question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Bake
Ingredients:
1 lg. cauliflower, cut into flowerets
1/2 tsp. salt
3 c. water
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 c. buttery cracker crumbs
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
1 med. onion, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped and undrained
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in a large saucepan, bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside.
Combine butter and next 4 ingredients in a large bowl, stir in cauliflower, 1 cup cheese, onion, chopped green pepper and tomatoes.
Spoon into a greased 13x9x2 inch baking dish.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.
Add remaining 1/2 cup cheese and bake 5 additional minutes.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Holiday Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 large head cauliflower
1 (2 oz.) can sliced mushrooms
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. shredded Swiss cheese
1 Tbsp. chopped pimento
Directions:
Bread cauliflower into medium sized flowerets; cook in boiling water until tender, about 10 minutes.
Drain well; set aside.
In saucepan, saute mushrooms in butter.
Blend in flour gradually. Stir in milk.
Cook, stirring constantly, over medium heat until thick.
Stir in salt, cheese and pimento.
Place 1/2 of cauliflower in buttered 2-quart casserole.
Cover with 1/2 the sauce.
Add remaining cauliflower and top with remaining sauce. Bake at 325° for 15 minutes.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Creole Cauliflower
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked chopped cauliflower
2 c. mashed cooked tomatoes
1/2 green pepper, chopped
1 onion, chopped
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. shredded cheese
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan; add onion and green pepper and brown lightly.
Blend in flour, stirring, then add tomatoes, salt and pepper.
Heat to boiling point and cook three minutes, stirring constantly.
Add cauliflower and heat through. Place mixture in casserole, top with cheese and bake at 350° until cheese melts and is lightly browned.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
olive oil flavored vegetable spray
1 medium onion, cut into thin slices
1 1/2 c. julienne cut carrots
1 1/2 c. fresh sugar snap peas
1 c. chopped red pepper
1/2 c. canned low sodium chicken broth (undiluted)
2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
Directions:
Coat a wok or large nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Heat at medium-high (375°) until hot.
Add onion.
Stir-fry 3 minutes. Add carrot.
Stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add peas and sweet red pepper. Stir-fry 4 to 5 minutes or until crisp-tender.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: "Stir-Fry Vegetables"
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
1 lb. bean sprouts
10 pea pods
2 c. cauliflower flowerets
2 c. broccoli flowerets
2 medium carrots, sliced
2 celery sticks, sliced
1 (8 oz.) pkg. mushrooms, sliced
1/2 medium bell pepper, sliced in rings or strips
1/2 medium brown onion, sliced in rings or strips
Directions:
In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat.
Add all vegetables, except onion, mushrooms and bell pepper.
Cook until vegetables are almost to the desired tenderness, then add the onion, mushrooms and bell pepper, adding as much soy sauce as desired to taste.
Cook up to 1/2 hour or until done to taste. Serve with rice, chow mein noodles or both.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 c. onion, cut into wedges
1 small bell pepper, julienned
1 stalk celery
1 carrot
1 c. mushrooms
1 clove garlic
1 small yellow squash (optional)
1 small zucchini (optional)
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. peanut oil
Directions:
Heat peanut oil in a wok or skillet until hot.
Stir-fry squash and carrots about 1 minute.
Add onion and celery for approximately 2 minutes.
Add the rest of the vegetables and stir-fry for another 1 to 2 minutes.
Add salt, pepper and soy sauce and stir-fry approximately 30 seconds.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 small onion, chopped
4 c. mixed, chopped vegetables (carrots, celery, broccoli, cauliflower, green peppers)
2 c. cooked chicken, beef or shrimp, chopped or cubed
Directions:
Heat oil in wok or skillet; add onion.
Saute until limp.
Add vegetables; cook until limp or to desired doneness.
Add meat. Stir until heated (3 to 4 minutes).
Remove from heat.
Let stand 4 or 5 minutes to heat and blend flavors.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Stir-Fried Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. oil
beef, sliced into thin chunks
1 c. green beans
1 c. carrots
1 c. celery
1 c. cabbage
1 can bean sprouts, drained
1 can bamboo shoots, drained
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. salt
1 small diced onion
Directions:
Wash vegetables.
Slant cut carrots and celery.
Chop cabbage. Heat oil in large frying pan over medium heat.
Add onion chunks and beef.
Saute until meat is done.
Add all vegetables.
Cook, stirring constantly, about 2 minutes.
Add salt and soy sauce. Cover.
Cook 1 minute.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Oats Cereal
Ingredients:
1 c. quick oats
1 c. brown sugar
6 c. coconut
1 c. oleo or butter
1 (12 oz.) can wheat germ
Directions:
Mix and roast until light brown.
Serve with milk.
Roast at 350°.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. rolled oats (breakfast oatmeal cereal)
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. melted shortening
1 yeast cake or 1 pkg. dry yeast
1/2 c. molasses or white or brown sugar
5 1/2 c. sifted flour
Directions:
Pour 2 cups boiling water over rolled oats; let sit for 1 hour, then add yeast softened in 1 cup warm water followed by remaining ingredients.
Add flour gradually, stirring until dough stiffens, then knead until all flour is absorbed.
Let dough rise in greased bowl until double.
Punch down.
Form into loaves.
Let rise again until double, then bake at 375° until golden brown, approximately 1 hour.
Remove from pans and cool on rack.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter, melted
1 c. brown sugar
2 eggs, beaten (optional)
3 c. quick oats
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
Directions:
Cream together the first 3 ingredients.
Add the rest to creamed mixture.
Bake in a 10 x 10-inch pan at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes, stirring occasionally (stirring is not a must).
Add raisins if desired.
Can be mixed the night before.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
1 c. oats
2 c. water
2 eggs, separated
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
1/4 c. honey
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 c. raisins
Directions:
Cook oats in water with salt for 5 minutes.
Beat egg whites until stiff.
Mix oats, egg yolks, melted butter, honey and raisins.
Fold in egg whites.
Pour into well-greased 8-inch pan and cook at 400° for 15 minutes or until set in the middle and light brown.
Recipe may be doubled.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. oats
2 c. buttermilk
2 eggs
1/4 c. butter, melted
1/2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. vanilla or cinnamon
1/4 tsp. salt
1/3 c. raisins (optional; we don't use)
Directions:
Mix oats and buttermilk in large bowl.
Let sit a while (a few minutes okay or overnight in refrigerator).
Beat in eggs and butter.
Add raisins, if used.
Add rest of ingredients.
Heat a lightly greased frying pan over moderate heat.
If batter is too thick, you can add up to 3 tablespoons more buttermilk.
Cook pancakes until a few bubbles appear.
Turn to brown other side. Makes about 18 pancakes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon, Fresh-Grilled Or Baked
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen salmon
2/3 c. onions, sliced
1 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/3 c. chopped fresh tomatoes
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1/4 c. parsley
3 Tbsp. chopped pimentos
1/2 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dill weed
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place salmon, skin side down, in baking dish which has been sprayed or greased and lined with aluminum foil.
Mix the vegetables, mushrooms, pimentos and parsley; put over fish.
Mix rest of ingredients and pour over fish.
Wrap foil over fish and seal tight.
Bake or grill 25 to 30 minutes at 350° or until flakes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Pacific Salmon With Roasted Garlic
Ingredients:
4 (6 oz.) salmon fillets
1 medium head garlic
1/4 c. olive oil
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
1 fresh lemon
fresh rosemary, chopped
Directions:
Separate garlic into cloves and peel. Place in small ramekin and cover with olive oil. Wrap with foil. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes. Place garlic and 1 tablespoon of oil from baked garlic in food processor. Add butter and puree; season with salt and fresh ground pepper.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Quick Salmon Casserole
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. sage
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 (1 lb.) can salmon, drained
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in order given; place in greased 8-inch casserole.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
Serve with thin white sauce.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Grilled Salmon With Salsa
Ingredients:
4 salmon steaks, cut 1-inch thick
1 medium cucumber, peeled, seeded and diced
1 large red bell pepper, diced
1 medium red onion, finely diced
2 large ripe tomatoes, seeded and diced
3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. plus 2 Tbsp. olive oil
Directions:
Grill salmon
4
to
6
inches
from
hot
coals, after brushing with 2 tablespoons olive oil.
Turn one time and cook 6 to 8 minutes on each side, or until fish flakes.
Serve with salsa sauce.
(If
steaks
are large, cut in half.) For sauce: Mix the vegetables
and
seasonings with 1/4 cup of olive oil. Place 1/3 of
the
mixture
in
blender
or food processor and blend 1 minute.
Stir
the blended mixture into the remaining chopped vegetables.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Salmon
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 c. dry white wine
3 Tbsp. chopped fresh herbs, such as chives, thyme, chervil, basil and parsley
2 tsp. grated lemon rind
1 whole chinook (king) salmon, butterflied with skin intact
Directions:
Melt 1 tablespoon of butter over low heat in a small, heavy saucepan.
Add the garlic and cook briefly.
Stir in wine and cook until reduced to 1/2 cup.
Add the remaining butter and stir until melted.
Stir in herbs and lemon rind.
Set aside.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
1 pkg. elbow macaroni
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 3/4 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar, grated
1/3 bread crumbs
1 1/2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Cook
macaroni	as
directed
and drain. Melt butter in heavy saucepan.
Blend in flour. Stir in milk slowly and cook, stirring constantly,
until	mixture thickens. Add seasonings and
cheese, stirring
until
cheese
melts. Add macaroni and transfer to a buttered 1-quart casserole. Combine bread crumbs and melted butter. Sprinkle over macaroni. Bake in a 400° oven for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac And Cheese For 30 People
Ingredients:
1 lb. elbow macaroni
2 1/2 lb. New York State cheese
6 eggs
1 qt. milk
2 tsp. dry mustard
1 stick margarine
2 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Boil macaroni according to directions on package; drain. While hot add grated cheese, saving some to put on top.
Add margarine and eggs which have been beaten into the milk.
Mix dry mustard with a little of the milk.
Place all in a large greased casserole. Spread cheese and bread crumbs on top.
Bake at 325° for 1 hour or until golden.
Delicious for large picnics or parties.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
8 slices American cheese
2 c. elbow macaroni, cooked
2 c. milk
1 bread slice
1/2 tsp. mustard powder
Directions:
Melt butter.
Add milk.
Add mustard powder.
Slowly add cheese.
Stir on low until sauce is thick.
Pour into baking dish with the macaroni.
Add broken bread bits.
Cook in oven at 350° for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac 'N' Cheese
Ingredients:
1 can condensed Cheddar cheese soup
1/2 can milk
1 tsp. prepared mustard
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 c. hot cooked elbow macaroni
2 tsp. margarine, melted
1 Tbsp. dry bread crumbs
Directions:
In a 1-quart casserole, combine soup, milk, mustard and pepper.
Stir in macaroni.
In a cup, combine margarine and bread crumbs.
Sprinkle over casserole and bake at 400° for 20 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
Yield:
4 side dish servings.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Mac & Cheese
Ingredients:
1 box elbow macaroni, (cooked & drained)
4 eggs
1 stick butter
3 c. mild shredded cheddar cheese
2 cans evaporated milk
salt & pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all ingredients.
Make very soupy.
Cover with tin foil. Bake in 350 degree oven for 35-40 minutes.
If too much liquid, remove foil and bake until liquid is absorbed.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. dried basil
3/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
2 1/2 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch cubes
Directions:
In a shallow bowl, combine the first 6 ingredients. Place melted butter in another. Dip chicken in butter and roll in crumbs. Place on a greased baking sheet and bake uncovered at 400° for 15 to 20 minutes or until juices run clear. Serve with your favorite dipping sauce.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Garden Style Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
1/2 pt. (8 oz.) sour cream
1/4 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. finely chopped garlic
2 lb. boneless chicken breast, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 1/2 c. plain dry bread crumbs
1 envelope vegetable soup mix
Directions:
In a medium bowl, thoroughly combine sour cream, mayonnaise, cheese, lemon juice and garlic.
Add chicken and toss until well coated.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts, skinned, boned and cut into bite size
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 c. plain flour
1/4 c. grated Parmesan
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 c. milk
corn oil or peanut oil
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients, mixing well.
Dip chicken in milk and dredge in flour mixture.
Heat one inch of oil in electric skillet to 325°.
Add chicken and fry 5 minutes on each side.
Drain on paper towels.
Makes 2 dozen nuggets.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Spiced Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
4 chicken breast halves, skinned and cubed
1/4 c. butter, melted
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. dried basil leaves
1/4 tsp. rubbed thyme
1/4 tsp. Cajun seasoning
1/2 c. dry breadcrumbs
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Put last 7 ingredients into a plastic bag and shake well. Place foil over a baking sheet.
Dip chicken pieces in butter and shake a few at a time in the bag.
Place on baking sheet and bake at 400° for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 tsp. sesame seed
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/4 c. water
1 lb. chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces
cooking oil
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Roll chicken in batter.
Fry in hot cooking oil until golden brown.
Drain.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Hearty Vegetable Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
7 c. water
1 (16 oz.) can whole tomatoes (undrained), cut into pieces
1/2 c. pearled barley
1/2 c. sliced celery
1/2 c. sliced carrots
4 beef bouillon cubes
1/2 tsp. crushed basil leaves
1 bay leaf
1 (9 oz.) pkg. frozen green beans or 16 oz. can undrained
Directions:
In 4-quart saucepan, brown meat in oil.
Add onion and garlic and continue cooking until onion is tender.
Drain.
Stir in remaining ingredients except green beans.
Cover, bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 50 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add green beans and continue cooking 10 minutes or until meat and barley are tender.
Additional water may be added if soup becomes too thick.
Makes twelve 1-cup servings.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Hearty Vegetable Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lean ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 garlic clove, minced
1 can (14 1/2 oz.) unsalted whole tomatoes undrained, cut into pieces
3/4 c. quick pearl barley or rice
5 1/2 c. water
1/2 c. sliced celery
1/2 c. sliced carrots
2 Beef Bouillon cubes
1/2 tsp. crushed basil
1 bay leaf
1 pkg. (9 oz.) frozen mixed vegetables
Directions:
Brown meat in Dutch oven.
Add onion & garlic till onion is tender.
Drain.
Stir in remaining ingredients except frozen vegetables.
Cover, bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir occasionally.
Add frozen vegetables.
Cook for 10 minutes until vegetables are done.
Additional water may be added if it becomes too thick upon standing.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Beef Barley Soup
Ingredients:
2 lb. boneless chuck, cut in 1/2-inch cubes
10 c. water
2 Tbsp. oil
1 1/2 c. medium barley
3 carrots, diced
1 c. chopped onion
3 large ribs celery with leaves, chopped coarse
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, cut up
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. chopped parsley
Directions:
In Dutch oven, bring beef and water to a boil.
Skim off foam.
Cover; simmer 1 hour.
Add remaining ingredients.
Stirring occasionally, simmer, uncovered, for 1 hour or until meat and barley are tender.
Serve immediately.
Refrigerate up to 3 days or freeze up to 3 months.
Serves 12.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Beef-Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1-inch cubes
8 c. water
2 beef flavor bouillon cubes
1/2 c. hot water
1 (14 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
1 c. carrots, sliced
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. barley
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat oil and beef; cook, stirring often, until brown.
Add 8 cups of water; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 1 hour or until meat is fork-tender.
With slotted spoon, remove meat.
With 2 forks, shred meat.
Set aside.
In cup, dissolve bouillon in 1/2 cup of water.
Add to soup kettle the tomatoes, carrots, onion, celery, barley, salt and pepper.
Stir in meat. Cover and simmer 1 1/2 to 2 hours until vegetables are tender.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Beef Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
2 lb. beef short ribs
2 medium onions, coarsely chopped
3 large carrots, sliced
3 celery stalks, sliced
1 can whole tomatoes with liquid, chopped
2 qt. water
4 chicken bouillon cubes
1/3 c. pearl barley
Directions:
In large Dutch oven or kettle, heat oil and brown beef.
Add onions, carrots, celery, tomatoes, water and bouillon, bring to a boil, cover and simmer for about 2 hours until beef is tender. Add barley and simmer again until barley is done.
Yields 3 1/2 quarts.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
2 lb. large raw shrimp
1/2 c. liquid Butter Buds
1/2 tsp. lite salt (optional)
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1/4 c. chopped parsley
2 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
6 lemon wedges (1 lemon)
4 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Remove shells from shrimp, leaving shell on tail section only.
Devein, wash under running water and drain on paper towels.
Spray a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish with a nonfat cooking spray.
Blend together liquid Butter Buds, lite salt, garlic and 2 tablespoons parsley.
Pour into prepared dish. Arrange shrimp in single layer in baking dish.
Bake, uncovered, 5 minutes.
Turn shrimp.
Sprinkle with lemon peel, lemon juice and remaining parsley.
Bake 8 to 10 minutes longer, or until just tender.
Arrange shrimp over cooked rice.
Pour garlic-Butter Buds mixture over shrimp.
Garnish with lemon wedges.
Do not overcook the shrimp or they will be tough.
If using smaller shrimp, cut down on cooking time.
Serve with sourdough or French bread to soak up the sauce.
Yields 8 servings.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
2 lb. shrimp, shelled and deveined
1 1/2 sticks margarine or butter
1 Tbsp. garlic or use garlic powder
1 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 c. chopped scallions or green onions
2 lemons (juice and grated rind of one; can use concentrated lemon juice)
Directions:
Melt margarine and add garlic, salt, pepper, parsley, scallions and lemons.
Grease a large shallow pan and place shrimp in single layer on bottom of pan.
Pour butter mixture over shrimp.
Place under broiler for 5 minutes, until pink.
Remove. Serve on bed of rice.
Can pour butter sauce over rice.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. large fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 c. butter, melted
1/4 c. olive oil
1 Tbsp. dried parsley flakes
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. garlic powder
3/4 tsp. dried whole basil
1/2 tsp. dried whole oregano
Directions:
Place shrimp in a single layer in a 15 x 10 x 1-inch jelly roll pan.
Set aside.
Combine next 8 ingredients.
Pour over shrimp.
Bake at 450° for 5 minutes or until shrimp is done.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
8 Tbsp. butter
3 to 6 cloves garlic, finely chopped
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. dried parsley flakes
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 lb. shrimp, shelled
Directions:
In shallow baking dish, combine all ingredients except shrimp. Microwave, uncovered, at High level for 4 to 5 minutes or until hot, stirring twice.
Stir shrimp into butter sauce.
Cover. Microwave at High for 5 to 7 1/2 minutes or until shrimp curl and turn pink.
Let stand, covered, 3 to 5 minutes before serving. Yield:
4 servings.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi(Makes 4 Servings)
Ingredients:
2 lb. large shrimp
1/2 c. olive oil
2 tsp. finely chopped garlic
2 Tbsp. finely chopped parsley
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper flakes
1/2 tsp. dried, crushed oregano
2 Tbsp. bread crumbs
salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat broiler to high.
Peel shrimp, rinse, drain well and pat dry.
Mix the remaining ingredients in a large bowl.
Add shrimp and mix to coat well.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna With White Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 large onion, chopped
1 can tomatoes with liquid, cut up
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1 beef bouillon cube
1 1/2 tsp. Italian seasoning
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. ground red pepper
2 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. milk
1 1/4 c. shredded Mozzarella
10 to 12 uncooked lasagna noodles
Directions:
In Dutch oven, cook beef and onion until meat is brown; drain. Add tomatoes, tomato paste, bouillon and seasonings.
Cover and cook for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
2/3 lb. ground beef
1 Tbsp. butter
2 peeled and chopped onions
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can crushed tomatoes
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1 beef bouillon cube
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Saute ground beef in butter.
Transfer to a pot.
Saute onions; add to meat.
Also add remaining ingredients; cook over medium-low heat, covered, for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. oil
1 can mushrooms
1 (1 lb.) can tomatoes
12 oz. tomato paste
2 c. water
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. garlic
3/4 c. chopped onion
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
2 lb. Ricotta cheese
2 eggs
parsley and oregano
8 oz. shredded Mozzarella
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Brown ground beef and onion in oil.
Add next 10 ingredients. Simmer uncovered.
Stir occasionally 30 minutes.
Cook noodles as directed.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 large can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 c. American cheese, grated
6 noodles
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. basil
Directions:
Brown meat and onion; drain.
Add tomato sauce and remaining ingredients, except noodles and cheeses. Simmer 15 minutes. Cook noodles until tender.
Layer 3 noodles and half of the hamburger mixture.
Sprinkle with half of each cheese.
Repeat.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
24 oz. tomatoes
1 Tbsp. parsley
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. oregano
1 clove garlic
1 lb. small curd cottage cheese
2 eggs, beaten
2 Tbsp. salt
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. parsley
3 pkg. Kraft sliced Mozzarella cheese
6 lasagna noodles
Directions:
Brown the ground beef.
Add the next 6 ingredients.
Simmer meat mixture for 45 minutes; stir occasionally.
Combine the cottage cheese, eggs, salt, Parmesan cheese and parsley.
Set the cottage cheese mixture aside until ready to use.
Prepare 6 lasagna noodles.
Grease a 9 x 13 x 2-inch pan.
Place 3 noodles on bottom.
Cover with 1/2 of the cottage cheese mixture.
Cover with 6 slices Mozzarella cheese.
Cover with 1/2 of the meat mixture.
Place remaining 3 noodles on top of mixture.
Cover with remaining cottage cheese mixture, 6 more slices Mozzarella cheese and remaining meat mixture.
Bake at 375° for 45 minutes.
Let stand 20 minutes before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Sugarless Cake*
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 1/2 c. applesauce
1 c. dates or raisins
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. whole wheat flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. nuts or cranberries
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients.
Beat eggs and vanilla; add to dry mixture.
Add melted butter, applesauce, raisins and nuts.
Bake in tube pan in 350 °oven for 45 minutes to 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Sugarless Fruit Cake(Yields 2 Loaf Pans)
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped dates
1 c. chopped prunes
1 c. chopped raisins
1/2 c. margarine
2 c. water
4 eggs
2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. cinnamon
2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. chopped nuts
4 pkg. Sweet 'N Low
Directions:
Place first 5 ingredients in saucepan.
Bring to a boil and simmer 2 minutes.
Cool.
Add remaining ingredients and bake for 40 minutes at 350° in 2 loaf pans, coated with vegetable spray.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Diabetic Sugarless Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. raisins
1 sq. baking chocolate
1 c. chopped apple
1 tsp. baking powder
1 egg
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. water
1/2 c. margarine
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1 1/2 Tbsp. liquid sweetener
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Chop raisins and boil water and raisins for 5 minutes in a 2-quart pan.
Remove from heat and add apples, chocolate and margarine.
When mixture is cool, stir in flour, baking powder and soda.
Add egg, liquid sweetener (Sweet 10) and vanilla.
Beat 1 minute by hand and stir in nuts.
Bake in 9 x 9-inch pan for 40 minutes at 350°.
Cut into pieces, wrap and store in freezer. Contains 175 calories per piece.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: No Sugar Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. water
1 c. raisins
1 c. applesauce
2 eggs
3/4 c. corn oil
1 tsp. baking soda
2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. sugar (10 pkg. Equal)
Directions:
Cook raisins in water until soft; drain off water.
Mix applesauce, eggs, sweetener and oil very well.
Add baking soda and flour.
Add remaining ingredients and stir in the raisins.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Makes 1 large cake or 2 dozen cupcakes.
One cupcake equals 1 fruit and 1 fat.
Sprinkle with chopped walnuts or "no sugar" coconut before baking if desired.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. all-purpose flour
3/4 c. unsweetened cocoa powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 c. margarine or butter
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 egg
1 egg white
1/2 c. plain low-fat yogurt
1 c. cold water
1/4 c. seedless red raspberry preserves
sifted powdered sugar
Directions:
Lightly grease and flour two 8 x 1 1/2-inch or 9 x 1 1/2-inch round baking pans.
Stir together flour, cocoa powder and baking soda.
In large mixer bowl beat margarine or butter with electric mixer on medium speed about 30 seconds.
Add sugar and vanilla; beat until well combined.
Add egg and egg white, one at a time, beating 1 minute after each.
Stir in yogurt.
Add dry ingredients and cold water alternately to beaten mixture, beating on low speed after each addition just until combined.
Pour batter into baking pans.
Bake in a 350° oven for 25 to 30 minutes for 9-inch layers or 30 to 35 minutes for 8-inch layers or until a wooden toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
Cool 10 minutes on wire racks, then remove from pans.
Cool.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger Patties
Ingredients:
3 c. water
2/3 c. pearl barley
2/3 c. lentils
2/3 c. long grain brown rice
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 c. grated carrots
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 Tbsp. minced garlic
1/4 c. shelled sunflower seeds
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh basil
2 tsp. chopped fresh thyme
2 tsp. chopped fresh oregano
salt and pepper to taste
4 beaten eggs
7 Tbsp. flour
vegetable oil for frying
Directions:
Dried herbs can be substituted, use smaller amounts.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger
Ingredients:
1 medium red bell pepper
1 medium green bell pepper
1 onion
1/2 to 1 small garlic clove
1 large carrot
1/2 c. mushrooms
1 c. couscous (Moroccan pasta)
1 egg
Directions:
Ground bell pepper, onion, garlic, carrot and mushrooms.
(May chop fine in food processor for best results).
Cook 1 cup of couscous as directed on box of pasta.
Add to ground ingredients, then add 1 scrambled egg.
Mix well.
Roll out to patties.
Bake or fry as desired.
Serve on hamburger buns (cheese optional).
May use rice instead of couscous.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked lentils
1 c. plain bread crumbs
3 egg whites
1 c. cooked spinach
1/2 c. chopped carrots, cooked
1/2 c. chopped green onions
1 c. shredded Cheddar
1 Tbsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. olive oil
salt to taste
8 wheat buns
Directions:
Combine lentils, bread crumbs, egg whites, spinach, carrots, onions, Cheddar cheese, salt and pepper in a bowl.
Shape into 6 equal patties.
Place on baking sheet.
Refrigerate for 2 hours.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Hamburgers
Ingredients:
1 can (20 oz.) vegeburger
6 eggs, beaten
1 large onion, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
1 tsp. sage
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
3/4 c. cracker crumbs
1 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Saute onion and green pepper and add to burger.
Mix all ingredients together. Fry in patties, 1/2 cup per bun.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Garden Burgers
Ingredients:
1 egg white
1/4 c. fine dry bread crumbs
1/4 c. finely shredded carrot
1/4 c. finely chopped onion
1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1 lb. ground turkey, veal or lean beef
1 medium tomato, sliced
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine egg white and bread crumbs.
(If using veal or beef, stir in 2 tablespoons water.)
Stir in carrot, onion, green pepper, salt and pepper.
Add Parmesan cheese and ground meat; mix well.
Shape meat mixture into four 3/4-inch patties.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon, Fresh-Grilled Or Baked
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen salmon
2/3 c. onions, sliced
1 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/3 c. chopped fresh tomatoes
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1/4 c. parsley
3 Tbsp. chopped pimentos
1/2 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dill weed
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place salmon, skin side down, in baking dish which has been sprayed or greased and lined with aluminum foil.
Mix the vegetables, mushrooms, pimentos and parsley; put over fish.
Mix rest of ingredients and pour over fish.
Wrap foil over fish and seal tight.
Bake or grill 25 to 30 minutes at 350° or until flakes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Baked Salmon
Ingredients:
3/4 to 1 c. bread crumbs or cracker crumbs
2 c. (1 lb.) Royal Pink salmon
1/4 tsp. pepper
3/4 tsp. sage
2 tsp. minced onion
2 tsp. chopped parsley
2 tsp. chopped pickles
4 Tbsp. butter, melted
1/4 c. milk
Directions:
Drain salmon; flake in large pieces.
Arrange in bottom of medium sized shallow casserole.
Mix together remaining ingredients.
Spread over salmon and bake in a moderate oven at 400° about 25 minutes.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Cakes
Ingredients:
1 large can salmon
1/4 c. milk
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1 egg
shortening
1 Tbsp. onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. green pepper, chopped fine
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Put salmon in bowl, flake and remove bones.
Beat egg. Combine with milk, crumbs and other ingredients.
Add to salmon. Mix well.
Shape into 6 cakes.
Place in hot shortening over medium heat and brown on both sides.
Serve with tartar sauce, if desired.
These may also be baked at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Baked Salmon
Ingredients:
3 or 4 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. dill
1 large clove garlic
2 slices lemon
1/2 to 1 onion
Directions:
Saute ingredients.
Clean salmon; lay on heavy aluminum foil. Pour ingredients over and inside of fish.
Top with lemon slices and onion slices.
Fold over foil and seal.
Can be baked in oven for 1 hour at 350° or put on the barbecue grill; turn over once during baking time.
Baking time depends on the size of the fish.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Bake
Ingredients:
1 (15 1/2 oz.) can pink or red salmon
1 egg
1/3 c. mayonnaise
1 can celery soup
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
1 c. cracker crumbs
1/4 c. onion (optional)
dash of salt and pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients in a large bowl.
Put in a covered casserole.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Goes well with potatoes and peas.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mango Salsa
Ingredients:
3 ripe mangos, peeled, seeded and chopped
1/2 sweet onion, chopped
1 tomato, chopped
3 Tbsp. cilantro
3 Tbsp. lime juice
3/4 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients; cover and chill. Serve as a relish for grilled fish or as a dip for chips.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mango Salsa
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. chopped mango
1 1/2 c. chopped tomato
2 Tbsp. minced fresh cilantro
2 Tbsp. lime juice
1 Tbsp. jalapeno, finely chopped and seeded
1 tsp. fresh ginger, peeled and minced
Directions:
Combine and chill.
Can use this with grilled meats and fish.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Papaya Or Mango Salsa
Ingredients:
6 sprigs cilantro, stemmed and chopped
1 large mango, peeled and diced
2 jalapenos, seeded and finely diced
1/2 small red onion, peeled and diced
1 to 2 limes, juiced
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all ingredients well and allow to sit, refrigerated, for at least 1 hour.
You may make salsa ahead of serving time but only by 24 hours or less.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mango Salsa(Great With Salmon Or Beef Tenderloin.)
Ingredients:
1 mango, chopped
1/2 red bell pepper, chopped
1/3 c red onion, chopped
1/4 fresh cilantro, chopped
3 Tbsp fresh lime juice
1/3 c jalapeno jelly
1/3 c jalapeno chile, or part of it
Directions:
Whisk jelly and lime juice in large bowl.
Mix with remaining ingredients.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Can be made 3 hours ahead.
Marshall Fields has a mild red pepper jelly that is nice to use.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Giant Tacos
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground meat
1 can tomato soup
1 pkg. taco mix
2 large onions
1 c. water
1 can (Trappeys) jalapeno pinto beans
Directions:
Brown meat and chopped onions.
Add other ingredients.
Simmer about 20 minutes, stirring several times.
Put amount of regular Fritos on your plate that you think you need.
Add the meat mixture, sharp grated cheese, chopped lettuce and fresh chopped tomatoes.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
5 oz. all-purpose white flour
4 to 6 c. cooking apples (1 1/2 to 2 lb.), peeled, cored and thinly sliced
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. butter
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. lemon rind, grated
Directions:
Combine 1/2 cup sugar and 1 ounce flour in mixing bowl. Squeeze lemon juice over apple slices.
Toss apples with sugar mixture.
Put
in
ovenproof
baking
dish.
Thoroughly
mix butter,
remaining
flour
and
cinnamon.
Add
lemon rind and remaining
1/2 cup of sugar.
Sprinkle mixture over apples and bake
in
oven
at 350° for 30 minutes or until golden.
Serve warm with ice cream.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. oats
1 c. packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
3 to 4 green apples, peeled and sliced to make 6 c.
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. white sugar
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix together 1 1/2 cups flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon and melted butter.
Press 1/2 of mixture in bottom of a 9 x 12-inch greased baking dish.
In a large bowl, combine sliced apples with 1 tablespoon flour and 1 tablespoon sugar.
Turn into crust. Sprinkle with remaining half of mixture.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour. Serve warm with whipped cream or ice cream, if desired.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Crumbled Apples
Ingredients:
6 tart apples
1/4 c. flour
3/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
4 Tbsp. butter
3/4 c. hot water
Directions:
Quarter apples and place in buttered pan.
Mix flour, sugar, cinnamon, butter and water.
Pour over apples and bake at 350°. Can be served hot or cold or with milk.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
5 to 6 c. sliced pared apples (I use 6)
1 1/4 c. Bisquick
2/3 c. sugar
1 egg
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. cinnamon (I use more)
a little allspice
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Grease an 8 x 8-inch square pan or a 10 x 6-inch rectangular baking dish.
Arrange apples in dish.
Mix Bisquick, sugar and egg until crumbly; sprinkle over apples. Drizzle margarine over top.
Sprinkle cinnamon and allspice over top.
Bake until topping is golden brown and apples are tender, 30 to 35 minutes.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
3/4 c. nonfat dry milk
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 c. oleo
3 c. sliced apples
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients. Cut in oleo until mixture is crumbly. Arrange apples in shallow, well-greased pan. Sprinkle apples with dry mixture and cover baking dish. Bake at 350° about 30 minutes or until apples are tender. Remove cover and bake a few minutes longer until crumbs are brown.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Basic Cheesecake(Easy, Delicious!)
Ingredients:
4 eggs
1 c. sugar
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
2 tsp. vanilla
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Place all ingredients in blender.
Blend on High for 1 minute or 3 minutes with an electric mixer.
Pour into an 8-inch graham cracker
crust, or it is great without a crust as well. Microwave on Low for 19 to 23 minutes, rotating dish 1/4 turn every 7 minutes until center is almost set.
(Cut through it with a knife to see if it is set.
When knife is clean, it's ready.) Makes 1 (8-inch) cheesecake.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Old Fashion Cheesecake
Ingredients:
3 (8 oz.) cream cheese
1 (8 oz.) sour cream
1 1/3 c. sugar
2 tsp. vanilla
5 eggs
1 pkg. crescent rolls
raisins (optional)
cinnamon (optional)
Directions:
Blend cheeses.
Add sugar and vanilla.
Add eggs, one at a time, and beat after each egg.
Line bottom of a 9 x 13-inch pan with rolls, pressing seams together.
Pour in batter.
Top with cinnamon and raisins.
Bake at 375° for 35 to 45 minutes.
If using a glass pan, bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.
Turn off oven and leave cake inside 5 to 7 minutes.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Baked Cheesecake
Ingredients:
2 c. graham crackers
1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. melted butter
4 eggs
1 c. sugar
1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. lemon rind, grated
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. light cream
3 c. dry cottage cheese (Ricotta)
1/4 c. flour
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Combine crumb with next 3 ingredients. Reserve 3/4 cup with spoon.
Press the rest to bottom and sides of 9-inch spring-form.
Beat eggs light, slowly beat in 1 cup sugar. Add next 5 ingredients and beat with hand or beater until blended.
Sieve.
Stir in lemon rind.
Pour into pan.
Sprinkle with reserved crumbs.
Bake at 350°
for 1 hour.
Turn off heat, open oven door.
Cool cake in oven for 1 hour.
Don't fret, it will settle.
Chill.
Remove pan sides.
Makes 10 to 12 servings.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Easy Baked Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yellow cake mix
1 Tbsp. oil
4 eggs
2 pkg. (8 oz. each) cream cheese
1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
whipped topping (optional)
fruit topping (optional)
powdered sugar (optional)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 300°.
Set aside 1 cup of dry cake mix.
Stir together remaining dry cake mix, 1 egg and oil.
(Mixture will be crumbly.)
Press crust mixture lightly into bottom and three-quarters of the way up the sides of a greased pan (13 x 9 x 2-inch or spring-loaded round).

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
1 lb. cream cheese
1 stick butter, melted
3 Tbsp. flour
4 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 lb. sour cream
1 1/2 c. sugar
3 jumbo eggs
3 Tbsp. cornstarch
4 1/2 tsp. fresh lemon juice
Directions:
Place ingredients in order given in a large mixing bowl.
Beat with electric mixer; start on low speed, then move to medium and finish with about 10 minutes on high speed.
Batter should be smooth and liquid.
Grease and lightly flour a round baking pan 10 inches in diameter and 3 inches high.
Pour batter into pan; bake for 1 hour in preheated 350° oven.
Leave cake in oven, with door closed, for an additional hour after heat is turned off, then cool on rack.
Refrigerate for storage.
Makes 20 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Garlic Herb Butter
Ingredients:
2/3 c. oleo
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. dry oregano
Directions:
Soften oleo and stir in remaining ingredients.
Use to make garlic bread; put on chicken.
Cook 1 cup spiral pasta according to package directions and drain well.
Put into serving bowl or dish.
Add 2 tablespoons or more to taste and toss well to coat pasta.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Easy Garlic Pasta
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. basil
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 c. butter/margarine (room temperature)
8 oz. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/3 c. Parmesan, grated
1/4 c. olive oil
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
1/2 Tbsp. pepper
2/3 c. boiling water
Directions:
Blend parsley and basil into butter.
Blend this with cream cheese.
Add Parmesan, olive oil, garlic and pepper.
When pasta is ready, drain.
Add 2/3 cup boiling water to cheese mixture. Stir and toss with pasta.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Buttered Noodles
Ingredients:
9 c. wide egg noodles, uncooked
1/4 c. (1/2 stick) real butter
2 tsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
In saucepan over low heat, add remaining ingredients.
Heat until butter is melted; stir in hot pasta.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until thoroughly heated.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Seasoned Buttery Vegetables And Noodles
Ingredients:
9 c. (12 oz. pkg.) extra wide egg noodles, uncooked
1/3 c. butter
2 c. fresh broccoli florets
1 c. green pepper strips
1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/2 c. chopped fresh basil leaves or 1 Tbsp. dried basil leaves
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions and drain. Meanwhile, in large saucepan, melt butter.
Add broccoli, green pepper and mushrooms.
Cook just until tender.
Add hot pasta and remaining ingredients, heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally. Sprinkle with cheese, if desired.
Yields 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Garlic Butter(3 Pound Recipe)
Ingredients:
3 (1 lb.) containers whipped soft butter
1/2 tsp. onion salt
1 1/2 Tbsp. wet garlic
1/3 c. dry crushed basil
1/3 c. crushed oregano
1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in mixing bowl.
Mix thoroughly until whipped smooth.
Put into container and refrigerate.
Use as needed.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
4 lb. stew meat (1 1/2-inch cubes)
4 Tbsp. oil
3 small onions
3 c. water or beef broth
8 to 10 carrots (1-inch chunks)
12 oz. pkg. snow peas or 2 pkg. green beans
Directions:
Mix
well
flour,
salt
and
pepper,
then roll meat in mixture
and
brown
in
oil using large Dutch oven, then brown onions.
Add water and carrots; bring to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer
2 to 2 1/2 hours until meat is tender, then add peas or beans.
Cover
and
continue
to
cook until meat is completely done.
Can be stored in freezer.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Cabbage Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground round
1 head cabbage
3 fresh carrots
1 medium onion
1 (10 oz.) frozen broccoli
1 (10 oz.) frozen corn
1 (10 oz.) frozen green beans
1 (15 oz.) can crowder peas
1 (15 oz.) can diced tomatoes
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
about 3 c. water
salt, pepper, garlic, oregano, basil and thyme to taste
Directions:
Saute ground round in 8-quart pot with onion; toss in shredded cabbage, cook until tender, adding water as needed.
Add spices and stir, to meat and cabbage.
Dice carrots, add to pot. Add 2 cups water, cover with lid; cook until tender.
Add green beans, broccoli and corn; cook until tender.
Add diced tomatoes and tomato sauce and 1 cup water and crowder peas.
Stir and cook for 1 to 2 hours on low-medium.
Add more water and spices as needed.
Serves about 12.
Serve with corn bread.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Chicken Stew
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 medium onion, finely chopped
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. minced fresh ginger or 1 tsp. ground ginger
2 Tbsp. flour
2 medium tomatoes, diced
8 to 10 peppercorns or to taste
6 whole cloves
1 cinnamon stick
8 pieces chicken (about 2 1/2 lb.), skinned and fat removed
2 c. water
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
3/4 lb. baby carrots (fresh or frozen)
6 oz. green peas (fresh or frozen)
8 oz. red or white new potatoes, scrubbed and unpeeled
Directions:
In a deep skillet or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Saute onion, ginger and garlic until onion is soft, about 3 minutes.
Add flour and cook 1 minute, stirring quickly to prevent sticking.
Stir in tomatoes and allow to cook another 2 minutes.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef for stew, cut into 3/4 inch cubes
1/3 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 lb. bacon
1 (1 3/8 oz.) envelope onion soup mix
3 c. water
1 (1 lb.) can (2 c.) tomato sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. barley
1 (29 oz.) can Veg-All homestyle-mixed vegetables (including juice)
Directions:
Coat beef with flour seasoned with salt and mustard.
Cut bacon 1 inch pieces; fry in Dutch oven.
Remove bacon pieces; add beef to bacon drippings.
Brown beef on all sides.
Add soup mix and Veg-All liquid plus water to give you 3 cups.
Cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Add tomato juice, sugar and barley.
Cover and simmer for 45 minutes.
Add bacon and Veg-All home-style vegetables.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef And Vegetable Stew
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. salt, divided
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces
2 Tbsp. oil
1 onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
4 parsnips (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
4 carrots (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
4 red skin potatoes (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
2 c. red wine or beef stock
1 1/2 tsp. dried thyme
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Combine flour, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper in plastic bag.
Add beef and shake until coated.
In large pot or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add meat in batches and cook until browned, about 20 minutes.
Remove meat. Reduce heat to medium.
Add onion, garlic and remaining 1 teaspoon salt.
Cook until onion is tender, about 5 minutes.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Pad Thai(Stir-Fry Thai Noodles)
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. dried rice flour noodles (noodles can be found in Asian grocery store)
8 medium shrimp
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 large eggs
2 Tbsp. distilled vinegar
2 Tbsp. fish sauce
3 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. paprika
2 scallions, cut in 2-inch pieces
1 c. bean sprouts
1 garlic clove
1/2 c. roast unsalted peanuts, crushed
coriander sprigs for garnish
Directions:
Soak noodles in warm water for 30 minutes or until softened. Do not let noodles become mushy.
Drain and discard water.
Set noodles aside.
Heat oil over medium-high heat until hot.
Add garlic and stir-fry for 20 seconds.
Add shrimp and stir-fry for 2 to 3 minutes.
Set shrimp aside.
Add eggs, stirring constantly and breaking it into pieces.
Push eggs aside.
Add noodles, vinegar, fish sauce, sugar and paprika and toss gently over medium heat for about 1 to 2 minutes.
Add scallions, bean sprouts and shrimp.
Mix all together for about 2 minutes.
Place noodles on a large platter.
Sprinkle crushed peanuts over noodles and garnish with the coriander sprigs and bean sprouts.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Pad Thaismall Width Noodles
Ingredients:
1 bag (16 oz.) Pad Thai Noodles
1 Clove Garlic
4 Tbsp. Peanut Oil
1 Egg
16 to 24 Shrimp (1 1/4 lbs.)
2 Tbsp. White Vinegar
1 1/2 Tbsp. Fish Sauce
1 Tbsp. Sugar
1/4 c. Ground Peanuts
1 tsp. Pepper
1 tsp. Ground Dried Shrimp
1 Scallion
1 c. Fresh Cilantro
Directions:
Soak the noodles in cold water overnight or 15 minutes in hot water.
Shell and devein shrimp.
Chop scallion and cilantro. Grind or crush the peanuts.
Preheat the oil in the WOK on medium-high, then add garlic and shrimp then stir until the shrimp turns white, add the egg and stir till cooked, add the noodles and all of the seasonings, stir or toss well.
Turn heat off, add bean sprouts and scallions.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Thai Chicken
Ingredients:
1/3 c. finely chopped green onions
2 crushed garlic cloves
3 Tbsp. hoisin sauce
2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. Tabasco sauce
8 skinned chicken thighs
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Combine first 8 ingredients.
Mix well.
Arrange chicken in shallow baking dish, single layer.
Spread sauce on top. Marinate for 2 hours.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Thai Fruited Rice
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
cold, cooked rice (6 c. or so)
1/2 red bell pepper, finely diced
2 or 3 green onions, slivered
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 small can mandarin oranges
1 mango, diced
1 Tbsp. toasted sesame seed (optional)
Directions:
Stir-fry in 2 tablespoons of oil.
Toss in wok while cooking. Can keep warm in low oven.
Good served with chicken, pork or fish.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Spicy Thai Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) can tomatoes
1/4 c. raisins
2 Tbsp. currant jelly
1 Tbsp. canned chopped green chili peppers
1 clove garlic
2 tsp. vinegar
1/2 to 1 tsp. crushed red pepper
dash of salt
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) broiler-fryer chicken, cut up
Directions:
For sauce, place all ingredients except chicken in a blender container or food processor bowl. Cover and blend or process until smooth. Transfer to a small saucepan.
Heat to boiling. Reduce heat.
Simmer, uncovered, 10 minutes or until mixture reaches brushing consistency.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Beans For Strict Fast
Ingredients:
1 large can Great Northern beans
1 (15 oz.) can tomatoes
2 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. oil
salt to taste
Directions:
In a saucepan, heat through the beans and the can of tomatoes, add salt to taste.
In a skillet, heat the oil; add flour and brown, making a smooth paste.
Add slowly to bean mixture to thicken.
Cook through until heated.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: No Beans Dip
Ingredients:
1 (15 oz.) can chili (no beans)
1 (10 oz.) can tomatoes
1 small can green chilies, diced
2 c. pasteurized processed cheese, cubed
1/2 c. green onions, chopped
1 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
In saucepan, combine all ingredients.
Heat just until cheese melts, stirring frequently.
Serve warm, with raw vegetables (celery, carrots, etc.).
Even French bread slices are good. Makes 4 cups.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Green Beans And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
3 cans cut-style green beans, drained
1 can stewed tomatoes
1 medium onion, minced
1/2 stick oleo
Directions:
Saute the onion until limp and mix in the rest of the ingredients.
Simmer 30 minutes and put into casserole.
Cover and reheat leftovers.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Tomato Surprise
Ingredients:
1 (1 lb.) can stewed tomatoes
1 (3 oz.) pkg. jello (lemon, strawberry or mixed fruit)
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. lemon juice or vinegar
Directions:
Pour tomatoes into saucepan, saving can for mold.
Bring tomatoes to a boil; add jello and salt.
Stir until dissolved.
Add lemon juice or vinegar.
Pour into can.
Chill until firm.
Yields 2 cups, 4 size servings or 6 relish servings.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Marinated Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 can wax beans
1 can lima beans, small, green
1 can corn
1 can kidney beans
1 can green peas
1 green pepper, chopped
1 or 2 stalks celery, chopped
1 onion, chopped
dash of salt and pepper
3/4 c. sugar
3/4 c. vinegar
1/3 c. salad oil
Directions:
Drain excess juice from all canned vegetables.
Combine vegetables; add onion, pepper and celery.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
combine sugar and liquid ingredients.
Stir and pour over vegetables.
Mix well; cover and refrigerate 8 to 10 hours.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken, cut into thin strips
3 c. cut up fresh vegetables (broccoli, carrot, sweet red pepper, green pepper)
1/4 tsp. garlic powder or 2 cloves garlic, minced
1 can tomato soup
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. vinegar
Directions:
In skillet, in 1 tablespoon hot oil, stir-fry half of the chicken until browned.
Remove and repeat with remaining chicken. In remaining 1 tablespoon hot oil, stir-fry vegetables with garlic powder until tender and crisp.
Add soup, soy and vinegar.
Heat to boiling.
Return chicken to skillet.
Heat through, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 lb. boneless chicken
1 c. broccoli
1 c. carrots
1 c. red peppers
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 can tomato soup
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. vinegar
cooked rice
Directions:
In skillet, cook 1 tablespoon oil and half the chicken until browned.
Remove.
Repeat with remaining chicken.
In remaining 1 tablespoon of oil, stir-fry vegetables with ginger and garlic powder until tender-crisp.
Add soup, soy sauce and vinegar.
Heat to a boil; return chicken to skillet.
Heat through, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry(Method:  Skillet)
Ingredients:
1 lb. chicken (boneless), sliced in thin strips
6 to 8 mushrooms, sliced thin
4 scallions, sliced
4 Tbsp. oil
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 carrots, sliced thin
1/2 head broccoli, sliced thin
1 can water chestnuts, drained
4 cloves garlic, chopped
Directions:
Put 2 tablespoons oil in pan.
Heat; cook chicken about 2 minutes, stirring often.
Remove chicken.
Add remaining oil and carrots, onions, mushrooms, garlic and water chestnuts.
Stir-fry until carrots are tender (2 minutes).
Add chicken, soy sauce and broccoli; stir-fry until broccoli is tender, about 1 minute.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 bag frozen vegetables (broccoli, cauliflower, peas and carrots)
6 chicken breasts, skinned and boned
3 Tbsp. oil
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 small can sliced mushrooms
1 medium onion
2 green peppers
1 can sliced water chestnuts
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 small head cabbage
3 c. rice
Directions:
Cut chicken in 1 1/2-inch strips.
Put oil in wok.
Add chicken and soy sauce; brown chicken and remove.
Add onion, peppers, cabbage and frozen vegetables to wok.
After these have cooked until crisp-tender, add chicken.
Drain water chestnuts and mushrooms (reserving liquids) and add to wok.
Mix cornstarch with reserved liquid and add to mixture; cook 2 or 3 minutes.
Cook rice according to directions on package and serve with this stir-fry.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into thin strips
1 (16 oz.) bag frozen vegetable combination, thawed
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 can tomato soup
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. vinegar
4 c. hot cooked rice
Directions:
In a skillet, over medium-high heat, in 1 tablespoon hot oil, stir-fry half of the chicken until browned.
Remove.
Repeat with remaining chicken.
Over medium heat, in remaining 1 tablespoon hot oil, stir-fry vegetables with ginger and garlic powder until tender-crisp.
Add soup, soy sauce and vinegar.
Heat to boiling. Return chicken to skillet.
Heat through.
Serve over rice.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
7 eggs, separated
2 1/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 c. Wesson oil
3 Tbsp. lemon rind and extract
3/4 c. water
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Separate eggs.
In egg whites, add 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar and beat well until very stiff.
In yolks, add flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, oil, extract, rind and water.
Beat well until creamy.
Fold into egg whites, do not beat.
Pour into 10 inch tube pan.
Do not grease.
Bake at 325° for 50 minutes and 375° for 10 minutes more.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. cake flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. Wesson oil
3/4 c. water
1 Tbsp. lemon flavoring
7 eggs, separated
1 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, oil, water, lemon flavoring and egg yolks until smooth.
Beat egg whites with cream of tartar until very stiff and dry (about 5 minutes).
Fold into flour mixture and pour into ungreased tube pan.
Bake for 1 hour in preheated 300° oven.
Remove from oven and invert pan over a bottle to cool for at least 1 hour.
May be glazed.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. salad oil
7 egg yolks
2 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. grated lemon rind
1 c. egg whites
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
3 Tbsp. butter
3 c. sifted powdered sugar
1/2 c. drained crushed pineapple
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Sift flour, sugar, baking powder and 1 teaspoon salt into bowl.
Make well in center.
Add oil, egg yolks, 3/4 cup cold water, vanilla and lemon rind.
Beat until smooth.
Beat egg whites and cream of tartar until stiff peaks form (do not underbeat).
Pour egg yolk mixture gradually over egg whites; fold gently until blended.
Do not overmix.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
1 orange chiffon sponge cake
3 pkg. lemon Jell-O chiffon pie filling
2/3 c. sugar
Directions:
Mix pie filling as directed on box.
Cut down sugar amount to 2/3 cup.
Break up half of sponge cake.
Put into a large spring-form tin (greased).
Pour 1/2 of pie filling mixture over cake in pan.
Repeat and put in refrigerator overnight.
Serve with Cool Whip.
Decorate with strawberries or coconut if desired.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake(Angel Food Mix)
Ingredients:
1 pkg. angel food cake mix
1 c. water
1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. oil
3 eggs
2 to 3 Tbsp. grated lemon peel
Directions:
Move bottom rack in oven to lowest position.
Heat to 350°. Beat egg whites as directed, using only 1 cup water.
Mix four packets with remaining ingredients.
Fold the two together.
Bake in angel food cake pan 40 to 50 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Lemon-Garlic Pasta
Ingredients:
8 oz. spaghetti
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. parsley, chopped
1 tsp. lemon rind, grated
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook spaghetti in salted water to desired doneness; drain. Mince garlic.
In pan, heat oil and butter.
Add garlic.
Cook for 1 minute.
Add to other ingredients.
Toss well.
Test for seasoning.
Add pepper and salt for taste.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Lemony Pasta
Ingredients:
4 oz. uncooked thin egg noodles
1 tsp. butter or margarine
1 tsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper (dash)
Directions:
Cook pasta in boiling, salted water for 4 minutes.
Drain well.
Return to pot and toss with remaining ingredients.
Serve hot or cold.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Herb Garden And Lemon Pasta
Ingredients:
8 oz. uncooked corkscrew or twist pasta
1/2 c. vegetable oil
3 c. (3 medium) sliced 1/4-inch zucchini
1 c. chopped red onion
1/4 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. chopped fresh basil
1/4 c. chopped fresh chives
2 medium ripe tomatoes, cut in wedges
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook pasta according to box directions and drain.
Meanwhile, in 10-inch skillet, heat oil.
Add zucchini and onions.
Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until zucchini is crisply tender.
Add remaining ingredients and pasta.
Cover; let stand for 2 minutes or until tomatoes are heated through.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Lemon Basil Pasta
Ingredients:
8 oz. linguine (cooked without salt), drained
2 Tbsp. melted butter
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. basil leaves
3/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
In a small bowl, combine butter, lemon juice and spices.
Toss with pasta.
Sprinkle with cheese and serve immediately.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Fresh Citrus Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. corn oil
grated peel of 1/2 lemon
juice of 1/2 fresh lemon
1 Tbsp. Dijon-style mustard
1/2 tsp. sugar (optional)
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 c. chopped green onion
1/2 tsp. dried tarragon leaves, crushed
2 oranges, peeled and cut in quarter-cartwheels
2 c. Brussels sprouts, cut in half, cooked and drained
1/4 lb. spaghetti, broken in half, cooked and drained
1/4 c. sliced celery
Directions:
Combine corn oil, lemon peel and juice, mustard, sugar, garlic salt and tarragon in large bowl.
Add remaining ingredients.
Toss gently.
Chill before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Indian Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 red apples, peeled and sliced
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 lb. skinned, boned chicken breasts
1/4 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. green bell peppers, cut in strips
1 clove garlic, minced
1 1/2 Tbsp. plain flour
3 tsp. curry powder or to taste
1/4 tsp. salt and pepper (each)
1/2 tsp. ginger
1 c. chicken broth
1 can stewed tomatoes
1/4 c. raisins (optional)
1 c. water (add more, if needed)
3 c. cooked rice (served on)
Directions:
In a small bowl, combine sliced apples and lemon juice; toss. Set aside.
Slice chicken; set aside.
Combine flour and chicken broth; stir until mixed.
Add all ingredients into skillet.
Cook on low for 30 minutes or until everything is cooked down; add extra water, if necessary.
Serve over rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Chicken
Ingredients:
3 to 4 lb. chicken
1/2 c. oil
1/2 c. onion, finely minced
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. curry powder
2 c. tomatoes, coarsely chopped
2 c. water (hot)
2 Tbsp. salt
1 (6 oz.) can evaporated milk
2 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Heat oil. Add onion, garlic and curry powder.
Cook 5 minutes, stir gently.
Add chicken, brown and remove (keep warm).
Add tomatoes to oil mixture, stirring constantly (3 minutes).
Add hot water and salt; mix.
Add chicken and simmer until tender (50 minutes).
Remove chicken to serving platter.
Blend evaporated milk into flour; stir constantly.
Stir and cook until thickens. Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken pieces, skinned
2 cloves garlic, chopped
2-inch pieces ginger, chopped
2 tsp. cumin seed, ground
3 Tbsp. natural yogurt
4 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. turmeric
pinch of chili powder
1 tsp. pepper
2 onions, chopped
salt
Directions:
Place the garlic, ginger, turmeric, cumin, chili pepper, coriander and yogurt in a large bowl with salt to taste.
Mix well.
Add chicken and leave for 4 hours; turn occasionally. Heat the oil in the pan; add the onion and fry until golden. Add the chicken and marinade.
Bring to simmering point; cover and cook for about 30 minutes, until the chicken is tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Indian Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken, skinned and cut into small pieces
1 large onion, chopped
3 tomatoes, chopped
1 inch ginger, grated
10 cloves garlic, crushed
1 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. cloves
1/4 tsp. red chili powder
salt to taste
1 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Heat oil in pot.
Add onion; fry until brown.
Add chicken; fry until all liquid is gone.
Add remaining ingredients.
Cook over medium heat until tomatoes are soft and chicken is well cooked. Serve over hot white rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken breasts (4 to 7)
1/4 c. butter
2 medium onions, chopped
2 or 3 cloves garlic
3 Tbsp. curry powder
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
4 c. water
4 little green peppers (don't cut open)
1 inch stick cinnamon
8 cloves
6 cardamon seed
salt to taste
1/4 c. butter
3 1/2 c. rice
5 c. chicken broth
Directions:
Boil chicken with onion, celery and salt; debone.
Saute onions, garlic and green peppers in butter.
Stir constantly, then add tomato paste and water.
Add chicken; cook about 20 minutes. Keep chicken broth.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. 1% cottage cheese
1/2 c. skim milk
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. salt (optional)
8 oz. corkscrew noodles, cooked and drained
1 large tomato, seeded and chopped
Directions:
In a blender or food processor, process cottage cheese, milk and garlic until smooth.
Add flour, lemon juice, basil, mustard, pepper and salt, if desired; process until well blended.
Pour into a saucepan.
Cook over medium heat until thickened.
Do not boil.
Serve over noodles; sprinkle with chopped tomatoes.
Yield: 4 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Classic Alfredo Pasta
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) pkg. uncooked fettuccine
1/2 c. butter or oleo
1 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 c. heavy or whipping cream
4 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped
Directions:
Cook fettuccine according to your taste of doneness; drain. Meanwhile, in small saucepan, melt butter over medium heat; gradually stir in cheese, then cream until well blended.
Continue heating sauce, stirring constantly, just to boiling point.
Remove from heat; stir in parsley.
Add sauce to hot fettuccine; toss lightly.
Serves 6.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. heavy cream
1 lb. noodles or fettuccini (cooked as directed on pkg.)
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese or more
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat butter and cream.
Do not boil.
Mound pasta in warm buttered bowl and pour on cream; sprinkle generously with cheese and toss thoroughly but lightly.
Season to taste.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Herbed Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/4 c. chopped green onions
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 (12 oz.) can evaporated skimmed milk
1/4 c. grated fresh Parmesan cheese
1/8 c. grated fresh Romano cheese
1/2 tsp. dried whole thyme
1/2 tsp. dried whole basil
1/4 tsp. dried dill weed
6 c. hot cooked medium seashell macaroni
Directions:
Melt margarine in saucepan over medium heat. Add onions and garlic; saute 2 minutes. Add flour and stir well.
Gradually add milk and bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook 3 minutes or until thickened, stirring constantly. Remove from heat.
Stir in cheeses and herbs. Serve over macaroni. Garnish with extra onions, if desired.
Contains 244 calories and 4.3 grams fat per serving.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. nonfat cottage cheese
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. butter flavored granules
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/2 tsp. chicken flavored bouillon granules
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
dash of ground red pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in container of an electric blender. Process until smooth, stopping once to scrape down sides.
Pour into a small saucepan. Cook sauce over low heat, stirring constantly, until thoroughly heated.
Yields 2 3/4 cups.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Quick Chicken Fajitas(4 Servings)
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 large onion, sliced
1 red or yellow bell pepper, thinly sliced
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. dried oregano
1/4 tsp. dried thyme
1/2 c. canned chicken broth
4 boneless chicken breast halves, skinned and cut into strips
warm flour tortillas
1 tomato, chopped
1 avocado, peeled and chopped
1 c. salsa
Directions:
Heat oil in large, heavy skillet over medium-high heat.
Add onion and bell pepper; saute until almost tender, about 10 minutes.
Add cumin, paprika, cayenne, garlic powder, oregano and thyme; continue cooking 1 minute.
Mix in broth and bring to boil. Add chicken; stir until cooked through, about 5 minutes.
Spoon chicken mixture into tortillas.
Top with tomato and avocado. Roll up.
Serve, passing salsa separately.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut in strips
1 small onion, chopped
3 scallions, chopped
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. canola oil or Pam
1/8 tsp. chili powder
prepared taco sauce
1 tsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. ground coriander seed
1 tsp. basil
8 drops Tabasco sauce
1 tomato, cubed
iceberg lettuce, shredded
2 oz. Monterey Jack cheese
2 oz. Cheddar cheese
pkg. 8 to 12 tortillas
Directions:
Saute mushrooms, onions, scallions and garlic in large pan with oil until opaque, 3 to 5 minutes.
Add chili powder, cumin, basil, Tabasco or hot sauce to taste (a few drops of smoke flavor may also be added).
Stir, then add chicken and stir until meat is tender and cooked.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1/2-inch wide strips
6 to 8 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1 Tbsp. cumin
1 Tbsp. oregano, crush with fingers
3 to 4 cloves garlic, pressed or minced
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
approximately 8 drops hot pepper sauce or to taste
juice of 1 fresh lime (optional)
1 green pepper, cut into strips
1 large sweet onion, sliced
Directions:
Heat a large, heavy skillet and then add the chicken strips (no additional oil needed), green pepper and onion.
Stir-fry until chicken is lightly browned and veggies are crisp-tender.
(I sometimes cook the chicken and veggies separately.)

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
3 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 Tbsp. fresh lemon or lime juice
1 1/4 lb. boneless chicken breasts, skinned
1 large onion
1 large green pepper
2 tsp. vegetable oil
8 corn tortillas
1/2 tsp. oregano (can also be added)
1/4 tsp. cumin (can also be added)
Directions:
Preheat broiler.
To make marinade, combine garlic, oil, lemon or lime juice, Worcestershire sauce and pepper in a bowl.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless chicken
1/2 onion, sliced
1 green pepper, sliced
2 cloves garlic, sliced
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. oregano
pinch of salt
2 Tbsp. sherry
8 flour tortillas
salsa or chopped tomatoes (for garnish, optional)
small amount oil (2 Tbsp.)
Directions:
Cut up chicken into thin slices.
Saute chicken in oil with garlic until no longer pink.
Add onion and pepper and continue to stir-fry.
Add cumin, oregano and salt.
Just before removing from heat, add sherry.
Warm tortillas one at a time in ungreased frying pan.
Assemble fajitas at the table by placing a large spoonful of the chicken mixture plus any desired garnish in the center of a tortilla; fold up bottom and sides to make fajita.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 slices bacon (fried then crumbled)
2 1/2 c. cauliflower
3/4 c. sour cream (low fat version works just as well)
1/2 c. grated cheddar cheese
1 sm. yellow onion, finely chopped
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook the cauliflower until firm, yet tender. Coarsely mash cauliflower with potato masher.
Add the sour cream, onion, cheese, salt and pepper.
Mix well.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Creole Cauliflower
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked chopped cauliflower
2 c. mashed cooked tomatoes
1/2 green pepper, chopped
1 onion, chopped
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. shredded cheese
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan; add onion and green pepper and brown lightly.
Blend in flour, stirring, then add tomatoes, salt and pepper.
Heat to boiling point and cook three minutes, stirring constantly.
Add cauliflower and heat through. Place mixture in casserole, top with cheese and bake at 350° until cheese melts and is lightly browned.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Casserole
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower
1 can chicken, celery or mushroom soup
1 c. grated cheese
1/3 c. mayonnaise
1 to 2 Tbsp. onion flakes
1 to 2 Tbsp. herb and pepper seasoning
Directions:
Cut up and cook cauliflower for 5 minutes.
Drain water.
Add cheese, mayonnaise and soup, stirring well.
If not enough liquid, add another can of soup.
Add onion flakes and seasoning.
Place in a large casserole dish and cover with Pepperidge Farm dressing mix.
Place in oven at 325° for 30 minutes or until top is brown.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Casserole
Ingredients:
2 carrots, shredded
1/4 c. butter or margarine, divided
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 large cauliflower, broken into flowerets
1 medium onion, chopped
1 1/2 c. herb-seasoned stuffing mix, divided
1/4 c. sour cream
vegetable cooking spray
Directions:
Saute carrots and onion in 2 tablespoons butter in a large saucepan until tender.
Stir in 1 cup stuffing mix, soup and sour cream.
Remove from heat.
Cook cauliflower in boiling water 10 minutes or just until tender.
Add to soup mixture.
Pour into an 8-inch square baking dish, which has been coated with cooking spray.
Combine remaining 2 tablespoons butter and 1/2 cup stuffing mix; sprinkle on top of casserole.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Casserole
Ingredients:
1 medium head cauliflower
1/4 c. flour
3/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
5 Tbsp. butter
2 c. milk
1 c. herb seasoned stuffing mix
1/4 c. water
1 c. grated sharp Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Cook cauliflower in salted water until done, about 10 minutes.
Combine flour, salt and pepper.
Set aside.
Melt 3 tablespoons butter in pan.
Add flour, salt and pepper.
Add milk and cook until thick.
Put cheese and cauliflower in a greased 2-quart casserole dish and spoon sauce over top.
Combine stuffing, 1/4 cup water and 2 tablespoons melted butter.
Mix well and put over cheese sauce.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a tangy raspberry vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 c. oil
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. wine vinegar (raspberry wine vinegar, if possible)
3 tsp. light soy sauce
1 1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
