Heat the vinegar; add sugar and stir until dissolved.
Remove from heat. Add oil and soy sauce. Mix in salt and pepper. Cover and
refrigerate until ready to use. Put in blender or food processor to emulsify.

question: How do I make a tangy raspberry vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Raspberry Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
2/3 c. olive oil
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. chopped garlic
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 c. raspberry preserves
1 Tbsp. honey
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Stir vigorously or put into a jar and shake well.
Serve over mixed greens.

question: How do I make a tangy raspberry vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Layered Vegetable Vinaigrette(Serves 8. Preparation :20.  Stand 1:00.  Total 1:20.)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. vinegar
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. Dijon mustard
fresh ground black pepper (to taste)
4 carrots
1 lb. green beans
2 tomatoes
2 cucumbers
1/4 lb. mushrooms
Directions:
Mix dressing (first 4 ingredients) in a jar. Shake well. Scrub or peel carrots and slice into rounds. Steam green beans for 5 minutes; drain. Slice tomatoes, cucumbers and mushrooms into slices. Layer vegetables in a serving dish and top with dressing. Refrigerate 1 hour or more before serving.

question: How do I make a tangy raspberry vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Raspberry-Orange Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/4 c. onion
5 cloves garlic
1/8 c. raspberry puree
1/2 c. orange juice
1 tsp. ground ginger
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. balsamic vinegar
1 1/2 c. olive oil
Directions:
Dice onion and garlic.
Pour in raspberry puree, orange juice, ginger, soy sauce and balsamic vinegar.
Whisk in olive oil slowly.
Let sit for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a tangy raspberry vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Raspberry Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1 c. raspberry vinegar
1 c. olive oil
1 c. vegetable oil
1 c. maple syrup
1 Tbsp. Poupon mustard
1 Tbsp. chopped tarragon leaves
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and mix well in mixer or food processor.
Mix until mixture thickens and is blended well.

question: What’s a good recipe for oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
2/3 c. dried bread crumbs
2/3 c. whole wheat or all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. buttermilk
12 chicken wings
Directions:
In 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch roasting pan in 425° oven, melt butter.
Remove pan from oven.
On wax paper, mix next 5 ingredients.
Pour buttermilk into small bowl.
Dip one wing at a time in buttermilk, then in crumb mixture.
Place wings in melted butter in roasting pan, turning to coat evenly.
Bake 35 minutes or until chicken wings are tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Style Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. chicken wings (about 8)
1 1/2 c. catsup
1 1/4 c. finely chopped onion
1 Tbsp. honey
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1 clove garlic, minced
Directions:
Rinse chicken; pat dry.
Cut off and discard wing tips.
Cut each wing at joint to make 2 sections.
Place the wing pieces in a single layer in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.
Bake in a 375° oven for 20 minutes.
Drain fat from baking pan.

question: What’s a good recipe for oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
32 chicken wings
6 to 8 Tbsp. butter, melted
1 1/2 c. bread crumbs
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. salt or lemon pepper
1 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Discard wing tip; cut remaining wing in two pieces.
Dip chicken wing in melted butter.
Combine bread crumbs, cheese, salt and garlic powder in a plastic bag.
Shake wings in crumb mixture. Place chicken on greased 15 x 10-inch baking sheet and bake in preheated oven at 400° for 30 minutes.
Serve hot.

question: What’s a good recipe for oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Good Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chicken wings
1 c. honey
1/2 c. ketchup
1/2 c. soy sauce
1 tsp. oil
2 garlic cloves, crushed
Directions:
Cut off tip of chicken wing, then split in half.
Place chicken in 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Combine honey, ketchup, soy sauce, oil and garlic cloves.
Pour over chicken.
Bake, uncovered, at 375° for 1 1/2 hours.

question: What’s a good recipe for oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings Extraordinaire
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken wings
3/4 c. salsa
2/3 c. honey
1/3 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. Dijon-style mustard
3 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. finely chopped ginger root
1 1/2 tsp. orange peel
Directions:
Cut off and discard wing tips.
Cut each wing in half and place in a shallow glass baking dish, side by side.
Combine remaining ingredients and pour over wings.
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight.
When ready to serve, preheat oven to 400° and bake the wings 40 to 45 minutes until well browned. Serve hot or at room temperature.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy tiramisu?
answer:
Title: Tiramisu
Ingredients:
4 egg yolks
1/2 c. sugar
1 c. low-fat milk
1/2 c. brandy
4 Tbsp. strong brewed Espresso
2 pkg. (12 each) small ladyfingers
2 oz. semi-sweet chocolate, grated
4 tsp. Nestle Quik
8 oz. Ricotta, mascarpone or light cream cheese
2 c. whipped topping or 1 c. heavy cream, whipped
Directions:
Combine in glass measure the egg yolks, sugar and milk; microwave on High 2 to 4 minutes, stirring with a whisk twice, or just until slightly thickened.
Set in bowl of ice water to cool.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy tiramisu?
answer:
Title: Tiramisu
Ingredients:
1 large pkg. ladyfingers
1 1/2 c. coffee (very strong)
2/3 c. dark rum
8 large egg yolks
3 (8 oz.) pkg. mascarpone cheese
2 c. heavy whipping cream
1/2 c. powdered sugar
dash of vanilla
cocoa powder (for dusting)
Directions:
Pour coffee in mixing bowl; add 1/3 cup rum. Set aside. In another bowl, beat eggs, then add mascarpone cheese, 1/4 cup of powdered sugar and rest of rum. Beat together until stiff. In another bowl, add 2 cups heavy cream, the rest of powdered sugar and dash of vanilla. Beat until stiff. Put together. Dip ladyfingers, one at a time, in coffee mix. Cover bottom of 9 x 13 dish. Layer cheese mix, then heavy cream. Mix and repeat. Dust with cocoa powder. Enjoy!

question: What’s a recipe for an easy tiramisu?
answer:
Title: Tiramisu
Ingredients:
6 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
6 eggs
6 Tbsp. sugar
1 lb. Mascarpone cheese
3/4 c. Espresso or strong coffee
24 ladyfingers
1 tsp. almond flavoring (optional)
Directions:
Grate chocolate by hand or in a food processor.
Beat eggs with sugar by electric mixer in double boiler until tripled in volume, about 5 to 7 minutes.
Chill until cooled.
Beat Mascarpone until smooth and softened.
Blend egg mixture into cheese.
Dip flat side of ladyfingers into coffee/almond mixture and line bottom of a 9-inch glass dish.
Spread 1/2 of cheese mixture and top with half of grated chocolate.
Repeat cheese and chocolate layers ending with chocolate.
Chill covered at least 2 hours.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy tiramisu?
answer:
Title: Light Tiramisu
Ingredients:
2 pkg. ladyfingers
Egg Beaters (equal to 6 yolks)
3/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. coffee liqueur
1/2 c. Mascarpone cheese
1/2 c. low-fat cream cheese
12 oz. Cool Whip
unsweetened cocoa powder
Directions:
In small mixer bowl, beat Egg Beaters and sugar until thick (about 1 minute).
Place in top of double boiler over boiling water.
Reduce heat and cook 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat; add cheeses and beat well.
Fold Cool Whip into mixture; set aside.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy tiramisu?
answer:
Title: Tiramisu
Ingredients:
6 egg yolks
3/4 c. sugar
8 oz. sweet wine
1 lb. Mascarpone cheese or cream cheese
10 oz. ladyfingers or sponge cake
3 c. Espresso or very strong black coffee
cocoa powder
Directions:
Mix egg yolks, sugar and wine in a bowl.
Cook this mixture in a double boiler for 3 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Now mix the Mascarpone cheese with the egg mixture until smooth.
(You can add some of the coffee to help it become thinner.)
Quickly dip the ladyfingers in the Espresso and one by one place them uniformly in a casserole dish.
Spread a layer of cheese mixture on top of ladyfingers.
Add another layer of ladyfingers on top of cheese mixture, then add another layer of cheese mixture.
Repeat process. End with last layer being the cheese mixture and refrigerate for 3 hours.
Sprinkle with cocoa powder and serve.

question: How do I make a simple chicken stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Easy Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
4 chicken breast halves, skinned, boned and cut into strips
1 (2.25 oz.) pkg. sliced almonds
1 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli, baby carrots and water chestnuts
1/4 c. soy sauce
3 Tbsp. pineapple juice
1 1/2 tsp. cornstarch
hot cooked rice
Directions:
Pour oil into wok or skillet, coating bottom and sides; heat to medium high (325°) for 2 minutes.
Add chicken and almonds; stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add vegetables; cover and cook 4 minutes stirring occasionally.
Combine soy sauce, pineapple juice and cornstarch; add to vegetables, and cook 2 minutes or until thickened.
Serve over rice.
Yields 4 servings.

question: How do I make a simple chicken stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
2 Tbsp. oil, divided
4 c. cut up vegetables
2 cloves garlic, minced
3/4 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast, thinly sliced
Directions:
In a bowl, mix the first 4 ingredients; set aside.
In skillet, heat 1 tablespoon oil over medium-high heat.
Add vegetables and garlic; stir-fry for 3 minutes, or until tender-crisp.
Remove. Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil.
Add chicken; stir-fry 4 minutes. Return vegetables.
Stir broth mixture.
Add to skillet, stirring constantly.
Bring to boil; boil 1 minute.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a simple chicken stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken, cut into thin strips
3 c. cut up fresh vegetables (broccoli, carrot, sweet red pepper, green pepper)
1/4 tsp. garlic powder or 2 cloves garlic, minced
1 can tomato soup
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. vinegar
Directions:
In skillet, in 1 tablespoon hot oil, stir-fry half of the chicken until browned.
Remove and repeat with remaining chicken. In remaining 1 tablespoon hot oil, stir-fry vegetables with garlic powder until tender and crisp.
Add soup, soy and vinegar.
Heat to boiling.
Return chicken to skillet.
Heat through, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice.

question: How do I make a simple chicken stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry(Method:  Skillet)
Ingredients:
1 lb. chicken (boneless), sliced in thin strips
6 to 8 mushrooms, sliced thin
4 scallions, sliced
4 Tbsp. oil
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 carrots, sliced thin
1/2 head broccoli, sliced thin
1 can water chestnuts, drained
4 cloves garlic, chopped
Directions:
Put 2 tablespoons oil in pan.
Heat; cook chicken about 2 minutes, stirring often.
Remove chicken.
Add remaining oil and carrots, onions, mushrooms, garlic and water chestnuts.
Stir-fry until carrots are tender (2 minutes).
Add chicken, soy sauce and broccoli; stir-fry until broccoli is tender, about 1 minute.

question: How do I make a simple chicken stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Quick And Easy Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
3 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
1 garlic clove, minced
1 c. each broccoli flowerets, red pepper strips and carrot slices
1/4 c. green onion
1/2 c. miracle whip
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet over high heat.
Cut chicken into strips. Add to skillet with garlic.
Stir-fry 3 minutes.
Add vegetables. Stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Reduce heat to medium.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Simmer for 1 minute.
Serve over rice. Serves 4.

question: I need a recipe for spicy salsa.
answer:
Title: Salsa
Ingredients:
4 tomatoes, peeled and finely chopped
1/2 c. minced onion
1/2 c. minced celery
1/4 c. minced green pepper
1/4 c. olive oil
3 Tbsp. chopped mild green chilies
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. mustard seed
1/2 tsp. oregano
dash of pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Cover and chill several hours. Serve as a dip with tortilla chips, or as a mild sauce for other dishes.

question: I need a recipe for spicy salsa.
answer:
Title: Spicy Salsa
Ingredients:
6 small tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1/2 cup diced red onion
1/4 cup diced yellow onion
3 serrano peppers, minced
1/4 cup minced cilantro
1/2 cup minced fresh parsley
3 garlic cloves, minced
3 Tbsp red wine vinegar
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and chill in refrigerator for several hours before serving.

question: I need a recipe for spicy salsa.
answer:
Title: Spicy Mexican Salsa
Ingredients:
4 qt. fresh tomatoes
8 green peppers
8 onions
6 to 10 fresh hot peppers
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 (12 oz.) cans tomato paste
1/4 c. canning salt
1 c. white vinegar
Directions:
Chop everything to desired size, food processor works well, but don't chop too fine.
Add paste to desired thickness, depending on how juicy your tomatoes are.
Add garlic, salt and vinegar.
Heat to boiling, don't overcook.
Process pints at 10 pounds pressure for ten minutes or for 30 minutes in a boiling water bath.
Makes 15 to 20 pints of salsa.
Serve with tortilla chips.

question: I need a recipe for spicy salsa.
answer:
Title: Salsa
Ingredients:
10 qt. chopped tomatoes
2 large onions, chopped
1 qt. + 1 pt. green peppers, chopped
1/2 c. salt
6 c. jalapeno peppers, chopped
2 bulbs garlic
2 tsp. coriander (optional)
1 1/2 tsp. basil leaf
1 tsp. oregano leaf
2 c. lemon juice
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
Chop in blender.
Cook until thickened.
Put into hot jars with hot lids.

question: I need a recipe for spicy salsa.
answer:
Title: Salsa
Ingredients:
2 jalapeno peppers, sliced
3 to 4 green onions, chopped
1 red or green bell pepper, chopped
1 clove garlic, squeezed
28 oz. can tomatoes
1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 tsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. cumin
1/2 Tbsp. oregano
juice of 1 lime
1 can chopped green chilies (optional)
Directions:
Put peppers, onion and garlic in blender with juice from tomatoes.
Blend a few seconds to chop; add remaining ingredients. Blend a second or two to chop up tomatoes; stir.
Serve with tortilla chips.

question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. stew beef
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. salad oil
2 c. water
3/4 c. tomato juice
1 bay leaf
1 tsp. thyme leaves, crushed
4 potatoes, cubed
6 carrots, cut into 1-inch pieces
2 stalks celery, sliced
1/2 lb. small whole onions
Directions:
Cut beef into 1-inch pieces.
In a paper bag, combine flour, salt and pepper.
Add meat, a few pieces at a time.
Close bag and shake to coat.
Repeat with remaining meat.

question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1-inch pieces
2 Tbsp. shortening
6 c. hot water
3 pared medium potatoes, cut into 1-inch pieces
4 carrots, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 green pepper, cut in strips
1 c. celery, cut into 1-inch pieces
1/2 c. diced onions
1 Tbsp. salt
2 beef bouillon cubes
1 bay leaf
Directions:
Mix flour, 1 teaspoon salt and the pepper.
Coat meat with flour mixture.
Melt shortening in a large skillet; brown meat thoroughly.
Add water; heat to boiling.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer 2 hours.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Simmer 30 minutes or until vegetables are tender.

question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Classic Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. stew meat
1 tsp. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. onions, chopped
16 oz. tomatoes (with liquid), cut up
10 1/2 oz. beef broth
3 Tbsp. quick cooking tapioca
1 clove garlic
1 tsp. dried parsley flakes
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 medium bay leaf
6 medium carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces
3 medium potatoes, peeled and cut into 2-inch pieces
1 c. sliced celery, 1-inch pieces
Directions:
In a Dutch oven, brown beef half at a time in the oil; drain. Return all meat to pan. Add onion, tomatoes, broth, tapioca, garlic, parsley, salt, pepper and bay leaf. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat. Cover and bake at 350° for 90 minutes. Stir in carrots, potatoes and celery. Bake, covered, for 60 minutes longer or until meat and vegetables are tender. Remove bay leaf before serving.

question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1/2 c. Gold Medal flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 lb. beef stew meat
2 Tbsp. shortening
6 c. hot water
3 pared potatoes, cut in 1-inch cubes
1 bay leaf
4 carrots, cut into 1-inch slices
1 green pepper, cut into strips
1 c. celery, sliced 1-inch thick
1/2 c. onion, diced
1 Tbsp. salt
2 beef bouillon cubes
Directions:
Mix flour, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper together.
Coat meat with flour mixture.
Melt shortening in large skillet; brown meat thoroughly.
Add water; heat to boiling.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer 2 hours.
Stir in remaining ingredients; simmer 30 minutes longer, or until vegetables are tender.
If desired, thicken stew. In a covered jar, shake 1 cup cold water with 2 to 4 tablespoons flour until blended.
Stir into stew.
Heat to boiling; stirring constantly, boil 1 minute.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean beef chuck, trimmed and cut into 1-inch cubes
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. canola oil
3 c. thinly sliced onions
2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 garlic clove, minced
2 tsp. tomato paste
2 c. beef broth
3 c. sliced carrots
2 c. thinly sliced potatoes
1 c. green bean pieces
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. cold water
1/4 c. fresh chopped parsley
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Coat beef cubes with flour, shaking off excess. In a large nonstick pot, heat oil; add beef and saute until brown. Remove and place on a plate. Add onions and mushrooms to pot; saute for 6 minutes. Add garlic and saute, stirring for 1 minute. Pour off fat. Return beef to pot; stir in tomato paste and the broth. Add enough water to cover; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low; simmer until beef is tender, about 1 1/2 hours. Skim off any foam. Add carrots, potatoes and green beans. Cover partially and simmer 15 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy spinach and artichoke dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach Artichoke Dip
Ingredients:
1 stick butter
1 finely chopped onion
3 cloves chopped garlic
1-1/2 cup sour cream
8 ozs. cream cheese
3/4 cup Parmesan cheese
12 ozs. Monterey Jack cheese with jalapenos
2 cans artichoke hearts, drained and chopped fine
2 boxes frozen chopped spinach, cooked a little and drained
Small amount of evaporated milk if necessary for desired consistency
salt to taste
Directions:
Melt butter, add onions and garlic.
Saute until wilted.
Add spinach and artichokes.
Cook about 3-5 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Add remaining ingredients.
Blend well. Heat to melt cheese in microwave or on low heat.
Serve with tortilla chips.
Sour cream and salsa optional.

question: How do I make a creamy spinach and artichoke dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Artichoke Dip
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 medium onion, chopped fine
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach, thawed and drained well
1 (8 oz.) sour cream
1 c. shredded Monterey Jack, divided
1 (14 oz.) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. Tabasco (optional)
crackers or corn chips
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan on medium heat. Add onion and cook until soft.
Stir in artichokes, spinach, cream cheese, 3/4 cup Monterey Jack and Parmesan cheeses, sour cream and optional Tabasco. Stir until cheeses are melted and mixture is well blended.
Pour mixture into a 1-quart
casserole dish. Top with some of the extra cheeses.
Bake at 350° for 10 minutes. Serve with crackers or corn chips.

question: How do I make a creamy spinach and artichoke dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach-Artichoke Dip
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz. each) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 c. chopped onion
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 (6 oz.) jar marinated artichoke, drained and chopped
1/2 c. whipping cream
1 1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 Tbsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook and drain spinach; set aside.
Saute butter and onion in large saucepan until golden brown.
Turn heat to medium setting. Add cream cheese in small bits, stirring slowly.
Once cream cheese melts, add spinach, artichokes, whipping cream, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Heat thoroughly.
Turn into serving dish.

question: How do I make a creamy spinach and artichoke dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Artichoke Party Dip
Ingredients:
2 c. sour cream
1 pkg. Ranch party dip mix
1 (14 oz.) can artichoke hearts
10 oz. pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
2 oz. jar diced pimientos, drained
1 1/2 lb. round loaf bread for dip
1 1/2 lb. round loaf bread, cut into cubes for dipping
assorted vegetables for dipping
Directions:
Mix sour cream and Ranch mix in medium bowl.
Add artichokes, spinach and pimentos.
Cut slice off top of round loaf and hollow out, leaving 1-inch shell.
Reserve bread pieces for dipping. Spoon dip into bread.
Serve warm or cold.

question: How do I make a creamy spinach and artichoke dip?
answer:
Title: Artichoke & Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1 c. Parmesan cheese
1 can artichoke hearts, cut up
1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach, cooked and well drained
Directions:
Mix all the ingredients and spoon in hot dip bowl.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make grilled chicken skewers?
answer:
Title: Oriental Skewers
Ingredients:
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
2 (8 oz.) cut sirloin
2 jumbo shrimp, peeled
1 large Vidalia onion
1 large green pepper
1 large red pepper
rice
mushrooms (fresh or canned, your choice)
1 can pineapple chunks
Directions:
Wash and cut chicken into 1-inch chunks.
Also cut sirloin into chunks.
Marinate chicken in teriyaki sauce for 1 hour.
Marinate steak in Worcestershire sauce for 1 hour.
Cut and wash peppers and onion into large chunks.
Put peppers and meat on skewer alternating.
Cook on grill until done.
Serve over rice with extra sauces, sauteed mushrooms and pineapple chunks.
Do not use the sauce that the meat marinated in.
Use fresh sauces.

question: How do I make grilled chicken skewers?
answer:
Title: City Chicken
Ingredients:
1 lb. cubed pork roast
salt
ground saltine crackers (approximately 1 to 2 pkg.)
wooden skewers (about 6-inches long; get from deli; ask for them)
1 lb. cubed beef roast
pepper
shortening
approximately 3 eggs
Directions:
Trim fat off the cubed pork and beef.
Alternate pork and beef cubes on wooden skewers.
Salt and pepper meat to taste.
Dip skewered meat into beaten eggs, then coat with ground saltine crackers.
Brown into skillet until brown on all sides.
Put into a roaster.
Add a little water to the roaster and bake in 350° oven for approximately 3 hours or until meat is soft/done.

question: How do I make grilled chicken skewers?
answer:
Title: North Carolina Spiedes(Excellent Recipe)
Ingredients:
3 lb. skewer size cut up chicken pieces
1 c. corn oil
3/4 c. vinegar
1/4 c. lemon juice
4 cloves finely chopped garlic
1 Tbsp. rosemary
1 Tbsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. basil
1 tsp. thyme
1 Tbsp. cracked pepper
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 pkg. Good Seasons Italian dressing
Directions:
Marinate chicken in the mixture for 24 hours.
Put chicken on skewers and grill.
Serve on sliced Italian bread!! Easy and delicious.

question: How do I make grilled chicken skewers?
answer:
Title: Chicken Yakitori(Skewered Grilled Chicken)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. sugar
8 Tbsp. soy sauce
8 Tbsp. sake or dry white wine
4 Tbsp. mirin (sweet rice wine)
12 oz. boned chicken with skin
7 oz. chicken livers
4 to 6 block mushrooms
4 small green peppers
2 leeks
Shichimi Togarashi (Japanese red hot powdered pepper mixed with other 6 spices)
Directions:
You will need 20 to 30 fine metal or bamboo skewers, about 5-inches long.

question: How do I make grilled chicken skewers?
answer:
Title: Chicken On The Grill
Ingredients:
1 c. vinegar
1/2 c. water
1/2 c. margarine or butter
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 1/2 to 3 lb. chicken pieces
Directions:
Combine vinegar, water, butter and salt; heat until butter melts and salt dissolves.
Keep hot on grill.
Brush chicken on both sides with sauce.
Arrange chicken, bone side down, on grill 5 inches from medium coals.
Brush chicken generously with sauce every 10 to 15 minutes; turn.
Grill until golden brown and tender.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk biscuits?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Biscuits
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. butter
1/3 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Combine first 5 ingredients, mixing well; cut in butter with a pastry blender or fork until mixture resembles coarse meal.
Add buttermilk, stirring until dry ingredients are moistened.
Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface; knead lightly 8 to 10 times.
Roll dough to 1/4-inch thickness; cut with biscuit cutter. Place on ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 425° for 10 minutes or until golden.
Yields 1 dozen.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk biscuits?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Biscuits
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
3 tsp. baking powder
2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
1/4 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. vegetable oil
3/4 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Stir together all dry ingredients; add liquid ingredients and mix well just until the dough clings together.
Knead gently on a lightly floured surface 10 to 12 strokes; roll or pat to 1/2-inch thickness.
Cut with a biscuit cutter, dipping flour in between cuts; place on ungreased baking sheet.
Bake in 450° oven for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden.
Makes 10 to 12 biscuits.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk biscuits?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Biscuits
Ingredients:
2 c. all-purpose flour
4 tsp. baking powder
3 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. shortening
1 egg
2/3 c. milk
Directions:
In a bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, sugar and salt. Cut in shortening until the mixture
resembles coarse crumbs. In a small bowl, beat egg and milk; stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Turn onto a well floured surface; knead 20 times. Roll to 3/4-inch thickness; cut with a 2 1/2-inch biscuit cutter. Place on lightly greased baking sheet. Bake at 450° for 8 to 10 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm; great with apple butter.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk biscuits?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Biscuits
Ingredients:
2/3 c. butter or margarine, cut up
4 c. self-rising flour
1 1/2 c. buttermilk
1 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Put flour in a mixing bowl; cut butter in with a pastry cutter until crumbly. Add buttermilk and stir just until dry ingredients are moistened. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface; knead a few times. Pat or roll dough out to 1/2 or 3/4-inch thickness. Cut out with a 2 1/2-inch round cutter. Place on a lightly greased baking sheet; bake in a 425° oven for 12 to 14 minutes. Brush tops with a little melted butter.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk biscuits?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Biscuits
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
2 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. lard (shortening may be substituted)
1 c. buttermilk (add more if needed)
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Sift dry ingredients together.
Cut in the lard.
Add buttermilk and stir until a soft dough is formed, then turn onto a lightly floured board and knead until smooth.
Roll out (1/2 inch thick for fluffy biscuits, 1/4 inch for crusty thin ones!!).
Cut to size with a biscuit cutter or cup.
Place on a greased pan. Bake at 450° for 13 to 15 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a chicken quesadilla?
answer:
Title: Chicken Quesadillas
Ingredients:
1 pkg. flour tortillas (small-sized)
2 large, skinless, boneless chicken breasts
1 tsp. salt
1-1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1-1/2 tsp. onion powder
1-1/2 tsp. cajun seasoning
1 tsp. crushed red pepper flakes
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil, divided
1 large onion, thickly sliced
1 each, green, yellow and red peppers, cut into strips
1 (12 oz.) pkg. shredded, Mexican style 4 cheese blend
Directions:
Washed and pat dry the chicken breasts.
Marinate with garlic powder, onion powder, cajun seasoning, and crushed red pepper flakes.
Add a bit of water and boil until chicken is tender. Let cool then cut into thin strips.
Set aside.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a chicken quesadilla?
answer:
Title: Chicken Quesadillas
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. chicken cutlets, cut into 1/4-inch cubes
2 to 3 Tbsp. taco seasoning
3 Tbsp. oil
soft taco shells
Monterey Jack cheese, shredded
Cheddar cheese, shredded
1 to 2 tomatoes, diced
1 can black olives, diced
shredded lettuce
hot chili peppers
salsa
sour cream
Directions:
Saute chicken in oil and seasoning 10 minutes or until done. Layer chicken on shell.
Cover with cheeses, tomato, olives, lettuce, hot peppers and salsa.
Cover with another taco shell. Sprinkle shell with more cheese.
Heat in microwave 1 minute.
Cut into wedges.
Serve on platter with salsa and sour cream to garnish.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a chicken quesadilla?
answer:
Title: Chicken Quesadillas
Ingredients:
1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken breasts
1 Tbsp. oil
1 (1 oz.) pkg. dry fajita seasoning mix
10 (10-inch) flour tortillas
8 oz. shredded Cheddar cheese or Mexican 4-cheese
1 Tbsp. bacon bits
1 onion chopped (optional)
2 peppers, chopped (optional)
Directions:
Preheat the broiler. Cut the chicken into small cubes and prepare with the fajita seasoning mix. Broil 5 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink on the inside. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in a large sauce pan over medium heat. Mix in the seasoned chicken, onion & pepper. Slowly cook and stir for 10 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender. Layer 1/2 of each tortilla with chicken mixture, cheese, and desired amount of bacon bits. Top with cheese. Fold the tortillas. Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes, or until cheese has melted.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a chicken quesadilla?
answer:
Title: Chicken Quesadillas
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless chicken breasts, cubed
1 can Campbell's Cheddar cheese soup
1/2 jar (1 c.) salsa
10 (8-inch) flour tortillas
Uncle Ben's fiesta rice (1 box) or you can substitute Lipton's Spanish rice
1 bag tortilla chips
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°. Cook chicken in skillet until done (browned and juices evaporate), stirring often. Add soup and salsa and heat through. Spread about 1/3 cup mixture on half of each tortilla. Moisten edge of tortilla with water; fold and seal. Place on baking sheet. Bake for 5 minutes or until lightly browned and hot. Serve with fiesta rice and tortilla chips and salsa.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a chicken quesadilla?
answer:
Title: Chicken Quesadillas
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1/2-inch strips
1 pkg. taco or fajita seasoning
1/2 bunch cilantro, chopped
1 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
3 to 4 green onions, chopped
5 to 6 burrito tortillas
sour cream
guacamole
salsa
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet.
Add chicken.
Stir until golden brown. Add taco seasoning and 2 tablespoons or so of water.
Add cilantro and simmer for 4 minutes.
Cover and set aside.
Divide and place chicken onto a half side of each tortilla.
Add green onions, cheese and a small amount of salsa if desired.
Fold over tortilla. Carefully place one folded tortilla in clean, dry skillet over medium heat.
Cover and let cook 5 minutes.
Carefully turn onto other side and heat 3 to 5 minutes until golden and ingredients are melted inside.
Repeat with other quesadillas.

question: What’s a good recipe for a fruit compote?
answer:
Title: Fresh Fruit Compote
Ingredients:
1 peach, sliced
1/2 c. fresh pineapple
1/2 banana
1/2 c. fresh strawberries
1/2 c. fresh blueberries
1/2 c. cantaloupe
1/3 c. honey
1 c. orange juice
1/4 tsp. ginger
Directions:
Mix all
fruits
in your prettiest bowl.
Add to it the mixture of	honey,	orange juice and ground ginger.
Blend and refrigerate.
Serve
in sherbets or can be used over ice cream with plain cake.

question: What’s a good recipe for a fruit compote?
answer:
Title: Fancy Fruit Compote
Ingredients:
1 can drained apricots
1 can drained peaches
1 can drained pears
1 box pitted prunes
1 can or jar pitted dark cherries
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 can macaroons
1/2 c. red wine
1 pkg. sliced almonds
1/4 c. brown sugar
Directions:
Butter sides and bottom of 9 x 11-inch pan.
Crumble 1/2 macaroons onto bottom.
Pour all fruits on top.
Melt butter and wine together and pour on fruit.
Sprinkle almonds; crumble remaining macaroons and sprinkle on, then sprinkle brown sugar. Bake 30 minutes at 350°.

question: What’s a good recipe for a fruit compote?
answer:
Title: Warm Fruit Compote
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. dried mixed fruit
1 c. apricot nectar
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. honey
1 apple, cored and chopped
4 oz. strawberries, hulled
4 oz. seedless red grapes
1 kiwi fruit, peeled and sliced
Directions:
In large saucepan over medium heat, combine mixed fruit, nectar, lemon juice and honey.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low; simmer 10 minutes.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Serve hot or chilled.
Serves 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for a fruit compote?
answer:
Title: Hot Fruit Compote
Ingredients:
16 oz. sliced peaches, drained
16 oz. pear halves, drained and coarsely chopped
16 oz. plums or cherries, drained
20 oz. pineapple chunks, drained
6 oz. maraschino cherries
2 bananas, sliced
3/4 c. brown sugar, packed
1/3 c. butter
16 oz. can applesauce
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Combine all fruit in baking dish (13 x 9-inch).
Combine brown sugar, butter and applesauce in saucepan; heat and stir.
Spoon over fruit and sprinkle with 3 tablespoons of brown sugar and pecans.
Bake at 300° for 1 hour.
Seal with aluminum foil.

question: What’s a good recipe for a fruit compote?
answer:
Title: Winter Fruit Compote
Ingredients:
2 pears, peeled and sliced
2 apples, peeled and sliced
1 c. cranberries
1 c. dried apricots
1/4 c. golden raisins
1 (22 oz.) can lemon pudding
3/4 c. water
1/4 c. orange liqueur
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Layer the fruits in a casserole dish. Mix remaining ingredients and pour over fruit.
Cover and bake 1 hour until fruits are tender.
Allow to stand covered 45 minutes before serving.
Great side dish for holiday dinners!

question: How do I make homemade biscuits and gravy?
answer:
Title: Homemade Gravy
Ingredients:
pan drippings (chicken, beef or pork)
self-rising flour
hot water
salt to taste
pepper to taste
Directions:
After cooking your meat, pour off grease until just bottom of pan is covered.
Add salt and pepper.
Stir in 2 to 3 heaping tablespoonfuls of flour.
Cook, stirring constantly, until nice brown roux (just before scorching).
Have hot water in bowl ready. Pour about half of water into roux.
Mixture will be thin.
Cook over medium heat, constantly stirring, until desired consistency is reached.
Tastes great with homemade biscuits and scrambled eggs.

question: How do I make homemade biscuits and gravy?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Gravy
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
3 heaping Tbsp. flour
4 Tbsp. chocolate
1/4 c. water
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. milk
1/2 stick butter
Directions:
Mix ingredients in order:
sugar, flour, chocolate, water, vanilla, milk and butter.
Stir constantly until thick on medium setting.
Serve over homemade biscuits.

question: How do I make homemade biscuits and gravy?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Chocolate Gravy
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. cocoa
2 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
In a skillet, mix sugar, cocoa, flour and just enough water to make a thick paste.
Add the milk and boil until thickened.
Serve over hot biscuits with butter.

question: How do I make homemade biscuits and gravy?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Gravy(For Breakfast)
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1/3 c. cocoa
5 Tbsp. cornstarch or flour
3 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients in large saucepan.
Add milk.
Cook until the thickness of gravy.
Pour over homemade biscuits.

question: How do I make homemade biscuits and gravy?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Gravy
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. chocolate
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
Mix real well the sugar, chocolate and flour together in a pan.
Add milk slowly.
Cook on medium heat.
When thickening starts, add butter and stir.
Cook until desired thickness.
Serve over hot biscuits.

question: How do I make a simple coleslaw?
answer:
Title: Easy Coleslaw(Low-Fat And Sugar-Free)
Ingredients:
3 1/2 c. shredded cabbage (about 1/2 medium cabbage)
2 Tbsp. minced onion
1/4 c. shredded carrots
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
1/4 c. chopped celery
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl; mix well and set aside.

question: How do I make a simple coleslaw?
answer:
Title: Creamy Coleslaw
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1 c. sour cream
1/2 c. mild, whole grain mustard
1/4 c. strained fresh lemon juice
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 (2 lb.) white cabbage
3 large carrots
2 crisp, tart apples
Directions:
Whisk together mayo, sour cream, mustard, lemon juice and sugar.
Core and quarter the cabbage.
Cut quarters into 1/8-inch julienne to make approximately 6 cups.
Peel carrots and grate coarsely.
Wash and core apples; grate coarsely.
Combine cabbage, carrots and apples.
Add dressing and toss thoroughly.
Cover and refrigerate overnight to let slaw marinate.

question: How do I make a simple coleslaw?
answer:
Title: Easy Coleslaw
Ingredients:
1 small cabbage
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 Tbsp. vinegar
green food coloring (optional)
3 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. mayonnaise
horseradish (optional)
Directions:
Chop cabbage up in food processor, very finely.
Sprinkle sugar and salt over cabbage.
Leave for 1 minute.

question: How do I make a simple coleslaw?
answer:
Title: Creamy Coleslaw
Ingredients:
1 small green cabbage, cut into 1-inch pieces
1/2 green pepper, cut up
1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
1/4 c. dairy sour cream
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
dash of pepper
Directions:
Fill blender container to top-cup marking with vegetables. Add cold water just to cover vegetables.
Cover container; follow manufacturer's instructions or run just long enough to chop vegetables, about 3 to 4 seconds.
Pour mixture into strainer; drain thoroughly.
Repeat with remaining vegetables.

question: How do I make a simple coleslaw?
answer:
Title: Creamy Coleslaw(Better Homes And Gardens)
Ingredients:
4 c. shredded cabbage
1/2 c. shredded carrots
1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. vinegar
2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. celery seed
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine cabbage, carrot, green pepper and onion or can use package of slaw mix purchased from store.

question: I want a simple recipe for pizza.
answer:
Title: Easy Pizza
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
1 egg
1/2 c. diced pepperoni
1/2 c. diced cheese
Directions:
Mix the first 3 ingredients together until smooth; add the cheese and pepperoni.
Mix well.
Spread on a pizza pan.
Sprinkle with grated cheese and oregano.
Bake at 350° until golden.
Cut into squares and serve.

question: I want a simple recipe for pizza.
answer:
Title: Easy Deep Dish Pizza
Ingredients:
3 c. Bisquick
3/4 c. water
1 lb. hamburger
1/2 c. onions, chopped
1/2 tsp. salt
2 cloves garlic, crushed
1 can (15 oz.) tomato sauce
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
1 c. mushrooms
1/2 c. green peppers
2 c. Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°.
Grease 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1-inch pan.
Mix baking mix and water until soft dough; gently smooth dough into a ball on floured surface.
Knead 20 times.
Pat dough on bottom and up sides of pan (or roll out on cookie sheet).
Pinch side 3/4 inch edge.
Cook and stir beef, onion, salt and garlic until beef is brown and drain.
Mix tomato sauce and Italian seasoning; spread over dough.
Spread beef over sauce.
Add mushrooms, green peppers and cheese.
Bake until crust browns, 20 minutes.

question: I want a simple recipe for pizza.
answer:
Title: Pizza
Ingredients:
1/4 c. warm water
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 pkg. dry yeast
1 c. water
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. salt
4 c. flour
1 jar favorite tomato sauce
3 c. grated Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
oregano
pepperoni
corn meal or Cream of Wheat
Directions:
In a large bowl, dissolve yeast and sugar in 1/4 cup warm water.
Add remaining water, oil and salt in big bowl.
Gradually stir in flour one cup at a time until dough forms a ball and pulls away from sides of bowl.
Turn out on a floured surface; knead 10 minutes.
Return to oiled bowl; cover and let rise 1 hour.
Punch down; divide in 2 parts.
Roll out flat on floured surface. Sprinkle 2 cookie sheets with cornmeal.
Spread out each dough on cookie sheet.
Sprinkle each with equal amounts of sauce, cheese, oregano and favorite toppings.
Bake 20 to 25 minutes at 350°.

question: I want a simple recipe for pizza.
answer:
Title: Pizza (Large)
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 Tbsp. oil
1 pkg. yeast
1 tsp. salt
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. flour (kneaded in)
1 1/4 lb. ground beef
1 small onion, chopped
1 c. tomato paste
3/8 tsp. oregano
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
2/3 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 Tbsp. salt
1/2 lb. cheese
Directions:
Cook meat in a small amount of water with onion.
Drain off fat and mix with tomato paste, garlic, sugar and salt.

question: I want a simple recipe for pizza.
answer:
Title: Any Way You Like It Pizza
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1 c. water
1 1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. spaghetti sauce
1/2 c. cheese (Mozzarella, Cheddar, etc., your choice) and choice of toppings (sausage, vegetables, pepperoni, etc.)
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Mix water and yeast in a bowl.
Wait 5 minutes, then add flour.
Mix with floured hands.
Roll into a ball.
Cover and let rise, then punch down.
Let rise again.
On a floured board, roll out.
Put on pizza pan that has been oiled.
Next, put on spaghetti sauce, then cheese.
Top as desired.
Bake at 375° for 20 minutes or until crust is golden around edges.

question: What’s a good recipe for a hearty stew with beef?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef for stew, cut into 3/4 inch cubes
1/3 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 lb. bacon
1 (1 3/8 oz.) envelope onion soup mix
3 c. water
1 (1 lb.) can (2 c.) tomato sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. barley
1 (29 oz.) can Veg-All homestyle-mixed vegetables (including juice)
Directions:
Coat beef with flour seasoned with salt and mustard.
Cut bacon 1 inch pieces; fry in Dutch oven.
Remove bacon pieces; add beef to bacon drippings.
Brown beef on all sides.
Add soup mix and Veg-All liquid plus water to give you 3 cups.
Cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Add tomato juice, sugar and barley.
Cover and simmer for 45 minutes.
Add bacon and Veg-All home-style vegetables.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for a hearty stew with beef?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
4 lb. stew meat (1 1/2-inch cubes)
4 Tbsp. oil
3 small onions
3 c. water or beef broth
8 to 10 carrots (1-inch chunks)
12 oz. pkg. snow peas or 2 pkg. green beans
Directions:
Mix
well
flour,
salt
and
pepper,
then roll meat in mixture
and
brown
in
oil using large Dutch oven, then brown onions.
Add water and carrots; bring to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer
2 to 2 1/2 hours until meat is tender, then add peas or beans.
Cover
and
continue
to
cook until meat is completely done.
Can be stored in freezer.

question: What’s a good recipe for a hearty stew with beef?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef And Vegetable Stew
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. salt, divided
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces
2 Tbsp. oil
1 onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
4 parsnips (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
4 carrots (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
4 red skin potatoes (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
2 c. red wine or beef stock
1 1/2 tsp. dried thyme
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Combine flour, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper in plastic bag.
Add beef and shake until coated.
In large pot or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add meat in batches and cook until browned, about 20 minutes.
Remove meat. Reduce heat to medium.
Add onion, garlic and remaining 1 teaspoon salt.
Cook until onion is tender, about 5 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a hearty stew with beef?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1 1/2 to 2 lb. stew beef, cut in 1-inch cubes
4 to 5 carrots, sliced
1 small onion, diced
2 to 3 stalks celery, sliced
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes
1/4 c. quick cooking tapioca
1 whole clove (optional)
2 bay leaves
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Trim all fat from meat.
Put all ingredients in crock-pot and mix. Cover and cook on low 8 to 10 hours. High 4 to 5 hours.

question: What’s a good recipe for a hearty stew with beef?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. round steak
1 whole onion, diced
1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 can beef consomme
1/2 c. vegetable oil
5 potatoes
10 carrots
1/2 celery stalk
1 garlic clove
1 can either wine, water or beer
Directions:
Saute onion and garlic in vegetable oil; cut steak in cubes and flour with dry seasonings.
Brown meat in oil with onion and garlic until all sides of meat brown and flour is saturated.
Add can of consomme and Worcestershire sauce; stir as it thickens. Add 1 more can of any liquid.
Gravy and meat should simmer at least 1 hour.
Add peeled, pared and sliced vegetables.
Cook 1 to 2 more hours.
Add water if too thick.
Should be beefy and thick.

question: What’s a recipe for stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
4 medium bell peppers
1/2 lb. ground turkey
1/3 c. diced red onion
16 oz. can refried beans
8 1/2 oz. can kernel corn, drained
3/4 c. chunky salsa
3/4 c. cooked rice
1/8 c. chopped parsley
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. each: chili powder and ground cumin
salt to taste
8 oz. shredded cheese
Directions:
Cut bell peppers in half.
Discard seeds and membranes.
In large pot of boiling water, blanch peppers for 3 minutes.
Invert to drain.

question: What’s a recipe for stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked rice
1/2 roll Prosage
1/2 c. sliced, cooked mushrooms
3 eggs
French fried onions (optional)
1/2 c. diced celery
1/2 c. diced onion
4 bell peppers
salt and McKay's chick style to taste
Directions:
Saute Prosage, celery and onion until transparent.
Mix in rice and eggs.
Remove seeds and stem from peppers and parboil them for 5 minutes.
Set peppers in a greased casserole and fill with rice mixture.
Don't crowd peppers as they will swell some in baking. If there is some rice mix left over, it can be placed in between peppers.
Top with French fried onion rings that come in a can.

question: What’s a recipe for stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
4 large bell peppers (any color)
1 tsp. olive oil
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 medium squash, diced (yellow)
1 medium zucchini, diced
1/2 c. onion, diced
2 medium cloves garlic, minced
2 c. cooked brown rice
1/2 c. fat-free Cheddar cheese, grated
1 c. tomato juice (no salt added)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°. Cut peppers in half lengthwise. Remove stems, rubs and seeds. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat, swirling to cover bottom. Saut crookneck squash, zucchini, onion and garlic until zucchini is tender-crisp (about 4 minutes). Don't overcook. In a medium bowl, combine rice and cheese. Gently stir into skillet. Stuff pepper halves with vegetable mixture. Place in a 9-inch casserole dish. Carefully pour tomato sauce around peppers. Bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes. Serves 8.

question: What’s a recipe for stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
18 small bell peppers
3/4 c. cooked rice
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped bell peppers
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/4 tsp. ground red peppers
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut thin slice from top of each green pepper; remove stems and seeds.
In saucepan over medium heat, in 1-inch boiling water, heat peppers to boiling.
Reduce heat to low.
Cover; simmer 5 minutes or until peppers are tender to crisp.
Drain.
In shallow baking dish, arrange peppers.
Meanwhile, in a skillet, brown meat and cook with chopped peppers and onions until tender.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well.
Spoon mixture into green peppers.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
After the first 10 minutes of baking, baste with tomato basting sauce.
Baste after every 10 minutes of baking.
Serves 18.

question: What’s a recipe for stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
5 bell peppers
1 lb. ground meat
1/3 c. butter
1 c. onions, chopped
1 c. bell peppers, chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1 Tbsp. garlic salt
1 1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce
2 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 to 1 tsp. red pepper
1/3 c. sherry
2 tomatoes, chopped
2 eggs
1/4 c. cheese, grated
3 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Cut bell peppers in half; clean and boil in lightly salted water until tender, approximately 3 to 5 minutes.
Melt butter in a large skillet.
Saute onions, chopped bell peppers and celery for 3 to 4 minutes.
Add ground meat and season with the garlic salt, pepper, Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, seasoned salt and red pepper.
Drain excess grease, then add sherry, tomatoes, eggs, cheese and bread crumbs.
Stuff into individual bell pepper shells and bake at 350° for 20 minutes until firm.
Serves 10.

question: What can I cook with kidney beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
2 minced garlic cloves
1 Tbsp. canola oil
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 medium zucchini, chopped
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1 large can garbanzo beans or chickpeas, rinsed and drained
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
3 c. cooked rice
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1 can red kidney beans (optional)
1 can Mexicorn (optional)
Directions:
In a nonstick skillet, saute onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in the tomatoes, zucchini and oregano. Cover and cook for 5 to 6 minutes, until zucchini is tender, stirring occasionally. Add the beans, salt and pepper; cook and stir until heated through. Serve over cooked rice, sprinkle with shredded cheese.

question: What can I cook with kidney beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. red kidney beans
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1 large bell pepper, chopped
5 stalks celery, chopped
8 to 10 c. water
1/2 c. parsley, chopped
3 medium onions, chopped
salt meat, ham or bacon
Directions:
Wash beans and place in large pot with water and seasoning meat and cook for 1 1/2 hours.
Add garlic, celery, onion, bell pepper and continue cooking an additional 1/2 hour or until tender.
Add cayenne pepper and salt to taste.
Serve over cooked rice.
Serves 10.

question: What can I cook with kidney beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Rice And Beans
Ingredients:
2 c. uncooked rice
2 cloves garlic
1 onion
1 zucchini
1 small jar mushrooms
1 can either kidney beans or black beans
Directions:
Prepare rice as directed.
Set aside.
Chop garlic, onion and zucchini into small pieces.
Fry garlic, onion and zucchini in hot oil for 2 to 3 minutes.
Drain mushrooms and add to frypan.
Drain and rinse beans and add to frypan.
Mix cooked rice in with vegetables.
Top with your favorite sauce (soy, sweet and sour) or cheese.

question: What can I cook with kidney beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1/2 c. onion, finely chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1 clove garlic
2 Tbsp. butter
1 (16 oz.) can kidney beans
2 c. cooked rice
1 tsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Brown onion, celery and garlic in stew pot.
Add all other ingredients.
Cook at low boil for 15 to 20 minutes.

question: What can I cook with kidney beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1/2 c. onions, finely chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1 clove garlic
2 Tbsp. butter
1 (16 oz.) can kidney beans or pinto beans
2 c. cooked rice
1 tsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Brown onions, celery and garlic in stew pot.
Add all other ingredients; cook at low boil for 15 to 20 minutes.

question: Give me a recipe for a healthy smoothie.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Smoothie(Makes 1 Serving)
Ingredients:
1/2 medium banana
2 Tbsp. chopped cashews (optional)
1/2 c. unsweetened tropical-blend fruit juice
1/2 c. fresh or frozen berries (blueberries, blackberries, raspberries or chopped strawberries)
1/4 c. plain nonfat yogurt or soy yogurt (optional)
Directions:
Put banana and half the juice (and the cashews, if desired) in a blender or food processor fitted with a steel blade.
Blend, adding remaining juice gradually, until smooth.
Add berries (and yogurt, if desired), and blend thoroughly.
Serve immediately.

question: Give me a recipe for a healthy smoothie.
answer:
Title: Best Breakfast Smoothie
Ingredients:
1 orange, peeled and torn into fourths
1 medium banana
1/2 c. chunked pineapple (fresh or frozen)
1/2 c. berries (raspberries, strawberries, blueberries or a combination)
1 heaping Tbsp. soy powder
3/4 c. milk (either soy or 1% coconut or combination)
Directions:
Put all ingredients into a Vita Mix machine (or a good blender, but it's not quite the same). Turn on slow, then increase to high speed and blend for 1/2 minute or longer until it's smooth. Serves 2 to 4 people, depending on how much each person wants.

question: Give me a recipe for a healthy smoothie.
answer:
Title: Power Packed Smoothie
Ingredients:
1/2 c. frozen strawberries, thawed
1/2 c. skim milk
1/2 peeled banana
1/2 pkg. vanilla instant breakfast mix
1/2 c. frozen yogurt (no-fat vanilla or peach)
Directions:
Puree strawberries.
Add milk, banana, instant breakfast and frozen yogurt and blend until smooth.

question: Give me a recipe for a healthy smoothie.
answer:
Title: Smoothies
Ingredients:
2 c. fruit (fresh, canned or even applesauce)
2 to 3 c. ice cubes
sugar to taste
water (if needed)
Directions:
Put 2 cups fruit (ex. strawberries) in blender.
Chop until pureed.
Add 2 to 3 cups ice cubes.
Blend until ice is slushy. Add sugar to taste.
Blend again.
Pour into tall glass.
Tastes great!
Be creative.
Try peaches, pineapple, watermelon or even applesauce.
Add a little vanilla ice cream with applesauce.

question: Give me a recipe for a healthy smoothie.
answer:
Title: Smoothie Delight
Ingredients:
2 c. frozen strawberries, pitted
1 banana
1 tsp. lemon (optional)
1 c. frozen pineapple
3/4 c. apple juice
2 tsp. honey (optional)
Directions:
Legumes, which is another name for beans, peas and lentils, are all good sources of fiber, protein, iron, calcium, zinc and B vitamins.
This group also includes chickpeas, baked and refried beans, soy milk, tempeh and texturized vegetable protein.

question: How do I make tender braised short ribs?
answer:
Title: Braised Short Ribs
Ingredients:
4 lb. short ribs (serving size pieces)
1 1/4 lb. small new potatoes (10 pieces)
1 c. coarsely chopped onion
1 bay leaf, crumbled
salt and pepper to taste
1 1/2 small onions or 2 large, cut up
1 lb. small carrots
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 can condensed beef broth (undiluted)
Directions:
Clean ribs with cloth or paper towels; trim excess fat. Slowly heat Dutch oven. Add ribs, fat side down, half at a time. Brown meat well on both sides (about 45 minutes).

question: How do I make tender braised short ribs?
answer:
Title: Braised Short Ribs With Vegetables
Ingredients:
4 lb. beef short ribs
1 1/2 lb. small onions (about 12)
1 1/4 lb. small new potatoes (about 10)
1 lb. small carrots (about 8)
1 c. coarsely chopped onion
1 clove garlic
4 whole black peppers
1 bay leaf
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. dried marjoram
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed beef broth
Directions:
Brown short ribs, coated with flour, in large skillet with oil.
Place vegetables in crock-pot; add short ribs.
Combine spices and beef broth.
Pour over meat.
Cover and cook on low low for 6 to 8 hours.
Remove short ribs and vegetables.
Turn control to high.
Dissolve 1/2 cup flour into small amount of water.
Stir into sauce and cook on high for 10 to 15 minutes, until thickened. Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make tender braised short ribs?
answer:
Title: Braised Short Ribs
Ingredients:
4 lb. beef short ribs
1 c. chopped onion
1 crushed clove garlic
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can beef broth
2 Tbsp. steak sauce
1/2 tsp. marjoram
4 peppercorns
1 bay leaf
1 c. water
2 to 3 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. water
Directions:
In a 12-inch Dutch oven, brown ribs (fat side down) for 30 minutes.
Discard
drippings.
Add	onions,
garlic,
beef broth, steak sauce, marjoram, peppercorns, bay leaf and 1 cup water. Bring to a boil and then simmer, covered, for 2 hours. Remove meat and skim fat from Dutch oven.
Mix flour with 1/2 cup water. Stir
into Dutch oven and boil for 3 minutes. Pour over ribs.

question: How do I make tender braised short ribs?
answer:
Title: Braised Short Ribs
Ingredients:
4 lb. beef short ribs
salt and pepper
flour
2 medium onions, sliced
1 1/2 c. beef broth, water or barbecue sauce
Directions:
Roll short ribs in seasoned flour (about 1 cup flour, 1 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper). Brown well in large skillet. Put sliced onions in crock-pot; add browned ribs and liquid. Cover and cook on low 8 to 10 hours or high 4 to 6 hours.

question: How do I make tender braised short ribs?
answer:
Title: Crock-Pot Braised Ribs With Vegetables
Ingredients:
3 to 3 1/2 lb. beef short ribs
1 c. canned tomatoes or tomato juice
2 tsp. salt
4 small onions
1/4 tsp. pepper
6 medium potatoes, quartered
6 to 8 carrots, cut into 2-inch lengths
Directions:
Preheat ribs in skillet.
Brown on both sides.
Put short ribs into pot.
Add tomatoes or juice, salt, pepper, potatoes, carrots and onions.
Cover; simmer at medium setting for 4 to 5 hours or low setting for 7 to 10 hours.

question: What can I make with tofu and soy sauce?
answer:
Title: Tofu Chili
Ingredients:
5 c. cooked pinto beans
2 lb. tofu, frozen, then thawed, broken into pieces
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 1/2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 Tbsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 Tbsp. tomato paste
2 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. oil
1 green pepper, diced
2 large onions, diced
3 cloves garlic, minced
16 oz. can tomatoes
8 oz. can tomato sauce
3 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 Tbsp. cumin
Directions:
Reserve the cooking water or liquid from cans of pintos.
Mix the soy sauce with next 6 ingredients (including the first of 2 tablespoons of oil); coat tofu pieces with this mixture.
Fry over medium heat until all liquid is absorbed and tofu is browned. Saute the green pepper, onions and garlic in the other 2 tablespoons oil.
Put beans, tofu mixture and sauteed vegetables in a cooking pot or crockpot.
Add the tomatoes, sauce and season. Simmer 30 minutes or longer.
If in crock-pot, simmer several hours.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: What can I make with tofu and soy sauce?
answer:
Title: Spicy Fried Tofu
Ingredients:
2 lb. tofu
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. each: turmeric, sweet basil, powdered thyme and ground cumin
1/2 to 3/4 tsp. curry
2 cloves garlic, pressed, or 1 tsp. garlic powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 to 1/3 c. Parmesan cheese or nutritional yeast
Directions:
First, press tofu by cutting to 1/2-inch slices and firmly patting out excess water with an absorbent towel.
Cut into small cubes.
Spray Pam on nonstick skillet or wok.
Add tofu; saute on high heat for 5 minutes, turning with spatula.
Reduce heat to medium.
Add turmeric; stir until tofu is yellow all over.
Add the other seasonings, stirring well between each addition. Increase heat.
Add soy sauce, stirring constantly.
Finally, add nutritional yeast or Parmesan cheese; mix well, sauteing until golden brown or until cheese melts.
Good hot or cold.
Serves 4 to 8.

question: What can I make with tofu and soy sauce?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Tofu And Veggies
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1/2 c. Sake or white wine
2 Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
4 Tbsp. soy sauce or to taste
2 cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. ginger juice (optional)
1 onion, thinly sliced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. broccoli florets or Chinese cabbage
8 oz. snow peas
1/4 c. roasted cashews or almonds
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
In wok or skillet, bring soy sauce, garlic, ginger and wine to a boil.
Add tofu cubes, cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove tofu and remaining broth from wok or skillet.
Heat oil in wok and stir-fry vegetables over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add remaining broth, tofu and cashews or almonds.
Heat and serve.

question: What can I make with tofu and soy sauce?
answer:
Title: Sesame Tofu
Ingredients:
1 lb. firm tofu
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/3 c. sliced green onion
1 Tbsp. sesame seed, toasted
1 tsp. sesame seed oil
1/4 c. almonds, grind
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1/4-inch thick or 3/4-inch cubes.
Mix soy sauce, onion, sesame seed, oil and almonds into small bowl.
In a dish, put sliced tofu and mixed sauce on the top of tofu; make layer. Cook in microwave about 4 to 5 minutes.
If you want to bring it to boil, use stainless pot or pan.
Cook about 3 minutes on medium-high temperature.
Serve with rice.

question: What can I make with tofu and soy sauce?
answer:
Title: Herb Tofu
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. tofu
4 Tbsp. plain yogurt
3 scallions, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 c. parsley leaves, chopped
1 pt. cherry tomatoes, cut in half and chopped
salt and pepper to taste
1 zucchini, chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
Directions:
In blender or food processor, place tofu and yogurt.
Add chopped vegetables and salt and pepper to taste.
Place on serving platter with bagels, crackers or pita bread.

question: How do I make crispy chicken parmesan?
answer:
Title: Crispy Parmesan Chicken
Ingredients:
3 lb. frying chicken, cut in pieces
1 egg, slightly beaten
2 Tbsp. milk
3/4 c. cornflakes, crushed
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Combine cornflakes, salt, pepper and cheese; set aside.
Wash and pat dry chicken pieces.
Combine beaten egg and milk.
Dip chicken pieces in egg mixture and roll in cornflakes mixture. Place in well-greased baking dish (can use Pam spray), skin side up.
Bake for 1 hour at 350°.
Do not cover or turn chicken while baking.

question: How do I make crispy chicken parmesan?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken With Parmesan Tomatoes
Ingredients:
1/4 c. seasoned bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 small garlic clove, minced
olive or salad oil
coarsely ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
2 large chicken breast halves (without skin and bones)
3 medium size plum tomatoes
2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. dried oregano
1/2 tsp. salt
1 bunch watercress
bottled olive oil and vinegar salad dressing
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Mix bread crumbs, parsley, garlic, 2 teaspoons olive or salad oil and 1/4 teaspoon pepper until blended.
Brush mustard onto chicken breasts, then coat with bread crumb mixture.
Place chicken in 11 x 7-inch greased baking dish, crumb side up.
Bake chicken for 20 minutes.
Cut each tomato lengthwise in half.
Mix Parmesan cheese, oregano, salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
Sprinkle mixture over tomatoes.
Add to chicken in baking dish and bake 15 to 20 minutes longer, until coating on chicken is crisp and juices run clear.

question: How do I make crispy chicken parmesan?
answer:
Title: Crispy Parmesan Chicken Tenders
Ingredients:
1 large egg
3 Tbsp. butter, melted
30 Ritz crackers, crushed
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1 lb. chicken tenders
Directions:
Heat oven to 400°. Line a rimmed baking sheet with foil; coat foil with nonstick spray. Put egg in a shallow bowl; beat lightly with a fork. Put melted butter in another shallow bowl. Mix crushed crackers, paprika, pepper and salt on a sheet of wax paper. Spread Parmesan cheese on another sheet. Dip tenders in egg, then cracker mixture to coat, then dip 1 side in melted butter, then Parmesan cheese. Place cheese side up on lined pan. Bake 12 to 15 minutes or until tenders are golden and cooked through.

question: How do I make crispy chicken parmesan?
answer:
Title: Crunchy Parmesan Chicken
Ingredients:
3/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 egg, beaten
1/4 c. dry bread crumbs
1 tsp. paprika
1 Tbsp. milk
1/4 c. melted margarine
2 1/2 to 3 lb. chicken, cut up
Directions:
Combine cheese, crumbs and seasonings.
Dip chicken in combined egg and milk, then coat with cheese mixture.
Place in a baking dish.
Pour margarine over chicken.
Bake at 350° for 55 to 60 minutes or until golden brown.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make crispy chicken parmesan?
answer:
Title: Parmesan Chicken
Ingredients:
2 fryers, cut up
3/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. salt
2 c. Ritz crackers
1/4 c. parsley
1 c. melted butter
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Blend crumbs (crackers), Parmesan cheese, parsley and seasonings. Dip each chicken piece in melted butter, then in crumb mixture.
Arrange in casserole dish. Pour remaining butter over chicken.
Bake 1 hour.
Do not turn or cover.
Serves 8.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a tuna salad?
answer:
Title: Hot Or Cold Tuna Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. box shells or elbow macaroni
1/2 c. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. mustard
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. dry basil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. mayonnaise
2 cans tuna
2 c. cooked broccoli florets
2 c. sliced cooked carrots
Directions:
Cook shells according to package.
Mix lemon juice, mayo, mustard, sugar, basil and salt.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a tuna salad?
answer:
Title: Tuna Salad With A Twist
Ingredients:
3/4 c. mayonnaise
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 cans drained and flaked white tuna
1 medium red pepper, cubed
1 medium cucumber, sliced and quartered
1/3 c. sliced green onions
Directions:
Combine all ingredients; cover and chill.
Makes about 4 cups.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a tuna salad?
answer:
Title: Tuna Salad
Ingredients:
2 (6 1/2 oz.) cans tuna
1 large apple, cut up
3 hard-boiled eggs, cut up
1 carrot, coarsely grated
2 stalks celery, cut up
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1 small onion, cut fine
3 Tbsp. salad dressing or mayonnaise
Directions:
Drain tuna and combine all ingredients.
Mix well.
Serve with 6 to 8 lettuce leaves, potato chips and 1 can English peas.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a tuna salad?
answer:
Title: Tuna Salad
Ingredients:
1/3 c. reduced calorie mayonnaise
1 1/2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
3 Tbsp. diced, peeled and seeded cucumber
3 Tbsp. chopped red onion
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh dill
2 Tbsp. thinly sliced green onion
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 (12 1/2 oz.) can light-meat tuna (packed in water), drained and flaked
Directions:
In large bowl, stir together the mayonnaise, lemon juice, cucumber, red and green onions, celery dill, salt and pepper. Add the tuna and toss to coat. Serve with slices of Rustice whole wheat round bread.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a tuna salad?
answer:
Title: Tuna Salad
Ingredients:
2 hard-boiled eggs
2 cloves garlic, crushed
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 slice bread, soaked and squeezed dry
salt and freshly ground pepper
1 1/2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 lb. tomatoes, cut into salad size pieces
1/4 lb. green peppers, cut fine
3/4 c. tuna, drained
1/4 c. julienne strips cured ham
Directions:
Separate egg yolks and whites.
Mash yolks and finely chop whites.
Mix yolks with garlic, oil and bread until smooth.
Add pepper, vinegar and salt.
This is the dressing.

question: What can I cook with barley and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Barley Hot Dish
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 chopped onion
1 to 2 stalks chopped celery
3 Tbsp. oil
salt and pepper
1 tsp. marjoram
1/2 bay leaf
2 (1 lb.) cans tomatoes
1 can mushroom soup
3/4 c. barley
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1 (1 lb.) can peas
1 to 2 c. water (as needed)
Directions:
Saute beef, onion and celery.
Add rest of ingredients except water.
Bring to boil; add water as needed.
Barley expands and absorbs water as it cooks.
Turn into shallow large roasting pan (4-quart).
Cover with foil.
Bake 1 hour or longer until barley is tender.
Check and stir occasionally, adding water as needed.

question: What can I cook with barley and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Barley Hot Dish
Ingredients:
3/4 c. barley (soak overnight)
1 lb. hamburger, browned with 1 onion
1 can peas with juice
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can tomato soup
2 c. celery, diced
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
Directions:
Combine ingredients.
Bake in covered casserole dish at 350° for 1 hour.

question: What can I cook with barley and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Baked Barley
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 medium onion, chopped
2 c. barley
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 garlic clove
1 tsp. parsley flakes
4 c. beef bouillon
Directions:
Melt butter in skillet; saute onion and garlic.
Add barley and spices.
Cook until barley is brown.
Bake for 30 minutes at 325°.

question: What can I cook with barley and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Barley Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
5 1/3 c. water
2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, cored and chopped
1/3 c. barley
1 bay leaf
1/2 tsp. dried sage, crumbled
1/4 tsp. dried oregano, crumbled
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 onion, chopped
1 carrot, thinly sliced
1 celery stalk, thinly sliced
2 medium zucchini, sliced small
1 medium-size yellow squash, sliced
ground pepper
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Bring 5 cups water to boil with salt in large saucepan.
Add tomatoes, barley, bay leaf, sage and oregano.
Reduce heat, cover pan and simmer until barley is tender, 30 minutes.

question: What can I cook with barley and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Baked Barley And Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 medium size carrot, sliced
1 small onion, diced
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. quick cooking barley
2 Tbsp. oleo, cut up
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In 2-quart casserole, mix all ingredients. Cover. Bake at 350° approximately 1 hour or until liquid is absorbed.
Stir occasionally.

question: How do I make a chocolate peanut butter pie?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Pie
Ingredients:
4 eggs
1 c. butter, softened
6 oz. semi-sweet chocolate, melted and cooled
2 c. confectioners sugar
3/4 c. peanut butter (smooth, not chunky)
1 c. heavy cream
1 baked 10-inch pie shell
semi-sweet chocolate chips or shavings for garnish
Directions:
Beat eggs with 3/4 cup butter, melted chocolate and sugar for 5 full minutes until smooth and thick.
In separate bowl, beat peanut butter with remaining 1/4 cup butter.
While you are beating, add up to 1/3 cup of the cream in order to make the peanut butter spreadable consistency that will swirl readily into the mixture.

question: How do I make a chocolate peanut butter pie?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Pie
Ingredients:
1 1/2 Tbsp. cocoa
2 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
3/4 c. sugar
dash of salt
2 egg yolks, slightly beaten
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
2 c. milk
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3 Tbsp. peanut butter
1 baked (9-inch) pie shell
whipped cream (for topping)
Directions:
Combine cocoa, flour, cornstarch, sugar and salt in a saucepan.
Add egg yolks, butter and milk.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened.
Add vanilla and peanut butter.
Stir.
Cool and pour into baked pie shell.
Refrigerate until ready to serve.
Within an hour of serving, spread whipped cream over top.

question: How do I make a chocolate peanut butter pie?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Pie
Ingredients:
2/3 c. Sugar
1/3 c. Cornstarch
1/2 tsp. Salt
1-1/2 c. (12 oz. can) undiluted Evaporated Milk
1 c. Water
1 tsp. Vanilla Extract
2 Eggs, slightly beaten
1/2 c. Creamy Peanut Butter
1 ready made Chocolate Flavored Pie Crust
2 Tbsp. coarsely chopped Peanuts
1 (12 oz.) bag (2 cups) Milk Chocolate Morsels
Directions:
In medium saucepan, combine Sugar, Cornstarch and Salt. Stir in Milk and Water. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until slightly thickened. Turn to low heat and add small amounts of cooked mixture to the Eggs. Mix well and return Egg mixture to saucepan and continue stirring. Mix in 1-3/4 cups of the Chocolate Morsels and stir until melted. Allow mixture to come to a boil and thicken on low for 3 minutes (continually stirring). Remove from heat and add Vanilla and Peanut Butter; stir until melted.

question: How do I make a chocolate peanut butter pie?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Peanut Pie
Ingredients:
1 baked (8-inch) pie shell
1 (4 oz.) pkg. chocolate pudding and pie filling mix
2 Tbsp. brown sugar, firmly packed
1/2 sq. unsweetened chocolate
2 c. milk
2 eggs, separated
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/3 c. chopped salted peanuts
Directions:
Combine pudding mix, brown sugar, chocolate and 1/4 cup milk in saucepan.
Add egg yolks and blend well.
Add remaining	1
3/4 cups
milk.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly
until mix comes to a boil.
Remove from heat and stir in butter.	Cool at least 5 minutes, stirring 2 or 3 times.

question: How do I make a chocolate peanut butter pie?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Pie
Ingredients:
2/3 c. sugar
2 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. salt
3 c. milk
3 egg yolks, beaten
1/2 c. peanut butter (creamy)
1 (9-inch) pastry shell
whipped cream or topping
Directions:
In saucepan, stir together sugar, cornstarch, flour and salt. Gradually add milk.
Cook; stir over medium-high heat until thickened and bubbly.
Reduce heat; cook and stir 2 minutes longer.
Remove from heat.
Stir about 1 cup of mixture into egg yolks.
Return all to saucepan.
Return to heat.
Bring to a gentle boil, stirring constantly.
Cook and stir 2 minutes more. Remove from heat; stir in peanut butter until smooth.
Pour into pastry shell; cool.
Cover and refrigerate.
Garnish with whipped cream or topping.

question: How do I make a roasted butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1 large butternut squash, halved
3 Tbsp butter
1/4 tsp cinnamon
1/4 tsp nutmeg
1/8 tsp cloves
1 Tbsp sugar
3 Tbsp olive oil
1 onion chopped
2 Idaho potatoes, peeled and chopped into large pieces
8 c chicken stock (or water + bouillon cubes)
1/4 c heavy cream (optional)
salt and white pepper to taste
Directions:
In a preheated, 400 degree oven, roast the butternut squash with the seasonings, butter and sugar, until soft and browned. Remove from oven and scoop squash from rind.
In a soup pot, heat olive oil and saute onions.
When translucent, add potatoes and squash flesh.
Cover with chicken stock and simmer until potatoes are soft.
Remove from heat and puree with stick blender or in an upright blender.
Return to soup pot and add heavy cream.
Season to taste.
Enjoy!

question: How do I make a roasted butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Carrot And Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
3 c. butternut squash, cut in 1/2-inch pieces
2 c. thinly sliced carrots
3/4 c. chopped onion
2 (14 1/2 oz.) cans chicken broth
1/4 tsp. white pepper
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 c. half and half cream
Directions:
Melt butter in large saucepan on medium heat.
Add squash, carrots and onion; cover and cook 8 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add broth, bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer 25 minutes.
Puree mixture in batches in food processor. Return to saucepan and add spices.
Bring to a simmer.
Add half and half; heat thoroughly.

question: How do I make a roasted butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1 butternut squash
1 small chopped onion
fresh parsley, chopped
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 pt. heavy cream
2 to 3 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Saute onion.
Cut up squash; boil with 1 tablespoon sugar until soft.
Add onion to chicken soup.
Add chopped parsley and onions.
Drain and mash squash and add to soup mixture.
Put through blender briefly.
Add cream and melted butter.
Stir briefly.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a roasted butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. squash, peeled and seeded
1 Tbsp. margarine
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. curry
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper (optional)
3 (10 3/4 oz.) cans chicken broth
1 c. water
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 Tbsp. creamy peanut butter
1/2 c. cream or evaporated milk
Directions:
Saute onion until wilted.
Add garlic.
Cut squash into 1-inch cubes.
Put into soup pot.
Add chicken broth, water and nutmeg; boil until squash is tender.
Remove from heat.
Add curry and pepper; stir.
Stir in Worcestershire sauce and peanut butter. Whirl mix in blender or food processor, adding cream or evaporated milk.
Reheat.
Makes 2 1/2 quarts.
Freezes well.

question: How do I make a roasted butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Elegant Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
2 butternut squash (about 2 lb. each)
2 qt. chicken broth
2 Tbsp. unsalted butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium-sized onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. ground mace
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1 Tbsp. light brown sugar
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
truffle oil (for garnish)
about 1/3 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Halve the squash lengthwise; peel, seed and cut into chunks. Place in a soup pot with the broth. Simmer, partially covered, until tender, 20 to 25 minutes. Transfer the squash to a bowl with a slotted spoon; reserve broth. Melt the butter in the oil in a nonstick skillet over very low heat. Add the onion and cook, stirring, until wilted, about 15 minutes. Sprinkle with the mace and ginger. Cook, stirring, for 1 minute more. Add the cooked onion mixture and the brown sugar to the squash and stir well. Season with salt and pepper.

question: What’s a good recipe for an easy stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Quick Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. sliced onion
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. sliced carrots
1 c. chopped broccoli
1 minced clove garlic or 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. minced ginger or 1/2 tsp. powdered ginger
1/2 to 1 lb. lean meat (beef, chicken, pork or shrimp, cut in slivers
3/4 c. broth or water and chicken or beef bouillon
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Heat skillet to medium-high heat.
Add oil and when sizzling hot, add meat, vegetables, garlic and ginger and stir-fry until meat is done and vegetables are tender-crisp.
Blend cornstarch with chicken broth or with bouillon and water.
Stir into meat and vegetable mixture.
Add soy sauce and reduce heat.
Cook for 5 more minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for an easy stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Easy Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
4 chicken breast halves, skinned, boned and cut into strips
1 (2.25 oz.) pkg. sliced almonds
1 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli, baby carrots and water chestnuts
1/4 c. soy sauce
3 Tbsp. pineapple juice
1 1/2 tsp. cornstarch
hot cooked rice
Directions:
Pour oil into wok or skillet, coating bottom and sides; heat to medium high (325°) for 2 minutes.
Add chicken and almonds; stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add vegetables; cover and cook 4 minutes stirring occasionally.
Combine soy sauce, pineapple juice and cornstarch; add to vegetables, and cook 2 minutes or until thickened.
Serve over rice.
Yields 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for an easy stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 1/2 to 2 c. shrimp, chicken, pork or beef
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 c. mushrooms, sliced
1 c. cabbage, chopped
1 c. broccoli, chopped
1/2 c. sliced carrots
1 green pepper, sliced
1 small tomato, chopped
1/2 c. Chinese pea pods (optional)
2 to 3 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Brown meat in 2 to 3 tablespoons of oil in large, deep skillet; drain.
Add vegetables of your choice with 1/4 cup water to meat.
Cook until tender, stirring to keep vegetables from scorching.
Serve on top of cooked rice.
Season with soy sauce.
