question: What’s a good recipe for an easy stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Oriental Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 c. celery with leaves, chopped
1/2 bunch broccoli
1/2 head cauliflower
5 carrots, diced
1 large onion, sliced
2 green peppers, cut into strips
12 oz. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1 can water chestnuts
1 can bamboo shoots
1 can pineapple chunks, drained
1/8 tsp. ginger
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/2 c. water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. onion powder
1/2 to 1 lb. stew beef
1/2 to 1 lb. pork roast
2 large boneless chicken breasts, cut into strips
1/2 to 1 lb. medium shrimp, peeled
Directions:
Mix ginger, garlic, water, lemon juice, seasoned salt, garlic powder and onion powder (amounts may be increased) for marinade.

question: What’s a good recipe for an easy stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
olive oil flavored vegetable spray
1 medium onion, cut into thin slices
1 1/2 c. julienne cut carrots
1 1/2 c. fresh sugar snap peas
1 c. chopped red pepper
1/2 c. canned low sodium chicken broth (undiluted)
2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
Directions:
Coat a wok or large nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Heat at medium-high (375°) until hot.
Add onion.
Stir-fry 3 minutes. Add carrot.
Stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add peas and sweet red pepper. Stir-fry 4 to 5 minutes or until crisp-tender.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Angel Food Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. cake flour
1 1/2 c. sugar (sifted confectioners)
1 1/2 c. egg whites (12)
1 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. sugar (white)
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. almond flavoring
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Have ready a tube pan.
Stir flour and first amount of sugar together to blend.
Measure egg whites, cream of tartar and salt into large mixing bowl.
Beat until foamy. Gradually add second amount of sugar, 2 tablespoons at a time. Continue beating until meringue holds stiff peaks.
Add flavoring. Sprinkle sugar-flour mixture over meringue.
Fold in gently until mixed.
Bake in ungreased tube pan for 30 to 35 minutes.
Invert on a funnel to cool.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Filled Angel Food Cake
Ingredients:
1 large angel food cake
1 c. milk
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs, well beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. gelatin
3 Tbsp. cold water
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 tsp. almond extract
1 c. cream, whipped
Directions:
Place milk, sugar, eggs and salt in top of double boiler. Place over boiling water; stir constantly until custard lightly coats spoon.
Do not overcook.
Soften gelatin in cold water and pour custard over it.
Stir until dissolved.
Add flavorings. Chill until partially thickened.
Stir frequently.
Fold in whipped cream.
Split cake in 2 layers.
Spoon filling between layers, on sides and top of cake.
Sprinkle with almonds.
Chill. Serves 16.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Angel Food Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1 3/4 c. egg whites
2 tsp. cream of tartar
pinch of salt
1 1/3 c. cake flour (sifted 4 times)
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. almond extract
Directions:
Sift flour and 1 cup sugar 4 times.
Beat egg whites until frothy, then add cream of tartar and salt.
Beat until stiff. Fold in 1 cup sugar.
Fold in flour and sugar mixture.
Add extracts.
Bake in tube pan (fit bottom of angel food cake pan with brown paper), in 325° oven for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Angel Food Cake(This Recipe Is Over 50 Years Old.)
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. flour
1 2/3 c. egg whites
3 Tbsp. cold water or 2 Tbsp. lemon juice and 1 Tbsp. water
1 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Add cream of tartar to egg whites before beating. Then beat until whites form peaks, but not too dry.
Gradually add sugar, then the flour.
Place the batter in an angel food cake pan.
Bake at 300° for 30 minutes.
Increase the temperature to 325° and bake for 15 additional minutes.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Angel Food Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. (8 or 10) egg whites
1 1/4 c. fine granulated sugar
1 tsp. cream of tartar
1/2 tsp. almond extract
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 c. cake flour, sifted
Directions:
Bake half of the recipe for Angel Food Cake in a shallow pan (10 x 15-inch), lined with wax paper, in a moderately slow oven (325°) for 20 minutes.
Turn onto a damp cloth or paper sprinkled with powdered sugar.
Remove bottom paper quickly; cut off thin strips from the sides and ends of cake.
Spread with jam, jelly or whipped cream.
Roll.
Wrap in cloth or wax paper until serving time.
Work quickly or cake will crack.

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Chicken Noodle Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 chicken, cut up
water
2 celery stalks, sliced
1/2 onion, chopped
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. thin egg noodles
1/2 c. half and half
Directions:
In a large Dutch oven, cover chicken with water.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 40 minutes or until tender. Remove chicken.
Reserve broth.
Bone and shred chicken.
Set aside. Discard bones and skin.
Saute celery and onion in butter until limp.
Add flour.
Cook, stirring until golden brown.
Add reserved broth, salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Add noodles. Cook until noodles are tender.
Stir occasionally.
Stir in chicken and half and half.

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Chicken Noodle Soup With Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. broiler-fryer chicken, skinned and cut up
1 qt. water
4 medium carrots, cut in 1/2 inch slices
4 stalks celery, cut in 1/2 inch slices
1 Tbsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 small onion, chopped (optional, adds wonderful flavor!)
2 c. uncooked thin egg noodles
2 chicken bouillon cubes or 2 tsp. instant bouillon
Directions:
Heat all ingredients, except noodles and bouillon, to boiling in 4-quart Dutch oven; reduce heat.
Cover and simmer until chicken is done, about 45 minutes.
Take chicken out of soup; cool slightly.
Remove bones and cut meat up (I use kitchen scissors).

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Chicken Noodle Soup
Ingredients:
1 cut up chicken
14 c. water
1 medium, chopped onion
2 bay leaves
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 c. sliced carrot
1 c. sliced celery
2 chicken bouillon cubes
1 tsp. basil leaves
1 tsp. parsley
1/2 (1 lb.) pkg. egg noodles
Directions:
Combine chicken, onion, bay leaves, salt and pepper; boil. Reduce heat; simmer, covered, until chicken is tender, for 1 hour. Remove chicken; cool, debone and cut into pieces.
Add remaining ingredients; simmer 25 minutes.

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Easy Chicken Noodle Soup
Ingredients:
46 oz. fat-free chicken broth
1/2 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast
1 1/2 c. uncooked medium egg noodles
1 c. sliced carrots
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/3 c. sliced celery
1 tsp. dill weed
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
Directions:
Cut up the chicken into bite size pieces.
In a large saucepan, heat all ingredients over medium-high heat until mixture comes to a boil.
Reduce heat to low; simmer, uncovered, 20 minutes, until chicken and noodles are done.

question: How do I make a classic chicken noodle soup?
answer:
Title: Chicken Noodle Soup
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken (cut up)
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1 tsp. monosodium glutamate
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 tsp. marjoram or basil
1 (8 oz.) pkg. frozen noodles
4 to 5 carrots, sliced
4 stocks chopped celery
1/4 c. parsley
1 chopped onion
1 bay leaf
Directions:
Place all ingredients in a pot, cover with water and simmer until chicken is done.
Remove chicken and debone, cut in small pieces, set aside.
Add noodles to boiling broth, cook until almost done then add cut up chicken, stir until chicken is heated through and serve.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Make-Ahead Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. potatoes
6 oz. cream cheese
1 c. sour cream
2 tsp. onion salt
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. butter
chopped green onions (optional)
Directions:
Cook peeled potatoes until tender and drain.
Mash smooth. Add all ingredients and beat until fluffy.
Cool.
Cover and place in refrigerator.
May be used any time within 2 weeks.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Make-Ahead Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 large potatoes, pared
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1/4 c. sour cream (dairy)
salt and pepper to taste
butter and paprika
Directions:
Boil potatoes until tender.
Drain and mash.
Add cream cheese, salt and pepper, mixing well.
Put in greased two-quart casserole.
Top with pats of butter.
Cover.
Potatoes may be stored in refrigerator for several days.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Hot Apple Dish
Ingredients:
1 stick butter
1 c. sugar
3/4 c. flour
8 oz. Velveeta cheese
2 cans apples with juice
Directions:
Don't throw away those leftover mashed potatoes.
Put in refrigerator for another day.
For 1 to 2 cups of potatoes, put 1 egg and chopped onion (in amount to suit you).
Mix well.
Drop by tablespoon into heated skillet with small amount of fat.
Let brown, then turn to brown other side.
You will never know they were leftover potatoes.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Leftover Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
leftover mashed potatoes
milk
dash of horseradish
table mustard
few fried bacon chips
grated cheese
Directions:
To the leftover mashed potatoes, add some milk and a dash of horseradish.
Add some table mustard and a few fried bacon chips. Whip it up.
Spread a layer in the bottom of a greased casserole and grate some cheese over it.
Add the rest of the mashed potatoes over that and top with more grated cheese.
Bake it in the oven with a piece of foil over it until the potatoes are hot. Remove foil and let the cheese brown a bit.

question: What can I do with leftover mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Refrigerated Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. boiled potatoes
1 stick butter or oleo
6 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped chives or 2 tsp. onion powder
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 to 1 3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Mash the potatoes, mixed with the other ingredients, until smooth and fluffy.
Pour into lightly greased casserole; cover tightly and refrigerate for later use in planning a dinner when you need to save time.
Will last up to 2 weeks in refrigerator.
When ready to use, uncover, sprinkle top with paprika and dot with butter and bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
4 large mild onions
2 to 4 Tbsp. butter
2 to 3 bouillon cubes, dissolved
3 c. water
1/4 c. grated Italian or dehydrated American cheese
salt
4 slices French bread or hard rolls
Directions:
Chop onions.
Place in medium saucepan with butter.
Cover and cook until tender, not brown.
Add bouillon.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Sprinkle bread or slice rolls with cheese and toast in hot oven.
Pour soup in deep bowl.
Place toasted bread on top just before serving.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. yellow onions
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
1/4 tsp. black pepper (coarse)
1 Tbsp. flour (regular)
3 cans beef broth
3 c. water
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper
French bread (8 slices)
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 c. Swiss cheese, grated
Directions:
Peel onions, slice thinly (about 5 cups).
Put butter in a 4-quart saucepan; heat over moderately high heat until butter melts.
Add onions and pepper to butter.
Saute onion mixture, stirring often
until onions are a light golden brown.
Sprinkle onions with flour; stir until all traces of flour disappear.
Cook 1 minute longer, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat. Gradually add beef broth, stirring onion mixture all the time; stir in water and bay leaf.
Return to moderately high heat. Bring mixture to a boil, stirring constantly.
Reduce heat to low. Cook onion soup, uncovered, for 30 to 40 minutes.
Discard bay leaf; add salt and pepper to taste.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
3 medium onions, thinly sliced
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. flour
2 c. consomme
4 c. water
1/2 c. boiled milk
1/4 lb. grated Swiss cheese
6 dried slices French bread
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
In heavy skillet, cook onions in heated butter until slightly browned.
Sprinkle with flour and cook over low flame until golden, never allowing them to become dark brown.
Add consomme and water. Bring to boil, stirring constantly with a wooden spoon, then simmer gently for 20 minutes.
Spoon into casserole or individual bowls. Place slices of bread on top.
Sprinkle generously with cheese. Add pepper.
Sprinkle with melted butter.
Brown quickly under broiler flame.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
6 cups thinly sliced onions
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/3 cup vegetable oil
6 cups beef broth
8 slices french bread (3/4 inch thick, toasted)
1/2 cup shredded parmesan or swiss cheese
Directions:
In dutch oven or soup kettle over medium low heat, cook onions, sugar and pepper in oil for 20 minutes or until the onions are caramelized, stirring frequently. Add the broth; bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 30 minutes. Ladle soup into ovenproof bowls. Top each with a slice of french bread and sprinkle with cheese. Broil until cheese is melted. Serve immediately. Serves 8.

question: How do I make a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. oil (olive)
2 Tbsp. butter
6 medium onions, thinly sliced
salt and pepper
2 tsp. thyme or poultry seasoning
1 bay leaf
1/2 c. dry sherry (optional)
6 c. beef stock
4 thick slices crusty bread, toasted
2 1/2 c. shredded Gruyere or Swiss cheese
Directions:
Heat deep pot; add oil and butter. Add onions; season with salt, pepper and 1 teaspoon thyme. Cook onions 15 to 18 minutes, stirring frequently, until tender, sweet and caramel colored. Add bay leaf and sherry (optional) to the pot and deglaze the pan drippings. Add beef stock and cover pot to boil soup to quick boil. Arrange 4 small, deep soup bowls or crocks on a cookie sheet. Place broiler on high. Once soup reaches a boil, ladle into bowls. Float toasted bread on soup and cover each bowl with mound of cheese. Sprinkle remaining thyme on cheese and place pan and soup bowls under hot broiler until cheese melts and bubbles.

question: How do I make an easy pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Easy Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. basil leaves
1 c. parsley
3 cloves garlic
1/2 c. olive oil
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/3 c. pine nuts or walnuts
Directions:
Put basil and parsley in blender.
Blend with 1/4 cup olive oil at low speed.
Add cheese and remaining oil and blend.
Add nuts, blending until chopped.
Use over spaghetti or in soups or vegetables.

question: How do I make an easy pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Basic Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. lightly packed basil leaves
1 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. extra virgin olive oil
1/3 c. pine nuts
1 clove garlic
2 Tbsp. lemon juice (optional)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a blender and whirl smooth.
Toss well over hot cooked pasta.
Add additional cheese, if desired. Makes 1 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make an easy pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. fresh basil leaves
2 to 5 cloves garlic, peeled
1/4 c. pine nuts
1/4 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice (if you want to cut calories) or 1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Put basil, garlic, pine nuts and Parmesan cheese in food processor or blender.
Turn machine on and drizzle in lemon juice or olive oil.
Continue to puree until a smooth paste is formed. This sauce is delicious to spoon on top of broiled salmon steaks.

question: How do I make an easy pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
3 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 c. fresh basil leaves, firmly packed
1/2 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. pine nuts or almonds
2 cloves fresh garlic
Directions:
Put all ingredients in blender or food processor.
Puree. Serve over hot pasta or fettuccini noodles.
Do not cook pesto or it will turn very dark.
Can be frozen and sliced off as needed for smaller amounts.

question: How do I make an easy pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Simple Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. fresh basil
6 garlic cloves
1/3 c. toasted pine nuts
2/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
3/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a food processor.
Blend until well incorporated.
Use by tossing into hot cooked pasta.

question: How do I make caramel sauce?
answer:
Title: Caramel Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 Tbsp. light corn syrup
1/2 c. whipping cream
Directions:
Melt butter.
Stir in brown sugar and corn syrup.
Bring to a boil.
Cook until sugar dissolves, about 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Stir in whipping cream.
Return to a boil.
Remove from heat.
Serve over ice cream, apple pie, etc.

question: How do I make caramel sauce?
answer:
Title: Caramel Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 tsp. golden syrup
2 Tbsp. condensed milk
pinch of salt
4 Tbsp. hot water
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan.
Add remaining ingredients, except water.
Stir over heat until mixture is thick and turns rich caramel color.
When mixture leaves sides of pan, remove pan from heat; add hot water, a little at a time.
Return to heat; simmer 2 to 3 minutes; let cool.
Serve with ice cream, pancakes or cake.

question: How do I make caramel sauce?
answer:
Title: Homemade Caramel Sauce
Ingredients:
1 stick margarine
2 c. brown sugar
1 c. light corn syrup
2 Tbsp. water
1 (1 1/2 oz.) sweetened condensed milk
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
In a saucepan, melt butter, stir in sugar, syrup and water. Bring to a boil and stir in milk.
Simmer, stirring constantly, until it reaches the thread stage (230°).
Add vanilla and stir. Pour in jars or servers.
Store leftovers in refrigerator.
Keeps well.
Makes 3 to 4 cups.

question: How do I make caramel sauce?
answer:
Title: Caramel Sauce
Ingredients:
1 cup light brown sugar
2 tablespoons flour
3/4 cup water
1 stick butter
Directions:
Combine and cook in sauce pot until thick.
Pour over warm cakes or vanilla ice cream.

question: How do I make caramel sauce?
answer:
Title: Caramel Sauce(2 Quarts)
Ingredients:
1 lb. brown sugar
1 lb. white sugar
2 oz. all-purpose flour
1 qt. water
1 c. butter
1 Tbsp. vanilla
Directions:
Mix sugars and flour.
Stir into water.
Boil gently until thickened.
Stir in butter and vanilla.
Serve warm or cold over ice cream or apple desserts.

question: What can I make with black beans and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. onions, chopped or 1 medium yellow onion
1/2 c. celery, chopped or 1 stalk
1 carrot, diced
2 cloves garlic, sliced
1/3 c. rice
1 tomato, chopped
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. sage
1 can chicken broth or 1 1/2 c. homemade
1 large can black beans, drained and rinsed
hot sauce or Tabasco (optional)
Directions:
In a large skillet or saucepan, heat oil over medium-hot flame.
Add onions and saute for 5 minutes, until onion starts to soften, then add celery, carrots and garlic.
Cook until veggies start to become tender-crisp.
Add rice; stir and coat with juices in the pan.
Cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomato, spices, herbs and chicken broth.
Cover, reduce heat to simmer and cook for 10 to 15 minutes.
Add beans and continue cooking until rice is tender and beans are heated through.
Stir to keep rice from sticking.
Add Tabasco and pepper to taste.
Serve hot with crusty bread.
This can be a meal in itself or a side dish to barbecue pork or ribs.

question: What can I make with black beans and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. olive oil
1 c. finely chopped green bell pepper
1 lb. rinsed, drained, cooked black beans
1 tsp. chopped fresh thyme or 1/2 tsp. dried
1 bay leaf
1/2 c. finely chopped onion
1 Tbsp. finely chopped garlic
1 c. low sodium chicken broth plus 1/2 c. water
1 1/2 c. coarsely chopped canned plum tomatoes with juice
1/4 tsp. dried oregano
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce
salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
4 c. cooked long grain rice
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh flat leaf parsley to garnish (optional)
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
In a medium saucepan, heat oil over medium-high heat; add onion, pepper and garlic.
Saute, stirring occasionally, 15 minutes.
Add beans, broth and water, tomatoes, thyme, bay leaf, oregano and hot pepper sauce.
Over high heat, bring to a boil . Reduce heat; simmer 45 minutes, stirring occasionally until sauce thickens and vegetables are tender.
If mixture becomes too thick, add water to thin to desired consistency.
Stir in cilantro and season with salt and pepper.
Remove bay leaf.
Serve over rice, sprinkled with parsley.

question: What can I make with black beans and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Black Beans Dinner
Ingredients:
2 lb. black beans
1 Tbsp. salt
1 large onion, diced
1 large green bell pepper, diced
1 small jar pimentos, diced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
2 garlic cloves, crushed
1 Tbsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. sugar
4 Tbsp. vinegar
Directions:
Soak black beans in water overnight, drain.
Add 8 cups of fresh water with salt and cook over low heat until beans are tender.

question: What can I make with black beans and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. black beans
1/4 lb. ham for seasoning
1 large onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 green peppers, chopped
1 bay leaf
1/8 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
3 to 4 c. cold water
2 pkg. yellow rice
chopped green onions, fat-free sour cream and tomato for garnish (optional)
Directions:
Wash beans thoroughly.
Cover with water and put in large pot to soak overnight.
Drain beans and place in crock-pot with 3 to 4 cups of water.
Add all other ingredients, except the rice.
Cook on high for 1 hour, then cook 8 to 10 hours on low.
Remove bay leaf.
Cook rice according to directions on package.
Serve beans over rice.
Garnish as desired.
This is a low-fat, high fiber meal.

question: What can I make with black beans and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil or olive oil spray and water
1 medium onion, chopped
2 or 3 cloves of garlic, pressed
1 small green pepper, chopped or use a mix of red, yellow, etc.
2 medium ripe tomatoes or 4 canned Italian plum, drained and chopped
salt and pepper
2 c. cooked black beans or 1 (15 oz.) can, drained and rinsed
1 c. white rice
Directions:
Cook onion, garlic and peppers in hot oil for about 2 minutes. Add tomatoes and cook 3 or 4 minutes.
(I often use a can of pasta-style chunky tomatoes, undrained.) Season with salt and pepper.
Stir in beans and cover and let simmer while rice is cooking.
Serve over rice.

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Cheese Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium mushrooms
4 oz. garlic and herb semi-soft cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
3 c. water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Remove mushroom stems, keeping caps. Chop enough stems to measure 1 cup; put in bowl.
Stir in cheese and parsley.
In saucepan, bring water to boil and lemon juice. Add caps; cook 1 minute.
Drain.
Spoon cheese mixture into caps. Arrange in shallow baking pan.
Bake 8 minutes.
Makes about 2 dozen.

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Cheese Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium mushrooms (about 24)
1/4 c. finely chopped green onions (with tops)
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried basil leaves
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Select firm white mushrooms with caps that are closed or slightly open around the stem.
Cut ends from mushroom stems; remove from mushrooms and chop finely.
Cook and stir mushroom stems, green onions and garlic in butter over medium heat until tender, about 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in remaining ingredients.
Fill mushroom caps with stuffing mixture.
Place filled sides up in greased baking dish.
Bake in 350° oven for 15 minutes.
Serve hot.
Makes 24 appetizers.

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
2 large pkg. fresh mushrooms, stems removed
2 pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 pkg. salad crunchies, chopped in blender
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. mixture of grated (finely) Monterey Jack and Cheddar cheeses
Directions:
After removing mushroom stems, combine cream cheese, salad crunchies and spices.
Add 2 to 3 tablespoons finely grated cheeses.
Spoon cream cheese mixture into mushrooms in a mound. Sprinkle cheese over filled mushrooms.
Bake at 350° on ungreased baking pans (it needs to have sides, because mushrooms become juicier) until cheeses are melted (about 15 to 20 minutes).

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
fresh mushrooms
1/2 c. melted butter (or less)
garlic powder to taste
3/4 c. Monterey Jack cheese
chopped green onion or pkg. onion dip mix
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry red wine
1 (2 3/4 oz.) pkg. Fritos, finely chopped or seasoned bread crumbs
Directions:
Remove stems.
Wash, pat dry and brush caps with part of melted butter.
Combine rest of butter with garlic powder.	Add cheese and onions (or dip mix).
Mix well.	Add soy sauce, wine and crumbs.
Chopped stems can be added also.
Fill caps.
Top with cheese if desired.
Put on cookie sheet and broil 3 to 5 minutes.

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
2 large baskets fresh whole mushrooms
1/2 stick butter
6 green onions, finely chopped
mushroom stems (from whole mushrooms), finely chopped
1 (4 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 pkg. Monterey Jack cheese
1 pkg. grated Cheddar cheese
10 slices bacon, fried crisp and broken in small pieces
4 oz. sour cream
Directions:
Remove stems from mushrooms; wash caps and drain.
Microwave caps until tender and drain all water.
Saute chopped onions and mushroom stems in butter until tender; drain and mix with melted cheeses.
Add sour cream and prepared bacon; salt and pepper to taste.
Stuff in caps and eat immediately.

question: How do I make lemon herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Herb Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tsp. salt
3 lb. chicken parts
1/4 c. corn oil
2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/4 tsp. pepper (fresh ground)
Directions:
In a large, shallow baking dish, mix lemon juice, oil, herbs and spices.
Add chicken; turn to coat.
Cover and refrigerate, turning occasionally, for several hours or overnight.
Remove chicken from marinade.
Grill or broil 6 inches from heat, turning and brushing frequently with marinade, for 35 to 45 minutes, or until tender.

question: How do I make lemon herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
4 lb. chicken fryer
1 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 c. melted butter
1/2 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. crushed rosemary
1 tsp. sweet basil, crushed
1 tsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°. Sprinkle chicken cavities with the garlic salt and crushed rosemary. Truss chicken and place in an open roasting pan. Combine butter, wine, rosemary, basil, parsley, salt and pepper in a small saucepan. Cook over low heat a few minutes until thoroughly blended.
Baste chicken with wine sauce. Roast 20 minutes per pound until tender. Baste frequently. The last 20 minutes, turn to brown underside.

question: How do I make lemon herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb-Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1/4 c. plus 2 Tbsp. vinegar
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. dried tarragon
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1 lb. new potatoes (unpeeled)
1 c. sliced celery
1 (2 oz.) jar pimento, chopped
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
1 (5 to 6 lb.) stewing chicken
Directions:
Combine first 8 ingredients, mixing well.
Set aside.
Cover potatoes with water in a small saucepan and cook, covered, over medium heat until tender, about 15 minutes.
Drain and cool.
Cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces and return to the saucepan.
Add celery, pimento and parsley to the pan.
Toss gently.
Add 2 tablespoons of the tarragon-oil mixture and again toss gently. Set aside.

question: How do I make lemon herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken(Serves Four)
Ingredients:
1 large roasting chicken (about 6 lb.)
3 Tbsp. butter, softened
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. sage leaves
3/4 tsp. thyme leaves
3/4 tsp. basil leaves
6 Tbsp. butter, softened
salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Wash chicken; pat dry.
Cream together 3 tablespoons butter, garlic, Parmesan, sage, thyme and basil.
This mixture goes under the skin, so turn chicken breast side up and make skin as loose as possible.
Spread herb mixture underneath the skin.
Smear butter on outside of skin.
Put chicken breast up in roasting pan and place in oven.
Melt remaining butter.
Cook chicken 15 minutes, basting once.
Reduce to 350°.
Roast 20 minutes per pound, basting with butter every 10 minutes.
Serve.

question: How do I make lemon herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Herb Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. marjoram
1/2 tsp. celery salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. lemon juice
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) broiler-fryer chicken, cut up
1/3 c. flour
3 Tbsp. vegetable shortening
Directions:
Combine thyme, marjoram, celery salt, pepper and lemon juice. Sprinkle over chicken.
Roll chicken in flour.
Slowly brown chicken pieces in melted shortening, about 15 minutes.
Reduce heat; cover and cook 30 to 40 minutes until tender.
Garnish with slices of lemon.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for classic banana pudding?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Banana Pudding
Ingredients:
3/4 c sugar
1/3 c all purpose flour
dash salt
4 eggs, separated
2 c milk
1/2 tsp vanilla extract
1 16 oz pkg vanilla wafers
5 to 6 fully ripened bananas
Directions:
Bring 3/4 full pan of water to boil in bottom pan of double boiler. Combine 1/2 c sugar, flour, and salt in top pan of a double boiler. Beat egg yolks and milk together, add to flour mixture; blend well. Place over boiling water,
cook, uncovered, stirring constantly till thickened. Reduce heat, cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 min. Remove from heat, stir in vanilla extract. Spread small amount of custard in bottom of a 2 qt. casserole dish. Layer wafers, bananas, and custard. Repeat for total of 3 layers, ending with custard. Set aside. In a grease free bowl, beat egg whites till stiff but not dry. Add remaining 1.4 c sugar, beat till stiff peaks form. Spread over pudding, sealing edges. Bake at 450° for 5 min. Cool before serving. When I make this recipe, I double the pudding recipe and add more bananas. I also use the wafer crumbs in the bottom of the package to sprinkle on top of the meringue.

question: What’s a recipe for classic banana pudding?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Banana Pudding
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
2 c. milk
3 eggs, separated
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 box vanilla wafers
6 medium size ripe bananas, sliced
Directions:
Combine 1/2 cup sugar, flour and salt in top of double boiler; stir in milk. Cook over boiling water, stirring constantly, until thickened. Cook, uncovered, 15 minutes more, stirring occasionally. Beat egg yolks. Gradually stir in hot mixture. Return to double boiler. Cook 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Add vanilla. Line bottom of a 1 1/2-quart casserole with vanilla wafers. Top with a layer of sliced bananas. Pour a portion of custard over the bananas. Continue to layer wafers, bananas and custard, ending with remaining 1/4 cup sugar and beat until mixture forms stiff peaks. Pile on top of pudding in casserole. Bake in preheated hot oven.

question: What’s a recipe for classic banana pudding?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Banana Pudding
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. salt
2 c. milk
3 eggs, separated
1 tsp. vanilla
1 pkg. vanilla wafers
6 medium ripe bananas
Directions:
Mix flour, salt and half of sugar.
Put in top of double boiler and add milk slowly.
Stir constantly over boiling water until thickened.
Occasionally stir while cooking, 15 minutes more.
Beat egg yolks in bowl and stir into custard mixture, gradually.
Return to heat.
Stir constantly and cook 5 minutes more.
Remove from heat and add vanilla.
Line bottom of 1 1/2-quart casserole dish with cookies, bananas and custard mix.
Repeat twice, ending with custard on top.
Beat egg whites until stiff, not dry.
Slowly add 1/4 cup sugar.
Whip until stiff peaks are formed.
Spread on pudding and bake at 425° for 5 minutes or until delicately brown.

question: What’s a recipe for classic banana pudding?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Banana Pudding
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
2 c. milk
3 eggs, separated
1 tsp. vanilla flavor
1 large box vanilla wafers
6 ripe bananas, sliced
1/4 c. sugar
Directions:
In a double boiler, combine 3/4 cup sugar, flour and salt; Stir in milk and beaten egg yolks; mix well.
Cook over boiling water, stirring until thickened.
Remove from heat; add vanilla and set aside.
In a quart size casserole dish, start layering with vanilla wafers in the bottom.
Next, add sliced bananas. Pour a portion of the custard over bananas.
Repeat layering, ending with custard on top.
Beat egg whites stiff, but not dry; gradually add 1/4 cup sugar.
Beat until mixture forms a peak. Pile on top of pudding.
Bake in preheated 425° oven for 5 minutes or until brown.

question: What’s a recipe for classic banana pudding?
answer:
Title: Layered Banana Pudding
Ingredients:
1/3 c. flour
2/3 c. packed brown sugar
2 c. milk
2 eggs, beaten
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 c. heavy cream, whipped
4 to 6 firm bananas, sliced
Directions:
In a medium saucepan, combine flour and brown sugar; stir in milk.
Cook and stir over medium heat until thickened and bubbly; cook and stir 1 minute more.
Remove from the heat.
Gradually stir about 1 cup hot mixture into egg yolks.
Return all to the saucepan.
Bring to a gentle boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat; stir in butter and vanilla.
Cool to room temperature, stirring occasionally.
Fold in the whipped cream. Layer a third of the pudding in a 2 quart glass bowl.
Top with half the bananas.
Repeat layers.
Top with remaining pudding. Cover and chill at least 1 hour before serving.
Yield:
8 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Layered Vegetable Vinaigrette(Serves 8. Preparation :20.  Stand 1:00.  Total 1:20.)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. vinegar
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. Dijon mustard
fresh ground black pepper (to taste)
4 carrots
1 lb. green beans
2 tomatoes
2 cucumbers
1/4 lb. mushrooms
Directions:
Mix dressing (first 4 ingredients) in a jar. Shake well. Scrub or peel carrots and slice into rounds. Steam green beans for 5 minutes; drain. Slice tomatoes, cucumbers and mushrooms into slices. Layer vegetables in a serving dish and top with dressing. Refrigerate 1 hour or more before serving.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Versatile Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. fresh ground pepper
1 clove garlic, pressed
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake vigorously.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Hot Vinaigrette Vegetable
Ingredients:
2 c. each: broccoli and cauliflower florets
1 c. thinly sliced onions
6 cherry tomatoes
1/2 c. red bell pepper strips
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/2 tsp. each; lemon juice and raspberry vinegar
1 tsp. Chinese sesame oil
1/2 tsp. each: granulated sugar and salt
1 small garlic clove, mashed
1/4 tsp. oregano leaves
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. chopped fresh basil
Directions:
In 2-quart saucepan, bring 1 quart water to a boil.
Add broccoli and cauliflower and cook, stirring once for 30 seconds to 1 minute.
Drain vegetables and transfer to serving platter.
Add onions, tomatoes and bell peppers and set aside.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: French Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 c. light olive oil
4 Tbsp. wine vinegar
2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1 clove garlic, finely minced
1 Tbsp. each: chopped fresh basil, tarragon and oregano
salt and fresh pepper to taste
Directions:
Whisk together all ingredients and toss with fresh salad. Serve at once.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Our Favorite Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. prepared Dijon style mustard
4 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. granulated sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
minced parsley and/or snipped fresh chives to taste
1/2 c. olive oil
Directions:
Measure mustard into a bowl.
Whisk in vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper and herbs to taste.
Continue to whisk mixture while slowly dribbling in olive oil until mixture thickens.
Adjust seasoning to taste.
Cover until ready to use.
(Vinaigrette is best if made just before it is to be used.)
If necessary, whisk again before serving.
Makes 1 cup.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Hot Chili
Ingredients:
1 lb. dried beans
2 lb. ground beef
2 large onions, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded, rinsed and chopped
3 to 5 Tbsp. chili powder
1 Tbsp. ground cumin
1 tsp. celery salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 (4 oz.) can green chilies, chopped
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
4 c. cocktail vegetable juice
Directions:
Sort and wash beans. Put in Dutch oven.
Cover with water and bring to a boil.
Cover and cook 2 minutes.
Remove from heat. Let stand 1 hour.
Bring to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 1 hour or until tender.
Drain beans and set aside.
Combine ground beef, onion, garlic and jalapeno in large Dutch oven.
Cook over medium heat, stirring to crumble meat, until meat is browned.
Drain off drippings.
Add beans and remaining ingredients.
Stir well. Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Yields 10 to 12 servings.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Chili Hot Beans Chili Recipe
Ingredients:
3 T. oil
1 lb. ground beef
1 lg. chopped onion
4 pieces chopped celery
3 cloves garlic
1 30 oz. can Bush Best Chili Hot Beans
3 c. water
2 t. salt
1/2 t. pepper
1/2 t. sugar
1 t. chili powder
1/2 c. ketchup
1/2 t. Cayenne pepper or hot pepper sauce
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet.
Lightly brown the meat.
Drain excess fat.
Push to side of pan.
Mix in remaining ingredients.
Simmer 30 to 45 min.
Serves 6 to 7 people.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Spicy Hot Chili
Ingredients:
2 medium cloves garlic
1 large onion, chopped
1 lb. ground chuck
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (15 oz.) can pinto beans
1 to 2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. oregano leaves
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
Directions:
Brown meat in Dutch oven.
Add garlic and onion while browning, stirring occasionally.
When brown, drain fat.
Add remaining ingredients to Dutch oven.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, one hour, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.
Yield:
4 (1 1/2 cup) servings.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Chili Beans
Ingredients:
1 ham hock
1 lb. pinto beans
1 lb. ground beef
1 chopped onion
1 clove garlic
1 half bell pepper, chopped
1 Tbsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 pkg. Dupree chili mix
1 small can mushrooms
1 (16 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (16 oz.) can Mexican stewed tomatoes
2 c. cut up smoke sausage
1 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 small can mild or hot jalapeno peppers (optional)
Directions:
Wash and sort beans.
Place beans, ham hock, garlic, salt and pepper into a pot with 8 cups of water.
Bring to a boil, then simmer 2 1/2 to 3 hours.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Homemade Chili
Ingredients:
cooked red beans (seasoned with garlic)
2 to 3 lb. chuck meat *
1 1/2 onions, chopped
2 cans Ro-Tel tomatoes
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cumin
4 to 5 Tbsp. chili powder
red pepper to taste
4 to 5 cloves garlic, chopped
8 oz. tomato sauce
1 tsp. black pepper
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. paprika
2 to 3 whole jalapenos
Directions:
Brown meat, garlic and onions.
Add all other ingredients. Bring to a boil.
Place in crock-pot.
Cook 12 to 16 hours on low.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium size mushrooms, wiped with a damp cloth
1 c. mushroom stems
3 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/4 c. butter, softened
1 c. nuts, finely chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 to 1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. heavy cream
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°. Arrange mushrooms in a shallow baking dish, hollow side up. Combine all remaining ingredients except cream; heap into mushroom umbrellas. Pour cream over mushrooms; bake at 350° for 20 minutes. Baste once or twice with sauce in baking dish. Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
fresh mushrooms (large, 10 to 15)
butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. chopped green onions
4 Tbsp. bread crumbs or stuffing mix
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley or chives
1/4 c. sour cream
salt and pepper
cayenne
grated Cheddar cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped meat (leftover) or bacon
Directions:
Take out stems of large, fresh mushrooms.
Saute in 2 tablespoons butter or margarine.
Add green onions, bread crumbs, meat and parsley or chives.
Moisten with sour cream.
Add seasonings.
Stuff caps with mixture.
Sprinkle grated cheese over. Drizzle melted butter over.
Bake at 375° for 15 to 20 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. large fresh mushrooms*
6 Tbsp. butter
1 c. chopped onions
1 c. bread crumbs
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
1/4 c. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Rinse mushrooms and pat dry.
Remove stems; chop and set aside.
In large skillet, melt butter.
Brush mushroom caps with melted butter; place on lightly buttered shallow baking pan.
To remaining butter, add onions and mushroom stems.
Saute 2 minutes. Add crumbs, cheese, nuts, parsley, salt and pepper; stir.
Spoon into mushroom caps, piling high.
Bake at 350° until hot, about 20 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
20 large mushrooms
2 Tbsp. butter, salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. melted butter
1/2 onion, finely chopped
2 egg yolks
3 Tbsp. bread crumbs
1/4 c. sour cream
Directions:
Saute chopped onion in butter.
Add egg yolks, salt, pepper, bread crumbs, sour cream and the mushroom stems, finely chopped. Stuff each mushroom head, forming a rounded top.
Sprinkle with 3 more tablespoons bread crumbs.
Place mushrooms in a shallow, buttered baking dish.
Sprinkle with the melted butter.
Bake in a hot oven at 450° for 10 minutes or until golden brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms(Great Appetizer When Having A Nice Dinner For Two)
Ingredients:
8 to 10 fresh medium-small mushrooms (about 1/4 lb.)
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. minced onion
1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 c. Soft breadcrumbs
1/4 c. shredded sharp cheddar cheese, lightly packed
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Wash mushrooms and drain on paper towel. Pull stems from mushrooms and finely chop.
Melt butter in a small skillet over medium-low heat.
Add chopped mushroom stems and onion.
Saute until tender and translucent.
Stir in Worcestershire sauce, soft breadcrumbs, cheese and salt and pepper.
Salt insides of mushroom caps and fill with sauteed mixture, mounding slightly. Add 2 Tbsp. water to shallow baking dish.
Arrange mushroom caps in dish.
Bake 20 minutes.
Serve hot.
Makes 8 to 10 appetizers.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges(Low Calorie)
Ingredients:
1 tsp. Paprika
1 tsp. Dried Parsley Flakes
1/4 tsp. Onion Salt
1/8 tsp. Pepper
2 Medium Potatoes Cut into Wedges
Refrigerated Butter Spray
Directions:
In a reusable plastic bag.
Combine the first 4 ingredients. Spritz the potato wedges with butter flavored spray.
Place in the bag a few at a time, and shake to coat.
Arrange in a single layer on an ungreased baking sheet.
Bake at 450 for 25-30 minutes or until tender.
Makes 2 Servings - 1 Point Each.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges
Ingredients:
4 medium Russet potatoes
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 tsp. ground pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
2 cloves garlic or powder
Directions:
Place potato wedges in large bowl; add cold water to cover. Let set 15 minutes.
Preheat oven to 425°.
Spray nonstick spray on baking pan and set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges
Ingredients:
4 medium russet potatoes, cut into large wedges
1 tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
2 cloves garlic, minced, optional
Reduced-sodium ketchup, optional
Directions:
Place potatoes in a large bowl, add cold water to cover. Let stand for 25 minutes. Preheat oven to 425°. Spray a nonstick baking sheet with vegetable cooking spray. Set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges
Ingredients:
2 medium baking potatoes
1 medium sweet potato
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. paprika
3/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. dried thyme, crushed
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges (24 wedges total). On an ungreased 15 x 10 x 2-inch baking pan, arrange wedges in a single layer, skin side down.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges
Ingredients:
4 Medium Russet Potatoes, cut into large wedges
1 Tbsp Vegetable Oil
1/4 tsp Freshly ground Black Pepper
1/8 tsp Salt
2 Cloves Garlic, minced (Optional)
Directions:
1. Place Potatoes in a large bowl, add cold water to cover, let stand for 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Cajun Shrimp Creole
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
3 stalks celery, chopped
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 large onion, diced
1 large bell pepper, diced
1 (14 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 tsp. dried basil leaves
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. salt
1 lb. medium shrimp, shelled and deveined
cooked rice
Directions:
In large, deep	fry
pan
over medium heat, melt butter and oil.
Add
celery, garlic, onion and bell pepper.
Saute 4 minutes, until
vegetables	begin to soften.
Add stewed tomatoes and tomato	sauce.	Mix well.
Add basil, pepper, cayenne pepper and salt.
Mix
well.
Over medium-high heat, simmer 10 minutes. Add shrimp.
Simmer
5
to	8 minutes, stirring frequently, until shrimp
are pink and cooked thoroughly.
Serve over white or brown rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground meat
1 large onion
1/2 tsp. cumin seed or powder
garlic powder to taste
1 hot jalapeno pepper
4 to 5 chopped fresh tomatoes or Del Monte Mexican style canned tomatoes
1 box taco shells
chopped lettuce and tomatoes (for topping)
Directions:
Heat shells in oven (325°) until crisp.
Simmer all ingredients for 45 minutes, thickening with 1 tablespoon flour if needed.
Spoon filling into taco shells.
Top with chopped lettuce, tomatoes and shredded cheese.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Creole
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. butter
1 small chopped onion
1 small chopped pepper (green)
1 tsp. chopped garlic
1/4 c. cooking wine
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. water
1 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. sugar
1 large can tomatoes
8 oz. chili sauce
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 lb. peeled shrimp or cooked shrimp
Directions:
Saute onion, peppers and garlic in butter.
Add liquid from tomatoes, salt, flour and water.
Cook on low for 15 minutes.
Add tomatoes, mushrooms, sugar and wine; cook for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Creole
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1 large onion, chopped
1/2 c. minced pepper (green)
1 minced clove garlic or 1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1/8 tsp. rosemary
1/8 tsp. paprika
2 c. cooked or canned tomatoes
1 lb. cooked, cleaned shrimp (1 1/3 c.)
2 to 3 c. hot cooked rice
Directions:
Place a 4 to 5 pound stewing hen in kettle with enough water to cover and cook gently until tender.
Add more water if necessary.
Let cool in broth.
Remove meat from bone and cut in bite-size pieces.
Place cut chicken in bottom of 8 1/2 x 13-inch baking pan.
Cover the chicken with gravy made by thickening the broth with flour.
This will take about 2 cups gravy.
Cut up about 3/4 loaf of bread into cubes and make a dressing, seasoning with salt and pepper using onion and celery according to taste. Moisten with chicken broth, according to whether you want wet or dry dressing.
Place the dressing on top of chicken and gravy and bake in a moderately hot oven until the gravy is bubbling and the dressing is slightly browned.
This will take about 30 minutes. This dish can be prepared the day before it is needed and placed in the refrigerator until time to bake.
This will serve 10 to 12 persons.
Any remaining broth can be used to make gravy to serve on the dressing.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Creole Pronto
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 c. chopped onions
1 c. chopped celery
1 green bell pepper, chopped
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 c. chopped, peeled tomatoes
1 can (8-oz) tomato sauce
1/2 c. Holland House Marsala Cooking Wine
1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
1 lb. uncooked shrimp, peeled and deveined
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
4 c. hot cooked rice or 1 (10-oz) package of egg noodles, cooked and drained
Directions:
Heat oil in large saucepan over medium-high heat.
Add onion, celery, bell peppers and garlic; cook 2 to 3 minutes.
Add tomatoes; cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add remaining ingredients except rice; cook 2 to 3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink.
Serve over hot cooked rice or noodles.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Baked Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 small can tomato paste
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. cottage cheese
1 large egg
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
4 oz. jumbo macaroni shells
1 can mushrooms, sliced or whole
Directions:
Saute onion, beef and all other ingredients, except cottage cheese, egg, parsley, Parmesan cheese and mushrooms.
Simmer about 15 minutes.
Cook shells as directed; cool.
Fill shells with cheese mixture:
cottage cheese, egg, Parmesan cheese and parsley. Place sauce in 2-quart baking dish.
Add stuffed shells.
Bake for 30 minutes at 300°.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
2 tsp. margarine
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. shredded carrots
1 pkg. chopped spinach, cooked
1/4 tsp. basil
8 jumbo shells, cooked and drained
1 jar spaghetti sauce
4 to 8 oz. Monterey Jack cheese
1 c. Ricotta cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Spray 8-inch baking pan with nonstick cooking spray.
In large skillet, melt butter (margarine); add onion.
Cook over medium for 5 minutes.
Add carrots, spinach and basil.
Cook another 3 minutes.
Remove from heat and add 1 cup Ricotta cheese.
Stuff into shells.
Put in baking dish.
Cover with sauce and cheese.
Bake 15 minutes or until heated through.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
1 pkg. jumbo shells
1/4 c. butter
1 lb. pork
1/2 c. minced onion
1 qt. spaghetti sauce
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1 Tbsp. salt
1 lb. hamburger
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 cloves minced garlic
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Cook shells until soft, place in cold water and set aside.
Melt butter.
Add pork and beef; cook until brown.
Drain.
Add onion and garlic.
Cover and simmer 10 to 15 minutes or until onion is tender.
Remove from heat; stir in Parmesan, salt and bread crumbs.
Pour 1/2 cup of spaghetti sauce in the bottom of casserole dish.
Stuff each shell and arrange on top of sauce.
Cover with remaining sauce and bake for 30 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
4 cups cooked and drained chicken
1/2 cup chopped onion
1 cup chopped celery
1 cup mayonnaise
8 oz. frozen peas (optional)
1 box Stove Top stuffing (prepared)
1 box jumbo shells (cook al dente)
2 cans of condensed chicken or mushroom soup
1 can water
1 cup sour cream
Directions:
Mix first 5 ingredients with stuffing. Stuff shells. Combine soups and water and sour cream. Spray dish with Pam (dish big enough to hold 25-30 shells). Put some soup in bottom of dish. Lay shells in single layer and top with remaining soup. Bake 30 minutes at 350°.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Classic Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
3 c. Ragu Old Home Style
2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1 (12 oz.) pkg. jumbo shells, cooked and drained
2 lb. Ricotta cheese
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
3 eggs
1/8 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Evenly spread 1 cup sauce in a 17 x 12-inch bake pan.
In a large bowl, combine cheeses, eggs, parsley and pepper.
Fill shells with cheese mixture and arrange in a single layer in baking pan.
Evenly top with remaining sauce. Bake 45 to 50 minutes or until bubbly.
Serves 8.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Cabbage Casserole
Ingredients:
1 or 2 heads cabbage
1 to 1 1/2 lb. ground pork
1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
1 c. onion
1 c. celery
1 c. bell pepper
1 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Cut up cabbage and boil until tender. Fry ground pork until brown; add seasonings, Ro-Tel tomatoes and cabbage.
Cook for about 45 minutes.
Add salt and black pepper to taste.
Add 1/2 cup bread crumbs to mixture. Cook about 2 to 3 minutes.
Pour into baking dish and sprinkle remaining crumbs on top.
Bake at 350° until bread crumbs are brown.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Cabbage
Ingredients:
3 medium onions
approximately 1 lb. salt pork (ground)
2 large heads cabbage
2 lb. ground pork
2 lb. ground beef
6 c. cooked rice (3 pkg. Success boil bags)
2 cans whole or crushed tomatoes
2 cans tomato soup
Directions:
Cook cabbage until tender.
(Easy Tip:
Freeze cabbage a couple of days; thaw 1 day until limp.)
Remove tough skin on salt pork and grind fat.
Chop and saute onions and salt pork.
Let cool.
Mix ground pork, ground beef, cooked rice and onion and salt pork mixture.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Cabbage
Ingredients:
1/2 c. uncooked rice
1 lb. ground beef
1 lb. ground pork
1 medium chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 eggs, beaten
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. cooked roast pork (butt end)
2 Tbsp. butter
1 large head cabbage
16 oz. sauerkraut, drained
1 qt. whole tomatoes
caraway seed
Directions:
Cook the rice in lightly salted water according to package directions.
Cool slightly.
Mix with the next 8 ingredients for filling.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Cabbage
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. ground pork
3/4 lb. ground beef
2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3/4 lb. rice, washed well
1 large onion, minced
3 Tbsp. shortening
1 large head of cabbage
1 small can of sauerkraut
1 No. 2 can tomato juice
Directions:
Core cabbage and place in enough boiling salted water to cover. With a fork in one hand and a knife in the other, keep cutting off the leaves as they become wilted. Drain. Trim thick center vein of each cabbage leaf. Brown the onion in shortening. Add to meat, seasonings and rice; mix well. Place a tablespoon of filling on each cabbage leaf and roll, tucking in edges. Place in pot and cover 2/3 full with water; arrange sauerkraut on top; add tomato juice. Cover and cook slowly for about 1 1/2 hours or until rice is tender. Serves 6 to 8 people. You can substitute green pepper for the cabbage or use both. For green peppers, cut off tops, scoup out center and fill peppers about 2/3 full with filling. Cook as directed for cabbage.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Cabbage And Pork Chops
Ingredients:
8 lean pork chops
1 small can tomato sauce
1 (No. 2) can peeled tomatoes
1/2 c. olive oil or butter
1/4 tsp. black pepper
6 medium onions, sliced paper thin
1 large cabbage head, cut sauerkraut style
salt to taste
Directions:
Place in large deep pot the oil or butter.
Add pork chops; brown lightly.
Remove the chops from the pot and place them in a dish.
Add the onions; saute for 15 minutes in the hot oil, stirring constantly.
Add tomatoes and the sauce.
Cook over low fire for 1 hour, stirring every 10 minutes.
Add salt, pepper and the lightly browned pork chops.
Cook slowly for 1/2 hour.
Add cabbage, a little at a time, until all is used.
Cook until tender.
Serve hot with cornbread or hot biscuits.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Hamburgers
Ingredients:
1 can (20 oz.) vegeburger
6 eggs, beaten
1 large onion, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
1 tsp. sage
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
3/4 c. cracker crumbs
1 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Saute onion and green pepper and add to burger.
Mix all ingredients together. Fry in patties, 1/2 cup per bun.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Hamburgers
Ingredients:
3 eggs, beaten
1/3 c. milk
1 onion, grated
1 rounded Tbsp. peanut butter
1 tsp. Vegex
1 c. oatmeal
Directions:
Mix all the ingredients except oatmeal together and then fold in the oatmeal.
Fry by tablespoons as patties.
Make gravy and simmer burgers in it for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger Patties
Ingredients:
3 c. water
2/3 c. pearl barley
2/3 c. lentils
2/3 c. long grain brown rice
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 c. grated carrots
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 Tbsp. minced garlic
1/4 c. shelled sunflower seeds
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh basil
2 tsp. chopped fresh thyme
2 tsp. chopped fresh oregano
salt and pepper to taste
4 beaten eggs
7 Tbsp. flour
vegetable oil for frying
Directions:
Dried herbs can be substituted, use smaller amounts.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Hamburger
Ingredients:
1 c. pinto, black-eyed peas or lentils
1 egg white
1/2 to 1 c. cracker meal
1/4 c. onion
1/4 tsp. garlic powder or garlic
1 tsp. cider vinegar
1/4 tsp. garlic salt (optional)
Directions:
Saute onion with garlic for 1 minute; set aside.
In a separate bowl, mash beans.
Add cracker meal (enough to make a ball).
Add cider vinegar, egg white, onion and garlic.
Grill or bake for 2 1/2 minutes on each side.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger
Ingredients:
1 medium red bell pepper
1 medium green bell pepper
1 onion
1/2 to 1 small garlic clove
1 large carrot
1/2 c. mushrooms
1 c. couscous (Moroccan pasta)
1 egg
Directions:
Ground bell pepper, onion, garlic, carrot and mushrooms.
(May chop fine in food processor for best results).
Cook 1 cup of couscous as directed on box of pasta.
Add to ground ingredients, then add 1 scrambled egg.
Mix well.
Roll out to patties.
Bake or fry as desired.
Serve on hamburger buns (cheese optional).
May use rice instead of couscous.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Coconut Muffins
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. sugar
3/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 (3 1/2 oz.) pkg. coconut cream instant pudding
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 c. canned pumpkin
1/2 c. chopped nuts (pecans or walnuts)
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in large mixer bowl.
Beat at medium speed until well blended.
Combine flour and next ingredients in medium bowl.
Add to the sugar mixture alternately with pumpkin.
Mix after each addition.
Stir in nuts.
Pour into greased muffin pans.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes or until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool in pan for 10 minutes.
Makes 15 to 18 muffins.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin-Coconut Bread
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. sugar
3/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 (3 1/2 oz.) pkg. coconut cream instant pudding mix
1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 c. canned or cooked, mashed pumpkin
1/2 c. chopped pecans (optional)
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in a large mixing bowl; beat at medium speed of an electric mixer until blended.
Combine flour and next 7 ingredients in a medium bowl; add to sugar mixture alternately with pumpkin, beginning and ending with flour mixture. Mix after each addition.
Stir in pecans, if desired.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Custard Cups
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. low-fat milk
1/2 c. canned pumpkin
1/3 c. packed brown sugar
2 Tbsp. reduced-calorie maple syrup
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
2 eggs
4 egg whites
1/2 c. water
1/3 c. raisins
2 Tbsp. reduced-calorie maple syrup
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Heat milk in heavy 1-quart saucepan until hot, but not boiling.
Mix pumpkin, brown sugar, 2 tablespoons syrup, cinnamon, ginger, eggs and egg whites in a large bowl until smooth.
Beat in hot milk.
Divide evenly among 6 ungreased 10-ounce custard cups.
Place cups in rectangular pan, 13 x 9 x 2-inches, on oven rack.
Pour very hot water into pan to within 1-inch of tops of cups.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. pumpkin
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 c. cooking oil
1 c. chopped nuts
1 small box instant coconut pudding mix
Directions:
Sift dry ingredients together, except sugar.
Mix together pumpkin, sugar, eggs, oil and nuts.
Add a small box of instant coconut pudding and mix in dry ingredients.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
2 c. Baker's Angel Flake coconut
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 c. Cool Whip
1 pkg. instant vanilla pudding
2/3 c. milk
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. cloves
1/4 tsp. allspice
1 c. pumpkin
Directions:
Lightly brown coconut in butter.
Stir often.
Save 2 tablespoons for garnish.
Press remaining coconut over the bottom and sides of greased 8-inch pie pan.
Cool.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Roasted Asparagus
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh asparagus, trimmed
2 Tbsp. olive oil
pinch salt
shaved parmesan cheese
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Arrange oven racks to middle and lower third of oven.
Heat oven to 400 degrees.
Divide asparagus and spread on two jelly-roll pans.
Toss each with 1 tablespoon oil and salt.
Roast 10 minutes. Switch pans between racks and roast 10 minutes more until stalks are tender.
Sprinkle top with cheese if desired and pepper.
Makes 4-6 servings.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Parmesan Topped Asparagus
Ingredients:
2 lb. asparagus, trimmed and peeled
1/4 c. unsalted butter, melted
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Blanche asparagus in boiling water for 3 to 5 minutes.
Drain on paper towels.
Arrange spears in a shallow ovenproof serving dish.
Pour melted butter over asparagus.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.
Sprinkle cheese evenly over top.
Bake for 20 minutes or until lightly browned.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Hazelnut-Parmesan Asparagus
Ingredients:
2 c. water
2 lbs. asparagus spears
2 Tbsp. butter or stick margarine
3 c. sliced mushrooms
1 1/2 tsp. chopped fresh basil leaves
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground pepper
1/4 c. shredded Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. chopped hazelnuts
Directions:
Heat water to boiling; cover and cook 4-6 minutes or until crisp and tender.
Drain and set aside.
Melt butter in skillet over medium heat.
Stir in mushrooms, and cook until light brown. Stir asparagus, basil, salt and pepper into mushrooms until vegetables are coated with seasoning and asparagus is heated through.
Sprinkle with cheese and hazelnuts.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Asparagus Parmesan
Ingredients:
1 lb. asparagus
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/3 c. butter or margarine
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
pepper to taste
Directions:
In skillet over medium heat, boil 1-inch of water. Add asparagus and 1 teaspoon salt; cover skillet and cook 5 minutes or until asparagus are tender-crisp. Drain.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Asparagus And Parmesan Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. green and/or white asparagus
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. fresh thyme or basil
1/4 tsp. Dijon style mustard
1 clove garlic, minced
salt and pepper
finely shredded Parmesan cheese
parsley
basil
slivered garlic (optional)
Directions:
Place asparagus in a steamer basket.
Place basket in a large skillet over boiling water.
Reduce heat, cover and steam for 5 to 7 minutes or until asparagus is crisp tender.
Remove from steamer and cool slightly.
Meanwhile, for dressing, in a screw top jar, combine olive oil, lemon juice, thyme, mustard, garlic, salt, and pepper to taste.
Cover and shake until combined.
Arrange asparagus on a platter.
Drizzle with dressing.
Sprinkle with cheese, parsley and if desired basil/garlic.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts With Cream And Garlic
Ingredients:
3 pounds Brussels sprouts, trimmed and cross cut in base
1/4 cup unsalted butter
2 medium garlic cloves, minced
1 cup whipping cream
1 tsp. salt
Freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Cook Brussels sprouts in large pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 10 minutes.
Drain, rinse under cold water and drain again.
(Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.)
Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until soft, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Do not brown.
Add Brussels sprouts, cream, salt and pepper and cook until cream thickens enough to coat Brussels sprouts, stirring occasionally, about 15 minutes.
Serve hot. Yield:
8 to 10 servings.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts Supreme
Ingredients:
1 pound fresh Brussels sprouts, trimmed
1 cup chopped celery
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 cup milk
1/2 cup shredded process American cheese
1/4 tsp. salt
pinch cayenne pepper, optional
Directions:
Place Brussels sprouts, celery, and a small amount of water in a saucepan; cover and cook for 8 minutes or until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in another saucepan, melt butter.
Stir flour until smooth.
Gradually add milk; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Add cheese, salt, and cayenne if desired; stir until cheese is melted.
Drain sprouts and celery; top with cheese sauce.
Yield:
4-6 servings.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Better Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
3 to 3 1/2 lb. Brussels sprouts
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
8 cloves garlic
1 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Cut off stem and "X" bottom of each sprout.
Over low heat, melt the butter with olive oil in a large pot.
Add garlic; cook 2 to 3 minutes.
Add sprouts; toss with butter mixture.
Add chicken broth, salt and pepper.
Cover; cook for 10 to 15 minutes over low.
Do not overcook.
Drain; return to pot.
Before serving, toss with melted butter and parsley.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen Brussels sprouts
water
4 slices bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. sour cream
salt to taste
Louisiana hot sauce or ground cayenne pepper to taste
Directions:
If using fresh sprouts, rinse well and cut off any discolored leaves.
With a paring knife, cut a "plus"
sign in the stem end to insure even cooking.
Place the sprouts in a large saucepan and cover with water.
Bring to a boil and continue boiling for about 10 minutes or until the stem side is tender when pierced with a knife.
Drain and set the sprouts aside.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Better Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
3 to 3 1/2 lb. sprouts
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
8 cloves coarsely chopped garlic
1 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
freshly squeezed lemon
Directions:
Cut off stems from sprouts and remove outer yellow layer.
Cut small x in bottom of each.
Rinse in cold water; drain and pat dry.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Easy Red Beans And Rice(Makes 10 Servings. Prep Time: 15 Minutes.)
Ingredients:
3 c. water
1 1/2 c. long grain rice
2 Tbsp. butter
1 (16 oz.) pkg. smoked sausage, cut 1/4-inch thick
1 (14.5 oz.) can stewed tomatoes/onions and green peppers
2 (15 oz.) cans kidney beans
1/2 tsp. chopped garlic
1 tsp. lemon pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Bring water, rice and butter to hard boil.
Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Put a little oil in large frying pan and saute meat and onion.
Brown for five minutes and add tomatoes and beans with seasonings.
Heat to boiling, then reduce heat to simmer and cover for about 15 minutes.
Remove lid and let simmer about 15 more minutes.
Serve over rice.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice With Leftovers(Very Good!!!)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. long grain rice, washed in 3 changes of water and drained
3 Tbsp. oil
2 stalks celery, diced
1 medium onion, diced
1/4 green pepper, diced
2 cloves garlic, diced
1 to 2 c. or more of any leftover meat (ham, beef, pork, chicken or combination), diced
1/4 c. soy sauce (optional)
1 can water chestnuts, sliced
1 can pieces and stems mushrooms, drained (save juice)
2 1/2 c. water
4 Tbsp. chicken bouillon
Directions:
Fry rice in skillet over high heat, stirring all the time, until brown.
Scrape into 4-quart pan with lid.
Add all ingredients, bringing to a boil.
Boil for 1 minute. Turn to low heat and cover tightly.
Don't lift lid for 25 minutes.
Stir and serve.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 cup of rice
5 cups of red beans
4 cans of tomato sauce
1 cup of oil
Directions:
1.
Put a little bit of boiling whater in a pot.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Beans-N-Rice That Fill You Up
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped onion (set aside)
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
2 c. cooked brown rice
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/8 tsp. dried coriander
1/4 tsp. ground red pepper
1 (15 oz.) can black beans, rinsed and drained
chopped tomato (optional)
Directions:
In nonstick pan, heat oil; add 1 cup onion and 1/2 cup green pepper and cook until tender.
Add rice, cumin, red pepper and coriander.
Mix and heat 2 minutes.
Add beans; heat.
Add uncooked onion and tomato if desired.
Approximately 125 calories per 1/2 cup; less than 2 grams of fat.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
2 minced garlic cloves
1 Tbsp. canola oil
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 medium zucchini, chopped
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1 large can garbanzo beans or chickpeas, rinsed and drained
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
3 c. cooked rice
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1 can red kidney beans (optional)
1 can Mexicorn (optional)
Directions:
In a nonstick skillet, saute onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in the tomatoes, zucchini and oregano. Cover and cook for 5 to 6 minutes, until zucchini is tender, stirring occasionally. Add the beans, salt and pepper; cook and stir until heated through. Serve over cooked rice, sprinkle with shredded cheese.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Marvelous Marinade
Ingredients:
3 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
1/3 c. catsup
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. crushed basil
2 to 3 lb. meat or chicken, cut in 1/4-inch chunks or pieces
veggies
Directions:
In a small pan, cook garlic in oil.
Remove from heat.
Add the rest of the ingredients, except the meat and vegetables.
Pour sauce over meat/chicken in covered container.
Marinate meat/chicken 6 hours or overnight.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marinade
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. water
2 Tbsp. dried minced onion
2 Tbsp. sesame seeds
1 Tbsp. sugar
4 garlic cloves, minced
1 tsp. ginger
3/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together. Pour over chicken (approximately 4 to 6 pieces). Cover and refrigerate overnight or for 8 hours. Keep 1/2 cup of the sauce for marinating while cooking; toss the remaining sauce. Grill or bake until done.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Lemon Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts (boneless, skinless)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary, chopped or 1 tsp. dried rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. white wine or water
1 Tbsp. oil
2 tsp. honey
1 tsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 tsp. lemon peel
Directions:
In a shallow dish, combine all ingredients except chicken; mix well.
Add chicken; turn to coat.
Cover and marinate in refrigerator 20 to 30 minutes, the longer, the better.
Oil broiler pan and place chicken on prepared pan; broil 4 to 6 inches from broiler.
Cook 8 to 10 minutes on one side, basting with marinade.
Turn and continue cooking and basting 8 to 10 minutes longer or until chicken is fork-tender and juices run clear.
Can also be charcoal grilled.
Use same method as for broiling. Serves 4.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marinade
Ingredients:
1 c. soy sauce
1 1/4 c. cooking sherry
4 c. pineapple juice
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
3/4 ??? sugar
2 tsp. granulated garlic
Directions:
Place all wet ingredients into a plastic container.
Stir in all dry ingredients.
Soak chicken, skin side up, 12 to 24 hours. Char-broil.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Sesame-Lime Marinade
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. finely shredded lime peel
1/3 c. lime juice
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. sesame oil
1/4 tsp. salt
4 chicken breasts, washed and patted dry
2 Tbsp. honey
1 tsp. sesame seed
Directions:
In a large bowl or plastic bag combine lime peel, lime juice, vegetable oil, sesame oil and salt.
Add chicken to marinade. Cover and refrigerate 4 hours or longer if desired, turning occasionally.
Remove chicken from marinade.
Reserve 1/4 cup marinade.
In a small bowl, combine 1/4 cup marinade, honey and sesame seed.
Grill or broil chicken with marinade-honey mixture several times while cooking.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. carrots (about 8 medium), pared and cut into 1-inch pieces
2 c. stock or broth
2 Tbsp. light brown sugar
6 Tbsp. butter
pinch of freshly ground black pepper
freshly grated nutmeg to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine carrots, stock and brown sugar in a heavy saucepan with lid; bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and cover tightly.
Cook the carrots until they are about half done, 10 to 15 minutes; then remove the lid from the pot.
Return the heat to medium-low and reduce the cooking liquid to a thick syrup.
As the syrup thickens, shake the pan frequently to keep the carrots from sticking.
When the syrup is thick, add the butter, pepper, nutmeg and salt.
When the butter is melted, shake the pan again, rolling the carrots gently in the glaze so each piece is covered.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
16 medium carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 1/2 c. water
2 Tbsp. liquid Butter Buds
1 onion, diced
1 Tbsp. packed brown sugar
1 tsp. dry instant beef broth
1/2 tsp. lemon peel
1/2 tsp. Sweet 'N Low brown sugar substitute
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
In a large saucepan, combine all ingredients and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low.
Simmer, covered, 20 to 25 minutes. With slotted spoon, remove carrots to a bowl.
Increase heat and bring to a rapid boil.
Reduce to glaze consistency.
Add carrots and coat evenly with glaze.
One 1 cup serving contains 95 calories and 0 gm fat.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
1 lb. carrots, peeled and cut into matchstick pieces
1 tsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. golden raisins
1/3 c. chicken broth
2 tsp. brown sugar
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In a large, heavy frypan, melt butter over medium heat.
Add carrots, raisins, broth and sugar.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat. Cover and simmer until carrots are crisp-tender, about 10 minutes. Uncover and boil over high heat until liquid has evaporated, shaking pan often and gently lifting and turning carrots.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
water
1 lb. carrots, cut in large chunks
salt
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
In 2-quart saucepan over medium heat, in 1-inch boiling water, heat carrots and 1/4 teaspoon salt to boiling.
Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer 15 minutes or until tender-crisp.
Drain. Add butter, sugar, nutmeg and 3/4 teaspoon salt.
Return mixture to heat and cook, stirring constantly until carrots are glazed.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
1/3 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. water
4 tsp. sugar
2 to 3 lb. mini carrots (3 to 4-inches long or cut into julienne strips)
1 tsp. Accent
1/2 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
Directions:
In medium skillet, melt butter; add water and sugar.
Add carrots, then cover and simmer until carrots are tender, adding water as necessary to prevent sticking.
Remove cover and bring to a boil.
Cook and stir until all liquid has evaporated and carrots are glazed, stirring gently.
Sprinkle with Accent, salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Lemon Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/4 c. fresh lemon juice
2 large cloves garlic, coarsely chopped
1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 c. fresh grated Parmesan
Directions:
Puree lemon juice and garlic in food processor.
