With machine running, gradually add olive oil and blend until smooth.
Add Parmesan cheese, blend until thickened.
Season with salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette (Basic)
Ingredients:
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
scant 1/2 tsp. salt
5 twists of peppermill
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
scant tsp. fresh lemon juice
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Put mustard in the bottom of a salad bowl.
Stir the first 5 ingredients, whisking constantly.
Add vegetable oil and olive oil in a very thin stream.
Makes 6 tablespoons of vinaigrette, enough for 10 to 12 cups of salad greens.
Use shortly after it is made. Add whatever you like, garlic, anchovies, shallots, sliced mushrooms, chopped capers, etc.
May be used on grilled fish or cold roast beef (add horseradish) or chicken.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Lemon Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/3 c. ReaLemon lemon juice from concentrate
1/4 c. sliced green onions
1 Tbsp. Dijon style mustard
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
In 1-pint jar with tight fitting lid or cruet, combine all ingredients; shake well.
Chill to blend flavors.
Use as a salad dressing or as a marinade for asparagus, broccoli, poultry or fish.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Our Favorite Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. prepared Dijon style mustard
4 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. granulated sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
minced parsley and/or snipped fresh chives to taste
1/2 c. olive oil
Directions:
Measure mustard into a bowl.
Whisk in vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper and herbs to taste.
Continue to whisk mixture while slowly dribbling in olive oil until mixture thickens.
Adjust seasoning to taste.
Cover until ready to use.
(Vinaigrette is best if made just before it is to be used.)
If necessary, whisk again before serving.
Makes 1 cup.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Delicious Vinaigrette For Green Salads
Ingredients:
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. mustard
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1 to 2 cloves garlic, crushed
1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
3 Tbsp. olive oil
Directions:
Place the first four ingredients in a jar.
Add the vinegar and shake well.
Add the oil and shake well again.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Oven Crisped Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. Russet potatoes
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 Tbsp. shallots, minced
1 Tbsp. diet soft margarine or Pam
1/4 c. chopped fresh basil (1/8 c. dried)
Directions:
Cut potatoes into eighths or sixteenths.
Brush margarine or spray with Pam evenly on potatoes to coat.
Sprinkle with garlic salt.
Roast potatoes in 450° oven until brown and crispy, approximately 20 to 30 minutes, turning once or twice.
Stir in basil and shallots.
Transfer to serving dish.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Crisp Oven-Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 envelope onion soup mix
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. margarine, melted
1 tsp. thyme (optional)
1 tsp. marjoram (optional)
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 lb. potatoes, cut into quarters
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
In shallow baking pan, thoroughly blend all ingredients, except potatoes.
Add potatoes to coat thoroughly. Bake, stirring potatoes occasionally, 60 minutes or until potatoes are tender and golden brown.
Garnish with chopped parsley, if desired.
Makes about 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Crispy Oven Potatoes
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter, melted
1 Tbsp. scallions, chopped
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
4 large unpeeled potatoes, thinly sliced
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese (optional)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Lightly grease a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish.
Combine melted butter with the next 5 ingredients.
Layer potatoes in baking dish, brushing each layer with butter mixture. Bake for 40 minutes or until tender.
Sprinkle with cheese and bake for 5 minutes.
(Bake at 350° for 1 1/2 hours, if desired.) Serve with pork or sausage.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Crisp Onion Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 envelop Lipton mushroom soup
1/2 c. olive or vegetable oil
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
1 tsp. thyme leaves (optional)
1 tsp. marjoram leaves (optional)
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 lb. all-purpose potatoes, cut into quarters
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Place in roasting pan.
Pour ingredients over potatoes.
Bake 60 minutes.
Garnish with parsley, if desired. Makes 8 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Oven Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 lb. small unpeeled red potatoes, cut into wedges
2 to 3 Tbsp. vegetable or olive oil
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh rosemary or 1 tsp. dried rosemary
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place potatoes in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.
Drizzle oil over.
Sprinkle with garlic, rosemary, salt and pepper; toss gently to coat.
Bake at 450° for 20 to 30 minutes or until potatoes are golden brown and tender when pierced with a fork. Yields 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice
Ingredients:
4 to 5 c. rice
4 eggs
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. scallions, chopped
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
dash of pepper
1/4 c. chicken broth or stock
Directions:
Cook rice.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in frying pan or wok on high heat.
Scramble eggs quickly and remove.
Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in same pan.
Add cooked eggs, salt, sugar, soy sauce, chopped scallions and broth.
Stir-fry over medium to high heat for 3 to 4 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice With Chicken
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. white rice
1 1/4 lb. boneless chicken, cut into 1/2-inch chunks
1/4 c. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 eggs, beaten
2 c. chopped white or yellow onions, cubed
2 c. chopped carrots (cubed)
2 c. frozen green peas, thawed
2 green onions, thinly sliced
Directions:
Cook rice according to directions on package.
Mix the soy sauce and pepper in a small bowl; set aside.
Place chicken in a medium bowl and add 1 tablespoon to chicken.
Mix well to marinate.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add eggs; stir to cook until done.
Make sure eggs are separated.
Remove and put on a plate.
Set aside.
Add remaining oil to wok or skillet.
Add chicken; stir-fry until fully cooked. Remove; put on plate and set aside.
Cook onions, carrots and peas in wok or skillet; stir-fry for 1 minute.
Leave in wok or skillet.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Homemade Fried Rice
Ingredients:
2 c. rice
1 c. meat (pork, ham, beef or shrimp)
1/2 c. green peppers
1/2 c. onions
1/2 c. celery
1/2 to 1 c. bean sprouts
2 or 3 eggs
salt
pepper
butter or oil
soy sauce
Directions:
Boil rice according to instructions on box.
Use less water for flaky rice.
Boil or cook meat or shrimp until done.
Add a little salt and pepper.
When meat is done, dice into small pieces.
Scramble eggs; add green peppers, onions, celery and bean sprouts.
Cook together until vegetables are soft.
Cook in butter or oil.
Add rice.
Stir for about 10 minutes.
Add soy sauce, salt and pepper.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1 c. cooked rice, cooked per pkg. instructions
2 c. chicken broth or water
1 small carrot, diced
1/2 small onion, diced
1 Tbsp. butter or peanut oil
1 Tbsp. soy sauce (optional)
1 egg
Directions:
Heat broth to boiling.
Add rice and turn down heat; cover for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
In a small, nonstick pan or wok on medium heat, put butter or oil, carrots and onion and cook until onion is translucent.
Take out onion and carrot.
Scramble 1 egg; add onion and carrot back to egg and add cooked rice.
Cook over medium heat about 3 to 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce, if desired. Serve hot.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. cubed chicken
1/4 c. onions, chopped
2 c. cold cooked rice
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/3 c. frozen peas and carrots
1 egg, slightly beaten
dash of garlic salt
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Heat oil on medium until hot.
Add chicken and onion, stirring continuously until chicken is cooked (about 2 minutes).
Add peas and carrots, rice and pepper.
Stir until heated.
Add garlic salt, soy sauce and egg, stirring quickly until egg is cooked.

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Special Apple Pie(Makes One 10-Inch Pie)
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. (1 1/4 sticks) butter
1/4 c. water or apple cider
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, cinnamon and salt in medium bowl.
Cut in butter using pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles coarse meal.
Add water and toss mixture gently with fork until evenly moistened.
Gather gently into ball.
Transfer to lightly floured board and roll into circle slightly larger than a deep 10-inch pie plate.
Ease pastry into pan and flute high edge.
Set aside.

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Apple Pie
Ingredients:
3/4 to 1 cup sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 to 1 tsp. cinnamon
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
6 to 7 cups sliced peeled apples (2 to 2 1/2 lbs.)
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
Combine sugar, flour cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
Mix lightly through apples (sliced 1/4 inch thick).
Heap in pastry-lined 9-inch pie pan.
Dot with butter.
Adjust top crust and flute edges; cut vents. bake in hot oven (425 degrees) 50 to 60 minutes, or until crust is browned and apples are tender.

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Apple Pie
Ingredients:
4 c. apples, peeled and sliced
1 c. white sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
3 Tbsp. tapioca
1/2 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. butter
1 tsp. sugar
2 (9-inch) pie crusts
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Combine together the first 7 ingredients.
Fill a 9-inch pie crust with the mixture.
Cut the butter into pieces and place on top of apple mixture.
Put 2nd pie crust on top.
Rub top crust with a little milk (this will make it crusty and brown).
Sprinkle a teaspoon of sugar on top crust. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes.

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
6 medium, tart and firm apples
1 1/2 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
2 Tbsp. butter
pinch of salt
Directions:
Dice apples and mix with sugar. Add cinnamon, flour, salt and vanilla. Pour this mixture into unbaked pie shell and dot top of fruit with 2 teaspoons butter, cut into small bits. Place crust over pie and seal firmly to edge of lower crust, turning edge up slightly to form a ridge. Prepare top crust by cutting air vents to allow steam to escape. Brush top crust with milk or cream and sprinkle 1/4 cup of sugar. Bake at 450° for 10 minutes, then reduce to 350° for 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Old World Apple Pie
Ingredients:
2 c. tart apples, finely chopped
3/4 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour (plain)
1/3 tsp. salt
1 egg, beaten
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
Set aside apples.
Combine other 6 ingredients and mix well. Add apples.
Pour into 9-inch unbaked deep dish pie shell.
Bake at 300° for 20 to 25 minutes.
Sprinkle topping over pie and bake 20 more minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. yellow onions
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
1/4 tsp. black pepper (coarse)
1 Tbsp. flour (regular)
3 cans beef broth
3 c. water
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper
French bread (8 slices)
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 c. Swiss cheese, grated
Directions:
Peel onions, slice thinly (about 5 cups).
Put butter in a 4-quart saucepan; heat over moderately high heat until butter melts.
Add onions and pepper to butter.
Saute onion mixture, stirring often
until onions are a light golden brown.
Sprinkle onions with flour; stir until all traces of flour disappear.
Cook 1 minute longer, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat. Gradually add beef broth, stirring onion mixture all the time; stir in water and bay leaf.
Return to moderately high heat. Bring mixture to a boil, stirring constantly.
Reduce heat to low. Cook onion soup, uncovered, for 30 to 40 minutes.
Discard bay leaf; add salt and pepper to taste.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
5 c. thinly sliced onions (1 1/2 lb.)
3 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. flour
3 (10 3/4 oz.) cans beef bouillon
3 c. boiling water
1/2 c. dry white wine
salt and pepper to taste
2 oz. Swiss cheese, slivered
16 (1/2 to 1-inch) French bread slices
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Cook onions slowly with butter and oil in heavy covered 4-quart saucepan for 15 minutes.
Stir in salt and sugar.
Cook, uncovered, over moderate heat, 35 to 40 minutes, stirring often until onions are a deep golden brown.
Sprinkle with flour; stir 3 minutes.
Remove from heat; add boiling bouillon and water to onion mixture.
Blend well.
Add wine and seasonings.
Simmer partially covered, 35 minutes.
While soup is simmering, place 1 layer of French bread slices on cookie sheet and bake at 325° for 30 minutes or until they are dried and golden brown.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: The World'S Best French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 lb. onions, thinly sliced
4 (14 1/2 oz.) cans beef broth, divided
1 bay leaf
1 sprig fresh parsley
1 large sprig fresh thyme
2 Tbsp. Madeira or sherry
salt and freshly ground pepper
8 (3/4-inch thick) slices French bread
2 c. grated Gruyere cheese
Directions:
Heat oven to 400°. On stove top, heat butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onions and stir often until softened and golden brown, about 35 minutes. Increase heat to high and pour in 1/2 broth, stirring until most of the broth has evaporated and onions are browning again. Continue until you have used up 2 cups of the broth. Wrap bay leaf, parsley and thyme in cheesecloth. Add to soup; reduce heat to low and simmer, covered, 15 minutes. Season with Madeira and salt and pepper to taste. Toast bread in oven on a cookie sheet 5 minutes. Divide the soup among 8 ovenproof bowls. Sprinkle 2 tablespoons of cheese over each, then top with bread and 2 tablespoons more cheese. Place bowls on cookie sheet and bake until the cheese bubbles, 10 minutes. Makes 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
3 medium onions, thinly sliced
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. flour
2 c. consomme
4 c. water
1/2 c. boiled milk
1/4 lb. grated Swiss cheese
6 dried slices French bread
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
In heavy skillet, cook onions in heated butter until slightly browned.
Sprinkle with flour and cook over low flame until golden, never allowing them to become dark brown.
Add consomme and water. Bring to boil, stirring constantly with a wooden spoon, then simmer gently for 20 minutes.
Spoon into casserole or individual bowls. Place slices of bread on top.
Sprinkle generously with cheese. Add pepper.
Sprinkle with melted butter.
Brown quickly under broiler flame.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
2 lb. thinly sliced onions (the more onions, the better)
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. flour
1 bay leaf
1/2 tsp. sage
1/2 c. red wine
salt and pepper to taste
3 cans beef broth
3 Tbsp. cognac (optional)
1 to 2 c. grated Swiss or Parmesan cheese
toasted sliced French bread
Directions:
In heavy bottomed, 4-quart covered pot, melt butter and oil. Add onions.
Cover and cook over low heat for 15 minutes.
Stir in salt and sugar.
Cook over moderate heat for 30 to 40 minutes, stirring frequently, until onions are deep golden brown.
Sprinkle in flour and stir over low heat for several minutes to cook flour. In a separate pot, bring broth to a boil.
Remove soup pot from heat and add boiling liquid, wine and seasonings.
Simmer, partially covered, for 30 to 40 minutes.
Just before serving, stir in cognac.
Pour in soup tureen or individual ovenproof bowls. Stir in some cheese and top with toasted French bread.
Sprinkle lightly with paprika.
Place bowls on cookie sheet and cover with the rest of the cheese.
Bake 15 minutes in a 325° oven and serve immediately.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: Garden Fresh Turkey Burgers
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
1 c. uncooked oatmeal
3/4 c. finely chopped onion
3/4 c. finely chopped green or red bell pepper
1/2 c. shredded zucchini
1/4 c. catsup
2 cloves crushed garlic
6 whole grain rolls, split and toasted
1/2 c. sour half and half
Directions:
Lightly grease rack of broiler pan.
Combine first 7 ingredients; mix well.
Shape into 6 burgers.
Place on rack of prepared pan or over medium hot coals on an outdoor grill 6 inches from heat.
Broil 7 to 9 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
Serve on rolls with rounded tablespoonful of sour half and half per serving.
Garnish with lettuce and sliced tomato, if desired.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: Turkey Burgers
Ingredients:
8 oz. ground turkey
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. margarine, softened
1 1/2 tsp. water
1 1/2 c. thinly sliced onions
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. ketchup
2 hamburger rolls, toasted
1 packet instant chicken broth and seasoning mix
Directions:
In bowl, combine turkey, margarine, water and broth mix.
Form into 2 patties.
Spray skillet with Pam and heat over medium-high heat.
Add patties and brown on both sides.
Reduce heat to low and add onions.
Cover pan and cook until patties are no longer pink inside, 5 to 8 minutes.
Serve each burger topped with 2 teaspoons ketchup and half the cooked onion slices on toasted rolls.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: Savory Turkey Burgers
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground raw turkey
2/3 c. rolled oats
1/2 c. tomato juice
1 large egg or 1/4 c. Egg Beaters
1 Tbsp. onion flakes
1 Tbsp. poultry seasoning
2 tsp. chicken bouillon
1/4 tsp. garlic flakes
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Mix well and shape into 6 patties. Broil or barbecue 3-inches from heat source, 4 minutes on each side.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: The All-American (Turkey) Burger
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey breast
1/4 c. oat bran cereal
1 large minced garlic clove
1/4 c. finely chopped onion
1/8 c. finely chopped green pepper
1 tsp. salt or sodium alternative seasoning
Directions:
Mix all the ingredients and form into 4 patties; grill indoors or out on the barbecue.
Serve on the proverbial toasted bun or choose sourdough bread for less fat and cholesterol.
Pile high with lettuce, tomato slices and onion rings grilled on a no stick pan sprayed with Pam.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: Turkey Burgers(Low Calorie)
Ingredients:
1lb. Ground Skinless Turkey
1 Medium Onion Chopped
1 Large Egg Beaten
2 Tbsp. Chopped Parsley
1 Clove Garlic Minced
1/2 tsp. Tarragon
1/2 tsp. Salt
1/4 tsp. Pepper
Directions:
Preheat broiler.
Spray the broiler with non-stick spray. Lightly combine turkey, onion, egg and parsley and garlic tarragon plus salt and pepper in a bowl.
Form into 4 burgers.
Broil 4-inch from heat until brown, about 5 minutes on each side. 1 Burger = 4 Points.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
4 avocados, peeled and chopped
2 green onions, chopped
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. dried cilantro or 1 fresh sprig
1 medium tomato, chopped
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, combine avocados, onions, lemon juice, salt, red pepper flakes, garlic powder and cilantro.
Using a fork or potato masher, mix and mash coarsely.
Add most of the tomatoes; stir well. Pour into serving bowl; garnish with remaining tomatoes and sprigs of cilantro.
Serve with tortilla chips.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 medium avocado, peeled
1 small tomato, quartered
2 Tbsp. lime or lemon juice
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. red pepper
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/3 c. chopped onion
Directions:
Position knife blade in food processor bowl.
Add all ingredients except onion.
Process 1 minute or until lumpy.
Stir in onions.
Yields 2 cups.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Make Ahead Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 envelope gelatin
1/4 c. cold water
1/2 c. boiling water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 c. mashed ripe avocado
1/3 c. mayonnaise
3/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. finely minced onion
1 small ripe tomato, seeded and diced (1/3 c.)
Directions:
Sprinkle gelatin over cold water and let stand 5 minutes.
Add 1/2 cup boiling water and stir until dissolved.
Whisk in lemon juice, mashed avocado, mayonnaise and salt.
Stir in minced onion and tomato.
Turn into 3 cup mold or bowl.	Make in a.m. and serve in p.m. and it will not darken.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
2 medium tomatoes
1 ripe medium avocado
1 c. low-fat cottage cheese
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. bottled minced garlic or dash of garlic powder
1/8 tsp. salt
few dashes of hot pepper sauce
Directions:
Cut stem ends off tomatoes and hollow out, leaving 1/4 to 1/2-inch thick shells.
Discard seeds.
Chop tomato pulp and tops. Set aside.
Halve, seed, peel and cut the avocado into chunks. Combine the chunks, cottage cheese, lemon juice, garlic, salt and pepper sauce in blender or food processor until mixture is smooth. Stir in chopped tomato.
Makes 16 (2 tablespoon) servings of dip.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
2 large avocados, seeded, peeled and cut up
1 small tomato, peeled and cut up
1/2 small onion, cut up
2 to 3 canned green chili peppers, rinsed and seeded*
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Place all ingredients in blender.
Blend until well combined. Makes about 2 cups.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Marinated Asparagus
Ingredients:
1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
2 Tbsp. chopped dill
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. white pepper
12 medium mushrooms, sliced
2 cucumbers
3 tomatoes
1 lb. asparagus
Directions:
Briefly steam and cool the asparagus.
Mix together olive oil, garlic, dill, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Cut stems from the mushrooms and slice.
Peel, seed and slice the cucumbers.
Peel and quarter the tomatoes.
Place all the vegetables in the bowl. Cover and refrigerate for 24 hours.
Drain the oil and arrange on chilled platter.
Serves 6.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Asparagus Spears With Garlic Mustard
Ingredients:
1 lb. (24) asparagus spears, trimmed
2 Tbsp. butter
2 c. (1/2 lb.) sliced 1/4-inch fresh mushrooms
2 Tbsp. country-style Dijon mustard
1/4 tsp. pepper
pinch of salt
1/2 tsp. minced fresh garlic
Directions:
In 10-inch skillet, place asparagus spears; add enough water to cover.
Bring to a full boil.
Cook over medium heat until asparagus is crisply tender (5 to 7 minutes).
Drain; return to skillet.
Add remaining ingredients, pushing asparagus to side just until butter is melted.
Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until heated through (5 to 7 minutes).
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Fresh Asparagus Pasta
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
3/4 lb. fresh asparagus
4 large green onions, chopped using white part only
4 cloves garlic, chopped
1/4 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
2 medium pear tomatoes
1 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 c. dry white wine
3/4 c. chicken broth
1/2 c. pitted black olives, cut in wedges
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 lb. pasta, cooked
Parmesan cheese (optional)
Directions:
Cut asparagus and onions into 1-inch diagonal pieces.
Cut tomatoes lengthwise in eighths.
Mix 1/2 cup of the chicken broth and the wine together; set aside.
Mix cornstarch and 1/4 cup chicken broth together; set aside.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Herbed Asparagus
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh asparagus, tough ends removed
4 Tbsp. unsalted butter, room temperature
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. chopped chives
1 Tbsp. chopped dill
1 Tbsp. chopped rosemary
1 tsp. ground black pepper
1/4 lb. wedge Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Blanch asparagus in boiling water for 1 1/2 to 2 minutes. Remove to paper towels.
Pat dry.
In small bowl combine butter with herbs and spices.
Melt herb-butter over medium heat in large skillet.
Add asparagus.
Toss gently.
Place on serving platter. Top with shaved Parmesan cheese.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Asparagus Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. asparagus
1 to 3 cloves garlic, minced
2 to 4 Tbsp. olive oil
1 to 2 tsp. vinegar
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Break and discard bottom 1/8 of each stalk.
Break remaining part into halves. Wash by soaking and rinsing.
Boil or steam until tender.
Do not overcook.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 graham cracker crust (recipe included)
3 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 c. sugar
3 eggs
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 (16 oz.) sour cream
3 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Press graham cracker crust mixture into a 10-inch spring-form pan; set aside.
Beat cream cheese at high speed of electric mixer until light and fluffy.
Gradually add 1 cup sugar, beating well. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Stir in 1/2 teaspoon vanilla.
Pour into prepared pan.
Bake at 375° for 35 minutes or until set.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 graham cracker crust mix
2 8 oz. cream cheese
2 cups powdered sugar
2 8 oz. cool whip
1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
1 can blueberry or strawberry pie filling
Directions:
Make graham cracker crust according to directions (double the recipe) and put crust on bottom of 9x13 cake pan. Mix cream cheese and powdered sugar together. Then mix in cool whip. Add crushed pineapple. pour this mixture over crust. Cool in refrigerator a few hours or overnight. Put pie filling on top before serving.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Classic Cheesecake
Ingredients:
2 c. graham cracker crumbs
1/4 c. confectioners sugar
6 to 8 Tbsp. melted butter
1 lb. cottage cheese
1 pt. sour cream
8 oz. pkg. softened cream cheese
3 large eggs, lightly beaten
1 c. sugar
1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. vanilla
1 can cherry pie filling (optional) or fresh sliced strawberries or blueberries to serve with cake
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 300°.
Butter a 12-inch spring-form pan. Mix the pulverized graham crackers, sugar and melted butter and pat this dough into the bottom of the spring-form pan. Bake for 15 minutes or until set; remove and cool before filling. Raise the temperature to 350°.
With an electric mixer, beat the cottage cheese, sour cream, cream cheese, eggs, sugar, flour and vanilla. Beat for 10 minutes; batter will be very thin.
Pour over crust and bake for 40 minutes. Turn off oven but leave cake in for an additional 30 minutes.
Do not open oven door. Remove cake from oven, then cool cake for 2 hours.
When cool, run a thin metal spatula around the edge of cake. Loosen and remove sides of spring-form pan.
Note that when cooling, cheesecake will develop a large crack across the top. Slide cake onto plate. If you wish, top with pie filling or serve a wedge of cake with fresh berries. Yield: 12 to 16 servings.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Cheesecake
Ingredients:
8 oz. cream cheese (room temperature)
2 eggs
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 pt. (16 oz.) sour cream
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
5 Tbsp. sugar
graham cracker crust
Directions:
Mix the cream cheese, eggs, sugar and vanilla until smooth. Pour into a 9-inch graham cracker crust and bake at 350° for 20 minutes (until firm).
Mix sour cream, vanilla, cinnamon and sugar.
Pour over baked mixture and bake for 5 minutes.
If you want to top the cheesecake with fruit, omit the cinnamon.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Large Cheesecake
Ingredients:
18 graham crackers
1/4 c. butter, melted
4 eggs
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
3 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
Directions:
Crush graham crackers and mix well with melted butter.
Mix eggs, sugar, vanilla and cream cheese. Beat well.
Put crackers in spring-form pan and pour in cheese mixture.
Bake at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes. Remove from oven and cool 10 minutes.
Increase oven to 475°.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients:
5 1/2 c. chicken stock or canned low-sodium broth
6 Tbsp. unsalted butter
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small onion, minced
1 1/2 c. Uncle Ben's rice (not Minute rice)
1/2 c. minced Italian parsley
2 oz. Asiago or Parmesan cheese, finely grated
salt and freshly ground pepper
Directions:
In a medium saucepan, bring the stock to a simmer over moderate heat.
Reduce the heat to very low and cover until ready to use.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 diced onion
1 1/4 c. Arborio rice
1/3 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
5 c. chicken broth (keep hot over low heat)
1/3 oz. diced mushrooms, soaked in 1/2 c. water for 15 minutes, then chopped
Directions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat.
Add onion and cook until tender.
Stir in rice and cook with oil.
Add wine and stir until evaporated.
Add dried mushrooms, the water they were soaked in and the tomato paste, mixed in 1/2 cup of chicken broth. Stir until liquid is absorbed.
Continue adding broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly.
Each addition should be absorbed before adding the next.
Cook, uncovered, until broth is all absorbed and rice is tender to the bite.
Do not overcook.
Remove from stove.
Add Parmesan cheese; stir and serve.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Savory Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
40 mushrooms (medium size), washed, caps whole, stems removed
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. rosemary
freshly ground pepper
2 c. chicken bouillon
1/2 c. wild rice
1 shallot
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. chopped almonds
fresh lemon
Directions:
Bring bouillon to a boil.
Add washed wild rice; cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove from heat.
Saute mushroom caps in butter.
Mix rice, almonds, herbs and spices and fill mushroom caps.
Drizzle with fresh lemon juice.
Bake on cookie sheet at 300° for 15 minutes.
May easily be prepared a day prior to re-heating.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Fresh Vegetable Risotto
Ingredients:
2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 medium onion, chopped (1/2 c.)
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. long grain rice
3 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. bite-size asparagus or broccoli pieces
1 medium tomato, seeded and diced
1/4 c. shredded carrots
1 c. shredded Muenster cheese
1/4 c. grated Parmesan
3 Tbsp. fresh basil
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook mushrooms, onion and garlic in hot oil until onion is tender, but not brown.
Stir in rice.
Cook and stir for 5 minutes.
In another saucepan, bring broth to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer.
Slowly add 1 cup of broth to rice mixture, stirring constantly.
Continue to cook and stir until liquid is absorbed.
Add 1 cup more broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly until broth is absorbed.
It should take 15 minutes.
Stir in tomato, carrot and remaining half cup broth. Cook until rice is slightly creamy and just tender, stirring constantly.
Stir in cheeses and basil.
If desired, garnish with tomato slices.
Serve immediately.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Rissotto With Porcini Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. Arborio rice
5 oz. butter
ground pepper and salt
4 oz. white wine
1 qt. chicken broth
6 oz. olive oil
6 cloves garlic
1 lb. porcini mushrooms
chopped parsley
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Melt butter in a deep skillet.
Grind in pepper to taste.
Add the rice.
Stir thoroughly.
Add wine.
Let some evaporate; add the broth.
Cook over low heat for 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. olive oil
thyme to taste (optional)
rosemary to taste (optional)
soy sauce or Tabasco to taste
onions
potatoes
use your favorite veggies: turnips, broccoli, cauliflower, garlic, peppers, zucchini, summer squash, mushrooms)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 475°.
Melt oil and butter in roasting pan large enough so that vegetables rest on bottom of pan.
Adjust oil and butter to amount of vegetables.
Using tongs, turn cut sides of longest cooking vegetables down to seal in juices (potatoes, onions, turnips).
Roast 15 minutes.
Toss once or twice.
Add medium cooking vegetables (broccoli, summer squash) and pour soy sauce (or other favorite sauce) to coat.
Roast 15 minutes.
Add mushrooms and any seasonings.
Toss lightly.
Roast 5 to 10 minutes.
Serve with cornbread.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Roasted Mixed Vegetables
Ingredients:
4 large red skin potatoes, wedged (about 2 lb.)
3 large carrots, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 c.)
3 large parsnips, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 c.)
2 lb. onions, cut into wedges (large)
1 Tbsp. dried rosemary leaves
2 tsp. garlic powder
3 Tbsp. Fleischmann's margarine, melted
Directions:
In a large bowl, toss potatoes, carrots, parsnips and onions with rosemary and garlic.
Drizzle with margarine.
Arrange in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Bake at 450° for 40 to 45 minutes or until fork-tender, stirring constantly.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Roasted Winter Vegetables(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 tsp. tarragon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 stalk broccoli (about 3/4 lb.)
1/2 head cauliflower (about 3/4 lb.)
2 small red onions
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°.
Put butter, tarragon, salt and pepper in a shallow roasting pan.
Put pan in oven just long enough to melt butter.
Cut broccoli and cauliflower into florets.
Cut onions into wedges.
Toss onions in butter mixture and roast uncovered, 5 minutes.
Stir in broccoli and cauliflower.
Continue roasting until vegetables are tender, about 25 minutes.
Yields 6 servings.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Roasted Winter Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 tsp. tarragon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 head broccoli (about 3/4 lb.)
1/2 head cauliflower
2 small red onions
Directions:
Place butter and spices into shallow roasting pan in oven just to melt butter. Cut broccoli and cauliflower into florets.
Cut onions into wedges. Toss onions in butter, mix and roast, uncovered, 5 minutes. Stir in remaining veggies. Continue roasting until tender.
Bake at 425° for about 25 minutes.
Other combinations of vegetables are quite yummy.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Oven-Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
10 c. mixed vegetables, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces (try onions, carrots, potatoes, eggplant, mushrooms and zucchini)
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. melted butter
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried or fresh rosemary
1 1/2 tsp. dried or 1 Tbsp. fresh marjoram
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 375°.
Arrange the vegetables in a large oiled baking dish and toss in the oil, butter, garlic and herbs. Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake for 35 minutes.
Uncover and turn the vegetables with a large spoon.
Add salt and pepper and roast at 425° for approximately 30 minutes or until the carrots and potatoes are thoroughly cooked and the edges of the vegetables have browned.
Serves 5.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
1/3 c. non-fat plain yogurt or reduced-fat sour cream
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh or 2 tsp. dried dill
1 clove garlic, crushed
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
2 small cucumbers, sliced 1/4-inch thick
dill sprig for garnish
Directions:
In large bowl, whisk together yogurt, dill, garlic, lemon juice and salt.
Add sliced cucumbers.
Toss gently to coat well. Cover and chill at least 30 minutes until ready to serve.
Toss gently just before serving.
Garnish with dill sprig.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad 1
Ingredients:
2 c. cucumbers, sliced very thin
1/2 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. sour cream
2 tsp. cider vinegar
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. onion, finely chopped
lemon pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle cucumbers with 1/2 teaspoon salt.
Let stand for 10 minutes; drain.
Add remaining ingredients in order given. Sprinkle with chopped parsley.
Serve very cold.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
2 medium cucumbers, quartered and sliced
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 c. chopped green peppers
1/2 c. chopped sweet onions
4 Tbsp. lime juice
4 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 tsp. dill weed
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, green peppers and onions. In a small bowl, mix together the lime juice, vinegar, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over cucumbers; toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for awhile before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
1 medium cucumber
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. yogurt or sour cream
4 tsp. white vinegar
2 tsp. fresh mint or 1 tsp. dried
1/2 tsp. fresh dill or 1/4 tsp. dried
dash of pepper
Directions:
Thinly slice cucumber; sprinkle with salt and let stand while preparing the dressing.
Combine yogurt or sour cream, vinegar, mint, dill and pepper.
Drain cucumber and pour dressing over. Mix well.
Chill 1/2 hour.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
6 to 8 cucumbers, sliced thinly (peel and leave little strips of green on for color)
2 tsp. salt
1 c. sugar
1 c. vinegar
1/3 c. oil
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 small jar pimentos
1 tsp. dried dill weed
Directions:
Mix salt into cucumbers.
Let stand in fridge for 2 hours. Meanwhile, mix together in saucepan sugar, 1/4 teaspoon salt, vinegar, oil and garlic powder.
Bring to boil.
Cook 1 minute. Let cool.
Drain cucumbers thoroughly.
Mix pimentos and dill weed into cucumbers.
Pour liquid over cucumbers and mix well.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Spicy Pumpkin Squares
Ingredients:
1 (18 1/4 oz.) pkg. spice cake mix
1 1/4 c. quick-cooking oats
1/2 c. margarine (soft)
1/4 c. firmly packed brown sugar
3 eggs, divided
1/4 c. chopped nuts
1 (16 oz.) can pumpkin
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. salt
whipped cream or ice cream (for topping)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In large bowl, beat cake mix, oats, margarine, sugar and 1 egg until crumbly.
Reserving 2 cups crumb mixture, press remainder firmly on bottom of 13 x 9-inch baking dish; bake 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Elegant Pumpkin Dessert
Ingredients:
1 (1 lb. 13 oz.) can pumpkin
1 (13 oz.) can evaporated milk
4 eggs, slightly beaten
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. ginger
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. cloves
1 c. chopped walnuts
1 (18.5 oz.) pkg. yellow cake mix
1 c. melted butter
Cool Whip or sweetened whipped cream
Directions:
Mix together pumpkin, milk, eggs, sugar, salt and spices and place in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Sprinkle cake mix over all.
Sprinkle with nuts.
Pour melted butter evenly over the whole thing and bake for 1 1/2 hours in 325° oven.
Knife should come out clean when testing for doneness.
Cool and cut in serving pieces (12). Top with the whipped cream or Cool Whip.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Spicy Pumpkin Cake
Ingredients:
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 eggs
3/4 c. buttermilk
1/2 c. canned pumpkin
1/2 c. light molasses
2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. finely shredded orange peel
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
sifted powdered sugar
Directions:
Grease and lightly flour a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.
In mixer bowl cream together brown sugar and butter or margarine until light.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each.
Combine buttermilk, pumpkin and molasses.
Thoroughly stir together flour, orange peel, soda, salt and spices.
Add dry ingredients to creamed mixture alternating with buttermilk mixture, beating after each addition.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Delicious Holiday Dessert
Ingredients:
1 (30 oz.) can pumpkin
1 (12 oz.) can evaporated milk
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
3 eggs
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. cloves
1 box spice cake mix
1/2 stick margarine, melted
1 c. nuts, chopped
whipped topping (if desired)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Beat pumpkin, milk, sugars, eggs and spices together.
Pour into an ungreased 9 x 13-inch baking pan. Sprinkle with cake mix.
Pour melted margarine on top; sprinkle with nuts.
Bake at 350° for 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center of dessert comes out clean.
Top with whipped topping.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Surprise
Ingredients:
1 small can pumpkin
3 eggs
1 (12 to 13 oz.) can evaporated milk
1 box spice cake mix
1 1/2 sticks melted oleo
1/2 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Mix pumpkin, eggs and milk together.
Pour into a 9 x 13-inch greased pan.
Sprinkle cake mix on top.
Pour melted butter over cake mix.
Top with sprinkled nuts.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Beef Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 garlic cloves, minced
1/4 tsp. salt
1 lb. lean ground beef
1 sweet red pepper, chopped
4 (10-inch) flour tortillas
2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1 onion, cut in strips
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. salsa
1 small zucchini, thinly sliced
2/3 c. low-fat sour cream
Directions:
In nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat; cook onion, garlic, chili powder, salt and pepper, stirring often, for 5 minutes or until onion is softened.
Add beef and salsa; cook, breaking up beef with back of spoon, for about 3 minutes or until beef is no longer pink.
Add peppers and zucchini; cook, stirring for 3 minutes or until tender-crisp and liquid has evaporated.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Beef Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 clove garlic, minced
1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1 1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 lb. beef, sliced in strips
1 red pepper
1 green pepper
1 large onion
8 flour tortillas
Directions:
Combine garlic, seasoned salt, cumin, chili powder, crushed red pepper, vegetable oil, lemon juice and cornstarch.
Add beef and marinate for 2 hours.
Chop onion and peppers.
Stir-fry beef until thoroughly cooked; remove from pan.
Stir-fry peppers and onions.
Re-add beef to heat up.
Place tortilla on plate; cover with damp paper towel.
Microwave for 30 to 45 seconds.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Beef Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean top round steak
1 Tbsp. salad oil
2 cloves garlic, minced or pressed
1 large onion
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
1 large red bell pepper, seeded and cut into thin strips
2 tsp. ground cumin
3 Tbsp. lime juice
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 lb. Roma tomatoes, diced
Directions:
Cut beef into strips and set aside.
Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over high heat; add meat and stir-fry until browned. Transfer meat to a bowl.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Beef Fajitas
Ingredients:
12 flour tortillas, warm
1 to 1 1/2 lb. beef skirt steak or round steak
1/2 c. fresh lime juice
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 onion, sliced in rings
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 green bell pepper
Directions:
Cut beef into 4 pieces.
Put in plastic bag with lime juice, garlic, salt and pepper.
Close bag and marinate in refrigerator for 2 to 30 hours or overnight.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Fajitas With Variations
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef skirt steaks
1 c. picante sauce
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 tsp. lemon juice
dash of pepper
dash of garlic powder
12 (8 to 10-inch) flour tortillas, heated
Directions:
Pound meat with meat mallet to tenderize.
Place in plastic bag.
Combine picante sauce, oil, lemon juice, pepper and garlic powder.
Pour into bag and fasten securely.
Refrigerate 3 to 24 hours, turning several times.
Drain meat, reserving marinade. Place meat on grill over hot coals or on rack of broiler pan. Cook for 5 to 6 minutes on each side or until well done, basting frequently with reserved marinade.
Remove from grill; slice across grain into thin strips.
Place meat on heated tortillas. Top with chunky guacamole and additional picante sauce or whatever you like.
Roll up.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Broccoli With Cheese
Ingredients:
1 small onion, chopped
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
2 c. milk
salt and pepper to taste
1 egg yolk, beaten
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 lb. cooked broccoli spears
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Spray 13 x 9 x 2 baking pan with nonstick cooking spray.
Cook onion in 4 tablespoons butter in a skillet until tender.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Cheese Casserole
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 stick melted butter, divided
1 can mushroom soup
1 (4 oz.) can chopped mushrooms
1 (6 oz.) roll cheese with garlic
1 tsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper to taste
1/4 c. slivered almonds
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli, chopped
2 c. herb seasoned stuffing mix
Directions:
Saute onion in 1/4 cup butter until tender.
Combine onion, soup, mushrooms, cheese, parsley, salt, pepper, almonds and broccoli.
Mix well.
Spoon into a 2-quart casserole.
Combine stuffing mix and 1/4 cup butter.
Spoon over broccoli mixture. Bake at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cheese Broccoli
Ingredients:
6 c. water
2 Tbsp. oil
3/4 c. chopped onion
6 chicken bouillon cubes
1 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
2 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen chopped broccoli
1 lb. Velveeta cheese
8 oz. pkg. fine noodles, cooked
6 c. milk
Directions:
Heat in large kettle the oil and onion over medium heat 3 minutes.
Add water, broccoli and bouillon cubes.
Heat to boiling, stirring occasionally, until cubes dissolve.
Gradually add the noodles and salt; cook, uncovered, for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add cubed cheese, pepper and garlic powder. Continue cooking until cheese melts, then add milk.
Do not let it come to boil as it will curdle.
Freezes well.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Cheese Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can cream of broccoli soup
1 soup can milk
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. ground red pepper
2 c. shredded cheese
4 large eggs, separated (whites brought to room temperature)
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and squeezed dry
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Lightly grease an 11 x 7 x 1 1/2-inch baking dish.
Mix the soup, milk, flour, mustard and pepper in a 3-quart saucepan until blended.
Stir over medium-high heat until almost boiling.
Remove from heat.
Add cheese; stir until melted. Stir in egg yolks and broccoli until blended.
Cool slightly. Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form; fold into broccoli mixture.
Pour into prepared dish.
Bake for 50 minutes, until top is golden and puffy and a knife inserted comes out clean. Makes 8 servings.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Cheese Casserole
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked rice
1 (16 oz.) pkg. chopped broccoli, cooked according to directions
1/2 stick butter
1 medium onion, chopped
1 can mushrooms, drained
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/2 soup can milk
1 small jar Cheez Whiz
Directions:
Saute onion in butter.
Combine remaining ingredients and heat (mix all ingredients together).
Pour in casserole; bake at 325° for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Meatless Chili
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 1/4 c. chopped onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. each: dried basil leaves, oregano leaves and ground cumin
2 c. diced zucchini
1 c. diced carrots
2 lb. tomatoes, cut in eighths or 2 cans (undrained)
1 can chickpeas, drained
1 can kidney beans (undrained)
Directions:
In a 5-quart saucepot, heat oil over medium heat.
Add next 6 ingredients.
Cook, stirring 5 minutes, or until onion is tender. Add zucchini and carrots.
Cook, stirring for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 to 35 minutes.
Makes 6 servings.
Freezes well.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Meatless Chili(Diet)
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
3 cloves garlic
1 c. water
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. cumin
2 c. diced zucchini
2 (16 oz.) cans tomatoes
1 (15 oz.) can red kidney beans
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans
1 c. diced green pepper
1/4 c. nonfat sour cream
Directions:
Spray pot with cooking spray.
Place over medium heat until hot.
Add onion and garlic; saute 5 minutes.
Add water and next 7 ingredients.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, 30 minutes.
Serve with some sour cream on top.
Serves 5 to 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Meatless Chili
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 1/4 c. chopped onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 c. diced zucchini
1 c. diced carrots
2 lb. ripe tomatoes, cut into eighths
1 (16 oz.) can chickpeas, drained
1 (16 oz.) can kidney beans, drained
Directions:
In a large saucepot, heat vegetables and oil over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, chili powder, basil, oregano and cumin.
Cook, stirring until onion is tender.
Add zucchini and carrots, cook stirring 1 or 2 minutes.
Stir in tomatoes, chickpeas and kidney beans.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes to 35 minutes.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Meatless Chili For 4
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. carrots, chopped
1 c. green pepper, chopped
1/2 c. sesame seed
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder or to taste
fresh ground pepper to taste
1/2 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. thyme
2 c. tomatoes, chopped
4 c. kidney beans (cooked or canned)
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 can water
Directions:
In large, heavy skillet saute the first 5 ingredients in olive oil.
Cook until vegetables are almost tender.
Add sesame seed and saute lightly.
Add all remaining ingredients.
Cover and cook over medium-low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Sometimes I cook this in my crock-pot.
After sauteing the vegetables and sesame seed I just transfer to the crock-pot, add everything else and cook at low for 3 to 4 hours.
Make sure you rinse the kidney beans before adding to the vegetables.
I also add extra beans to stretch, if needed.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Chili(Meatless)
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
1/4 c. green pepper, chopped
4 c. water, divided
1 can (15 to 16 oz.) Great Northern beans, rinsed and drained
1 can (15 oz.) navy beans, rinsed and drained
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can diced tomatoes
2 to 4 tsp. chili powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In large saucepan, cook the onion and green pepper in 1/2 cup water until tender.
Add beans, tomato paste and tomatoes.
Stir in chili powder, salt, pepper and remaining water; bring to boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Meatballs
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 lb. ground pork
1 c. Parmesan cheese
1 c. milk
1 egg
1 c. soft bread crumbs
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 clove minced garlic
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 c. butter
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except butter and mix well.
Shape meat into balls.
Melt butter in large frying pan.
Brown slowly in butter over low heat.
Place meatballs in hot cooked sauce. Cover and cook an additional 30 minutes.
Serve over spaghetti.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Meatballs
Ingredients:
1/2 c. bread crumbs
1/2 c. milk
2 lb. ground beef
1/2 lb. ground pork
2 eggs
1 c. Quick oats
1/3 c. Parmesan or Romano cheese
1 tsp. minced garlic
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. dry basil
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine milk and bread and let soak, then add all remaining ingredients.
Mix well.
Shape into 1 1/2-inch balls.
Place in baking pan.
Bake in a 400° oven for 30 minutes.
Drain, then add sauce and cook 10 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Meatballs
Ingredients:
1 pound ground beef
1 pound ground pork
1 large onion, diced fine
2 tsp salt
1/4 tsp pepper
1/4 tsp nutmeg
1/4 tsp allspice
1 1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 eggs, beaten
1 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together in bowl and shape into balls. Brown in frying pan in butter and vegetable oil. You may put these in spaghetti sauce or pour over 1 can golden mushroom soup and 1/2 c. sour cream, which makes like a gravy, and serve this way.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Make Ahead Meatballs
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground chuck
3 Tbsp. minced dry onions
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 egg
1/4 c. milk
Directions:
Heat oven to 400°.
Mix all ingredients and shape into 1-inch balls.
Place in pans and bake about 10 minutes or until done. Cool in pans for 5 minutes.
Pack in freezer containers after about 15 minutes and freeze.
Use as needed.
Makes about 3 dozen. I like to double the recipe using 1 pound of chuck and 1 pound of turkey.
Enjoy!

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Unusual Meatballs
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 c. Special K cereal
1 onion
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 egg
1 c. applesauce
1 can tomato soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
Directions:
Mix all together except soups.
Make into 12 large balls or more small ones if preferred.
Place in 9 x 13-inch pan or any baking dish.
Mix soups together and pour over.
Cover with foil or glass top of baking dish.
Bake 1 hour at 350°.
This can be made the night before and put in the refrigerator.
Can be served with rice or potatoes.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Homemade Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. warm water
1 pkg. dry yeast
1 egg
4 c. plain flour
Directions:
Scald milk; stir in sugar, salt and butter so that the sugar is dissolved and the butter melts.
Cool to lukewarm.
Dissolve the yeast in 1/4 cup of water and add to the milk mixture.
Add 1/2 of the flour and the egg and beat by hand until smooth.
Add the rest of the flour which makes a fairly stiff batter.
Cover tightly and cool for 3 hours.
Using 1/2 of the dough, knead it several times and roll to an oval shape.
Spread the top with softened butter (you choose amount) and sprinkle a mixture of cinnamon and sugar on top of the butter.
Roll up jelly roll style and cut into 1/2-inch slices.
Place in a greased pan and allow to rise for an hour or so.
(At this point, they may be cooked or placed in the refrigerator until needed.)
Place rolls into a cold oven when ready to be baked.
Turn oven to 350° and cook until lightly browned (about 30 minutes).
Top with a simple powdered sugar icing.
Because this dough contains an egg, use the dough within 3 days.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Homemade Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1/2 c. warm water
1 1/2 pkg. dry yeast
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 (3 oz.) pkg. vanilla pudding
2 c. milk
1/2 c. oil
2 large eggs
8 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. cinnamon
1 c. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Mix everything except cinnamon and brown sugar; let rise for 1 hour.
Roll out.
Mix brown sugar and cinnamon; sprinkle on top.
Roll up tightly, then cut about 1 1/2-inch apart.
Bake for 10 to 15 minutes.
For icing, just buy plain vanilla cake icing.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls(Makes 150)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. yeast
2 c. warm water
1 qt. sugar
1/3 c. salt
2 Tbsp. salt
2 2/3 qt. warm water
1 qt. oil
1 qt. dry non-fat milk
16 eggs
14 lb. white flour
2 lb. brown sugar
2 c. cinnamon
1/2 lb. butter
Directions:
In mixer soften yeast in water, let stand 10 minutes.
Next, add sugar through dry milk then add eggs and flour.
Mix for 10 minutes.
Take out of mixer and split into two batches.
Take one batch and roll into rectangle as long as table and as wide, (if possible without tearing dough).
Then put brown sugar and cinnamon onto dough that has been rubbed with butter or oleo. Next add raisin and nuts and roll as tight as needed.
Cut and place cut side down on cookie sheets lined with baking paper.
Set aside and let dough rise.
Bake at 300° for about 30 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
5 to 6 c. flour
1/2 c. sugar
2 pkg. yeast
1 c. milk
1/4 c. butter
2 eggs
2/3 c. water
dash of salt
Directions:
Grease pan with butter or oil.
In a large bowl, mix 2 cups of flour, sugar, salt and yeast.
Combine milk, water and butter in a saucepan.
Heat over low heat until liquid is very warm (120° to 130°).
Butter doesn't need to melt.
Gradually add dry ingredients and beat two minutes at medium speed of electric mixer or use hands.
Add eggs and 3/4 cup of flour.
Beat at high speed 2 minutes, scraping bowl occasionally.
Stir in enough additional flour to make a stiff dough.
Turn out onto table and cover the dough with butter.
Add sugar and cinnamon.
Roll the dough up and cut into slices.
Put into greased pan.
Cover with hot towel and let rise.
Bake at 350° until done.
Serve hot or warm.
Good.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. shortening
1 Tbsp. salt
4 eggs, beaten
3 1/2 Tbsp. yeast, dissolved in 1 3/4 c. warm water
butter, softened
cinnamon sugar
1/3 c. sugar
1 3/4 c. boiling water
9 c. flour
Directions:
Combine shortening, sugar, salt and boiling water.
Beat eggs and add to first mixture.
Dissolve yeast in warm water and add. Add flour and mix well.
Place in refrigerator to chill.
Remove dough from refrigerator and roll to 1/4-inch thickness.
Spread with butter and then with cinnamon sugar.
Roll into a long roll; cut into rolls 1-inch thick.
Put in buttered pan and mash down lightly.
Put back in refrigerator until needed.
Turn oven and set temperature to 400°.
Put rolls into cold oven and bake until done.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower-Pasta-Chickpea Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. potatoes, cubed
1 large onion, cut into thin strips
2 tsp. minced garlic
3 c. cauliflower florets
16 oz. can tomatoes, chopped
8 oz. pasta (shells, bowties, etc.)
1 c. chickpeas
4 c. chicken broth
4 c. water
basil, oregano, salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat oil in 4-quart pot over medium heat.
Add potatoes, onion and garlic.
Cook 5 minutes.
Add cauliflower and cook 2 minutes. Add water, broth, tomatoes, chickpeas and seasonings.
Bring to a boil.
Add pasta.
Cover and simmer 15 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Salad
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower
1 can French-style beans, drained
1 can small green peas, drained
1 onion, sliced (cut in 1/2)
1 green pepper, sliced
3/4 c. sugar
3/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. celery seed
3/4 c. oil
Directions:
Boil sugar, salt, vinegar and celery seed until it foams. Then add 3/4 cup oil and mix.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Baked Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 large head cauliflower in flowerets
1 can cream of shrimp soup (10 3/4 oz., undiluted)
8 oz. carton sour cream
2 Tbsp. butter or oleo, melted and divided
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. dry bread crumbs
Directions:
Cook flowerets in small amount
of water (boiling) for 6 to 8 minutes, until crisp and tender.
Place flowerets in buttered baking dish.
Set aside.
Combine soup, sour cream, 1 tablespoon melted butter and pepper.
Stir well and pour over cauliflower. Combine bread crumbs and remaining melted butter and put over soup mix.
Bake for 20 to 30 minutes in 350° oven, until hot and bubbly.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Bake
Ingredients:
1 lg. cauliflower, cut into flowerets
1/2 tsp. salt
3 c. water
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 c. buttery cracker crumbs
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
1 med. onion, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped and undrained
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in a large saucepan, bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside.
Combine butter and next 4 ingredients in a large bowl, stir in cauliflower, 1 cup cheese, onion, chopped green pepper and tomatoes.
Spoon into a greased 13x9x2 inch baking dish.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.
Add remaining 1/2 cup cheese and bake 5 additional minutes.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Salad
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower
1 large bunch broccoli
3 to 4 ribs celery, chopped
1 (10 oz.) frozen peas, thawed, not cooked
1 lb. bacon, fried crisp and broken into small pieces
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. vinegar
Directions:
In large bowl combine small pieces of cauliflower and broccoli, chopped celery, peas and bacon.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. softened butter or shortening
2 medium eggs or 3 small eggs
1 c. granulated sugar
1/2 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2 tsp. vanilla flavoring
2 c. unsifted self-rising flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. chopped nuts (optional)
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate chips
Directions:
Beat butter, eggs, sugars and vanilla until light and fluffy. Add dry ingredients; blend well.
Stir in chips and nuts.
Drop from teaspoon onto ungreased baking sheet 2 inches apart.
Bake in a moderate oven (375°) for 7 to 9 minutes.
Makes about 7 dozen.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: My Favorite Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
2 1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 c. butter, softened
3/4 c. sugar
3/4 c. brown sugar, firmly packed
1 tsp. vanilla
2 eggs
12 oz. pkg. (2 c.) semi-sweet chocolate chips
1 c. chopped nuts (optional)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Combine first 3 ingredients in a small bowl.
Combine the next 4 ingredients in a big bowl; beat until creamy.
Beat in the eggs.
Gradually add the dry ingredients; mix well.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop by teaspoonful on cookie sheet.
Bake 8 to 10 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter or margarine, softened
1/4 c. white sugar
3/4 c. light brown sugar, packed
1 tsp. vanilla
1 pkg. (small) vanilla instant pudding mix
2 eggs
2 1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 pkg. (12 oz.) chocolate chips
1 c. chopped nuts (optional)
Directions:
Combine butter, sugars, vanilla and pudding mix.
Beat until smooth and creamy.
Beat in eggs.
Add flour and soda, then stir in chips and nuts.
Batter will be stiff.
Drop by teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 375° for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. softened butter
3/4 c. packed brown sugar
3/4 c. granulated sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. water
2 eggs
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 c. chopped nuts
1 (12 oz.) bag chocolate chips
Directions:
Beat butter, sugars, vanilla, water and eggs until fluffy. Mix flour with soda and salt.
Blend into butter mixture.
Stir in nuts and chips.
Drop 2-inches apart from teaspoon onto greased baking sheets.
Bake at 375° for 8 to 10 minutes or until golden brown.
Makes about 8 dozen.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Different Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter or margarine, softened
3/4 c. brown sugar
3/4 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/4 c. flour
1 c. whole wheat flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips
1/2 c. salted sunflower kernels
1/4 c. sesame seed
Directions:
Cream butter.
Add sugar, beating until light and fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla.
Beat well.
Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
Add to creamed mixture.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto lightly greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 375° for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Giant Peanut Butter Oat Cookie
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. unsifted all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
2 1/2 c. quick-cooking oats
1 c. corn oil
1 tsp. vanilla
2 eggs
1 c. firmly packed brown sugar
1 c. sugar
1 c. peanut butter (creamy or crunchy)
Directions:
Stir together flour, baking powder, soda and salt in a medium bowl.
Mix in oats.
In another bowl, beat margarine and peanut butter on medium speed of electric mixer until smooth.
Beat in sugars until blended.
Beat in eggs and vanilla.
Add oat mixture and stir by hand until well combined.
Shape mixture into 2-inch balls.
Place 6 balls on an ungreased cookie sheet and flatten each to 3 inches in diameter.
Bake at 350° for 9 1/2 minutes or until golden.
Cool completely on wire rack.
Makes about 24 big cookies.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Peanut Butter Candy
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. milk
1 stick margarine
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. peanut butter
3 c. quick oats
Directions:
Combine sugar, milk and margarine in saucepan; bring to boil. Cook 2 minutes, then remove from heat.
Stir in vanilla, peanut butter and oats.
Drop onto waxed paper.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter-Oatmeal Bars
Ingredients:
2/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
1/4 tsp. baking soda
1/4 c. peanut butter
3 Tbsp. shortening
1 beaten egg
1 Tbsp. milk
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/4 c. quick-cooking rolled oats
frosting
Directions:
Sift together flour, sugar, soda and 1/4 teaspoon salt.
Cut in peanut butter and shortening until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Mix egg, milk and vanilla; add to flour mixture with oats.
Mix well.
Spread in lightly greased 8 x 8 x 2-inch baking pan.
Bake at 375° for 12 to 15 minutes.
Cool.
Frost.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter-Oatmeal Bars
Ingredients:
1 c. self-rising flour
1 c. quick cooking oats
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
1 egg
2 to 3 tsp. milk
2 tsp. peanut butter
1/4 c. sifted powdered sugar
1 c. chocolate chips
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/3 c. peanut butter
1/4 c. milk
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Grease a 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan.
Beat butter for 30 seconds.
Add sugar and brown sugar; beat until fluffy.
Add egg, 1/3 cup peanut butter, 1/4 cup milk and vanilla. Beat well.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Oatmeal Squares
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. cocoa
1/2 c. milk
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 c. peanut butter
2 c. Quick cooking oats
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix
sugar,
cocoa
and milk.
Bring mixture to a boil. Boil one minute.
Remove from heat and add vanilla and peanut butter. Beat until well mixed.
Add Quick cooking oats.
Drop onto a cookie sheet or press into a pan and cut into squares.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Medley Salad
Ingredients:
6 c. cooked instant white rice, chilled
1 c. olives
12 1/2 oz. can white tuna, chilled
4 strips cooked bacon, crumbled
1/2 c. radishes
2 c. green and red bell peppers
1 c. sliced celery
1/2 c. green onions, chopped
1 c. frozen green peas
1 large bottle your favorite Italian salad dressing
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
crisp salad greens
tomatoes
Directions:
Mix all ingredients except salad greens.
Cover tightly and refrigerate several hours or overnight.
Serve over salad greens. I never use the radishes, bell peppers and tomatoes.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Salad
Ingredients:
1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite size pieces
1 pkg. Feta cheese, crumbled
1/2 c. seedless green grapes, halved
1/2 c. pine nuts, toasted
1/2 c. olive oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 tsp. fresh cracked pepper
dash of salt
Directions:
Toss first four ingredients together.
Combine vinegar and seasonings, then slowly whisk in olive oil and add dressing to salad mixture.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
2/3 c. olive oil
3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1/2 c. chopped fresh basil
2 Tbsp. green onion
2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
12 oz. rotelle pasta, cooked and drained
1 each: small red, green and yellow bell pepper, sliced crosswise
1 medium size tomato
1/4 c. pitted black olives
8 oz. Mozzarella, cubed
1/4 tsp. dried oregano
Directions:
Process oil, vinegar, 2 tablespoons basil, green onion, Parmesan, salt and pepper in blender or food processor until smooth.
Put pasta, bell pepper strips, tomato wedges, nuts and olives in large bowl.
Pour in dressing; toss to mix.
Roll cheese cubes in remaining 2 tablespoons basil to coat.
Add to salad; sprinkle with oregano.
Toss lightly.
Serve at room temperature. Makes 4 main dish servings.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
3 oz. pkg. dried fettuccine, broken
1 medium carrot, cut into julienne strips
1/2 (6 oz.) can pitted ripe olives, halved
2 Tbsp. vinegar
1 Tbsp. water
1 Tbsp. olive oil or cooking oil
1 clove garlic, minced
3/4 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/8 tsp. onion powder
Directions:
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven, bring 3 cups water to boiling.
Add pasta; return to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Boil, uncovered, for 6 minutes.
Add carrot strips; cook for 2 to 4 minutes more or until pasta is tender but slightly firm and carrot strips are crisp-tender.
Drain pasta and carrot strips; rinse with cold water.
Drain again.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Salad With Balsamic Vinaigrette(Serves 8)
Ingredients:
3 (6 3/4 oz.) cans boneless and skinless pink salmon
2 lb. cucumbers
1 lb. tomatoes
8 oz. Feta cheese
1 1/4 c. olive oil
3/4 c. balsamic vinegar
1 1/2 Tbsp. minced garlic
4 Tbsp. rosemary (fresh preferable)
3 Tbsp. chopped shallots
Directions:
Drain salmon.
Wash, peel and slice cucumbers.
Wash, core and roughly chop tomatoes. Crumble cheese.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Fresh Fruit Crumble
Ingredients:
6 c. fresh pears, pared, cored and sliced
1/3 c. Mrs. Butterworth's syrup
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 c. uncooked oatmeal
1/2 c. margarine or 1/2 c. plain yogurt
1 tsp. lemon peel
3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine pear slices, syrup, lemon juice and peel and cinnamon.
Mix well.
Put in 1 1/2-quart baking dish. Stir together flour, oatmeal and nutmeg.
With a pastry cutter, cut in margarine until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Sprinkle over pears.
Bake at 375° for 40 minutes or until pears are tender.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Fruit Crumble
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
1 1/2 c. flour
1 c. quick rolled oats
1 1/2 sticks melted margarine
1 can pie filling
1/2 tsp. soda
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except fruit.
Spread half of mixture in bottom of 8 x 8-inch pan.
Cover with fruit and top with remaining mixture.
Bake at 350°
for 40 minutes.
Can be served with ice cream or whipped cream.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
12 oz. sugar
12 oz. flour
6 oz. butter
5 apples
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 300°.
Slice apples into an 8 x 8-inch baking dish.
Sprinkle with sugar and lemon.
Crumble sugar, flour and butter together.
Sprinkle the topping over the apples.
Sprinkle a little extra sugar over the top if you wish.
Bake for 45 minutes, uncovered.
Serve with custard, ice cream or cream.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Fresh Peach Crumble
Ingredients:
1 c. granulated sugar, divided use
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 c. flour
1/2 c. butter
4 to 6 Tbsp. water, divided use
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 to 3 c. sliced fresh peaches
whipped cream or ice cream (optional)
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, mix 1/2 cup of the granulated sugar, the brown sugar, the flour and nutmeg.
Using a pastry blender, cut in butter until it resembles coarse cornmeal.
Sprinkle with 2 to 3 tablespoons of the water; stir with fork until water is absorbed. It will make a crumbly dough.
Pat half the mixture into the bottom of an 8 x 8-inch baking dish.
Bake in a 450° oven for 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Peach Crumbler
Ingredients:
8 sliced peaches
1 c. flour
1/8 tsp. salt
1 tsp. lemon juice
1 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. butter
Directions:
Arrange peaches into buttered 8-inch baking dish or pan. Sprinkle lemon juice over peaches; blend together flour, sugar and salt.
Cut in butter until consistency of coarse meal.
Sprinkle crumb mixture over peaches.
Bake at 375° for 30 minutes.
Serves 6, with vanilla ice cream.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Basic Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, chopped fine
4 Tbsp. dried parsley
1 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. salt
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped (reserve liquid)
Directions:
Heat oil in heavy skillet.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook until tender.
Add tomatoes and liquid, spices and sugar.
Cover and simmer over medium heat 20 minutes to blend flavors.
Cool and divide into 3 half-pint freezer containers.
Freeze and use to make Mediterranean Stuffed Potatoes, Southwest Turkey Pie or marinara makes an excellent base for spaghetti sauce.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, peeled and sliced
3 Tbsp. finely chopped parsley
3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 can (28 oz.) whole tomatoes
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.
Add garlic and saute for 2 to 3 minutes.
Add parsley and onion.
Slowly add tomatoes.
Stir to break up tomatoes.
Add bay leaf, salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer on low about 15 minutes.
Serve over pasta dishes or with rice.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
16 oz. can tomatoes, crushed
8 oz. can tomato sauce
1/2 small onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. each oregano, basil and parsley
1/2 c. mushrooms, sliced (optional)
Directions:
Saute garlic and onions in oil.
Add remaining ingredients; bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes to 1 hour.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 garlic cloves (or instant)
2 c. finely chopped onions (or instant)
3 1/2 c. Italian plum tomatoes (1 lb. 12 oz. can)
2 c. tomato puree (one 15 oz. can)
1 1/2 c. tomato paste (one 12 oz. can)
1/2 c. water or meat stock or wine
1 tsp. each: dried basil and oregano
1/2 tsp. ground sage
1 tsp. salt
freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Heat the oil in a large saucepan and add the garlic and onions.
Cook, stirring until the onions are light brown.
Add the tomatoes, tomato puree, tomato paste, water and seasonings. Simmer for 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.
Leftover sauce may be frozen.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 to 3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 white onion, chopped
1 medium bell pepper, chopped
2 stalks celery, chopped
1 lb. mushrooms, chopped
1 medium zucchini, diced
2 to 3 tomatoes, chopped
2 tsp. basil
1 handful fresh basil leaves, chopped
1 (13 oz.) can tomatoes
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. salt
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 Tbsp. honey
3 tsp. black pepper
4 to 5 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 c. fresh minced parsley
Directions:
Heat olive oil in Dutch oven.
Add onion, bell pepper, celery, mushrooms, zucchini, fresh tomatoes, herbs and salt.
Saute over medium heat until onion is soft; add can of tomatoes, tomato paste, honey and black pepper.
Bring to a boil, then simmer partially covered for about 30 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 10 minutes. Add parsley last.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 tsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter over low heat in a heavy saucepan.
Stir with wooden spoon.
Saute onion and mushrooms in butter for 5 minutes. Blend in flour and seasonings.
Cook over low heat until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Remove from heat.
Stir in milk.
Bring to a boil; boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Cook until thickened. Serve over noodles, potatoes, etc.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. flour
1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms
2/3 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
In a small saucepan, cook onion in butter until tender, but not browned.
Stir in flour.
Drain mushrooms.
Stir in mushrooms, milk, salt and pepper.
Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir 1 to 2 minutes more.
Stir in sour cream; heat through.
Serve with poultry, beef, pork or burgers.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
