Ingredients:
1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free Kraft mayonnaise
1 tsp. minced garlic
1 Egg Beater, beaten
1 (8 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese (1 c.)
Directions:
Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
Drain and set aside.
Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in a small saucepan.
Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beater.
Toss with fettuccine until well coated.
Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.
Serves 8.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium can mushrooms
4 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. rich milk
Directions:
Saute mushrooms in butter.
Add flour slowly and brown slightly.
Add milk and cook until it thickens.
Pour over steak or chicken.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked eggless variety)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free mayonnaise or salad dressing
1 tsp. minced garlic
2 Egg Beaters, beaten (1/2 c.)
2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, drained
1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
Drain and set aside. Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in small saucepan.
Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beaters.
Toss with fettuccine and mushrooms until well coated.
Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 cloves minced garlic
1 tsp. crushed red pepper
2 bay leaves
1/2 tsp. crushed oregano
salt and pepper
lemon juice
1 lb. medium to large shrimp in shell
Directions:
Melt butter
in skillet with lid.
Add remaining ingredients, including shrimp in shells.
Toss well.
Set aside for 30 minutes. Stir occasionally.
Place over medium heat.
Stir and cover. Cook
for
5
minutes.
Shrimp
should
turn pink. Serve immediately over rice.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Skillet
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. onion
1/2 tsp. salt
1 3/4 c. hot water
1 c. cooked shrimp
1 c. French-style green beans
1/2 c. celery
dash of pepper
1 can cream of mushroom soup
2 tsp. lemon juice
1 1/3 c. Minute rice
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Add rice to butter, onion, celery in skillet and saute until rice is golden brown.
Add remaining ingredients.
Bring to a boil and then simmer uncovered 5 minutes.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
20 large shrimp, cleaned and shelled
1 tsp. fresh rosemary, chopped
1/2 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
1 tsp. fresh basil, chopped
2 Tbsp. fresh parsley
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. butter
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/3 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Melt butter in a skillet.
Add olive oil.
Saute onion and garlic in same skillet.
Add rosemary, basil, black pepper and shrimp.
Cook until shrimp loses transparency (do not overcook). Add salt to taste.
Add wine and cook until oil and wine become slightly thickened.
Sprinkle parsley over.
Serve with fresh Parmesan cheese and lemon wedge to garnish.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 red or yellow bell pepper, cut into julienne strips
1 medium zucchini, cut into 1/2 inch half moon slices
1 lb. uncooked peeled shrimp
4 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 c. diagonally sliced scallions
6 ounces snow peas
1/4 c. lemon juice
zest of 1 lemon
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 c. fresh parsley, coarsely chopped
1/4 c. chopped chives
Directions:
Heat the olive oil in a wok or large skillet.
Add the bell pepper and zucchini.
Stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Add the shrimp, garlic and scallions.
Stir-fry over high heat for a few more minutes.
Add the snow peas.
Stir-fry until the shrimp begin to curl.
Add the lemon juice and zest.
Stir-fry until the shrimp turn pink.
Remove to a serving platter using a slotted spoon. Season with salt and pepper.
Sprinkle with parsley and chives. Serve with orzo, rice or noodles.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Shrimp With Garlic
Ingredients:
1 pkg. (16-oz) uncooked linguine
1/2 c. olive oil
1 c. diced red bell pepper
2 tsp. minced garlic
1 lb. medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
1/2 c. lemon juice
1 tsp. crushed red pepper or more to taste
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Salt and black pepper to taste
Directions:
Prepare linguine according to package directions; drain.
Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat.
Add bell pepper and garlic; cook 6 minutes or just until tender.
Add shrimp, lemon juice, crushed red pepper, salt and black pepper; cook 10 minutes or until shrimp is pink and opaque.
Sprinkle with parsley.
Add shrimp mixture to cooked linguine in large bowl and toss well.
Serve immediately.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Basic Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, chopped fine
4 Tbsp. dried parsley
1 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. salt
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped (reserve liquid)
Directions:
Heat oil in heavy skillet.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook until tender.
Add tomatoes and liquid, spices and sugar.
Cover and simmer over medium heat 20 minutes to blend flavors.
Cool and divide into 3 half-pint freezer containers.
Freeze and use to make Mediterranean Stuffed Potatoes, Southwest Turkey Pie or marinara makes an excellent base for spaghetti sauce.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, peeled and sliced
3 Tbsp. finely chopped parsley
3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 can (28 oz.) whole tomatoes
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.
Add garlic and saute for 2 to 3 minutes.
Add parsley and onion.
Slowly add tomatoes.
Stir to break up tomatoes.
Add bay leaf, salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer on low about 15 minutes.
Serve over pasta dishes or with rice.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 cans diced tomatoes (no salt added)
1 can tomato sauce (no salt added)
1 c. sliced mushrooms
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 large onion, chopped
3/4 tsp. oregano
3/4 tsp. basil
pepper to taste
Directions:
Spray nonstick skillet with Pam.
Combine all ingredients listed in the skillet.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve over linguini, angel hair pasta or any cooked pasta.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
16 oz. can tomatoes, crushed
8 oz. can tomato sauce
1/2 small onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. each oregano, basil and parsley
1/2 c. mushrooms, sliced (optional)
Directions:
Saute garlic and onions in oil.
Add remaining ingredients; bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes to 1 hour.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 garlic cloves (or instant)
2 c. finely chopped onions (or instant)
3 1/2 c. Italian plum tomatoes (1 lb. 12 oz. can)
2 c. tomato puree (one 15 oz. can)
1 1/2 c. tomato paste (one 12 oz. can)
1/2 c. water or meat stock or wine
1 tsp. each: dried basil and oregano
1/2 tsp. ground sage
1 tsp. salt
freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Heat the oil in a large saucepan and add the garlic and onions.
Cook, stirring until the onions are light brown.
Add the tomatoes, tomato puree, tomato paste, water and seasonings. Simmer for 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.
Leftover sauce may be frozen.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Tropical Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
2 c. water
1 c. coconut milk
1 1/2 c. uncooked long grain white rice
1/2-inch piece fresh ginger
1/2 c. pineapple tidbits
1/2 c. shredded coconut, toasted
1 1/2 Tbsp. cilantro (fresh), minced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. red bell pepper, minced
1/2 c. red onion, minced
1/2 c. chopped toasted cashews
Directions:
Bring water and coconut milk to boil. Stir in rice and ginger. Cover. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20 minutes, until liquid is absorbed. Transfer to bowl. Remove ginger. Add pineapple, shredded coconut and cilantro to rice and stir to combine. Heat olive oil in saut pan. Add red bell pepper and onion and saut until softened. Add to rice. Last, add cashews to rice; stir well. Serves 6.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
2 tsp oil
3/4 c shredded coconut
1/2 c finely chopped onion
2 c rice
4 c chicken broth
1 small mango, peeled and chopped
1/4 cup fresh chives, chopped
Directions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan. Add coconut and cook and stir until browned. Add onion and cook 1 minute. Stir in rice. Add broth and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat to low and simmer for 25 to 30 minutes until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. Remove from heat. Stir in mango. Sprinkle with chives.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Curried Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. curry powder
2 c. water
2 chicken broth cubes
1 c. uncooked rice
1 c. coconut milk
1/3 c. golden raisins
sliced onions, fried
Directions:
Melt butter in 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Stir in curry powder. Add water and broth cubes and bring to a boil. Add rice, coconut milk and raisins. Stir to blend.
Return to boil and then reduce heat.
Cover and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.
Put into a serving dish and garnish with fried onions.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Rice And Coconut Pudding
Ingredients:
2 c. rice (cooked)
1 c. coconut
1 c. raisins
1 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
4 eggs
2 1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. grated orange peel
Directions:
Mix well together cooked rice, coconut, raisins, sugar and salt.
Pour into buttered baking dish.
Beat eggs lightly. Combine with milk and vanilla.
Pour over rice mixture and sprinkle with grated orange peel over top.
Set baking dish in pan of hot water.
Bake 45 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Rice-Coconut-Chocolate Squares
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. water
1/4 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. Minute rice
1/2 c. Angel Flake coconut
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
1 c. Cool Whip nondairy whipped topping, thawed
Directions:
Mix sugar, salt and water in a saucepan.
Bring to full boil. Stir in rice.
Cover.
Remove from heat.
Let stand 5 minutes. Add coconut and chips to hot rice and stir until chips are melted. Cover and chill.
Fold whipped topping into rice mixture.
Pour into waxed paper lined square pan (8-inch or 9 x 5-inch loaf pan). Cover and chill until firm.
Remove paper and put on a serving plate.
Cut into squares or slice.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Herbed Pork Chops
Ingredients:
4 lean pork chops (about 1-inch thick)
1 c. unsweetened pineapple juice
2/3 c. dry sherry
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary leaves, crushed
1 clove garlic, minced
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except pork chops.
Mix well.
Place chops in shallow dish.
Pour marinade over chops.
Cover and refrigerate overnight, turning meat occasionally.
Remove pork chops from marinade and place on rack of broiling pan.
Broil 10 to 12 minutes on each side or until done, turning and basting once with marinade.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops With Herbs
Ingredients:
6 pork chops
2 onions, sliced
1 can cream of celery soup
1/2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 tsp. salt
pepper
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. dried oregano
snipped parsley
Directions:
Brown chops in heavy skillet.
In same skillet, saute onions until golden.
Combine soup, milk, thyme, poultry seasoning, oregano, water and salt.
Remove chops and onions to baking dish. Cover with remaining ingredients.
Cook 1 1/2 hours in covered pan at 350°.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Creamy Herbed Pork Chops
Ingredients:
4 pork chops (3/4-inch thick)
1 Tbsp. margarine or butter
1/3 c. finely chopped carrot
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
2 tsp. flour
1/2 tsp. dried basil, thyme or tarragon, crushed
1/2 tsp. instant beef bouillon
2/3 c. milk or light cream
2 Tbsp. dry white wine or water
Directions:
Trim fat; sprinkle with salt and pepper.
In a large skillet, cook chops in margarine or butter over medium heat for 5 minutes. Turn chops and add carrot.
Cook 5 to 7 minutes more, until no pink remains.
Remove chops; reserve drippings and carrot.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Savory Herb-And-Garlic Pork Chops
Ingredients:
2 pork loin chops (1 1/2 lb.)
1 Tbsp. minced garlic
1 tsp. ground cumin
1 tsp. herbal salt substitute (optional)
1/2 tsp. ground coriander
1/4 tsp. ground red pepper
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1 c. unsweetened applesauce
1 c. braised red cabbage
2 baking potatoes
Directions:
Place the chops in the freezer until partially frozen, about 20 minutes.
Trim off all visible fat.
In a cup, combine the garlic, cumin, salt substitute, coriander, red pepper and black pepper.
Spread the mixture thickly on both sides of the chops. Place on a plate.
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate 2 to 8 hours.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Herbed Pork Chops
Ingredients:
1 c. unsweetened pineapple juice
2/3 c. dry sherry
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary leaves, crushed
4 (1-inch thick) center cut pork chops
Directions:
Combine the first 3 ingredients; set aside.
Arrange pork chops on an 8-inch square dish.
Pour marinade over pork chops; cover and refrigerate 8 hours, turning meat occasionally.
Drain meat, discarding marinade.
Place chops on a lightly greased rack in broiler pan.
Broil 6 inches from heat with oven door partially open for 12 minutes.
Turn chops and broil 10 more minutes or until done.
Yields 4 servings.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Easy Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
3 heaping c. flour
3 rounded Tbsp. cocoa
3 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. shortening
3 c. sugar
3/4 c. buttermilk or sour milk
1 1/2 c. boiling water
3 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Measure and sift the flour, cocoa, soda, baking powder and salt.
Beat shortening and sugar; cream well.
Add alternately with dry ingredients and mix well.
Add buttermilk or sour milk, boiling water and vanilla.
Dough will be thin.
Bake in hot oven at 375° to 400°.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Can Do Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 2/3 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 c. shortening
1 tsp. vanilla
2 eggs
2/3 c. cocoa
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Grease and flour 2 round pans or 1 oblong pan.
In large bowl, combine all ingredients.
Beat on low speed 30 minutes, scraping sides and bottom of bowl.
Beat 3 minutes on medium speed, scraping bowl frequently.
Pour into prepared pans.
Bake at 350° until done.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Easy, Easy Cake(Chocolate)
Ingredients:
1 stick oleo
4 Tbsp. cocoa
1/2 c. Crisco oil
1 c. water
2 c. plain flour
2 c. sugar
2 eggs, well beaten
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Put oleo, cocoa, oil
and water in a pan and bring to a boil. Sift plain	flour.	Add sugar into a large mixing bowl. Pour cocoa mixture
into
this.
Mix
eggs,
soda, vanilla and buttermilk in a separate bowl.
Add to first mixture.
Bake in a long pan in a 400° oven for 20 minutes.
After cake has been baking 15 minutes, start the icing.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Perfect Chocolate Cake(May Prepare Ahead.  Makes One 3-Layer Cake.)
Ingredients:
1 c. cocoa
2 c. boiling water
1 c. butter, softened
2 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
2 3/4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
4 eggs
Directions:
Combine cocoa and boiling water, stirring until smooth; set aside to cool.
Combine butter, sugar, eggs and vanilla; beat until light and fluffy (about 5 minutes).
Combine dry ingredients; add to sugar mixture alternately with cocoa mixture, beginning and ending with flour mixture.
Do not overbeat!
Pour batter into 3 greased and floured 9-inch round cake pans.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until toothpick comes out of the center clean.
Cool in pans for 10 minutes; remove and cool completely.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Easy Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. lard
4 Tbsp. cocoa
1 c. water
1/2 c. buttermilk
2 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Set aside first 2 ingredients in
bowl.
Bring
next
4 ingredients to a boil;
then pour
over
first
2 ingredients. Mix well, then add remaining ingredients.
Mix
well
and pour into 9 x 13-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for
1
hour
or
15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1-inch jelly roll pan and only bake 20 to 25 minutes. Ice while hot.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Fantastic Corn On The Cob
Ingredients:
6 ears frozen or fresh sweet corn
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1/2 tsp. oregano
salt to taste
pepper to taste
1/4 c. butter
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Boil corn for 15 minutes.
Remove from water and place in rectangular dish.
Sprinkle with spices and add butter.
Sprinkle corn with Parmesan cheese.
Cover dish with foil and place in warm oven until ready to serve.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Baked Corn
Ingredients:
2 large cans cream-style corn
1 large onion, chopped
1 medium bell pepper, chopped
1 (2 oz.) jar pimento, chopped
1 c. grated cheese
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. fine crushed cracker crumbs
1 egg, well beaten
1/4 c. melted oleo or butter
salt and pepper to taste
2/3 c. milk
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and place in a 9-inch casserole dish.
Bake at 350° for one hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Elegant Scalloped Corn
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) can cream-style corn
1 c. cracker crumbs
1/3 c. diced celery
1/4 c. diced onion
3/4 c. American cheese, cut in small pieces
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs, well beaten
2 Tbsp. melted butter
1/4 tsp. paprika
1 c. milk
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and pour into greased casserole.
Bake in a 350° oven about an hour.
Sprinkle paprika on top, also, before baking, if desired.
Serves 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Corn To Can
Ingredients:
9 heaping c. corn
1 c. water
2/3 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut raw corn off of cob and measure.
Add water, sugar and salt.
Stir well.
Cook for 5 minutes.
Cool.
Put into freezer containers and freeze.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Fried Corn
Ingredients:
6 ears fresh corn
1/4 c. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. water
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
Directions:
Wash and cut corn off the cob in a large bowl.
Combine corn, sugar, flour, water, salt and pepper; mix well.
Melt butter over medium heat.
Add ingredients in the skillet and cook over low heat, stirring frequently, for 1/2 hour to 45 minutes, or until tender.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
3 garlic cloves, smashed and chopped
1 1/2 green peppers, cut into thin strips
salt and pepper
1 large lemon, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Heat butter in large frying pan.
Add shrimp and cook 2 minutes on each side over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and season well. Continue cooking for 1 minute.
Stir in green peppers and diced lemon.
Cook 1 more minute.
Add parsley, paprika, salt and pepper. Mix and serve.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. (12 oz.) frozen, peeled, deveined, quick cooking shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup. Microwave at high 30-45 second, until melted. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Butter
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. cleaned, cooked shrimp, chopped
1 hard-cooked egg, chopped
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1/2 c. butter, softened
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. lite mayonnaise
1 clove garlic, mashed
1/8 tsp. white pepper
1/8 tsp. Worcestershire
Directions:
Insert metal blade in food processor.
Add all ingredients. Process until smooth.
Line a 2 cup mold with plastic wrap.
Leave extra to hang over edge.
Spoon in mixture.
Press to remove air spaces and to make a nice smooth shape when unmolded later.
Chill 6 hours or overnight.
Invert mold on serving plate.
Peel off plastic.
Garnish with parsley sprigs, cherry tomato halves and lemon slices.
Serve with crackers or toast squares.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter(Microwave; Easy)
Ingredients:
1/2 stick butter
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 (12 oz.) pkg. frozen, peeled and deveined shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in microwave-safe dish (8 or 9-inch); a Corning Ware dish works great.
Heat butter 35 to 45 seconds to melt. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.
Place shrimp in colander; run cold water over to clean and separate.
Drain.
Stir shrimp into butter mixture to evenly coat.
Cover tightly with plastic wrap.
Microwave 6 to 8 minutes on High.
Stir every 2 minutes.
When shrimp are tender and opaque, let stand 1 1/2 minutes before serving.
Serve with toothpicks.
Fresh shrimp may be used if deveined and peeled.
Makes 1 1/2 to 2 cups.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp With Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
2 lb. jumbo shrimp
3 cloves garlic, minced
3/4 c. olive oil (approximately)
juice of 1/2 lemon
lemon wedges
1 Tbsp. minced parsley
Directions:
Slit each shrimp down the back without removing the shell. Flatten and place cut side up in a shallow broiler pan.
Sprinkle with the garlic and olive oil and put under a preheated broiler. Broil 3 minutes, then turn the shrimp.
Broil an additional 4 minutes, or until the flesh is opaque and the shrimp are cooked through.
Transfer to a warmed platter.
Pour the cooking liquid over the shrimp and sprinkle with the parsley and lemon juice. Garnish with lemon wedges.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut-Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. linguine or thin spaghetti
3 garlic cloves
1 1/2 tsp. minced peeled ginger root
7 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
6 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/4 c. rice wine vinegar
1/4 c. honey
1 tsp. dark sesame oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 c. broccoli florets, blanched until tender-crisp
1 c. sliced Napa cabbage
1/2 c. carrots, diagonally sliced
1/2 c. bean sprouts
Directions:
Cook linguine according to package directions until al dente; rinse in cold water and drain well.
In food processor or blender, combine garlic, ginger, soy sauce, peanut butter, vinegar, honey, sesame oil and hot pepper sauce; process until blended.
Add water to reach desired consistency (1/2 to 3/4 cup), processing until smooth.
To serve, toss cooked linguine with vegetables and sauce. Yield:
6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
8 oz. thin spaghetti
4 Tbsp. toasted sesame oil
6 green onions, finely chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. dried hot pepper flakes
1 Tbsp. rice wine vinegar
1 tsp. granulated sugar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 c. finely chopped salted dry peanuts
1/3 c. chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Drain.
Rinse in cold water and toss with 2 tablespoons sesame oil.
Set aside.
Place remaining sesame oil in large heated frying pan.
Add green onions, garlic and pepper flakes.
Stir over medium heat until onions have softened, 2 minutes.
Add spaghetti, vinegar, sugar and soy sauce.
Heat mixture, tossing to combine for 3 or 4 minutes.
Stir in peanuts and cilantro.
Add salt to taste. Transfer to serving bowl.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sauce For Pasta
Ingredients:
1/4 c. creamy peanut butter
2 Tbsp. hot water
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. salad oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. pasta
Directions:
In medium bowl with wire whisk or fork, beat peanut butter with water until smooth.
Stir in vinegar and next 4 ingredients until blended.
Add cooked and drained pasta; toss gently to coat well. Serve immediately.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Chinese Chicken And Noodles
Ingredients:
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/3 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. honey
1 tsp. sesame oil
1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes
1/4 c. coarsely chopped fresh ginger
2 tsp. finely chopped garlic
2 Tbsp. coarsely chopped green onions
1 lb. linguine or spaghetti
1/4 lb. snow peas
2 c. cooked julienned chicken
1 red pepper, julienned
1 can (8 oz.) sliced water chestnuts
1/2 c. thinly sliced green onions
2 tsp. sesame seed (optional)
Directions:
Dressing:
Combine first 5 ingredients in large bowl.
In food processor, process ginger, garlic and green onions until fine.
Whisk into soy mixture.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Cold Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
4 oz. fine egg noodles
1 Tbsp. sesame oil
1/4 c. sesame paste (tahini) or peanut butter
3 Tbsp. brewed tea or water
2 Tbsp. hot oil (chili oil)
3 Tbsp. light soy sauce
3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
2 tsp. sugar
salt to taste
1/4 c. oil
2 tsp. to 2 Tbsp. chopped garlic
leftover chicken, cut into small pieces
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Let sit a couple of hours.
Once all the ingredients are stocked, they last a long time and it's a great way to use leftover chicken or make a "special" dinner for surprise guests.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Creamed Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. yellow Finn or long white potatoes, washed and peeled
1/2 c. (1 stick) unsalted butter, cut into pieces
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, cut into pieces
1/4 c. heavy cream
salt and freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Cut potatoes in quarters. Place in a large stockpot with water to cover. Boil over high heat uncovered for 30 minutes or until soft. Drain and mash with potato masher or pass through a food mill. While hot, add butter, cream cheese, heavy cream and salt and pepper to taste. Whip until smooth with a wooden spoon.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Baked Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes
3 Tbsp. onion, minced
2 large potatoes, boiled
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. butter
1 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
salt
pepper
Directions:
Scrub the 4 potatoes, dry and coat with oil or fat. Wrap in foil. Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Halve lengthwise. Scoop out insides; salt and pepper shells. Mash boiled potatoes with pulp of baked potatoes. Beat sour cream and butter with potatoes until fluffy; season. Stir in onions and parsley; stuff shells. Sprinkle with cheese. Return to oven until hot.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
2 c. hot or cold mashed potatoes (leftovers okay)
1 large (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)
1 small onion, finely chopped
2 eggs
2 Tbsp. flour
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. crushed potato chip crumbs
Directions:
Put potatoes in large bowl.
Add cream cheese, onion, eggs and flour.
Beat at medium speed of electric mixer until ingredients are blended.
Then turn on high speed and beat until light and fluffy.
Taste and add salt and pepper as needed.
Spoon into a greased 9-inch baking casserole.
Sprinkle chip crumbs atop potatoes.
With knife, poke some of crumbs into potato mixture. Bake, uncovered, in 300° oven for about 35 minutes.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Potato Bake(A Tangy Version Of Mashed Potatoes)
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes (6 large)
1/4 c. finely chopped onion
1/4 c. margarine or butter
1 (12 oz.) carton small curd cream-style cottage cheese (1 1/2 c.)
1/4 c. snipped parsley
1 tsp. salt
margarine or butter, melted (optional)
Directions:
Cook, peel and mash potatoes.
In saucepan, cook onion in 1/4 cup margarine until tender, but not brown.
Stir onion, cottage cheese, parsley and salt into mashed potatoes.
Spoon potato mixture into a well-greased 2-quart casserole dish.
Drizzle melted margarine over top, if desired.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Bread
Ingredients:
2 ripe medium bananas, mashed
1 3/4 c. unsifted all-purpose flour
1 c. chopped walnuts or pecans
1/4 c. plus 1 tsp. buttermilk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Grease and flour 9 x 5 loaf pan. Combine all ingredients in large bowl and mix well. Transfer to prepared pan. Bake at 325° until top is golden brown and splits slightly, about 1 hour and 20 minutes. Serve warm.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Best-Ever Banana Bread
Ingredients:
2 ripe medium bananas, mashed
2 eggs
1 3/4 c. all-purpose flour, unsifted
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 c. chopped walnuts
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. buttermilk
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 325°.
Grease and flour a 9 x 5-inch loaf pan.
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl and mix well. Transfer to prepared pan.
Bake until top is golden brown and splits slightly, about 1 hour and 20 minutes.
Serve warm or cold. Makes 1 loaf.
Do not double recipe.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Banana Bread
Ingredients:
3 ripe medium bananas
2 eggs
1 3/4 c. unsifted all-purpose flour
3/4 c. dark brown sugar
3/4 c. white sugar
1 c. chopped pecans
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. buttermilk
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Grease and flour one 9 x 5-inch loaf pan.
Mash bananas with a fork.
Add eggs and rest of ingredients; mix well.
Pour into pan and bake for 1 hour and 20 minutes, until golden brown and splits slightly.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Banana Bread
Ingredients:
2 ripe bananas, mashed
2 eggs
1 3/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 c. walnuts, chopped
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. buttermilk
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and mix thoroughly.
Pour into greased 9 x 5-inch loaf pan.
Bake at 325° for 1 hour and 20 minutes.
Do not double recipe.
Yields one 9 x 5-inch loaf.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Banana Bread
Ingredients:
3 ripe bananas, mashed
2 eggs
1 3/4 c. unsifted all-purpose flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 c. chopped walnuts
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. buttermilk
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Grease and flour a 9 x 5-inch loaf pan. Combine all ingredients in large bowl; mix well.
Pour
into pans.
Bake in center of oven until top is golden brown and splits slightly, about 1 hour and 20 minutes.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Easy Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. cloves
1 c. cooked pumpkin
3 egg yolks
1 c. milk or cream
4 Tbsp. margarine
Directions:
Combine sugar, cornstarch and spices; add pumpkin.
Beat egg yolks; add milk and pour into pumpkin mixture.
Add 1/2 teaspoon salt and margarine; mix well.
Cook over low heat until mixture thickens.
Pour into baked shell.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
2 c. pumpkin
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. granulated sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. butter
unbaked pastry shell
Directions:
Mix pumpkin with eggs.
Add dry ingredients.
Heat milk with butter and add to pumpkin mixture.
Pour in shell.
Bake at 400° for 20 minutes.
Reduce to 350°
for 30 minutes more or until knife comes out clean.
This makes a very deep pie.
I use a 10-inch round, 2-inch deep pie pan.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1/2 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. brown sugar (firmly packed)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. allspice
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 1/2 c. pumpkin
1 1/2 c. canned milk
Directions:
To slightly beaten eggs, add sugar, flour, salt and spices. Stir thoroughly.
Add pumpkin and stir again.
Add milk and mix thoroughly.
Pour mixture into prepared pie crust.
Bake at 450° for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 350° and bake for 40 minutes longer, or until a silver knife comes out clean when inserted in filling.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
3 eggs, slightly beaten
1 lb. can (2 c.) pumpkin
2/3 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/4 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. cloves
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 1/3 c. evaporated milk
1/2 c. molasses
2 unbaked pie crust shells
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
In large mixing bowl, combine eggs and pumpkin.
Add sugar, salt and spices to pumpkin mixture.
Stir in milk and molasses; blend.
Pour into pie shells.
Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until knife inserted comes out clean.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. strained pumpkin
2/3 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. powdered ginger
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. molasses
1 can evaporated milk plus water to make 2 c.
2 eggs
Directions:
Mix spices, flour, salt and water well.
Add pumpkin and mix. Add slightly beaten eggs.
Stir in milk.
Pour into unbaked pie crust.
Bake at 450° for about 15 minutes, until crust is set. Then reduce heat to 300° and bake about 45 minutes longer or until inserted knife comes out clean.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Quick And Easy Chicken Wraps
Ingredients:
1 c. nonfat plain yogurt
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
1/2 c. roughly chopped cilantro
3 c. diced cooked chicken breast
4 large whole wheat tortillas
4 large pre-washed lettuce slices (large enough to cover tortilla surface)
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In medium mixing bowl, combine yogurt, garlic and herb. Stir until blended. Salt and pepper to taste. Add chicken breast and stir until well coated. Place lettuce slices and 1/4 of chicken mixture on a whole wheat tortilla and wrap up. Serves 4.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Asian Chicken Wrap
Ingredients:
6 (8-inch) flour tortillas
1 large carrot, peeled and sliced into strips
1 medium yellow squash, sliced into strips
6 scallions, thinly sliced
2 whole roasted red peppers, thinly sliced
8 oz. cooked shredded chicken
3 Tbsp. orange marmalade
1 Tbsp. low-sodium soy sauce
1 tsp. ground ginger
1 1/2 tsp. olive oil
Directions:
Place flour tortillas on work surface.
Divide and layer sliced carrot, squash, scallions, red peppers and chicken in the center of each tortilla.
Roll up tortilla, enclosing filling. Slice in half.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Wrap-Ups
Ingredients:
chicken breast (boneless and skinned; 1 per person)
bacon (two slices per chicken breast)
salt
pepper
soy sauce
lemon juice
parsley
Directions:
Wrap each chicken breast with 2 pieces bacon.
Crisscross slices of bacon and secure with toothpick.
Place in rectangular baking pan.
Season with salt and pepper, lots of soy sauce and lemon juice.
Sprinkle chopped parsley over top.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes to 1 hour.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Chicken Wraps
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless skinless chicken breast
1 Tbsp. garlic powder
1 Tbsp. onion powder
1 Tbsp. pepper
15 jalapeno peppers, halved and seeded
2 tsp. seasoned salt
1 tsp. paprika
1 small onion, cut into strips
1 lb. sliced bacon, halved widthwise
Blue cheese dressing (for dipping)
Directions:
Cut chicken into 2 x 1 1/2-inch strips.
In a large plastic bag, mix garlic and onion powder, pepper, seasoned salt and paprika; add chicken and shake to coat.
Place a chicken and onion strip in each jalapeno half.
Wrap each with a piece of bacon and secure with toothpicks.
Grill, uncovered, over indirect medium heat for 18 to 20 minutes or until chicken juices run clear and bacon is crisp, turning once.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken-Bacon Wraps
Ingredients:
6 skinned, boned chicken breasts
6 slices bacon
1 can cheese broccoli soup
8 oz. sour cream
garlic powder
salt and pepper
Directions:
Wrap 1 slice bacon around each chicken breast.
Put in small cake pan.
Mix soup and sour cream together.
Pour over chicken. Sprinkle with garlic, salt and pepper.
Bake 1 1/2 hours at 350° covered.
Serve with baked potatoes.
Use sauce for gravy.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 loaf crusty French or Italian bread
1 stick butter
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. basil
4 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese, shredded (Sargento)
Directions:
Slice bread diagonally but leave bottom crust unsliced. Soften butter.
Add garlic, herbs and cheese to butter and mix well.
Gently pull slices of bread open and spread with butter. Take care not to break bottom crust.
Spread any leftover butter on top of loaf.
Carefully place buttered
loaf on foil and wrap ends, leaving top of loaf exposed.
Bake at 350°
until crusty. Great with spaghetti!

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 c. thinly sliced green onions with tops
3 garlic cloves, minced
1 loaf French bread (20-inch), halved lengthwise
1/3 c. minced, fresh parsley (optional)
Directions:
Mix mayonnaise, cheese, onions and garlic; spread on bread halves.
If desired, spread with parsley.
Wrap each half in foil. Refrigerate 1 to 2 hours or freeze.
Unwrap and place on baking sheet.
Bake at 400° for 8 to 10 minutes (20 to 25 minutes if frozen) or until puffed but not brown.
Cut into slices.
Serves 12 to 15.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 c. thinly sliced green onion, with tops
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 loaf French bread (about 20 inches), halved lengthwise
fresh parsley (optional)
paprika (optional)
Directions:
Mix mayonnaise, cheese, onions and garlic.
Spread on bread halves.
If desired, sprinkle with parsley and paprika.
Wrap each half in foil.
Refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours, or freeze.
Unwrap and place on a baking sheet.
Bake at 400° for 8 to 10 minutes (20 to 25 minutes, if frozen).
Cut into slices.
Yield: 12 to 15 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 loaf unsliced French bread
1 c. shredded cheese
1/2 c. margarine, softened
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. celery seed
1/2 tsp. parsley flakes
Directions:
Slice French bread into 1-inch slices.
Combine remaining ingredients, mixing well.
Spread butter mixture between bread slices and on top and sides of loaf.
Wrap loaf in foil.
Bake at 350° for 15 minutes or until thoroughly heated.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 medium loaf French bread (unsliced)
1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 cloves garlic, halved
1 tsp. dried parsley
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°. Cut slices down the length of bread at 1-inch intervals, without cutting all the way through. Rub slices and top of loaf with cut sides of garlic halves. Then mince garlic. Combine butter, garlic, parsley and Parmesan cheese in small bowl. Spread mixture between bread slices and on top of the loaf. Wrap bread in foil, leaving top partially uncovered. Bake until heated through, about 15 minutes.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 sweet potatoes
1 small flat can pineapple slices
1/2 stick butter
1 c. sugar (may use less)
1/2 c. orange juice
1/2 c. apricot nectar
1/2 c. pineapple juice (from can)
spices: cinnamon, allspice, nutmeg (optional)
Directions:
Cook yams until tender.
Do not overcook.
Melt butter in a skillet.
Add sugar and juices.
Cook until syrup is formed.
Dip sweet potatoes (quartered) in syrup, then place in a Pyrex baking dish.
Dip pineapple slices in syrup and place on top of potatoes. Sprinkle with spices, if desired.
Pour rest of syrup over dish. Bake until good and hot.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Creamed Sweet Potatoes With Marshmallows
Ingredients:
6 large yellow sweet potatoes
1/4 lb. butter
1 1/4 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. orange flavoring
1 c. whole milk
3 eggs, well beaten
heavy dash of ground ginger
dash of black pepper
pinch of salt
1 c. chopped pecans
1 c. raisins
2 tsp. orange flavoring
1 c. whole milk
3 eggs, well beaten
heavy dash of ground ginger
dash of black pepper
pinch of salt
1 c. chopped pecans
1 c. raisins
Directions:
Place in a casserole dish and cook until it sets.
Cover with marshmallows and brown lightly.
Add crystallized red cherries between marshmallows.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Festive Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked mashed sweet potatoes
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 c. milk
1/3 c. margarine, melted
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. flaked coconut
1 c. firmly packed brown sugar
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/3 c. margarine
1 c. chopped pecans
1 c. tiny marshmallows
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients, mixing well.
Spoon into lightly greased 8-inch square baking dish.
Combine remaining ingredients except marshmallows.
Sprinkle over top of potato mixture.
Bake at 375° for 20 minutes.
Remove from oven and sprinkle marshmallows over.
Return to oven until marshmallows are brown and melted.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Special Sweet Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
8 medium cooked sweet potatoes, mashed
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. mace
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. ginger
1 large egg, slightly beaten
1/2 stick margarine, melted
3 Tbsp. orange juice
3/4 c. finely chopped peanuts, divided
1/2 c. flaked coconut
1/4 c. brown sugar
Directions:
Combine
sweet	potatoes
with next 8 ingredients.
Add 1/4 cup peanuts, finely chopped.
Place in a 2 quart casserole and bake at 400° for 25 minutes.
Combine coconut, brown sugar and remaining
peanuts (1/2 cup).
Sprinkle over top of sweet potato mixture
and
bake approximately 10 minutes longer, or until lightly browned.
Makes about 6 to 8 servings.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
8 medium sweet potatoes
1/4 lb. butter
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 c. milk (approximately)
1/4 c. coconut
1/4 c. raisins
1/4 c. chopped walnuts
1 bag large marshmallows
Directions:
Boil potatoes with skins on.
When cooked, slip skins off. With electric mixer, whip potatoes, butter, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and enough milk to make potatoes smooth and creamy.
Add coconut, raisins and walnuts.
If desired, add more cinnamon and nutmeg.
Pour into baking dish.
Cover entire top of casserole with marshmallows.
Push marshmallows 1/4 way into top of potatoes.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until marshmallows are slightly browned.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Crispy Tofu(Crisp Outside, Soft Inside)
Ingredients:
1 box "regular" tofu
1/4 c. chopped, roasted peanuts
2 medium cucumbers, cubed
2 to 3 Tbsp. vinegar
2 to 3 Tbsp. sugar
1 bunch cilantro, chopped
Directions:
Soak 4 blocks tofu in salted water overnight or 4 hours if cut in cubes.
Cut each block into 9 to 12 cubes, depending on size, and drain.
Dip-fry in hot oil (should be crispy outside and soft inside, not hard).
Dip or pour Peanut Dressing over Crispy Tofu when ready to eat.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Sesame Tofu
Ingredients:
1 lb. firm tofu
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/3 c. sliced green onion
1 Tbsp. sesame seed, toasted
1 tsp. sesame seed oil
1/4 c. almonds, grind
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1/4-inch thick or 3/4-inch cubes.
Mix soy sauce, onion, sesame seed, oil and almonds into small bowl.
In a dish, put sliced tofu and mixed sauce on the top of tofu; make layer. Cook in microwave about 4 to 5 minutes.
If you want to bring it to boil, use stainless pot or pan.
Cook about 3 minutes on medium-high temperature.
Serve with rice.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Tofu And Vegies
Ingredients:
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. water
1/3 can (2/3 c.) pineapple chunks with juice
1/4 c. water
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/2 Tbsp. malt or molasses or 1 tsp. honey
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. ginger
touch of pepper
2 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 large carrot, sliced thinly or chopped small
3/4 lb. tofu, cut into chunks
1 green pepper, chopped
Directions:
Dissolve cornstarch in 2 tablespoons of water; add 1/4 cup pineapple juice, 1/4 cup water, vinegar, honey, soy sauce, ginger, and pepper; set aside.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet on high heat.
Add onion and stir until strong smell starts to go away. Add carrot and stir a little more.
Add tofu and stir until lightly browned.
Add green pepper and salt.
Stir a minute more, then reduce heat to medium and cook, uncovered.
Colorful, rich and juicy with a Chinese flavor.
A meal in itself with rice or chow mein noodles.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Tofu And Veggies
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1/2 c. Sake or white wine
2 Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
4 Tbsp. soy sauce or to taste
2 cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. ginger juice (optional)
1 onion, thinly sliced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. broccoli florets or Chinese cabbage
8 oz. snow peas
1/4 c. roasted cashews or almonds
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
In wok or skillet, bring soy sauce, garlic, ginger and wine to a boil.
Add tofu cubes, cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove tofu and remaining broth from wok or skillet.
Heat oil in wok and stir-fry vegetables over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add remaining broth, tofu and cashews or almonds.
Heat and serve.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Herb Tofu
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. tofu
4 Tbsp. plain yogurt
3 scallions, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 c. parsley leaves, chopped
1 pt. cherry tomatoes, cut in half and chopped
salt and pepper to taste
1 zucchini, chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
Directions:
In blender or food processor, place tofu and yogurt.
Add chopped vegetables and salt and pepper to taste.
Place on serving platter with bagels, crackers or pita bread.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Crispy Oven-Fried Chicken(Makes 4 Servings)
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic, peeled
4 slices white bread, torn into pieces
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese (about 1 oz.)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. crumbled sage or thyme
1/4 c. milk
2 1/2 c. chicken parts
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 375°.
Line a baking sheet with foil.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Crisp-Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (3 lb.) chicken, cut into 8 pieces
1/2 c. butter, melted
1 1/2 c. crushed Rice Krispies
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. Pleasoning
Directions:
Melt butter and dip chicken pieces into it.
Roll in crushed cereal, mixed with seasonings.
Place, skin side up, on shallow baking pan lined with foil.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until tender.
Do not cover or turn.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Crispy Baked Chicken
Ingredients:
1 frying chicken (2 1/2 to 3 lb.), cut in serving pieces
1 c. skim milk
1 tsp. rosemary
1 c. cornflake crumbs
freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Remove all skin from the chicken; rinse and dry the pieces thoroughly.
Dip in milk, mix cornflake crumbs with rosemary and pepper and roll in the seasoned crumbs.
Let stand briefly so coating will adhere.
Place chicken in an oiled baking pan (line pan with foil for easy clean up).
Do not crowd; pieces should not touch.
Bake at 400° for 45 minutes.
Crumbs will form a crisp skin.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken, cut up
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
3 to 4 c. flour
Directions:
Wash chicken.
Roll chicken in flour, salt and pepper mixture. Dip in water.
Roll in flour mixture a second time.
This makes chicken crispier.
Drop in deep fryer in hot oil.
Fry until chicken comes to top or until golden brown and done.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Crispy Baked Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 to 3 lb.) fryer, cut up
1 c. skim milk
1 c. crushed cornflakes
seasoned salt
Directions:
Remove all skin from chicken and rinse and dry pieces thoroughly.
Add seasoned salt to chicken to taste.
Dip in milk and roll in cornflakes crumbs; let stand briefly so coating will adhere.
Place chicken in an oiled baking pan.
Line with foil for easy clean up.
Do not crowd pieces (should not touch).
Bake at 400° for 45 minutes or until done.
Crumbs will form a crispy skin.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Easy Meal
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
6 medium potatoes
3 medium onions
3 carrots (optional)
Directions:
Make ground beef into 4 patties.
Place on large piece of aluminum foil each patty separate.
Slice onions and potatoes, placing in layers (sliced carrots optional).
Season with salt and pepper.
Close the foil and bake at 350° to 400° for 45 minutes. Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Quick And Easy Meal
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 small onion, chopped
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen mixed vegetables
salt and pepper
Directions:
Add onion to ground beef, salt and pepper and brown meat.
Add frozen mixed vegetables and enough water to cover mixture.
Bring to boil, then simmer with lid on until done, 20 to 25 minutes. Stir occasionally.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef And Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 c. chopped onions
1 c. diced potatoes
1 c. diced celery
1 c. shredded cabbage
4 c. tomato juice or 2 (1 lb.) cans tomatoes
1/2 c. uncooked rice
3 c. water
pepper
3 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. basil (optional)
1 tsp. thyme (optional)
Directions:
Brown beef and onions in small amount of fat; drain.
Combine remaining ingredients in large kettle.
Add beef and onions. Simmer for 1 hour.
Yields 6 to 8 servings.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: More
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 onion, chopped
salt
pepper
garlic salt
Parmesan cheese
1 (12 oz.) pkg. egg noodles, cooked
1 can tomatoes
1 can creamed corn
1 small can sliced olives
10 slices bacon
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
Directions:
Cook ground beef with onion, salt, pepper and garlic salt. Add tomatoes, creamed corn, olives and tomato sauce.
Mix well. Cook noodles and drain.
Combine noodles with meat mixture.
Stir well.
Place in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Top with strips of raw bacon, which has been cut up.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and return to oven for 5 minutes longer. Serves 10 to 12.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef One Dish Meal
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
1 (8 oz.) pkg. noodles, dried
1 can tomato soup
1 c. sour cream
Velveeta cheese
Directions:
Brown ground beef; add onion and green pepper.
Cook until onion and green pepper are done.
Add tomato soup, dried noodles and sour cream; cover and simmer.
When noodles are done, add Velveeta cheese on top.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Creole Style Lentils
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped carrots
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 large onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. pepper
few drops hot pepper sauce
1 c. lentils, cooked and drained
hot cooked rice (optional)
Directions:
Cook carrots, celery and onion in hot margarine in medium size saucepan until lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes, salt, sugar, pepper, pepper sauce and lentils.
Cover; simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice.
Makes about 5 1/2 cups.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Ma'S Lentils And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. lentils, uncooked
1/2 c. chopped celery, raw
1/2 c. chopped carrot, raw
1/2 c. chopped onion, raw
1/2 c. chopped tomato, raw
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
1 Tbsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
4 c. cooked rice
olive oil
Directions:
Place uncooked lentils in clean pot (not aluminum), cover with water until water is 1 1/2 to 2 inches above level of beans.
Let soak for 2 1/2 to 3 1/2 hours.
Drain lentils and return pot; fill again with water to same level as before.
Bring water to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 1 1/2 to 2 hours with cover.
Add celery, carrot, onion, tomato, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper 1/2 hour before lentils are done cooking.
Stir lentils occasionally during cooking time; add more water if necessary to keep beans covered.
When lentils are done cooking you may mix rice in all at once or individual servings.
If so desired, add a dash of olive oil to each individual serving and mix.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Lentil And Tomato Bake
Ingredients:
2 large carrots
6 large tomatoes
1 c. split lentils
1 small onion
1 bay leaf
2 cloves
1/2 tsp. sea salt
1/4 c. margarine
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Grate carrots and chop tomatoes; set aside.
Wash lentils, removing any small stones.
In large saucepan, combine with 2 cups of water.
Wrap bay leaf around onion and push cloves through leaf into onion.
Add to pan with carrots and tomatoes.
Bring to a boil, stirring.
Lower heat and cover; simmer about 20 minutes. Remove onion; add salt, margarine and parsley.
Stir well.
Spoon into large ovenproof dish.
Dot top with margarine and bake in 375° oven for about 30 minutes.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium carrots
2 medium celery stalks
1 medium onion
3/4 lb. small red potatoes
1 (14 to 16 oz.) can Italian stewed tomatoes
3 c. water
1 c. dry lentils
2 (13 or 14 oz.) cans chicken broth
1 garlic clove
2 Tbsp. olive and salad oil
1 small head escarole
Directions:
Dice carrots, celery and onions.
Cut potatoes into 1/2-inch pieces.
Mince garlic.
In 5-quart Dutch oven over medium high heat, in hot olive oil, cook vegetables until tender.
Add garlic. Cook until brown.
Stir in tomatoes, lentils, broth, potatoes and water.
Over high heat, heat to boiling.
Reduce to low and cover. Simmer for 50 minutes.
Thinly slice escarole.
Just before serving, stir into soup.
Cook until wilted.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Herbed Lentils And Rice
Ingredients:
3 c. water
2 Tbsp. chicken seasoning
3/4 c. dry lentils
3/4 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. brown rice
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
6 oz. Swiss or Jack cheese, shredded
Directions:
Mix all, leaving 2 ounces of cheese to put on top.
Pour into ungreased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Bake, covered, in a 350° oven for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, stirring every 1/2 hour.
Top with remaining cheese and return to oven to melt.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. sifted all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
3/4 c. butter, at room temperature (1 1/2 sticks, no substitute)
1 1/4 c. sugar
3/4 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. lemon extract
1/4 tsp. almond extract
2 large eggs
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients.
Beat butter until light and fluffy.
Gradually beat in sugar until well mixed.
Add extract and eggs and mix thoroughly.
Stir in flour mixture.
Mix well. This will make a soft, sticky dough.
Place in a tight container or roll in foil and season overnight in the refrigerator.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1 stick each unsalted butter and margarine, softened
1/2 c. confectioners sugar
1/2 c. granulated sugar
1 large egg
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 c. coarse white or colored sugar, or a combination
Directions:
Heat oven to 375 degrees.
Coat baking sheets with nonstick spray.
In a large bowl, beat butter, margarine, confectioners and granulated sugar with mixer on low speed until blended.
Increase to high until fluffy and light.
Beat in egg, vanilla, baking powder and salt.
On low, blend in flour.
Roll dough into 1 inch balls.
Roll balls in coarse sugar.
Place about 2 inches apart on baking sheet.
Flatten balls with the bottom of a glass or bottle into 2 inch rounds.
Bake 10 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheets for 10 seconds or so before removing cookies to wire racks to cool completely.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter, softened
1 c. sugar
1 egg
3 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/4 tsp. baking powder
1/8 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg
red or green food coloring (optional)
additional sugar
colored sugar sprinkles (optional)
Directions:
Cream butter; gradually add 1 cup sugar, beating until light and fluffy.
Add egg; beat well.
Combine flour, baking powder, soda, cinnamon and nutmeg; add to creamed mixture, mixing until blended. Tint with food coloring, if desired.
Cover and chill dough.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. softened butter or margarine
1 egg
1 tsp. grated lemon
1 tsp. vanilla extract
2 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
Directions:
Cream the sugar, salt and the butter.
Add to the creamed mixture the egg, grated lemon and vanilla extract.
Sift together the flour and the baking powder; add to mixture.
Roll out on a floured surface and cut into shapes.
Dab with clear Karo and sprinkle on some colored sugar crystals.
Bake at 350° on a lightly greased cookie sheets for 9 to 10 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. soft butter
1 c. oil
1 c. sugar
1 c. powdered sugar
2 eggs
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
4 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cream of tartar
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cream butter, oil and sugars together until fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla.
Beat well.
Add sifted dry ingredients to batter and mix well.
Roll into small balls, then roll in sugar.
Place on ungreased cookie sheet, 2-inches apart and press down with the sugared bottom of a glass.
Bake in 350° oven for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground chuck
1 large onion, chopped
1/2 large green pepper, chopped
3 stalks celery, chopped
1 large can peeled tomatoes, cut up
3 tsp. chili powder
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 small can tomato paste
Directions:
In Dutch oven, put ground chuck, onion, green pepper and celery on medium heat, stirring constantly, until meat is browned. Add cut up tomatoes, chili powder, tomato paste and sugar.
Mix well.
Let mixture come to a boil. Turn stove on low and cook for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add kidney beans and cook 15 minutes longer.
Stir to mix well.
Remove from heat and serve over rice.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil
2 medium onions, chopped
1 medium carrot, diced
2 garlic cloves, minced
10 oz. lean ground beef
2 Tbsp. plus 1 1/2 tsp. mild or hot chili powder
2 tsp. ground cumin
2 cups canned whole Italian tomatoes, coarsely chopped
1 tsp. dried oregano
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1/4 tsp. ground red pepper
4 oz. black beans, cooked and drained
Directions:
In large saucepan, heat oil; add onions and carrot. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, 3-5 minutes, until onions are softened. Add garlic; cook, stirring frequently, 5 minutes, until onions are golden brown.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. diced green pepper
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
1 lb. ground beef
1 tsp. finely chopped beef suet or 1 slice bacon, chopped fine
2 c. canned tomatoes
2 c. red kidney beans, drained (save liquid)
2 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. chili powder, diluted in 2 Tbsp. warm water
4 Tbsp. fat or oil
Directions:
Heat oil. Add onion, garlic, bacon and green pepper.
Saute until golden brown. Add beef and stir until lightly brown. Add remaining ingredients. Cover and bring to a quick boil.
Lower heat and simmer 30 minutes.
Add beans and simmer an additional 15 minutes.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 clove garlic
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 tsp. salt
1 large can kidney beans
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 large can tomatoes
Directions:
Melt butter.
Add garlic and onion until soft.
Add meat and salt; brown.
Add rest of ingredients.
Cover and simmer 1 1/2 hours or more.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 medium onions, chopped
1 can kidney beans, drained
2 (1 lb.) cans tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 green pepper, chopped
2 cloves garlic, crushed
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1 bay leaf
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Brown meat and onion; drain.
Combine everything in crock-pot. Cook on low 8 to 10 hours.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple 'N Oat Bread
Ingredients:
3 c. chopped, pared raw apples
1/2 c. water
1 c. brown sugar, packed
1 tsp. each: baking powder, cinnamon, soda and salt
2 c. sifted flour
1/2 tsp. allspice
1 c. rolled oats (regular)
1/2 c. seedless raisins
1/2 c. chopped nuts
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 c. melted shortening or cooking oil
Directions:
Combine apples, water and 1/2 cup brown sugar.
Cook until apples are almost tender, about 5 minutes.
Cool while preparing remaining ingredients.
Sift together flour, baking powder, soda, salt and spices.
Stir in remaining brown sugar, oats, raisins and nuts.
Add apple mixture, eggs and shortening or oil to dry ingredients; stir just until dry ingredients are moistened.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple Oatmeal Crisp
Ingredients:
4 c. peeled and thinly sliced tart (Granny Smith) cooking apple
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
3 Tbsp. granulated sugar
1/3 c. flour
1 c. rolled oats
1/2 c. firmly packed dark brown sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon or to taste
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. unsalted butter, melted and cooled
Directions:
In a well buttered 9 inch square baking pan, combine apples, lemon juice, and the granulated sugar.
In a bowl combine the flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon, and the salt, add the butter and combine the mixture well.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Apple Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. unsifted flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
2 c. quick cooking rolled oats
1 c. packed light brown sugar
1 c. soft butter
4 apples (3 1/2 c.), peeled and chopped
1 c. chopped nuts
1/2 c. granulated sugar
3 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Sift together flour, soda and salt.
Add oats, brown sugar and butter.
Mix with pastry blender until grainy.
Put half of mixture into lightly greased 15 x 10 x 1-inch pan.
Cover mixture with apples.
Mix nuts and granulated sugar.
Sprinkle half on apples and dot with butter.
Put on remaining mix and sprinkle with nuts.
Bake in slow oven for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until done.
Cut while still warm.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple Oatmeal Breakfast
Ingredients:
2/3 c. uncooked oats (regular or quick)
1 medium apple, cored and finely chopped
2 Tbsp. chopped walnuts
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
dash of cinnamon
Directions:
Cook oats according to package. Stir in apples, nuts, brown sugar and cinnamon. Let stand, covered, for 3 minutes.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Yummy Oatmeal Apple Squares
Ingredients:
1 c. Butter Buds (liquid)
1 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2 Egg Beaters (1/2 c.)
1/3 c. apple juice
2 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. whole wheat flour or white flour
2 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
4 c. quick oats (not instant or old-fashioned)
2 c. peeled and diced green apples
1/2 c. raisins
1 c. granulated sugar
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Spray Pam spray on a 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1-inch pan.
Combine liquid Butter Buds, brown sugar and granulated sugar in a large bowl.
Beat at medium speed until well blended.
Beat in Egg Beaters, apple juice and vanilla.
Combine flour, cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda and nutmeg.
Mix into creamed mixture at low speed until blended.
Stir in oats, apples and raisins with a spoon.
Spread in pan.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes or until brown and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool in pan on cooling rack.
Cut into 2 1/2 x 1 1/2-inch bars.
Makes 3 1/2 dozen.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Homemade Bread
Ingredients:
8 c. warm water
3 pkg. yeast
1 c. powdered milk
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. oil
3 Tbsp. salt
5 lb. flour (plus some)
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in water and powdered milk. Add all other ingredients. Mix well. Knead for at least 10 minutes. Put back in greased bowl and let rise until double, punch down and let rise again.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Easy "No Knead" Yeast Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. salt
1 1/2 Tbsp. oil
4 1/2 c. flour
1 c. warm water
2 pkg. yeast
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in cup of warm water; set aside.
Scald milk, sugar, salt and oil.
Let cool.
Mix yeast mixture and cooled milk mixture.
Stir in flour until well mixed.
Cover, let rise double in bowl, about 45 minutes.
After rising, stir dough a half minute.
Place dough in greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover, let rise double in size, 1 hour.
Bake at 400° for 25 to 30 minutes. Brush with oleo.
Makes 1 loaf.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Homemade Bread
Ingredients:
3 to 4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. oil
1 pkg. yeast
2 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in 1 cup warm water.
Put 1 teaspoon of sugar in yeast water.
Mix flour, salt, 1 teaspoon sugar and oil together.
Combine yeast and flour mixture.
Knead into a soft ball; let set for 1 hour.
Push back down and knead again into small balls.
Place into angel food pan.
Let rise another hour. Cook at 400° for about 20 minutes.
Rub butter over bread when half cooked.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Easy Homemade Bread
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. warm water
3 pkg. dry yeast
6 Tbsp. sugar
4 or 5 tsp. salt
10 c. flour
6 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 eggs
Directions:
Mix yeast with water in a large bowl.
Add sugar, salt, eggs and butter; then add in flour (mixer can be used).
Stir with a spoon until all flour is well mixed in.
Let sit for 1 hour. Grease and flour hands; then divide dough into 3 loaves.
Put in greased pans.
Cover with towel and let sit 40 minutes.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Easy Bread
Ingredients:
4 c. water
4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. oil
2 Tbsp. yeast
1/2 c. sugar
12 c. flour
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in water.
Let stand a few minutes.
Add salt, sugar and oil.
Add flour 4 cups at a time.
After all flour is mixed in, knead 10 minutes.
Let rise 1 hour.
Punch down, then let rise another hour.
Shape into loaves.
Let rise 1 hour.
Bake at 325° for 30 minutes.
Makes 5 medium loaves.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef top round steak
1 1/2 c. broccoli (1-inch size)
3 medium carrots
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion
1 c. frozen peas
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
4 to 6 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Slice beef very thin in bite size strips.
Add cooking oil to preheated hot wok (high heat).
Stir-fry broccoli, carrots and onion in hot oil for 2 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Remove from wok.
Add more oil, if necessary, before stir-frying the beef strips (fry only 1/2 of the portion of beef strips at a time) in hot oil (high heat) for 2 to 3 minutes.
Return all meat to wok. Add peas, water chestnuts and bamboo shoots.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. top round steak, thinly sliced across grain into bite sized strips
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut in 1-inch pieces
3 carrots, bias slices
1 medium onion, cut in thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
1 c. beef broth, water and bouillon
2 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Blanch in boiling water for 2 minutes the broccoli and carrots.
Drain.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef round steak, sliced thin
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut into pieces
3 medium carrots, sliced
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, thawed
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
Directions:
Cook broccoli and carrots about 2 minutes in boiling water; drain.
Mix cornstarch, salt, sugar, soy sauce and sherry; set aside.
Add oil to wok or pan over high heat and stir-fry broccoli, carrots and onions until crisp and tender.
Remove from wok.
Add beef and cook for 2 to 3 minutes.
Remove beef.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
3 c. sliced bottom rump or sirloin
1 c. broccoli
1 c. cauliflower
1 c. carrots
1 c. chopped peppers
1 c. onion, chopped
1/4 c. cashew nuts
1/2 c. mushrooms
1/2 c. teriyaki sauce
1/4 c. Worcestershire
1/4 c. soy sauce
Directions:
Brown meat well in round frying pan or wok.
When done add Worcestershire and soy sauces and all the vegetables.
Cook for about 10 to 15 minutes and add teriyaki sauce.
(You may add more teriyaki than recipe calls for.)
When done, serve over rice or pasta.
M-mmm good!

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless sirloin steak
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. oyster sauce
cooking spray (vegetable)
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 large onion, quartered
3 stalks celery, sliced diagonally
1/2 lb. sliced fresh mushrooms
1 green pepper, cut in strips
1/2 lb. fresh snow peas
1/2 bunch broccoli flowerets
1 can sliced water chestnuts
Directions:
Trim fat
from
steak.
Cut
across
grain into strips. Combine water,
cornstarch, soy sauce, sugar and oyster sauce. Set aside.
Coat wok or skillet with cooking spray and heat on medium-high for 2
minutes.
Add
steak
and
stir-fry about 3 minutes.
Remove meat.
Place onion, celery, mushrooms, pepper and water chestnuts to
pan drippings in wok.
Stir-fry 2 to 3 minutes. Add meat,
broccoli
and snow peas.
Cover and reduce heat to medium.
Simmer
2
to
3
minutes.
Stir in soy sauce mixture.
Cook
on
medium,
stirring constantly until bubbly. Serve over hot rice.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans With Almonds
Ingredients:
3 (14.5 oz.) cans green beans, drained and rinsed
2 cubes beef bouillon
2 c. water
1/2 c. corn oil
1/4 c. chopped onions (optional)
salt and pepper to taste
3/4 c. sliced or slivered almonds, toasted
Directions:
In a large pan, combine beans, bouillon cubes, water, oil and onions.
Bring to a boil on the stove and cook on low heat for 1 hour.
Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Add almonds during last 15 minutes of cooking or use almonds as a garnish when served.
Yield:
8 to 12 servings.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Fresh Green Beans With Almonds
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh green beans
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. melted butter
1 tsp. salt
dash of garlic powder
1/4 c. slivered almonds
Directions:
Stem and wash beans.
Put beans in a pot and cover with boiling water.
Bring to a boil and boil 1 minute; reduce heat. Add seasonings.
Cover and cook for approximately 15 to 20 minutes or until tender.
Drain.
Put in serving dish; drizzle with butter.
Top with almonds.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans With Almonds
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh green beans, cut or left whole
2 c. boiling water
3/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. blanched slivered almonds
1/4 to 1/2 c. butter
Directions:
Place
green beans in kettle of salted water with sugar added. Cook,
covered,
until
barely
tender
(from 10 to 25 minutes). Drain but keep hot for serving.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans With Almonds
Ingredients:
3 pounds fresh green beans (stem ends removed)
1/2 teaspoon butter flavored buds or butter flavored cooking spray
1/8 teaspoon garlic powder
1 1/2 teaspoons crushed dried thyme
2 tablespoons slivered almonds, toasted
Directions:
Bring green bean to a boil in a large covered pot.
Reduce heat and simmer until crisp and tender, 3 to 4 minutes.
Drain. Toss with butter flavored buds, garlic powder and thyme.
Garnish with toasted almonds.
Serve hot.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans Almondine
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. green beans, trimmed
2 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. sliced natural almonds
1 pt. cherry tomatoes, washed and dried
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
In large skillet over high heat, bring 1-inch water to a boil.
Add washed green beans and cook 5 minutes; drain.
Remove beans and wipe out skillet.
In the same skillet over medium-high heat, melt the butter.
Add sliced almonds; cook 2 minutes or until browned, stirring frequently.
Meanwhile, halve the cherry tomatoes.
Add to skillet and cook 3 to 5 minutes, gently pressing with a wooden spoon to release the juices.
Season tomato mixture with salt and pepper.
Cook 5 minutes more or until softened.
Add cooked green beans to the skillet.
Gently toss all ingredients together; cook 1 to 2 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 8 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Tofu
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. tofu, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (firm or extra firm is best)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. vinegar
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. grated ginger
3 Tbsp. peanut or salad oil
1 large carrot, chopped
2 c. chopped broccoli
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. sliced green onions
3 Tbsp. cilantro (optional)
use any vegetables that are your favorites
crispy noodles
Directions:
Place tofu in shallow bowl.
Mix soy, vinegar, cumin, garlic and ginger; drizzle this over tofu and set aside.
Heat oil in wok or large pan over high heat.
Add carrot and stir-fry 1 minute. Add broccoli and cook 2 minutes, then add mushrooms and onions. Reduce heat to medium.
Add tofu mixture and cook, stirring gently until heated through but vegetables are still crisp.
Garnish with cilantro.
Spoon over hot rice and pass the soy sauce and add crispy noodles on top.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Crispy Tofu(Crisp Outside, Soft Inside)
Ingredients:
1 box "regular" tofu
1/4 c. chopped, roasted peanuts
2 medium cucumbers, cubed
2 to 3 Tbsp. vinegar
2 to 3 Tbsp. sugar
1 bunch cilantro, chopped
Directions:
Soak 4 blocks tofu in salted water overnight or 4 hours if cut in cubes.
Cut each block into 9 to 12 cubes, depending on size, and drain.
Dip-fry in hot oil (should be crispy outside and soft inside, not hard).
Dip or pour Peanut Dressing over Crispy Tofu when ready to eat.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Tofu And Veggies
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1/2 c. Sake or white wine
2 Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
4 Tbsp. soy sauce or to taste
2 cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. ginger juice (optional)
1 onion, thinly sliced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. broccoli florets or Chinese cabbage
8 oz. snow peas
1/4 c. roasted cashews or almonds
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
In wok or skillet, bring soy sauce, garlic, ginger and wine to a boil.
Add tofu cubes, cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove tofu and remaining broth from wok or skillet.
Heat oil in wok and stir-fry vegetables over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add remaining broth, tofu and cashews or almonds.
Heat and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Spicy Fried Tofu
Ingredients:
2 lb. tofu
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. each: turmeric, sweet basil, powdered thyme and ground cumin
1/2 to 3/4 tsp. curry
2 cloves garlic, pressed, or 1 tsp. garlic powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 to 1/3 c. Parmesan cheese or nutritional yeast
Directions:
First, press tofu by cutting to 1/2-inch slices and firmly patting out excess water with an absorbent towel.
Cut into small cubes.
Spray Pam on nonstick skillet or wok.
Add tofu; saute on high heat for 5 minutes, turning with spatula.
Reduce heat to medium.
Add turmeric; stir until tofu is yellow all over.
Add the other seasonings, stirring well between each addition. Increase heat.
Add soy sauce, stirring constantly.
Finally, add nutritional yeast or Parmesan cheese; mix well, sauteing until golden brown or until cheese melts.
Good hot or cold.
Serves 4 to 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Flavorful Tofu(Kids Will Eat)
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1 small onion
1 can pasta ready tomatoes - 3 cheese
1/4 c. dry red wine
dash of chili pepper to taste
dash of marjoram to taste
