dash of oregano to taste
dash of black pepper to taste
1/4 c. wheat germ
8 oz. mushrooms, sliced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. brown rice, cooked
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1/2-inch thick slices and allow to dry on paper towels.
Start to cook brown rice.
In large saute pan saute onions in olive oil until translucent.
Add mushrooms, red wine and spices and continue to cook until mushrooms are soft.
Coat tofu with wheat germ by placing wheat germ in shallow dish and gently pressing tofu.
Add tofu to saute, moving vegies aside to place tofu directly on pan.
Pour can of tomatoes over all and gently mix vegies onto top and in with the tomatoes.
Allow to cook, covered, on medium heat for 7 minutes.
Serve with rice.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. olive oil
thyme to taste (optional)
rosemary to taste (optional)
soy sauce or Tabasco to taste
onions
potatoes
use your favorite veggies: turnips, broccoli, cauliflower, garlic, peppers, zucchini, summer squash, mushrooms)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 475°.
Melt oil and butter in roasting pan large enough so that vegetables rest on bottom of pan.
Adjust oil and butter to amount of vegetables.
Using tongs, turn cut sides of longest cooking vegetables down to seal in juices (potatoes, onions, turnips).
Roast 15 minutes.
Toss once or twice.
Add medium cooking vegetables (broccoli, summer squash) and pour soy sauce (or other favorite sauce) to coat.
Roast 15 minutes.
Add mushrooms and any seasonings.
Toss lightly.
Roast 5 to 10 minutes.
Serve with cornbread.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Roasted Winter Vegetables(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 tsp. tarragon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 stalk broccoli (about 3/4 lb.)
1/2 head cauliflower (about 3/4 lb.)
2 small red onions
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°.
Put butter, tarragon, salt and pepper in a shallow roasting pan.
Put pan in oven just long enough to melt butter.
Cut broccoli and cauliflower into florets.
Cut onions into wedges.
Toss onions in butter mixture and roast uncovered, 5 minutes.
Stir in broccoli and cauliflower.
Continue roasting until vegetables are tender, about 25 minutes.
Yields 6 servings.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Roasted Winter Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 tsp. tarragon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 head broccoli (about 3/4 lb.)
1/2 head cauliflower
2 small red onions
Directions:
Place butter and spices into shallow roasting pan in oven just to melt butter. Cut broccoli and cauliflower into florets.
Cut onions into wedges. Toss onions in butter, mix and roast, uncovered, 5 minutes. Stir in remaining veggies. Continue roasting until tender.
Bake at 425° for about 25 minutes.
Other combinations of vegetables are quite yummy.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Oven-Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
10 c. mixed vegetables, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces (try onions, carrots, potatoes, eggplant, mushrooms and zucchini)
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. melted butter
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried or fresh rosemary
1 1/2 tsp. dried or 1 Tbsp. fresh marjoram
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 375°.
Arrange the vegetables in a large oiled baking dish and toss in the oil, butter, garlic and herbs. Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake for 35 minutes.
Uncover and turn the vegetables with a large spoon.
Add salt and pepper and roast at 425° for approximately 30 minutes or until the carrots and potatoes are thoroughly cooked and the edges of the vegetables have browned.
Serves 5.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Roasted Mixed Vegetables
Ingredients:
4 large red skin potatoes, wedged (about 2 lb.)
3 large carrots, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 c.)
3 large parsnips, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 c.)
2 lb. onions, cut into wedges (large)
1 Tbsp. dried rosemary leaves
2 tsp. garlic powder
3 Tbsp. Fleischmann's margarine, melted
Directions:
In a large bowl, toss potatoes, carrots, parsnips and onions with rosemary and garlic.
Drizzle with margarine.
Arrange in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Bake at 450° for 40 to 45 minutes or until fork-tender, stirring constantly.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Classic Chocolate Truffles
Ingredients:
9 oz. milk chocolate, chopped
3/4 c. whipping cream
Directions:
Place cream in a small saucepan over medium heat.
Bring to a boil, stirring constantly with wooden spoon.
As soon as cream reaches boiling point, remove from
heat, add the chopped chocolate and cover the pan.
Leave covered for three minutes to allow chocolate to melt.
Stir the mixture until perfectly blended and smooth.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes to cool and stiffen.
Drop by spoonful on wax paper lined cookie sheet and refrigerate for one hour or until firm.
Form into balls and dip into chocolate.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Truffles
Ingredients:
8 oz. bittersweet chocolate
4 oz. unsalted butter, cut into small cubes
2 egg yolks
2 Tbsp. dark rum, cognac or orange liqueur
unsweetened cocoa
Directions:
Melt chocolate in a bowl over hot water.
Remove bowl from hot water and whisk in butter.
Next, whisk in egg yolks.
Add rum, cognac or liqueur.
Place bowl over cold water and beat vigorously until chocolate is thick and smooth.
Chill until workable.
Form into balls with 2 teaspoons; roll in unsweetened cocoa.
Place on a chilled plate until firm.
Roll in cocoa again and keep chilled in a covered container until served.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Truffles
Ingredients:
1 pkg. semi-sweet chocolate
4 oz. cream cheese, softened
8 oz. tub chocolate nondairy whipped topping, thawed
powdered sugar
finely chopped nuts, toasted coconut, grated semi-sweet chocolate, cookie crumbs or multi colored sprinkles
Directions:
Cook chocolate on High for 2 minutes or until chocolate is almost melted, stirring halfway through heating time.
Stir until chocolate is completely melted.
Stir in cream cheese until smooth.
Cool to room temperature.
Gently stir in whipped topping.
Refrigerate 1 hour.
Shape into 1 inch balls.
Roll in powdered sugar, nuts, coconut, grated chocolate, cookie crumbs or sprinkles.
Store in the refrigerator.
Makes 2 1/2 to 3 dozen.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Truffles
Ingredients:
16 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
16 Tbsp. unsalted butter, softened
6 egg yolks
5 Tbsp. dark rum
3/4 c. confectioners sugar
3/4 c. Dutch cocoa
Directions:
In double boiler, melt chocolate over simmering water.
Beat in softened butter, egg yolks, rum and vanilla with wire whisk. Remove from heat and refrigerate until firm enough to handle (1 hour), keeping tightly covered.
Combine cocoa and confectioners sugar.
Shape chocolate mixture into 1-inch balls and roll in cream and sugar.
Store in airtight container and refrigerate.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Truffles
Ingredients:
6 oz. (1 c.) semi-sweet chocolate
1/4 c. whipping cream
1 tsp. instant coffee, dissolved in 1 Tbsp. warm water or 2 Tbsp. of any liqueur (Kahlua, Grand Marnier, etc.)
2 Tbsp. butter
1 to 2 Tbsp. cocoa powder or other toppings to roll truffles in
Directions:
Combine all, but topping ingredients, into a small saucepan and slowly melt, stirring constantly.
Pour into a bowl and chill until firm.
Using a melon baller, shape into balls and roll into topping mixture.
Place on plate and keep in refrigerator.
Set at room temperature approximately 30 minutes before serving.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 medium avocado, peeled
1 small tomato, quartered
2 Tbsp. lime or lemon juice
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. red pepper
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/3 c. chopped onion
Directions:
Position knife blade in food processor bowl.
Add all ingredients except onion.
Process 1 minute or until lumpy.
Stir in onions.
Yields 2 cups.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
4 avocados, peeled and chopped
2 green onions, chopped
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. dried cilantro or 1 fresh sprig
1 medium tomato, chopped
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, combine avocados, onions, lemon juice, salt, red pepper flakes, garlic powder and cilantro.
Using a fork or potato masher, mix and mash coarsely.
Add most of the tomatoes; stir well. Pour into serving bowl; garnish with remaining tomatoes and sprigs of cilantro.
Serve with tortilla chips.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Make Ahead Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 envelope gelatin
1/4 c. cold water
1/2 c. boiling water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 c. mashed ripe avocado
1/3 c. mayonnaise
3/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. finely minced onion
1 small ripe tomato, seeded and diced (1/3 c.)
Directions:
Sprinkle gelatin over cold water and let stand 5 minutes.
Add 1/2 cup boiling water and stir until dissolved.
Whisk in lemon juice, mashed avocado, mayonnaise and salt.
Stir in minced onion and tomato.
Turn into 3 cup mold or bowl.	Make in a.m. and serve in p.m. and it will not darken.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole Dip
Ingredients:
1/2 small onion
1 clove garlic, cut in half
1 medium avocado, peeled and chopped
1/2 small tomato, peeled and chopped
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. hot sauce
Directions:
Place all ingredients in the food processor and blend until very small chunks of vegetables remain.
You may have to scrape the sides of the bowl a few times to get all of it chopped.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
4 medium avocados, peeled and mashed
1 medium tomato, chopped
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. Tabasco or hot sauce
1/4 c. mayonnaise or sour cream
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in bowl.
Mix together well.
Serve with corn chips or as a salad dressing.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients:
2 (1 oz.) sq. unsweetened chocolate
3/4 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
3 1/2 c. skim milk, divided
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Melt chocolate in a heavy saucepan over low heat.
Stir in sugar and salt.
Gradually add 3 cups milk, stirring constantly with a wire whisk.
Cook over medium heat 5 minutes.
Combine remaining milk and cornstarch; stir well.
Add to saucepan.
Cook 30 minutes or until mixture comes to a boil, stirring frequently. Cook 1 minute, stirring frequently.
Remove from heat; stir in vanilla.
Serve warm or chilled.
Yield:
8 servings (about 167 calories per 1/2-cup).

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
1 c. self-rising flour
2 Tbsp. cocoa
1/2 c. milk
3 Tbsp. melted butter
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. cocoa
1 1/2 c. water or coffee
Directions:
Mix in a 9-inch baking pan the sugar, flour, cocoa and milk. Stir.
Combine sugars and 1/4 cup cocoa and sprinkle over batter. Pour water or coffee over top.
Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes. This makes its own sauce.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Homemade Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1/4 c. cocoa
1/4 c. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. salt
4 c. milk
2 Tbsp. butter
2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
In a heavy saucepan, combine sugar, cocoa, cornstarch, salt. Gradually add milk. Bring to rolling boil over medium heat; boil and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Remove from heat and stir in butter and vanilla. Spoon into individual serving dishes. Chill until ready to serve.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
4 Tbsp. chocolate
1 can milk
dash of salt
1/2 c. flour
1 egg
1 can water
butter
Directions:
Stir the sugar and flour, chocolate and salt together in a skillet and make a small well; add egg and slowly mix into powder mixture.
Turn burner on low heat.
While cooking and stirring, slowly add milk and water.
Cook until thick and bubbly, stirring almost constantly.
Add vanilla and a small amount of butter.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Chocolate Pudding(Yields 2 Cups)
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. milk, scalded (or Lonalac)
6 Tbsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. cocoa
2 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 c. cold milk or Lonalac
Directions:
Scald the milk in the top of a double boiler over direct heat. Mix the cocoa, sugar and add the 1/4 cup cold milk slowly, stirring all the time, to make a smooth paste.
Combine the scalded milk with the other ingredients and cook over hot water, stirring constantly until the pudding thickens.
Remove from the fire and chill before serving.
If you use milk, for each half cup of pudding that you eat, subtract a half a cup of milk from your daily allowance of milk.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) pkg. Stove Top dressing
1 1/4 c. water
1/4 c. white wine
12 carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces
4 to 5 lb. roasting chicken
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Prepare dressing as directed.
Set aside to cool.
Stir in wine.
Blanch carrots 5 minutes in boiling water.
Drain and put in crock-pot.
Stuff chicken with dressing and place in pot over carrots.
Cover pot and set on low for 6 to 8 hours.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Fast Paced Chicken
Ingredients:
4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
1 c. sour cream
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. salsa (mild, medium or hot)
1/8 tsp. white pepper
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. celery salt
Directions:
Place chicken in a glass 9-inch baking dish.
Mix remaining ingredients and pour over chicken.
Refrigerate 8 to 24 hours. Preheat oven to 350° and bake 1 hour.
Good served with rice and a steamed squash medley.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Easy Slow Cooker Chicken
Ingredients:
4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 (10.75 oz.) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10.75 oz.) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (10.75 oz.) can condensed cream of celery soup
1 c. white rice
Directions:
Cut chicken breasts into large chunks. Place the chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of celery soup and the rice in a slow cooker. Cook on high for 3 hours or low for 4 hours.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Easy Chicken And Rice Slow Cooker
Ingredients:
2 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1 c. celery, sliced
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 pounds chicken thighs skinned and fat removed
1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup or cream of chicken
3/4 c. chicken broth
1 1/2 c. instant rice
Directions:
In a slow cooker combine mushrooms, celery, onion dill weed and pepper.
Top with chicken.
Pour soup and broth over chicken. Cover, cook on High 2 1/2 to 3 hours or Low 5 to 6 hours.
If using low turn slow cooker to high heat setting.
Stir uncooked rice into mushroom mixture.
Cover and cook for 10 minutes more.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken In A Pot
Ingredients:
1 (5 lb.) or 2 (3 lb.) roasting chickens
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. white wine
1/2 c. chicken broth
2 tsp. salt
12 small new potatoes, unpeeled
18 baby carrots
18 small white onions
12 medium mushrooms, halved
1/4 tsp. rosemary
1/2 c. chopped celery leaves
6 stalks celery, sliced
Directions:
Truss chicken.
Melt butter in large skillet and brown chicken slowly (about 30 minutes).
Transfer chicken to a large pot.
Pour wine, broth and salt into skillet and bring to a boil.
Stir to get all brown bits.
Pour this over chicken.
Cover and cook over medium heat for 45 minutes.
Remove chicken.
Add vegetables in layers:
first potatoes, second carrots, third celery, then onions and mushrooms.
Sprinkle with rosemary and celery leaves.
Place chicken on top of vegetables, cover and cook for 45 minutes more. Cut up the chicken and arrange with vegetables on platter.
Fill gravy boat with remaining juices.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Sauce For Fish
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Melt butter. Blend in flour, salt and pepper. Gradually stir in milk. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and smooth. Add lemon juice and parsley. Serve over fish.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Butter Baked Fish
Ingredients:
1 lb. catfish fillets
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. (1/4 lb.) butter
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
In a 12 x 8 x 2-inch dish, arrange fillets with thickest, meaty areas to outside edge of dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. In 1-quart casserole dish, place butter. Microwave on High for 1 to 2 minutes until melted. Blend in parsley and lemon juice; pour over fish. Sprinkle paprika over fillets. Preheat oven to 350°. Place casserole dish in oven. Cook 45 to 60 minutes or until fillets are fluffy. Serves 2 to 3 people.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Fish
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. celery seed
1 lb. fish fillet
Directions:
Place butter in baking dish.
Microwave on High to melt butter (45 seconds).
Blend in seasonings.
Coat fish fillets in mixture. Place around in dish.
Cover with wax paper and microwave on High until fish flakes (with fork).
Approximate time is 5 to 6 minutes.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Piquant Sauce For Fish(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or oleo
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1 1/2 tsp. dried parsley flakes
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Place butter in a 1-cup glass measure.
Microwave on Medium-high (roast) for about 1 1/2 minutes, or until melted.
Add mustard, parsley flakes, garlic powder and lemon juice.
Pour sauce over fish to serve.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Baked Fish In Lemon Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. margarine, melted
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. paprika
2 to 3 lb. fresh fish or 1 1/2 lb. fish fillets
1 green pepper, sliced into rings
1 onion, sliced into rings
Directions:
In baking dish, put onion and green pepper on fish.
Pour sauce onto fish.
Cover.
Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1/3 c. sugar
1/2 c. oil
1 Tbsp. salt
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 c. starter
6 c. bread flour
Directions:
Stir all ingredients, except flour.
When mixed, add flour, a little at a time, to other ingredients, mixing well.
Put dough in large greased bowl; turn dough to grease the top.
Cover with foil.
Let rise at room temperature overnight, or for at least 8 hours.
Punch down dough.
Turn out onto floured board and knead. Divide into 3 parts; shape into loaves.
Put in 3 greased loaf pans; brush tops with oil.
Cover with paper towel or plastic wrap.
Let rise an additional 4 to 5 hours.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.
Brush with butter; cool and wrap.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1/4 c. oil
1 Tbsp. salt
1/4 c. sugar
1 c. Starter
1 1/2 c. warm water
6 c. bread flour
Directions:
Combine oil, water, sugar and Starter.
Stir well and add flour.
Place in greased bowl and turn to cover all surfaces with oil. Let rise in warm place. Bowl may be covered with towel or cookie sheet.
Turn dough onto floured surface and knead several times. Shape into loaves or rounds.
Place in greased pans.
Let rise for at least 8 hours. Bake at 350° until brown, about 20 minutes for rounds, 30 minutes for loaves.
May add 1 package of Italian seasoning mix for variety.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. corn oil
1 Tbsp. salt
1 c. starter
1 1/2 c. warm water
6 c. or more plain flour
Directions:
In large bowl make stiff dough of sugar, corn oil, salt, starter, warm water and flour.
In larger greased bowl, put dough mixture and brush top with oil.
Let rise overnight (8 hours or more), covered lightly.
Divide dough into 2 parts and knead each piece on a floured board a few times.
Make into loaves and put in loaf pans with brush with oil to rise.
Let rise 6 to 8 hours, covered lightly.
Bake in bottom rack of oven at 350° for 30 minutes or until golden brown.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. Starter
1/3 c. sugar
2 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. oil
1 1/2 c. warm water
6 c. bread flour
Directions:
In a large bowl, mix all ingredients.
Grease large container; put dough in and turn to grease top.
Cover with foil; let stand overnight.
Do not refrigerate.
Next morning, punch down and divide into 3 parts.
Knead each part on a floured surface 8 to 10 times.
Put in greased loaf pans; brush with oil.
Cover with waxed paper; let rise 4 to 6 hours.
Bake at 325° for 30 to 40 minutes. Brush top with melted butter.
Can be frozen.
If putting bread in pans on workday to rise, it can set all day.
Makes 3 loaves.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 c. oil
1 Tbsp. salt
1 c. Sourdough Starter
1 1/2 c. warm water
6 c. bread flour
Directions:
In a large bowl, mix all the ingredients into a stiff dough. Grease both sides of dough with oil. Cover lightly with foil and allow to stand all day. That night, punch down. Knead 3 or 4 times and divide into 3 loaves.
Lightly knead each loaf 1 to 3 times on a floured surface. Put into greased loaf pans and let rise overnight, covered lightly in oven. The next morning, bake on bottom rack of a 350° oven. Remove and brush with butter, if desired.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Spicy Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chicken wings, cut apart
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. flour
1 tsp. butter
hot sauce to taste
1 c. grease for frying
Directions:
Rinse
chicken	wings.	Add
salt
and	pepper to flour (other seasonings
may
be added if desired) in a bowl.
Heat grease. Coat
chicken
wings
with flour mixture and place in the
grease for about 4 minutes or until done.	Take out wings and place in a bowl.
Add butter to the hot wings and sprinkle hot sauce all over the chicken.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Spicy Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken wings
1 (18 oz.) bottle your favorite barbecue sauce
Directions:
Wash chicken wings, then season with garlic, salt, pepper and lemon-pepper.
Lightly flour chicken wings.
Fry chicken wings until golden brown and almost done.
Put fried chicken in a slow cooker, between high and medium.
Pour barbecue sauce over chicken. Let slow cook for 1 1/2 hours.
Remove chicken wings from slow cooker.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Style Hot Wings
Ingredients:
10 to 20 chicken wings
1 c. Tabasco sauce
1 cube butter or margarine
1 lb. lean ground beef
1 small onion, chopped
4 medium potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
equal amount of sliced carrots
1 can condensed tomato soup
Directions:
Brown and drain meat; add onion.
Spread half of the potatoes and carrots in a baking dish and cover with half of the meat and onion mixture.
Season to taste.
Cover with half of a can of condensed tomato soup.
Layer remaining ingredients in same order, topping with remaining half can of soup.
Bake at 350° for 1 1/2 hours.
Serves 8.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Steve'S Hot Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. Tabasco sauce
1/2 tsp. fresh ground pepper
2 Tbsp. Kraft Original Thick 'N Spicy
2 Tbsp. finely diced jalapeno peppers
3 lb. chicken wings
5 Tbsp. hot sauce
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper**
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and simmer covered for an hour.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. paprika
1 Tbsp. caraway seed
1 Tbsp. dried onion flakes
1 Tbsp. dry mustard
1 Tbsp. grated lemon peel
1 1/2 tsp. dried thyme leaves
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. ground red pepper
3 lb. chicken wings
4 Tbsp. margarine or butter (1/2 stick), melted
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
In a small bowl, mix paprika, caraway seed, onion flakes (crushed), dry mustard, lemon peel, thyme leaves, salt and ground red pepper.
Brush wings with melted butter and lightly pat paprika mixture on wings.
Place wings in a large open roasting pan.
Bake 30 minutes or until tender.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Fast Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef (sirloin), cut in 1/4-inch pieces
2 medium onions, cut in medium pieces
2 medium green peppers, cut in medium pieces
1 stick margarine
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
2 small cans mushroom pieces, drained
juice of 2 lemons with pepper to taste
Minute rice
Directions:
In large frying pan, melt margarine.
Add garlic, onions and peppers.
Cook until onions are beginning to become tender.
Add beef, lemon juice and pepper mixture.
Cover and cook until beef is done.
Cook 2 cups of Minute rice according to directions.
Serve vegetables and meat over rice.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. top round steak, thinly sliced across grain into bite sized strips
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut in 1-inch pieces
3 carrots, bias slices
1 medium onion, cut in thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
1 c. beef broth, water and bouillon
2 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Blanch in boiling water for 2 minutes the broccoli and carrots.
Drain.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef top round steak
1 1/2 c. broccoli (1-inch size)
3 medium carrots
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion
1 c. frozen peas
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
4 to 6 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Slice beef very thin in bite size strips.
Add cooking oil to preheated hot wok (high heat).
Stir-fry broccoli, carrots and onion in hot oil for 2 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Remove from wok.
Add more oil, if necessary, before stir-frying the beef strips (fry only 1/2 of the portion of beef strips at a time) in hot oil (high heat) for 2 to 3 minutes.
Return all meat to wok. Add peas, water chestnuts and bamboo shoots.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef round steak, sliced thin
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut into pieces
3 medium carrots, sliced
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, thawed
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
Directions:
Cook broccoli and carrots about 2 minutes in boiling water; drain.
Mix cornstarch, salt, sugar, soy sauce and sherry; set aside.
Add oil to wok or pan over high heat and stir-fry broccoli, carrots and onions until crisp and tender.
Remove from wok.
Add beef and cook for 2 to 3 minutes.
Remove beef.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Quick Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. sliced onion
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. sliced carrots
1 c. chopped broccoli
1 minced clove garlic or 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. minced ginger or 1/2 tsp. powdered ginger
1/2 to 1 lb. lean meat (beef, chicken, pork or shrimp, cut in slivers
3/4 c. broth or water and chicken or beef bouillon
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Heat skillet to medium-high heat.
Add oil and when sizzling hot, add meat, vegetables, garlic and ginger and stir-fry until meat is done and vegetables are tender-crisp.
Blend cornstarch with chicken broth or with bouillon and water.
Stir into meat and vegetable mixture.
Add soy sauce and reduce heat.
Cook for 5 more minutes.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Tomatoes-Mozzarella Salad
Ingredients:
3 med. tomatoes, sliced
1/2 lb. skim Mozzarella Cheese, sliced
3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1/3 cup olive oil
3 Tbsp. chopped parsley
3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 Tbsp. finely chopped fresh basil
dash of salt and pepper
Directions:
Layer tomatoes and cheese in shallow dish. In small jar with a tight lid, place oil, vinegar, parsley, onion, basil, salt and pepper. Cover and shake well. Pour over tomatoes and cheese. Cover and refrigerate several hours, occasionally spooning dressing over tomatoes salad.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Mozzarella With Tomatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh Mozzarella
3 ripe tomatoes
2 tsp. oregano
4 Tbsp. olive oil
freshly ground black pepper
10 fresh basil leaves, chopped
salt to taste (optional)
sliced black olives (optional)
Directions:
Slice Mozzarella and tomatoes.
Arrange by alternating overlapping layers on a serving platter.
Sprinkle oregano, black pepper and salt.
Drizzle olive oil.
Top with basil leaves.
Let sit 1/2 hour before serving.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Layered Mozzarella And Tomato Salad
Ingredients:
4 large ripe tomatoes, cut into 1/4-inch slices
2 lb. fresh Mozzarella cheese, cut into 1/4-inch slices
1/4 c. chopped fresh basil
1/4 c. chopped parsley
1/2 c. olives
olive oil
red wine vinegar
freshly ground black pepper to taste
Directions:
On a large serving platter, alternate overlapping slices of tomato and Mozzarella cheese.
Sprinkle basil, parsley and black olives over all.
Drizzle vinaigrette over salad and grind black pepper on generously.
Serve at room temperature.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Tomatoes With Mozzarella
Ingredients:
tomatoes
Mozzarella
basil
salt and pepper
extra virgin olive oil
Directions:
Layer slices of tomatoes and Mozzarella.
Sprinkle with chopped fresh basil, salt and freshly ground pepper.
Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Tomato-Mozzarella Salad
Ingredients:
3 medium tomatoes, sliced
1/2 lb. part skim Mozzarella cheese, thinly sliced
1/3 c. safflower oil
3 Tbsp. red vinegar
3 Tbsp. chopped parsley
3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 Tbsp. finely chopped fresh basil or 1/2 tsp. dried basil
dash of salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Layer tomatoes and cheese in shallow dish.
In small jar with tight fitting lid, place oil, vinegar, parsley, onion, basil, salt and pepper.
Cover and shake well.
Pour over tomatoes and cheese. Cover and refrigerate several hours, occasionally spooning dressing over tomato salad.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Ganache
Ingredients:
2 c. heavy cream
4 Tbsp. unsalted butter
4 Tbsp. granulated sugar
6 oz. unsweetened chocolate
4 oz. white chocolate
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
Directions:
Heat cream, butter and sugar in a 2 1/2-quart saucepan over medium heat.
Stir to dissolve sugar.
Bring to a boil.
Place the semi-sweet, unsweetened and white chocolate in a steel bowl.
Pour the boiling cream mixture over chocolates.
Let stand 5 minutes. Stir until smooth.
Can put in 1 to 2 teaspoons vanilla, pecans or orange rind (optional).
Refrigerate.
Cut into bite-size pieces.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Ganache
Ingredients:
1 c. heavy cream
10 oz. semi-sweet or bittersweet chocolate, chopped (2 c.)
Directions:
Gently warm the cream in a small saucepan over medium heat until small bubbles begin to appear at the edges.
Remove from heat.
Stir in chocolate until mixture is smooth and the chocolate has melted completely.
Do not stir so vigorously that bubbles form.
If there are any visible lumps, strain the mixture through a fine mesh sieve.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Sour Cream Ganache Frosting
Ingredients:
4 (3 oz.) bars bittersweet chocolate (Lindt-Excellence recommended)
1 2/3 c. sour cream, at room temperature
Directions:
In a double boiler set over hot water or in a microwave on High power, stirring every 10 seconds, melt the chocolate.
Remove from the heat and add the sour cream.
Stir with a rubber spatula until uniform in color.
If the pan feels warm, transfer to a bowl.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Candy
Ingredients:
3 c. sugar
1/4 c. cocoa
1 stick butter
2/3 c. cream
Directions:
Mix and bring to boil.
Cook 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat; add 1 teaspoon vanilla.
Set in sink of cold water and stir until thick enough to pour into buttered dish.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Dipped Chocolate Candy
Ingredients:
2 lb. powdered sugar
1 stick margarine, melted
2 c. chopped pecans
1 can Eagle Brand milk
1 can coconut
1 tsp. vanilla
2 pkg. chocolate chips
1/2 block paraffin
Directions:
Work all but last
two
ingredients
together
and make into balls (for Easter I make
mine the shape of Easter eggs). Melt chocolate chips and 1/2
block paraffin in double boiler. Dip candy, using toothpick, ice pick
or two tine fork.
Drain and put on wax paper.
I find it works better to make my candy at night and dip it in the morning.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
1 (5 to 6 lb.) Boston butt
salt
1 tsp. chili sauce
1 tsp. celery seed
1 c. catsup
1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. brown sugar
1 c. water
Directions:
Cook pork in lightly salted water over low heat 2 to 2 1/2 hours.
Drain, reserving 1 cup broth.
Cut pork into thin slices and place in a large shallow baking pan.
Combine salt, reserved broth and remaining ingredients.
Mix well and pour over pork slices.
Bake at 325° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
3 lb. pork, cubed
2 c. onions, chopped
3 green bell peppers, chopped
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. vinegar
6 oz. can tomato paste
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in slow cooker; cover and cook on high 8 hours. Shred meat with fork. Mix into sauce and heat through. Serve on hamburger/sandwich buns with grated cheese and cole slaw on top.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Delicious Pork
Ingredients:
2 lb. boneless pork loin
1/2 c. butter
salt and pepper to taste
3/4 lb. Swiss cheese, grated
2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
2 Tbsp. whipping cream
1/4 c. apple juice
3 1/2 Tbsp. whipping cream
parsley to garnish
Directions:
Cut pork into 1 1/2-inch slices.
Flatten slightly into a rounded shape.
Brown pork in butter; about 5 minutes per side. Season with salt and pepper and bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes in a well-greased pan.
Pour off fat.
Turn oven up to 500°.
Mix cheese, mustard and 2 tablespoons whipping cream in bowl.
Spread mixture over pork and bake at 500° for 3 to 5 minutes or until topping bubbles.
Remove pork from pan and keep warm.
In the pan, the pork was cooked in, mix apple juice and 3 1/2 tablespoons of whipping cream.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly and scraping the bottom and sides of the pan.
Cook 3 to 5 minutes, until sauce is slightly thickened.
Pour over pork and sprinkle with parsley.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
4 to 5 lb. pork roast
2 medium onions, sliced
salt and pepper
1 c. hot water
1 small bottle barbecue sauce
Directions:
Put one slice onion in bottom of slow cooker.
Top with roast and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Arrange remaining onions on roast and add water.
Cook on low 8 to 10 hours or until tender. Discard most of juices.
Break pork into pieces, removing fat. Pour barbecue sauce over pork and stir.
Let heat through, then serve over buns.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Pork Barbecue
Ingredients:
1 (4 to 6 lb.) Pork Roast
1 qt. Canned Tomatoes
1/2 c. Vinegar
2 1/2 oz. Worcestershire Sauce
1 Tbsp. Sugar
2 tsp. Salt
2 tsp. Black Pepper
1/2 tsp. Red Pepper
1 small finely chopped Onion
Directions:
Trim fat off meat. Mix other ingredients in bottom of a large crockpot; add meat. Cook on high for 4 hr., then reduce to low and continue to cook for 4-5 hrs. more. Take meat out and shred. Return meat to crockpot (leave other ingredients in crockpot meat will absorb juices after being shredded) and keep warm until serving time. If there is too much liquid on the meat discard some. May be frozen. May also be made with venison instead of pork.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
3 c. self-rising meal
2 1/2 c. buttermilk
1/2 c. salad oil
3 eggs, beaten
1 large onion, grated
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. cream-style corn
1/2 c. chopped jalapeno chili peppers
1 1/2 c. yellow cheese, grated
1/4 lb. bacon or more, fried and crumbled
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 c. pimentos, chopped
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together well. Bake at 400° for about 35 minutes or until done.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. cornmeal
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs
1 c. buttermilk
1 c. mild cheddar cheese, grated
1 c. cream style corn
1/3 c. Wesson oil
3 whole jalapeno peppers, cut up
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients. Add buttermilk. Add 1 egg at a time. Stir in corn. Fold in jalapeno peppers, and cheese. Heat oil in baking dish until very hot. Pour hot oil into batter and stir. Then pour batter into baking dish. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Seasoned Cornbread
Ingredients:
3 c. cornbread mix
3 eggs, beaten together
2 1/2 c. sweet milk
1/2 c. jalapeno peppers, cut up
1 c. corn (small can creamed corn)
1 1/2 c. grated cheese
1/2 c. salad oil
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 large onion
Directions:
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Cook all at one time.
Cut in pieces and keep in freezer, if desired.
Heat and eat.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
3 c. cornbread mix
2 1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. salad oil
3 eggs, beaten
1 large chopped onion
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. cream-style corn
1/2 c. finely chopped jalapeno peppers
1 1/2 c. sharp Cheddar cheese
1/2 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
1 garlic clove (optional)
Directions:
Put cornbread mix in a large bowl; add milk and stir.
Add other ingredients in order given.
Bake in 3 greased 8 x 8 x 2-inch pans at 400° for about 35 minutes until done.
This freezes well.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
3 c. cornmeal
2 1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. salad oil (vegetable oil)
3 eggs
1 large onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 can cream-style corn
1/2 c. finely chopped jalapeno (fresh or canned)
1 1/2 c. sharp cheese, shredded
1/4 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
1/4 c. pimientos, chopped
1/2 clove garlic, chopped fine
Directions:
Put cornmeal in large bowl, add milk and eggs and stir well. Add all other ingredients as given in order.
Bake in 3 greased 8 x 8 x 2-inch pans at 400°, about 35 minutes or until done.
Can also be baked in muffin pans.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef And Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef or turkey
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 can tomato soup
3/4 c. water
3 potatoes, sliced
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Cook meat and onion.
Drain.
Layer 1/2 of the potatoes in a 9 x 13-inch dish, then layer 1/2 of the meat mixture, followed by 1/2 cup of cheese.
Top with remaining potatoes, then rest of meat mixture.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Ground Beef Bake
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 Tbsp. minced green pepper
1 can golden mushroom soup
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
1 small onion, sliced thin
Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Brown ground beef in skillet, stirring until crumbly; drain. Add green pepper, soup, salt and pepper; set aside.
Layer potatoes and onion in greased casserole.
Spoon ground beef mixture over layers.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake for 5 minutes longer.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Ground Beef Bake
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. minced green pepper
2 cans golden mushroom soup
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
4 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
1 medium onion
Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Brown ground beef in skillet, stirring until crumbly.
Drain. Add green pepper, soup, salt and pepper.
Set aside.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Beef And Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 can tomato soup
1 small onion, chopped
2 c. cooked green beans or other vegetables
5 servings instant potatoes
Directions:
Brown ground beef and onion in skillet.
Drain off grease. Add tomato soup and ground beef; mix together.
Put in 2-quart casserole dish.
Put green beans on top of beef.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef And Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
1 can mushrooms
1 lb. ground beef
3/4 c. boiling water
1 small onion, finely chopped
1 can cream of mushroom soup
4 medium potatoes, sliced thin
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Brown beef and onions; drain.
Mix all ingredients together. Bake at 350° for 40 minutes to 1 hour.
Extra water may be added, if needed.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. chicken breast, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1 tsp. chicken bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. chili powder
2 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1/2 tsp. cumin
1 (16 oz.) can chopped tomatoes, drained
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. chopped celery (optional)
3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
2 Tbsp. dry red wine
1/8 tsp. red pepper
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
4 (6-inch) tortillas
1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
2 jalapeno peppers, finely chopped
Directions:
Filling:
In skillet combine first 15 ingredients.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat.
Cover tightly and simmer for 15 minutes. Uncover and cook for 5 minutes.
Remove from skillet.
Set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. shredded chicken
2 c. cream of mushroom soup
1 c. milk or 1/2 c. sour cream
3 cans green chiles
10 to 12 flour or corn tortillas
2 c. grated cheese
1 chopped onion
Directions:
Combine meat, salt and pepper.
Mix soup with milk or sour cream and chiles in saucepan.
Heat a small skillet with oil to hot.
Heat each tortilla just to soften.
Dip each tortilla in sauce and place a small spoonful in tortilla.
Add some chicken, onion and cheese; roll up.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas
Ingredients:
2 cans green chilies, seeded and chopped
1 large clove garlic
2 tsp. vegetable oil
1 can whole tomatoes, drained, 1/2 c. liquid reserved
2 c. chopped onion
1/2 tsp. oregano, crumbled
3 c. shredded, cooked chicken breast (about 15 oz.)
1 c. reduced fat sour cream
3/4 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
12 flour tortillas
Directions:
Saute chilies and garlic in oil, in large nonstick skillet, over medium-high heat until soft.
Add tomatoes, breaking up, reserved liquid, onion and oregano.
Simmer 30 minutes until thick.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas
Ingredients:
1/2 c. salad oil
8 flour tortillas
1 c. chopped onion
1 large clove garlic, minced
1 can black bean or bean with bacon soup
2 c. shredded cooked, boneless breast chicken
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. ground cumin
1 can (4 oz.) chopped green chilies, drained
1 jar (8 oz.) taco sauce
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In 8-inch skillet over medium heat in hot oil, cook onion and garlic until tender, stirring occasionally.
Stir in soup, chicken, water, cumin and chilies.
Heat through.
Butter tortillas, wrap in foil and heat in 350° oven for approximately 10 minutes.
Spoon about 1/3 cup soup mixture onto each tortilla; roll up.
Arrange tortillas in 12 x 8-inch baking dish.
Pour taco sauce evenly over enchiladas.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Cover with foil.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes, uncover, bake 5 more minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada
Ingredients:
1 lb. cooked chicken, shredded
1 large can tomatoes in sauce, cut up
1/2 tsp. garlic or 1 clove, crushed
1/2 tsp. cumin
4 to 6 oz. Monterey Jack cheese, shredded
1 doz. corn tortillas, thin style
1/2 c. water
1 (4 oz.) can green chilies
1 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. chili powder
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Mix chicken, 1/2 cup sour cream and most of the cheese; set aside.
In
large
frying pan, saute onion and garlic in 1 tablespoon
oil
until
translucent.
Add
tomatoes,
chilies, water and
spices.
Simmer to taste with more spices.
Put 1/2 cup sauce
in
with
chicken
mixture.
Then
add 1/2 cup sour cream to
sauce.
Put
approximately 2 tablespoons chicken on each tortilla.
Roll and place in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
When all 12 tortillas are
in
the pan, pour rest of sauce over top and sprinkle with
leftover
cheese.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes, until hot and bubbly.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Tofu
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. tofu, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (firm or extra firm is best)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. vinegar
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. grated ginger
3 Tbsp. peanut or salad oil
1 large carrot, chopped
2 c. chopped broccoli
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. sliced green onions
3 Tbsp. cilantro (optional)
use any vegetables that are your favorites
crispy noodles
Directions:
Place tofu in shallow bowl.
Mix soy, vinegar, cumin, garlic and ginger; drizzle this over tofu and set aside.
Heat oil in wok or large pan over high heat.
Add carrot and stir-fry 1 minute. Add broccoli and cook 2 minutes, then add mushrooms and onions. Reduce heat to medium.
Add tofu mixture and cook, stirring gently until heated through but vegetables are still crisp.
Garnish with cilantro.
Spoon over hot rice and pass the soy sauce and add crispy noodles on top.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Crispy Tofu(Crisp Outside, Soft Inside)
Ingredients:
1 box "regular" tofu
1/4 c. chopped, roasted peanuts
2 medium cucumbers, cubed
2 to 3 Tbsp. vinegar
2 to 3 Tbsp. sugar
1 bunch cilantro, chopped
Directions:
Soak 4 blocks tofu in salted water overnight or 4 hours if cut in cubes.
Cut each block into 9 to 12 cubes, depending on size, and drain.
Dip-fry in hot oil (should be crispy outside and soft inside, not hard).
Dip or pour Peanut Dressing over Crispy Tofu when ready to eat.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Tofu And Veggies
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1/2 c. Sake or white wine
2 Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
4 Tbsp. soy sauce or to taste
2 cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. ginger juice (optional)
1 onion, thinly sliced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. broccoli florets or Chinese cabbage
8 oz. snow peas
1/4 c. roasted cashews or almonds
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
In wok or skillet, bring soy sauce, garlic, ginger and wine to a boil.
Add tofu cubes, cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove tofu and remaining broth from wok or skillet.
Heat oil in wok and stir-fry vegetables over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add remaining broth, tofu and cashews or almonds.
Heat and serve.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Spicy Fried Tofu
Ingredients:
2 lb. tofu
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. each: turmeric, sweet basil, powdered thyme and ground cumin
1/2 to 3/4 tsp. curry
2 cloves garlic, pressed, or 1 tsp. garlic powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 to 1/3 c. Parmesan cheese or nutritional yeast
Directions:
First, press tofu by cutting to 1/2-inch slices and firmly patting out excess water with an absorbent towel.
Cut into small cubes.
Spray Pam on nonstick skillet or wok.
Add tofu; saute on high heat for 5 minutes, turning with spatula.
Reduce heat to medium.
Add turmeric; stir until tofu is yellow all over.
Add the other seasonings, stirring well between each addition. Increase heat.
Add soy sauce, stirring constantly.
Finally, add nutritional yeast or Parmesan cheese; mix well, sauteing until golden brown or until cheese melts.
Good hot or cold.
Serves 4 to 8.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Tofu Fried Rice
Ingredients:
4 c. baked rice
2 Tbsp. water
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 c. diced onion (green)
1 c. diced celery
1 1/2 c. bean sprouts
1 c. diced red pepper
1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 recipe OVEN-FRIED TOFU, diced
Directions:
Saute garlic
and
green
onion
in water until tender. Stir in celery
and
cook 2 to 3 minutes.
Stir in sprouts and red pepper and
cook 1 to 2 minutes.
Stir in remaining ingredients and remove from heat.
Serve hot with soy sauce.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Poppers
Ingredients:
1 dozen jalapeno peppers
1- 8 oz. pkg. cream cheese
1-1/2 c. self-rising flour
1-1/2 c. canola oil
water
Directions:
Wash peppers and slice in half lengthwise removing all seeds, being careful not to rub your eyes and wash your hands thoroughly when done.
Stuff each pepper half thoroughly with cream cheese. In med saucepan heat oil on med-high heat until oil is hot.
In a med size bowl mix all of flour with enough water to make batter consistency thick enough to cling to peppers.
Place poppers 6 at a time in hot oil.
Let cook until crisp turning over to cook both sides.
(New oil will not allow batter to brown as well.)
Remove cooked peppers from oil and drain on paper towels.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Poppers
Ingredients:
fresh jalapeno peppers
Monterey Jack cheese, shredded
1/2 c. milk
1 egg
3/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
oil
Directions:
Slice open one side of pepper.
Clean out seeds, depending on taste.
Fill with cheese.
Mix milk, egg, flour and salt.
Beat into batter.
Heat oil.
Dip into batter.
Deep fry.
Drain on paper towel.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Doris' Jalapeno Pepper Poppers
Ingredients:
10 medium fresh jalapeno peppers
4 oz. cream cheese, softened
10 bacon strips, halved
Directions:
Cut peppers in half; remove seeds. Stuff with 2 tablespoons of cream cheese. Wrap with slice of bacon and secure with toothpick. Place on broiler rack that has been coated with nonstick spray. Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes or until bacon is crisp.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Jalapeno Appetizer
Ingredients:
1 small can jalapeno peppers, chopped and rinsed
1 1/2 lb. grated medium sharp Cheddar cheese
1 1/2 lb. Monterey Jack cheese
5 well-beaten eggs
Directions:
Put grated cheese in buttered 9 x 13-inch pan.
Pour peppers on top.
Pour beaten eggs over entire pan.
Bake at 300° for 45 minutes.
Serve warm or cold.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno-Pimento Squares
Ingredients:
4 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
4 eggs, beaten
3 Tbsp. chopped and seeded jalapeno peppers
1 (2 oz.) jar pimentos, drained and chopped
1 Tbsp. minced onions
Directions:
Combine all; stir well.
Spread mixture in lightly greased 8-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.
Let set 10 minutes.
Cut in squares.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, coarsely chopped
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
2 medium firm red tomatoes (3/4 lb.)
2 medium zucchini (3/4 lb.)
1/4 tsp. basil (fresh if available)
1/4 tsp. oregano (fresh if available)
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. Italian bread crumbs
1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1/4 tsp. paprika (optional)
cooked pasta or rice
Directions:
In heavy skillet (with metal handle) heat oil.
Add onion and saute until golden.
Add garlic and cook until slightly brown. Stir in tomatoes.
Cook, stirring occasionally, for 2 minutes.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
5 small zucchini (approximately 1 lb.)
1/2 tsp. each: salt, pepper and paprika
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese, grated
4 Tbsp. butter, melted
Directions:
Scrub but do not peel zucchini; trim ends.
Cut the zucchini into 2-inch lengths, then cut each length into quarters, lengthwise.
Bring zucchini to a boil in salted water to cover; simmer until tender, but not soft.
Drain thoroughly.
Butter a 9-inch ovenproof dish; arrange zucchini in a layer over the bottom.
Sprinkle with salt, pepper, paprika and cheese.
Pour the melted butter over all.
Place under the broiler until cheese is melted.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
1/2 c. grated parmesan cheese
6 medium zucchini, sliced
2/3 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 large clove garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. each of salt, pepper, oregano and rosemary
4 c. peeled tomatoes
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Heat oil in a skillet and add zucchini, onion, parsley and the spices.
Saute mixture over medium heat, stirring often until zucchini is done but still crisp and tender.
Toss in chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Turn mixture into a serving dish and sprinkle with the parmesan cheese.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Parmesan Squares
Ingredients:
1 lb. zucchini (about 4 c. shredded)
1 onion
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1 c. Bisquick
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 eggs
1/2 c. oil
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Butter a 9 x 13-inch rectangular pan. Shred zucchini and onion.
Combine all ingredients, except eggs and oil.
Beat together eggs and oil and stir into zucchini mixture.
Pour into pan and smooth top.
Bake until edges are brown and center sets, about 25 minutes.
Cool 10 minutes before cutting into 48 squares.
Serve warm or at room temperature.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
3 zucchini, cut in chunks
1/2 lb. Mozzarella cheese, cut in chunks
dash of salt
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Pour oil in bottom of 8-inch baking dish.
Add zucchini and Mozzarella cubes, salt and parsley.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Cover with bread crumbs.
Dot with butter.
Bake uncovered 45 to 50 minutes or until golden brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Best Spinach Dip Ever
Ingredients:
2 1/3 cup fat free/light sour cream
1 pkg. Dry onion soup mix (1.8 oz; Lipton's)
4 oz can drained and chopped water chestnuts
10 oz pkg frozen chopped spinach (thaw, drain and squeeze all the water out)
1 oz pkg of light/no fat cream cheese
1 pound round loaf sour dough bread (or similar)
Directions:
Mix sour cream, Ranch Dressing mix, onion soup mix, water chestnuts, cream cheese, and chopped spinach in a bowl.
Chill for 6 hours or overnight. Remove the top from the bread and make a bowl. Cut the carved-out bread top into bite-sized cubes for dining. Serve in bread bowl.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained (or you can use 1 can spinach, drained)
1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing or Miracle Whip Light
1 c. sour cream
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/4 c. green onion slices
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
Directions:
Combine ingredients; mix well. Chill and serve with assorted vegetable dippers.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 C. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 C. sour cream
1/2 C. cottage cheese
1 Tbsp. dried onion flakes
1 tsp. lemon juice
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Chill for two hours. Return to room temperature before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
8 oz. sour cream
1 c. mayonnaise
1 tsp. celery salt
1/2 tsp. dill weed
1/4 tsp. onion salt
1/4 c. chopped green onions
3 c. frozen cut leaf spinach, thawed and drained
8 oz. can water chestnuts, drained and finely chopped
3 Tbsp. chopped red pepper
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Mix well.
Stir in onions, spinach, water chestnuts and red pepper.
Cover and refrigerate until flavor blends.
Serve with vegetables or assorted crackers.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. sour cream
2 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise (1 c. makes it stiff)
2 green onions, chopped
1 can water chestnuts, chopped fine
1 pkg. Knorr dry vegetable soup
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, cooked and drained (squeeze dry)
Directions:
Mix and refrigerate.
Use dark bread or French bread for bowl and to dip.
A loaf of vegetable bread is very good.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
5 oz. all-purpose white flour
4 to 6 c. cooking apples (1 1/2 to 2 lb.), peeled, cored and thinly sliced
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. butter
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. lemon rind, grated
Directions:
Combine 1/2 cup sugar and 1 ounce flour in mixing bowl. Squeeze lemon juice over apple slices.
Toss apples with sugar mixture.
Put
in
ovenproof
baking
dish.
Thoroughly
mix butter,
remaining
flour
and
cinnamon.
Add
lemon rind and remaining
1/2 cup of sugar.
Sprinkle mixture over apples and bake
in
oven
at 350° for 30 minutes or until golden.
Serve warm with ice cream.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Crumbled Apples
Ingredients:
6 tart apples
1/4 c. flour
3/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
4 Tbsp. butter
3/4 c. hot water
Directions:
Quarter apples and place in buttered pan.
Mix flour, sugar, cinnamon, butter and water.
Pour over apples and bake at 350°. Can be served hot or cold or with milk.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. oats
1 c. packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
3 to 4 green apples, peeled and sliced to make 6 c.
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. white sugar
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix together 1 1/2 cups flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon and melted butter.
Press 1/2 of mixture in bottom of a 9 x 12-inch greased baking dish.
In a large bowl, combine sliced apples with 1 tablespoon flour and 1 tablespoon sugar.
Turn into crust. Sprinkle with remaining half of mixture.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour. Serve warm with whipped cream or ice cream, if desired.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Crumbled Apple Dessert
Ingredients:
4 to 6 apples, sliced
2/3 c. light brown sugar
dash of cinnamon
3 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. cold water
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 c. flour
1/2 c. butter
pinch of salt
Directions:
Slice
apples
in deep baking dish.
Cover with 2/3 cup brown sugar,
cinnamon
and butter.
Sprinkle cold water over all. Combine
1/2
cup brown sugar, flour, 1/2 cup butter and salt to form
a crumbly mixture.
Put on top of apples.
Bake for 30
to 40
minutes or until apples are tender and crust a golden brown.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
3/4 c. nonfat dry milk
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 c. oleo
3 c. sliced apples
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients. Cut in oleo until mixture is crumbly. Arrange apples in shallow, well-greased pan. Sprinkle apples with dry mixture and cover baking dish. Bake at 350° about 30 minutes or until apples are tender. Remove cover and bake a few minutes longer until crumbs are brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: 6-Cup Salad("Quik-N-Ez")
Ingredients:
1 c. pineapple tidbits
1 c. mandarin oranges
1 c. shredded coconut
1 c. fruit cocktail
1 c. mini marshmallows
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.
Mix well.
Chill as long as possible or overnight.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
3 eggs, well beaten
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
2 c. low-fat cottage cheese (small curd)
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
3 Tbsp. shredded Swiss cheese
1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/4 tsp. instant minced onion
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
vegetable cooking spray
Directions:
Combine first 10 ingredients; mix well.
Pour into a 9-inch pie plate coated with cooking spray.
Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes or until set.
Yields 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Three Greens Salad
Ingredients:
3 1/2 c. uncooked pasta
4 c. trimmed arugula
2 c. thinly sliced radicchio
2 medium heads Belgian endive, quartered
1 (19 oz.) can chickpeas
6 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
1/4 c. low-salt chicken broth
2 Tbsp. virgin olive oil
1/4 c. finely chopped fresh flat leaf parsley
2 oz. shaved Parmigiano Reggiano cheese
Directions:
Combine first 5 ingredients in a large bowl; toss well. Combine vinegar, broth and oil; stir well with a whisk. Pour over pasta mixture; toss gently to coat. Sprinkle with parsley and cheese. Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Inez'S Quik-N-Easy Salad
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower
1 bunch broccoli
1 green pepper
1 red onion
2 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. vinegar
1/8 tsp. salt
1 bottle Ranch Dressing
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and let set over night.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Make Ahead Salad
Ingredients:
1 head lettuce, torn up
1/2 c. green pepper
1 can chestnuts, sliced
2 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. sugar
Cheddar cheese, shredded or cubed
Bac*Os
1/2 c. celery
1/2 c. onion
1 box frozen peas (do not thaw)
1 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
Salad Supreme
Directions:
Layer as written.
Cover tightly and put in refrigerator overnight using a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Taco Seasoning Mix
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. dried minced onion
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
3/4 tsp. crushed beef bouillon cube
1/4 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
dash onion powder
1 banana, cut into pieces
1 orange, cut into quarters
2 cups orange juice
4 ounces Cool Whip
1-1/2 cups ice
1 (12 ounce) can pineapple juice
3 cups sugar
1/2 cup Smuckers orange marmalade
1/4 cup lemon juice
1 btl (32 ounce) orange-flavor seltzer water
1 pint orange sherbet
1 orange, thinly sliced
1/2 cup maraschino cherries
Directions:
Add ice cubes before serving.
(12 servings.)

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Tex Mix
Ingredients:
1 pkg. taco seasoning mix
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. sour cream
2 cans jalapeno bean dip (I use refried beans)
2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
2 or 3 green onions, sliced thin
1 large can pitted black olives, sliced
4 tomatoes, chopped (I use canned chopped tomatoes, drained)
Directions:
Mix taco seasoning mix, mayonnaise and sour cream; set aside. Spread bean dip in 9 x 13-inch pan.
Spread taco mix on top of bean dip.
Layer onions, olives and tomatoes and top with shredded cheese.
Refrigerate.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Taco Seasoning Mix
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. instant onion
2 Tbsp. green pepper flakes
1 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 tsp. instant minced garlic
3/4 tsp. dried oregano
1 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper
1 1/2 tsp. ground cumin
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a bowl and blend thoroughly.
(It is important that the ingredients be evenly distributed.)
Divide on three 6-inch squares of aluminum foil.
Fold foil to make airtight packages.
Label.
Store in cool dry place.
Keeps up to 6 months.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Taco Seasoning Mix
Ingredients:
4 tsp. instant minced onions
2 to 3 tsp. chili powder
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. crushed red pepper
1 tsp. minced garlic
1 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Mix all ingredients in covered jar.
Use within 6 months. Ingredients may be increased proportionally.
Makes enough for about 20 tacos.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Taco Seasoning Mix
Ingredients:
2 tsp. minced onion
1 tsp. chili powder
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Add to 1 pound hamburger that has been browned and drained.
Stir in 1/2 cup of water and simmer 10 minutes.
Mix equals 1 package of commercial taco mix.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Cheesecake Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
3/4 c. brown sugar, firmly packed
1 1/2 c. chopped peanuts
1/2 c. margarine, melted
1 beaten egg
2 tsp. vanilla, divided
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
2 eggs
1/3 c. sugar
2 c. creamy peanut butter
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, half the chopped peanuts and margarine until crumbly.
Stir in the beaten eggs and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Mix well.
Press into bottom of 15 x 10-inch jelly roll pan and bake at 350° for 15 minutes.
Beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in condensed milk, 2 remaining eggs, sugar and peanut butter. Add remaining teaspoon of vanilla and mix until smooth.
Pour over prepared crust and sprinkle the remaining peanuts on top.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes until set.
Cool and cut into bars.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Cheesecake
Ingredients:
2 c. graham cracker crumbs
1 1/4 c. peanut butter, divided
4 pkg. cream cheese (8 oz.), at room temperature
1/4 c. sour cream
5 eggs
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. honey
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
peanut butter and peanut brittle for garnish
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Coat 9-inch spring-form pan with nonstick cooking spray.
For crust:
In bowl combine graham cracker crumbs and 3/4 cup peanut butter.
Press onto bottom and 3/4 way up sides of pan; freeze 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Cheesecake
Ingredients:
25 Oreo cookies
1/4 c. margarine
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1/2 c. peanut butter
4 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sugar
1 pt. whipping cream, whipped with 2 Tbsp. sugar
Hershey's chocolate syrup
Cool Whip
Directions:
Crush cookies and blend with margarine.
Press firmly on bottom of a 9-inch spring-form pan. Chill.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: The Best Cheesecake
Ingredients:
3/4 c. softened butter
all-purpose flour
sugar
3 egg yolks
grated peel of 2 small lemons
5 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
5 eggs
1/4 c. milk
Directions:
In small bowl with mixer at low speed, beat butter, 1/4 cup flour, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 egg yolk and 1/2 of grated lemon peel until well mixed; shape into ball.
Wrap and chill 1 hour. Preheat oven to 400°.
Press 1/3 of dough into bottom of 10 x 2 1/2-inch spring-form pan; bake 8 minutes.
Cool.
Turn oven to 475°.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: The Best Cheesecake
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
1 1/4 c. flour
1/4 c. sugar
3 egg yolks
grated peel of 2 small lemons
5 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
5 eggs
1/4 c. milk
1 3/4 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
In small bowl with mixer at low speed, beat butter or margarine, flour, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 egg yolk and 1/2 of grated peel until well mixed; shape into ball; wrap; chill 1 hour.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion
1 clove garlic, minced
5 large ripe red tomatoes
1 Tbsp. fresh basil, chopped
1/4 tsp. mustard powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper, ground
1/4 c. tomato paste
1/4 c. flour
2 c. chicken broth
4 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
2 c. light cream
Directions:
In a deep saucepan, melt butter.
Saute onion and garlic until golden.
Slice tomatoes and add with dry mustard, salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, 8 to 10 minutes.
Stir in tomato paste.
(If tomatoes are not full flavored, you may wish to add more paste.) Add flour and chicken broth, then bring to a boil, stirring constantly.
Puree in a blender, then strain to remove seeds and skins.
Add 1 to 2 cups light cream.
Reheat to serve, but do not boil.
Add sherry to taste.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Creme Bisque
Ingredients:
1 can bisque of tomato
1/3 c. sour cream
1 c. water
Directions:
In saucepan, blend soup and sour cream.
Gradually stir in water.
Heat and stir.
Makes 2 to 3 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
2 lb. ripe tomatoes or 2 (15 oz.) cans tomatoes, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. butter
1 bay leaf
1 heaping tsp. brown sugar
2 tsp. basil, finely chopped
2 whole cloves
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 pt. light cream
1 c. milk
6 large croutons, buttered
2 Tbsp. chives, chopped
Directions:
Peel and seed tomatoes.
Saute onion in butter and add the chopped tomatoes, bay leaf, sugar, cloves, salt, pepper and basil. Simmer, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes are thoroughly cooked, about 25 minutes.
Remove bay leaf and cloves and transfer soup to blender or food processor to puree.
Add cream and milk and heat.
Serve topped with toasted buttered croutons.
Sprinkle with chives.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can tomatoes
3 chicken bouillon cubes
1 clove garlic, minced
2 stalks celery with leaves
cracked pepper to taste
3/4 tsp. sweet basil
1 c. water
dash of Tabasco
1 c. half and half or milk
Directions:
Cut celery into thirds or just enough to fit into medium size saucepan.
Put all ingredients (except for half and half) into saucepan; bring to a boil.
Turn down heat and let simmer for 20 minutes.
Place mixture in a blender and puree.
Pour into saucepan with half and half and heat through.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
1 - 14 ounce can tomato sauce
1 - 14 ounce can stewed tomatoes
1 small onion chopped
1/3 cup cooked, crumbled bacon
1 tablespoon sugar
3 bay leaves
1 tablespoon granulated garlic
2 chicken bouillon cubes
1 cup V - 8 juice
salt and black pepper to taste
Directions:
Combine tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, onion, bacon crumbles, sugar, bay leaves, garlic, chicken bouillon, V - 8 juice, salt and pepper in a large sauce pan. Mix well.
Simmer 1 hour.
Serve hot with homemade croutons.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/2 c. sherry or wine
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. ginger
1 clove garlic, minced
boiling water
1 tsp. fresh lemon juice
pinch of white pepper
2 egg yolks
2 oz. (1/8 lb.) butter
pinch of salt
Directions:
Preheat the blender.
Put the butter on medium heat. Beat the yolks.
When the butter just starts to sizzle, pour it slowly into the beaten yolks (while beating) through the barely open top of the blender.
Add lemon juice.
Add salt and white pepper to taste.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: "Make Your Own" Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. soy sauce
1 c. sherry (the real kind) or dilute to 1/2 c. sherry and 1/2 c. water
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 medium onion, chopped fine
1/2 tsp. dry ginger
2 tsp. sugar
2 whole chickens (fryers)
3 lb. ground meat
1 pork roast
6 to 7 small cans corn (whole kernel)
6 to 7 cans whole tomatoes
2 cans tomato sauce
1 can tomato paste (the smallest can)
2 (32 oz. size) bottles ketchup
1 lemon, squeezed and seeded (use juice only)
2 large onions, diced
2/3 c. vinegar (white)
1/2 c. sugar (white granulated)
1/2 c. sugar (brown granulated)
2 Tbsp. yellow mustard
1/3 stick butter
1 bottle hot sauce
salt and pepper to taste (to season meats as they are cooking)
1 fresh ham with the bone in it (9 to 14 lb.)
salt to taste
black pepper
2 garlic cloves, chopped
2 Tbsp. corn oil or vegetable cooking oil
2 large onions, peeled and left whole
1 whole chicken or if white meat is preferred, use breast filets
1 can Veg-All mixed vegetables
1 can Campbell's cream of chicken soup
2 deep dish pie shells, at room temperature
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Remove the skin from the chicken.
Place in a pot with enough water to cover the chicken.
Boil in a medium pot until tender.
Add the Veg-All and the cream of chicken soup. Mix well.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. lite soy sauce
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 garlic or less
2 tsp. ginger
2 tsp. mustard (dried)
Directions:
Mix; marinate meat at least 1/2 hour.
Great with steak or chicken.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce Mix
Ingredients:
1/2 c. ketchup
1/4 c. dry white wine
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Mix ingredients all together. Pour over desired meat and marinate overnight.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
1/3 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. oil
2 Tbsp. catsup
2 Tbsp. vinegar
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
3/4 c. beef or chicken stock
1 tsp. chopped garlic
1 tsp. parsley
1/4 c. chopped onion
Directions:
Mix all ingredients in a jar and shake.
Use to marinate chicken, beef or pork.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Pork
Ingredients:
2 lb. meat, cut in cubes and cooked
1/4 c. drippings
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. chopped celery or celery seed
1/4 tsp. pepper
3/4 tsp. Accent
2 garlic, crushed, or granulated garlic
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. vinegar
1/3 c. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. chili powder
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat drippings in saucepan.
Add other ingredients and simmer 2 or 3 minutes.
Add pork and simmer 5 to 10 minutes, longer if time permits.
Serve on buns or use as main dish.
The longer it simmers, the better it is.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Eastern Style Barbecue Pork
Ingredients:
1 Boston butt (about 5 lb.)
1 pt. cider vinegar
2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. ground red pepper
1 Tbsp. red pepper flakes
2 Tbsp. firmly packed brown sugar
Directions:
Combine everything but the meat in a saucepan and heat until boiling.
In a baking pan, place the pork.
Add a little sauce on top and cover with foil.
Cook at 350° for 2 hours or as many hours as it takes your pork to be done.
Finely chop the pork and add a little more sauce.
This recipe is great with the Barbecue Slaw and Baked Beans.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
1 (5 to 6 lb.) Boston butt
salt
1 tsp. chili sauce
1 tsp. celery seed
1 c. catsup
1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. brown sugar
1 c. water
Directions:
Cook pork in lightly salted water over low heat 2 to 2 1/2 hours.
Drain, reserving 1 cup broth.
Cut pork into thin slices and place in a large shallow baking pan.
Combine salt, reserved broth and remaining ingredients.
Mix well and pour over pork slices.
Bake at 325° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Pork Barbecue
Ingredients:
2 lb. pork
2 large onions
1 (No. 2 1/2) can tomatoes
1/3 bottle Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. red pepper
1 Tbsp. mustard
1 small clove garlic
1/2 c. vinegar
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Have pork cut into small pieces.
Mix all ingredients and cook slowly for 7 to 8 hours or until meat falls into pieces.
Serve on 18 to 20 buns.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Pork Barbecue
Ingredients:
4 to 6 lb. pork roast
1 (28 oz.) can crushed tomatoes
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. black pepper
2 tsp. crushed red pepper
2 tsp. liquid smoke
Directions:
Trim off fat and skin.
Mix all other ingredients in bottom of Dutch oven.
Add meat and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 6 hours.
Take meat out and allow to cool; shred.
Use sauce on beef or serve on rice.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Sugar-Free Snack Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. raisins
1 c. prunes, cooked and chopped
1 c. water
1/2 c. butter
1/4 tsp. salt
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. self-rising flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 c. nuts, chopped
Directions:
Bring fruits and water to a boil.
Add butter and boil for 5 minutes.
Set aside to cool.
Add remaining ingredients to mixture.
Bake in 11 x 7 x 2-inch pan that has been greased.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Cool and cut in squares.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Sugar-Free One Layer Yellow Cake
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. self-rising flour
1/2 c. fructose sweetener
1/3 c. shortening
1 egg
3/4 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 boxes sugar-free instant vanilla pudding
3 c. milk
3 bananas, sliced
1 regular size can crushed pineapple (in its own juice)
Cool Whip
nuts
1 box vanilla sugar-free pudding
Chocolate Sauce
sliced almonds
Directions:
Mix sugar-free pudding according to directions.
Let set. Spoon all of pudding between the 2 layers of cake.
Top with Chocolate Sauce and sliced almonds.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Sugarless Cake*
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 1/2 c. applesauce
1 c. dates or raisins
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. whole wheat flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. nuts or cranberries
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients.
Beat eggs and vanilla; add to dry mixture.
Add melted butter, applesauce, raisins and nuts.
Bake in tube pan in 350 °oven for 45 minutes to 1 hour.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Sugar Free Fruit Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. dates
1 1/4 c. water
1/2 c. prunes
1/2 c. raisins
1 stick margarine
1 tsp. vanilla
2 eggs, well beaten
1 c. flour with 1 tsp. soda
1/2 c. walnuts (if desired)
Directions:
Put first four ingredients together and bring to boil, then simmer 5 minutes.
Take off heat and mash.
Add margarine and vanilla; let cool.
Add remaining ingredients.
