In shallow 3-quart casserole, mix oil and next 3 ingredients. Add potatoes, onions and zucchini, turning to coat all sides. Cook, covered, on High 12 minutes until potatoes are tender; stir often.
Add peppers.
Cook, covered, on High for 10 minutes more. When vegetables are all done, sprinkle with shredded cheese and cook 1 minute more until melted.
Makes 4 servings.
About 370 calories per serving.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Vegetable Casserole
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini
4 to 5 green or red peppers
3 bay leaves
salt, pepper and garlic salt
4 to 5 medium potatoes
1 small onion
olive oil
Directions:
Peel vegetables, slice and place in a large baking pan.
Add tomatoes, bay leaves and seasoning.
Mix well.
Sprinkle with olive oil and cover. Bake at 400° about 30 minutes. Uncover and cook an additional 30 to 40 minutes.
Delicious!

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Casserole
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground chuck
4 small onions
1 zucchini squash
1/2 c. rice, cooked
1 c. tomato juice
Directions:
Saute the ground chuck and onions.
Add to the squash.
Add cheese and mushrooms if desired.
Season to taste and bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Pork Chops And Dressing
Ingredients:
4 large pork chops
2 c. cubed dry bread
1/8 tsp. sage
2 Tbsp. onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. celery salt
1/2 c. celery, chopped
2 Tbsp. water or more
1/4 c. oleo, melted
1 can mushroom soup plus 1/3 can water
Directions:
Brown chops in skillet; place into a 2-quart casserole.
In small bowl combine bread cubes, onion and seasoning.
Add water and melted oleo.
Top each pork chop with 1/4 cup or more of dressing.
Combine soup and water in skillet used to brown chops and heat.
Pour over the chops and dressing.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 1 hour.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Pork Chops
Ingredients:
6 pork chops, cut 3/4-inch thick
shortening
salt and pepper
6 Tbsp. uncooked rice
6 tomato slices
6 onion slices
6 green pepper rings
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes
1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
Directions:
In skillet, brown chops in small amount of shortening.
Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Place chops in greased baking dish.
Top each chop with a tablespoon of rice.
Place tomato slices, onion slices and green pepper on rice.
Spoon tomatoes over all.
Cover.
Bake in 350° oven for 30 minutes.
Add mushrooms.
Cover and continue baking for 30 minutes longer. Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops For Two Dinner
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. oil
2 c. cabbage
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 medium potatoes, sliced 1/4-inch thick
1 1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
1/2 c. seasoned bread crumbs
2 loin chops (1 inch)
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 c. green beans
1 Tbsp. butter
3/4 ??? apple juice
Directions:
In a large skillet heat oil on high.
Brown chops on both sides; set aside.
Toss cabbage and brown sugar.
Place in 11 x 7 x 2-inch baking dish.
Top with potatoes and beans.
Put chops on top.
Sprinkle pepper on top.
Pour apple juice over top.
Cover and bake at 350° for 45 minutes.
Combine crumbs and butter.
Put on top.
Bake another 15 minutes.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops Supreme
Ingredients:
6 pork chops (1/2 to 3/4-inch thick)
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 c. celery, chopped fine
1/2 envelope (1/4 c.) dry onion soup mix
2 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. dry parsley flakes
1 (6 oz.) can evaporated milk
1 small can sliced mushrooms, drained
paprika
salt and pepper to season
Directions:
Sprinkle pork chops with salt, pepper and paprika.
Put oil in skillet.
Heat and brown chops.
Drain off any excess oil.
Add 1 cup of water, celery and onion soup mix.
Cover and cook on low heat for 40 minutes or until chops are tender.
Remove chops from pan.
Combine flour, parsley and 1/4 cup water.
Blend in pan juices.
Add milk and mushrooms.
Cook over low heat until thick and bubbly.
Return chops to sauce.
Let stand for a few minutes. Serves 6. Serve with mashed potatoes and spoon extra sauce over potatoes.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops And Stuffing
Ingredients:
4 pork chops
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
3 c. soft bread cubes
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1/4 c. melted butter or margarine
1/4 c. water
1/4 tsp. poultry seasoning
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup (undiluted)
1/3 c. water
Directions:
Brown chops in oil.
Place in 12 x 8 x 2-inch glass baking dish.
Lightly mix bread cubes, onion, butter, 1/4 cup water and poultry seasoning.
Place a mound of stuffing on each chop.
Blend soup and 1/3 cup water.
Pour over stuffing and chops.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until tender.
Yields 4 servings.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Fresh Vegetables With Creamy Garlic Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. nonfat yogurt
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 tsp. olive oil
1 small artichoke, cooked and cooled
1 c. new potatoes, halved and cooked
1 c. green beans, blanched
1 c. carrots (about 2 inches long), blanched
6 or 8 small beets, cooked and cooled
1/2 c. cooked chickpeas
Directions:
In a small bowl, combine yogurt, garlic and olive oil. Arrange remaining ingredients on a large platter.
Mound yogurt sauce in the center.
Serve at room temperature.
Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Marinated Carrots(A Great Cookout Dish And Easy To Make!)
Ingredients:
2 lb. sliced cooked carrots
1 can tomato soup
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. cooking oil
1/2 c. cider vinegar
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 chopped onion
1 chopped green pepper
3 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach
1 (9 oz.) can artichoke hearts
1/2 lb. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
4 Tbsp. margarine
6 Tbsp. milk
1/3 c. grated cheese
ground pepper
Directions:
Layer drained artichoke hearts in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.
Layer drained spinach next.
Blend cream cheese, mayonnaise and margarine until light and fluffy.
Gradually beat in milk. Spread over top of spinach.
Sprinkle with pepper and grated cheese.
Bake at 375° for 40 minutes.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Marinated Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 (1 lb.) can French green beans, cut small
1 (1 lb.) can white Shoe Peg corn
1 (1 lb.) can early June peas (small)
1 c. bell pepper, chopped fine
1 c. purple onion, chopped fine
1 c. celery, chopped fine
1 small jar red pimentos
3/4 c. vinegar
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine vinegar, oil, sugar, salt and pepper in a saucepan and bring to a boil.
Pour over vegetables.
Let stand refrigerated overnight.
Keeps several days in refrigerator.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Marinated Carrots With Sauce
Ingredients:
2 lb. bag fresh carrots, sliced thin
1/2 c. green onions, finely diced
1/2 c. green peppers, finely diced
1 can tomato soup
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. Crisco oil
1/2 c. vinegar
Directions:
Drop sliced carrots in salted boiling water.
Cook 10 minutes or until tender, but crisp.
Drain.
In a baking dish, layer carrots, onions and peppers in a baking dish, ending with carrots. Mix tomato soup, sugar, oil and vinegar; cook and bring to a boil. Pour over layered carrots.
Cover.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Marinated Carrots
Ingredients:
2 lb. carrots
1 can tomato soup
1 medium/large onion
1 green pepper
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. canola oil
3/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
salt and pepper
Directions:
Cook carrots until crisp-tender; thinly slice onions and peppers.
Mix sugar, oil, vinegar, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper.
Add to vegetables in a large bowl.
Mix well. Chill 24 hours.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: "Stir-Fry Vegetables"
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
1 lb. bean sprouts
10 pea pods
2 c. cauliflower flowerets
2 c. broccoli flowerets
2 medium carrots, sliced
2 celery sticks, sliced
1 (8 oz.) pkg. mushrooms, sliced
1/2 medium bell pepper, sliced in rings or strips
1/2 medium brown onion, sliced in rings or strips
Directions:
In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat.
Add all vegetables, except onion, mushrooms and bell pepper.
Cook until vegetables are almost to the desired tenderness, then add the onion, mushrooms and bell pepper, adding as much soy sauce as desired to taste.
Cook up to 1/2 hour or until done to taste. Serve with rice, chow mein noodles or both.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
olive oil flavored vegetable spray
1 medium onion, cut into thin slices
1 1/2 c. julienne cut carrots
1 1/2 c. fresh sugar snap peas
1 c. chopped red pepper
1/2 c. canned low sodium chicken broth (undiluted)
2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
Directions:
Coat a wok or large nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Heat at medium-high (375°) until hot.
Add onion.
Stir-fry 3 minutes. Add carrot.
Stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add peas and sweet red pepper. Stir-fry 4 to 5 minutes or until crisp-tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 c. chopped cabbage
1 c. chopped carrots
1 c. chopped onions
1/2 c. chopped sweet pepper (maybe 1 hot pepper)
1/2 c. chopped zucchini
1 c. chopped cauliflower
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Heat oil about 1 minute.
Add vegetables with wooden spoon. Stir constantly until food is only wilted, but still crunchy.
The secret of good stir-fry is not to overcook.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 small onion, chopped
4 c. mixed, chopped vegetables (carrots, celery, broccoli, cauliflower, green peppers)
2 c. cooked chicken, beef or shrimp, chopped or cubed
Directions:
Heat oil in wok or skillet; add onion.
Saute until limp.
Add vegetables; cook until limp or to desired doneness.
Add meat. Stir until heated (3 to 4 minutes).
Remove from heat.
Let stand 4 or 5 minutes to heat and blend flavors.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. stir-fry vegetables (frozen or fresh)
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. powdered ginger
1 tsp. low sodium
soy sauce
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add garlic and ginger.
Stir-fry 15 seconds. Remove garlic.
Add vegetables and soy sauce.
Stir-fry 3 to 5 minutes, stirring vegetables until they are tender-crisp.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Herbed Chicken
Ingredients:
3/4 c. Miracle Whip
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 tsp. dried basil leaves, crushed
1 tsp. dried thyme leaves, crushed
6 boneless chicken breast halves
1/4 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. finely chopped green onions
Directions:
Mix dressing, wine, garlic, onions and seasonings.
Pour salad dressing mixture over chicken; cover.
Refrigerate for several hours.
Drain.
Place chicken on grill over medium hot coals or on rack of broiler pan.
Grill or broil for 8 to 10 minutes on each side or until tender.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Gentlemen Prefer Chicken
Ingredients:
3 lb. Chicken, cut up
Salt and Pepper to taste
1/4 c. Oil
1 can Lemonade Concentrate, thawed
3/4 c. crushed Pineapple, drained
3/4 c. chunk Pineapple, drained
2 Green Bell Pepper, cut in strips
1/4 c. Brown Sugar
1/4 c. A-1 Steak Sauce
1/2 c. Slivered Almonds
Directions:
Brown chicken in skillet with oil, salt and pepper with a little butter.
When brown place in baking dish.
Put remaining ingredients over chicken in the order given.
Bake uncovered at 400 degrees for 45 minutes.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Stuff Chicken
Ingredients:
1 large chicken
2 lb. ground pork
1 c. chopped ham
1/4 c. sweet relish
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 hot dogs, chopped
4 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. grated cheese
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 c. peas
1/2 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. pimientos, chopped
1 onion, minced
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Prepare chicken for stuffing, removing all bones and meat, leaving skin, wings and legs intact.
Soak in lemon juice and soy sauce.
Chop meat of chicken.
Mix ground pork and chopped chicken, then add ham, sweet relish, hot dog, eggs, cheese, raisins, peas, ketchup, cornstarch, pimientos, onion, salt and pepper.
Mix them all together.
Stuff chicken with meat mixture.
Sew up opening and bake in moderate oven until brown.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Dressing
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. dried onion flakes
1 Tbsp. poultry seasoning
1 Tbsp. ground sage
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 can condensed cream of chicken soup (plus 1 can water)
1 (10-inch) corn bread cake
3 slices white bread, crumbled
salt to taste
Directions:
Cook chicken (skin and remove fat) in salted water with bay leaf until tender.
Remove from broth, throw away bay leaf. Remove bones and cut or tear meat into pieces; set aside.
In very large bowl or pan, crumble cornbread and white bread; add seasoning, chicken broth and soup.
Mix thoroughly.
If too dry, add the can of water.
Mix in chicken.
Generously grease 3-quart baking dish or roaster pan.
Put dressing in pan.
Dot with butter or margarine.
Bake at 450° until golden brown.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Herbed Chicken
Ingredients:
3/4 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
1/4 c. dry white wine
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 Tbsp. finely chopped green onions
2 tsp. dried basil leaves, crushed
1 tsp. dried thyme leaves, crushed
6 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
Directions:
Mix dressing, wine, garlic, onion and seasonings.
Pour mixture over chicken.
Cover.
Refrigerate several hours or overnight. Drain.
Place chicken on grill (medium) or rack of broiler pan. Grill or broil 8 to 10 minutes on each side.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
3 eggs, beaten
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
1 lb. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Butter 9 x 13-inch pan.
Mix all ingredients.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach, drained
4 eggs
salt and pepper
1 c. milk
1 Tbsp. flour
1 1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Mix all together and bake at 350° for 1 hour; the last 5 minutes sprinkle a small amount of grated cheese on top.
Very tasty.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen or chopped spinach
1 (3 oz.) pkg. softened cream cheese
1 c. shredded cheese
5 eggs, slightly beaten
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tomato, thinly sliced
1/4 c. grated cheese
1 (9-inch) pastry shell (uncooked)
Directions:
Cook spinach according to directions on package (drain well). Combine next 6 ingredients and beat lightly with a fork.
Stir in spinach.
Pour into pastry shell.
Arrange tomato slices on top. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Bake at 450° for 35 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
1 pastry crust (9-inch)
1 c. evaporated milk
1 tsp. mustard
4 eggs
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. salt
10 oz. frozen chopped spinach, thawed
3/4 c. shredded Cheddar or Swiss cheese
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°.
Beat eggs well; add milk, mustard, nutmeg and salt.
Mix well.
Add spinach and cheese to mixture.
Stir well.
Pour into crust.
Bake at 425° for 15 minutes.
Reduce heat to 300°.
Bake until knife inserted in middle comes out clean, about 40 minutes.
Let stand 15 minutes.
Cut and serve.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
16 oz. egg substitute
1/3 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
2 c. cottage cheese
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and dried
1/4 c. sliced scallions
1/4 tsp. red pepper
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
Directions:
Heat oven to 400°.
Have ready with baked crust a 10-inch quiche dish or a deep dish pie plate.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Lemon Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts (boneless, skinless)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary, chopped or 1 tsp. dried rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. white wine or water
1 Tbsp. oil
2 tsp. honey
1 tsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 tsp. lemon peel
Directions:
In a shallow dish, combine all ingredients except chicken; mix well.
Add chicken; turn to coat.
Cover and marinate in refrigerator 20 to 30 minutes, the longer, the better.
Oil broiler pan and place chicken on prepared pan; broil 4 to 6 inches from broiler.
Cook 8 to 10 minutes on one side, basting with marinade.
Turn and continue cooking and basting 8 to 10 minutes longer or until chicken is fork-tender and juices run clear.
Can also be charcoal grilled.
Use same method as for broiling. Serves 4.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Lemon Herb Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. canola and corn oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. rosemary or tarragon, crushed
1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
Directions:
In a cup, mix first five ingredients.
Pour over chicken. Cover and let stand at room temperature no longer than 30 minutes, turning once.
Broil 10 minutes or until thoroughly cooked, turning once.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Lemon Herb Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. canola oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. rosemary or tarragon, crushed
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
Directions:
In cup, mix the first 5 ingredients.
Pour over chicken. Cover and let stand at room temperature no longer than 30 minutes, turning once.
Broil 10 minutes or until thoroughly cooked, turning once.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Lemon Herb Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. Mazola Right Blend
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. rosemary or tarragon, crushed
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
Directions:
In a cup, mix the first 5 ingredients; pour over chicken. Cover; let stand at room temperature no longer than 30 minutes, turning once.
Broil 10 minutes, or until thoroughly cooked, turning once.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Chicken
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts, skin removed or chicken cutlets (use mallet to tenderize)
2 lemons
1 tsp. thyme, garlic powder and marjoram
2 or more Tbsp. soy sauce
4 Tbsp. honey (can add more if necessary)
Directions:
Mix ingredients; marinate chicken for one hour.
Put in broiler for 10 minutes or so.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Mushroom And Cheese Omelette
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 lb. mushrooms, cleaned, trimmed and sliced thin
1 clove garlic, minced or put through a press
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1 Tbsp. dry white wine
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
4 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. milk
1/2 c. grated Gruyere or Parmesan cheese
fresh chopped parsley (for garnish)
Directions:
Heat half the butter in a frying pan and add mushrooms and garlic.
Cook over moderate heat 5 minutes or until mushrooms begin to soften.
Add thyme, rosemary and white wine and continue to saute another 5 minutes or until liquid evaporates.
Season to taste with salt and freshly ground pepper.
Remove from heat and set aside.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Cheese Omelet
Ingredients:
5 pieces bread, buttered on both sides
1/2 lb. Swiss cheese
4 eggs, well beaten
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
dash of pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese
2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1 can mushrooms
Directions:
Place bread in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Grate the cheeses; mix together and sprinkle on bread.
Mix together the eggs, milk, dry mustard, salt and pepper.
Beat well.
Pour over cheese.
Sprinkle mushrooms over top.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Remove from refrigerator 1 hour before baking.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Omelette Casserole
Ingredients:
4 eggs
1 1/4 c. milk
4 Tbsp. butter
salt
pepper
1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. diced potatoes
1/4 c. scallions, sliced diagonally
3/4 c. diced ham
10 slices cheese (approximately)
green peppers, diced (optional)
Directions:
Melt 2 tablespoons butter, add potatoes, mushrooms and peppers (optional).
Cook until done, slightly browned.
Mix eggs and milk, blend with beater; set aside.
Melt 2 tablespoons butter, add egg mixture, stir frequently, cook until eggs are fully cooked.
(There should be a watery liquid remaining with eggs.) Add potatoes and mushrooms, ham, scallions, salt, pepper and cheese.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Omelet(Serves 12)
Ingredients:
18 eggs
1/4 tsp. basil
2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
1 c. sour cream
1 (4 oz.) can mushrooms, drained
4 chopped green onions
8 oz. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/4 c. butter
Directions:
Mix together eggs, basil, salt, milk and sour cream.
Add mushrooms, green onions and Cheddar cheese.
Melt butter in 13 x 9-inch pan.
Pour mixture over butter.
Keep overnight.
Bake at 325° for 50 to 55 minutes, uncovered.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Omelet
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced mushrooms (about 1/4 lb.)
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1 medium garlic clove, minced
6 tsp. butter or margarine
6 or 12 eggs
1 c. water
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed tomato soup
1 large bay leaf
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Combine mushrooms, onion, green pepper and garlic in 2 teaspoons margarine in small saucepan and cook until tender.
In another saucepan, blend water, soup, bay leaf, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper to taste and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove bay leaf.
Keep sauce hot.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Tofu
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. tofu, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (firm or extra firm is best)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. vinegar
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. grated ginger
3 Tbsp. peanut or salad oil
1 large carrot, chopped
2 c. chopped broccoli
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. sliced green onions
3 Tbsp. cilantro (optional)
use any vegetables that are your favorites
crispy noodles
Directions:
Place tofu in shallow bowl.
Mix soy, vinegar, cumin, garlic and ginger; drizzle this over tofu and set aside.
Heat oil in wok or large pan over high heat.
Add carrot and stir-fry 1 minute. Add broccoli and cook 2 minutes, then add mushrooms and onions. Reduce heat to medium.
Add tofu mixture and cook, stirring gently until heated through but vegetables are still crisp.
Garnish with cilantro.
Spoon over hot rice and pass the soy sauce and add crispy noodles on top.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Tofu Spaghetti
Ingredients:
8 oz. pasta
6 c. spaghetti sauce
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 lb. firm tofu, shredded or mashed
2 oz. grated Parmesan cheese
2 oz. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
2 oz. Colby or Cheddar cheese, shredded
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Combine sauce with pasta and pour into a 9 x 13-inch casserole pan.
Combine tofu and cheese in separate bowl and cover pasta mixture with it. Bake 1/2 hour at 350°.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Flavorful Tofu(Kids Will Eat)
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1 small onion
1 can pasta ready tomatoes - 3 cheese
1/4 c. dry red wine
dash of chili pepper to taste
dash of marjoram to taste
dash of oregano to taste
dash of black pepper to taste
1/4 c. wheat germ
8 oz. mushrooms, sliced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. brown rice, cooked
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1/2-inch thick slices and allow to dry on paper towels.
Start to cook brown rice.
In large saute pan saute onions in olive oil until translucent.
Add mushrooms, red wine and spices and continue to cook until mushrooms are soft.
Coat tofu with wheat germ by placing wheat germ in shallow dish and gently pressing tofu.
Add tofu to saute, moving vegies aside to place tofu directly on pan.
Pour can of tomatoes over all and gently mix vegies onto top and in with the tomatoes.
Allow to cook, covered, on medium heat for 7 minutes.
Serve with rice.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Tofu And Veggies
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1/2 c. Sake or white wine
2 Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
4 Tbsp. soy sauce or to taste
2 cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. ginger juice (optional)
1 onion, thinly sliced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. broccoli florets or Chinese cabbage
8 oz. snow peas
1/4 c. roasted cashews or almonds
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
In wok or skillet, bring soy sauce, garlic, ginger and wine to a boil.
Add tofu cubes, cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove tofu and remaining broth from wok or skillet.
Heat oil in wok and stir-fry vegetables over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add remaining broth, tofu and cashews or almonds.
Heat and serve.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Noodles
Ingredients:
1 egg, beaten
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. milk or half and half
1 c. flour
Directions:
Roll out thin.
Cut and dry on table or countertop.
Drop into boiling broth (chicken or turkey).
Cook about 10 minutes.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Tomatoes
Ingredients:
2 large tomatoes, chopped
2 Tbsp. fresh basil or 2 tsp. dried basil
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 oz. bow tie pasta or spaghetti, cooked and drained
fresh basil and grated Parmesan cheese (optional)
Directions:
Combine tomatoes, basil, garlic, salt and pepper; set aside at room temperature for several hours.
Serve over hot pasta.
If desired, garnish with basil and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Herbs
Ingredients:
1 lb. noodles (spaghetti or macaroni)
3 Tbsp. basil, chopped
3 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1 Tbsp. oregano, chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/2 c. olive oil
1 c. cottage cheese
Directions:
Cook pasta until tender; drain and rinse.
Mix herbs, garlic, oil and cheese in a blender and liquify to make sauce.
Add sauce to cooked pasta and gently heat while stirring.
Serve immediately, 25 minutes to make, as a side dish or main dish.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. fancy pasta
1 c. green beans
1/2 c. olive oil
6 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
2 cloves garlic, crushed
1 tsp. sweet basil
fresh ground pepper
1/2 c. grated Parmesan or Romano cheese
2 c. sliced, cooked ham
1/2 c. sliced ripe olives
1 (7 oz.) jar roasted sweet pepper or pimento
1/8 c. chopped green onion
1/2 c. toasted almonds
Directions:
Cook pasta in boiling, salted water until tender.
Drain.
If using fresh or frozen green beans; cook until tender and drain.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 c. golden Caesar dressing (Kraft)
2 c. cherry tomatoes, halved
1 c. cucumber slices, halved
1 c. mushroom slices
1/4 lb. pepperoni slices
3/4 c. sour cream
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. green onion slices
2 c. pasta noodles, cooked, drained and chilled
Directions:
Pour dressing over tomatoes, cucumbers, mushrooms and meat. Cover, marinate in refrigerator several hours or overnight; drain. Combine sour cream, cheese and onions; toss with the noodles.
Top noodles with vegetable mixture.
Sprinkle with additional cheese, if desired.
Garnish with tiny choppings of the green onion stems.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 box or bag of pasta
1 pkg. pepperoni, diced up
1 bunch of broccoli, cut up flowerets
1 small pkg. cheese (shredded)
1 c. celery, diced
1 can black olives (optional)
1 small bottle Zesty Italian dressing
Directions:
Boil pasta and rinse in cold water.
Add all other ingredients.
Toss and let stand in fridge for awhile.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Grilled Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
6 large lamb chops
1 Tbsp. olive oil
3 to 4 cloves of garlic, peeled and cut thin
1 Tbsp. rosemary
Directions:
Brush lamb chop with olive oil, then roll in garlic and rosemary.
Put on grill until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Charcoal Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
8 thick lamb chops
1/2 c. white wine
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. garlic, minced
1 tsp. rosemary
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Season chops with salt and pepper.
Then marinate in a mixture of the other ingredients for 4 hours or overnight.
Grill the drained chops for 6 to 8 minutes on each side for a medium rare (pink center).

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Lamb Chops With Rosemary
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary
6 lamb chops or steaks
2 Tbsp. olive oil
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 Tbsp. fresh sage, crushed
2 cloves garlic
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 large egg or whites from 2 large eggs
1 can (15 oz.) salmon, drained and flaked
1 c. fresh bread crumbs
1/4 c. minced onion
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Heat oven to
400°.
Spray
cookie sheet with vegetable cooking spray.
Beat egg
with
fork
in
a medium sized bowl. Add remaining ingredients
and	mix until well blended.
Shape in eight 1/2-inch patties.
Place on prepared cookie sheet and bake 10 to 12
minutes,	turning
once,	until golden brown on both sides.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
3 loin lamb chops
2 tablespoons butter
salt and pepper
1/2 cup water
1 can (8 ounces) tomato sauce
1/4 cup ketchup
1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon dried oregano
Directions:
Melt butter in a heavy skillet; brown lamb chops. Place chops in a baking dish; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Pour 1/2 cup water into the skillet and stir to loosen browned bits. Add remaining ingredients to skillet then pour over the lamb chops. Cover and bake at 350 for 1 hour. Serves 3.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Indonesian Grilled Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
1 lb. lamb loin chops, trimmed and sliced
1 c. shoyu
1 c. chopped and peeled ginger
1/8 c. chopped garlic
1/8 c. sesame oil
1/2 c chopped fresh mint
1/4 c. coarse grain mustard
Directions:
Marinate for 24 hours.
Grill over charcoal.
Serve on a saute of mixed kula greens.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken And Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli
2 c. (or more) cooked chicken
2 cans Cheddar cheese soup
1 c. milk
2 c. Bisquick or Jiffy mix or cornbread mix
2/3 c. milk
Directions:
Cook broccoli until tender.
Arrange spears in large 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Place chicken on top.
Combine soup and milk and pour over chicken and broccoli.
Mix Bisquick or Jiffy mix and milk.
Spread this mixture over the chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded and divided
1 1/2 c. cooked chicken
1 1/2 c. pasta, cooked and drained
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. chopped red or green pepper
1/4 c. milk
3/4 c. seasoned croutons (optional)
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Mix all ingredients except 1/2 cup cheese and croutons.
Spoon into a 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with reserved cheese and croutons.
Bake 30 minutes until thoroughly heated.
You may also heat in microwave oven on High for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped broccoli
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 (8 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz
1 c. instant rice
1 c. cream of chicken soup
3/4 c. water
1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Saute celery and onion, then add frozen broccoli and steam for 10 minutes.
Then add Cheez Whiz, rice, milk, chicken soup and water.
Bring ingredients to a boil.
Pour into a casserole dish. Bake at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Casserole
Ingredients:
1- 8 oz. jar of Cheez Whiz
2 cans of cream of chicken soup
1/2 c. milk
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. onions
2- 10 oz. pkg. frozen broccoli
4 c. diced cooked chicken
2 c. Minute Rice
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
fine bread crumbs, buttered, optional
Directions:
Combine cheese, soup, and milk. Microwave onion in butter until tender. Cook broccoli according to pkg. directions. Drain. Combine all ingredients. Divide between two well greased 1 1/2 qt. casserole dishes. Top with buttered bread crumbs. Bake at 350 degrees until bubbly (20-30 minutes). Can be frozen. If frozen leave crumbs off until ready to bake.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
2 boxes chopped broccoli
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1/2 (1/4 lb.) stick butter
1/2 c. rice (not instant), uncooked
1 c. salted water
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 small Cheez Whiz
Directions:
Cook broccoli and onion together (salted water), then drain. Cook rice in salted water for 15 minutes with lid on.
Add soup and Cheez Whiz.
Bake for 30 minutes covered at 350°.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole(Or Turkey)
Ingredients:
3 to 4 c. cooked, chopped chicken or turkey
1 onion, chopped
1 small can chopped green chilies
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 small carton sour cream
3 to 4 c. shredded cheese (mix of Cheddar and Monterey Jack)
1 large pkg. flour tortillas
Directions:
Mix sour cream, soups and green chilies to make the sauce.
On a tortilla layer about 1 tablespoon meat; sprinkle on about 1 teaspoon onion.
Add 1 tablespoon sauce.
Top with 1 tablespoon cheese.
Roll up tortilla and place seam side down in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Repeat until the baking dish is full.
Top with the remaining sauce and cheese.
Bake in a 350° oven until hot, about 20 to 30 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas Casserole Style
Ingredients:
1 can Valley Fresh white chicken in water
1 small (1/2 c.) purple onion
1 small can diced green chiles
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of chicken soup
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1 soup size can water or milk
8 oz. sour cream
12 to 15 corn tortillas
2 c. grated cheese (Longhorn, Colby or Monterey Jack)
Directions:
Place first 7 ingredients in saucepan; heat to boil.
Reduce heat.
Add sour cream (do not boil after adding).
Place a couple of spoonfuls in the bottom of 4-cup crock-pot.
Layer tortillas, soup mixture and cheese.
Cook on low for the afternoon.
Let stand 10 minutes if there is too much liquid or cook a bit longer. Dinner is ready when lessons are finished.
Serve with tossed green salad.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
1 large fryer, cooked and boned
1 c. chopped onion
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 to 1 c. sour cream
1/2 c. reserved chicken broth
1 small can chopped green chiles
1 doz. corn tortillas, torn into pieces
1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Cook chicken in boiling water until tender.
Save stock. Debone chicken and cut into small pieces.
Mix onion, soups, sour cream, broth and green chiles in a bowl.
Grease a 2-quart casserole and place a layer of torn tortilla pieces on the bottom. Add a layer of soup mixture, then chicken pieces, then grated cheese.
Repeat this process one more time, ending with cheese. Bake at 350°, uncovered, for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, diced
3 Tbsp. butter
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 c. chicken broth
1 8 oz. carton sour cream
1 small can chopped green chilies
4 cans chunk chicken
1 lb. shredded cheddar cheese
6 corn tortillas, torn
Directions:
Brown onion in butter, add soup, broth, chilies, sour cream, add chicken.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly.
Place 1/3 cheese into 9x13 inch casserole.
Top with layers of tortilla pieces, sauce and cheese.
Repeat.
Bake for 30 minutes at 350°. Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. oil
1 (4 oz.) can chopped green chilies
2 c. onions, chopped
1 (28 oz.) can chopped tomatoes (undrained)
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 c. (8 oz.) Mozzarella cheese, grated
1/2 tsp. ground oregano
3 c. cooked chicken, chopped (skinless)
1/2 c. water
2 c. low-fat plain yogurt
24 corn tortillas, torn into 1-inch strips
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Heat the oil in a nonstick skillet and saute the green chilies and onion over low heat for 2 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, garlic powder, oregano, salt and water.
Simmer, uncovered, about 30 minutes or until thick.
Combine chicken and yogurt and place in shallow 3-quart baking dish.
Add tortilla strips on top of chicken mixture; cover with tomato sauce.
Top casserole with grated Mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 20 to 30 minutes or until thoroughly heated.
Yields 10 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Creamy Cheese Soup(Debbie Loves My Cheese Soup.)
Ingredients:
6 c. milk
4 Tbsp. flour
1/2 lb. ham, diced in tiny pieces
1/2 stick oleo
1/2 lb. Colby cheese, grated
1 c. carrots, diced fine
Directions:
Put milk in a double boiler and cook on medium heat.
Melt oleo (this can be done in microwave) and add flour to oleo.
Mix well, then stir into hot milk.
Add cheese, ham and carrots and cook for 20 minutes.
Do not let double boiler boil dry!
Serves 6 to 8.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Cream Of Anything Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. flour
2 (14 1/2 oz.) cans evaporated milk
cheese (optional)
1 to 2 c. chopped meat or vegetables
2 to 3 c. broth
Directions:
Make a roux of butter and flour; add milk and make a thick white sauce.
If cheese is used, add here and whisk to melt.
Mix in leftover cooked vegetables or meat; stir until smooth.
Add broth to desired consistency.
Season to taste.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Cheese Soup
Ingredients:
3 c. cubed potatoes
1/2 c. sliced carrots
1/2 c. sliced celery
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. parsley
2 Tbsp. flour
dash of pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
1/2 lb. cubed Velveeta cheese
1 can chicken broth
Directions:
Combine broth and veggies in big pot.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes.
Blend milk and flour together and stir into veggie mixture, cooking until slightly thickened. Add seasonings and cheese.
Simmer until cheese melts.
Serves 4.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Cheese Soup
Ingredients:
8 Tbsp. butter
6 Tbsp. flour
1 qt. rich milk
2 c. grated cheese
2 c. chicken stock, seasoned to taste
1/2 c. celery
1/2 c. green pepper
1/2 c. onion
1/2 c. grated carrots
several drops hot pepper sauce
salt to taste
Directions:
Melt 6 tablespoons butter.
Add flour, blending well.
Pour milk in gradually, blending well.
Bring to a boil.
Add cheese and remove from heat, but keep warm.
Melt remaining butter in another pan.
Add celery, green pepper, onion and carrots, all of which have been finely chopped or grated.
Cook until transparent, then pass these through a sieve.
Add chicken stock and mix well. Combine two mixtures and season with hot pepper sauce and salt. Do not boil.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Cheese Soup
Ingredients:
1 large potato, grated
1 carrot, grated
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. butter
2 cans good chicken broth
1 large jar Cheez Whiz
3 Tbsp. flour
3 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. water
2 c. milk
Directions:
In a large stock pot, add chicken broth to vegetables and butter.
Cook until vegetables are tender.
Add milk and cheese over low heat.
Combine flour, cornstarch and water, stirred together.
Add to first mixture and continue to stir until smooth and thick.
Do not have heat too high or soup will stick.
Add salt and pepper to taste.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
2 c. sausage or bacon, cooked and drained
1/4 lb. sharp cheese, diced
1/2 lb. Velveeta, diced
1 stick butter
1 qt. milk
1 tsp. dry mustard
12 slices bread (crust removed)
1 tsp. dry onion
1/2 tsp. salt
6 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Grease a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Layer bread, meat, cheese and onion.
Melt butter and pour over all.
Beat eggs, seasonings and milk.
Pour over.
Chill in refrigerator overnight and bake 1 hour at 350°. Let stand 15 minutes before serving.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Hearty Casserole
Ingredients:
1 onion, chopped fine (about 1 c.)
4 Tbsp. butter
1 lb. lean ground chuck
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 (1 lb.) can red kidney beans (and liquid)
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed tomato soup
1 to 1 1/2 c. sliced celery
3 to 4 thinly sliced raw potatoes (about 4 c.)
Directions:
Saute onion in butter or margarine until transparent; push aside. Add ground meat, salt and pepper; brown slightly.
Stir in remaining ingredients. Spoon into a 2-quart casserole. Cover. Bake at 375° for 1 hour or until potatoes are tender.
Makes 6 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
6 slices whole wheat bread
1/2 lb. ground turkey sausage
1 medium red or green pepper
1/2 c. chopped fresh mushrooms
4 oz. shredded reduced-fat sharp Cheddar cheese (1 c.)
1 (10 3/4 oz.) condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (8 oz.) carton frozen egg product, thawed
1 c. evaporated milk
3/4 tsp. mustard
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut bread into cubes.
Place in shallow baking dish.
Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes, until toasted.
Spray a 12 x 7 x 2-inch baking dish.
Place half of bread cubes in dish.
Set aside.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
4 c. cubed bread (French is best)
2 c. shredded cheese
2 c. egg substitute
2 eggs, beaten
1 qt. milk
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
black pepper to taste
1/2 lb. bacon or sausage
4 to 5 green onions, thinly sliced
1 c. sliced mushrooms
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
Directions:
Grease a 9 x 13-inch pan and arrange bread cubes along bottom. Sprinkle with shredded cheese.
Mix egg substitute, eggs, milk, mustard, Worcestershire and pepper.
Pour evenly over bread. Sprinkle with bacon or sausage chunks, onions, mushrooms and tomato.
Cover and chill for 12 to 24 hours.
Heat oven to 325° and bake for 1 hour or until set.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
6 slices bread, cubed
6 eggs, well beaten
3/4 c. milk
salt and pepper to taste
garlic powder to taste
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
dash of Tabasco
1/4 c. minced onion
1 c. grated Jack
1 lb. bacon or ham
Directions:
Arrange cubes in casserole dish.
Mix eggs and milk together and pour over cubes.
Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic. Arrange meat over mixture.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Bake at 350° for 40 to 50 minutes.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Rice And Sausage
Ingredients:
4 c. hot cooked rice
1 lb. Polska kielbasa sausage, sliced thick
1 large onion, diced
1 large bell pepper, diced
1 c. celery, cut up or chopped
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1 c. beef broth
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. cornstarch, mixed with 2 Tbsp. water
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Cook rice as you would normally (4 cups boiling water to 2 cups rice). When cooked, combine sausage, onion, bell pepper and celery in large skillet. Cook for 4 minutes. Add tomatoes, broth and seasonings. Cover and simmer 5 minutes. Pour cornstarch mixture into skillet; continue to cook for about 3 minutes and pour over rice in a casserole dish.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh sausage, sliced
1 1/2 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Fry sausage in a pan until done.
Add sausage to rice and stir mixture on low heat for about five minutes.
Serve hot!

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Baked Rice With Sausage
Ingredients:
2 lb. bulk Italian sausage
4 celery ribs, thinly sliced
1 large onion, chopped
1 large green pepper, chopped
4 1/2 c. water
3/4 c. dry chicken noodle soup mix (1 to 1 1/2 envelopes)
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 c. uncooked long grain rice
1/4 c. dry bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
In a large skillet, cook sausage, onion and green pepper over medium heat until meat is no longer pink and vegetables are tender; drain.
In a large saucepan, bring water to a boil; add dry soup mix.
Reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes or until noodles are tender.
Stir in canned soup, rice, sausage mixture and mix well.
Transfer to a greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Cover and bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
Toss bread crumbs and butter; sprinkle over rice mixture.
Bake uncovered for 10 to 15 minutes or until rice is tender.
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
Makes 12 to 14 servings.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Rice Supreme
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean sausage
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 c. celery, chopped
1 (3 oz.) can mushrooms
1/2 c. almonds, toasted
1 can water chestnuts
1 1/2 pkg. chicken noodle soup (dehydrated)
2 1/2 c. water
3 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Cook rice according to package directions.
Reserve.
Slice and fry sausage in skillet.
Coarsely crumble sausage.
Remove sausage from drippings.
In drippings, add onion and celery and saute.
Add mushrooms, almonds, water chestnuts, soup, water, cooked rice and sausage.
Mix and bake covered 45 minutes at 1 hour at 350°.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Savory Sausage Rice
Ingredients:
2 lb. bulk sausage
2 1/2 coarsely chopped celery
3/4 c. chopped onion
1 c. finely chopped green pepper
2 (2 1/8 oz.) pkg. chicken noodle soup mix
4 1/2 c. boiling water
1 c. regular rice
1 c. blanched slivered almonds
1/4 c. melted butter or margarine
Directions:
Lightly brown sausage in Dutch oven; pour off excess fat.
Add celery, green pepper and onion; saute until tender.
Set aside.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepes
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
2 large eggs
1 c. milk
1 Tbsp. melted butter
pinch of salt
Directions:
Mix flour and salt in large bowl.
Make a well in center and add eggs, melted butter and half of milk.
With a whisk or wooden spoon, gradually stir the flour into the liquid mixture.
While stirring, gradually add more liquid until consistency is that of cream.
When all liquid is added, beat or whisk to remove all lumps.
Pour 1/4 cup of crepe batter into preheated pan.
Cook both sides on low heat until lightly browned.
Makes 6 to 8 crepes. Fill with fruit, ice cream, or scrambled eggs.
Fold and enjoy.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepe
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
2 eggs, well beaten
1 c. evaporated milk
1 c. water
1 Tbsp. melted shortening
Directions:
Mix together flour, baking powder and salt.
Combine eggs, milk and water.
Beat until smooth.
(I like to make batter the night before.)
In cast-iron skillet, add shortening (Crisco). When very hot, add 3 to 4 tablespoons of batter and fry until golden brown.
Serve with your favorite topping.
Brown sugar and sour cream is mine.
Roll like a jelly roll.
Enjoy.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepes
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
3/4 c. milk
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. butter, melted
1 can fruit filling (fresh fruit of your choice)
whipped cream
powdered sugar
Directions:
Beat ingredients together.
Pour batter into warmed skillet, just enough to thinly cover bottom of pan.
Cook over medium heat until golden.
Fill with fruit, roll up lengthwise and top with whipped cream and powdered sugar.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepes
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
3 tsp. oil
pinch of salt
1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Mix all together with a wire whip.
Fry as you would a pancake.
Drain on paper towel.
Cool.
Use whipped cream and top with fresh strawberries or blueberries.
Arrange the whipped cream on half of the crepe.
Then top with fresh fruit.
Then flip the crepe on top of fruit.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: Crepes(French)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 c. milk
2 eggs
1/2 tsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Mix flour, sugar, baking powder and salt together in a bowl. Stir in remaining ingredients.
Beat mixture until smooth.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp And Pasta
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 can clear chicken broth
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 1/2 lb. medium shrimp, uncooked, shelled and deveined
4 cloves garlic, minced
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
5 c. hot cooked angel hair or very thin pasta
Directions:
Mix cornstarch and broth, set aside.
In a skillet or medium-high heat, heat oil.
Cook shrimp, garlic and pepper until shrimp turns pink, stirring often.
Set aside.
Add parsley and lemon juice.
Stir in cornstarch mixture and add.
Cook mixture to a boil and thicken, stirring often.
Return to shrimp pan.
Heat through.
Toss with pasta.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 lb. linguine
3/4 c. butter
1 medium green pepper, chopped
1 small onion, chopped
2 (12 oz.) pkg. frozen cocktail shrimp (not breaded), thaw and drain
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. pepper
grated cheese
Directions:
Cook spaghetti and set aside.
In heavy 3-quart saucepan melt butter.
Cook onions and peppers for a few minutes before adding the shrimp and remaining spices.
After cooked, toss over the spaghetti and sprinkle with grated cheese.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Shrimp And Wine
Ingredients:
12 oz. fresh or frozen shelled shrimp
1 c. onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
1 tsp. dried basil
1 clove garlic, crushed (if desired)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped (1 c.)
10 oz. dry pasta, cooked (6 c.)
1/4 c. butter, melted
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. snipped fresh parsley
Directions:
Thaw shrimp if frozen.
In saucepan cook onion in 2 tablespoons butter and olive oil until tender, but not brown. Stir in wine, bouillon granules, basil, garlic (if used), salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and boil gently, uncovered, for 12 to 15 minutes or until liquid is reduced by 2/3.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Shrimp And Pasta
Ingredients:
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 Tbsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 sticks butter
3 lb. medium shrimp, peeled (uncooked)
12 oz. cooked thin spaghetti
8 oz. Velveeta cheese
Directions:
Combine first 9 items (salt through butter) in a large casserole dish.
Add shrimp; stir.
Cook for 25 minutes at 350° (just until shrimp is pink).
Cook spaghetti and add with sliced cheese to shrimp mixture.
Bake for 30 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Shrimp And Vegetables
Ingredients:
olive or salad oil
1 lb. large shrimp, shelled and deveined
2 green onions, thinly sliced
1 1/2 tsp. grated fresh ginger root
1 garlic clove, minced
salt
2 medium-size carrots, thinly sliced
1 medium yellow pepper, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
2 c. small broccoli florets
3/4 (16 oz.) pkg. bow tie or rotella pasta
1/2 c. chicken broth
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
Directions:
About 40 minutes before serving:
In nonstick 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat, in 1 tablespoon hot olive or salad oil, cook shrimp, green onions, grated ginger, garlic and 1/4 teaspoon salt, stirring constantly until shrimp are opaque throughout, about 3 minutes.
With slotted spoon, remove shrimp mixture to bowl.
In dripping remaining in skillet and 1 teaspoon additional hot olive or salad oil, cook carrots, yellow pepper and 1/4 teaspoon salt, stirring frequently, until vegetables are golden and tender-crisp.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked French Fries(Low Calorie)
Ingredients:
2 large potatoes
1 egg white
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. red pepper
Directions:
Cut the potatoes into fries.
In a large bowl, beat the egg whites with a fork until foamy.
Stir in the chili powder and pepper.
Add the potatoes and coat them well.
Spray cookie sheet with Pam and spread in a row.
Bake at 450° for 30 to 35 minutes, until crisp and brown.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Baked French Fries
Ingredients:
2 large potatoes
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/8 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. salt (if desired)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°. Peel potatoes and cut into slices 4-inches long and about 1/4-inch wide. Place in a bowl of iced water to crisp. Just before cooking, turn onto paper towel and pat dry. Turn pieces into a shallow baking pan. Sprinkle with vegetable oil. Shake pan to spread oil evenly over potatoes and spread into one layer. Bake 30 to 40 minutes, turning frequently, until golden brown. Turn potatoes onto paper towel. Sprinkle with paprika and salt, if desired.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven French Fries(Dietetic)
Ingredients:
2 large potatoes
1 Tbsp. salad oil
salt, pepper and paprika
Directions:
Slice potatoes in half and then slice each half into 8 thick crescent-shaped pieces.
Chill sliced potatoes 10 minutes (or longer) in ice cold water to crisp them.
Preheat oven to 475°. Drain potatoes well.
Toss lightly with oil.
Spray a baking pan with Pam.
Arrange the slices in a single layer.
Bake 25 minutes turning occasionally.
Season and serve.
Makes 4 (75 calorie) servings.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Baked French Fries(Low Fat Recipe)
Ingredients:
3 medium potatoes
2 tsp. oil (or a little less)
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°. Cut potatoes lengthwise into 1/4 inch thick slices, then cut into fry shaped strips. Pour oil into bowl and toss to coat. Spread on baking sheet and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake 20 minutes and then turn potatoes and bake until crisp, about 15 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven French Fries "Lite"
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes
1 Tbsp. oil
sprinkle of pepper, garlic powder, paprika or no salt herb blend (optional)
Directions:
Peel potatoes and cut into long strips, 1/2-inch wide.
Dry strips thoroughly on paper towels.
Toss in bowl with oil as if tossing a salad.
Sprinkle in herbs or seasonings.
When strips are coated, spread them in single layers on cookie sheet.
Place in oven at 475° for 35 minutes.
Turn strips occasionally to brown on all sides.
If you want strips crisper, brown for 1 to 2 minutes.
Serves 6.
Per serving:
80 calories.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
2 c. mashed sweet potatoes
1 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. allspice
1 Tbsp. vanilla
2 eggs, beaten
2/3 c. canned milk
1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
1/2 c. flour, mixed with water to make a paste
Directions:
Beat potatoes.
Mix in all the spices, vanilla, eggs, milk and butter.
Mix well, then add flour mixture.
Pour into pie shells. Bake at 400° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
6 large sweet potatoes, boiled and peeled
1 1/2 c. evaporated milk
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 Tbsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
2 eggs
1 stick butter
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. vanilla
3 prepared pie shells
Directions:
Prepare oven to 375°.
Mash potatoes until well blended.
Add butter, sugar and eggs, stirring well after each addition.
Add lemon juice, vanilla, cinnamon and nutmeg.
Blend until of smooth consistency. Add milk, stirring so mixture will not become lumpy. Sprinkle flour over butter.
Stir into mixture.
Pour into pie shells. Bake 30 minutes or until done in a 350° oven.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked, mashed sweet potatoes
1 c. granulated sugar
1 stick margarine, softened
2 egg yolks (save whites in small bowl)
1 c. brown sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. sweet milk
Directions:
Beat the 2 eggs together.
Add granulated sugar.
Beat well. Mix first 8 ingredients.
Add milk.
Fold in beaten egg whites. Pour into unbaked pie shell.
Bake at 400° for 10 minutes.
Reduce heat to 350° until firm.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
4 medium size sweet potatoes, cooked until soft, then peeled
3 eggs, lightly beaten
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/4 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. light cream
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
4 Tbsp. unsalted butter, melted and cooled
1 unbaked 9-inch pie shell, chilled
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Put the sweet potatoes in a large mixing bowl and mash with a wooden spoon or a potato masher.
Set aside.
Combine the eggs, sugar, spices, salt, lemon zest and cream in a small bowl; whisk until combined.
Pour this mixture into the sweet potatoes; stir until thoroughly combined.
Add the butter; mix well.
Pour into the pie shell and bake for an hour, or until filling is set and a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.
Let cool completely before slicing.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes, cooked
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. lemon
1 1/2 c. milk
1 stick margarine
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. salt
3 eggs, separated
Directions:
Mash potatoes and margarine together.
Add sugar, salt, spices and flavorings.
Separate eggs.
Blend yolks with milk (add more milk if desired); add to potato mixture (will be a very thin consistency).
Pour into unbaked pie shell; cook at 400° until lightly browned (approximately 45 minutes).

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 gal. mix
1 bag chocolate chips
2 eggs
Directions:
Put in bowl. Pour in pan, put it in oven 1 to 1 1/2 hours at 50°.
Take it out and cut into circles.
Wait till cool - 5 minutes.
Eat them.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1 lb. dark brown sugar
1 1/2 c. granulated sugar
2 Tbsp. vanilla
1 lb. butter or margarine, softened
6 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 Tbsp. water
4 c. chocolate chips or 2 (12 oz.) pkg.
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In a large mixing bowl beat eggs for 4 minutes on high speed; add the sugar, vanilla and butter and mix well.
Sift together the flour, salt and baking soda.
Add the flour mixture to the batter slowly and mix well.
Add the water and mix again.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Measure 1/4 cup batter onto an ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 13 to 15 minutes or until golden brown.
Be careful not to overbake.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. softened butter or shortening
2 medium eggs or 3 small eggs
1 c. granulated sugar
1/2 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2 tsp. vanilla flavoring
2 c. unsifted self-rising flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. chopped nuts (optional)
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate chips
Directions:
Beat butter, eggs, sugars and vanilla until light and fluffy. Add dry ingredients; blend well.
Stir in chips and nuts.
Drop from teaspoon onto ungreased baking sheet 2 inches apart.
Bake in a moderate oven (375°) for 7 to 9 minutes.
Makes about 7 dozen.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Forgotten Cookies
Ingredients:
2 egg whites
1/4 tsp. salt
2/3 c. sugar
1 c. miniature chocolate chips
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Beat egg whites and salt until frothy. Gradually add sugar.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop by teaspoonfuls onto greased and floured pans.
Put in oven.
Turn off oven.
Leave in 2 1/2 to 4 hours (or overnight).
Store in airtight container to avoid tearing.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
2 1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 c. butter, softened
3/4 c. sugar
3/4 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
2 well-beaten eggs
12 oz. chocolate chips
1 c. nuts (optional)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
In small bowl combine flour, soda and salt; set aside.
In large bowl combine butter, sugars and vanilla. Beat until creamy.
Beat in eggs.
Gradually add flour mixture; mix well.
Stir in chocolate chips and nuts.
Drop by rounded teaspoon onto greased cookie sheets.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Strawberries With Chocolate Cream
Ingredients:
1 c. whipping cream
3 Tbsp. cocoa
1/4 c. + 1 Tbsp. powdered sugar
2 qt. medium-sized fresh strawberries
Directions:
Beat whipping cream until foamy.
Sift cocoa and powdered sugar together.
Serve with strawberries.
Yield: about 6 1/2 dozen appetizers.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Strawberries And Cream Dessert
Ingredients:
1 (14 oz.) can Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk
1 1/2 c. cold water
1 (3 1/2 oz.) pkg. instant vanilla pudding and pie filling mix
2 c. whipping cream, whipped (1 pt.)
1 (12 oz.) prepared loaf pound cake, cut into cubes
4 c. sliced fresh strawberries
1/2 c. strawberry preserves
additional fresh strawberries
slivered almonds
Directions:
In large mixing bowl, combine sweetened condensed milk and water; mix well.
Add pudding mix; beat until well blended.
Chill 5 minutes.
Fold in whipped cream.
Spoon 2 cups pudding mixture into 4-quart round serving bowl; top with half the cake cubes, half the strawberries, half the preserves and half the remaining pudding mixture.
Repeat layering, ending with pudding mixture.
Garnish with additional strawberries and almonds.
Chill for 4 hours.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
6 c. fresh strawberries
3/4 c. sugar
1 2/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/3 c. cocoa
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter or margarine
2/3 c. milk
1 egg, beaten
1 c. cold whipping cream
2 Tbsp. powdered sugar
Directions:
Reserve 6 strawberries. Slice remaining berries into bowl. Gently stir in 1/4 cup sugar; set aside.
Preheat oven to 450°. Grease an 8-inch round cake pan.
In a separate bowl, stir together flour, cocoa, 1/2 cup sugar, baking powder and salt. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
In separate bowl, stir together milk and egg. Add all at once to dry ingredients, stirring just until moistened.
Spread dough in prepared pan, building up edges slightly. Bake in a 450° oven for 15 to 18 minutes.
Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pan. Place on serving plate.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Chocolate-Dipped Strawberries
Ingredients:
3 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
1 Tbsp. unsalted butter
1 tsp. cognac or brandy
12 large strawberries
Directions:
In a double boiler, combine the chocolate, butter and cognac over moderate heat.
Melt the mixture, stirring frequently until smooth, about 5 minutes.
Remove from heat.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Dipped Strawberries
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. semi-sweet chocolate
1/2 lb. milk chocolate
20 strawberries (stems attached)
Directions:
Melt the chocolate in the top pan of a double boiler over hot, not boiling, water.
When chocolate is melted, add 1 tablespoon of hot water and stir thoroughly.
Dip each strawberry in the chocolate 2/3 of the way towards the stem.
Place the berries on a wax paper-lined cookie sheet to cool.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Diet Cake
Ingredients:
1/2 c nuts chopped
1 1/2 c dates chopped
1 c raisins
2 Tbsp butter
3/4 tsp soda
1 tsp vanilla
1 1/2 c whole wheat flour
1/4 c wheat germ
Directions:
Place all in bowl except flour and wheat germ.
Pour 1 c boiling water over all and stir well.
Add the flour and wheat germ and mix well.
Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until done.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Sugarless Cake
Ingredients:
16 oz. dates (chopped)
4 eggs
2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. unsweetened pineapple juice
1 tsp. salt
1 c. oil
2 c. flour
3 c. carrots (shredded)
1 c. nuts (chopped)
Directions:
Blend dates, eggs and juice. Add flour, cinnamon and salt; mix well. Add oil, carrots and nuts. Blend well. Spread in greased and floured 9 x 13 inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Serve with non-dairy whipped topping.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: What Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. boiling water
1 stick butter
1 tsp. soda
3/4 c. sugar
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. quick cooking oats
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
2 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Pour boiling water over oats and butter which has been broken into chunks.
Stir until butter melts; set aside.
Sift flour, soda, cinnamon and salt.
Add to oat mixture; mix well.
Add sugars, then eggs; mix thoroughly.
Bake in a 2-quart dish 12 minutes in microwave.
Turn dish often.
Frost with topping.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Very Moist Cake
Ingredients:
4 eggs
1 1/2 c. oil
2 c. sugar
2 1/2 c. flour (self-rising)
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. pecans, chopped
1 c. coconut
1 c. pineapple (crushed), undrained
Directions:
Mix eggs, oil and sugar well.
Add nuts, coconut, pineapple, flour and vanilla.
Bake at 325° for 1 hour in a tube pan on lower rack in oven.
When baked, punch holes in top of cake and pour the glaze over cake.
Leave in pan overnight.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Sugarless Cake*
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 1/2 c. applesauce
1 c. dates or raisins
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. whole wheat flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. nuts or cranberries
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients.
Beat eggs and vanilla; add to dry mixture.
Add melted butter, applesauce, raisins and nuts.
Bake in tube pan in 350 °oven for 45 minutes to 1 hour.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Curried Chickpeas And Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 c. soaked chickpeas or canned chickpeas
1 onion, sliced
2 carrots, diced
1 small zucchini, diced
2 tsp. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. coriander (dry ground)
1 tsp. cumin (dry ground)
1 tsp. ground turmeric
2 tsp. salt to taste
1/3 c. fresh coriander leaves
1/2 small chili pepper (optional)
1/3 c. plain yogurt (low-fat)
Directions:
Cook chickpeas in enough water to cover until tender, 1/2 to 1 hour.
Saute onion in olive oil.
Add to chickpeas.
Add carrots and zucchini.
Cook on low heat until vegetables are tender.
Add a little water if necessary to keep moist.
Add 1 1/2 teaspoons coriander, 1 teaspoon cumin and 1 teaspoon turmeric.
Add salt, depending on your taste.
Cook on low heat for 10 minutes.
Add fresh coriander leaves, chopped fine, and 1/2 small chili if you like it hot and spicy.
Just before serving, stir in yogurt.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Amanda'S Roasted Chicken With Vegetables
Ingredients:
4 to 5 lb. whole roasting chicken
1/2 c. softened butter
2 tsp. rosemary leaves, crushed
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. minced fresh garlic
6 new red potatoes, halved
6 carrots, quartered
2 medium onions, quartered
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In small bowl, stir butter, rosemary, salt, pepper and garlic.
Rub chicken with 1/2 of butter mixture. Place chicken on rack in roasting pan.
Place vegetables around chicken and dollop remaining butter mixture over them.
Bake, basting chicken occasionally, for 2 to 2 1/2 hours.
Sprinkle with parsley.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 lb.) roasting chicken
1 large onion, finely chopped
3 Tbsp. butter
12 dried apricots, chopped
6 prunes, chopped
1 large apple, diced
1/4 c. raisins
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. tarragon
1/2 tsp. thyme
Directions:
Wash and prepare chicken for roasting.
Saute the chopped onions in the butter for 5 minutes.
Add the dried fruit and saute for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Add seasoning and let cool for a few minutes.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Salad
Ingredients:
2 (15 1/2 oz.) cans chickpeas, drained
2 to 3 ribs celery, sliced
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 tsp. tarragon or basil
1 small red onion, minced
1 c. chopped parsley
pepper
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
Directions:
Steam vegetables in a little water for 5 minutes.
Toss with chickpeas.
Mix olive oil and vinegar with salt, pepper and herbs. Chill.
Serve on a bed of lettuce.
Serves 5 to 6.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Tortillas (Flour)
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1 1/2 Tbsp. salt
1/3 c. shortening
1/2 c. cold water
Directions:
Cut shortening in flour and salt.
Add water, enough to make a soft but not sticky dough.
Make into 18 balls.
Set aside about 30 minutes.
Roll out about 1/8-inch thick.
Bake on hot griddle. Serve warm with beans or chile con carne.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Flour Tortillas
Ingredients:
4 c. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. shortening
1 c. lukewarm water
1 Tbsp. baking powder
Directions:
Place flour, salt and baking powder in mixing bowl.
Add shortening and mix well.
Add lukewarm water and blend well.
Turn out on lightly floured board and knead at least 50 strokes.
Divide into 12 equal sized pieces and form into balls.
Cover with a cloth and let stand 15 minutes.
Roll each ball into a round tortilla, about 8 inches in diameter.
Cook on moderately hot iron grill, ungreased, turning once.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Tortillas
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1 1/4 c. warm water
1 tsp. baking powder
3 Tbsp. shortening
Directions:
Mix flour, baking powder and salt.
Blend in shortening and water; knead.
Let sit covered for 15 minutes.
Roll into balls and roll out.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Tortillas
Ingredients:
5 c. flour (all-purpose)
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
1/4 c. shortening
3/4 c. warm water (only as warm as your hand can stand)
Directions:
Mix flour, salt, baking powder and shortening together.
Pour small amount of warm water into flour.
Knead flour together. Only add enough water to where the flour stays together and forms a ball.
Preheat wrought iron skillet or some form of baking utensil on top of the stove.
Make small, round balls; roll out with rolling pin into a circle.
Cook in wrought iron skillet at a medium to high flame.
Cook on both sides.
Flip tortillas with tongs or fork.
Serves 6 to 8 persons.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Tortillas
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. baking powder
4 Tbsp. shortening
1 c. hot water (approximately)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together, adding water a couple of tablespoons at a time until dough is workable but not sticky.
Add a little more flour, if necessary.
Separate dough into 12 small balls.
Roll out into circles and cook in an iron skillet or griddle, turning to brown both sides evenly.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
3 lb. ground chuck
1 c. bread crumbs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 egg
a little milk
1 tsp. basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
salt and pepper
2 cans crushed tomatoes
3 cans tomato sauce
3 cans tomato paste
2 cloves garlic
dash of sugar
2 (8 oz.) Mozzarella cheese
2 (8 oz.) Ricotta cheese
1 egg
Directions:
Mix first 9 ingredients and make into meatballs.
Brown in oven until done.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. ziti pasta
2 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. instant minced onion
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. instant minced garlic
1 1/2 tsp. Italian seasoning
3 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
2 (6 oz.) cans tomato paste
2 3/4 c. water
1 (8 oz.) carton cottage cheese
1 small can sliced black olives
1 can mushrooms, drained
2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Prepare
pasta	as
directed
on
package;
cook only 7 minutes.
Drain.	Meanwhile,
brown
beef
and
drain.
Add seasonings, tomato sauce, tomato paste and water.
Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Mix pasta, meat sauce,
cottage cheese, black olives and mushrooms in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Top with Mozzarella cheese.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese
over
Mozzarella cheese.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Ziti
Ingredients:
3 cans tomato sauce
1 lb. ground beef
1 small onion
1/4 size basil
1 Tbsp. salt (more or less)
1 Tbsp. pepper (more or less)
1/4 c. sugar (more or less)
1 large whole milk Ricotta cheese
1 box ziti
Directions:
Saute onion in oil.
Add beef and cook.
Add sauce and 1 1/2 cups water.
Bring almost to a boil.
Add seasonings.
Cook down 45 minutes to an hour.
Boil pasta with oil and a lot of salt. Wash pasta.
Mix pasta into sauce.
Add Ricotta cheese.
Enjoy.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti With Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium green and red bell pepper, diced
1/4 lb. mushrooms, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/4 c. dry red wine
1 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. oregano
1 pkg. frozen spinach
1/2 c. frozen corn
8 oz. ziti, cooked
8 oz. Ricotta
1/4 c. Parmesan
Directions:
Saute peppers in oil for 5 minutes.
Remove and set aside. Saute onions, garlic and mushrooms for several minutes.
Break up tomatoes and add to skillet; add tomato sauce, wine, basil, salt, pepper and oregano.
Bring to boil.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Add spinach and corn; cook until spinach wilts.
Combine ziti, tomato mixture, Ricotta and 2/3 of peppers and spoon into prepared casserole.
Sprinkle with Parmesan.
Bake at 375° for 25 minutes. Garnish with remaining peppers.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Cheese Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1 (1 lb.) pkg. ziti
1 (27 1/2 oz.) can spaghetti sauce
2 tsp. dried oregano or 1 1/2 Tbsp. chopped fresh oregano leaves
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 (15 oz.) container Ricotta cheese
3 large eggs
2/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/4 tsp. ground pepper
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 (12 oz.) pkg. part skim milk Mozzarella cheese, diced
Directions:
In large pot, cook ziti as package directs; cook spinach and drain.
Squeeze to remove excess moisture.
In a large bowl, combine spinach, Ricotta, eggs, Parmesan, pepper and nutmeg. Preheat oven to 375°.
Drain ziti and return to pot.
Add spaghetti sauce and oregano.
Place half the ziti in a 12 1/2 x 8 1/2-inch clear shallow baking dish.
Add all of the spinach mixture and half the Mozzarella.
Top with remaining ziti and Mozzarella and cover with foil.
Bake 25 minutes.
Bake, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until bubbly.
Let stand 10 minutes, then serve.
Serves 8.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 diced onion
1 1/4 c. Arborio rice
1/3 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
5 c. chicken broth (keep hot over low heat)
1/3 oz. diced mushrooms, soaked in 1/2 c. water for 15 minutes, then chopped
Directions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat.
Add onion and cook until tender.
Stir in rice and cook with oil.
Add wine and stir until evaporated.
Add dried mushrooms, the water they were soaked in and the tomato paste, mixed in 1/2 cup of chicken broth. Stir until liquid is absorbed.
Continue adding broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly.
Each addition should be absorbed before adding the next.
Cook, uncovered, until broth is all absorbed and rice is tender to the bite.
Do not overcook.
Remove from stove.
Add Parmesan cheese; stir and serve.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Fresh Vegetable Risotto
Ingredients:
2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 medium onion, chopped (1/2 c.)
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. long grain rice
3 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. bite-size asparagus or broccoli pieces
1 medium tomato, seeded and diced
1/4 c. shredded carrots
1 c. shredded Muenster cheese
1/4 c. grated Parmesan
3 Tbsp. fresh basil
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook mushrooms, onion and garlic in hot oil until onion is tender, but not brown.
Stir in rice.
Cook and stir for 5 minutes.
In another saucepan, bring broth to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer.
Slowly add 1 cup of broth to rice mixture, stirring constantly.
Continue to cook and stir until liquid is absorbed.
Add 1 cup more broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly until broth is absorbed.
It should take 15 minutes.
