Stir in tomato, carrot and remaining half cup broth. Cook until rice is slightly creamy and just tender, stirring constantly.
Stir in cheeses and basil.
If desired, garnish with tomato slices.
Serve immediately.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto With Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 red pepper, diced
1 medium zucchini, diced
2 Tbsp. butter
1 large onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 Risotto
4 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, cooked
1 chicken breast, cooked and shredded
1/2 c. Romano cheese, grated
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet.
Saute pepper and zucchini until crisp or tender.
Set aside.
In large saucepan heat butter and saute onion and garlic over medium heat 5 minutes, stirring constantly.
Add Risotto and cook about 3 minutes.
Stir in 1/2 cup hot chicken broth.
Continue stirring until almost absorbed.
Add remaining hot broth 1/2 cup at a time, stirring until Risotto is al dente.
Stir in red pepper, zucchini, peas, chicken and cheese.
Rice may be substituted for Risotto.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Plain Risotto
Ingredients:
2 tablespoons olive oil
1 tablespoon butter
1 medium onion (chopped)
1 cup Arborio rice
1/2 cup white wine or dry vermouth
4 cups chicken or vegetable broth
1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
fresh chopped parsley
Directions:
Heat olive oil and butter in a saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion and saut until soft.
Add rice and saut until rice is coated.
Add white wine or vermouth and stir until all the liquid is absorbed.
Add hot broth 1/2 cup at a time, until it is all absorbed in the rice and rice is tender.
Add hot water if more liquid is needed.
Stir in parmesan cheese and fresh parsley, and serve warm.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto
Ingredients:
1 onion, cut into small pieces
olive oil
6 large shrimp (per person)
3 or 4 very young zucchini, cut in thick slices*
1 c. Italian Arborio rice
4 c. hot chicken broth
1 c. white wine
4 Tbsp. butter or 4 oz. sweet cream
1/2 c. chopped Italian parsley
1 c. grated real Parmigiana cheese
Directions:
*Or 1 pound tender green asparagus, cut into 1-inch pieces or a handful of dried porcini, soaked in water.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Fries
Ingredients:
1 lb. sweet potatoes
1 egg white
2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. onion powder
Directions:
Peel and cut potatoes into 1/4 inch by 1/2 inch strips. In a bowl, combine egg white and seasonings; beat well. Add potatoes; toss to coat. Place in a single layer on two baking sheets coated with nonstick cooking spray. Bake, uncovered, at 450° for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. Yield: 8 servings. One 1/2 c. serving equals 40 calories, 20 mg sodium, 0 cholesterol, 9 gm carbohydrate, 1 gm protein, trace fat. Diabetic Exchange: 1/2 starch.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Spiced Sweet Potato Fries
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. canola oil
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
2 lb. sweet potatoes, peeled and cut lengthwise into 3/4-inch thick wedges
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine oil with salt, cinnamon and cayenne. Stir in sweet potatoes until each piece is well coated. Arrange sweet potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes. Turn potatoes; bake until lightly browned, about 10 minutes. Remove from oven; place on serving platter.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Oven Fries
Ingredients:
2 medium sweet potatoes (12 oz. total), peeled
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. olive or canola oil
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450 degrees.
Coat baking sheet with vegetable oil spray.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Oven-Roasted Sweet Potato Fries
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil, divided
4 large sweet potatoes or baking potatoes, scrubbed
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Line cookie sheet with foil.
Brush with 1 teaspoon of oil.
Cut potatoes lengthwise into 1/2-inch thick wedges.
Transfer to a large bowl.
Add remaining teaspoon of oil, salt and pepper.
Toss.
Spread potatoes in single layer on prepared cookie sheet.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes, until golden and crisp.
Makes 4 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Oven Fries
Ingredients:
4 medium sweet potatoes
cooking oil spray
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut the sweet potatoes into wedges lengthwise. Spray them lightly with the cooking oil spray. Add the salt and pepper. Bake them at 450° until crispy on the outside and tender on the inside, about 25 minutes. Turn them halfway through the cooking time.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese(Casserole)
Ingredients:
1 cauliflower (about 1 1/2 lb.)
1 small red pepper, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 c .milk
3 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Jack cheese or white Brick cheese
2 Tbsp. dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Separate cauliflower into flowerets.
Drop into boiling water with salt.
Cook five minutes or until tender-crisp.
Drain. Arrange in a shallow, 2-quart well-buttered baking dish.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese Casserole
Ingredients:
1 cauliflower (about 1 1/2 lb.)
1 small red pepper, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced or mashed
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 c. milk
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Jack cheese or white Brick cheese
2 Tbsp. fine dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. melted butter or margarine
Directions:
Separate cauliflower into flowerets.
Drop into boiling salted water.
Cook 5 minutes or until tender-crisp.
Drain.
Arrange in a shallow 2-quart well buttered baking dish.
Heat 1 tablespoon butter in frying pan.
Add red and green pepper and garlic.
Saute for 1 1/2 minutes.
Sprinkle over cauliflower.
Mix cornstarch into milk.
Add 2 tablespoons butter to frying pan.
Stir in milk and cornstarch mixture; cook, stirring until thickened.
Add salt, pepper and cheese.
Stir until cheese is blended.
Pour over vegetables.
Mix bread crumbs and butter.
Sprinkle on top of casserole.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes or cover and refrigerate. Bake for 35 minutes, if chilled.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese Salad
Ingredients:
large head cauliflower, broken up
1 green pepper
1 lb. bacon, fried and crumbled or substitute Bac*Os
1/2 c. Miracle Whip
1/4 c. sugar
2 c. grated Colby cheese
1/2 c. onion
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
Combine cauliflower, cheese, green pepper, onion and bacon. Mix Miracle Whip, sour cream and sugar.
Pour over ingredients and toss lightly.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Company Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 large head cauliflower
1/4 c. diced green pepper
2 Tbsp. diced pimento
2 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 (14 oz.) can evaporated milk
1/4 lb. American cheese
paprika
Directions:
Separate cauliflower into medium pieces; cook, covered in boiling water, until tender (10 to 15 minutes).
Drain.
Saute green pepper and pimento in margarine; blend in flour.
Gradually stir in milk and cook, stirring constantly, until thick; add salt, mushroom soup and cheese.
Continue stirring until smooth.
Add cauliflower and mix gently until cauliflower is coated.
Pour into 1 1/2 to 2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with paprika.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Yield:
6 to 8 servings.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese Casserole
Ingredients:
1 cauliflower (about 1 1/2 lb.)
1 small red pepper, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced or mashed
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 c. milk
3 tsp. butter or margarine
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Separate cauliflower into flowerets.
Cook 5 minutes in boiling, salted water until tender-crisp.
Drain.
Put in a shallow 2-quart well buttered baking dish.
Heat 1 tablespoon butter in frying pan.
Add red and green pepper and garlic.
Saute 1 1/2 minutes.
Sprinkle over cauliflower.
Mix cornstarch into milk.
Add 2 tablespoons butter to frying pan; stir in milk and custard mixture.
Cook, stirring, until thickened.
Add salt, pepper and cheese.
Stir until cheese is blended in.
Pour over vegetables.
Mix bread crumbs and butter.
Sprinkle on top of casserole.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage Potato Dinner
Ingredients:
1 lb. Polish sausage
5 Idaho potatoes, peeled
2 cans cream of celery soup
1 c. water
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. chopped green pepper (optional)
1/4 c. chopped pimientos (optional)
Directions:
Grease a 3-quart baking dish.
In a large saucepan, heat soup and water over low heat, stirring occasionally.
Prepare cheese, peppers and pimientos.
Slice sausage.
Add above to soup mixture. Continue to heat.
Slice potatoes and layer on bottom of dish. Pour soup mixture over potatoes and bake at 400° for 1 1/4 hours. Serves 6.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage-Vegetable Dinner
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. Polish sausage
4 medium baking potatoes
1 medium sized green pepper, cut into strips
4 medium carrots, cut into 3 x 1/2-inch strips
1 (16 oz.) can French-style green beans, drained
1 medium onion, quartered
1 medium head cabbage, cored and quartered
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. water
Directions:
Cut sausage diagonally into 1/2-inch slices.
Wash potatoes; cut into 1/3-inch crosswise sections.
Layer sausage, potatoes and next 5 ingredients in order given in a large Dutch oven, sprinkling each vegetable layer with salt and pepper.
Add water and bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer 35 to 45 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Yields 4 to 6 servings.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage-Potato-Dinner
Ingredients:
1 lb. or less Hillshire smoked sausage, cut into bite size pieces
2 1/2 c. potatoes, pared and thinly sliced
1 can cream of celery soup
1 c. water
1/3 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/4 c. chopped pimentos (optional)
Directions:
Grease a 10-inch baking dish.
Line the bottom with potatoes. In separate saucepan, heat soup and water, stirring until smooth. Stir in cheese until melted.
Add Hillshire sausage pieces, green pepper and pimento (if desired).
Pour over potatoes.
Bake at 350° for 55 minutes or until potatoes are done.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato Saute And Sausage Or Turkey
Ingredients:
6 medium red potatoes
1 1/2 lb. green beans
3 medium onions
salad oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 lb. turkey-sausage links
3 medium tomatoes
Directions:
Cut each unpeeled potato into quarters and cut stem end from beans.
In 6-quart pan, heat potatoes covered in hot water to boiling over high heat.
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 7 minutes.
Stir in green beans, adding more hot water if needed. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce heat to low and simmer 5 minutes.
Drain.
Thinly slice onions.
In 12-inch skillet over medium heat, put 1 1/2 tablespoons hot salad oil and cook sausage until lightly brown.
Add onions and continue cooking until onions are tender.
Stir in 1/2 cup water, turn heat to low; cover and cook until sausage is cooked through.
Remove sausage mixture to bowl.
In same skillet, in 1 1/2 tablespoons hot salad oil, cook potatoes and green beans with salt and pepper until potatoes are golden, stirring frequently. Cut tomatoes in wedges.
Return sausage mixture to skillet, then add tomatoes and heat through. Spoon on to warm platters.
Makes 8 main dish servings.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Potato Stew
Ingredients:
12 oz. hot or sweet Italian sausage, cut in 1/2-inch pieces
2 c. water
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. all-purpose flour
1 large bell pepper, chopped
1/4 tsp. dried thyme leaves
2 large potatoes, peeled and cut in bite size chunks
1 large onion, cut in thin wedges
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Bring sausage and 1/4 cup of the water to a boil in a large saucepan.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer 5 minutes, stirring once or twice, until water evaporates.
Reduce heat to low.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
6 cloves garlic, peeled and left whole
salt in water
Directions:
Boil potatoes and garlic in salt water until tender.
Drain well.
Add 1/2 stick light butter.
Using hand blender mash all above ingredients until smooth.
Slowly add skim milk and 2 Tablespoons lite mayo, until creamy consistency.
Sprinkle parsley before serving.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
1 1/4 - 1 1/2 c low fat milk, warmed
1/2 tsp salt
dash pepper
Pam Garlic Flavor Seasoning spray
paprika, parsley, watercress, or chives for garnish
Directions:
Place potatoes and water to cover in large saucepan; heat to boiling. reduce heat; cover and simmer 20-25 min. until tender. Drain potatoes; return to saucepan. Mash potatoes until no lumps remain, gradually adding milk in small amounts. Add salt and pepper. Spray Pam into mixture for 15 seconds; mix until blended. Spoon into serving bowl and garnish with paprika, snipped parsley, watercress, or chives, if desired. Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Herbed Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. potatoes
1/4 c. butter
1 small onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, slivered
3/4 c. milk
2 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In large pot, boil potatoes.
Drain.
In same pot, melt 2 tablespoons butter.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook until golden, stirring frequently.
Remove pot from heat and add potatoes, remaining 2 tablespoons butter, milk, basil, salt and pepper. Using an electric beater or potato masher, beat mixture until smooth.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 medium-sized potatoes, peeled
2 large cloves garlic, peeled
2 c. boiling water
salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
3 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. heated cream
Directions:
Add potatoes and garlic to boiling water.
Cover and boil slowly about 30 minutes or until tender.
Drain, reserving cooking liquid.
Put hot potatoes and garlic through food ricer.
Add salt, pepper, butter and cream.
Stir to blend ingredients.
Add reserved potato cooking water to desired consistency.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 baking potatoes, peeled and quartered (about 4 lb.)
1 3/4 tsp. salt, divided
1/2 c. butter, softened
3/4 c. half-and-half
3 large garlic cloves, minced
1/2 tsp. ground white pepper
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Bring potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water to cover to a boil in a Dutch oven or stockpot; cover, reduce heat, and simmer 30 minutes or until tender; drain.
Beat potatoes, remaining 3/4 teaspoon salt, butter, half-and-half, garlic cloves, and pepper at medium speed with an electric mixer until smooth.
Stir in fresh parsley. Serve immediately.
Makes 8 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
2 tsp. minced onions
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
3/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Cook ground beef in skillet until browned. Drain excess fat. Add rest of ingredients.
Simmer, uncovered, about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Makes 12 tacos.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Beef Tacos(Quick Low Calorie Meal, Feeds 1 To 22)
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 can chicken or beef stock
1 pkg. taco seasoning or chili powder, black pepper and garlic salt
grated cheese
picante sauce
taco shells
onions
lettuce
cumin
tomato
Directions:
Cook ground beef in iron skillet on medium heat.
Add 1 can of beef or chicken stock.
Season with spices or package of taco seasoning.
When stock is reduced, serve meat with slotted spoon. Chop veggies and put each in it's own serving bowl.
Put grated cheese in bowl.
Heat shells on cookie sheet in 300° oven for 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1 clove garlic, crushed
12 taco shells
2 tomatoes, chopped
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. ground cumin
dash of Tabasco sauce
1/2 lb. shredded lettuce
1/2 lb. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Saute beef, onion, green pepper and garlic until beef is no longer red.
Drain excess fat.
Add tomato sauce and seasonings. Simmer for 20 minutes or until somewhat thickened, stirring often. Warm taco shells in a 350° oven for 5 minutes.
Spoon beef mixture into shells.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes and cheese.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Beef Tacos
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. Planters peanut oil
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 medium clove garlic, minced
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 tsp. salt
dash of ground black pepper
12 prepared taco shells
grated cheese
shredded lettuce
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Add beef and brown. Add onion and garlic. Continue cooking until onion is tender. Mix in tomato sauce, salt and pepper.
Heat, stirring occasionally. Spoon beef mixture into taco shells.
Top with cheese and lettuce.
Serve hot.
Makes 12 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1/2 tsp. salt
12 tortillas (canned or frozen)
1/2 c. cooking oil
3 large tomatoes
lettuce
3/4 c. grated Cheddar cheese
taco sauce
Directions:
Brown ground beef in Dutch oven.
Add tomato paste and salt. Simmer for 10 minutes, covered.
Heat oil in skillet; fry each tortilla on both sides.
Remove quickly and fold over before it stiffens.
Place on paper towel to absorb oil; sprinkle with salt.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mac-N-Cheese
Ingredients:
1 lb. elbow macaroni
1 stick butter or margarine
3 c. milk
1 lb. Velveeta cheese
1 c. bread crumbs
4 Tbsp. flour
dash of salt and pepper if desired
Directions:
Cook macaroni and put in casserole dish.
Slice up cheese. Melt 4 tablespoons butter; add flour.
Stir; add milk and stir. Add cheese to mixture and stir frequently.
When melted, add to macaroni and mix.
Melt remaining 4 tablespoons butter and add bread crumbs; put on top of macaroni and cheese.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: My Mother'S Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 c. elbow macaroni, cooked and drained
1 can (28 oz.) tomatoes with liquid, cut up
1/2 tsp. onion salt (optional)
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. shredded Cheddar, divided
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Combine macaroni, tomatoes, onion salt, pepper and 1 1/2 cups of the Cheddar cheese.
Pour into a greased 2-quart casserole dish. Dot with butter.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake 15 minutes longer.
Serves four.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Grandma'S Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. uncooked macaroni
4 Tbsp. butter
4 Tbsp. flour
2 c. milk
1 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 lb. cubed Velveeta
2/3 c. sour cream
1 1/3 c. cottage cheese
2 c. grated cheddar cheese
1 1/2 c. soft bread crumbs
Directions:
Cook and drain macaroni.
Place in 2 1/2 qt. greased casserole dish.
Melt butter over medium heat, stir in flour; mix well.
Add milk and cook over medium heat, stir constantly until sauce thickens.
Add salt, sugar, and cheese, mix well.
Mix sour cream and cheese into sauce.
Pour over macaroni; mix well.
Sprinkle grated cheese and bread crumbs over top.
Dot with butter.
The dish may be frozen at this point.
Bake at 350 degrees for 45-50 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 c. uncooked macaroni
1 stick butter
1 1/2 lb. Velveeta cheese, cubed
1 can Milnot or evaporated milk
milk (enough to cover macaroni)
salt and pepper
Directions:
Put all ingredients in a prepared 9 x 13 pan and stir. Place in oven at 350°. Bake 1 hour. Every 15 minutes, pull out of oven and stir. Place back in oven; repeat process for that hour.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
1 pkg. elbow macaroni
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 3/4 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar, grated
1/3 bread crumbs
1 1/2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Cook
macaroni	as
directed
and drain. Melt butter in heavy saucepan.
Blend in flour. Stir in milk slowly and cook, stirring constantly,
until	mixture thickens. Add seasonings and
cheese, stirring
until
cheese
melts. Add macaroni and transfer to a buttered 1-quart casserole. Combine bread crumbs and melted butter. Sprinkle over macaroni. Bake in a 400° oven for 20 minutes.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium potatoes
bottoms of 3 large leeks
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, grated
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 small clove garlic
salt and pepper to taste
1 pt. or more chicken broth
Directions:
Cook vegetables in enough water to keep from sticking until tender.
Add Accent while cooking.
Serve hot with saltine or other crackers.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium potatoes
bottom of 3 large leeks
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, grated
1/2 c. onion, chopped
small clove garlic
salt and pepper to taste
1 pt. or more chicken broth
Directions:
Cook vegetables in enough water to keep from sticking, until tender.
Serve hot with crackers.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium potatoes
bottoms of 3 large leeks
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, grated
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 pt. or more chicken broth
1 small clove garlic
salt and pepper to taste
Accent
Directions:
Cook vegetables in enough water to keep from sticking until tender.
Add chicken broth and seasonings.
Add Accent while cooking.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Microwave Leek And Potato With Lemon Thyme
Ingredients:
8 oz. leeks, trimmed, sliced and washed
8 oz. potatoes, peeled and sliced
salt
ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. chopped lemon thyme
1/2 c. hot vegetable stock
Directions:
Arrange the leeks and potatoes in a microwave-proof dish. Sprinkle each layer with salt, pepper and lemon thyme.
Pour over the stock.
Cover loosely and cook on High for 8 to 10 minutes until cooked.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Leek And Potato Soup
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
4 large leeks, sliced (green tops also)
2 Tbsp. oil or margarine
dash of cayenne pepper
2 Tbsp. fresh minced parsley
2 c. cold water
1 large onion, chopped
3 c. milk
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. cream
Directions:
Cook potatoes in water about 10 minutes.
Saute leeks and onion in oil until golden.
Add to potatoes and stir in milk and seasonings.
Simmer until the flavors are blended (about 15 minutes).
Add parsley and heat almost to boiling, stirring frequently.
Enrich soup with cream and serve hot.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Shortbread Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. butter
1 c. powdered sugar
3 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/4 c. granulated sugar
Directions:
Cream softened butter and confectioners sugar together until light. Sift flour and salt together and add to butter/sugar mixture. Add vanilla and blend thoroughly. Gather dough in a bowl; wrap in wax paper and chill 4 to 6 hours. Roll out chilled dough to 5/8-inch thickness. Cut out cookies (hearts or shamrocks are nice). Sprinkle tops with granulated white or colored sugar. Place cutout cookies on ungreased cookie sheet and refrigerate for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: "Shortbread"(Cookies)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. butter, at room temperature
1 c. confectioners sugar
1 Tbsp. vanilla
2 2/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. granulated sugar
Directions:
Beat butter, powdered sugar and vanilla until fluffy. Gradually add flour until well blended.
Divide dough in 1/2. Shape each into ball.
Flatten to 1-inch rounds between 2 pieces of plastic wrap.
Refrigerate until firm.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Shortbread Cookies
Ingredients:
2/3 c. margarine
3/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
1 egg
4 tsp. milk
2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
Directions:
Thoroughly cream the shortening, sugar and vanilla.
Add egg; beat until light and fluffy.
Stir in milk.
Add dry ingredients; blend into creamed mixture.
Divide dough in half; chill for 1 hour.
On lightly floured surface, roll dough to 1/8 to 1/4-inch thickness.
Cut into desired shapes with cutters.
Bake on greased cookie sheet at 375° for about 6 to 8 minutes.
Cool slightly; remove from cookie sheet.
Makes approximately 2 dozen.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Shortbread Cookies
Ingredients:
1 lb. butter (not margarine), softened
4 c. plain flour
1 1/2 c. powdered sugar
1 tsp. soda
Directions:
Mix butter and sugar.
Add flour and soda.
Form into 2 logs. If too soft to work with, put in refrigerator for awhile.
(You can mix chopped nuts, if desired.)
Chill well before slicing about 1/3-inch thick. Bake at 350° until slightly brown on ungreased cookie sheet. Do not overcook.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Shortbread
Ingredients:
1 c. butter, softened (no substitutes)
1/2 c. sifted powdered sugar
2 c. all-purpose flour
Directions:
Cream butter.
Gradually add powdered sugar.
Beat until light and fluffy.
Stir in flour; press into jelly roll pan.
Prick all over with fork.
Chill 30 minutes.
Bake at 375° for 5 minutes. Reduce heat to 300° and bake 25 additional minutes.
Cut into squares while warm.
Sprinkle with sugar.
Yield:
72 cookies. These are better if stored in a tin box for several days. Cookies get sweeter with age.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey-Mustard Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. crushed rosemary
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. oil
4 tsp. honey
2 tsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
2 lb. chicken
Directions:
Marinate chicken for about 1 hour.
Bake or broil until chicken is cooked.
Drizzle with remainder of marinade while cooking.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey Mustard Marinade (For Grilling)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. honey
1/4 c. Dijon mustard
1/4 c. lemon juice
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 cloves crushed garlic
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Brush on chicken while grilling. (Best to marinate chicken or pork for about 8 hours before grilling.)

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marinade
Ingredients:
2 or 3 Tbsp. mustard
1/2 Tbsp. honey
oregano as desired
garlic powder as desired
chicken pieces
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients.
Stir or mix well.
Wash chicken pieces.
Place chicken in large flat baking pan.
Pour or spoon marinade over chicken and let it marinate several hours.
Place in oven at 375° for 1 hour or until done.
Make gravy with juices. Serve with rice, mixed vegetables and butternut squash baked.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey Barbecue Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken
salt
pepper
1/3 c. dry white wine
2 pinches of ground ginger
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/2 c. ketchup
1 Tbsp. mustard
1/3 c. honey
Directions:
Salt and pepper chicken on one side.
Mix rest of ingredients and add chicken.
Place in refrigerator overnight.
Barbecue on low until chicken is cooked.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Marinade(Great For Chicken And Spareribs)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, blenderized
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. Tabasco
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Heat all to boiling.
Marinate meat and brush every 15 minutes while cooking.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice With Leftovers(Very Good!!!)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. long grain rice, washed in 3 changes of water and drained
3 Tbsp. oil
2 stalks celery, diced
1 medium onion, diced
1/4 green pepper, diced
2 cloves garlic, diced
1 to 2 c. or more of any leftover meat (ham, beef, pork, chicken or combination), diced
1/4 c. soy sauce (optional)
1 can water chestnuts, sliced
1 can pieces and stems mushrooms, drained (save juice)
2 1/2 c. water
4 Tbsp. chicken bouillon
Directions:
Fry rice in skillet over high heat, stirring all the time, until brown.
Scrape into 4-quart pan with lid.
Add all ingredients, bringing to a boil.
Boil for 1 minute. Turn to low heat and cover tightly.
Don't lift lid for 25 minutes.
Stir and serve.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Tasty Rice
Ingredients:
2 c. rice
4 c. water
2 tsp. salt (optional)
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Stir lightly all ingredients; bring to a rolling boil and reduce heat to simmer. Cover with a tight fitting lid and simmer for 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Let stand covered 5 minutes. Remove cover; fluff with fork.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Rice With Lemon
Ingredients:
5 c. water
1 1/2 c. arborio
1 Tbsp. salt
3 eggs
2 Tbsp. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1 c. freshly grated Parmesan plus additional for table
freshly milled white pepper
3 Tbsp. unsalted butter
Directions:
Bring water to boil in large saucepan.
Meanwhile, in bowl or pitcher with pouring spout, combine rice and salt.
Over high heat, pour rice into boiling water in slow, steady stream so as not to break boil.
Reduce heat to medium and simmer uncovered until rice is cooked 12 to 15 minutes.
Do not stir.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Rich Rice
Ingredients:
4 c. cooked rice, divided
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 onion, chopped
8 oz. fresh mushrooms
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. white pepper
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 c. sour cream
1 c. finely chopped spinach
1 c. grated Swiss cheese
paprika
Directions:
Spoon half of the rice in a buttered, shallow 2-quart baking dish.
Melt the butter in a large skillet with onion, mushrooms, lemon juice and seasonings.
Cook over medium heat until onion is soft.
Remove from heat; stir in sour cream.
Spread mixture over rice.
Cover with spinach.
Top with remaining rice.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Dust with paprika.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes or until heated.
Makes 6 servings.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: White Rice
Ingredients:
2 c. water
1 c. washed rice
1 tsp. margarine (if desired)
dash of salt
Directions:
Bring to a boil, stirring only once or twice.
Cover and reduce heat to simmer.
Cook for 14 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir with fork.
Cover and let steam for 5 to 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. catsup
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. salt
1/2 to 1 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 bay leaf
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 c. water
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all of the ingredients in a small saucepan.
Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer 30 minutes.
Discard bay leaf.
Use as a basting sauce when grilling chicken, pork or beef.
Yields 1 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. salt
1/2 to 1 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 bay leaf
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. water
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all of the ingredients in a small saucepan; bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 30 minutes.
Discard bay leaf.
Use as a basting sauce for chicken, pork or beef.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. prepared barbecue sauce
1/2 c. chili sauce
1/4 c. water
1/4 c. honey
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 clove garlic, sliced thin
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in small saucepan.
Heat to thicken and blend flavors.
Baste turkey with sauce during the last half hour of roasting.
Make 2 2/3 cups.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/2 c. vinegar
1/4 c. oil
4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
Directions:
In a small saucepan, beat 1 egg; add remaining ingredients. Cook over medium-high, stirring constantly, until mixture begins to thicken.
Remove from heat.
Coat chicken wings, parts, breasts, etc. on the grill.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
1 tsp. salt
dash of chili powder
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 medium minced onion
1/4 c. vinegar
2 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in saucepan.
Heat to boiling, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat.
Let stand for several hours to blend flavors.
Makes about 1 1/4 cups sauce.
Use on spareribs or chicken.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Miniature Drumsticks
Ingredients:
3 lb. broiling chicken wings
1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. m.s.g.
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
3/4 c. buttermilk
oil or shortening
Directions:
Cut wings in half. Discard wing tips.
Combine flour, cheese and seasonings in shallow dish. Dip chicken pieces in buttermilk. Shake to remove excess. Roll in flour mixture.
Heat oil in electric skillet to 365°.
Fry chicken pieces for 5 minutes. Drain on absorbent paper.
Keep warm.
Yields 18 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Delicious Drumsticks
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. pepper
6 chicken drumsticks
1/4 c. melted and cooled butter
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°.
Mix flour, salt, paprika and pepper in a bowl.
Dip chicken into butter.
Roll in flour mixture to coat. Arrange in an ungreased square pan 8 x 8 x 2-inch.
Bake uncovered until done, about 50 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Drumsticks
Ingredients:
12 chicken legs
3/4 c. flour
3/4 c. corn flake crumbs
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. margarine, melted
1 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Wipe chicken legs with damp paper towel. In clean bag, combine flour, corn flake crumbs, salt, pepper, poultry seasoning and garlic.
Dip chicken in egg a couple at a time, then shake in bag to coat with flour mixture.
Arrange in greased pan.
Pour melted margarine over chicken.
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes at 400°.
Remove foil, increase heat to 450° and bake 25 to 30 minutes until golden brown.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Glazed Chicken Drumsticks
Ingredients:
12 chicken drumsticks (about 2 lb.)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. honey
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. chili sauce
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Place chicken drumsticks in ungreased shallow glass dish. Mix remaining ingredients.
Pour over chicken.
Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour.
Heat oven to 375°.
Line broiler pan with aluminum foil.
Place chicken on rack in broiler pan. Brush chicken with remaining sauce.
Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until done.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked Drumsticks
Ingredients:
6 chicken drumsticks
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. butter or margarine
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°.
Mix flour, salt, pepper and paprika in a bowl.
Dip drumstick into butter.
Roll in flour mixture to coat. Arrange in ungreased square pan, 8 x 8 x 2-inches.
Bake, uncovered, about 50 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients:
1 large head lettuce, shredded
potato salad (recipe given)
2 or 3 tomatoes, cut into wedges
1 cucumber, cut lengthwise into fingers
1 to 2 avocados, sliced
6 slices Feta (Greek cheese)
1 green pepper, cut into rings
1/4 c. olive oil and 1/4 c. salad oil, blended
6 to 8 slices canned beets, cooked
shrimp, peeled and cooked
6 to 8 anchovy fillets
black olives (Greek-style preferred)
6 to 8 whole green onions
1/2 c. white vinegar
oregano
Directions:
Mound the potato salad on a large platter. Cover the potato salad with the shredded lettuce, then arrange the remaining vegetables in an attractive pattern on the lettuce. Place the anchovies and shrimp on top of the salad. The entire salad is then sprinkled with the vinegar, then the blended oil. Sprinkle liberally with oregano over all and serve at once. Toasted French or Greek bread is served with the salad. Each person serves himself from the beautiful salad platter. Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Recipe For Greek Salad
Ingredients:
1 head lettuce, washed and cut into bite-sized pieces
3 tomatoes, washed and cut into bite-sized slices
1 clove garlic, minced
3 or 4 green onions, washed, ends cut off and sliced diagonally
1/2 lb. Greek Feta cheese, crumbled or cut into small pieces
1 Tbsp. oregano, rubbed between fingers
1 tsp. Cavenders Greek seasoning
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
8 Tbsp. olive oi
2 1/2 Tbsp. wine vinegar
Directions:
Add ingredients in the order given, toss gently and serve with your favorite crackers.
I like to serve it with Wheatsworth stone ground wheat crackers.
Recipe yields 6 large salads or 10 small salads.
Enjoy!

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 c. olive oil
1/4 c. wine vinegar
bay leaf
1 clove garlic
1 tsp. oregano
1/4 c. parsley, chopped
1 bunch romaine (bite size pieces)
1/2 head lettuce (bite size pieces)
2 red onions, sliced thin
2 tomatoes, quartered
1 cucumber, sliced
1/2 green pepper, cut into strips
8 to 10 black olives
1/4 lb. Feta cheese, crumbled
4 hard-cooked eggs
Directions:
In a jar, combine oil, vinegar, bay leaf, garlic and oregano. Shake well and chill several hours.
In a large bowl, combine remaining ingredients.
Before serving, remove bay leaf and garlic from dressing.
Shake well and pour over salad.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients:
10 lb. red potatoes
2 Tbsp. chopped garlic
1 large chopped onion
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. sour cream
3 to 4 Tbsp. vinegar
2 large heads lettuce
2 green peppers, cut in rings
1 lb. boiled shrimp, cleaned
4 tomatoes, cut in wedges
2 cucumbers, quartered and sliced
1 bunch green onions
1 large can black olives
1 jar green olives
1 jar Greek peppers
1 can beets
2 lb. Feta cheese, sliced
1 to 2 cans flat anchovies
Directions:
Peel and cube potatoes.
Add garlic and cook until done, but still firm.
Drain.
Add chopped onion.
Cool to warm.
Add mayonnaise, sour cream, vinegar, salt and pepper to taste and mix well.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad Supper
Ingredients:
5 medium potatoes, peeled, cooked and diced
2 Tbsp. each minced parsley and onion
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 Tbsp. oil
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 lb. cooked, cold shrimp
1/3 c. mayo
1/2 c. pitted black olives
1 head lettuce
2 tomatoes, cut into wedges
1 jar artichokes
1 cucumber, sliced into spears
1/4 lb. Feta cheese, diced
1 large green onion, sliced into rings
1/2 red onion, sliced and separated
1 bunch radishes
Directions:
Mix potatoes, parsley, onion, cider vinegar, oil, salt and pepper.
Chill until ready to serve.
Put on a bed of lettuce.
Mound potato mixture in center.
Arrange around potatoes: tomato wedges, artichokes, cucumber spears, green onion rings, red onion, pitted black olives, diced Feta cheese, shrimp and radishes.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Chicken
Ingredients:
3 to 4 lb. chicken
1/2 c. oil
1/2 c. onion, finely minced
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. curry powder
2 c. tomatoes, coarsely chopped
2 c. water (hot)
2 Tbsp. salt
1 (6 oz.) can evaporated milk
2 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Heat oil. Add onion, garlic and curry powder.
Cook 5 minutes, stir gently.
Add chicken, brown and remove (keep warm).
Add tomatoes to oil mixture, stirring constantly (3 minutes).
Add hot water and salt; mix.
Add chicken and simmer until tender (50 minutes).
Remove chicken to serving platter.
Blend evaporated milk into flour; stir constantly.
Stir and cook until thickens. Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Indian Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 1/4 c. onion, chopped
1 small garlic clove, minced
2 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. pepper
8 oz. can tomato sauce
1 1/2 c. water
2 chicken bouillon cubes
3 c. cooked chicken breasts, skinned, boned and shredded into large chunks
Directions:
Melt butter; add onion and garlic and cook until tender.
Add remaining ingredients (except cooked chicken).
Cover and simmer 30 minutes.
Add chicken; cover and heat.
Serve over hot rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Indian Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 red apples, peeled and sliced
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 lb. skinned, boned chicken breasts
1/4 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. green bell peppers, cut in strips
1 clove garlic, minced
1 1/2 Tbsp. plain flour
3 tsp. curry powder or to taste
1/4 tsp. salt and pepper (each)
1/2 tsp. ginger
1 c. chicken broth
1 can stewed tomatoes
1/4 c. raisins (optional)
1 c. water (add more, if needed)
3 c. cooked rice (served on)
Directions:
In a small bowl, combine sliced apples and lemon juice; toss. Set aside.
Slice chicken; set aside.
Combine flour and chicken broth; stir until mixed.
Add all ingredients into skillet.
Cook on low for 30 minutes or until everything is cooked down; add extra water, if necessary.
Serve over rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Chicken
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/2 c. pared, chopped apple
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. curry powder
1/4 c. flour
1 c. light cream
1 c. chicken bouillon
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 c. cooked, chopped chicken (breasts)
Directions:
In a large pan, saute apple, onion, garlic and curry powder in butter until tender. Gradually add flour, then cream and bouillon. Cook and stir until sauce boils for about 1 minute. Add seasonings and chicken; cook for 10 minutes. Serve on a bed of rice (about 3 to 4 cups).

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Indian Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken, skinned and cut into small pieces
1 large onion, chopped
3 tomatoes, chopped
1 inch ginger, grated
10 cloves garlic, crushed
1 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. cloves
1/4 tsp. red chili powder
salt to taste
1 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Heat oil in pot.
Add onion; fry until brown.
Add chicken; fry until all liquid is gone.
Add remaining ingredients.
Cook over medium heat until tomatoes are soft and chicken is well cooked. Serve over hot white rice.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Breakfast Take Alongs
Ingredients:
2/3 c. butter or margarine
2/3 c. sugar
1 egg
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. oats (quick or old-fashioned)
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. wheat germ or finely chopped nuts
6 crispy cooked bacon slices, crumbled
Directions:
Beat together until well blended the butter, sugar, egg and vanilla.
Add the combined flour, soda and salt; mix well.
Stir in oats, cheese, wheat germ and bacon.
Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 12 to 14 minutes or until edges are golden brown.
Cool 1 minute on cookie sheet; remove to wire cooling rack.
Store in loosely covered container. Yield:
about 3 dozen cookies.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Low Carb Breakfast Smoothie
Ingredients:
1/2 c. sliced fruit
1/2 c. cottage cheese
1/4 c. plain yogurt
strawberries, raspberries, peaches (fresh or frozen)
flavor with sugar-free Tang or Crystal-Lite to taste
Directions:
Mix all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Add ice if using fresh fruit and blend again until slushy.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat, Low-Cholesterol Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
6 slices whole wheat bread, cut into cubes
1/2 lb. ground turkey sausage
1 red or green sweet pepper
1/2 c. (or more) mushrooms
1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded reduced fat sharp Cheddar cheese
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can reduced sodium cream of mushroom soup
1 (8 oz.) carton frozen egg product, thawed (may use 4 fresh eggs)
1 c. skim milk
3/4 tsp. dry mustard
pepper
Directions:
Cut whole wheat bread into cubes, place in large shallow pan and bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes or until toasted, stirring once.
Spray a 12 x 8-inch baking dish and dump half of the cubes therein.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Breakfast For One
Ingredients:
1 slice bread, tear into bite-size pieces
1 egg, beaten well
cinnamon to taste
2 tsp. sugar or 1 to 2 pkg. Sweet 'N Low
1/2 Granny Smith apple (tart), diced and unpeeled
small dab of diet margarine
Directions:
Fry apples with margarine in nonstick skillet until softened. Crumble bread into beaten egg.
Mix until bread is soaked like French toast.
Pour into skillet with apples.
Add cinnamon and sugar (or Sweet 'N Low).
Continue to fry until bread is toasty and apples are turning brown and are done.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Breakfast Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. boiling water
1 c. quick oats
1 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 c. shortening
2 eggs
1 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. chopped dates
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Combine first 2 ingredients and set aside.
Sift together next 5 ingredients.
Cream shortening, eggs and brown sugar.
Add nuts and dates to creamed mixture.
Combine all ingredients and mix well by hand.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Kid'S Favorite Chicken
Ingredients:
8 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 roll Ritz crackers, very finely crushed
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
black pepper to taste
1 stick margarine, melted
Directions:
Mix cracker crumbs, cheese, salt, garlic and pepper; set aside.
Cut chicken into small pieces (about 1 1/2 inches).
Dip chicken in margarine, then into crumb mixture.
Place on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Bake at 400° for 20 minutes or until done.
Serve with Pineapple Dipping Sauce.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken For A Crowd
Ingredients:
4 c. diced, cooked chicken or turkey
1 c. chopped celery
2 Tbsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 Tbsp. chopped pimiento
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. mayonnaise
a little curry
water chestnuts, if desired
8 slices bread, cubed
3 eggs
1 pt. half and half cream
1 can cream of mushroom or cream of chicken soup
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Put 4 slices cubed bread on bottom of a greased 9 x 13-inch Pyrex dish.
Add chicken mixture.
Top with 4 slices of cubed bread.
Mix eggs and half and half cream.
Pour over casserole. Let stand, covered in refrigerator, overnight.
Next day, spread soup over mixture.
Top with grated Cheddar cheese.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Serve immediately.
Serves 10.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Gentlemen Prefer Chicken
Ingredients:
3 lb. Chicken, cut up
Salt and Pepper to taste
1/4 c. Oil
1 can Lemonade Concentrate, thawed
3/4 c. crushed Pineapple, drained
3/4 c. chunk Pineapple, drained
2 Green Bell Pepper, cut in strips
1/4 c. Brown Sugar
1/4 c. A-1 Steak Sauce
1/2 c. Slivered Almonds
Directions:
Brown chicken in skillet with oil, salt and pepper with a little butter.
When brown place in baking dish.
Put remaining ingredients over chicken in the order given.
Bake uncovered at 400 degrees for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fantastic
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. cooked turkey or chicken, cut in pieces
1 large box Uncle Ben's long grain and wild rice
1 medium onion, chopped fine
1 small can pimentos
1 small can water chestnuts, slivered
1 can celery soup
1 c. mayonnaise
grated sharp Cheddar
buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Cook rice according to directions.
Add all other ingredients, except cheese and crumbs.
Mix well.
Pour into baking pan (9 x 13-inch).
Cover with grated cheese and buttered crumbs.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Can be prepared the day before and refrigerated.
Save buttered crumbs to sprinkle over casserole just before it goes into oven.
Serves 12 to 15.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Spectacular
Ingredients:
1 can French-style green beans, drained
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. water chestnuts, drained and chopped
1 (6 oz.) can mushrooms
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 (6 oz.) pkg. long grain and wild rice
1 can cream of celery soup
1 pkg. slivered almonds
1 stewed chicken or 3 large breasts, diced
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Stew chicken, then use broth to cook 1 package rice.
Toast almonds in butter and salt under broiler in oven.
Mix remaining ingredients along with chicken and rice.
Place in 13 x 9-inch casserole dish.
Top with slivered almonds.
(Almonds can be mixed in casserole if desired.) If not moist enough before baking, pour chicken broth over casserole.
This can be frozen, thawed well, then baked uncovered for 30 minutes at 350°.
Serves 10.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Ziti With Sausage And Cream Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. ziti
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 lb. Italian sweet sausage, casing removed
1 c. heavy whipping cream
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat butter and oil in large frying pan.
Add onion and saute for 2 minutes.
Add sausage and cook, crumbling with fork, for 10 minutes, or until lightly browned.
Reduce heat to low and add cream, salt and pepper.
Continue to cook, stirring constantly, until sauce thickens; do not boil.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. Italian sausage, cut into slices
1/3 c. chopped onions
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
2 c. eggplant, pared and cut into strips
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
3 c. uncooked ziti
3 1/2 c. spaghetti sauce
1 c. Mozzarella cheese
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Brown sausage, onions, garlic, mushrooms and eggplant.
Saute until vegetables are tender; drain off fat.
Add salt and pepper. Set aside.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti With Sausage
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. ziti
1 1/2 lb. sweet Italian sausage links
1 medium size onion, chopped
1 large green pepper, chopped
1 (30 oz.) jar chunky garden-style spaghetti sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded part-skim Mozzarella cheese (2 c.)
1 (15 oz.) container part-skim Ricotta cheese
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
About 1 1/4 hours before serving:
In saucepot, prepare ziti as label directs, but do not use salt in water.
Drain ziti and return to pan.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. sweet or hot Italian sausage or 1/2 and 1/2
1 (15 oz.) jar Ragu sauce
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese
1 (20 oz.) can tomato sauce
2 cloves garlic
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
Directions:
Brown sausage with garlic.
Add Ragu sauce and tomato paste. Simmer for 2 to 3 hours.
Cook 16 ounces ziti according to package instructions.
In a large casserole dish, place a layer of ziti, then layer of sauce, followed by cheese.
Repeat process ending with sauce.
Bake, covered, for 45 minutes at 350°.
Serve with Parmesan cheese.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. ziti macaroni
1 (16 oz.) pkg. sweet Italian sausage links
1 medium onion, chopped
1 (30 oz.) jar spaghetti sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. (2 c.) shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 (15 oz.) Ricotta cheese (2 c.)
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Cook ziti according to package directions and drain.
Remove casings from sausage links. Brown sausage in a large skillet, stirring occasionally. Saute onion in sausage drippings. Drain off excess fat.
Combine ziti, sausage/onion mixture, spaghetti sauce, 1 cup Mozzarella cheese and Ricotta cheese. Spoon mixture into 3 1/2-quart casserole. Top with Parmesan and remaining Mozzarella cheese. Cover and bake 30 to 40 minutes or until hot and bubbly. Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Tempura Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 egg
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. flour
1 tsp. soy sauce (optional)
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. water
vegetables
Directions:
Beat first 6 ingredients together until smooth.
Dip vegetables in tempura batter and cook in hot oil until brown.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Tempura Veggies
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. melted butter
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 c. milk
1 egg yolk
1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. milk
1 egg white
1 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Beat egg yolk. Add butter, salt and 1/4 cup milk.
Add flour and stir until smooth, then add other 1/4 cup milk.
Beat egg white until peaks form.
Add sugar to whites and beat until stiff. Fold into flour mixture.
Dip cut veggies into flour and then into batter.
Deep fry until golden.
Especially good is zucchini, onions, green peppers, mushrooms, broccoli or whatever you like best.
Even apple slices are good this way.
Will do about 2 pounds fresh veggies.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Tempura
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. cold water
2 Tbsp. whole wheat flour
1/2 Tbsp. beaten egg
salt
oil for frying
pre-cut vegetables
Directions:
You will need the following equipment:
skillet, spatula, mixing bowls, forks, measuring spoons, paper towels, pot holder and spatter screen.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Tempura Cooking(Deep-Frying)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1 heaping Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs
1 c. milk or water
oil (corn, peanut, soybean or sunflower)
item to be fried (chicken, fish or fresh vegetable), cut in uniform 2-inch bite-size pieces
Directions:
Batter:
Mix the dry ingredients.
Stir milk into beaten eggs. Pour into the dry ingredients and beat.
Let batter rest at room temperature for 1 hour before using.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Easy Tempura
Ingredients:
1 block tofu, drained
1 pkg. chop sui vegetables
1 pkg. surumi (fish paste)
1 egg
salt and pepper
vegetable oil
Directions:
Chop vegetables into smaller pieces.
Mash drained tofu and then mix in surumi.
Add the egg and chopped vegetables.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Drop by tablespoon into a heated frying pan with vegetable oil heated at medium setting.
Cook both sides until each piece is lightly brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Cheese, Tomato And Onion Pie
Ingredients:
pastry for pie crust
10 oz. cheese (1/2 Swiss, 1/2 Gruyere)
5 Tbsp. flour
2 large onions
4 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. chopped basil
2 large, firm tomatoes, sliced
2 large eggs
3/4 c. cream
Directions:
Prepare pastry; line a 10-inch pie dish and chill.
Grate all the cheese; toss it with the flour.
Melt the butter in a large skillet.
Slice onions; saute them very gently in butter until they begin to turn golden, about 1/2 hour.
Spread about 1/3 of cheese over bottom of pie dish.
Spread the onions over it.
In butter that is left in pan, heat tomato slices with chopped basil for 1 to 2 minutes.
Arrange tomato slices over the onions.
Cover with remaining cheese.
Beat eggs with cream; pour mixture over the cheese.
If you like nutmeg, sprinkle a little on the top. Bake in a preheated 350° oven for about 35 to 40 minutes, or until the top browns nicely.
Serve hot in wedges.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Chicken Pie
Ingredients:
5 lb. cooked chicken (boneless), pulled in pieces
1 c. pimento, diced
1 (#10) can Veg-All mixed vegetables
1 c. chicken fat or margarine
1 c. flour
1 qt. milk
1 qt. chicken stock
2 tsp. sage
1 Tbsp. salt
2 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. marjoram
2 doz. drop biscuit dough
Directions:
Fold chicken, pimento and Veg-All together.
Mix fat and flour together.
Cook until smooth and golden.
Add milk and stock, whipping until smooth and thick.
Add seasoning and fold into chicken vegetable mixture.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Upside-Down Pie
Ingredients:
7 1/2 oz. pkg. frozen puff pastry
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 large onion, chopped
3 egg yolks
1 c. mushrooms
4 oz. bacon slices
1/2 c. crumbled Blue cheese
1 Tbsp. chopped sorrel and chervil
Directions:
Thaw pastry.
Mix ground beef, salt, pepper and onion; bind with egg yolks.
Wash and quarter mushrooms.
Cover the bottom of an 8-inch loose bottomed cake pan with the bacon.
Arrange the cheese, herbs and mushroom quarters on top.
Cover the meat mixture, pressing it down firmly and smoothly on the top.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: The Best Pot Pie
Ingredients:
1/3 c. margarine
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
pastry dough (top and bottom)
1 3/4 c. chicken broth
2/3 c. milk
2 c. cooked, cut up chicken or turkey
1 pkg. frozen peas and carrots or fresh carrots and celery
Directions:
Heat margarine over low heat until melted.
Blend in flour, onion, salt and pepper.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Remove from heat.
Stir in broth and milk.
Heat to boiling, stirring constantly.
Boil and stir 1 minute.
Stir in chicken and vegetables; reserve.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Fried Pies
Ingredients:
3 c. dried fruit
1 c. sugar
3 c. plain flour
1 1/2 c. Crisco
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Add 2 cups water to 1 cup fruit.
Cook until tender, then cool. Add sugar to fruit; mix good.
Add 1 teaspoon cinnamon.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Classic Chocolate Souffles
Ingredients:
sugar
1/2 c. whole milk
1 1/4 c. sugar
7 oz. unsweetened chocolate, chopped
6 large egg whites
4 large egg yolks
powdered sugar
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Butter 8 (2/3 cup) souffle dishes. Sprinkle with sugar.
Tap off excess.
Bring milk and 1 cup of sugar to simmer in large saucepan, stirring until sugar dissolves. Reduce heat to low.
Add chocolate and stir until smooth.
Pour into large bowl.
Cool 10 minutes.
Beat whites into soft peaks. Add remaining 1/4 cup sugar and beat until stiff.
Whisk 1/4 whites and yolks into chocolate mixture.
Fold in remaining whites.
Bake until souffle puffs about 16 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Souffle
Ingredients:
1/2 c. raspberries
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine plus 1 Tbsp.
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. milk
dash of salt
2 large eggs, separated
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 oz. sq. unsweetened chocolate
butter or margarine for dish
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Coat bottom and sides of 2-cup souffle dish or two 10-ounce cups with butter (1 tablespoon of butter). Melt 2 tablespoons of butter and chocolate in saucepan.
Add flour and stir until smooth, stirring continuously. Gradually add milk until thick.
Add salt and remove from heat.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Souffle
Ingredients:
4 egg yolks
1/3 c. sugar
5 oz. bittersweet chocolate (Tobler, Lindt if possible)
2 Tbsp. heavy cream
1 tsp. instant coffee
2 Tbsp. cognac, rum, Grand Marnier or liqueur of choice
5 egg whites
Directions:
Ribbon egg yolks, sugar and salt heavily.
Melt chocolate and let cool.
Add heavy cream, instant coffee (dissolved in the liqueur) and blend into ribboning yolks.
Beat the whites and fold into the base.
Spoon into a buttered and lightly sugared 6-cup souffle dish.
Bake in a 400° oven for 12 to 14 minutes.
Can freeze.
Take right from freezer to oven only put on lower rack; add 5 minutes for light souffle.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mint Souffle
Ingredients:
2 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. flour
3/4 c. milk
1 egg, slightly beaten
2 sq. (2 oz.) sweet baking chocolate
2 Tbsp. white creme de menthe
6 egg whites, stiffly beaten
butter
granulated sugar
Directions:
Combine 2 teaspoons sugar and flour in saucepan.
Gradually stir in milk, mixing well.
Stir in egg and egg yolk and cook over low heat until thickened, stirring constantly.
Cool.
Melt chocolate in creme de menthe.
Stir into egg mixture.
Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites.
Spoon into 4 (8 ounce) souffle cups which have been lightly buttered and sprinkled with granulated sugar.
Bake in a pan of hot water at 350° for 20 minutes or until souffle tests done (a silver knife inserted in center comes out clean when done).
Serve at once.
Yields 4 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Double Chocolate Souffle
Ingredients:
3 whole eggs
2 egg whites
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/3 c. unsweetened cocoa powder
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
1 c. milk (skim)
1/2 c. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
1/3 c. chocolate pieces
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Coat inside of 2 1/2-quart souffle dish with nonstick cooking spray.
Separate eggs, placing yolks in small bowl and whites in large bowl.
Place milk, sugar, flour and salt in 2-cup jar with lid.
Shake until smooth.
Pour into saucepan; stir in cocoa.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens and boils.
Remove from heat. Add vanilla.
Stir a little hot mixture into yolks; stir yolks back into saucepan.
Beat together egg whites and cream of tartar at high speed until stiff, but not dry, peaks form.
Gently but thoroughly fold yolk mixture and chocolate pieces into whites. With a rubber spatula, cut down through center of whites, across bottom of bowl and up side, turning bowl as you fold.
Pour into prepared dish.
Bake 35 to 45 minutes until puffy and souffle shakes slightly when rack is gently moved.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twist Sticks
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. cayenne
1/3 c. butter
1 c. grated cheese (Cheddar)
3 Tbsp. ice water
Directions:
Sift all dry ingredients and cut in cheese and butter.
Add ice water and roll to a thickness of 1/8-inch.
Cut in strips and twist.
Bake at 350° for about 15 minutes.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twists
Ingredients:
1 c. sifted flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 c. grated sharp Cheddar
1/3 c. cold water
Directions:
Sift flour, baking powder and salt into a medium sized bowl. Cut in butter with a pastry blender until crumbly.
Sprinkle water over.
Mix lightly with fork just until mixture holds together and leaves sides of bowl.
Roll out on lightly floured pastry cloth or board to a 12 x 10-inch rectangle.
Divide in half lengthwise, then cut each half crosswise into 1/2-inch wide strips.
Lift strips one at a time.
Twist a couple turns and place on ungreased baking sheet.
Bake at 425° for 10 minutes or until golden brown.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twists
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
3/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese, divided
1/2 c. softened butter or margarine
3 egg yolks
2 tsp. water
1 egg white, slightly beaten
1 Tbsp. sesame seeds (optional)
Directions:
Combine flour, baking soda, mustard, salt and red pepper in large bowl. Reserve 1 tablespoon cheese; stir remaining cheese into flour mixture. Cut in butter with pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles fine crumbs. Add egg yolks and water, mixing until dough forms. Shape into a ball; flatten and wrap in plastic wrap. Refrigerate 2 hours or until firm.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twists
Ingredients:
1 c. all purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper (cayenne)
3/4 c. grated parmesan cheese, divided
1/2 c. butter or margarine
3 egg yolks
2 tsp. water
1 egg white, slightly beaten
1 Tbsp. sesame seeds, optional
Directions:
Combine flour, baking soda, mustard, salt and red pepper in large bowl. Reserve 1 Tbsp. cheese; stir remaining cheese into flour mixture. Cut in butter with pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles fine crumbs. Add egg yolks and water, mixing until dough forms. Refrigerate 2 hours or until firm. Preheat oven to 400°. Grease two cookie sheets. Roll out dough on lightly floured surface into 12 inch square (about 1/8 inch thick). Brush surface lightly with egg white and sprinkle with remaining 1 Tbsp. cheese and sesame seeds, if desired. Cut dough in half. Cut each half crosswise into 1/4 inch strips. Twist 2 strips together. Repeat with remaining strips. Place 1 inch apart on prepared cookie sheets. Bake 6 to 8 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from cookie sheets and cool completely on wire racks. Store in airtight container. Makes about 48 twists.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twists
Ingredients:
3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/8 tsp. red pepper
1/4 c. cold butter or margarine
1 egg yolk
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
In a bowl, mix flour, cheese and red pepper with a pastry blender or 2 knives.
Cut butter into flour mixture until it resembles fine crumbs.
Stir in mixture of egg yolk and water. Gather dough into a ball; dust with flour.
Wrap and refrigerate until firm.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Rice
Ingredients:
4 to 6 chicken thighs
1 c. rice
2 tsp. poultry seasoning
2 tsp. onion powder
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. pepper
1 small can peas (optional)
Directions:
Put chicken thighs in large saucepan; cover with water.
Add all seasonings.
Bring to boil; continue boiling until meat begins to fall off bone.
Remove thighs from water; take meat off bone and discard skin and bone.
Continue boiling water until about 2 cups remain in saucepan.
Add rice and boned chicken.
Cover; simmer for about 20 minutes, until all water is absorbed.
Drain and add peas.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Rice
Ingredients:
oil
1 large or 2 medium onions, chopped fine
salt and pepper
2 or 3 cloves garlic
2 fresh medium tomatoes, chopped fine
8 to 10 chicken thighs
1 1/2 c. long grained rice
Directions:
In a large pot put enough oil to cover the bottom.
Put in chicken pieces and lightly brown.
Add garlic, onions, tomatoes, salt and pepper.
Cook with cover on for 1/2 hour.
Remove cover and cook until sauce is reduced and thick.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Thighs And Rice
Ingredients:
2 slices bacon
1 to 1 1/2 lb. chicken thighs (boneless)
1/2 c. long grain rice
1 small onion, cut into thin wedges
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can tomatoes, drained and cut up
1/2 c. quartered fresh mushrooms
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
1/4 tsp. dried basil, crushed
3 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In a 10-inch skillet cook bacon until crisp.
Drain, reserving drippings.
Crumble bacon and set aside.
Brown chicken in reserve drippings, about 10 minutes.
Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper.
Remove chicken from skillet.
Cook rice, onion wedges and garlic in skillet drippings until rice is golden brown.
Stir frequently.
Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms, wine, bouillon granules, salt, basil and 1 cup water.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Rice Dinner(Serves 5)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
10 chicken thighs (about 3 lb.)
3 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces (undrained)
2 c. boiling water
minced fresh parsley (optional)
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. chopped onions
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 chicken bouillon cubes
4 chicken breasts, split and boned
1 (5 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts
1 can undiluted cream of mushroom soup
1 1/2 c. finely chopped celery
1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
1 pkg. corn bread stuffing (about 3 c.)
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix soup, mayonnaise, chestnuts and celery.
Lightly grease 3-quart casserole.
Lay breasts in pan.
Pour over mixed ingredients.
Mix stuffing with melted butter and sprinkle on top of chicken.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes to 1 hour.
Delicious!

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Rice Dinner
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
10 chicken thighs (about 3 lb.)
3 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. uncooked long grain rice
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 can (4 oz.) mushroom stems and pieces, undrained
2 chicken bouillon cubes
2 c. boiling water
minced fresh parsley (optional)
Directions:
Combine flour, salt and pepper; coat chicken pieces.
In a large skillet over medium heat, brown the chicken in oil.
Place rice in an ungreased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish.
Sprinkle with onion and garlic; top with mushrooms.
Dissolve bouillon in boiling water; pour over all.
Place chicken pieces on top.
Cover and bake at 350° for 1 hour or until chicken juices run clear and rice is tender.
Sprinkle with parsley, if desired.
Yields 5 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala (For One)
Ingredients:
2 oz. corn oil
1 (5 oz.) chicken breast
3 Tbsp. flour
2 oz. sliced mushrooms
1 oz. Marsala wine (sweet)
2 oz. beef stock
1 oz. half and half
6 oz. cooked pasta (angel hair)
1/2 oz. chives or green onions, chopped
Directions:
In a saucepan, heat oil. Dredge chicken in flour and place in pan.
Cook until done, making sure not to burn chicken.
Add mushrooms. Deglaze pan with Marsala wine. Add beef stock; reduce by half. Slowly add half and half and cook for 1 minute.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
3 large chicken breasts, split, skinned and boned
1 egg, beaten
1/4 c. milk
1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. butter
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 clove garlic, mashed
1 c. Marsala cooking wine
1 can chicken broth
1 lemon
Directions:
Flatten chicken pieces between sheets of wax paper with rolling pin or mallet.
Pieces should be 1/4-inch thick.
Combine egg and milk in dish.
Combine flour, salt and pepper on wax paper.
Dip chicken into egg mixture, then into flour mixture to coat all sides.
Refrigerate 2 hours.
Heat oil and butter in large skillet. Brown chicken on both sides.
Remove to platter.
Saute onion, mushrooms and garlic until tender.
Remove to platter.
Add wine and chicken broth to pan; boil 10 minutes to reduce liquid.
Return chicken and vegetables to pan; heat thoroughly.
Arrange on platter.
Garnish with lemon slices.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
4 boneless breasts
1 1/2 c. bread crumbs
1 small bottle olive oil
2 eggs
1 c. milk
1 pkg. fettucine noodles
juice of 1 lemon
1/2 c. favorite wine
4 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. butter
1 c. water
salt to taste
Directions:
Dip chicken in egg, milk and bread crumbs.
Brown lightly in olive oil.
Remove chicken and set aside. Make gravy with flour and butter.
When bubbly, add wine and water.
May need to add more water to get to right consistency.
Squeeze in lemon juice. Add chicken to gravy. Slice lemons on top.
Add salt and garlic. Cover and simmer 20 to 30 minutes.
Serve over pasta.
Soooo Good!

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Light Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. margarine
10 oz. thinly sliced chicken
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. dry Marsala wine
1/4 c. canned chicken broth
1 tsp. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of freshly ground pepper
Directions:
In a 9-inch, nonstick skillet, heat margarine until bubbly and hot.
Add chicken and quickly saute on both sides.
Remove chicken from pan and set aside.
In same skillet, combine mushrooms and garlic; cook over high heat, stirring constantly until liquid evaporated.
Add wine and cook, stirring occasionally for 3 to 4 minutes.
Combine broth and flour, stirring to dissolve flour. Add to skillet and cook, stirring constantly, until sauce thickens.
Add chicken, any juices remaining from chicken, salt and pepper and cook until heated.
Serve immediately.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
flour and butter
1 1/2 to 2 lb. chicken breasts
1 clove minced garlic
1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1/2 to 3/4 c. Marsala wine
1/2 c. chicken broth
parsley
Directions:
Flour chicken lightly.
Heat 2 tablespoons of butter in a large skillet.
Saute 3 to 4 minutes on each side.
Add salt and pepper. Lightly brown chicken, adding more butter if needed.
Remove chicken.
Add 1 tablespoon butter.
Saute mushrooms and garlic for 3 minutes.
Add wine and broth.
Bring to boil.
Return chicken to pan.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add parsley.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Butter Baked Fish
Ingredients:
1 lb. catfish fillets
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. (1/4 lb.) butter
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
In a 12 x 8 x 2-inch dish, arrange fillets with thickest, meaty areas to outside edge of dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. In 1-quart casserole dish, place butter. Microwave on High for 1 to 2 minutes until melted. Blend in parsley and lemon juice; pour over fish. Sprinkle paprika over fillets. Preheat oven to 350°. Place casserole dish in oven. Cook 45 to 60 minutes or until fillets are fluffy. Serves 2 to 3 people.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Fish
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. celery seed
1 lb. fish fillet
Directions:
Place butter in baking dish.
Microwave on High to melt butter (45 seconds).
Blend in seasonings.
Coat fish fillets in mixture. Place around in dish.
Cover with wax paper and microwave on High until fish flakes (with fork).
Approximate time is 5 to 6 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Light 'N Lemony Fish
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen sole, halibut or other firm fish
1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/2 c. lemon juice
4 green onions, sliced thin
1/2 tsp. white pepper
4 Tbsp. sherry
1/2 tsp. paprika
1 tsp. seasoned salt
Directions:
Arrange fish fillets in single layer in a baking dish.
Combine remaining ingredients, except onions, and pour over fish.
Bake at 425° for 15 minutes, basting occasionally.
Remove fish and garnish with green onions.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Fish
Ingredients:
2 lb. red snapper
1 lemon (small)
1 small onion
1 small green pepper
salt to taste
garlic to taste
1/2 tsp. black lemon pepper
1/2 to 1 stick butter (unsalted)
Directions:
Season fish with salt, pepper and garlic.
Set aside for 15 minutes.
Cut up onion and green pepper.
Squeeze lemon juice over fish.
Put in covered dish.
Add onion, green pepper and s/c lemon over the entire dish.
Cook slow in oven for one hour.
Serve hot.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Butter Trout
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter, softened
1 1/2 tsp. fresh lemon juice
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. chopped dill
1/8 tsp. black pepper
6 trout, filleted
Directions:
Combine butter, lemon juice, parsley, dill and black pepper. On a 12 x 12-inch square aluminum foil, shape butter mixture into 1-inch log.
Wrap tightly in foil and freeze for 1 hour.
Broil trout, meat side up, for about 5 minutes.
Serve topped with 2 slices herb butter.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
2 chicken breasts, cooked and diced small
2 c. Delicious apples (with skins on), diced small
3 c. mayonnaise
1 c. raisins
2 c. walnuts
2 c. red grapes
1 c. celery, chopped small
Directions:
Mix all ingredients, except mayonnaise, in a large bowl.
Set aside.
Chop 3 heads of lettuce and 2 heads of Romaine lettuce. Place in separate bowl.
Do not mix with ingredients until ready to serve.
When ready to serve, mix all ingredients, including mayonnaise, and mix well.
Serve.
Serves 10 or more.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
5 red apples, cut up
3 bananas, cut up
3 c. red seedless grapes
2 c. celery, cut up
1 c. raisins
1 small jar maraschino cherries, cut up
1 c. mayonnaise
1/3 c. honey
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 to 1 c. walnuts or pecans
1 small bag marshmallows (if desired)
Directions:
Mix together apples, bananas, grapes (use Fruit-Fresh liberally), celery, raisins and cherries.
Mix mayonnaise, honey and sour cream; pour over fruit mixture and mix well.
Last, add nuts and marshmallows.
Keep refrigerated.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad For A Crowd
Ingredients:
2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. whipped cream
8 lb. tart apples
2 lb. celery, chopped
2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. sugar
8 oz. marshmallows, cut
8 oz. walnuts, chopped
Directions:
Blend mayonnaise and whipped cream.
Core and chop apples, adding to dressing immediately.
Add other ingredients except walnuts; mix lightly.
Salad can be chilled before serving.
Add walnuts just before serving.
Makes 50 (1/3-cup) servings (5 quarts).

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Classic Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. diced, tart apples
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. lemon juice
dash of salt
1 c. (1-inch) julienne celery sticks
