1 c. halved and seeded red Emperor grapes
1/2 c. broken walnuts
1/2 c. whipping cream, whipped
1/4 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Sprinkle apple cubes with sugar, lemon juice and salt.
Add celery, grapes and nuts.
Fold mayonnaise into whipped cream. Gently fold into apple mixture.
Chill and serve in lettuce-lined bowls.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. chopped apples or pears (2 medium)
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. slivered almonds or chopped pecans, toasted
1/4 c. celery
1/4 c. dried red tart cherries or raisins
1/4 c. seedless grapes, halved
1/3 c. whipping cream
1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
Directions:
In a medium mixing bowl, toss chopped apples or pears with lemon juice.
Stir in nuts, celery, cherries or raisins and grapes.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon, Fresh-Grilled Or Baked
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen salmon
2/3 c. onions, sliced
1 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/3 c. chopped fresh tomatoes
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1/4 c. parsley
3 Tbsp. chopped pimentos
1/2 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dill weed
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place salmon, skin side down, in baking dish which has been sprayed or greased and lined with aluminum foil.
Mix the vegetables, mushrooms, pimentos and parsley; put over fish.
Mix rest of ingredients and pour over fish.
Wrap foil over fish and seal tight.
Bake or grill 25 to 30 minutes at 350° or until flakes.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Horseradish Pate(A Great Way To Use Leftover Cooked Salmon)
Ingredients:
1 c. cooked salmon, flaked
1/3 c. shallots, minced
1 Tbsp. horseradish
2 Tbsp. diet mayonnaise (enough to hold it together)
freshly ground pepper
1 tsp. lemon juice
2 to 3 cucumbers, thinly sliced
Directions:
In a bowl, combine salmon, shallots, dill, horseradish, mayonnaise and pepper.
Let ripen at least 4 hours in the refrigerator.
(Keep only 1 to 2 days in the refrigerator.) Spread on thinly sliced cucumber rounds.
Can also be used as a dip for raw vegetables.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Baked Salmon
Ingredients:
1/3 c. oleo
1/3 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. grated lemon rind
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 c. diced celery
3 c. cooked rice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. thyme
Directions:
Melt butter in pan; saute celery and onion until tender, then toss with rice, lemon rind, salt, thyme and lemon juice.
This is enough to stuff a large salmon.
Sprinkle inside of fish with salt; stuff fish.
Spray foil and wrap fish in foil.
Prick holes in bottom.
Measure at thickest part of fish and bake in 450° oven, allowing 10 minutes cooking time for each inch of stuffed thickness.
Serve with lemon slice.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Delicious Salmon
Ingredients:
1 large (16 oz.) can pink salmon
1 large can whole tomatoes, cut in half
1 green pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 medium onion, chopped
3 stalks celery, cut into 2-inch pieces
2 sprigs parsley, chopped
1 tsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Heat olive oil in frying pan over moderate heat.
Drain salmon and tomatoes, saving juice from both.
Saute onions.
Add flour and mix smoothly, letting it brown slightly Pour liquid from salmon and tomatoes into onion mixture.
Stir in parsley, oregano, soy sauce and tomatoes.
Simmer for 5 minutes.
Lower heat and place salmon in single pieces of 8 inches in pan.
Add celery and green pepper around salmon.
Do not stir.
Simply place sauce on top and simmer 6 minutes.
Serve with vegetables, sauce and salmon wedges.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Dip
Ingredients:
1 can (1 lb.) salmon
juice of 1 lemon
2 tsp. chopped chives
1 tsp. minced onion
1/4 tsp. crumbled dried rosemary
1/8 tsp. coarse black pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Drain salmon; remove and discard bones and skin.
Mash salmon; add remaining ingredients, except sour cream.
Mix well; fold in sour cream.
Chill for at least one hour.
Makes 2 cups. Serve with chips or crackers.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: What Shall We Do With The Leftover Turkey
Ingredients:
6 slices white bread
2 c. cubed turkey
1 c. cubed ham
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
1 can sliced water chestnuts
1/4 c. sliced pimentos
1 c. mayo
3/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
2 slightly beaten eggs
1 1/2 c. milk
1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1/2 c. sharp cheese, shredded
Directions:
Butter 2 slices of bread.
Cut into small cubes and set aside. Cut remaining bread in cubes.
Place half of unbuttered cubes in bottom of an 8
x
8 x 2-inch baking dish. Combine turkey, ham, vegetables, seasonings and mayonnaise. Spoon over bread.
Place remaining unbuttered cubes over mixture. Combine eggs and milk; pour over all.
Chill for 1 hour or overnight. Spoon soup over top and sprinkle with the buttered cubes. Bake at 325° for 1 hour or until set. Sprinkle shredded cheese over top during the last few minutes of baking.
Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.
Makes 6 healthy servings.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Leftover Turkey Pie
Ingredients:
4 potatoes, diced
2 carrots, sliced
1 stalk celery, diced
1 onion, chopped
1/2 c. Bisquick
1/2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 stick butter or margarine
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. cold mashed potatoes
leftover turkey and gravy
leftover peas or other vegetables
Directions:
Grease 2-quart baking dish with butter generously.
Cook first four ingredients together.
Mix Bisquick, flour, parsley and margarine together.
Beat eggs; season with salt and pepper and mix with leftover mashed potatoes.
Add to Bisquick mixture and work together.
Mixture will be sticky.
Spoon mixture into dish and using the back of spoon, pat it into bottom and sides of dish. Save some mixture for top.
Put cold turkey, gravy and peas in dish; add potatoes, carrots, celery and onion.
Put more turkey and gravy in center.
Spoon Bisquick mixture around sides, sealing well.
Let circle in center open.
Bake at 375° to 400° for 1 hour.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Leftover Turkey, Chicken Or Pork
Ingredients:
2 c. diced, cooked turkey
2 c. chopped celery
1 c. cooked rice
1 c. mayo or Miracle Whip
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. chopped onion
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix all together.
Mixture will be dry.
Top with sliced almonds or croutons.
Bake at 450° for 20 minutes or until hot.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Thanksgiving Tomorrow
Ingredients:
3 c. leftover stuffing or 1 pkg. (6 oz.) stuffing mix, prepared according to pkg. directions
2 c. turkey, cooked and cubed
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat oven
to 350°.
Combine all ingredients, adding turkey broth or water if mixture is too dry.
Place in lightly greased 1-quart casserole dish.
Bake 35 to 45 minutes or until hot and lightly browned on top.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Leftover Turkey Casserole
Ingredients:
2 cups cooked (leftover) turkey, chopped
2 cups macaroni cooked
1 onion
1 green bell pepper
1 jar pimentos
1 can mushroom soup
1/2 to 1 pound Velveeta cut in small pieces
Milk
Salt
Directions:
Saute onion and pepper until tender in margarine.
Mix all ingredients together and bake until bubbly.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
4 lb. chicken fryer
1 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 c. melted butter
1/2 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. crushed rosemary
1 tsp. sweet basil, crushed
1 tsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°. Sprinkle chicken cavities with the garlic salt and crushed rosemary. Truss chicken and place in an open roasting pan. Combine butter, wine, rosemary, basil, parsley, salt and pepper in a small saucepan. Cook over low heat a few minutes until thoroughly blended.
Baste chicken with wine sauce. Roast 20 minutes per pound until tender. Baste frequently. The last 20 minutes, turn to brown underside.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) chicken
2 Tbsp. garlic powder with parsley
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoned salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Easy Garlic Chicken
Ingredients:
1 whole roasting chicken (about 3 lb.)
salt and pepper to taste
12 cloves garlic, peeled
1 medium onion, quartered
1/2 c. fresh parsley, snipped
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 bay leaf (optional)
2 Tbsp. tarragon vinegar
1/2 c. apple juice
Directions:
Wash chicken and pat dry.
Rub with salt and pepper.
Cut one clove of garlic in half and rub over chicken.
Place remaining garlic, onion quarters, parsley and thyme in chicken cavity. Place in roasting pan.
Place vinegar and apple juice in pan with chicken, using liquid for basting.
Roast at 425° for 20 minutes. Baste once with juices.
Reduce oven to 350° and roast at least 1 more hour, basting often.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Roast Chicken With Garlic
Ingredients:
1 (3 lb.) fryer
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. dried oregano
10 large unpeeled garlic cloves
1 1/2 Tbsp. each: olive oil, white cooking wine
freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Heat oven to 450°.
Rinse chicken.
Pat dry.
Place on prepared pan, breast side up.
Put 1 1/2 teaspoons in cavity, sprinkling evenly.
Split 8 cloves and put in cavity.
Peel and mince remaining garlic.
Mix with remaining salt and oregano, oil, cooking wine and pepper in a small dish.
Use your fingers to carefully separate skin from the entire breast area of the chicken without tearing it, making a pocket.
Spoon the garlic mixture into pocket; massage gently on surface to distribute it evenly over breast area.
Roast about 50 minutes.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken(Serves Four)
Ingredients:
1 large roasting chicken (about 6 lb.)
3 Tbsp. butter, softened
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. sage leaves
3/4 tsp. thyme leaves
3/4 tsp. basil leaves
6 Tbsp. butter, softened
salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Wash chicken; pat dry.
Cream together 3 tablespoons butter, garlic, Parmesan, sage, thyme and basil.
This mixture goes under the skin, so turn chicken breast side up and make skin as loose as possible.
Spread herb mixture underneath the skin.
Smear butter on outside of skin.
Put chicken breast up in roasting pan and place in oven.
Melt remaining butter.
Cook chicken 15 minutes, basting once.
Reduce to 350°.
Roast 20 minutes per pound, basting with butter every 10 minutes.
Serve.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushroom Soup(6 Cups)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, chopped
1 small clove garlic, minced
1 lb. fresh mushrooms, cut in 1/4-inch dices
1/4 c. flour
3 c. chicken stock
1 c. milk
1/4 c. dry sherry
1 bay leaf
1/4 c. (2 oz.) cream cheese, cut in bits
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. Tabasco sauce
3/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Melt butter in heavy saucepan.
Add onion and saute 3 to 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook 30 seconds.
Stir in mushrooms and saute until they release juices.
Sprinkle on flour and blend. Cook 1 minute.
Add stock, milk and sherry.
Bring to boil and stir constantly.
Add bay leaf and simmer 15 minutes.
Stir in cream cheese, lemon juice and Tabasco.
Stir until smooth and cream cheese is melted.
Season with salt.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Cream Of Mushroom Soup
Ingredients:
8 oz. mushrooms
1 pt. water or stock
3/4 pt. fresh milk
2 oz. butter or substitute
2 oz. flour
seasoning
Directions:
Chop mushrooms finely unless it is desired to strain the soup. Melt butter in saucepan; fry mushrooms for 5 minutes, stirring to prevent their discoloring.
Stir in the flour and cook for 3 minutes.
Remove the pan from the heat and gradually add water and milk.
Bring to the boil and cook until soup thickens.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Soup
Ingredients:
3 oz. dried mushrooms
1 qt. beef broth
2 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. sour cream
Directions:
Soak mushrooms for 3 to 4 hours and bring to a boil in a small amount of water.
Add the broth and simmer, covered, for half an hour.
Melt the butter; blend in the flour, salt and pepper.
Add the stock gradually while stirring.
Stir in sour cream just before serving.
Reheat, but don't let the soup boil.
Add more seasoning to taste.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Cream Of Mushroom Soup
Ingredients:
2 c. chopped fresh mushrooms
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1/4 c. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
3 c. milk
2 beef bouillon cubes, dissolved in 1 c. boiling water
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Saute mushrooms and onion in butter until tender (5 to 8 minutes).
Stir occasionally.
Blend in flour; add milk slowly and then beef stock, stirring to blend.
Add salt and pepper and cook, stirring constantly until soup is thickened.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushroom Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 large onion
1 clove garlic, finely chop
1 lb. mushrooms
3 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 1/2 c. chicken stock
2 1/2 c. milk or more (as desired)
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire
1/4 tsp. Tabasco
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. fresh chopped parsley
Directions:
Melt butter in skillet.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook until onion is tender.
Add mushrooms.
Cook until liquid is evaporated. Melt butter in large saucepan.
Whisk in flour.
Cook, stirring constantly, 2 to 3 minutes without browning.
Whisk in milk.
Add seasoning.
Bring to boil.
Reduce heat and cook 5 to 8 minutes.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach Squares
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. Feta cheese
2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
2 eggs
1/4 c. Romano cheese
1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small chopped onion
1 pkg. filo dough (1/2 for 9 x 13-inch pan)
1 1/2 sticks melted oleo
Directions:
Mix really good the first 6 ingredients.
Brush oleo in 9 x 13-inch pan.
Layer 1 sheet of filo; brush with oleo.
Do that about 7 or 8 layers.
Put filling on that and add about 7 more sheets of filo, brushing after each with oleo.
Put in refrigerator to chill, then cut through top layer just before you bake at 350° for 50 minutes.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Cheese
Ingredients:
speck of butter
3 eggs
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
1 tsp. or less pepper
1 tsp. baking powder
24 oz. shredded Cheddar (white)
2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 small onion
Directions:
In a very large bowl, beat eggs.
Add flour, milk, pepper and baking powder and mix.
Boil spinach and drain well.
Add cheese, spinach and finely chopped onion to bowl.
In pan, melt a little butter.
Wipe excess with paper towel.
Pour mix into 13 x 9 x 2-inch Teflon pan and bake uncovered at 350° for 35 minutes.
Best if covered and refrigerated overnight.
Cut like brownies when cold.
Heat in oven or microwave before serving.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach Balls
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
3 c. herb seasoned stuffing mix (crushed)
1 large finely chopped onion
6 well-beaten eggs (I used Egg Beaters)
3/4 c. melted butter or margarine
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. grated Italian cheese (example Mozzarella)
1 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. thyme
Directions:
Cook spinach, drain and squeeze out excess.
Combine spinach and all other ingredients.
Mix well.
Shape into 3/4-inch balls and place on lightly greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° about 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach Balls
Ingredients:
1 package frozen spinach
2 eggs
1/4 to 1/2 cup grated cheese
1/2 cup melted butter
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/2 small onion, chopped
1 cup Pepperidge Farm onion croutons or stuffing mix
Directions:
Cook spinach in microwave and drain.
Add eggs.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach Balls
Ingredients:
6 eggs
2 c. herb stuffing mix
1 large onion, grated
3/4 c. butter, at room temperature
salt and freshly ground pepper
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. poultry seasoning
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Beat eggs lightly in large bowl.
Add remaining ingredients and blend well.
Roll into walnut sized balls.
Transfer to baking sheet.
Bake until golden, about 20 minutes.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
10 to 12 small carrots
3 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. honey
Directions:
Cook carrots in small amount of boiling, salted water about 10 minutes or until tender.
Drain.
In a skillet, melt butter; add sugar and honey.
Simmer mixture for 2 minutes.
Add carrots and cook over low heat, turning until well glazed, about 5 minutes. Serves 6.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey-Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
2 lb. carrots, scraped and thinly sliced
1/2 c. water
3 Tbsp. honey
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. spiced mustard (this is optional)
Directions:
Combine carrots and water in medium saucepan.
Bring to a boil;
cover,
reduce
heat
and
simmer
8 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Drain and return to pan.
Add honey and remaining ingredients;
cook	over low heat, stirring gently, until butter and sugar melts.
Yields 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
4 1/2 c. sliced carrots
1 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 Tbsp. honey
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Boil carrots in water until tender; drain.
Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat; add honey and lemon juice, stirring until smooth.
Add carrots, tossing gently.
Serve.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
4 large carrots
1/2 stick butter/margarine
brown sugar
lemon juice (optional)
Directions:
Clean and slice carrots longways.
Then cut in half to desired thickness.
Boil until tender.
Drain water; add butter until melted, then add brown sugar to sweetness desired.
Stir until carrots are glazed.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
6 to 8 carrots
2 Tbsp. honey
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. parsley
2 Tbsp. orange juice
salt to taste
Directions:
Scrape or peel carrots.
Cook in a small amount of water until tender, but not soft, about 15 minutes.
Remove from water.
Place in a greased baking pan.
Mix honey and orange juice, pour over carrots.
Bake 15 minutes in moderate oven at 350°.
Sprinkle with parsley.
Serves 6.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients:
1 lb. rigatoni or pasta of your choice
1 small onion, chopped
4 cloves garlic, finely chopped
1 medium zucchini, peeled, halved lengthwise and sliced
1 c. broccoli cuts
1/2 c. lima beans
1/2 c. peas
2 carrots, cut in thin strips
3/4 c. crushed tomatoes
1/4 c. heavy cream
3 Tbsp. olive oil
salt and pepper
grated cheese
Directions:
Combine olive oil, onion and garlic in a large skillet.
Add all vegetables and season to taste with salt and pepper.
Cook on medium-high heat (stirring occasionally) until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Remove from heat.
Serve over cooked pasta. Sprinkle with grated cheese.
Makes approximately 6 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera(Springtime Pasta)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium diced onion
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
3 to 4 c. sliced vegetables (zucchini, squash, red and green pepper, fresh mushrooms, cauliflower or broccoli)
1 (14 oz.) can diced tomatoes, drained (reserve juice)
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
3/4 c. water
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. dried basil
linguine
olives
Directions:
Cook pasta.
Saute onion and garlic in medium skillet about 1 minute.
Add vegetables and saute 3 to 4 minutes.
Stir in reserved tomato juice, tomato paste and water.
Simmer 5 to 8 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Add tomatoes and basil, salt and pepper.
Simmer another couple of minutes.
Serve over pasta.
Garnish with olives.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
4 cloves garlic, chopped
2 Tbsp. plus 2 Tbsp. fat-free chicken broth
2 (15 oz. each) cans tomato sauce
4 Tbsp. honey
2 tsp. crushed dried oregano
2 tsp. crushed dried basil
pinch of white pepper (optional)
1 large red pepper, cut in 1-inch strips
1 1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 1/2 c. yellow summer squash or zucchini, cut in thin sticks 1 1/2-inches long
1 1/2 c. carrots, cut in thin sticks 1 1/2-inches long
1 1/2 c. small broccoli florets
2 Tbsp. plus 1 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
3/4 c. peas
10 oz. whole grain pasta, cooked
1/4 c. chopped green onion
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
In a medium saucepan, cook onion and garlic in 2 tablespoons broth 5 to 7 minutes or until softened over medium-high heat. Add tomato sauce, honey, oregano, basil and white pepper.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer gently for 20 minutes.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
4 chopped garlic cloves
2 Tbsp. plus 2 Tbsp. fat-free chicken broth
2 (15 oz.) no salt tomato sauce
4 Tbsp. honey
2 tsp. crushed dried oregano
2 tsp. crushed dried basil
pinch of white pepper
1 large red pepper, cut in 1-inch strips
1 1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 1/2 c. yellow summer squash or zucchini, cut in thin sticks (1 1/2-inches long)
1 1/2 c. carrots, cut in very thin sticks (1 1/2-inches long)
1 1/2 c. small broccoli florets
2 Tbsp. plus 1 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
3/4 c. peas
10 oz. whole grain cooked pasta
1/4 c. chopped green onions
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
In medium saucepan, cook onion and garlic in 2 tablespoons broth 5 to 7 minutes or until softened.
Add tomato sauce, honey, oregano, basil and white pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer gently for 20 minutes.
In a skillet or wok, combine red pepper, mushrooms, squash, carrots, broccoli and 2 tablespoons each balsamic vinegar and broth.
Stir-fry over high heat until crisp-tender, about 10 minutes.
Add peas and cook for 2 more minutes.
Set aside.
Add 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar to sauce and cook for 5 minutes.
Reserve 1 cup sauce to serve at table. Pour remaining sauce over cooked pasta and toss thoroughly.
Add stir-fried vegetables and toss again.
Sprinkle green onion and parsley over top.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients:
5 oz. corkscrew macaroni or fettuccine
1/4 c. water
2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1 (9 oz.) pkg. frozen French-style green beans
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (12 oz.) can evaporated skim milk
4 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. shredded Provolone or Mozzarella cheese (2 oz.)
1 medium tomato, cut into wedges
Directions:
Cook pasta according to directions, drain well.
Meanwhile, for sauce, in a medium saucepan, combine water, mushrooms, frozen beans, green pepper, garlic, 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
Bring to boiling, reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 4 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Do not drain.
Stir together milk and cornstarch; stir into vegetable mixture.
Cook and stir over medium heat until thickened and bubbly.
Cook and stir for 1 minute more.
Stir in cheese until melted.
To serve, pour over pasta.
Garnish with tomato wedges.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Couscous Salad
Ingredients:
2/3 c. water
1 c. couscous
about 3 Tbsp. olive oil
about 3 Tbsp. lemon juice
3 scallions (including green parts), finely chopped
1/2 c. tightly packed Italian parsley, finely chopped
2 medium ripe tomatoes, peeled, seeded and finely chopped
3 Tbsp. finely chopped mint
kosher salt
black pepper
Directions:
Bring the water to a boil in a small saucepan.
Pour in the couscous.
Cover the pan and remove from the heat.
Let stand for 5 minutes.
Uncover the pan and stir the couscous right away with a fork.
(If the grains do not separate, fluff them gently with your fingers.)
Transfer the couscous to a bowl and stir in the remaining ingredients.
Season the salad to taste with more lemon juice, salt and pepper.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Gourmet
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. onion
3 Tbsp. flour
2 c. milk
2 (14 oz.) cans spinach
3 boiled eggs
1/2 c. corn flakes, crushed
1/2 c. shredded cheese
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
paprika
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan; saut onion until tender. Add flour, stirring until smooth.
Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Gradually add milk; cook over medium heat, stirring until thick and bubbly.
Drain spinach in a colander; place on paper towels. Press until barely moist.
Stir spinach, eggs, salt and pepper into sauce.
Spread in a lightly greased 8-inch square baking dish.
Combine crushed flakes and cheese; mix well. Sprinkle over spinach mixture. Sprinkle lightly with paprika.
Bake at 375° for 20 minutes.
Yield: 6 servings.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Balls
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
3 c. herb seasoned stuffing mix (crushed)
1 large finely chopped onion
6 well-beaten eggs (I used Egg Beaters)
3/4 c. melted butter or margarine
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. grated Italian cheese (example Mozzarella)
1 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. thyme
Directions:
Cook spinach, drain and squeeze out excess.
Combine spinach and all other ingredients.
Mix well.
Shape into 3/4-inch balls and place on lightly greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° about 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Balls
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach
3 c. herb seasoned stuffing mix
1 large onion, finely chopped
6 well beaten eggs
3/4 c. margarine, melted
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. thyme
Directions:
Cook spinach by directions; drain well and squeeze to remove excess moisture.
Combine spinach and remaining ingredients; mix well.
Shape spinach mixture into 3/4-inch balls and place on lightly greased baking sheet.
Bake at 325° for 15 to 20 minutes. Makes 80 balls.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Creamed Spinach
Ingredients:
1 lb. spinach (fresh, frozen, canned)
1 Tbsp. butter
2 tsp. flour
few grains of pepper
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Wash fresh spinach thoroughly.
Add salt and cook until tender.
Do not add water.
Chop fresh spinach very fine.
Melt butter in a saucepan.
Blend in a mixture of flour, pepper and nutmeg.
Heat until mixture bubbles.
Remove from heat; add milk gradually, stirring constantly.
Bring to boil; cook 1 to 2 minutes longer.
Blend spinach into sauce and serve hot.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
3 fresh mangoes, peeled and chopped
16 oz. can unsweetened pears, chopped
20 oz. can chunk pineapple
16 oz. can unsweetened peaches
1 c. seedless golden raisins
1 c. coarsely chopped nuts, walnuts or pecans
1/2 pt. heavy cream
4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
Directions:
Drain all fruits well and add to mangoes.
Beat cream to pudding consistency, fold in mayo.
Put all ingredients together, cover, refrigerate until ready to serve. Serve with mint leaves for garnish.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Twenty-Four Hour Salad
Ingredients:
1 egg
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. sugar
pinch of salt
1/2 c. heavy cream, whipped
12 large or 48 small marshmallows, quartered
1 c. pineapple tidbits, drained
1 c. sliced orange sections
1 c. seedless grapes
1 c. sliced bananas
10 maraschino cherries, quartered
1/2 c. toasted almond slivers
crisp salad greens
Directions:
In a double boiler, beat egg with a fork; stir in lemon juice, sugar and salt.
Cook over boiling water, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens.
Remove from heat and allow to cool completely.
Fold in whipped cream, marshmallows and fruits. Refrigerate for 24 hours.
To serve, fold in almonds and arrange on crisp greens.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: *Mango Chutney*
Ingredients:
6 lb. mangos (about 26 large mangos, or about 12 cups), chopped or put through grinder course
5 lb. brown sugar
3 pt. vinegar
2 c. water
1 c. ginger, finely chopped
1 c. onion, finely chopped
1 doz. small Hawaiian chili peppers, without seeds
6 doz. whole Hawaiian chili peppers
3 Tbsp. salt
3 cloves garlic, finely chopped
1 lb. seedless raisins, chopped
1 lb. seeded raisins, whole
Directions:
Combine vinegar, water, salt and sugar in a large pot and bring to a boil.
Add onions, raisins, garlic and ginger and bring to a boil again.
Add mangos and chili peppers and bring to a boil.
Cook for 20-30 minutes until mangos look clear or glassy. Gently stir mixture occasionally to avoid sticking to the bottom of the pot.
Remove from heat, place mixture in hot sterilized jars and seal immediately.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Spinach & Mango Salad With Shrimp(A Quick And Easy Delight)
Ingredients:
1 bag pre-washed baby leaf spinach
2 large mangos, peeled and diced
2 Haas avocados, peeled, diced and soaked briefly in lemon juice
1 can palm hearts, drained and chopped (optional)
2 c. small cooked shrimp (fresh works best but frozen shrimp that has been thawed is good, too)
1 c. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
Directions:
Toss everything together and serve with your favorite dressing. Serves 3 to 4.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Large Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
1 (large) can fruit cocktail
1 (large) can crushed pineapple
1 can mandarin oranges
1 large Cool Whip
1 (3 oz.) lemon instant pudding
1 c. raisins or nuts
2 c. small marshmallows
Directions:
Drain all fruit juices.
Mix fruit with Cool Whip, raisins or nuts and marshmallows.
Sprinkle dry pudding mix over when Cool Whip is added.
If this is dry, spoon in a few spoons of fruit juice.
Large salad, is good to make a few days ahead of time.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Seafood Paella
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) can crab meat
1 can smoked oysters
1 Tbsp. corn oil
1/2 c. chopped green onion with tops
4 c. cooked yellow saffron rice
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can diced tomato
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 lb. fresh or frozen peeled shrimp
2 c. frozen green peas, defrosted
1/2 oz. jar chopped pimiento with juice
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3 large bay leaves
Directions:
Saute onions in oil.
Combine all ingredients in stove top pan.
Simmer for 20 to 25 minutes until seafood is cooked.
Remove bay leaves before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Paella
Ingredients:
2 c. rice (yellow)
2 c. chicken chunks
1/2 c. sliced black olives
1 c. scallops
1 c. shrimp
2 to 3 muscles
6 clams
lobster tails (if desired)
other seafood of desire (optional)
Directions:
Steam or boil all seafood.
Cook rice.
Mix all ingredients together and bake 20 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Paella
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. raw shrimp
1/4 lb. raw little neck clams
1/4 lb. raw mussels
2 Tbsp. Spanish olive oil
3 chorizos or 1/2 lb. Italian sausage
3 Tbsp. Spanish olive oil
1 (1 1/2 or 2 lb.) chicken, cut up
1/2 c. flour or more if needed
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. Spanish olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
1 green pepper, sliced
1 (1 lb.) can tomatoes, drained
3 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground saffron
6 c. boiling water
1 pkg. frozen peas, thawed
1/4 c. sliced pimiento
Directions:
Remove shells from shrimp, leaving tails.
Devein by making shallow incision down the back and running under cold water.
Set aside.
Scrub clams and mussels.
Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet.
Prick sausages with a fork to let out steam and cook in skillet until brown.
Pour off oil; add water to cover sausages.
Cover pan and simmer 5 minutes; set aside.
In a separate skillet, heat 3 tablespoons olive oil.
Mix 1/2 cup flour, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper.
Use to lightly coat chicken. Brown chicken until golden.
Set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Paella
Ingredients:
1/2 c. dry white wine
3 Tbsp. saffron threads
light vegetable oil cooking spray
1 c. chopped onion (1 medium onion)
1 c. arborio rice
1 banana pepper, trimmed and cut into strips
1 red bell pepper, trimmed and cut into strips
1 yellow bell pepper, trimmed and cut into strips
3 c. hot chicken stock, fat skimmed off
6 oz. boneless, skinless chicken breast, cubed
1/2 c. squid rings
1/2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
12 mussels, scrubbed
12 littleneck clams, scrubbed
4 (3 oz.) freshwater lobster tails or 2 (6 oz.) lobster tails, cut in half
1/2 c. canned sliced artichoke hearts
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 c. chopped tomato (1 medium tomato)
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 350°.
Put the white wine and saffron threads in a small bowl and set aside.
Preheat a large, heavy paella pan or frying pan for about 1 minute over medium-high heat. Spray it 4 times with the vegetable oil.
Saute the onion for 2 to 3 minutes until limp.
Add the rice and saute for about 1 minute until golden.
Add the wine and saffron and stir until the liquid is completely absorbed.
Stir in the peppers.
Add the hot chicken stock 1/4 cup at a time, stirring until absorbed.
Keep the stock over low heat.
When only 1/2 cup of the chicken stock remains to be added, stir in the chicken.
With the last addition of stock, stir in the squid and shrimp.
Turn the burner off.
The rice should be tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Spanish Paella
Ingredients:
4 oz. butter
1 large sweet yellow onion, chopped
2 lb. boned chicken breasts, skinned, sauteed, cut into 1-inch strips and set aside in a bowl
2 c. long grain rice
1 to 2 Tbsp. saffron, crushed
4 c. chicken broth (1/3 less salt)
1 chorizo sausage, cooked well, drained of fat, mashed and set aside in a bowl
1 red bell pepper, chopped
18 small clams in shells, scrubbed
1 lobster tail, cleaned and cut into chunks
2 lb. fresh fish (halibut, scallops, sea bass), cooked, sauteed in butter and set aside in a bowl
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
In a large paella pan or iron skillet, saute onion and red bell pepper in butter until softened.
Add rice to pan and cook 10 minutes.
Do not brown.
Add more butter, if necessary.
Stir in chicken broth and saffron and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce to a low simmer and cook, uncovered, for 20 minutes or until rice is tender.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Potato Chips
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
1 inch deep vegetable oil
salt
Directions:
Slice potatoes as thinly as possible.
Soak in cold water for 1 hour; drain and pat dry.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Homemade Potato Chips
Ingredients:
2 medium size Russet potatoes (about 1 lb.), sliced 1/16 inch thick
1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 350°.
Lightly grease a nonstick baking sheet.
Arrange the potato slices in 1 layer on the baking sheet and bake, turning occasionally, for 45 minutes or until golden brown.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Potato Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. white sugar
2 eggs
2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. vanilla
2 c. crushed potato chips (6 oz. pkg.)
1 c. nuts (optional)
Directions:
Cream together butter, brown sugar and white sugar.
Add eggs and beat well after each.
Sift together flour, salt and soda. Add all together and add vanilla.
Crush potato chips and nuts. Mix all ingredients together.
Mix well.
Drop by spoonfuls on ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake 10 minutes at 350°.
Take up hot.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Fresh Fried Potato Chips
Ingredients:
7 or 8 medium potatoes, scraped and sliced thin
1 c. Pet milk
1/2 c. flour
deep fat (for frying)
pepper and salt to taste
Directions:
Put potatoes in a large bowl and add salt and pepper.
Moisten well with Pet milk.
Sift about 1/2 cup flour over potatoes and coat potatoes well.
Fry in deep fat until brown.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Potato Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 lb. butter
1 1/2 c. sugar
3 1/2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. vanilla
1 c. chopped pecans
1 1/2 c. crushed potato chips
Directions:
Mix all ingredients.
Make 1-inch balls.
Flatten on cookie sheet (the thinner the better).
Bake at 350° for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with confectioners sugar when cool.
Yields 7 to 8 dozen. This is a really stiff batter, be patient.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. peanut oil
1 c. chopped onion
1 1/2 tsp. minced garlic
7 c. chicken broth
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. thinly sliced carrots
1 tsp. minced ginger root
1 lb. lean pork, cut in strips
1 (8 oz.) can bamboo shoots, drained
1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
6 oz. frozen pea pods
1/4 tsp. sesame oil
2 eggs, well beaten
Directions:
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, ginger and pork; cook and stir until tender. Stir in broth, soy sauce, pepper and sesame oil; bring to a boil. Add carrots; simmer 15 minutes.
Add all remaining ingredients except eggs; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low.
Stir in eggs with a fork to separate into strands.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
4 cans chicken broth
1/4 c. water
3 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 beaten eggs
Directions:
Heat broth.
Make a paste of cornstarch and water. Add sugar, salt and pepper. Stir in cornstarch mixture. Cook and stir until slightly thick.
Holding eggs above the pot, pour in slowly, constantly stirring to break into strings.
Serve with noodles. May top with chopped green onions.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
1 c. chicken bouillon
1 tsp. cornstarch, dissolved in 1 Tbsp. cold water
1 medium egg, beaten
1 small slice ginger root, diced
1 oz. scallion (including part of green top), chopped
Directions:
Bring bouillon to a boil; stir in cornstarch mixture.
Remove from heat.
With chopstick in one hand, stir the soup.
With the other hand, slowly pour the beaten egg into soup, stirring to create egg shreds.
Remove from heat.
Put ginger in soup bowl and add soup.
Top with scallion.
Serve at once.
Yield:
1 serving.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
2 cans (14 1/2 oz.) clear chicken broth
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. rice wine vinegar or dry sherry
2 tsp. soy sauce
3 green onions, sliced
2 eggs, beaten
Directions:
In 2-quart microwave-safe casserole, stir together broth, cornstarch, vinegar and soy sauce until smooth.
Stir in onions and cover with lid.
Microwave on High 10 minutes or until boiling, stirring twice during cooking.
With fork, stir broth in swirling motion without stirring.
Slowly pour eggs into swirling broth, then stir just until eggs are set in long strands.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
2 eggs
2 tsp. water
2 scallions
1 Tbsp. water
6 c. stock
1/2 tsp. sugar
3/4 to 1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sherry
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Beat eggs and stir in water.
Mince scallions.
Blend cornstarch and remaining cold water to a paste.
Bring stock to a boil.
Reduce heat to medium and stir in sugar, salt, sherry and soy sauce.
Add cornstarch paste and cook, stirring, until soup thickens and is smooth.
Reduce heat to low.
Pour eggs in slowly, stirring constantly, until they separate into shreds, then turn off the heat.
Garnish with minced scallions.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. black beans
1/4 lb. ham for seasoning
1 large onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 green peppers, chopped
1 bay leaf
1/8 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
3 to 4 c. cold water
2 pkg. yellow rice
chopped green onions, fat-free sour cream and tomato for garnish (optional)
Directions:
Wash beans thoroughly.
Cover with water and put in large pot to soak overnight.
Drain beans and place in crock-pot with 3 to 4 cups of water.
Add all other ingredients, except the rice.
Cook on high for 1 hour, then cook 8 to 10 hours on low.
Remove bay leaf.
Cook rice according to directions on package.
Serve beans over rice.
Garnish as desired.
This is a low-fat, high fiber meal.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Black Bean And Rice Bake
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 1/2 c. chopped onion
3 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 c. chopped red bell pepper
1 (4 oz.) can diced green chiles
1 c. crushed, drained canned tomatoes
1 Tbsp. lime juice
1 1/2 to 2 tsp. chili powder
3/4 tsp. salt
16 oz. drained, cooked black beans
2 c. cooked brown rice
4 oz. Cheddar or Jack cheese
Directions:
Preheat
oven
to
350°.
Heat	oil
in
heavy,
large, nonstick
skillet
over
medium
heat.
Add
onion and garlic; saute 8
to 10 minutes until tender.
Add bell pepper; saute 3 minutes.
Stir in tomatoes, lime juice, chili powder and salt; bring to
a boil.
In a 2-quart casserole, mix beans and rice. Pour in
tomato
mixture and stir to combine.
Sprinkle casserole with cheese.
Bake 10 to 15 minutes until hot and bubbly. Healthy. Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. black beans
1 c. chopped onion
1 green pepper, chopped
1 garlic clove, chopped
4 c. cooked rice
1/2 c. olive oil
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 smoked ham bone
1/4 c. chopped green onion
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
Directions:
Wash black beans in accordance with package instructions. Boil beans in 6 cups water.
Saute chopped onion, green pepper and garlic in olive oil for 5 minutes or until softened.
Add sauteed mixture to beans with salt, black pepper and ham bone. Cover and simmer until beans are soft, adding more water as needed.
Serve over rice.
Garnish with green onion and vinegar (to taste).
Recommended with seafood or as cold salad.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Black Beans-Cuban Style
Ingredients:
1 lb. dried black beans
1 whole bay leaf
1 green pepper, cut in quarters
1 large onion
1 tsp. minced garlic
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
ham hock (optional)
salt and pepper
Directions:
Soak black beans overnight in cold water.
In morning, rinse beans and cover with fresh water in crock-pot.
Add all ingredients except salt, pepper and vinegar.
Cook until tender, then season with salt and pepper.
Add vinegar and cook for 1/2 hour more.
Serve over white rice.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Mexican Black Beans
Ingredients:
2 1/4 c. water
3/4 c. dried black beans*
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 tsp. lemon peel
1/4 tsp. red pepper sauce
2 green onions (with tops), thinly sliced
1 c. green bell pepper, chopped
Directions:
Heat water and beans to boiling in 2-quart saucepan.
Boil uncovered 2 minutes; reduce heat.
Cover and simmer about 1 hour, stirring occasionally, until beans are tender (do not boil or beans will burst); drain.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Cook and stir until mixture is hot.
Also great served cold.
Makes 4 servings, 135 calories, 1 gram of fat.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken-Broccoli Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 tsp. oil
2 whole chicken breasts, boned and thinly sliced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 (16 oz.) pkg. broccoli cuts
1 medium red pepper, sliced into 1/2-inch pieces
2 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. chicken flavored instant bouillon
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/2 c. water
Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Heat oil in
a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Stir-fry chicken and garlic for 3 to 5 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink. Reduce heat.
Remove chicken and keep warm. Stir in broccoli and red pepper. Cover and steam 3 to 5 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
1 lb. fresh broccoli
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 medium onion, chunked
2 medium-size red tomatoes, chunked
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, quartered
1/3 c. stir-fry sauce
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
Directions:
Cut chicken into 1-inch square pieces.
Cut broccoli flowerets into bite-size pieces and peeled stalks into thin slices.
Heat oil in large skillet over high heat.
Add chicken; stir-fry 1 minute.
Add broccoli and onion; stir-fry 1 minute.
Add 2 tablespoons water; cover and cook 2 minutes, stirring once.
Add bell peppers and mushrooms; stir-fry 3 minutes.
Add stir-fry sauce and crushed red pepper.
Cook, stirring, until chicken and vegetables are coated with sauce.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fried Chicken And Broccoli
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 whole chicken breasts, skinned and cut in 1-inch pieces
2 c. broccoli flowerets
1 medium red bell pepper, cut in 1-inch chunks
1/2 c. sliced onion
1 large clove garlic, minced
1 1/2 c. vegetable juice
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. grated, fresh ginger
3 c. hot, cooked rice
Directions:
In 10-inch skillet over medium heat in hot oil, cook chicken, a few pieces at a time, until lightly browned.
Remove with slotted spoon.
Add broccoli, pepper, onion and garlic; cook until tender-crisp.
In small bowl, stir together juice, cornstarch, soy sauce, brown sugar and ginger.
Stir into vegetables.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until slightly thickened.
Add reserved chicken pieces and heat through.
Serve over hot, cooked rice.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. chicken filets, chopped
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 can mushrooms
1 c. sliced carrots
1 box frozen broccoli
1 can broccoli soup with 1 can water
3/4 c. instant rice
Directions:
Saute chicken in butter.
Add onions and mushrooms.
Add carrots and thawed broccoli, soup, water and rice.
Cover and cook until rice is done.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Chicken And Broccoli
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/4 lb. skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch pieces
2 c. broccoli florets
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
4 scallions, cut into 1-inch pieces
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 Tbsp. dry sherry
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1 tsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. water
1 tsp. Oriental sesame oil
Directions:
In a large frying pan or wok, heat oil over medium high heat. Add the chicken cubes and stir-fry 3 minutes, until chicken becomes opaque.
Remove with slotted spoon and set aside.
Add broccoli, fry for 1 to 2 minutes.
Add mushrooms, scallions, soy sauce, ginger and sesame oil.
Stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add cornstarch, dissolved in water, and chicken.
Cook until heated through and sauce has thickened.
Serve over rice or angel hair pasta.
Serves 4.
Preparation time 20 minutes.
Cooking time 20 minutes.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: The Best Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
6 slices bacon, cut across into 1/4-inch pieces
1/2 c. pine nuts
2-1/2 lb. (8 cups) Brussels sprouts, halved, cored and each half cut into quarters
2 tsp. minced garlic
1 cup carrots, peeled and cut into very small dice
2 tsp. salt
Freshly ground pepper to taste
1/4 c. chopped Italian parsley
Directions:
Place the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat and cook until the fat is rendered.
Add the pine nuts and cook until the bacon is crisp and the nuts are golden, about 1 minute.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts With Bacon
Ingredients:
3 slices bacon, coarsely chopped
1/4 c. chopped pecans
2 (10 oz. each) boxes frozen Brussels sprouts, thawed and halved or 2 c. fresh, halved
1/4 c. apple juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook bacon over medium heat for 5 minutes, stirring frequently until crisp.
Stir in pecans and cook 1 minute, until roasted. Drain all but 1 tablespoon fat from skillet; remove bacon and pecans to a paper towel.
Add Brussels sprouts and stir to coat with remaining bacon fat.
Stir in apple juice, cover and bring to a boil over high heat.
Reduce heat to low and simmer 8 to 10 minutes (for frozen) or 10 to 12 minutes (for fresh).
Before serving, add bacon, pecans, salt and pepper.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Company Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
4 bacon strips, diced
1 doz. Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
1 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh chives
1 carrot, thinly sliced
10 stuffed green olives, sliced
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/3 c. chicken broth or dry white wine
1 tsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. pepper
pinch of salt
Directions:
In a skillet, fry bacon just until cooked.
Drain, reserving 2 tablespoons drippings.
Add remaining ingredients; cook and stir over medium-high heat for 10 to 15 minutes or until Brussels sprouts are crisp-tender.
Yields 4 servings.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts With Bacon
Ingredients:
1 lb. Brussels sprouts
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
4 slices bacon
Directions:
Trim the bottoms of the Brussels sprouts and pull off any withered leaves. Cook them in boiling salted water until tender, about 10 minutes; drain. Cut the bacon into 1-inch pieces and fry until crisp. Drain on paper towels. Pour off all but 2 tablespoons of the fat from the pan. Add the vinegar to the pan and cook 1 minute over medium-high heat, scraping up the browned bits in the bottom of the pan. Add the Brussels sprouts and toss until warm. Sprinkle with bacon.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Easy And Good Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
8 bacon slices diced
1 med. onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
1 container brussels sprouts
salt and pepper
Directions:
Par boil brussels sprouts until medium hard about 7-10 minutes. Fry bacon, onion and garlic until brown.
Add brussels sprouts to pan and mix.
Add salt and pepper to taste and saute 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. old-fashioned oats
1 c. raisins or dried cranberries
1 c. unsalted peanuts
1/2 c. unsalted sunflower seeds
2 1/2 c. Rice Krispies
2 Tbsp. sesame seeds
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. chunky peanut butter
1 (10 oz.) pkg. marshmallows
Directions:
Toast oats for 15 minutes at 250°. Add peanuts, raisins and sunflower seeds. Cool. Mix in Rice Krispies. Melt butter, peanut butter and marshmallows. Add dry mixture
and mix together. Press into buttered pan. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. To serve, cut into desired size or cut and wrap to store.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
1 c. butter or oleo
1/2 c. peanut butter
1 (10 oz.) pkg. marshmallows
2 c. Rice Krispies
2 c. Minute oatmeal
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 c. peanuts
wheat germ
Directions:
Melt butter, peanut butter and marshmallows in a microwave until smooth. Add remaining ingredients, mixing thoroughly. Pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan lined with foil or sprayed with cooking spray. Flatten. When set, cut into squares.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. Rice Krispies cereal
1 c. quick oats
1/2 c. toasted sesame seed
1/4 c. butter (1/2 stick)
1/2 c. peanut butter
1 (10 oz.) pkg. marshmallows
1/2 c. peanuts, halved
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Grease 9 x 13-inch pan.
In large frying pan, combine cereal, oats and sesame seed.
Toast over medium heat for a few minutes until crisp, stirring constantly.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Banana Energy Bars
Ingredients:
3/4 c. soft margarine
1 c. packed brown sugar
1 egg
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. mashed ripe bananas
4 c. uncooked oats
1 c. raisins
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Cream margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in egg, salt and bananas.
Stir in remaining ingredients.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
3 c. miniature marshmallows
1/2 c. crunchy peanut butter
1/4 c. honey
3 Tbsp. margarine
4 Tbsp. cocoa
4 c. Rice Krispies
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Melt together first 5 ingredients, stirring over low heat until marshmallows are melted. Add Rice Krispies and vanilla. Place in foil-lined pan and cool thoroughly. Cut into squares. Store in plastic container.
Makes 24 squares.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. shortening
1 egg, well beaten
1/3 c. milk (about)
1 pkg. frozen strawberries, slightly defrosted
whipped cream
Directions:
Set oven for very hot (450°).
Grease 8-inch round cake pan. Mix and sift flour, baking powder, salt and sugar.
Cut in shortening with 2 knives or a pastry blender, until mixture looks like coarse meal.
Combine egg and milk; stir into flour mixture. If dough is too stiff, add more milk.
Pat or roll out into an 8-inch circle and put in pan.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
4 egg whites
1 1/2 sticks softened butter
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 c. milk
3 c. finely sifted flour
4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 qt. strawberries
3 c. whipping cream (or more; use mountains of whipped cream!)
1/4 c. sugar
Directions:
Stiffly whip the cream.
Rinse and cap the strawberries; blot dry on paper towels.
Slice strawberries and sprinkle with sugar. (If strawberries are sweet, no sugar is required.)
Divide the strawberries and put between cake layers.
(Do not put strawberries on top or they may bleed into cream.)
Spread whipped cream over the cake.
Cut and serve.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. milk
3/4 c. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 large egg, beaten
3 pt. fresh strawberries
whipped cream
Directions:
Sift first 4 ingredients together.
Cut in butter with pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles coarse meal.
Pour beaten egg into the flour mixture and knead about 20 seconds. Brush with melted butter, pat out the remaining half of the dough over top.
Bake 12 to 15 minutes or until done.
Turn out on cooking rack.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
1 qt. fresh strawberries
1 c. sugar
2 c. all-purpose flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. shortening
1 c. milk
butter or margarine
light cream or whipped cream
Directions:
Slice strawberries and sprinkle with 1 cup of sugar.
Let stand 1 hour.
Heat oven to 450°.
Grease round layer pan, 8 x 1 1/2-inches.
Measure flour, 2 tablespoons of sugar, baking powder and salt into a bowl.
Cut in shortening thoroughly until mixture looks like meal.
Stir in milk just until blended. Put into pan. Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until golden brown.
Split shortcake while warm. Spread with butter. Fill and top with berries.
Serve warm with cream.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Old Fashion Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
2 tsp. cream of tartar
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. shortening (heaping)
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. milk
strawberries
Directions:
Blend sifted dry ingredients and shortening. Add milk. Stir only to mix and place on well floured board. Roll out 2 layers. Place together in round cake pan (greased and floured) with soft butter between layers. Bake at 375° for 20 minutes. Separate layers and put sweetened strawberries between and on top. Top with whipped cream. Serve hot.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Dry Rub
Ingredients:
1/4 c paprika
2 Tbsp granulated garlic
2 Tbsp Granulated onion
2 tsp peppercorns
1 tsp dry mustard
1 tsp chili powder
2 Tbsp cumin seed, toasted
3 Tbsp coriander seed, toasted
1/4 c kosher salt
1/4 c light brown sugar
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a clean coffee grinder. Rub on chicken directly or coat in a plastic storage bag. Make sure chicken is dry before applying.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Honey Barbecue Rub
Ingredients:
4 beef top sirloins (4 oz. each)
1/4 c. honey
4 cloves garlic, diced
2 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. chili powder
2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Rub each steak with 1 tablespoon honey.
Combine rest of the ingredients and rub into steaks.
Let stand 20 to 30 minutes. Barbecue or broil to desired degree of doneness.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Goodie'S Bbq Rub
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp salt
2 Tbsp crushed red pepper
1/2 Tbsp dry rosemary
1 Tbsp chopped garlic
2 Tbsp cayenne pepper
1 Tbsp dry sage
2 Tbsp paprika
Directions:
Mix all together and use as a dry rub before cooking ribs or chicken.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Dry Rub Mix
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. paprika
2 Tbsp. light brown sugar
2 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. red cayenne pepper
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 bay leaf
Directions:
Process until the bay leaf is pulverized and mixture is thoroughly blended.
Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 3 months.
Makes about 1/2 cup.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Basting Solution
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil
3/4 c. vinegar
1/2 c. water
2 tsp. salt
1/4 lb. margarine
Directions:
Combine ingredients in saucepan; heat well.
Brush or spray over chicken every 5 to 10 minutes while grilling.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Chicken-Spinach Picnic Salad
Ingredients:
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1/2 tsp. sugar
3 c. cooked, cubed chicken
2 c. broccoli florets
1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts
Parmesan cheese
3 tsp. vinegar
1 tsp. minced onion
1/4 tsp. pepper
5 oz. fresh spinach, torn in bite size pieces
6 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
Directions:
Mix soy sauce, vinegar, oil, onion, sugar and pepper and pour over chicken to marinate.
Refrigerate for at least several hours. Combine spinach, broccoli, chestnuts and bacon.
Just before serving, add chicken mixture.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Spinach
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
4 chicken breasts (8 halves)
1 c. mayonnaise
2 cans cream of chicken soup
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. curry powder
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Squeeze excess liquid out of spinach.
Spread in 9 x 13-inch dish.
Put chicken on top.
Mix mayo, soup, lemon juice and curry. Spread on top of chicken.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake at 350° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Grits
Ingredients:
4 servings instant grits
1 can chicken broth
1 Tbsp. dry wine
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. ground red pepper
1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach, prepared according to pkg. directions
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 c. fat-free Cheddar cheese
1 1/4 c. prepared barbecue sauce
1 1/4 c. water
2 tsp. dried thyme
1 1/2 tsp. chicken bouillon
1 1/3 lb. potatoes, cut in 1/4-inch slices
Directions:
In large saute pan, combine all ingredients except potatoes; bring to a boil.
Add potatoes; cover and simmer 20 to 25 minutes until tender, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Meat Combination
Ingredients:
1 lb. spinach, fresh or frozen
1 bell pepper, diced (red and green)
1 tsp. sugar
pepper and salt to taste
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. onion powder or small dried onion
1 chicken breast, cut up
1/2 lb. beef for stew
Directions:
In a 3-quart pot with cover, cook beef in 1 cup water for 1/2 hour, then add chicken breast with spinach and other ingredients. Add water as needed.
Cook for 45 minutes.
Usually served over rice.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Fried Spinach Stuffed Chicken Breast
Ingredients:
1 (10-oz.) frozen chopped spinach, thawed, drained
1/4 c. sour cream
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg (optional)
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
6 chicken breasts, skinless, boneless
1 egg
1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Place breast between heavy plastic wrap and flatten to 1/4-inch thickness.
Place 1/2 teaspoon of spinach mixture on each flattened breast.
Fold in sides and ends and secure with toothpicks. Combine egg and milk, mix well.
Dredge chicken in flour mixture, then dip in egg mixture, and dredge in flour mixture.
Pour oil to 1 inch in skillet and fry chicken in hot oil about 15 minutes or until golden brown.
May also dip in egg wash and roll in cornflake crumbs (with seasonings) and bake.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Flaky Pie Crust
Ingredients:
1 1/3 c. flour (all-purpose)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 c. oil
2 Tbsp. cold water
Directions:
In a medium bowl, sift together flour and salt.
Dribble oil over flour.
Mix with flour until oil and flour are mixed.
Dribble water over this mixture.
Stir to form smooth ball.
Dampen work surface.
Put large wax paper down.
Put dough on this.
Cover with another piece of wax paper.
Roll out.
Remove wax paper.
Shape in pie plate.
Prick holes in shell for cream pies.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in a 425° oven.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Three Flaky Pie Crusts
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1 1/3 c. Crisco
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1 egg
3 Tbsp. vinegar
7 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Mix flour, baking powder and salt together.
Cut in shortening.
Mix egg, water and vinegar in a cup; beat slightly. Then pour into flour mixture and mix (with fork or pie dough cutter) until you can form one big ball.
Divide into 3 sections. Place each part into a quart size plastic bag.
Mash each flat. Refrigerate extras up to one month in Ziploc bag.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Flaky Pie Crust
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1 c. shortening
1 tsp. salt
1 egg
5 Tbsp. water
1 Tbsp. vinegar
Directions:
Mix flour, shortening and salt thoroughly.
Then mix egg well and add water and vinegar.
Add this to the flour mixture.
This is very flaky and tasty.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Flaky Pie Crust
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1 c. Crisco
1 tsp. salt
1 egg
3 Tbsp. cold water
2 Tbsp. vinegar
Directions:
Blend flour, shortening and salt.
Cut in shortening until pieces are the size of small peas.
Beat egg; mix with water and vinegar.
Add to flour mixture and toss lightly with fork.
Roll out onto floured board or wax paper.
Makes 3 single crusts.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Flaky Pie Crust
Ingredients:
4 c. flour, sifted
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. salt
1 3/4 c. shortening
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/2 c. cold water
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar and salt.
Cut in shortening.
Blend vinegar, egg and water.
Stir in flour until it forms a ball. Chill 15 minutes and then divide into fourths.
Makes four 9-inch crusts.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. (12 oz.) frozen, peeled, deveined, quick cooking shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup. Microwave at high 30-45 second, until melted. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
3 garlic cloves, smashed and chopped
1 1/2 green peppers, cut into thin strips
salt and pepper
1 large lemon, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Heat butter in large frying pan.
Add shrimp and cook 2 minutes on each side over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and season well. Continue cooking for 1 minute.
Stir in green peppers and diced lemon.
Cook 1 more minute.
Add parsley, paprika, salt and pepper. Mix and serve.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter(Microwave; Easy)
Ingredients:
1/2 stick butter
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 (12 oz.) pkg. frozen, peeled and deveined shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in microwave-safe dish (8 or 9-inch); a Corning Ware dish works great.
Heat butter 35 to 45 seconds to melt. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.
Place shrimp in colander; run cold water over to clean and separate.
Drain.
Stir shrimp into butter mixture to evenly coat.
Cover tightly with plastic wrap.
Microwave 6 to 8 minutes on High.
Stir every 2 minutes.
When shrimp are tender and opaque, let stand 1 1/2 minutes before serving.
Serve with toothpicks.
Fresh shrimp may be used if deveined and peeled.
Makes 1 1/2 to 2 cups.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Butter
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. cleaned, cooked shrimp, chopped
1 hard-cooked egg, chopped
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1/2 c. butter, softened
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. lite mayonnaise
1 clove garlic, mashed
1/8 tsp. white pepper
1/8 tsp. Worcestershire
Directions:
Insert metal blade in food processor.
Add all ingredients. Process until smooth.
Line a 2 cup mold with plastic wrap.
Leave extra to hang over edge.
Spoon in mixture.
Press to remove air spaces and to make a nice smooth shape when unmolded later.
Chill 6 hours or overnight.
Invert mold on serving plate.
Peel off plastic.
Garnish with parsley sprigs, cherry tomato halves and lemon slices.
Serve with crackers or toast squares.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. frozen shrimp, peeled
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup.
Microwave on High for 30 to 40 seconds until melted.
Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes. Separate shrimp and place in 9 or 10-inch diameter dish.
Pour butter mixture over shrimp evenly.
Cover tightly.
Microwave 5 to 8 minutes until shrimp are opaque, stirring every 2 minutes.
Let stand, covered, for 1 to 2 minutes.
Serve over noodles or some form of pasta.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken breasts, skinless, boneless and cut up
1 c. flour
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. olive oil
1 c. chicken broth
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 lemons, sliced very thin
1/2 c. finely chopped parsley
Directions:
Place cutlets between 2 pieces of foil and pound until very thin. Dredge in flour and salt. Shake off excess.
Heat butter and oil. Saute chicken 5 minutes over medium heat, turning meat only once.
If skillet is not large enough, as soon as first slices are done, pile on a plate and keep warm. Return all chicken to skillet, adding the chicken broth. Simmer until the liquid is reduced by half.
Add lemon juice and thin slices of lemon.
Heat only until lemons are hot.
Add parsley at the last minute. Serve with the sauce poured over and garnish with the hot lemon slices.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
6 chicken breast halves, skinned and boned
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 lemon, thinly sliced
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Place each piece of chicken between 2 sheets of waxed paper; flatten to 1/4-inch thickness with meat mallet.
Combine flour, salt and pepper.
Dredge chicken in flour mixture.
Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat.
Add chicken.
Cook 3 to 4 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
Remove chicken; drain on paper towels.
Keep warm.
Add lemon juice and lemon slices to pan drippings in skillet.
Cook until thoroughly heated.
Pour lemon mixture over chicken and sprinkle with parsley.
Yields 6 servings.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
2 whole chicken breasts, halved lengthwise
dash of salt and pepper
1/4 c. flour
4 Tbsp. margarine
1 c. fresh mushrooms
1 garlic clove, minced
1/4 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Place chicken breast between 2 pieces of plastic wrap.
Pound chicken to 1/2 inch thickness.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper; coat with flour.
In a large skillet, brown chicken in 3 tablespoons butter 5 minutes until golden brown.
Remove from skillet.
Add remaining butter; cook mushrooms and garlic until tender.
Return chicken to pan.
Add wine and lemon juice.
Simmer 7 to 10 minutes.
Top with parsley.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
4 whole chicken breasts, skinned, boned and halved
1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 c. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 to 4 Tbsp. dry Madeira or water
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
lemon slices
3 to 4 Tbsp. capers (optional)
1/4 c. minced parsley
Directions:
Place chicken between 2 sheets of waxed paper and pound them until thin (about 1/4-inch).
Combine flour, salt, pepper and paprika in plastic bag.
Add chicken breasts and coat well.
Shake off excess.
Heat butter and olive oil in large skillet until bubbling.
Saute chicken, a few at a time, 2 to 3 minutes on each side.
Do not overcook.
Drain on paper towels and keep warm. Drain off all but 2 tablespoons of butter and oil.
Stir Madeira or water into drippings, scraping bottom of skillet to loosen any browned bits.
Add lemon juice and heat briefly.
Return chicken to skillet, interspersing with lemon slices.
Heat until sauce thickens.
Add capers.
Sprinkle with minced parsley.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
4 boneless chicken breasts, cut in halves
1 egg
3 Tbsp. lemon juice concentrate
1/4 c. flour
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. paprika
1/4 c. margarine or butter
2 tsp. instant chicken bouillon
1/2 c. boiling water
Directions:
Beat egg with 1 tablespoon lemon juice. Combine flour, garlic powder and paprika in another bowl. Dip chicken in egg, then coat with flour mixture. Brown chicken in margarine/butter in a skillet. Dissolve
bouillon in boiling water and add to skillet with remaining lemon juice. Cover; simmer 20 minutes, until tender.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts (Tyson)
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. Tabasco sauce
1/2 tsp. black pepper (ground)
1 tsp. basil
3 Tbsp. capers
1/2 celery, chopped
1/4 c. sun-dried tomatoes, cut into strips
1 c. cheese (Mozzarella)
1/4 c. olives (black), sliced
4 loaves French bread (mini loaves)
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Boil chicken and cut into bite-size pieces.
In bowl, mix together mayonnaise, lemon juice, Tabasco, black pepper and basil. Mix in chicken, capers, celery, tomatoes, cheese and olives. Slice top off mini loaves lengthwise and hollow to form boats. Brush with melted butter, garlic and parsley.
Broil until golden and toasty.
Fill with salad mixture; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Chicken
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. frying chicken
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 Tbsp. oil
1 lb. mushrooms, sliced
3 tsp. chopped fresh parsley
1 tsp. crushed garlic
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 can artichoke hearts
1 can black olives
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 can Hunt's tomato paste
1/4 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Rinse chicken well.
In a bag, combine flour, salt and pepper. Shake chicken (few pieces at a time) in flour mixture to coat.
In a large skillet, brown chicken in oil.
Remove from skillet.
Add mushrooms, parsley, garlic and thyme.
Cook until mushrooms are tender.
Add artichoke hearts and olives.
Return chicken to skillet.
Mix together tomato paste and wine.
Pour over chicken. Simmer covered 40 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink inside.
Sprinkle with additional parsley, if desired.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Chicken And Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. mushrooms
1/4 c. flour
3 lb. chicken
4 Tbsp. oil
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. quartered green pepper
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
1 (1 lb.) can tomatoes, broken up
1 c. water
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. Italian dressing
1/16 tsp. ground red pepper
1/2 c. raw rice
Directions:
Slice mushrooms. Dredge chicken with flour; shake off excess. Heat oil in large saucepan. Add chicken and brown well. Remove chicken.
To oil remaining, add onion, green pepper and garlic. Saute 3 minutes. Add mushrooms and saute 4 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, water, salt, Italian dressing and red pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Stir in rice.
Return chicken to saucepan.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 45 minutes or until chicken is tender.
Serves 4.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Chicken Mediterranean
Ingredients:
6 oz. boneless chicken breast
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
1 c. julienne cut vegetables
1 tsp. oregano, rosemary, thyme and sage mixed
1 Tbsp. butter (optional)
1 tsp. chopped shallots
Directions:
Cut chicken into 3 to 4 pieces.
Heat oil over medium heat and place meat in pan, turning after a few minutes.
Add vinegar, shallots, herbs and vegetables.
Cover and simmer for 7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Stir in butter and serve.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Chicken Mediterranean
Ingredients:
4 to 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
3 to 4 large potatoes (unpeeled), quartered
1 Tbsp. (15 ml) olive oil
1/4 c. (60 ml) fresh lemon juice
1 Tbsp. (15 ml) finely chopped fresh rosemary leaves or 1 tsp. (5 ml) dried
2 to 4 cloves garlic, finely chopped
1/4 c. (60 ml) chopped scallions (spring onions)
salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
1/4 c. (60 ml) Kalamata or other black olives
1 c. (250 ml) sliced mushrooms
Directions:
Place the chicken and potatoes in an ovenproof casserole. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Sprinkle with rosemary, garlic, scallions, salt and pepper. Marinate in the refrigerator for 30 to 60 minutes, turning occasionally. Bake, covered, in a preheated 400°F (200°C) oven for 30 minutes. Add the olives and mushrooms; bake an additional 30 minutes. Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: Chewy Brownies
Ingredients:
1/3 c. butter or margarine
3 sq. unsweetened chocolate
1 c. all-purpose flour
3/4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3 eggs
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. chopped pecans or walnuts
Directions:
Melt butter and chocolate together.
Cool.
Stir together flour, baking powder and salt.
Beat eggs until light and fluffy. Gradually add sugar, beating until thick.
Add chocolate mixture and extract.
Add flour mixture, beating just until blended.
Stir in nuts.
Bake in a well-greased 9-inch square pan at 350° for 28 to 30 minutes.
Cool on rack.
Cut into squares.
Yield: 25 brownies.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: "Chewy" Brownies
Ingredients:
2 sticks margarine (not whipped margarine)
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. cocoa
4 eggs (medium)
1 1/2 c. flour (self-rising)
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Mix sugar and cocoa in large bowl. Add melted margarine. Add eggs one at a time; stir in after each egg. (Do not beat with mixer.) Add flour, vanilla and nuts. Bake in jelly roll pan (approximately 11 x 13 x 1-inch) for 20 minutes at 325°. (Shake pan while brownies are baking to make them fall. This makes them chewy.) Top with marshmallow cream while hot, then make a chocolate confectioners icing to spread on top.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: Soft And Chewy Brownies
Ingredients:
4 sq. unsweetened chocolate
3/4 c. butter, softened
2 c. sugar
1 c. flour
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Melt chocolate squares over very low heat.
In a large bowl, mix butter, sugar, vanilla and chocolate.
Add eggs and mix well. Slowly add flour and mix until completely blended.
Grease pan and bake for 40 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: Moist 'N Chewy Brownies
Ingredients:
1 c. chocolate chips
1/4 c. margarine
2 c. baking mix
1 can condensed milk
1 egg
1 c. nuts
Directions:
Melt chips and butter.
Add other ingredients.
Mix well. Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: Chewy Brownies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. melted butter
1 c. sugar
1 egg
1/2 tsp. vanilla flavoring
6 Tbsp. cocoa
1/2 c. flour
1 c. chopped walnuts
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Cream butter and sugar well.
Beat in egg. Add remaining ingredients.
Bake in a greased 8-inch square pan in a moderate oven for 20 minutes.
Cut in squares when cool or serve hot with vanilla ice cream.

question: What can I make with butternut squash and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oil
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
3 eggs
2 c. plain flour
2 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
8 oz. crushed pineapple (undrained)
2 c. grated butternut squash
1 c. walnuts
Directions:
In large bowl, combine first 6 ingredients. Beat eggs. Add to spice mixture. Mix dry ingredients together. Slowly add to spice mixture. Beat 5 minutes. Add pineapple, squash and nuts. Fold in. Pour in large, greased tube pan. Bake at 300° for 55 minutes. Cool. Frost with Buttercream Frosting or your favorite frosting.

question: What can I make with butternut squash and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash And Corn Casserole
Ingredients:
1 lb. butternut squash or pumpkin
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
2 Tbsp. butter
1 (17 oz.) cream-style corn
1 c. coarsely crushed Ritz crackers
1/2 c. shredded cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped pimento (optional)
1/4 c. chopped pecans (optional)
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
Quarter squash.
Remove seeds.
In microwave-safe dish (1 1/2 quarts) place squash and 2 tablespoons water.
Cook on High 10 minutes or until tender, mash.
Microwave onion, green pepper and butter.
Stir in mashed squash, corn, crackers, cheese and optional pimento and nuts.
