1 1/2 c. chickpeas, soaked in water for 19 hours, drained and finely ground with electric grinder
1 1/2 lb. finely chopped onions
4 c. finely chopped parsley
3 c. finely chopped fresh coriander
1 tsp. ground coriander
1 tsp. crushed garlic
1/4 tsp. cayenne
4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. flour
vegetable oil (for frying)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients very well and knead well. Let it stand, covered, for 2 1/2 hours. Let the oil get hot on high heat. Add a dash of baking soda to the falafil with tablespoon water. Mix well. Shape into small circles; pat with the palm of your hands, then fry in oil for 3 minutes on each side or until brown. Drain. Serve with pita bread, chopped parsley, pickles, tahini, chopped tomatoes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade falafel?
answer:
Title: Felafel
Ingredients:
2 (15 oz.) cans chickpeas
4 medium cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. finely minced onion or 6 scallions
1/2 c. minced parsley
1/4 c. water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. flour
a few dashes cayenne
oil for frying
Directions:
Rinse chickpeas and drain.
Combine all ingredients besides flour in a food processor or bowl.
Mash to a uniform batter.
Add flour, stir thoroughly.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Easy Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients:
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/4 c. butter
1 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 can mushrooms, sliced
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Cook the onion in butter in a saucepan over medium heat until transparent. Add the beef and cook, stirring until beef is light brown. Add the flour, salt, pepper, mushrooms and soup and cook for 5 minutes. Add the sour cream and simmer 15 more minutes. Serve over rice or noodles. Serves 6.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. sirloin, cut thin
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 medium onion, sliced thin
1 Tbsp. flour
2/3 c. evaporated milk
1/3 c. Sauterne (optional)
Directions:
Cut beef into thin slices.
Season with salt and pepper. Melt butter or margarine in large skillet.
Brown meat, mushrooms and onions.
Mix flour and evaporated milk.
Add to meat.
Cook and stir until thickened.
Add Sauterne.
Serve over buttered noodles. Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef (1/4-inch thick), cut into strips or cubes
3 Tbsp. flour
salt, pepper and garlic salt
1/4 c. margarine
1/2 c. minced onions
1/4 c. water
1 can undiluted cream of mushroom soup
1 small can mushrooms
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Combine flour, salt and pepper.
Coat meat pieces with flour mixture.
Brown meat in margarine; add onions.
Saut until golden brown.
Add water, soup and mushrooms.
Simmer for 20 minutes. Just before serving, remove from heat and add sour cream.
Serve with rice or noodles.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 lb. beef sirloin, cut in 1/4-inch strips
2 Tbsp. butter
1 can (3-oz.) sliced mushrooms, drained
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. tomato paste
1 1/4 c. cold beef stock or 1 can (10 1/2-oz.) condensed beef broth
1 c. sour cream
2 Tbsp. dry white wine
Hot buttered noodles
Directions:
Combine the 1 tablespoon flour and the salt; coat meat.
Melt 2 tablespoons butter in skillet; add meat and brown quickly on both sides.
Add mushrooms, onion, and garlic; cook till crisp-tender, 3 or 4 minutes.
Remove meat and mushrooms from pan. Add 2 tablespoons butter to pan drippings.
Blend in the 3 tablespoons flour.
Add tomato paste; stir in beef stock.
Cook and stir till thickened and bubbly.
Return browned meat and mushrooms to skillet.
Stir in sour cream and wine; cook slowly until hot; do not boil.
Serve over noodles. Serves 4 or 5.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients:
2 lb. round steak, cut in finger strips
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 small onion, chopped
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. mushrooms (2 small cans)
1/2 c. sour cream (or less)
Directions:
Brown meat.
Add salt, mustard, butter, onion, pepper and one cup of water.
Pressure cook 10 to 12 minutes.
Make thickening of 2 tablespoons of flour and water.
Stir into cooked meat.
Add mushrooms, simmer until thickened.
Add sour cream.
Serve over noodles or rice.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Creole Style Lentils
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped carrots
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 large onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. pepper
few drops hot pepper sauce
1 c. lentils, cooked and drained
hot cooked rice (optional)
Directions:
Cook carrots, celery and onion in hot margarine in medium size saucepan until lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes, salt, sugar, pepper, pepper sauce and lentils.
Cover; simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice.
Makes about 5 1/2 cups.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Lentil And Tomato Bake
Ingredients:
2 large carrots
6 large tomatoes
1 c. split lentils
1 small onion
1 bay leaf
2 cloves
1/2 tsp. sea salt
1/4 c. margarine
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Grate carrots and chop tomatoes; set aside.
Wash lentils, removing any small stones.
In large saucepan, combine with 2 cups of water.
Wrap bay leaf around onion and push cloves through leaf into onion.
Add to pan with carrots and tomatoes.
Bring to a boil, stirring.
Lower heat and cover; simmer about 20 minutes. Remove onion; add salt, margarine and parsley.
Stir well.
Spoon into large ovenproof dish.
Dot top with margarine and bake in 375° oven for about 30 minutes.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Ma'S Lentils And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. lentils, uncooked
1/2 c. chopped celery, raw
1/2 c. chopped carrot, raw
1/2 c. chopped onion, raw
1/2 c. chopped tomato, raw
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
1 Tbsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
4 c. cooked rice
olive oil
Directions:
Place uncooked lentils in clean pot (not aluminum), cover with water until water is 1 1/2 to 2 inches above level of beans.
Let soak for 2 1/2 to 3 1/2 hours.
Drain lentils and return pot; fill again with water to same level as before.
Bring water to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 1 1/2 to 2 hours with cover.
Add celery, carrot, onion, tomato, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper 1/2 hour before lentils are done cooking.
Stir lentils occasionally during cooking time; add more water if necessary to keep beans covered.
When lentils are done cooking you may mix rice in all at once or individual servings.
If so desired, add a dash of olive oil to each individual serving and mix.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium carrots
2 medium celery stalks
1 medium onion
3/4 lb. small red potatoes
1 (14 to 16 oz.) can Italian stewed tomatoes
3 c. water
1 c. dry lentils
2 (13 or 14 oz.) cans chicken broth
1 garlic clove
2 Tbsp. olive and salad oil
1 small head escarole
Directions:
Dice carrots, celery and onions.
Cut potatoes into 1/2-inch pieces.
Mince garlic.
In 5-quart Dutch oven over medium high heat, in hot olive oil, cook vegetables until tender.
Add garlic. Cook until brown.
Stir in tomatoes, lentils, broth, potatoes and water.
Over high heat, heat to boiling.
Reduce to low and cover. Simmer for 50 minutes.
Thinly slice escarole.
Just before serving, stir into soup.
Cook until wilted.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Ranch Style Lentils
Ingredients:
4 c. cooked lentils (1 1/2 c. dry lentil with 2 1/2 c. water)
1 lb. ground beef (or chicken)
1/2 c. cooking oil
1 tsp. prepared mustard
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce (or 1 c. catsup and 1 c. water)
1 tsp. vinegar
1 tsp. dried oregano
2 c. carrots, grated
3 ribs celery, diced
Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Cook lentils, about 30 minutes.
Brown meat in oil.
Add all other ingredients.
Place in 9 X 13 pan and bake 30 minutes at 350°-400°.
Top with cheese during last few minutes of baking. Serves 8.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
1 head lettuce, chopped
1 head cauliflower, chopped
6 green onions, chopped
2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
1 lb. bacon, cooked crisp and crumbled
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and keep in refrigerator.
When ready to serve, combine 1/2 cup sugar and 1 cup Miracle Whip. Pour over salad and stir well.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
large cottage cheese
1 bell pepper
1 onion or green onions
1/2 or 1 cabbage
1 tomato
1 Tbsp. mayo
Directions:
Mix all ingredients to your taste.
Add a squirt of lemon if desired.
Salt and pepper.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. mandarin oranges
1 c. pineapple
1 c. coconut
1 c. red cherries
1 c. sour cream
1 c. Cool Whip
1 c. miniature marshmallows
Directions:
Drain all fruit and pour into a large bowl.
Add other ingredients and mix well. Cover and chill.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
3 to 4 medium tomatoes
1 small to medium onion (preferably Vidalia)
1 to 2 green peppers
any other veggies (optional)
1/3 c. canola oil
1/3 c. balsamic vinegar
1/8 c. sugar or to taste
1 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. garlic
1 Tbsp. ketchup
Directions:
In medium bowl mix canola oil, balsamic vinegar, sugar, pepper, garlic and ketchup.
Cut vegetables into bite size pieces and stir into mixture.
Serves 4 to 6. Best when chilled.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 pkg. lemon jello
1 pkg. orange jello
1 large can crushed pineapple
4 carrots, grated
2 c. boiling water
1 c. chopped nuts (optional)
2 c. chopped celery
Directions:
Mix jello and cream cheese thoroughly.
Gradually add boiling water, stirring constantly, until well mixed with no lumps.
Add other ingredients.
Pour into 13 1/2 x 8 3/4 x 1 1/2-inch Pyrex dish.
Chill until firm.
Serve on crisp lettuce with dollop of mayonnaise.
Serves 10 to 12.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: 3 Bean Tofu Chili
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
4 Tbsp. chili powder
1 small hot chili pepper, chopped fine
8 oz. baby carrots, chopped extra fine
2 c. rough chopped onions
1 c. rough chopped bell pepper
1/2 c. chopped celery
8 oz. tofu crumbles
salt and pepper to taste
1 (29 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 Tbsp. dark molasses or sorghum
2 (16 oz.) cans small pink beans
1 (16 oz.) can pinto beans
1 (16 oz.) can garbanzo beans
Directions:
Heat olive oil in cooking pot on medium high.
Add to hot oil the garlic, chili powder, chili pepper, carrots, onions, bell pepper, celery, tofu crumbles and salt to taste.
Cook until tender (approximately 10 minutes).
Add tomato and molasses.
Cook on low heat until all ingredients are blended together (approximately 5 minutes).
Drain all beans and add to mixture. Continue to cook on low heat until beans are heated through (10 to 15 minutes).

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Tofu Chili
Ingredients:
5 c. cooked pinto beans
2 lb. tofu, frozen, then thawed, broken into pieces
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 1/2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 Tbsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 Tbsp. tomato paste
2 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. oil
1 green pepper, diced
2 large onions, diced
3 cloves garlic, minced
16 oz. can tomatoes
8 oz. can tomato sauce
3 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 Tbsp. cumin
Directions:
Reserve the cooking water or liquid from cans of pintos.
Mix the soy sauce with next 6 ingredients (including the first of 2 tablespoons of oil); coat tofu pieces with this mixture.
Fry over medium heat until all liquid is absorbed and tofu is browned. Saute the green pepper, onions and garlic in the other 2 tablespoons oil.
Put beans, tofu mixture and sauteed vegetables in a cooking pot or crockpot.
Add the tomatoes, sauce and season. Simmer 30 minutes or longer.
If in crock-pot, simmer several hours.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Tofu And Veggies
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1/2 c. Sake or white wine
2 Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
4 Tbsp. soy sauce or to taste
2 cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. ginger juice (optional)
1 onion, thinly sliced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. broccoli florets or Chinese cabbage
8 oz. snow peas
1/4 c. roasted cashews or almonds
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
In wok or skillet, bring soy sauce, garlic, ginger and wine to a boil.
Add tofu cubes, cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove tofu and remaining broth from wok or skillet.
Heat oil in wok and stir-fry vegetables over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add remaining broth, tofu and cashews or almonds.
Heat and serve.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
4 medium bell peppers
1/2 lb. ground turkey
1/3 c. diced red onion
16 oz. can refried beans
8 1/2 oz. can kernel corn, drained
3/4 c. chunky salsa
3/4 c. cooked rice
1/8 c. chopped parsley
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. each: chili powder and ground cumin
salt to taste
8 oz. shredded cheese
Directions:
Cut bell peppers in half.
Discard seeds and membranes.
In large pot of boiling water, blanch peppers for 3 minutes.
Invert to drain.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
5 large bell peppers
1 1/2 lb. ground chuck
1 c. cooked rice
1 can tomato soup
4 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. black pepper
1/4 lb. sharp Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Boil pepper pods after seeds have been removed in salt water for 5 minutes; let cool.
Cook meat in skillet with onion, salt and pepper together until meat is done.
Add 1/2 can of tomato soup and rice all together.
Stand your peppers in a baking dish and stuff each one.
Add rest of soup on top of peppers.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.
Ease out of oven and put a slice of cheese on top of each pepper.
Put back in oven until cheese melts.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. quick rise yeast (two 1/4 oz. packets)
1 tsp. salt
8 oz. lukewarm water (1 c.)
1/2 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Combine flour, yeast, salt and sugar in mixing bowl and stir. Add vegetable oil and water.
Mix together all ingredients.
Knead by hand for 3 minutes; shape and put in bowl. Cover and let rise until double in volume (approximately 1/2 hour).
Punch down; divide into 2 equal pieces and shape into round balls or leave in one piece for 16-inch pizza.
Let dough rest for 4 minutes.
Roll out approximately 12 or 16-inches in diameter.
Spray pizza pan lightly with no stick vegetable cooking spray and wipe off excess. Place on pizza pan; let rise for 10 to 15 minutes.
Add sauce, toppings and cheese.
Place on bottom rack in cold oven; turn oven to 500° and bake 17 to 20 minutes, depending on oven.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
1 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. oil
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. additional flour
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients in large bowl allowing yeast to soften.
Stir in oil and 2 cups flour.
Add more flour until dough holds together.
Grease your hands lightly and knead dough on floured board until smooth.
Cover and let rise 45 minutes.
Shape it to pans you are using or into individual disks all on greased pans.
Brush with sauce and cover with ingredients.
Let rise about 5 to 10 more minutes then bake in 425° oven for 15 minutes. This recipe also makes a nice French bread loaf.
My family makes individualized pizzas.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1/2 c. warm water
1 tsp. sugar
5 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 3/4 c. warm water
Directions:
Put yeast, warm water and sugar in a small bowl.
In a large bowl, add the flour, salt/yeast mixture and warm water.
Mix together, then on a floured surface, knead for a few minutes.
Put dough into a well-greased bowl.
Cover with wax paper.
Let rise for 1 hour, then spread dough onto a well-greased pizza pan or cookie sheet.
Let rise another 1/2 hour.
Bake at 350° or until crust is brown on bottom.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
2 pkg. yeast
pinch of sugar
pinch of salt
1 c. warm water
1 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Mix first four ingredients.
Add water and oil.
Mix and knead until you are able to roll into a smooth ball.
Place in warm place with towel over it.
Let rise 30 minutes.
Punch down and let set for 4 minutes.
Roll out and place on pan and let rise for 15 minutes.
Add toppings (sauce, cheese, meats, veggies, etc.). Place pizza in cold oven, set temperature to 500° and bake for 15 to 17 minutes, or longer depending on your oven!
(This recipe works best on "Air-Pans.")

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. oil
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 3/4 to 3 1/4 c. flour
Directions:
Mix water and yeast together until dissolved.
Add sugar and oil; mix well.
Add salt and 2 1/2 cups flour.
Mix into a ball. Turn onto floured board.
Add remaining flour until a bread-type consistency.
Put in lightly greased bowl.
Cover and let rise until double.
Spread on 1 large pizza pan or 2 small.
Bake at 325° for 5 minutes.
Add favorite pizza toppings and sauce; bake at 425° for 15 minutes.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Ground Turkey Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
2 bunches green onions
1 (4 oz.) can mushrooms
soy sauce
Chinese noodles
1 c. uncooked brown rice
1 c. uncooked long grain white rice
Directions:
One cup of uncooked kashi may be substituted for brown rice.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Ground Turkey Quick Dish
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
2 cans stewed potatoes
2 cans pinto or kidney beans
approximately 6 to 8 servings instant rice
seasonings to taste
Directions:
Brown the ground turkey. Cook the instant rice according to directions using a microwave-safe casserole dish.
Combine the ground turkey, rice, tomatoes and beans. Microwave 3 to 4 minutes, until hot.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Ground Turkey Delight
Ingredients:
1 pkg. ground turkey
onions, chopped
garlic, chopped
garlic salt
chicken seasoning
1 egg
bread crumbs
Directions:
Mix all of the ingredients together.
Mixture can be used for meatballs or your favorite pasta dish, or it can be used for burgers on the grill or on the stove.
Cook in your selected method (grill or stove).
They are simply great and are a healthy change for those unable to eat beef!!!

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: When You Don'T Have Much Time, Cook This...
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
16 oz. can stewed tomatoes
8 oz. can corn
Directions:
Fry the ground turkey and drain.
Mix with tomatoes and corn. Heat on medium-low for about 1/2 hour and serve.
Great with corn bread!

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Ground Turkey Casserole
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. egg noodles
3 oz. cream cheese, softened
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Brown ground turkey and drain.
Return to pan; add garlic salt, sugar and tomato sauce.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Cook egg noodles and drain.
Mix cream cheese, Cheddar cheese and sour cream.
Layer in 13 x 9-inch dish as follows:
egg noodles, cheese mixture and meat sauce.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter or oleo
1/4 c. onion, chopped
2 c. diced potatoes
1 c. water
1/2 c. evaporated milk
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
1 can cream-style corn
1 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan.
Add onion.
Saute until onion is golden yellow.
Add potatoes, water, salt and pepper.
Cover and cook on low heat until potatoes are very soft.
Stir frequently. Add corn, milk and evaporated milk.
Heat, stirring frequently, until chowder bubbles.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
6 Tbsp. chopped onion
3/4 c. chopped celery
2 1/2 c. hot water
2 medium boiling potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2 inch cubes
3 c. fresh or frozen corn kernels, thawed
2 Tbsp. sugar (or less, according to taste)
2 Tbsp. flour
1 qt. half and half
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan.
Add onion and celery; saute 5 minutes until soft, but not brown.
Add water, potatoes, corn, sugar, salt and pepper.
Cover and simmer until potatoes are barely tender, about 30 minutes.
Whisk flour into 1 cup half and half; stir into soup.
Add remaining half and half and simmer until soup has thickened to a creamy consistency, about 15 minutes.
Season to taste with additional salt and pepper if needed.
If too thick, add more milk; if too thin, simmer 5 to 10 minutes longer.
Makes 9 servings, about 1 cup each.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Fresh Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
6 fresh medium ears of corn
1/4 c. chopped onions
4 c. milk
2 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 slightly beaten egg
1/2 c. water
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut corn off cob.
In saucepan, combine corn, onion, 1/2 cup water and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer about 15 minutes or until corn is barely done; stir occasionally.
Stir in 3 1/2 cups milk, butter, salt and pepper, combining remaining milk and flour mixture to corn.
Cook and stir until thick and bubbly.
Slowly stir in about 1 cup of the hot mixture into beaten egg.
Return to hot mixture in saucepan.
Cook over low heat 2 more minutes.
Stir.
Do not boil.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
2 c. dried potatoes
1/2 c. sliced carrots and celery
1/4 c. diced onion
1 tsp. salt and pepper
2 c. boiling water
1/4 c. flour
2 c. milk
2 1/2 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 can cream-style corn
1 lb. bacon, cut in small pieces, cooked until crisp and drained on paper towel
Directions:
Cook vegetables in water for ten minutes.
Melt butter; stir in flour until thickened, 1 minute.
Add cheese and milk, stirring, until cheese is melted.
Stir in corn; heat.
Do not boil.
Add bacon.
Serves 8.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Creamy Sweet Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. unsalted butter or vegetable oil
1/2 c. finely chopped onion
2 1/2 c. uncooked corn kernels (about 5 ears cut from cob)
1 c. Russet potatoes, peeled and diced
2 c. reduced sodium or homemade chicken broth
1 bay leaf
1 1/2 c. low-fat milk
Directions:
In large saucepan, heat vegetable oil or butter until melted. Add onion and cook, stirring, over medium-low heat until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add 2 cup corn kernels, potatoes, chicken broth and bay leaf.
Cover and cook over low heat until tender, about 15 minutes.
Remove and discard bay leaf.
Cool slightly; transfer to a food processor with metal blade and puree in batches if necessary.
Press mixture through a sieve set over the saucepan. Pour milk through the sieve.
Add remaining 1/2 cup corn to the saucepan.
Heat over low heat, stirring until warm; do not boil.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Special Occasion Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes (about 12 medium), peeled and cooked
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. milk
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 c. onions, finely chopped
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Mash hot peppers.
Add cream cheese and butter in pieces.
Beat until both melted.
Mix in sour cream.
To milk, add eggs and onions; whip lightly.
Add to potato mixture along with seasonings. Beat until light and fluffy.
Place in greased 9-inch round casserole dish.
Refrigerate several hours (can be chilled overnight if not needed immediately).
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes. Serves 8 to 12.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
9 large baking (Idaho) potatoes, peeled and diced
1/2 c. (1 stick) butter (at room temperature)
12 oz. cream cheese (at room temperature)
3/4 c. sour cream
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place potatoes in large saucepan and add water to cover.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat and simmer over medium heat until tender, then drain.
Place potatoes in mixer bowl.
Cut butter and cheese into small pieces and add to potatoes.
Beat with electric mixer until light and fluffy.
Beat in sour cream.
Season with nutmeg, salt and pepper.
Serve immediately or reheat in a buttered casserole at 300° for 20 minutes.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Quick And Easy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 3/4 c. water
1 c. milk
1 (6.5 oz.) pkg. instant mashed potato flakes
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
3 green onions, chopped
1 (2 oz.) jar diced pimento, drained (optional)
1 tsp. fresh or frozen chopped chives
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine water and milk in a heavy saucepan; bring to a boil. Remove from heat; stir in potato flakes.
Add cream cheese and remaining ingredients, stirring until blended.
Cover potatoes and keep warm.
Yields 4 servings.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 to 5 medium potatoes
1/2 c. butter or margarine
2 eggs
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. white pepper
1 c. shredded medium to sharp Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Mash potatoes with a hand mixer and then beat in butter, eggs, salt and pepper.
Whip until light and fluffy.
Turn into buttered 2-quart casserole.
Make a deep well in the center of the potatoes.
Put the cheese into the center of the potatoes and press it down firmly.
Bake at 375°
for 20 to 25 minutes.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Meat Combination
Ingredients:
1 lb. spinach, fresh or frozen
1 bell pepper, diced (red and green)
1 tsp. sugar
pepper and salt to taste
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. onion powder or small dried onion
1 chicken breast, cut up
1/2 lb. beef for stew
Directions:
In a 3-quart pot with cover, cook beef in 1 cup water for 1/2 hour, then add chicken breast with spinach and other ingredients. Add water as needed.
Cook for 45 minutes.
Usually served over rice.
Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Spinach
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
4 chicken breasts (8 halves)
1 c. mayonnaise
2 cans cream of chicken soup
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. curry powder
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Squeeze excess liquid out of spinach.
Spread in 9 x 13-inch dish.
Put chicken on top.
Mix mayo, soup, lemon juice and curry. Spread on top of chicken.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake at 350° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Spinach Bake
Ingredients:
2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
4 to 5 c. cut-up cooked chicken
2 cans cream of chicken soup
2 c. chicken broth
2 tsp. lemon juice
salt and pepper to taste
paprika
6 Tbsp. butter
6 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Cook spinach as on package.
Drain thoroughly and spread over the bottom of a buttered 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish.
Spread chicken over spinach.
Melt butter and blend in flour; add chicken soup, chicken broth and cook, stirring constantly, until sauce boils and thickens.
Add lemon juice and salt and pepper.
Pour sauce over chicken; sprinkle with cheese and dust with paprika. Bake in 400° oven for 30 minutes or until nice and brown.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach-Cheese Chicken
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless chicken
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach
sliced cheese (American, Monterey Jack or sharp)
1 bouillon cube
salt and pepper
garlic powder
Directions:
Boil chicken in water with bouillon.
Cook spinach according to package.
Place chicken in baking pan. Cut to lay flat.
Scoop spinach on top of chicken.
Season with salt, pepper and garlic powder.
Top with a slice of your favorite cheese.
Broil until cheese melts.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Chicken
Ingredients:
3 pkg. frozen spinach
3 chicken breasts
flour
melted butter
salt and pepper to taste
granulated garlic
Parmesan cheese
paprika
2 cartons whipping cream
Directions:
Thaw and drain spinach, then pack in 9 x 13 casserole dish. Dip chicken in butter and flour and place on top of spinach. Season with salt, pepper and garlic. Pour whipped cream on top. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and paprika. Bake at 350° for 45 to 50 minutes.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
1 turkey breast
1/2 c. melted butter
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 tsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. minced onions
1 tsp. dried sage
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. marjoram
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except turkey, in a saucepan and bring to a boil.
Place turkey breast in a 13 x 9-inch oiled baking dish.
Pour 1/2 the mixture over the turkey; cover with foil and bake about an hour.
Pour the other 1/2 over the turkey and continue baking another hour.
Check for doneness.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
5 to 6 lb. turkey breast
2 Tbsp. unsalted butter
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. dry white wine
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. salt
2 minced green onions
1/2 to 1 c. chicken stock
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Rub butter on skin.
Season with paprika, salt and pepper.
Scatter onions over all sides.
Put turkey in roasting pan.
Pour wine and broth in bottom of pan (1/2 inch liquid in bottom).
Roast about 1 1/2 hours until 160° to 165° on meat thermometer or until liquid runs clear.
Baste during roasting.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
1 turkey breast (6 to 7 lb.)
2 stalks celery
1 large onion, cut
salt and pepper
Directions:
Thaw turkey breast in refrigerator.
Wash and dry well.
Rub outside well with salt and pepper.
Also sprinkle some on the inside.
Fill cavity with chunks of celery and onion.
Wrap breast good and tight with aluminum foil.
Put in crock-pot.
Add 1 cup of water.
Turn to high for about an hour.
Reduce to low and cook all night.
You will have lots of good broth and the turkey breast will be nice and juicy and tender.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Creamy Turkey-Vegetable Casserole
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
6 oz. sliced mushrooms, drained
1 can cream of celery soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. diced, roasted turkey
1 c. chow mein noodles
1/2 medium green or red pepper, chopped
2 Tbsp. butter
3/4 c. milk
2 Tbsp. sherry
10 oz. pkg. frozen mixed vegetables, cooked and drained
Directions:
In a small skillet, saute onion, green or red pepper and mushrooms in butter until onion is tender.
In a large bowl, mix soups, milk, sherry and pepper.
Stir in sauteed mixture, vegetables and turkey.
Turn into greased shallow 1 1/2-quart baking dish; sprinkle with noodles.
Bake in a preheated 400° oven for 20 minutes.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Roasted Spiced Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
1 Shady Brook Farms split turkey breast
8 oz. nonfat or low-fat plain yogurt
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh coriander
1 Tbsp. minced fresh ginger
2 garlic cloves, crushed
1 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. hot red pepper sauce as desired
Directions:
Combine all ingredients, except turkey, in large shallow pan or bowl.
Add turkey; marinate for 1 hour in refrigerator, turning once.
Discard unused marinade.
Cover the breasts with foil; roast for 30 minutes in a 350° oven.
Baste occasionally. Uncover; roast for an additional 30 to 40 minutes, until brown.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Ground Lamb Curry
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground lamb
2 Tbsp. flour
1 large onion, sliced thinly
1/2 to 2 tsp. curry powder (depends on taste)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. water or stock
1/2 c. raisins
juice and grated peel of 1 lemon
2 whole cloves
Directions:
Brown meat in large skillet; pour off all but 2 tablespoons of drippings. Push meat to one side. Add flour and brown slightly, stirring constantly. Add all remaining ingredients and mix in the meat. Cover and simmer about 15 minutes or until onions are tender. Remove cloves before serving. Serve over hot rice. Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Lamb In Casserole
Ingredients:
2 to 3 lb. boneless lamb
flour
salt and pepper
1/4 c. carrots, chopped fine
2 Tbsp. onions, chopped fine
2 Tbsp. parsley, chopped fine
2 Tbsp. drippings
Directions:
Cut lamb in uniform pieces and roll in seasoned flour.
Brown in drippings.
Place in casserole.
Add carrots, onions, parsley and cover with cold water.
Cook in moderate oven until meat is tender.
Add more seasonings if necessary.
Thicken the gravy with flour.
Time in oven 1 1/2 hours at 350°.
Serves 8.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Broiled Lamb
Ingredients:
1 c. olive oil
1/2 c. fresh lemon juice
1 large onion, thinly sliced
4 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 c. fresh Italian parsley, chopped
few sprigs of fresh oregano
salt
freshly ground pepper
1 leg of lamb (about 9 lb.), butterflied
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except for lamb.
Mix well and pour over lamb in glass dish.
Turn lamb to coat well.
Refrigerate overnight, turning occasionally.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Lamb, Red Beans And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. leftover roast lamb or broiled lamb from barbecue
1 (27 oz.) can dark red beans or prepared dried beans
3 c. canned, cut tomatoes
3 tsp. chili powder or to taste
salt to taste
chopped onion
chopped parsley
minced garlic
Directions:
Mix together the onion, parsley and garlic.
Cut cooked lamb into small pieces.
Brown meat in small amount of oil or in its own fat.
Add onion mixture and saute 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes, chili powder and salt (if needed); stir in beans.
Simmer about 20 minutes.
Very good with cornbread.
Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Rack Of Lamb
Ingredients:
4 racks of lamb (1 to 1 1/2 lb. each) trimmed
2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1 c. soft bread crumbs
1/4 c. minced fresh parsley
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
1 garlic clove, minced
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Place lamb on a rack in a greased large roasting pan; brush with mustard.
In a small bowl, combine the bread crumbs, parsley, salt and pepper.
Press onto the meat. Combine butter and garlic; drizzle over the meat.
Bake, uncovered for 35 to 40 minutes or until meat reach desired doneness.
Yield: 8 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta
Ingredients:
sun-dried tomatoes
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. tomatoes, peeled, seeded and diced
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/4 c. sun-dried tomatoes
1 Tbsp. Italian parsley, chopped
salt and pepper
pasta (except spaghetti or linguine)
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Heat oil in skillet; add garlic and saute 1 minute.
Add tomatoes; heat to boiling.
Stir until thickens, about 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and sun-dried tomatoes and simmer about 5 minutes.
Add salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Fresh Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
2 tsp. olive oil
3 tomatoes, peeled and seeded
1/2 tsp. salt
12 oz. pasta, cooked
1/2 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. leaf basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Saute onion in olive oil in a large nonstick skillet until golden.
Add tomatoes and simmer until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Add broth, basil and oregano, simmer to thicken sauce, 5 to 7 minutes.
Stir in salt and pepper.
Serve over hot, cooked pasta. Sprinkle with cheese.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Baked Tomato Pasta
Ingredients:
12 medium Roma tomatoes
3 to 6 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/2 c. olive oil
1 lb. dry spaghetti, cooked according to directions
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, at room temperature
1/2 c. fresh whole or 2 Tbsp. basil leaves
Directions:
Cut tomatoes in half lengthwise; set cut side up in a 9 x 13-inch baking pan.
Sprinkle lightly with salt and pepper.
Mix garlic with 1/3 cup parsley and 2 tablespoons olive oil; pat mixture over cut side of tomatoes.
Drizzle 2 tablespoons of olive oil over tomatoes.
Bake at 425° for 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Sauce(Large Pot)
Ingredients:
8 cans tomato sauce
2 large cans tomato paste
1 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3/4 Tbsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. thyme
1 Tbsp. basil
1/2 c. Italian cheese
Directions:
Saute onion in small amount of oil.
Add tomato paste.
Stir for a minute.
Add all other ingredients.
Then add 4 cans of water, using tomato paste can for measure.
Bring to boil.
Simmer 3 hours, stirring often.
Add 1/2 cup grated Italian cheese after cooking 1 hour.
(Meatballs can be made and cooked in sauce.)

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Vodka And Tomato Cream Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small onion, chopped
1 (28 oz.) can Italian plum tomatoes, chopped
1 1/2 c. whipping cream
1/3 c. vodka
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1 lb. pasta, dried (preferably penne or rigatoni)
freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Melt butter and oil in pan.
Add onion and saute until translucent, about 8 minutes.
Add tomatoes and cook until reduce to almost no liquid remains in pan, about 25 minutes.
Add cream, vodka and red pepper.
Boil until thickened, about 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Roasted Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower
2 red onions
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
2 Tbsp. garlic olive oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. parmesan cheese
Directions:
Make cauliflower into 1-1/2 inch florets.
Cut red onions into 8 wedges.
Heat oven to 475°.
In non-stick roasting pan, mix cauliflower, onions, oil, salt and 1/4 tsp. pepper.
Roast 15 minutes. Toss and roast 5 to 10 minutes until lightly charcoal and tender. Transfer to platter, top with 1/4 tsp. pepper, parsley and cheese.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 medium head cauliflower
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 tsp. finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. water
1 tsp. mustard
1/2 c. shredded cheese
Directions:
Place cauliflower in 1 1/2-quart glass dish.
Add water. Cover and microwave for 8 to 10 minutes.
Combine mayonnaise, mustard and onion.
Spoon sauce on top of cauliflower and sprinkle with cheese.
Roast for 2 minutes.
Let stand 2 minutes; serve.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Bake
Ingredients:
1 lg. cauliflower, cut into flowerets
1/2 tsp. salt
3 c. water
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 c. buttery cracker crumbs
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
1 med. onion, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped and undrained
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in a large saucepan, bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside.
Combine butter and next 4 ingredients in a large bowl, stir in cauliflower, 1 cup cheese, onion, chopped green pepper and tomatoes.
Spoon into a greased 13x9x2 inch baking dish.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.
Add remaining 1/2 cup cheese and bake 5 additional minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Baked Cauliflower(This Is Also Good With Broccoli!)
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower broken into flowerettes
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 cup milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. chopped pimento
1/2 cup chopped green onions
1/2 cup buttered bread crumbs
1/2 cup grated cheese
Directions:
Cook cauliflower in boiling salted water until done but not too soft.
Drain and place in a baking dish.
Melt butter; add flour and stir until blended.
Add milk and continue stirring. Add seasonings, green onions and pimento.
Pour over cauliflower. Top with bread crumbs and cheese.
Bake at 375 degrees for about 20 minutes.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Casserole
Ingredients:
2 carrots, shredded
1/4 c. butter or margarine, divided
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 large cauliflower, broken into flowerets
1 medium onion, chopped
1 1/2 c. herb-seasoned stuffing mix, divided
1/4 c. sour cream
vegetable cooking spray
Directions:
Saute carrots and onion in 2 tablespoons butter in a large saucepan until tender.
Stir in 1 cup stuffing mix, soup and sour cream.
Remove from heat.
Cook cauliflower in boiling water 10 minutes or just until tender.
Add to soup mixture.
Pour into an 8-inch square baking dish, which has been coated with cooking spray.
Combine remaining 2 tablespoons butter and 1/2 cup stuffing mix; sprinkle on top of casserole.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. butter
1 pt. vinegar
2 heaping tsp. black pepper
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
The next time you make white sauce, make a "big batch" of it, thick.
Drop one tablespoon at a time on a cookie sheet leaving a little space between.
Put the sheet in the freezer and when frozen put into plastic bags.
The next time you want to cream peas, etc., take out the required number of chips and thaw in saucepan or microwave.
Thin with milk to desired consistency.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
4 c. sugar
2 1/2 c. catsup
1 pt. mustard
2 Tbsp. salt
2 Tbsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1 c. water
1 stick butter
1 1/2 qt. vinegar
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. cornstarch
Directions:
Mix the first 9 ingredients.
Cook over medium heat for 1 hour. Mix the remaining ingredients with a little water; add and simmer for 1/2 hour.
Pour into bottles.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: All-Purpose Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
2 qt. water
4 (12 oz.) cans tomato paste
3 lemons, cut in eighths
3 garlic cloves, minced
2 medium onions, chopped fine
12 large bay leaves, broken
2 tsp. celery salt
4 tsp. salt
3 tsp. cayenne pepper
3 1/4 c. white vinegar
3 c. brown sugar
Directions:
Put all ingredients in a large kettle and bring to a boil. Turn down and simmer for 45 minutes.
Makes 1 gallon.
Good on anything.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. honey
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
6 Tbsp. white vinegar
1 medium onion, chopped
1 1/2 c. tomato ketchup
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients in small saucepan. Heat to boil and then simmer for 30 minutes.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Homemade Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. catsup
2 Tbsp. vinegar
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire
4 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. mustard
1 tsp. chili powder
1 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients in saucepan.
Heat on medium for 1/2 hour. Stir occasionally.
Pour over chicken, ribs or chops.
Bake or grill.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. milk
1 egg
1 tsp. flour
2 oranges, cut up
3 apples, cut up
Directions:
Place fruit in bowl.
Mix ingredients and cook until thickens.
Pour over fruit.
Mix gently and refrigerate in covered dish overnight when possible.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Easy Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
1 can fruit cocktail
1 can pears, chopped
1 can peaches, chopped
1/4 c. nuts, chopped
2 bananas, sliced
mayonnaise to taste
Directions:
Drain all fruit.
Mix first 5 ingredients.
Add mayonnaise to taste. Chill and eat.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
2 bananas, peeled and sliced
1 large red apple, cut into small chunks
1 large green apple, cut into small chunks
2 oranges, peeled, sectioned and cut up
1 bunch grapes
1 grapefruit (pink), peeled, sectioned and cut up
1 can pineapple tidbits in their own juice
1/2 c. chopped walnuts (if desired)
2 stalks diced celery (if desired)
Directions:
Place all the fruit into a large
bowl.
Pour pineapple and its juice over all fruit; mix.
Add walnuts and celery, if desired.
Mix.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Twenty-Four Hour Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. halved green grapes
2 c. halved dark grapes
2 c. diced pineapple
2 c. orange sections
1 1/2 c. maraschino cherries, cut in half
2 sliced bananas
2 c. miniature marshmallows
1 1/2 c. broken pecans
2 eggs, slightly beaten
4 Tbsp. sugar
4 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Cook in a double boiler.
When cool, add 1 cup whipping cream, whipped until soft peaks form.
Add to cooled custard.
Gently fold into fruit mixture.
Cover and chill 24 hours or overnight.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad Recipe
Ingredients:
3 uncooked peaches, sliced
3 McIntosh apples, peeled and diced
1 c. small marshmallows
3 c. grapes
1 c. black walnuts
2 medium oranges, cut in small pieces
2 Tbsp. Miracle Whip salad dressing
2 Tbsp. white sugar
1/4 c. milk
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Mix salad dressing, sugar and milk good, then pour over fruit and stir it up.
Serves 10 to 12.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Couscous With Chickpeas And Feta Cheese
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) can chicken broth or vegetable broth
1 c. packaged couscous (1 box)
1 (15 1/2 oz.) can chickpeas, drained
1 c. sliced scallions (with tops)
4 oz. crumbled Feta
1 (2 1/4 oz.) can drained ripe olives
2/3 c. Italian vinaigrette dressing
Directions:
In medium saucepan, bring broth to boil.
Stir in couscous. Remove from heat; cover and let stand for 5 minutes.
Transfer couscous to large bowl and fluff with fork.
Let stand 5 minutes; fluff again. mix in chickpeas, scallions, cheese and olives.
Pour dressing over mixture and toss lightly with fork.
Serve on bed of lettuce.
Serves 6. Enjoy.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Braised Vegetables With Couscous
Ingredients:
4 tsp. vegetable oil
2 c. sliced onions
1 c. sliced carrots
1 c. sliced celery
1 c. sliced zucchini
1 lb. rinsed, drained, canned chickpeas
1 sq. Knox vegetable bouillon
1/2 tsp. cumin
4 oz. uncooked couscous
Directions:
In nonstick Dutch oven, heat oil.
Add onions, carrots, celery and zucchini.
Cook over high heat, stirring frequently until onions are lightly browned.
Add 3 cups water, chickpeas, bouillon, cumin and dash of pepper.
Reduce heat to low.
Cover and simmer 10 minutes or until carrots are tender.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Veggie-Topped Couscous
Ingredients:
1 large onion, cut into thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. olive oil or cooking oil
2 c. thinly sliced carrots
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper (optional)
2 medium zucchini, quartered lengthwise and cut into 1/2-inch pieces (2 1/2 c.)
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can reduced sodium stewed tomatoes
2 Tbsp. water
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 c. reduced sodium chicken broth
1 c. couscous
1/4 c. chopped unsalted dry roasted peanuts
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook onion and garlic in hot oil over medium-low heat until crisp-tender.
Stir in carrots, 1/2 cup water, basil, cumin, salt and, if desired, red pepper.
Bring to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in zucchini, garbanzo beans and tomatoes.
Cover and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir together 2 tablespoons water and cornstarch.
Stir into tomato mixture.
Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes more.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Couscous
Ingredients:
2 c. chopped tomatoes (about 2 large)
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans
1/2 c. chopped red bell pepper
1/2 c. chopped green onions
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh oregano
1 tsp. paprika
1 tsp. olive oil or vegetable oil
5 c. hot cooked couscous
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat all ingredients except couscous and cheese to boiling in a 2-quart saucepan.
Serve over couscous.
Sprinkle with cheese. Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Couscous Pilaf
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 c. sliced zucchini
1 small onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. white wine or chicken broth
1 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. couscous
1 c. cherry tomatoes
1/4 c. pitted black olives, cut in half (Kalamata best)
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh flat leaf parsley
Directions:
Melt butter; add onion, zucchini, salt, pepper, garlic and basil.
Cook until zucchini is tender, 4 to 5 minutes.
Add wine; bring to boil.
Cook 1 minute.
Add broth; bring to boil.
Stir in couscous, olives and tomatoes.
Remove from heat; cover.
Let stand until liquid is absorbed (about 5 minutes).
Before serving, fluff with fork; sprinkle with parsley.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Special Occasion Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes (about 12 medium), peeled and cooked
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. milk
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 c. onions, finely chopped
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Mash hot peppers.
Add cream cheese and butter in pieces.
Beat until both melted.
Mix in sour cream.
To milk, add eggs and onions; whip lightly.
Add to potato mixture along with seasonings. Beat until light and fluffy.
Place in greased 9-inch round casserole dish.
Refrigerate several hours (can be chilled overnight if not needed immediately).
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes. Serves 8 to 12.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: "Make Ahead" Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
9 large baking potatoes, peeled and cut in chunks
1/2 c. butter/oleo, softened
12 oz. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/2 c. sour cream
1/4 tsp. white pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
pinch of ground nutmeg
Directions:
Place potatoes in a large pot. Cover with water and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer over medium heat until potatoes are tender. Drain.
Put potatoes in mixing bowl.
Beat with mixer until light and fluffy. Beat in butter and cream cheese (which have been cut in small chunks).
Beat in sour cream, nutmeg, salt and pepper.
Transfer mixture to a heavily buttered casserole dish. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate.
Before serving, bring to room temperature, then bake, uncovered, in preheated 350° oven for 20 to 30 minutes.
Makes 8 servings.
May be fixed 2 to 3 days ahead.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 cloves crushed garlic
4 medium-sized all-purpose potatoes, peeled and thin sliced
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. plain low-fat yogurt
Directions:
In a medium-size heavy saucepan, bring 3 cups water to a boil. Add garlic, potatoes and bay leaf.
Cook, partially covered, over moderate heat until potatoes are "fork tender" (reserving 3 tablespoons cooking water).
Discard bay leaf, transfer potatoes to a large mixing bowl.
Add margarine, buttermilk and yogurt.
Beat with a mixer, then add just enough of the reserved water to make the potatoes creamy.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
9 large baking (Idaho) potatoes, peeled and diced
1/2 c. (1 stick) butter (at room temperature)
12 oz. cream cheese (at room temperature)
3/4 c. sour cream
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place potatoes in large saucepan and add water to cover.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat and simmer over medium heat until tender, then drain.
Place potatoes in mixer bowl.
Cut butter and cheese into small pieces and add to potatoes.
Beat with electric mixer until light and fluffy.
Beat in sour cream.
Season with nutmeg, salt and pepper.
Serve immediately or reheat in a buttered casserole at 300° for 20 minutes.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
fish of your choice
salt and pepper
lemon juice
Directions:
Put aluminum foil on grill.
Punch holes in foil.
Spray foil with Pam cooking spray.
Place fish, skin side down.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Squeeze lemon juice on fillet.
Cook on grill at medium temperature for 15 to 20 minutes or until flaky.
Top with Molly McButter flakes.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
2 lb. fish
1/2 c. salad oil
1/3 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. capers and juice (optional)
2 Tbsp. catsup
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
4 bay leaves, crushed
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 cloves garlic, finely chopped
paprika
Directions:
Marinate fish for 30 minutes in mixed ingredients.
Cook on grill about 8 minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily with fork.
Baste fish while grilling and sprinkle with paprika.
Baste shrimp or scallops only, don't marinate.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Light 'N Lemony Fish
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen sole, halibut or other firm fish
1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/2 c. lemon juice
4 green onions, sliced thin
1/2 tsp. white pepper
4 Tbsp. sherry
1/2 tsp. paprika
1 tsp. seasoned salt
Directions:
Arrange fish fillets in single layer in a baking dish.
Combine remaining ingredients, except onions, and pour over fish.
Bake at 425° for 15 minutes, basting occasionally.
Remove fish and garnish with green onions.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh fish (any kind)
splash of white wine
3 slices lemon
3 sprigs fresh dill
Directions:
Place fish on tin foil.
Splash with wine.
Place lemon slices and dill on top of fish.
Wrap fish in foil tightly.
Grill on medium coals for 20 minutes or until fish flakes.
This is very low cal and a great way to do any kind of fish.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Spicy Grilled Catfish
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. lemon-pepper seasoning
2 Tbsp. blackened redfish seasoning
6 (6 oz.) catfish fillets
1/2 c. margarine, melted
1/4 c. lemon juice
Directions:
Combine first 2 ingredients; set aside.
Place fish in a single layer in a lightly-greased fish basket.
Combine butter and lemon juice; brush on each side of fish.
Grill fish 3 to 5 inches from hot coals 5 minutes on each side, basting with butter mixture when turned.
Sprinkle each side of fish with seasoning mixture. Baste and grill 3 additional minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce (optional)
2 avocados, peeled and chopped
6 hard boiled eggs, chopped
1 c. chopped tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped red onions
1/4 cup fresh parsley or cilantro
Directions:
In a medium bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, salt and hot pepper sauce until well blended. Toss lightly with remaining ingredients until evenly coated with dressing. Cover - chill to blend flavors.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Scrambled Eggs Especial
Ingredients:
8 eggs
1 tsp. pepper
salt to taste
1/2 c. light cream
1 avocado, peeled and cubed (about 1 c.)
2 Tbsp. margarine
12 slices bacon, fried and crumbled
Directions:
Mix eggs,
pepper,
salt
and cream with fork.	Stir in avocado.
Heat
margarine
in
12-inch
Dutch oven over medium heat until just
hot
enough
to sizzle a drop of water.
Pour egg mixture into oven.	As egg mixture begins to set at bottom and side,
lift
cooked
portion
with spatula so the thin uncooked portion
can
flow to the bottom.
Avoid constant stirring.
Cook until eggs are thickened through but still moist. Sprinkle bacon on eggs.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
4 hard-cooked shelled eggs, diced
4 strips bacon, fried, drained and crumbled
1 Tbsp. minced onion
2 large avocados, halved and pitted
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. bottled mustard or to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine eggs, bacon and onion.
Cut and scoop avocado pulp and mash with a fork or large plate.
Stir in mayonnaise, lemon juice, prepared mustard and salt.
Add egg mixture; spoon into pretty glass cups.
Garnish with leaf of lettuce.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Egg And Avocado Dip
Ingredients:
1 ripe avocado, diced in small pieces
2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped fine
2 anchovies, cut fine
1/2 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Mix well and refrigerate.
Serve on crackers or as dip.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Eggs
Ingredients:
1 large ripe avocado
8 hard-cooked eggs, cut in half
1/2 c. softened cream cheese
pinch of salt and pepper
lemon juice
Directions:
Mash yolks of eggs with fork.
Add the cheese, 3/4 avocado, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Stuff the egg whites.
Slice remaining avocado thinly.
Put thin slice of avocado on top of eggs.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Easy Chicken Salad(Number Of Servings: 2)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. finely chopped celery
2 Tbsp. sweet relish
1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard
black pepper to taste
1/4 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. finely minced onion
1/8 tsp. salt
2 c. cubed cooked chicken
salad greens (optional)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except chicken and salad greens in large bowl. Mix well. Stir in chicken. Refrigerate at least 1 hour. Serve on salad greens.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad With Fruit
Ingredients:
4 to 6 chicken breasts, cooked and chopped
3 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
2 stalks celery, finely chopped
1/4 c. sweet pickle relish
1/4 c. green olives, chopped
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. pecans or walnuts, chopped
3/4 c. seedless grapes, sliced
1 Golden Delicious apple, peeled, cored and diced
1 c. Miracle Whip or mayonnaise (more or less)
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except dressing. Mix thoroughly. Add enough of the Miracle Whip or mayonnaise to properly moisten salad. May need more or less than 1 cup.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Easy Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
3 c. chicken, cut into bite size pieces
1 c. mayonnaise or to taste
pinch of salt
1 c. celery pieces
1 c. raisins
1 c. cashews
Directions:
Combine the chicken, mayonnaise, pinch of salt and celery pieces.
Place in covered dish overnight or for several hours. Just before serving, add the raisins and cashews.
Good with melon wedges and croissants!

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. diced celery
3 c. cubed cooked chicken
1/2 c. small seedless grapes
1/2 c. toasted pecans, coarsely chopped
1/4 c. flaked coconut
1/4 c. whipping cream, whipped
3/4 c. salad dressing or mayonnaise
1/4 tsp. salt
few grains pepper
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine the first 5 ingredients, tossing together lightly with a fork.
Gradually blend the salad dressing and seasonings into whipped cream.
Pour over salad ingredients in bowl; fork-toss to mix lightly but thoroughly.
Cover; chill thoroughly.
Serve on chilled, crisp greens, or use to fill center of a tomato.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad(Nice For A Party.)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. mayonnaise and sour cream
2 Tbsp. milk
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
3 c. cut up chicken
3 c. seeded green grapes, cut in half
1 c. sliced celery
sliced almonds
Directions:
Combine mayonnaise, sour cream, salt, mustard, pepper and lemon juice. Blend until smooth. Add chicken, grapes and celery. Toss well. Top with sliced almonds. Serve on bed of lettuce. Garnish with melon slices.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Meat Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 c. (8 oz.) tomato sauce
1 tsp. chili powder
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Brown beef in skillet, stirring until crumbly; drain excess fat.
Stir in remaining ingredients; simmer, covered, for 10 minutes.
Makes filling for 8 taco shells.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
8 oz. can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 c. chopped onions
1 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. cumin
Directions:
Brown the ground beef and onions. Drain. Add other ingredients and simmer over low heat until most of the liquid is absorbed. Easily increased for more than 1 pound.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. water
1 pkg. taco seasoning mix or use Taco Seasoning Mix recipe
1 can pinto, red, or chili beans, drained
1 can whole kernel corn, drained
Directions:
Brown ground beef in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Drain excess grease.
Add water and taco seasoning mix and beans. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes, add corn stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Meat Filling
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground chuck
1 finely chopped green pepper (use seeds also)
1 chopped very large onion
1 medium size bottle salsa
chopped hot peppers to taste
1 pkg. taco seasoning mix
Directions:
Cook green peppers and onion in small amount of oil adding ground chuck when almost done.
Stir occasionally until fine and thoroughly brown.
Drain any excess fat.
Add hot peppers and salsa, stirring occasionally.
Sprinkle contents of seasoning mix over meat mixture.
Stir well and simmer on medium-low heat for about 15 minutes.
Serve with taco shells and all the trimmings.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Meat-Filled Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 envelope taco seasoning mix
3/4 c. water
12 taco shells
2 tomatoes, chopped
1 c. Colby or Cheddar cheese, shredded
shredded lettuce
taco sauce
Directions:
Cook beef, onion and garlic until done.
Drain off fat.
Stir in taco seasoning mix and water.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, 15 to 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, arrange taco shells on a baking sheet lined with paper towels.
Warm in a 350° oven for 5 to 10 minutes.
Stuff each taco shell with meat, tomatoes, cheese, lettuce and top with taco sauce.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Crispy Pork Chops
Ingredients:
4 pork chops (1 inch thick)
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. Dijon-style mustard
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. wine vinegar
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. dried thyme leaves
Directions:
Cut off excess fat from edges of chops.
Bread chops in the egg and crumbs, coating well.
Broil on a lightly greased rack about 8 inches away from heat for 10 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked Pork Chops
Ingredients:
1/2 stick butter
1 c. coarse cracker crumbs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 egg, beaten
2 Tbsp. milk or more
6 pork chops
Directions:
Combine crumbs, salt and pepper. In another bowl, blend egg and milk.
Coat chops with crumbs.
Dip in egg mixture and again in crumbs.
Place butter in pan.
Melt.
Place chops in a 13 x 9-inch pan and bake at 325° for 30 minutes.
Turn chops and bake 30 minutes more.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Pork Chops
Ingredients:
6 large pork chops
garlic seasoning
black pepper
salt
1 onion, sliced
3 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. flour
4 sliced baking potatoes (leave skin on)
4 carrots
Directions:
Take Brown-in-Bag and shake flour in bag.
Place all meat, potatoes and carrots in bag.
Then take all seasonings and place on meat, potatoes and carrots.
Close bag; tie.
Slit 3 or 4 holes on top of bag.
Bake at 375° for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Savory Pork Chops
Ingredients:
6 pork chops, 1 1/2 inch thick
salt and pepper to taste
6 slices of lemon
6 tsp brown sugar
1 c catsup
1 c water
juice of 1/2 lemon
1/4 c brown sugar
Directions:
In a deep baking dish, place chops and sprinkle with salt and pepper on each chop. Place a slice of lemon and 1 tsp of brown sugar. Mix the other ingredients together and pour around the chops until they are covered. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour, or until done.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Pork Chops
Ingredients:
6 pork chops
2 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. salt
pepper
1 can cream of mushroom soup
3/4 c. water
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. rosemary, crushed
1 can French fried onion rings
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
Coat chops in mixture of flour, salt and pepper.
Brown chops in skillet.
Place chops in baking dish.
Combine soup, water, ginger and rosemary; pour over chops.
Sprinkle with half of the onion rings.
Cover.
Bake at 350° for 50 minutes.
Uncover; sprinkle with remaining onion rings and continue baking 10 minutes.
Remove meat to platter.
Blend sour cream into soup mixture; heat through.
Serve meat and gravy with fluffy rice.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentils And Spinach
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lentils (1 c.)
1 lb. spinach, chopped
1 onion
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. coriander
1 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. chili powder
lemon juice to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Boil the lentils in 1 pint (2 cups) water until soft (about 25 minutes).
Fry sliced onion and chopped garlic; add spices.
Stir about 2 minutes.
Add cooked lentils and washed and coarsely chopped spinach.
Stir well.
Simmer 10 to 15 minutes.
Add salt and lemon juice.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Stew
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 c. water
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can cut tomatoes
4 tsp. vegetable bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt and thyme
1/4 tsp. fennel seed and pepper
1 bay leaf
2 medium chopped carrots (1 c.)
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
Directions:
Rinse lentils; set aside.
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven cook onion and garlic until tender, not brown.
Stir in lentils, water, tomatoes, bouillon, Worcestershire sauce, salt, thyme, fennel seed, pepper and bay leaf.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add carrots and frozen spinach. Bring to a boil, breaking up spinach with a fork; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for about 10 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add vinegar; discard bay leaf.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
8 c. chicken stock or 48 oz. can stock
2 cloves chopped garlic
1 onion, chopped
3/4 c. chopped carrots
1 c. chopped celery
1 c. lentils
1 bunch spinach
3 Tbsp. lemon juice or vinegar
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Wash and pick over lentils.
Place in boiling water and cook 2 minutes.
Cover; let sit 1 hour and drain.
(This removes gas.)

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. pkg. lentils
1 pkg. frozen spinach
1 small chopped onion
1 stalk celery, chopped
1 carrot, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
8 c. water
1 bouillon cube
2 Tbsp. vinegar
freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large soup pot or crock-pot. Cook on low for 6 hours.
If using a crock-pot, set crock-pot to high and cook 6 hours.
Add ground pepper to taste.
Can also add two chopped Italian sausages to ingredients for different flavor before cooking.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced onions
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
1/2 lb. dry lentils
1 lb. frozen, chopped spinach
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
3 c. water
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil in 3-quart saucepan over medium heat until onions are tender.
Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice.
Cover and simmer until spinach is tender, about 5 minutes.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Good Carrots
Ingredients:
12 carrots, peeled and sliced
1/4 c. butter
1 small onion, minced
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
2 c. milk
1/4 tsp. celery salt
3 c. buttered bread crumbs or Pepperidge Farm stuffing
1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese slices
Directions:
Cook carrots.
Saute onion in butter.
Stir in flour, salt, dry mustard and milk.
Add pepper and celery salt.
In 2-quart casserole, arrange layers of carrots and cheese, ending with carrots.
Pour on sauce.
Top with crumbs.
Bake 20 minutes or until hot throughout.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Cabbage
Ingredients:
1 large head cabbage
1 lb. ground chuck
1/2 c. raw regular rice
1 grated small onion
2 eggs
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 sliced large onion
2 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
2 (No. 2 1/2) cans tomatoes (7 c.)
1 (16 oz.) can sauerkraut
1/2 c. brown sugar
Directions:
Remove 12 large leaves from cabbage.
Trim off thick part of each leaf.
Let boiling water stand on leaves a few minutes, so they become easy to roll.
Heat oven to 375°.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Chinese-Style Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. water
3 c. finely shredded cabbage
1 c. thin diagonal sliced celery
2/3 c. chopped onion
1 medium green pepper, cut in thin slices
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
In medium skillet, mix water and vegetables.
Cover; steam until crisp-tender (about 5 minutes).
Stir several times.
Season with salt and pepper; stir in soy sauce.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Delightfully Different Carrots
Ingredients:
2 lb. carrots, sliced
1 large green pepper, chopped
1 large onion, chopped
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can tomato soup (undiluted)
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 c. vinegar
1/4 c. cooking oil
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. prepared mustard
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. celery seed
1 tsp. basil leaves
Directions:
Slice carrots and cook in lightly salted water until done. Drain and cool.
Combine the remaining ingredients; pour over carrots and marinate 24 hours.
Will keep up to 2 weeks in the refrigerator.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Chinese-Style Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. water
3 c. finely shredded cabbage
1 c. celery, thin slices
2/3 c. chopped onion
1 medium green pepper, cut in thin diagonal slices
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
In medium skillet, mix water and vegetables.
Cover.
Steam 5 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender, stirring several times.
Season with salt and pepper.
Stir in soy sauce.
Makes 4 servings (40 calories each).

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. buttered Crisco
1 c. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. buttermilk or sour milk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 c. sifted flour
1/2 tsp. soda
1 tsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix
shortening and sugar;
beat well.	Add vanilla and lemon juice.
Add
egg
and beat until light. Add flour, soda and
salt; alternate	with buttermilk.
Drop by tablespoonful and sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon.
Top with raisins.
Bake at 350° for 10 minutes or until lightly brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
3 1/4 c. sifted flour
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 c. sugar
1 egg (unbeaten)
1 1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 c. thick sour cream
Directions:
Mix together flour, soda and salt. Combine butter, egg, sugar and flavoring. Add sour cream and half of flour. Blend. Add remaining flour. Roll to 1/4-inch thickness on lightly floured surface. Cut. Place on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 400° for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. margarine or butter
1 1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
3 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1 c. sour cream
cinnamon and sugar (on top, if desired)
Directions:
Cream margarine/butter with sugar.
Add eggs, mixing well. Add dry ingredients and flour.
Add sour cream.
Bake at 400° for 10 to 12 minutes on greased cookie sheet.
Yields 30 (3-inch) cookies or 18 (5-inch) cookies.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookie
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter/margarine
1 1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
3 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 c. buttermilk
Directions:
In large bowl mix together butter, eggs, vanilla and buttermilk; set aside.
Mix together sugar, salt, flour, baking powder and baking soda.
Combine the dry ingredients slowly to the wet ingredients.
Mix well.
Drop onto ungreased cookie sheet. Sprinkle with granulated sugar (at Christmastime use red and green granulated sugar, be careful not to get sugar onto baking pan, sugar will burn).
Bake at 350° for 4 to 5 minutes or until done (top of cookie will spring back when touched).

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
3 eggs
2 c. sugar
1 c. shortening
2 tsp. baking powder
6 c. flour, sifted
1/2 tsp. nutmeg (optional)
1 c. sour or sweet milk
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 tsp. cream of tartar
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Beat eggs for 1 minute.
Add sugar and shortening and beat for 1 minute.
Add milk and vanilla, alternating with sifted flour and dry ingredients.
Turn out on floured surface (need to be floured well).
Roll out 1/2-inch thick.
Cut out and decorate as desired. Bake in a 350° oven for approximately 8 minutes or until light brown.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
4 large bell peppers (any color)
1 tsp. olive oil
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 medium squash, diced (yellow)
1 medium zucchini, diced
1/2 c. onion, diced
2 medium cloves garlic, minced
2 c. cooked brown rice
1/2 c. fat-free Cheddar cheese, grated
1 c. tomato juice (no salt added)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°. Cut peppers in half lengthwise. Remove stems, rubs and seeds. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat, swirling to cover bottom. Saut crookneck squash, zucchini, onion and garlic until zucchini is tender-crisp (about 4 minutes). Don't overcook. In a medium bowl, combine rice and cheese. Gently stir into skillet. Stuff pepper halves with vegetable mixture. Place in a 9-inch casserole dish. Carefully pour tomato sauce around peppers. Bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes. Serves 8.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
18 small bell peppers
3/4 c. cooked rice
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped bell peppers
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/4 tsp. ground red peppers
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut thin slice from top of each green pepper; remove stems and seeds.
In saucepan over medium heat, in 1-inch boiling water, heat peppers to boiling.
Reduce heat to low.
Cover; simmer 5 minutes or until peppers are tender to crisp.
Drain.
In shallow baking dish, arrange peppers.
Meanwhile, in a skillet, brown meat and cook with chopped peppers and onions until tender.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well.
Spoon mixture into green peppers.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
After the first 10 minutes of baking, baste with tomato basting sauce.
Baste after every 10 minutes of baking.
Serves 18.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
6 large bell peppers
2 c. cooked rice
1 lb. ground meat
1 can tomatoes and green chilies
1/2 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 can cream of mushroom soup
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut tops off and center out of peppers.
Put peppers in boiling water; cook until tender.
Saute meat and pepper tops with salt.
Drain off excess oil.
Mix well the meat, rice, 1/2 of liquid from tomatoes and soups.
If you want it hotter, add rest of tomato juice.
Place peppers in pan and stuff with mixture. Bake at 350° for 20 minutes, or until bubbling hot.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
5 large bell peppers
