1 1/2 lb. ground chuck
1 c. cooked rice
1 can tomato soup
4 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. black pepper
1/4 lb. sharp Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Boil pepper pods after seeds have been removed in salt water for 5 minutes; let cool.
Cook meat in skillet with onion, salt and pepper together until meat is done.
Add 1/2 can of tomato soup and rice all together.
Stand your peppers in a baking dish and stuff each one.
Add rest of soup on top of peppers.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.
Ease out of oven and put a slice of cheese on top of each pepper.
Put back in oven until cheese melts.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
4 large bell peppers, cored
water
3 to 4 lb. ground beef or venison
1/2 c. bread crumbs
1 medium onion, chopped
1/4 c. ketchup
1 c. cooked rice
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place peppers in a boiler pan.
Cover with water and boil approximately 20 minutes.
Remove and drain.
Rinse in cold water until cool.
Mix beef, onion, ketchup, rice, salt and pepper well. Stuff peppers with meat mixture.
Place peppers in a baking dish. Bake in a 350° oven until meat is done.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut-Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. linguine or thin spaghetti
3 garlic cloves
1 1/2 tsp. minced peeled ginger root
7 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
6 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/4 c. rice wine vinegar
1/4 c. honey
1 tsp. dark sesame oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 c. broccoli florets, blanched until tender-crisp
1 c. sliced Napa cabbage
1/2 c. carrots, diagonally sliced
1/2 c. bean sprouts
Directions:
Cook linguine according to package directions until al dente; rinse in cold water and drain well.
In food processor or blender, combine garlic, ginger, soy sauce, peanut butter, vinegar, honey, sesame oil and hot pepper sauce; process until blended.
Add water to reach desired consistency (1/2 to 3/4 cup), processing until smooth.
To serve, toss cooked linguine with vegetables and sauce. Yield:
6 servings.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sauce For Pasta
Ingredients:
1/4 c. creamy peanut butter
2 Tbsp. hot water
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. salad oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. pasta
Directions:
In medium bowl with wire whisk or fork, beat peanut butter with water until smooth.
Stir in vinegar and next 4 ingredients until blended.
Add cooked and drained pasta; toss gently to coat well. Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
8 oz. thin spaghetti
4 Tbsp. toasted sesame oil
6 green onions, finely chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. dried hot pepper flakes
1 Tbsp. rice wine vinegar
1 tsp. granulated sugar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 c. finely chopped salted dry peanuts
1/3 c. chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Drain.
Rinse in cold water and toss with 2 tablespoons sesame oil.
Set aside.
Place remaining sesame oil in large heated frying pan.
Add green onions, garlic and pepper flakes.
Stir over medium heat until onions have softened, 2 minutes.
Add spaghetti, vinegar, sugar and soy sauce.
Heat mixture, tossing to combine for 3 or 4 minutes.
Stir in peanuts and cilantro.
Add salt to taste. Transfer to serving bowl.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Buttered Noodles
Ingredients:
9 c. wide egg noodles, uncooked
1/4 c. (1/2 stick) real butter
2 tsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
In saucepan over low heat, add remaining ingredients.
Heat until butter is melted; stir in hot pasta.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until thoroughly heated.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Noodles With Character
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. (1/4 stick) butter
1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
4 garlic cloves, chopped
1 tsp. anise seed, crushed or coarsely chopped
8 oz. tri-color tubular or spiral pasta, freshly cooked
1 (7 oz.) jar roasted red peppers, drained and chopped
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 plum tomatoes, seeded and chopped
1/4 c. thinly sliced fresh basil leaves
Directions:
Melt butter in heavy saucepan over medium-high heat.
Add oil, garlic and anise seed and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute. Mix in all remaining ingredients and toss until heated through, approximately 2 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper and serve. Makes four servings.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Spanish-Style Chicken And Sausage
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 lb. sweet or spicy Italian sausage or chorizo, cut into 1/2-inch slices
1 whole chicken breast, boned, skinned and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 medium onion, chopped
1 medium green pepper, chopped
2 chicken bouillon cubes
1 2/3 c. hot water
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground thyme
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 c. frozen green peas
1 1/2 c. instant rice
2 medium tomatoes, diced
Directions:
Heat oil in a large skillet; add sausage and brown well, about 5 minutes.
Drain fat.
Add chicken, onion and green pepper and cook 5 minutes longer.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Sausage
Ingredients:
1 lb. sweet Italian sausage
3 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1 (3 lb.) chicken, cut up
1/4 c. oil
1 medium onion, sliced
1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 (16 oz.) can whole or crushed tomatoes with their juices
1/4 tsp. caraway seed
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas
Directions:
Pierce sausage with a fork several times.
Place sausage in a small frying pan; cook over low heat for about 20 minutes to render fat.
Drain on paper towels.
Slice into 1-inch chunks. Place flour, pepper and paprika in a plastic bag.
Add chicken pieces, a few at a time; shake to coat.
Reserve flour mixture. In a Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat.
Add chicken; cook until brown, 5 minutes a side.
Remove and drain on paper towels. Add onion and mushrooms; cook until tender.
Stir in the remaining seasoned flour.
Return chicken to the pan.
Add 1/2 cup water, the tomatoes with their juices and caraway seed.
Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Stir in sausage and peas to cook 10 minutes longer, or until heated through.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Homemade Sausage Recipe
Ingredients:
8 lb. ground pork
5 Tbsp. salt
2 tsp. cayenne pepper (1 tsp. for mild)
3 Tbsp. black pepper
4 Tbsp. sage
Directions:
Mix and package or freeze.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Sausage Supper
Ingredients:
4 slices bacon, cut up
2 carrots, sliced
1 lb. red potatoes, sliced
3 c. broccoli, cut up
1 medium onion, sliced
1/2 tsp. crumpled marjoram
salt and pepper to taste
1 lb. kielbasa, sliced
3/4 c. water
Directions:
In large skillet, cook bacon until crisp.
Remove from pan, drain and crumble.
Add vegetables and seasonings to pan drippings.
Cook over medium heat 5 minutes, tossing frequently. Add kielbasa slices and water.
Cover and cook over medium-low heat 15 to 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender, tossing occasionally.
Sprinkle bacon on top.
Serve.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Southern-Style Sausage Stuffing
Ingredients:
5 c. cornbread, crumbled
1 lb. sausage
1 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. onion, chopped
5 c. crumbled biscuits or dry bread cubes
1 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 (14 1/2 oz. each) cans chicken broth
Directions:
Combine sausage, celery and onion in large skillet.
Saute mixture over medium heat until sausage is browned and vegetables are tender.
Drain well.
Pour sausage mixture into large bowl. Add cornbread and remaining ingredients in order listed.
Blend well.
Stuff mixture into bird.
Roast according to standard roasting directions.
Mixture may also be baked in a greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan at 350° for 1 hour or until golden brown.
Makes 12 cups stuffing.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts Supreme
Ingredients:
1 pound fresh Brussels sprouts, trimmed
1 cup chopped celery
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 cup milk
1/2 cup shredded process American cheese
1/4 tsp. salt
pinch cayenne pepper, optional
Directions:
Place Brussels sprouts, celery, and a small amount of water in a saucepan; cover and cook for 8 minutes or until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in another saucepan, melt butter.
Stir flour until smooth.
Gradually add milk; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Add cheese, salt, and cayenne if desired; stir until cheese is melted.
Drain sprouts and celery; top with cheese sauce.
Yield:
4-6 servings.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts With Cream And Garlic
Ingredients:
3 pounds Brussels sprouts, trimmed and cross cut in base
1/4 cup unsalted butter
2 medium garlic cloves, minced
1 cup whipping cream
1 tsp. salt
Freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Cook Brussels sprouts in large pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 10 minutes.
Drain, rinse under cold water and drain again.
(Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.)
Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until soft, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Do not brown.
Add Brussels sprouts, cream, salt and pepper and cook until cream thickens enough to coat Brussels sprouts, stirring occasionally, about 15 minutes.
Serve hot. Yield:
8 to 10 servings.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Better Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
3 to 3 1/2 lb. Brussels sprouts
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
8 cloves garlic
1 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Cut off stem and "X" bottom of each sprout.
Over low heat, melt the butter with olive oil in a large pot.
Add garlic; cook 2 to 3 minutes.
Add sprouts; toss with butter mixture.
Add chicken broth, salt and pepper.
Cover; cook for 10 to 15 minutes over low.
Do not overcook.
Drain; return to pot.
Before serving, toss with melted butter and parsley.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Saucy Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
2 pt. Brussels sprouts
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 c. milk
1 c. dairy sour cream
Directions:
Cook fresh Brussels sprouts as directed; drain well. Meanwhile, in an 8-inch skillet or medium saucepan, cook chopped onion in butter until tender, but not brown.
Blend in flour, brown sugar, dry mustard and 1 teaspoon salt.
Stir in milk. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and bubbly.
Blend in sour cream.
Add cooked Brussels sprouts; stir gently to combine. Cook until heated through, but do not boil.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Better Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
3 to 3 1/2 lb. sprouts
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
8 cloves coarsely chopped garlic
1 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
freshly squeezed lemon
Directions:
Cut off stems from sprouts and remove outer yellow layer.
Cut small x in bottom of each.
Rinse in cold water; drain and pat dry.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Homemade Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1/8 c. hot tap water
1/3 c. brown sugar
1 1/3 c. warm water
approximately 5 c. flour
baking soda
Kosher salt
Directions:
In a large bowl place 1/8 cup hot water from tap.
Add yeast and stir until dissolved.
Add warm water and brown sugar.
Stir until dissolved.
Add flour until dough does not stick to sides of bowl.
Place dough on a floured surface and knead until smooth. Pinch off dough the size of a golf ball and roll into a rope approximately 10 inches long.
Form into shape of pretzel and place on a floured surface.
Prepare cookie sheets sprayed with Pam. Fill frying pan with water.
For every cup of water add 1 tablespoon of baking soda.
Bring water to a slow boil.
Place pretzels into slowly boiling water for approximately 30 seconds. Place pretzels on cookie sheet and salt with Kosher salt.
Bake at 475° just until golden brown.
Pretzels are best if eaten right away.
They can be frozen after the frying pan step and baked from frozen at a later date.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
2 pkg. dry yeast
2 Tbsp. sugar
3 c. flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1 egg
coarse salt
Directions:
Mix yeast and water;
then
add sugar and flour.
Knead on floured surface and let raise in warm space for 30 minutes. Heat oven to 400°.
Fill
pot
1/2
full
of water; add baking soda and bring to
a
boil.
Roll dough to 1/2-inch thickness; cut and twist into pretzel shapes.
Place on slotted spoon and lower
into boiling water
for
5
to
10
seconds.
Place
on greased cookie sheet.
Brush with beaten egg and sprinkle with salt.
Bake 12 to 15 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Soft Pretzels(Snack)
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 c. each: whole wheat and white flour
Directions:
Mix yeast in warm water; stir in salt and sugar.
Add 4 cups flour; mix well.
Turn the dough onto a floured surface to knead for 5 to 10 minutes.
Pull off walnut-sized chunks and roll into snakes.
Place on greased cookie sheet.
To make shiny pretzels, beat an egg and brush onto pretzels.
Sprinkle lightly with salt. Bake at 425° for 15 minutes or until golden brown.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Homemade Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
3/4 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. salt
4 c. flour
1 egg
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in water.
Add sugar and salt.
Gradually add flour. Roll dough into long rolls and shape pretzels.
Beat egg and brush on top. Sprinkle on salt. Bake at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. warm water
2 1/2 to 3 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. salad oil
1 egg white, beaten
1 tsp. each salt and pepper
caraway seed or coarse salt
Directions:
Dissolve yeast and sugar in water in bowl.
Let stand about 10 minutes. Add 2 cups flour, salt and oil. Beat until smooth. Gradually stir in more flour (about 1/2 cup) to form soft dough. Turn dough out to floured surface.
Knead until smooth and elastic, adding more flour (up to 1/2 cup) if necessary to prevent dough from being too sticky.
Place dough in a greased bowl. Cover and let stand to rise about double (45 minutes to 1 hour).

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Eggplant From The Border
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
4 slices bacon, chopped
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
1 medium eggplant, peeled and cut into chunks
1 can tomato sauce
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Brown ground beef.
Drain and set aside.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Baked Eggplant
Ingredients:
1 eggplant
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/4 stick margarine
1 onion, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
2 c. Italian rice, cooked
1/3 c. seasoned bread crumbs
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. parsley
1/3 lb. grated Romano cheese
Directions:
Peel eggplant and cut into cubes.
Cook in boiling salt water. Drain well.
Mash eggplant down with a fork.
Brown ground beef in butter with spices, onion and green pepper.
Stir in eggplant and cooked rice.
Spoon into lightly greased Pyrex casserole. Sprinkle with bread crumbs and grated Romano cheese.
Cover and bake at 375° for 20 minutes.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Eggplant And Beef Casserole
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant
1/2 c. oil
1/4 c. minced onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 c. canned tomatoes
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. sharp grated cheese
Directions:
Saute eggplant (peeled and diced) in oil with onion, green pepper and ground beef for 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes, salt, pepper and sugar and cook 10 minutes longer.
Pour into buttered 2-quart casserole.
Cover with cheese and bread crumbs.
Bake at 400° for 20 minutes.
Serves 8 to 10 people.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Beef Eggplant Bake
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef for stew
1/4 c. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. cooking fat
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1/4 c. water
2 medium onions, sliced
1 tsp. dill seed
1 large eggplant (approximately 1 1/2 lb.)
2 c. boiling water
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. dry bread crumbs
1/4 c. grated Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Cut beef cubes in 1/2-inch strips across the grain.
Combine flour, 2 teaspoons salt and pepper. Dredge meat and brown in hot fat in large frying pan, 1/3 at a time.
Drain tomatoes, reserving liquid.
Break tomatoes into pieces and set aside.
Add reserved tomato liquid, water, onions and dill seed.
Cover and cook slowly 1 hour and 15 minutes or until tender.
Add tomatoes and cook 5 minutes.
Cut eggplant into 1/2-inch slices.
Pare and place in large saucepan with boiling water and salt.
Boil 5 to 10 minutes, turning occasionally.
Remove to absorbent paper and pat dry. Combine Parmesan cheese and bread crumbs.
Sprinkle half the crumb mixture in bottom of a 2 1/2-quart casserole.
Place eggplant in layers in casserole and sprinkle with remaining crumbs.
Add meat mixture and top with Mozzarella cheese.
Cover and bake in moderate 350° oven for 15 to 20 minutes or until eggplant is done. Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Eggplant-Beef Casserole
Ingredients:
1 medium eggplant
1 lb. ground beef
1 c. chopped onion
16 oz. can tomatoes
1 tsp. basil
1 1/2 tsp. salt
pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
3 c. hot cooked rice
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Peel and cook eggplant in salt water until tender; drain. Brown beef and onion.
Stir in other ingredients.
Sprinkle with Mozzarella cheese.
Serve over hot rice sprinkled with Parmesan cheese.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Tomato Bake
Ingredients:
4 medium zucchini, sliced
1 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 medium tomatoes, cut in wedges
1 medium onion, sliced
1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
3 Tbsp. margarine
Directions:
Place zucchini in a 2 1/2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with 1/2 each of soy sauce, garlic salt, salt and pepper.
Layer tomatoes and onion over zucchini; sprinkle with remaining seasonings.
Top with cheese; dot with margarine.
Cover and bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
Yields 8 to 10 servings.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Baked Zucchini With Tomatoes
Ingredients:
6 c. sliced zucchini
1 large onion, chopped
6 cloves garlic, minced
1 (No. 2) can tomatoes, drained and chopped
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. chopped parsley
1 tsp. oregano
2/3 c. olive oil
Directions:
Combine zucchini, onion, garlic, tomatoes, salt, pepper, parsley and oregano.
Place in casserole and pour olive oil over top.
Bake at 400° for 50 minutes.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Tomato Bake
Ingredients:
4 medium zucchini, sliced
1/2 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. butter
2 medium tomatoes, cut into wedges
1 medium onion, sliced
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Place zucchini in a 2 1/2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with 1/2 each:
soy sauce, salt, garlic salt, and pepper.
Layer tomatoes and onion over zucchini.
Sprinkle with remaining seasoning.
Top with cheese and dot with butter.
Cover and bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Tomato Bake
Ingredients:
4 medium zucchini, sliced
1/2 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 medium tomatoes, cut in wedges
1 medium onion, sliced
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
3 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Place zucchini in 2 1/2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with half of seasonings.
Layer tomatoes and onion over zucchini.
Sprinkle with remaining seasonings.
Top with cheese; dot with butter. Cover.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. salad oil
1 medium onion, diced
1 medium green pepper, diced
1 small clove garlic, minced
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
4 medium zucchini (2 lb.), cut in 1 1/4-inch slices
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. basil
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese, grated
Directions:
In a 10-inch skillet over medium heat in hot oil, cook onion, green pepper and garlic until tender, stirring occasionally.
Add tomatoes with liquid and next 5 ingredients.
Heat to boiling. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer until zucchini are tender-crisp, about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally to break up tomatoes.
When zucchini are done, sprinkle evenly with cheese. Cover and simmer for about 3 minutes.
Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus(Chickpea Spread)
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic
2 c. cooked, drained chickpeas or canned
4 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
3 to 5 Tbsp. tahini sauce*
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 Tbsp. olive oil
Directions:
Start your food processor and then put in garlic.
As soon as garlic is minced, put in chickpeas, lemon juice, salt, tahini and cold water.
Blend until smooth.
Add more cold water if you want it thinner.
Empty contents into a shallow 6-inch wide bowl. Smooth contents.
Sprinkle with paprika and cumin, then drizzle oil over it.
Best served at room temperature.
Dip with pita bread.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzos (chickpeas)
1/2 c. tahini paste
3 to 4 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 to 4 Tbsp. water
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
pinch of coriander
salt to taste
pita bread, warmed and cut into triangles
Directions:
Mince garlic in food processor.
Add garbanzos, tahini, lemon juice, water, olive oil, salt and cumin.
Blend until smooth.
Add lemon juice or water if too thick.
Transfer to serving dish and garnish with olives, chopped red onion and chopped tomato.
Use pita triangles for dipping.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 lb. chickpeas (garbanzos)
1/2 c. tahini (sesame paste)
2 cloves garlic
1/2 c. lemon or lime juice
cooking broth (from chickpeas)
pita breads
paprika or cayenne to taste
olive oil
parsley
Directions:
Cook chickpeas in lightly salted water. Drain. Reserve liquid. Cool.
Peel chickpeas (this can be done by rolling peas between palms of hands to loosen skins).
Process in small amounts in food processor.
Process garlic.
Add tahini; mix well.
Add lemon or lime juice and as much cooking broth to make a medium thick dipping paste.
Place in dish with well in center. Top with olive oil, paprika or pepper and parsley. Serve with pita bread for dipping.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 2/3 c. (15 oz. can) cooked chickpeas, drained, reserve liquid
1/4 c. tahini (sesame paste)
1/4 c. lemon juice
3 large cloves garlic, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground coriander
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. paprika
water if needed
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/4 c. scallions
dash of cayenne
Directions:
In blender (in batches) or in food processor, process chickpeas, tahini and lemon juice until mixture reaches consistency of coarse paste; use as much of reserved pea liquid or water as needed.
Add garlic, coriander, cumin, paprika and cayenne and process again.
Transfer to a bowl and add scallions. Cover and chill one hour before serving the dip.
Add parsley as garnish.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 can chick peas, drained (reserve liquid to add if needed)
2 Tbsp. Tahini sesame paste
drizzle of olive oil
1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper flakes
1 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. coriander
1 clove garlic, crushed
salt
juice from 1/2 of lemon
Directions:
Place all ingredients in food processor.
Process until well blended.
Serve with pita chips, celery, and carrot sticks.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
2 to 3 ripe bananas, mashed
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Cream butter.
Gradually add sugar, medium speed.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Beat after each egg.
Stir in bananas, vanilla and cinnamon.
Combine flour and next 3 ingredients.
Gradually add to creamed mixture.
Beat until blended.
Stir in chips and walnuts. Spoon batter into loaf pan (greased).
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes.
Shield with foil after 1 hour.
Test with toothpick until comes out clean.
Cool in pan 10 minutes.
Remove from pan; cool completely.
Yields 1 loaf.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Chocolate Chip Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. butter (1 stick)
3 Tbsp. milk
1 c. mashed bananas
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 c. chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped nuts
2 c. sifted flour
Directions:
Cream sugar, butter and egg together in large mixing bowl. Beat until fluffy.
Set aside.
Combine bananas and milk in small bowl.
Set aside.
Sift flour, baking powder and soda together. Stir by hand all ingredients, including chips and nuts.
Pour batter into greased 9 x 5 x 3-inch pan.
Bake 1 hour at 350° or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool in pan for 10 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Cool on rack.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 c. mashed ripe bananas
1/2 c. shortening
2 eggs
1 c. mini chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
1/2 tsp. orange peel (optional)
Directions:
Grease bottoms of 2 (8 x 4 x 2-inch) loaf pans.
Combine all ingredients, except chocolate chips and walnuts.
Blend well on medium speed.
Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts.
Pour into pans.
Bake in center of oven for 60 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
3/4 tsp. salt
1 1/4 c. sugar
1/2 c. vegetable oil
3 eggs
1 1/2 c. mashed ripe bananas (about 3 large)
1 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Generously grease four 6 x 3 x 2-inch loaf pans.
Combine flour, baking soda and salt.
Set aside. In large mixer bowl at medium speed, beat sugar, oil and eggs until blended.
Add bananas and beat until well blended.
At low speed, beat in flour mixture just until blended.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Pour into pans.
Bake 45 to 50 minutes or until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool in pans for 10 minutes.
Remove from pans and cool on wire racks.
Store overnight before serving.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip-Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter, softened
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
2 ripe bananas, mashed
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. semi-sweet chocolate mini chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Cream butter; gradually add sugar, beating well at medium speed of an electric mixer.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating after each addition.
Stir in bananas.
Combine flour and next 3 ingredients; gradually add to creamed mixture until blended.
Stir in many marvels and walnuts.
Spoon batter into a greased 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Cool in pan 10 minutes; remove from pan.
Cool completely.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes(Preparation: 10 Minutes. Baking: 25 Minutes.  Servings: 4.)
Ingredients:
1 to 2 large cloves garlic, peeled and chopped
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 lb. small potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/8 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Place garlic, butter and water in small saucepan; simmer until water evaporates and garlic is tender. Strain butter; mash soft garlic through very fine strainer.
Toss potatoes in garlic butter; place in single layer in large baking dish.
Bake for 25 minutes, turning potatoes occasionally, until they are tender and browned.
Remove potatoes from baking dish with slotted spoon.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted New Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. whole tiny new potatoes (20 to 24)
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
2 Tbsp. water
2 cloves garlic, minced, or 1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place peeled potatoes in a greased 9 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish. Combine the margarine, water, garlic, salt and pepper.
Drizzle over potatoes.
Toss to coat.
Bake, covered, at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes, stirring once.
Uncover; bake 20 minutes more or until the potatoes are tender and slightly browned.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Butter Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 large unpeeled potatoes
1 stick butter
pepper and salt to taste
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 milk
Directions:
Wash potatoes and cube into pieces about 1 inch.
Do not peel. Put into a covered casserole dish.
Drop in 1 stick butter. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic.
Pour in milk.
Cover. Bake at 350° for about 1 hour.
Do not lift lid.
The steam helps cook.
Take out of oven and let sit for 30 minutes.
Ready to serve.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Oven Roasted Garlic Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. red potatoes (3 to 4)
6 large garlic cloves, unpeeled and flattened
2 Tbsp. olive oil (any oil will do)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary or 1 tsp. dried rosemary, crumbled
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Cut potatoes in half lengthwise and then into 3 wedges per half.
Combine all ingredients in bowl; mix well.
Bake in shallow baking pan for 30 to 35 minutes or until potatoes are light brown and tender, turning occasionally.
Serve potatoes hot.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Roasted Potatoes With Garlic And Rosemary(Makes About 3 Cups)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
4 to 5 cloves garlic, smashed
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh rosemary
2 lb. Yukon gold and/or red skinned potatoes (unpeeled), cut into large chunks
coarse sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450° with rack in lower third.
Bring 6 quarts salted water to a boil in a large saucepan.
Heat oil, garlic and rosemary on a large baking sheet (with sides) on stove top over medium-low heat.
Do not allow garlic to brown.
To heat oil, place the pan directly on the stove top.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Roast Chicken Legs Or Wings
Ingredients:
30 chicken wings, cut into 3 pieces (I use leg parts)
3/4 c. butter
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. soy sauce
1 tsp. dry mustard
3/4 c. water
1 tsp. crushed hot red pepper
1/4 tsp. Chinese five-season powder
Directions:
Mix all ingredients, except chicken, in saucepan and cook until slightly thickened on top of stove.
Place chicken in roasting pan and baste with sauce.
Roast, uncovered, at 350° for 2 hours, basting and turning occasionally.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Pan-Roasted Chicken And Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. red potatoes, cut into 1 1/2-inch chunks
1 lb. onion, cut into 12 wedges
4 garlic cloves, peeled
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary
1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken thighs or breasts, cut each into quarters
1 (10 oz.) bag spinach, discard stems
rosemary sprigs for garnish
Directions:
Preheat oven to 475°.
In large roasting pan, (17 x 11 1/2-inch), combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt and pepper and rosemary; toss to coat.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Chicken Thighs And Rice
Ingredients:
2 slices bacon
1 to 1 1/2 lb. chicken thighs (boneless)
1/2 c. long grain rice
1 small onion, cut into thin wedges
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can tomatoes, drained and cut up
1/2 c. quartered fresh mushrooms
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
1/4 tsp. dried basil, crushed
3 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In a 10-inch skillet cook bacon until crisp.
Drain, reserving drippings.
Crumble bacon and set aside.
Brown chicken in reserve drippings, about 10 minutes.
Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper.
Remove chicken from skillet.
Cook rice, onion wedges and garlic in skillet drippings until rice is golden brown.
Stir frequently.
Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms, wine, bouillon granules, salt, basil and 1 cup water.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Mahogany Glazed Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. brewed dark roast coffee
1/2 c. orange juice
2 Tbsp. honey
1 Tbsp. dark molasses
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1 large clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. finely grated fresh ginger
1/4 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
salt and pepper to taste
6 each of chicken thighs and breasts, skin removed
Directions:
In a saucepan, combine all the ingredients, except the chicken.
Bring to a boil and cook about 4 minutes.
Remove the pan from the heat.
Place the chicken on a rack and baste with the mixture.
Bake in a 375° oven for at least 45 minutes or until cooked.
Baste every 10 minutes.
Pour the remaining sauce over the chicken and serve.
Serves 6.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Great Baked Chicken(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
4 to 5 lb. chicken wings or thighs
1 c. soy sauce
3 tsp. sugar
1/4 c. pineapple juice
1/4 c. white wine
2 cloves garlic, mashed
1 level tsp. ground ginger (optional)
Directions:
Clean and take skin off thighs.
Put in a large baking pan. Combine marinade.
Pour over chicken.
Refrigerate for 16 hours in marinade.
Bake at 325° for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, uncovered. This is especially good to cook while you're at church if you have a timer on oven.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Herbed Steak
Ingredients:
1 round steak
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 Tbsp. oil
3 Tbsp. ketchup
1 1/2 tsp. basil leaves
1 tsp. oregano leaves
1 Tbsp. garlic chips
Directions:
Mix all ingredients and brush all over steak. Salt and pepper. Refrigerate at least 5 hours; no longer than 24 hours. Cook at 250° for 3 hours.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Meal In One
Ingredients:
1 round steak (cut up in small serving pieces)
1 small can mushroom steak sauce
1 medium onion, chopped
1 can green beans, drained
1 can tomatoes
potatoes, mashed
1 Tbsp. flour
1/4 c. milk
Directions:
Brown
steak
and
onions
together in a large skillet. Take out of skillet and set aside.
Brown flour (as if to make gravy). Add
milk
and
stir.
Add your tomatoes and mushroom steak sauce. Simmer for a few minutes.	Add green beans.
Let simmer for a few more minutes on low heat.
Add your meat with onions.
Pour
into a casserole dish.
Spread mashed potatoes on top.
Brush top of potatoes with melted butter.
Bake until potatoes turn a golden brown at 325 to 350°.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Elegant Steak
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef, cut in strips
1 1/2 Tbsp. oil
2 large sliced onions
1/2 lb. sliced mushrooms
salt and pepper
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
4 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 c. sherry
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup
1 1/2 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Brown meat in 1 1/2 tablespoons oil.
Add onions and mushrooms. Cook briefly.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Stir in ginger, soy sauce, soup, sherry and garlic salt.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer until meat is tender.
Serve over rice.
Also good with pork.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Surprise
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chuck fillets
1 1/2 c. ketchup
1 1/2 c. water
1 small onion, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1/8 tsp. seasoned salt
1/8 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 tsp. A.1. steak sauce
4 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Brown steaks in oil on both sides.
Drain thoroughly and place in baking dish.
Mix together all of the other ingredients in a large bowl and pour over steaks.
Bake, uncovered, in oven at 350° for 1 hour.
Serve over hot, cooked rice.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Steak And Potato Supper
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. round steak, cut into pieces
1/3 c. flour
4 Tbsp. oil
6 small potatoes, peeled
1 small onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 cans Hunt's tomato sauce (8 oz. cans)
Directions:
Roll steak in flour.
Fry in oil until browned.
Place meat in 1 1/2-quart casserole dish, no excess fat.
Scrape up brown drippings in pan.
Add to meat.
Arrange potatoes, onion and parsley in pan.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Add tomato sauce. Cover.
Bake at 350° for 1 1/2 hours.
Makes 4 to 5 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Homemade Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. warm water
1 pkg. dry yeast
1 egg
4 c. plain flour
Directions:
Scald milk; stir in sugar, salt and butter so that the sugar is dissolved and the butter melts.
Cool to lukewarm.
Dissolve the yeast in 1/4 cup of water and add to the milk mixture.
Add 1/2 of the flour and the egg and beat by hand until smooth.
Add the rest of the flour which makes a fairly stiff batter.
Cover tightly and cool for 3 hours.
Using 1/2 of the dough, knead it several times and roll to an oval shape.
Spread the top with softened butter (you choose amount) and sprinkle a mixture of cinnamon and sugar on top of the butter.
Roll up jelly roll style and cut into 1/2-inch slices.
Place in a greased pan and allow to rise for an hour or so.
(At this point, they may be cooked or placed in the refrigerator until needed.)
Place rolls into a cold oven when ready to be baked.
Turn oven to 350° and cook until lightly browned (about 30 minutes).
Top with a simple powdered sugar icing.
Because this dough contains an egg, use the dough within 3 days.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1/2 c. warm water
4 c. sifted flour
1 tsp. salt
1 c. sugar
1/4 c. butter
2 pkg. dry yeast
1/4 c. melted butter
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
3/4 c. brown sugar
5 Tbsp. raisins
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
In a cup combine yeast with warm water.
In a pot, scald milk. Blend in sugar until sugar dissolves.
Remove from heat.
Let stand until warm.
Blend egg and yeast.
In a large bowl, combine yeast mixture with flour and cinnamon.
Blend butter.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: The Best-Ever Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
4 1/3 to 5 c. flour
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1 c. milk
1/3 c. margarine
1/3 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
3 eggs
3/4 c. packed brown sugar
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 c. margarine or butter
1/2 c. light raisins
1/2 c. chopped pecans
1 Tbsp. half and half or light cream
1 recipe Powdered Sugar Glaze
Directions:
In a large saucepan, heat milk, the 1/3 cup margarine or butter, the 1/3 cup sugar and salt just until warm (120° to 130°) and margarine is almost melted, stirring constantly.
Add to flour mixture.
Add eggs.
Beat with an electric mixer on low speed for 30 seconds, scraping sides of bowl constantly.
Beat on high speed for 3 minutes.
Using a wooden spoon, stir in as much of the remaining 2 1/4 to 2 3/4 cups flour as you can.
Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface.
Knead in enough of the remaining flour to make a moderately soft dough that is smooth and elastic (3 to 5 minutes total).
Shape into a ball.
Place in a greased bowl, turning once.
Cover; let rise in a warm place until double (about 1 hour).

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Homemade Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1/2 c. warm water
1 1/2 pkg. dry yeast
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 (3 oz.) pkg. vanilla pudding
2 c. milk
1/2 c. oil
2 large eggs
8 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. cinnamon
1 c. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Mix everything except cinnamon and brown sugar; let rise for 1 hour.
Roll out.
Mix brown sugar and cinnamon; sprinkle on top.
Roll up tightly, then cut about 1 1/2-inch apart.
Bake for 10 to 15 minutes.
For icing, just buy plain vanilla cake icing.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls(Makes 150)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. yeast
2 c. warm water
1 qt. sugar
1/3 c. salt
2 Tbsp. salt
2 2/3 qt. warm water
1 qt. oil
1 qt. dry non-fat milk
16 eggs
14 lb. white flour
2 lb. brown sugar
2 c. cinnamon
1/2 lb. butter
Directions:
In mixer soften yeast in water, let stand 10 minutes.
Next, add sugar through dry milk then add eggs and flour.
Mix for 10 minutes.
Take out of mixer and split into two batches.
Take one batch and roll into rectangle as long as table and as wide, (if possible without tearing dough).
Then put brown sugar and cinnamon onto dough that has been rubbed with butter or oleo. Next add raisin and nuts and roll as tight as needed.
Cut and place cut side down on cookie sheets lined with baking paper.
Set aside and let dough rise.
Bake at 300° for about 30 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish Tacos
Ingredients:
2 lbs. Fish; firm and fresh, such as Swordfish,Shark, or Sea Bass, cut thick
1/3 c. Lime Juice
1/4 c. Tequila or White Wine
Directions:
Broil on the barbeque, the grill or the oven, turning as often as necessary and basting as needed, until cooked but not overdone.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Authentic Tacos
Ingredients:
3 1/2 lb. lean, boneless beef, pork or chicken
flour
water
1/2 bell pepper strips
3/4 c. chopped onion
1 bay leaf
1 1/2 Tbsp. vinegar
1 small can tomato sauce
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. cumin
1 jalapeno pepper, chopped
Directions:
Roll meat in flour and place in stock pot filled with 1/4-inch water.
Brown meat and cook on low heat for about 30 minutes.
Then roll up and heat to high and add remaining ingredients.
Cook 1 hour longer until meat is shredding.
Serve in flour tortillas and garnish with lettuce and picante sauce.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground meat
1 large onion
1/2 tsp. cumin seed or powder
garlic powder to taste
1 hot jalapeno pepper
4 to 5 chopped fresh tomatoes or Del Monte Mexican style canned tomatoes
1 box taco shells
chopped lettuce and tomatoes (for topping)
Directions:
Heat shells in oven (325°) until crisp.
Simmer all ingredients for 45 minutes, thickening with 1 tablespoon flour if needed.
Spoon filling into taco shells.
Top with chopped lettuce, tomatoes and shredded cheese.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Meat-Less Tacos
Ingredients:
1 small onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
chili powder to taste
cumin (just a pinch)
1/4 c. tomato sauce
3/4 c. water
1 can pinto beans, drained
1 c. quick cooking brown rice
taco shells or tortillas
low-fat grated Cheddar cheese
shredded lettuce
hot sauce
Directions:
Coat a large skillet with cooking spray and heat.
Saute the onion and garlic.
Add chili powder to taste, a pinch of cumin, tomato sauce and water. Bring to a boil, then add beans and rice. Cover and simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand another 5 minutes.
Spoon into taco shells or tortillas and top with cheese, hot sauce and lettuce.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Creamy Tacos
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground chuck
1/4 tsp. salt
2 cans refried beans
1 small can Pet milk
1 onion
chili powder to taste
2 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
4 c. cheese
Directions:
Fry beef, onion, salt and chili powder together.
Drain. Blend refried beans and Ro-Tel tomatoes.
Add to beef.
Then add Pet milk and cheese.
Cook until cheese is melted.
Serve over corn chips.
Then top with chopped lettuce, tomatoes, onions, sour cream and taco sauce.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: Homemade French Fries
Ingredients:
3 c. vegetable oil
7 medium potatoes
1/2 tsp. onion salt
Directions:
Preheat deep fryer on medium with the vegetable oil, add onion salt to the oil.
Cut potatoes into quarters.
Deep fry for 1 1/2 minutes, check, stir occasionally.
Remove when brown.
Place on paper toweling to drain.
Add salt as desired.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: French Fries
Ingredients:
10 oz. potatoes
1 tsp. oil
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/8 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut potatoes into 1/2 inch wide sticks.
Place in old water (ice) about 30 minutes.
Pat dry.
Place potatoes in plastic bag with other ingredients.
Shake to coat.
Arrange on large cookie sheet in a single layer.
Bake at 425° for 30 minutes, stirring once or twice until golden brown.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: No Fry French Fries
Ingredients:
6 large potatoes
1/4 c. oil
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese (optional)
1/2 tsp. garlic powder (optional)
1 tsp. paprika (optional)
1/2 tsp. pepper (optional)
Directions:
Scrub potatoes well and cut into strips.
Combine oil, salt and pepper (may add optional ingredients) into a plastic bag.
Add potatoes and shake to coat.
Spread strips on 2 cookie sheets in a single layer.
Bake at 400° for 20 to 30 minutes until golden brown and tender.
Stir once.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: French Fries
Ingredients:
2 medium potatoes
2 tsp. oil
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/8 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut potatoes lengthwise into 1/2 inch wide sticks. Place in bowl of ice water about 30 minutes to crisp, then drain.
Pat dry with paper towels. Place sticks into plastic bag and add oil, paprika and salt. Shake to coat. Place on large cookie sheet in single layer. Bake at 425° for 30 to 35 minutes. Stir once or twice. Bake at 450° for last 10 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked French Fries
Ingredients:
8 large potatoes
1/2 c. salad oil
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt (optional)
1/2 tsp. herb and pepper (optional)
Directions:
Peel potatoes and cut into 1/-8 inch wedges lengthwise.
Set aside.
Mix together oil and the rest of the ingredients.
Add the potatoes and coat well.
Place in a single layer on a cookie sheet.
Bake at 375° about 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Tasty Chicken Tenders
Ingredients:
3 c. rice crispy cereal, slightly crushed
1 Tbsp. garlic salt
1 tsp. dill weed
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 lb. chicken tender or breasts (skinless and boneless)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°. Mix cereal, salt and dill. Dip chicken in oil.
Roll in cereal mixture to coat thoroughly.
Place on foil-lined pan. Bake uncovered for 30 to 40 minutes or until chicken is fully cooked.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Chicken Tenders
Ingredients:
chicken breasts
egg
milk
crushed sour cream and onion potato chips
1 tsp. onion salt
1 tsp. pepper
butter
Directions:
Cut up chicken breasts.
Dip in milk and egg.
Roll in crushed potato chips with onion salt and pepper.
Set at room temperature for 5 minutes.
Top with butter.
Bake at 350° until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Chicken Tenders
Ingredients:
4 boneless chicken breasts (split and skinned)
3 cloves garlic, crushed
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
cornstarch and water to thicken
3 stalks celery, diced
1 small can mushrooms
2 1/2 to 3 c. chicken stock (canned or homemade)
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut chicken into strips about 1 1/2 to 2-inches wide, coat them with the flour seasoned with salt and pepper.
Brown the chicken in a little oil on both sides, remove from pan.
Put chicken back in pan.
Let this cook about 35 minutes.
Mix enough cornstarch and water to thicken the broth that chicken was cooked in.
Take chicken out to thicken, after it is thickened as in gravy, put chicken back into pan to heat.
Serve over rice. Serves 4.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Chicken Ala Kel
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 tsp. sweet basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. rubbed sage
1/2 tsp. white pepper
2 c. dry breadcrumbs
1 lb. chicken tenders
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
In a small bowl, beat eggs and set aside.
In a large bowl, combine all dry ingredients and mix well. Dip chicken tenders in eggs, then dredge in breadcrumb mixture, coating well.
Place chicken pieces on ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 375° for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Chicken "N" Biscuits
Ingredients:
1 1/2 to 2 lb. chicken tenders
1 medium green or red pepper, chopped fine
1 small onion, chopped fine
1 c. flour
2 cans Campbell's chicken broth
1 can water
1 large can mushrooms, drained
1/3 c. chopped pimientos (optional)
1 1/2 c. milk
2 egg yolks
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Wash chicken tenders; place in single layer in microwave dish. Add 1/4 cup water; poach 12 minutes, turning over after 6 minutes.
Let stand until cool.
Cut into large bites.
Saute pepper and onion in 1 stick melted butter for 3 to 5 minutes, until tender.
Blend in flour.
Add chicken broth and water; mix well.
Cook 4 to 6 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes, until thick. Add chicken, mushrooms, pimientos, salt and pepper.
Beat egg yolks in milk; add to above mixture.
Cook for 10 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes.
One cup frozen peas may be added the last 5 minutes, if desired.
Serve over Bisquick baking powder biscuits, mashed potatoes or puff pastry cups.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Crispy Buttermilk Oven-Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. lemon-pepper seasoning
1/3 c. buttermilk
1/2 c. corn flake crumbs
3 Tbsp. cornmeal
4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter, melted
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°.
Line 15 x 10 x 1-inch baking pan with foil.
Spray foil with nonstick cooking spray.
In shallow dish, combine flour and lemon-pepper seasoning; mix well.
Place buttermilk in another shallow dish.
In third shallow dish, combine corn flake crumbs and cornmeal; mix well.
To bread chicken, dip chicken in flour mixture to coat.
Dip in buttermilk; dip in crumb mixture to coat.
Place chicken in foil-lined pan. Drizzle with margarine.
Bake at 425° for 18 to 20 minutes or until chicken is tender and juices run clear.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 fryer, cut into serving pieces
buttermilk
seasoned flour*
3/4 c. butter or margarine
Directions:
Dip pieces of cut up and skinned chicken in evaporated milk, then in corn flake crumbs, which have been mixed with 1 teaspoon salt and 1 teaspoon garlic powder.
Put in buttered baking dish and turn once to coat both sides.
Sprinkle with black pepper and bake at 350° about 1 hour or until well done.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 2-1/2 to 3-1/2 lb. fryer chicken, cut up
1 c. buttermilk
1 c. all purpose flour
1-1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic and season salt
cooking oil for frying
Directions:
Place chicken in a large flat dish.
Cover with buttermilk and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Combine flour and seasonings, drain chicken.
Toss pieces, one at a time in flour mixture.
Put in hot oil on medium heat.
Cook 20 minutes on each side or until juices run clear.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 fryer chicken (2 1/2 to 3 lb.), cut up
1 c. buttermilk
1 c. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
cooking oil (for frying)
Directions:
Place chicken in flat dish.
Pour buttermilk over.
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Mix flour, salt and pepper in a paper bag.
Drain chicken.
Toss, one at a time, in flour mixture. Place on waxed paper for 10 minutes to dry.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (3 lb.) chicken, cut up
1 c. buttermilk
1 c. flour
2 Tbsp. cornmeal
4 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
3 to 4 c. oil
Directions:
Dip chicken in buttermilk.
Combine flour, cornmeal, salt and pepper in a grocery sack.
Place chicken in bag, 3 pieces at a time, and shake until well coated.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter, melted
1 c. brown sugar
2 eggs, beaten (optional)
3 c. quick oats
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
Directions:
Cream together the first 3 ingredients.
Add the rest to creamed mixture.
Bake in a 10 x 10-inch pan at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes, stirring occasionally (stirring is not a must).
Add raisins if desired.
Can be mixed the night before.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
1/2 c. margarine, melted
2 eggs, beaten
2 tsp. baking powder
1 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
Directions:
Thoroughly mix all ingredients together.
Pour into a buttered 8 x 8 inch pan and bake at 350° for 40 to 60 minutes. Serve hot with cold milk, tastes great with cinnamon or fried apples.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
3 c. rolled oats
1 1/2 c. coconut
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. chopped dried fruit
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
6 c. water
Directions:
Stir together and put in a large casserole and bake.
If you start with cold water, 1 hour at 350°.
If you start with hot water, 1/2 hour at 400°.
Fresh fruit may be used (apples, peaches, bananas).

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
3 c. quick cooking oats
1 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
1/2 c. butter, melted
2 eggs, beaten
whipping cream
Directions:
Combine in mixing bowl all ingredients except whipping cream. Spoon into greased 9 inch square pan.
Bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes.
Serve with whipping cream and a cold glass of milk.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
1 c. oats
2 c. water
2 eggs, separated
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
1/4 c. honey
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 c. raisins
Directions:
Cook oats in water with salt for 5 minutes.
Beat egg whites until stiff.
Mix oats, egg yolks, melted butter, honey and raisins.
Fold in egg whites.
Pour into well-greased 8-inch pan and cook at 400° for 15 minutes or until set in the middle and light brown.
Recipe may be doubled.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
3/4 c. salad oil
3 Tbsp. lime or lemon juice
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. finely chopped green onions
1 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. coarse black pepper
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a covered jar and shake thoroughly. Chill.
Shake again before using.
Makes 1 1/2 cups dressing. Pour over broken romaine lettuce leaves and add croutons and anchovies if you like.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1/3 c. oil
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. mustard
1/2 clove garlic (let stand in dressing 2 hours and remove)
1 beaten raw egg
4 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Serve all but bread crumbs over your greens.
Then you sprinkle your salad with bread crumbs, broiled in garlic oil.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
3/4 c. salad oil (canola, olive or vegetable)
3 Tbsp. lime or lemon juice
1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped green onions
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Shake in a jar and serve immediately!

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. garlic
1 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
4 eggs
2 oz. anchovy paste
4 oz. Dijon mustard
2 oz. lemon and pepper seasoning
5 oz. lemon juice
24 oz. olive oil
8 oz. salad oil
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Chill for 30 minutes and serve.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 egg (yolk only)
1 good size squeeze anchovy paste
squeezed lemon
Directions:
Mix together in wooden bowl. Toss with lettuce (romaine), cut up. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh new potatoes
3 cloves garlic
1/2 Tbsp. rosemary, crumbled well
4 boneless chicken breasts
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Heat oven to 475°.
Spray a 10 x 15-inch pan well.
Place potatoes in single layer and cook for 15 minutes.
Mix rosemary and garlic in small bowl.
Put chicken breasts on top of potatoes and add rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper.
Bake chicken and potatoes until tender.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Grilled Chicken And Potato Dinner
Ingredients:
1-1/4 lb. red potatoes, cut into 2-inch chunks
2 tsp. olive oil
4 skewers
2 plum tomatoes, seeded and diced
3-1/2 Tbsp. oil-cured black olives, pitted and coarsely chopped
1 small lemon, peel grated, 2 tsp. juice reserved
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. parsley, chopped
1 tsp. lemon pepper seasoning
4 (4 oz.) chicken breast halves
Directions:
Prepare grill.
Place potatoes in a steamer basket over boiling water.
Cover pan and steam 10 minutes or until tender.
Drain, transfer to a bowl and toss with oil.
When cool enough to handle, thread potatoes onto skewers.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken Breast - Sauteed With New Potatoes
Ingredients:
1/4 c. margarine
4 to 6 large chicken breasts
1 slice onion
1 minced clove garlic
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 chicken bouillon cube
1 c. hot water
1 (No. 303) can small potatoes, drained
1/4 c. red wine
snipped parsley
Directions:
Saute chicken in large skillet in hot butter until both sides are brown.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook about 5 minutes.
In a small bowl combine flour, salt and pepper and slowly stir in bouillon cube which has been dissolved in the hot water.
Pour over browned chicken.
Cook slowly covered for about 25 minutes or until chicken is tender.
Add potatoes and wine.
Heat potatoes thoroughly.
Garnish with parsley.
Yields 4 to 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Easy Baked Chicken And Potato Dinner
Ingredients:
4 bone-in skinless chicken breast halves
4 medium Russet or baking potatoes
1 red or green pepper (optional)
1 medium onion, cut into wedges
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter, melted
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Heat oven to 400°.
Spray 15 x 10 x 1-inch baking pan with nonstick cooking spray.
Place 1 chicken breast half in each corner of the pan.
Cut unpeeled potatoes into 1-inch cubes.
Place potatoes, onions and pepper into center of pan.
Pour melted margarine over chicken and vegetables.
Sprinkle evenly with cheese, garlic powder and paprika.
Bake for 40 minutes or until chicken is fork-tender and juices run clear, stirring vegetables once halfway through the cooking.
Makes 4 servings.
Add carrots, broccoli or other vegetables for variety.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken Breasts With New Potatoes
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
4 to 6 split chicken breasts
1 sliced onion
1 minced garlic clove
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 chicken bouillon cube
1 c. hot water
1 can small potatoes
dry parsley flakes
Directions:
Saute chicken breasts in butter on both sides until brown. Add onion and garlic; cook 5 minutes.
In small bowl, combine flour, salt and pepper.
Slowly stir bouillon into hot water. Pour over chicken; cook, covered, for 25 to 30 minutes.
Add potatoes and heat.
Garnish with parsley.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: "One Pot" Dinner(Makes A Big Hit ... Especially With The Men.)
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. ground beef
3/4 lb. bacon, cut in small pieces
1 c. chopped onion
2 (1 lb. 15 oz. size) cans pork and beans
1 (1 lb.) can kidney beans, drained
1 (1 lb.) can butter limas, drained
1 c. ketchup
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 Tbsp. liquid smoke
3 Tbsp. white vinegar
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Brown ground beef in skillet; drain off fat and put beef in crock-pot.
Brown bacon and onions; drain off fat.
Add bacon, onions and remaining ingredients to crock-pot.
Stir together well.
Cover and cook on low 4 to 6 hours.
If using the 2-quart crock-pot, reduce this recipe by half.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: One-Pot Dinner
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 c. chopped celery
3/4 c. chopped green pepper
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. uncooked medium egg noodles
1 can (16 oz) kidney beans rinsed & drained
1 can (14 1/2 oz) stewed tomatoes
3/4 c. water
1 beef bouillon cube
Directions:
In a large skillet, cook meat until no longer pink; drain. Add onion, celery and green pepper, cook for 5 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Add Worcestershire sauce, salt, basil and pepper.
Stir in noodles, beans, tomatoes, water and bouillon.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until noodles are tender.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: "One Pot" Dinner
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. ground beef
5 strips bacon, cut in small pieces
1 c. chopped onion
2 (31 oz.) cans pork and beans
1 (16 oz.) can kidney beans, drained
1 c. catsup
1 (16 oz.) can butter beans, drained
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 Tbsp. liquid smoke
3 Tbsp. white vinegar
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Brown ground beef in skillet.
Drain off fat and put beef in crock-pot.
Brown bacon and onions; drain off fat.
Add bacon, onions and remaining ingredients to crock-pot.
Stir together well.
Cover and cook on low 5 to 9 hours (high 3 hours).

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: Hunter'S "One Pot" Dinner
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. ground beef
3/4 lb. bacon, cut up into small pieces
1 c. chopped onion
2 (31 oz.) cans pork and beans
1 (16 oz.) can kidney beans, drained
1 c. catsup
1 (16 oz.) can lima beans, drained
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 Tbsp. liquid smoke
3 Tbsp. white vinegar
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Brown beef, drain and place beef in crock-pot.
Brown bacon and onion.
Drain.
Add everything to crock-pot.
Stir together. Cover and cook on low for 4 to 9 hours in crock-pot.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: One Pot Dinner
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
3/4 lb. bacon, cut in small pieces
1 c. chopped onion
2 (1 lb. 15 oz.) cans pork and beans (not drained)
1 (1 lb.) can kidney beans, drained
1 (1 lb.) can lima beans, drained
1 c. catsup
1/4 c. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. liquid smoke
4 Tbsp. white vinegar
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Brown beef in skillet and drain off fat.
Put meat into crock-pot.
Brown bacon and onion and drain off fat.
Put bacon and onion and remaining ingredients into the crock-pot.
Stir well.
Cover and cook on low 4 to 9 hours.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
4 cooked chicken breasts (skinless), cut in pieces
1 can mushrooms
1/4 c. liquid Butter Buds
1/4 c. flour
4 tsp. fat free chicken broth
1/3 c. low-fat Parmesan
1/4 tsp. minced garlic
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
10 to 12 oz. cooked fettucine
1 c. evaporated skim milk
Directions:
In saucepan over low heat, blend flour, liquid Butter Buds, skim milk and chicken broth.
Add minced garlic, salt and pepper. Continue to cook over low heat stirring constantly until the sauce thickens.
Stir in Parmesan cheese.
Combine sauce with chicken and mushrooms.
Fold into cooked pasta.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
2 chicken breasts, boned
2 slices bacon
1 tsp. chopped garlic
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 pt. light cream
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/3 c. frozen peas
1 chopped scallion
fresh ground pepper to taste
1/4 c. white wine
Directions:
Cut bacon into small pieces and chicken into about 1-inch cubes.
Add garlic and oil into hot skillet; cook until chicken is done.
Remove from skillet.
Reheat pan and add wine so that it picks up flavors from skillet.
Slowly add cream, scallions, cayenne pepper, oregano and peas.
Mix cornstarch with about 4 ounces water.
Add a little at a time until you get a creamy sauce.
Add chicken and bacon mixture; heat.
Add black pepper to taste.
Serve over pasta.
Shrimp may be substituted for chicken.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
4 cooked chicken breasts, cut in pieces
1 c. evaporated skimmed milk
1/4 c. liquid Butter Buds
1/4 c. flour
4 tsp. fat-free chicken broth
1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese
3 cloves garlic
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Stir and cook slowly until thick.
Serve over fettuccine noodles or small spaghetti.
Add chicken to sauce after it has cooked.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
2 skinless boneless chicken breasts
1 large green bell pepper sliced
1/2 purple onion sliced,
1 jar Alfredo sauce
1/2 tbsp black pepper
1/2 tbsp garlic powder
1/2 c parmesan cheese
4 c cooked egg noodles, drained
2 dashes of crushed pepper--optional
Directions:
Cut up chicken in pieces, cook in large skillet until almost done.
Then add bel pepper and onion.
Cook until chicken is done. In large bowl, mix chicken mixture and the other ingredients. Bake about 20 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. butter
1 pt. heavy cream
1 pt. milk
1 c. Romano or Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. minced garlic
1 1/2 tsp. basil
1 tsp. chicken base
3/4 tsp. white pepper
cornstarch (to thicken)
Directions:
Melt butter.
Bring cream and milk to a boil in a large pan. Mix rest of ingredients except cornstarch together and add to boiling mixture.
Mix with whisk.
Burns easy.
Thicken with cornstarch.
Serve over hot fettucine.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Tangy Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 c. boiling water
3/4 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/4 c. sliced green onions and tops
1 1/2 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh parsley
lemon slices (for garnish)
Directions:
Combine flour, salt and paprika in paper or plastic bag. Brush chicken with lemon juice.
Place a few pieces at a time in bag.
Shake to coat.
Heat oil to 365° in electric skillet or large heavy skillet.
Add chicken.
Brown.
Combine water and bouillon granules.
Stir until dissolved.
Add brown sugar and remaining lemon juice.
Pour into skillet.
Cover.
Reduce heat to 250°; simmer 5 minutes.
Turn chicken.
Sprinkle with onion and lemon peel.
Recover.
Simmer 10 minutes.
Serve garnish with lemon slices and additional parsley.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
4 whole chicken breasts, halved, boned and skinned
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. clarified butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. Madeira wine
3 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 large lemon, cut in 6 slices
3 Tbsp. capers
1 tsp. chopped pimento
1/4 c. fresh chives
1 (8 oz.) pkg. fettuccine, cooked according to package
Directions:
Pound chicken breasts to 1/4-inch thickness between 2 pieces of waxed paper.
Mix salt, pepper, paprika and flour in a plastic bag; add chicken, one piece at a time, and shake to coat.
Place butter and oil in a saute pan or large skillet; heat over medium heat until bubbly.
Add garlic and chicken; saute, turning, about 6 minutes or until chicken is brown and fork can be easily inserted.
Drain on paper towels and keep warm.
Drain all but 2 tablespoons of cooking fat from pan; add wine and deglaze pan, scraping up brown bits.
Add lemon juice and heat 1 minute; return chicken to pan; add lemon slices and heat 2 minutes.
Add capers and pimento.
Sprinkle chives over all.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. frozen unsweetened orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. dried parsley flakes
1 pkg. instant chicken flavor broth mix
1 lb. boned, skinned chicken parts, cut into large chunks
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. cornstarch
1 c. water
toasted sesame seed
bow tie noodles
Directions:
In a large skillet, combine lemon juice, mustard, garlic powder, pepper, orange juice, broth mix, parsley and vegetable oil.
Heat over medium heat until hot.
Add chicken.
Turning frequently, cook chicken until done (about 15 minutes).
Reduce heat to low; cover and cook 10 more minutes.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1 to 2 chickens, cut up (meaty pieces)
1/4 c. flour
1 1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
3 Tbsp. catsup
1 Tbsp. vinegar
2 Tbsp. cold water
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
hot cooked rice
Directions:
Combine flour and salt; coat chicken.
Brown in hot oil; drain.
Transfer to crock-pot.
Stir together lemonade, brown sugar, catsup and vinegar.
Pour over chicken.
Cover; cook on high for 3 to 4 hours.
Remove chicken; pour liquid into saucepan. Return chicken to crock-pot; cover to keep warm.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/3 c. chicken broth
1/3 c. fresh lemon juice
1/2 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. lemon zest
1 egg
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. white pepper
3/4 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 2 large), cut the chicken in strips
1/4 c. cornstarch
1/3 c. cooking oil
1 1/2 tsp. cornstarch, dissolved in 1 Tbsp. water
1 tsp. toasted sesame seeds
Directions:
Toast sesame seeds by swirling in a nonstick skillet until they smell nutty.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 small cans tomato paste
5 Tbsp. sour cream
3 c. cottage cheese
2 small cans mushrooms
2 lb. Mozzarella cheese
1 small box noodles
Directions:
Brown ground beef and drain.
Add tomato paste and two or three cans of water.
Simmer about 20 minutes.
Add sour cream and simmer about 10 minutes.
Remove and add cottage cheese and mushrooms.
Boil noodles, drain, coat in butter.
Grease a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Line with noodles, sauce and cheese.
Repeat.
Top with Parmesan cheese and the parsley.
Bake at 350° until cheese melts.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 c. onions, chopped
1 garlic clove, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
1/4 tsp. oregano
1 lb. ground chuck
1 (28 oz.) can Italian tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
Directions:
Cook the first 4 ingredients in 3 tablespoons oil until soft, but not brown.
Add meat and stir until meat loses red color.
Add tomatoes, tomato sauce and tomato paste.
Cook for 1 hour.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Easy Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 small pkg. flat noodles
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 (8 oz.) cottage cheese
1 (8 oz.) sour cream
1 medium onion, diced
1/2 green pepper, chopped
1 lb. ground beef
3/4 Tbsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
3 to 4 cans tomato sauce
1 can sliced mushrooms
Directions:
Boil noodles; drain and rinse.
Place in large flat buttered dish.
Mix softened cream cheese, cottage cheese and sour cream. Spread over noodles.
Cook onion and green pepper until tender. Add ground beef, salt and pepper.
Brown lightly, then add tomato sauce and mushrooms.
Spread over cheese.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Baked Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. basil
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 lb. can tomatoes (2 c.)
2 (6 oz.) cans tomato paste
10 oz. pkg. lasagna noodles
3 c. cottage cheese
2 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese, grated
1 pkg. Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Mix together and cook 30 minutes the beef, onion, garlic, basil, salt, tomatoes and tomato paste.
Cook noodles and set aside.
Mix cottage cheese, eggs, salt, pepper, parsley flakes and Parmesan cheese together.
In 9 x 13 pan, put 1/2 of the noodles in the bottom. Next, put in 1/2 beef mixture, then 1/2 cheese mixture, then 1/2 Mozzarella cheese.
Repeat process for second layer.
Bake at 375° for 30 minutes.
Let stand 10 to 15 minutes before serving.
Serves 12.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. hamburger
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 cloves garlic
2 Tbsp. olive oil
15 oz. can tomato sauce
1 small can tomato paste
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. crushed peppers
2 pkg. Mozzarella cheese
1 large cottage cheese
1 pkg. Parmesan cheese
9 noodles, cooked until tender
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients; cook until brown.
Combine and add next 6 ingredients; simmer for 1 hour.
Layer noodles, cottage cheese, Mozzarella, sauce and sprinkle Parmesan on top (3 layers) in buttered pan.
Cook in oven for 30 minutes at 350°.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Fresh Apple Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 c. salad oil
3 diced apples (Winesap)
1 c. chopped nuts
2 1/2 c. flour
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
1 pkg. butterscotch chips
Directions:
Mix sugar, eggs and oil.
Add dry ingredients.
Mix well while adding apples and nuts.
Pour into greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan.
Sprinkle butterscotch chips over top of batter.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Fresh Apple Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. Wesson oil
2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 c. pecans
4 c. diced apples
1 (6 oz.) pkg. butterscotch chips
Directions:
Grease and flour 13 x 9-inch pan.
Preheat oven at 350°.
Sift together dry ingredients.
Mix all ingredients except apples and chips.
Fold in apples; pour into pan.
Sprinkle chips on top. Bake 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oil
2 c. sugar
2 eggs
3 c. peeled, chopped apples
1 c. chopped nuts
raisins
3 c. flour (I use 1/2 whole wheat)
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Blend oil, sugar and eggs well.
Stir in apples, nuts and raisins.
Add flour, vanilla, baking soda and cinnamon.
Bake about 1 hour in greased 13 x 9-inch pan.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Fresh Apple Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. salad oil
2 eggs
2 c. sugar
2 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. baking powder
1 c. broken pecans or walnuts
3 c. sour cooking apples, chopped
1 (6 oz.) pkg. butterscotch chips
Directions:
In large bowl, mix oil, eggs and sugar.
In separate bowl, sift dry ingredients.
Add to mixture.
Stir in apples and nuts. Spread into well-greased 13 x 9-inch pan.
Distribute chips onto top of cake.
Bake at 350° for 55 to 60 minutes.
For best results, bake at least 2 to 3 days before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1 3/4 c. sugar
1 c. vegetable oil
2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 c. chopped apples
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Beat together eggs and sugar.
Add vegetable oil.
In large bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon.
Slowly mix dry ingredients into egg mixture.
Blend well.
Fold in apples and nuts.
Spread into a greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium can mushrooms
4 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. rich milk
Directions:
Saute mushrooms in butter.
Add flour slowly and brown slightly.
Add milk and cook until it thickens.
Pour over steak or chicken.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 tsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter over low heat in a heavy saucepan.
Stir with wooden spoon.
Saute onion and mushrooms in butter for 5 minutes. Blend in flour and seasonings.
Cook over low heat until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Remove from heat.
Stir in milk.
Bring to a boil; boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Cook until thickened. Serve over noodles, potatoes, etc.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Savory Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
40 mushrooms (medium size), washed, caps whole, stems removed
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. rosemary
freshly ground pepper
2 c. chicken bouillon
1/2 c. wild rice
1 shallot
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. chopped almonds
fresh lemon
Directions:
Bring bouillon to a boil.
Add washed wild rice; cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove from heat.
Saute mushroom caps in butter.
Mix rice, almonds, herbs and spices and fill mushroom caps.
Drizzle with fresh lemon juice.
Bake on cookie sheet at 300° for 15 minutes.
May easily be prepared a day prior to re-heating.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. fresh mushrooms
1 or 2 onions, chopped or sliced
2 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 to 2 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. sour cream
2 c. hot broth or water
Directions:
Thinly slice the mushrooms and onions.
Saute in butter for 5 minutes.
Slowly add the flour and the hot broth, stirring constantly.
Add salt and pepper.
Simmer for 10 minutes.
Add the sour cream and stir.
Good with grilled steak and baked potatoes.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinated Mushrooms 2
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
