3 Tbsp. minced onion
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. tomato sauce
1/4 c. dry white wine
1/4 c. water
2 cloves
1/8 tsp. saffron
salt
freshly ground pepper
1/2 lb. very small mushrooms, washed and stems removed
Directions:
Heat the oil in a small, deep casserole and saute the onion and garlic until onion is transparent.
Stir in tomato sauce, wine, water, cloves, saffron, salt and pepper.
Simmer, covered, for 45 minutes, adding more water, if necessary.
Add the mushrooms to the cooking liquid and simmer 5 minutes more.
Turn off heat, cover and let cool.
Refrigerate overnight.
Serve cold or at room temperature.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken wings (32 to 36 pieces)
1/2 c. margarine
1 c. unsifted flour
1 tsp. onion salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Line large shallow baking pan to aluminum foil.
Cut wings at each joint.
Discard tips.
Melt margarine in lined pan.
Combine flour, onion, salt and pepper in bowl.
Add chicken pieces, a few at a time, and shake to coat. Place in pan.
Bake 25 minutes at 400°.
Turn wings over and bake an additional 20 to 25 minutes or until crisp.
Drain on paper towels.
Transfer to serving platter.
Serve to barbecue sauce, Blue cheese dressing, buttermilk Ranch dressing or hot sauce.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
12 chicken wings
1 egg
2 tsp. vegetable oil
2 tsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. 5 spice powder
1/4 c. water
1/2 c. Gold Medal all-purpose flour
1/4 c. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. baking soda
vegetable oil
1/2 c. Chinese hot mustard sauce
Directions:
Cut each chicken wing at joints to make 3 pieces.
Discard tips.
Mix egg, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, the soy sauce, salt, sugar and 5 spice powder in medium glass or plastic bowl.
Stir in chicken.
Cover and refrigerate 1 hour.
Add water to chicken. Stir flour, cornstarch and baking soda into chicken.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken wings
1/2 c. butter, melted
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut chicken wings into pieces, discarding tips.
In a small bowl, combine melted butter and garlic powder.
In another bowl, combine remaining ingredients.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
2/3 c. dried bread crumbs
2/3 c. whole wheat or all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. buttermilk
12 chicken wings
Directions:
In 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch roasting pan in 425° oven, melt butter.
Remove pan from oven.
On wax paper, mix next 5 ingredients.
Pour buttermilk into small bowl.
Dip one wing at a time in buttermilk, then in crumb mixture.
Place wings in melted butter in roasting pan, turning to coat evenly.
Bake 35 minutes or until chicken wings are tender.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wing Recipe
Ingredients:
24 chicken wings (about 4 lb.)
salt (optional)
freshly ground black pepper
4 c. vegetable or corn oil
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 to 5 tsp. hot sauce (Frank's Original Red Hot Sauce is the local favorite)
1 tsp. white vinegar
Directions:
Cut off tips and separate each wing at the joint.
Sprinkle wings with salt and pepper to taste.
Heat oil in deep-fat fryer or large heavy pot.
When it is quite hot, add half the wings and cook about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
When wings are golden brown and crisp, remove them and drain well.
Add remaining wings and repeat process.
Meanwhile, melt butter in saucepan, add hot sauce to taste and vinegar.
Pour hot sauce over wings and shake in bucket.
Serve with Blue Cheese dressing and celery sticks.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli And Cheddar Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. chopped broccoli
2 c. chicken broth or 2 c. water plus 2 bouillon cubes
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. salt
2 c. light cream
1/4 c. chopped onion
3 Tbsp. margarine
3 Tbsp. cornstarch or flour
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In large saucepan, cook broccoli until soft; drain.
In small pan, saute onion in margarine.
Add cornstarch and slowly add broth and cream.
Stir and cook until thickens.
Add salt, nutmeg and broccoli.
Just before serving, stir in cheese.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli And Cheddar Soup
Ingredients:
4 c. broccoli, diced
3 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
5 c. chicken stock
1 c. milk
1 c. whipping cream
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
salt and pepper
Directions:
Saute broccoli in butter over medium heat until tender. Sprinkle with flour and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes.
Gradually stir in stock and milk.
Heat just to simmering.
Stir in cream and cheese.
Allow cheese to melt in soup.
Season to taste and serve with croutons.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
Ingredients:
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 stick butter
1/4 c. flour
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. chicken broth
2 1/2 c. milk
2 c. broccoli, cooked slightly
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In a saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender.
Stir in flour, salt and pepper.
Cook and stir until smooth.
Add broth and milk all at once.
Cook until thick.
Add broccoli; simmer and stir.
Remove from heat and stir in cheese until melted.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Cheese Soup
Ingredients:
5 Tbsp. oleo, divided
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, peeled
2 lb. fresh broccoli
1 large rib celery
1 large carrot, peeled
4 green onions
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1/4 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
dash of nutmeg
1 1/2 c. skim milk
4 oz. sharp Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
In heavy 4-quart kettle, melt 1 tablespoon oleo over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic.
Saute, stirring until onion is transparent and set aside.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Cream Of Broccoli Soup
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. chopped celery
5 Tbsp. flour
2 c. milk
1 c. water or chicken broth
1 c. sour cream
steamed fresh broccoli
3/4 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Combine onion and celery in butter and saute.
Add flour.
Add fluid and sour cream to make a white sauce.
Add tender broccoli; simmer.
Put contents, mostly broccoli, in a blender for a few seconds to puree, then put back into pan.
Top with grated cheese in bowl.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese(Kids In The Kitchen)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped carrot
1/2 c. chopped celery
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 (28 oz.) can crushed tomatoes or tomato puree
1 tsp. dried basil leaves
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1/2 lb. ground sirloin or ground beef
1 lb. spaghetti or ziti, cooked according to pkg. directions
Directions:
Heat oil in a large skillet. Add onion, carrots and celery. Saute over low-medium heat, stirring frequently, about 10 minutes. Stir in garlic. Saute 2 minutes more.
Add tomato sauce to skillet. Add basil and oregano. Stir.
Cook, covered, on medium-low heat for about 10 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion
1 slice root celery or 2 stalks celery
1 carrot
4 oz. smoked ham
1 c. water
3 to 4 canned whole tomatoes or 3 Tbsp. tomato puree
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. salt
dash of black pepper
1 tsp. dried thyme
1/3 c. white wine or chicken broth
10 to 12 oz. spaghetti or other pasta
Directions:
In a skillet saute ground beef in 1 tablespoon oil until meat loses its pinkness then transfer to a pan.
Peel and chop onion then dice celery and carrot.
Chop ham into small pieces and saute in remaining oil with onion, celery and carrot.
Transfer to pan with ground meat and combine all.
Add water, tomatoes or tomato puree, garlic, salt, pepper and thyme.
Cover and cook for about 20 minutes, then add the wine or chicken broth and cook for a few more minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Spaghettini Bolognese
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 carrot, sliced
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/2 c. each chopped onion, celery and green pepper
2 Tbsp. Wesson oil
1 lb. Italian sausage, casing removed
2 (15 oz.) cans Hunt's tomato sauce
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. dry red wine (optional)
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. Italian seasoning
Directions:
Saute mushrooms, carrot, garlic, onion, celery and green pepper in Wesson oil in Dutch oven.
Add sausage; cook until sausage loses redness.
Drain fat.
Add remaining ingredients. Simmer, uncovered, 40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve over hot, cooked spaghettini.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Spaghetti Bolog'Nase
Ingredients:
3/4 to 1 lb. Italian sausage
2 medium onions, chopped
1 carrot, thinly sliced
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 rib celery
1 green pepper
2 (15 oz.) cans tomato sauce
1/2 c. water or 1/4 c. red wine
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. Italian herb seasoning (increase to taste)
basil, oregano, garlic and red pepper
Directions:
Saut mushrooms, carrot, onions and green pepper in oil. Add sausage and cook until sausage is done. Drain well. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer 40 minutes (or longer).

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion
2 stalks celery
1 carrot
4 oz. smoked ham
1 c. water
3 to 4 canned tomatoes
2 cloves minced garlic
1 tsp. salt
dash of black pepper
1 tsp. thyme
1/3 c. chicken broth
10 to 12 oz. spaghetti or other pasta
Directions:
Brown ground beef in 1 tablespoon oil until meat is done. Transfer to a pan.
Peel and chop onion; dice celery and carrot. Chop ham into small pieces.
Saute in remaining oil with onion, celery and carrot.
Add to ground meat.
Add water, tomatoes, garlic, salt, pepper and thyme; cover and cook about 20 minutes. Add chicken broth; cook a few minutes more.
Cook pasta according to package directions; drain well.
Serve immediately with sauce.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Fresh Vegetables With Creamy Garlic Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. nonfat yogurt
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 tsp. olive oil
1 small artichoke, cooked and cooled
1 c. new potatoes, halved and cooked
1 c. green beans, blanched
1 c. carrots (about 2 inches long), blanched
6 or 8 small beets, cooked and cooled
1/2 c. cooked chickpeas
Directions:
In a small bowl, combine yogurt, garlic and olive oil. Arrange remaining ingredients on a large platter.
Mound yogurt sauce in the center.
Serve at room temperature.
Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Marinated Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 (1 lb.) can French green beans, cut small
1 (1 lb.) can white Shoe Peg corn
1 (1 lb.) can early June peas (small)
1 c. bell pepper, chopped fine
1 c. purple onion, chopped fine
1 c. celery, chopped fine
1 small jar red pimentos
3/4 c. vinegar
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine vinegar, oil, sugar, salt and pepper in a saucepan and bring to a boil.
Pour over vegetables.
Let stand refrigerated overnight.
Keeps several days in refrigerator.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Marinated Carrots(A Great Cookout Dish And Easy To Make!)
Ingredients:
2 lb. sliced cooked carrots
1 can tomato soup
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. cooking oil
1/2 c. cider vinegar
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 chopped onion
1 chopped green pepper
3 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach
1 (9 oz.) can artichoke hearts
1/2 lb. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
4 Tbsp. margarine
6 Tbsp. milk
1/3 c. grated cheese
ground pepper
Directions:
Layer drained artichoke hearts in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.
Layer drained spinach next.
Blend cream cheese, mayonnaise and margarine until light and fluffy.
Gradually beat in milk. Spread over top of spinach.
Sprinkle with pepper and grated cheese.
Bake at 375° for 40 minutes.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Chickpeas Indian Style
Ingredients:
2 cans chickpeas
2 peeled medium onions, cut in quarters
1 1/4 inch long piece fresh ginger, peeled
1 green chili or 2 dried small red chilies
3 or 4 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. nigella seed (black onion seed)
1 tsp. mustard seed
1 tsp. powdered coriander
1/2 tsp. powdered red pepper (if desired)
small can tomatoes, broken up
salt to taste
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Open cans of chickpeas and drain, reserving liquid.
In blender or food processor place onions, ginger, chilies and garlic.
Blend this all together into a puree.
In heavy saucepan, heat 2 to 3 tablespoons oil briefly.
Add cumin, nigella and mustard seed.
The seed should pop and crackle.
(Do not let burn.)
Pour in blender contents.
Fry, stirring, until color turns golden.
Add coriander, tomatoes, salt, lemon juice and red pepper (if desired).
Mix well and gently mix drained chickpeas into the spice-onion mixture. Then add liquid from cans.
Cover and let simmer about 40 minutes. Tastes better the next day.
A good dish for vegetarians, too.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
Ingredients:
chicken meat, parboiled
1 box pea pods (frozen)
3 to 4 sticks celery, chopped
3 to 4 onions, sliced
1 green pepper, sliced
1/2 c. teriyaki sauce
2 c. chicken broth
1 c. drained mushrooms
1 bag frozen broccoli
1 bag frozen cauliflower
1 can water chestnuts, drained
bean sprouts (optional)
cornstarch to thicken
Directions:
Parboil chicken.
(May use just white meat.)
Cool and cut into chunks (quarter size).
Fry in 2 to 3 tablespoons oil until tender, stirring often, 5 to 10 minutes.
Add celery first and cook for awhile and add other ingredients.
I make my chicken broth with boiling water and chicken crystals, then add teriyaki sauce and thicken.
Add to vegetables and stir often.
Vegetables should be crunchy.
Fresh vegetables can be used instead of frozen and canned.
Makes enough to fill a 12 x 2 x 2-inch electric frypan.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg. curly noodles
2 small avocados
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese
1/4 c. butter or margarine
garlic salt and pepper to taste
Parmesan cheese to taste
Directions:
Cook noodles according to package directions.
Drain in colander and return to pot.
Add butter, grated cheeses, seasonings and thinly sliced avocados.
Stir.
Serves 4 to 6. Very quick and easy to make and your family will think you're a gourmet cook!

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. rotini pasta
1/2 c. diced Provolone cheese
1 can pitted black olives
4 c. assorted vegetables
salt and pepper
1/2 c. Italian dressing
2 oz. Prosciutto, slivered
1/2 c. sliced red onion
1/2 c. frozen peas, thawed
2 Tbsp. fresh basil
1 avocado
Directions:
In a large bowl, gently toss pasta with dressing.
Add cheese, Prosciutto, black olives, onion, peas, broccoli, carrots, bell pepper, mushrooms, asparagus tips and sliced basil.
Toss gently. Season to taste.
Fan avocado slices on top.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and tomato.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Dish Salad
Ingredients:
2 large avocados
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. garlic salt
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream
2 (8 oz.) jars picante sauce
3/4 c. ripe olives, chopped
3 c. tomatoes, peeled and chopped
1 1/2 c. cheddar cheese, shredded
Directions:
Peel and mash avocados.
Stir in garlic powder, garlic salt, lemon juice and mayonnaise.
Spread mixture into a 9 x 13 x 2-inch baking dish.
Carefully spread sour cream over mixture.
Drain picante sauce and spoon on top of sour cream being careful not to mix in with sour cream layer.
Layer chopped, ripe olives over picante sauce.
Layer chopped tomatoes over olives.
Top with shredded cheese.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Cream Soup
Ingredients:
2 tsp. minced onion
2 tsp. butter or margarine
2 tsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
3 drops hot pepper sauce
1 c. milk
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 soft avocado
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
green and yellow food coloring
4 avocado crescents
Directions:
In saucepan, cook onion in butter until tender but not browned.
Stir in flour, salt, pepper sauce, milk and broth. Cook and stir until smooth and soup comes to a boil.
Simmer, uncovered, about 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Layered Avocado Salad
Ingredients:
2 cans bean dip
3 mashed ripe avocados
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. sour cream
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 pkg. dry taco seasoning
2 c. chopped lettuce
1 c. chopped green onions
1 or 2 cans sliced black olives
2 c. chopped tomatoes
2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Mix together the bean dip, avocados, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Spread onto large platter, spreading to edges.
Mix together the sour cream, mayonnaise and taco seasoning.
Spread over bean mixture.
Layer remaining ingredients in the order given.
Chill for 3 to 4 hours.
Serve with tortilla style chips.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Chicken
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts, skin removed or chicken cutlets (use mallet to tenderize)
2 lemons
1 tsp. thyme, garlic powder and marjoram
2 or more Tbsp. soy sauce
4 Tbsp. honey (can add more if necessary)
Directions:
Mix ingredients; marinate chicken for one hour.
Put in broiler for 10 minutes or so.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Marinade(Great For Chicken And Spareribs)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, blenderized
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. Tabasco
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Heat all to boiling.
Marinate meat and brush every 15 minutes while cooking.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Marvelous Marinade
Ingredients:
3 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
1/3 c. catsup
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. crushed basil
2 to 3 lb. meat or chicken, cut in 1/4-inch chunks or pieces
veggies
Directions:
In a small pan, cook garlic in oil.
Remove from heat.
Add the rest of the ingredients, except the meat and vegetables.
Pour sauce over meat/chicken in covered container.
Marinate meat/chicken 6 hours or overnight.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Easy Marinade
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. oil
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. basil
1 tsp. minced onion
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and pour over chicken. Let set as little as 1 hour or overnight for really juicy chicken.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Chicken
Ingredients:
1 cut up fryer or 6 breasts
1 pkg. dry onion soup mix
1 (8 oz.) bottle Catalina dressing
1 can whole cranberries
1 large onion, cut fine
1 large bell pepper, cut fine
3 Tbsp. shortening
1 lb. hamburger meat
2 1/2 c. canned tomatoes (I use two cans stewed tomatoes and cut them up if they need it)
1/2 c. uncooked rice (I use Minute rice)
1 tsp. chili powder (you've got to be kidding! I put this in until I feel like I've got enough; I like to be able to taste the spicy taste, so put a lot of this in there!)
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Cook onion and green pepper slowly in shortening until onion is yellow.
Add meat and cook until it gets brown.
I always drain the grease off right here.
Add tomatoes, rice and seasoning.
Put in casserole dish (large size) and bake in oven at 350° for 1 hour.
I hope this will be a super dish for you, too.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
8 hard-boiled eggs, halved lengthwise
4 slices bacon, crisp-cooked, drained and crumbled
4 tsp. prepared mustard
1 medium avocado, sliced
1/8 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. paprika
dash of pepper
1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
Directions:
Remove yolks from egg whites; arrange whites on plate or container.
Sieve egg yolks and combine with remaining ingredients except avocado; mix well.
Refill egg whites with egg yolk mixture.
Sprinkle with additional paprika.
Garnish with avocado. Half of recipe may be stored in a container.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 hard-boiled eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. salad dressing (mayo)
2 slices bacon, crisply fried and crumbled
1/2 c. finely shredded American cheese
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
Directions:
Cut eggs lengthwise in half.
Slip out yolks and mash with fork.
Mix in seasonings and salad dressing.
Fill whites with egg yolk mixture, heaping it up slightly.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 hard boiled eggs, chopped
4 strips of bacon, cooked and crumbled
1/4 c mayonnaise
1 tbsp onion, minced
1/2 tsp salt
1/2 tsp pepper
1/4 tsp mustard
1 c cheddar cheese, shredded
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except for the cheese until creamy. Shape into 1 inch balls.
Roll in cheese.
Cover and refrigerate until serving.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 eggs, hard-boiled and peeled
1/2 tsp. mustard
salt and pepper to taste
2 tsp. pickle relish
1 to 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 c. rice
1 can water
1 Tbsp. butter
1 can beef consomme soup
1 medium onion, chopped
1/4 tsp. black pepper
4 large Irish potatoes, cooked
1/2 c. chopped onion
3 eggs, hard-boiled and chopped
1/2 to 1 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. chopped bell pepper
2 Tbsp. sweet pickle relish
salt and pepper
Directions:
Peel and cube potatoes.
Gently fold into all other ingredients.
Add 1/2 cup mayonnaise and stir, adding as much as you need to make it the consistency you want.
Add salt and pepper to your taste.
Chill 1 hour before serving.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Different Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 eggs hard boiled and finely chopped
3 bacon strips cooked and crumbled
1/4 c. mayonnaise
1 tsp. minced onion
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. prepared mustard
4 oz. cheddar cheese shredded (1 c.)
Directions:
In a bowl combine all the ingredients except cheese, until creamy. Shape into 1 inch balls. Roll in grated cheese, cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. Makes 2 dozen.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Salad With Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
3/4 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
3 to 4 drops hot pepper sauce
salad greens
bell peppers, mushrooms, tomatoes or any other vegetables of your choice
Directions:
In a jar with a tight fitting lid, combine the first 7 ingredients and shake well.
Toss salad greens and vegetables in a large bowl or arrange on individual salad plates.
Serve with dressing.
Yields 1 cup of dressing.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette For Salad And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. diced capers
1 tsp. diced tarragon leaves or 1/2 tsp. dry
1/2 medium onion, diced
1/2 medium red onion, diced
1 large dill pickle, diced
1 1/2 tsp. thyme
1 Tbsp. tarragon vinegar
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. red wine vinegar
1 c. salad oil
2 dashes Tabasco
2 dashes Worcestershire
salt and fresh ground pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all the ingredients in a bowl.
This recipe has been used at LeBistro for 20 years.
Spoon over any fresh salad mixture. Also excellent over tomatoes and asparagus with fresh red onion.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette Salad
Ingredients:
4 c. torn romaine
1/2 c. Feta cheese
4 slices red onion
8 black olives
1/4 c. honey
2 tsp. white wine vinegar
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
1 tsp. poppy seed
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 drop hot pepper sauce
pinch of salt
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Arrange romaine, Feta cheese, onions and olives on 4 salad plates. Combine remaining ingredients in a jar with tight-fitting lid and shake well. Just before serving, pour vinaigrette over salad.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Tomato Vinaigrette Salad
Ingredients:
8 to 12 tomatoes, cut into pieces
1/4 c. finely chopped onion
1 green pepper, cut into pieces (optional)
1/2 c. wine vinegar
2/3 c. olive oil or salad oil
2 tsp. oregano leaves
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
2 cloves garlic, crushed
Directions:
Dressing should be mixed by putting ingredients in tightly covered jar and shaking vigorously until blended.
Cover salad and chill several hours or overnight before serving.
Spoon dressing over the tomatoes occasionally.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette (Basic)
Ingredients:
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
scant 1/2 tsp. salt
5 twists of peppermill
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
scant tsp. fresh lemon juice
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Put mustard in the bottom of a salad bowl.
Stir the first 5 ingredients, whisking constantly.
Add vegetable oil and olive oil in a very thin stream.
Makes 6 tablespoons of vinaigrette, enough for 10 to 12 cups of salad greens.
Use shortly after it is made. Add whatever you like, garlic, anchovies, shallots, sliced mushrooms, chopped capers, etc.
May be used on grilled fish or cold roast beef (add horseradish) or chicken.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Feta Spinach And Fruit Salad With Honey-Lemon Dressing
Ingredients:
5 c. torn fresh spinach
1 c. cantaloupe chunks
1 c. halved strawberries
1/2 c. thin-sliced red onion rings
1 c. crumbled Feta natural cheese
1/4 c. pitted ripe olives
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. honey
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place spinach, fruit, onion, cheese and olives in large bowl. Toss lightly.
Mix remaining ingredients; add and toss.
Makes 6 cups or 6 side-salad servings.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Spinach Supreme
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed
2 Tbsp. butter
2/3 c. chopped onion
1 3/4 c. cottage cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 well beaten eggs
1/2 lb. Feta cheese, crumbled
Directions:
Saute spinach in butter.
Add onion, cottage cheese, salt, pepper and eggs.
Mix.
Add cheese.
Place in greased 8 x 8-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes until firm.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Spinach, Red Pepper, And Feta Quiche
Ingredients:
1/2 c. plus 3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
3 Tbsp. cold, unsalted butter
1 Tbsp. cold vegetable shortening
1 1/2 Tbsp. ice water, plus additional if necessary
1/3 c. sliced red bell pepper
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. packed, fresh spinach leaves, trimmed and washed thoroughly (about 5 oz.)
2 large eggs
1/3 c. heavy cream or milk
1/3 c. crumbled Feta cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach And Fettucini
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter
3 Tbsp. onion, chopped
1 lb. fettucini
1 c. heavy cream
1 clove garlic, chopped
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach, drained and chopped
1 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
pepper to taste
Directions:
In skillet, melt 1/2 the butter, add garlic and onion, cook until golden.
Add spinach, cover pan, cook until spinach is heated through.
Meanwhile, cook noodles.
Drain and return to pot.
Toss with remaining butter, spinach mixture, Parmesan and cream until all are blended and heated through.
Serve immediately.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Spinach Squares
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. Feta cheese
2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
2 eggs
1/4 c. Romano cheese
1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small chopped onion
1 pkg. filo dough (1/2 for 9 x 13-inch pan)
1 1/2 sticks melted oleo
Directions:
Mix really good the first 6 ingredients.
Brush oleo in 9 x 13-inch pan.
Layer 1 sheet of filo; brush with oleo.
Do that about 7 or 8 layers.
Put filling on that and add about 7 more sheets of filo, brushing after each with oleo.
Put in refrigerator to chill, then cut through top layer just before you bake at 350° for 50 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Curry
Ingredients:
1 cauliflower, cut up
6 tomatoes, cut and peeled
6 to 8 potatoes, small and cut up
1/4 lb. shelled peas
1/4 lb. green beans, sliced
1 Tbsp. turmeric
1 1/2 Tbsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. butter
6 small onions
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. stock
Directions:
Place vegetables on a large plate.
Sprinkle with mixed spices and salt.
Melt butter in a heavy pan.
Saute the onions and garlic.
Add the spiced veggies and stock.
Cover and bring to a boil, simmer for about 20 minutes until all vegetables are tender. Serve with hot cooked rice.
Enjoy!

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Mixed Vegetable Curry
Ingredients:
2 c. broccoli (flowerets)
1 large potato (3/4-inch cubes)
2 carrots (1/3-inch slices)
1/2 c. sour cream
1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. cumin powder
1 Tbsp. coriander powder
pinch of garlic powder
1 1/2 tsp. salt
oil for deep frying
Directions:
Steam broccoli until tender.
Deep fry potato on high heat until golden and tender.
Then deep fry carrots until tender. Drain and set aside vegetables.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Vegetables
Ingredients:
6 to 8 tiny new potatoes, quartered (1 to 1 1/2 lb.)
2 c. cauliflower flowerets
3/4 c. frozen peas
1 medium onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. water
1 tsp. curry powder
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. each: garlic and ginger powder
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper
Directions:
In a large skillet, cook potatoes and onion in hot oil until the edges start to brown.
Add water, curry powder, salt, garlic, ginger and red pepper.
Bring to boiling; reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for about 10 to 15 minutes.
Add cauliflower; cook about 5 minutes more or until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.
Add frozen peas; heat through, adding a little more water if necessary.
Makes 4 to 6 side dish servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Curry In A Hurry
Ingredients:
1 c. diced apple
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. curry powder
2 Tbsp. butter
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 c. water
1 c. diced chicken, pork or turkey
2 c. cooked rice
shredded coconut
Directions:
In saucepan, cook the apple, onion and curry in butter until onion is tender. Stir in soup, water and meat.
Heat, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice and garnish with coconut.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Curry Dip For Fresh Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. drained chili sauce
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. cayenne red pepper
1 Tbsp. horseradish
2 to 3 drops lemon juice
Durkee sauce to taste
curry powder to taste
Directions:
Mix well.
Good with carrots, celery, squash, broccoli and cauliflower.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken wings (32 to 36 pieces)
1/2 c. margarine
1 c. unsifted flour
1 tsp. onion salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Line large shallow baking pan to aluminum foil.
Cut wings at each joint.
Discard tips.
Melt margarine in lined pan.
Combine flour, onion, salt and pepper in bowl.
Add chicken pieces, a few at a time, and shake to coat. Place in pan.
Bake 25 minutes at 400°.
Turn wings over and bake an additional 20 to 25 minutes or until crisp.
Drain on paper towels.
Transfer to serving platter.
Serve to barbecue sauce, Blue cheese dressing, buttermilk Ranch dressing or hot sauce.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
2/3 c. dried bread crumbs
2/3 c. whole wheat or all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. buttermilk
12 chicken wings
Directions:
In 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch roasting pan in 425° oven, melt butter.
Remove pan from oven.
On wax paper, mix next 5 ingredients.
Pour buttermilk into small bowl.
Dip one wing at a time in buttermilk, then in crumb mixture.
Place wings in melted butter in roasting pan, turning to coat evenly.
Bake 35 minutes or until chicken wings are tender.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken wings
1/2 c. butter, melted
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut chicken wings into pieces, discarding tips.
In a small bowl, combine melted butter and garlic powder.
In another bowl, combine remaining ingredients.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Baked Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
16 chicken wings
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 c. canned stewed tomatoes
1/2 c. finely chopped celery
1/2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Wash chicken wings and pat dry.
In skillet, saute chicken wings in melted butter until lightly browned.
Arrange in oiled baking dish; add tomatoes and celery.
In a separate bowl, mix soy sauce, vinegar and salt.
Pour over the chicken.
Bake at 375°, uncovered, for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
12 chicken wings
1 egg
2 tsp. vegetable oil
2 tsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. 5 spice powder
1/4 c. water
1/2 c. Gold Medal all-purpose flour
1/4 c. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. baking soda
vegetable oil
1/2 c. Chinese hot mustard sauce
Directions:
Cut each chicken wing at joints to make 3 pieces.
Discard tips.
Mix egg, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, the soy sauce, salt, sugar and 5 spice powder in medium glass or plastic bowl.
Stir in chicken.
Cover and refrigerate 1 hour.
Add water to chicken. Stir flour, cornstarch and baking soda into chicken.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Poached Eggs
Ingredients:
4 eggs
4 slices toast
butter or magarine
1 1/2 c. milk (approximately)
salt
pepper
Directions:
Heat milk slowly in a large skillet.
Add salt, pepper and 1 tablespoon butter.
Add eggs when milk is steaming (don't break yolks).
Spoon milk over eggs.
About now, put toast in toaster. Turn eggs, if necessary.
Stir milk, it will start to look like gravy.
Butter toast in plate.
Place 1 egg on each piece of toast.
Spoon gravy over top.
Add salt and pepper to taste!

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Poached Eggs Provencale
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1 medium onion, sliced
1 medium zucchini, sliced
1 medium green pepper, coarsely chopped
2 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. celery salt
3 or 4 drops red pepper sauce
8 eggs
Directions:
Place undrained tomatoes in 10-inch frying pan and cut them into wedges or chunks with a spoon.
Stir in all remaining ingredients except eggs.
Cook over medium heat until mixture boils.
Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes.
Carefully break eggs into simmering vegetable mixture.
Cover and cook eggs to desired doneness, 3 to 5 minutes.
Spoon eggs and vegetable mixture into serving dishes.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Microwave Poached Eggs
Ingredients:
2 eggs
seasonings
butter
Directions:
Grease poacher with oil, margarine or butter.
Add 1 teaspoon of water.
Place 1 egg in each holder.
Pierce white and yolk with toothpick.
Cover and cook 45 to 120 seconds.
Hold cover firmly and turn over.
Eggs will fall onto tray.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Poached Fish
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. water or skim milk
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 bay leaf
a few cloves or peppercorns
1 lb. fish fillets or steaks of your choice
Directions:
Stir together water, lemon juice, onion and seasonings in a large skillet.
Bring to a simmer.
Add fish; cover and adjust heat to maintain a simmer.
Cook 10 minutes per inch of thickness of thickest part of fish, probably 5 to 10 minutes.
Fish is done when it is opaque and flakes easily with a fork.
Don't overcook or it becomes tough and dry.
Serve hot with sauce or lemon juice or cold in chunks in salad.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Omelet
Ingredients:
6 eggs, separated
6 Tbsp. water
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. flour
dash of pepper
1 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Beat egg whites until frothy.
Add water and salt; beat until stiff in bowl.
Add flour and pepper to egg yolks.
Beat until thick and lemon colored.
Cook on low heat until puffy and lightly browned on bottom.
Bake at 325° for 12 to 15 minutes, until top feels dry and center springs back when lightly touched.
Fill with jelly, crisp bacon, cheese or ham.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free Kraft mayonnaise
1 tsp. minced garlic
1 Egg Beater, beaten
1 (8 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese (1 c.)
Directions:
Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
Drain and set aside.
Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in a small saucepan.
Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beater.
Toss with fettuccine until well coated.
Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.
Serves 8.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked eggless variety)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free mayonnaise or salad dressing
1 tsp. minced garlic
2 Egg Beaters, beaten (1/2 c.)
2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, drained
1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
Drain and set aside. Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in small saucepan.
Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beaters.
Toss with fettuccine and mushrooms until well coated.
Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Broccoli, Cauliflower And Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 small head trimmed cauliflower, cut in florets
1 small bunch broccoli, trimmed and cut in florets
2 tsp. olive oil or vegetable oil
3 cloves garlic
2 1/2 thickly sliced mushrooms
2 1/2 c. whole noodles
1 c. low-fat small curd cottage cheese
1/2 c. low-fat milk
1/4 c. low-fat sour cream
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
salt and pepper
Directions:
In a large pot of boiling water, cook cauliflower and broccoli until tender-crisp, about 5 minutes.
With a slotted spoon, remove vegetables and save the liquid for cooking the pasta.
In a large skillet, heat oil.
Saute garlic for 2 minutes over medium heat. Add mushrooms for about 5 minutes.
Stir in broccoli and cauliflower.
Saute for 2 to 3 minutes longer; set aside. Meanwhile in reserved boiling vegetable liquid, cook pasta.
Add water if necessary tender but until firm, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain.
In a food processor combine cottage cheese, milk, sour cream and Parmesan.
Pour over broccoli mixture, add drained pasta and toss until mixed.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.
Make 8 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. mushrooms (white)
1 can Carnation milk
1 stick butter
1/2 c. flour
pinch of garlic powder
salt and white pepper
Directions:
Wash and slice mushrooms; set aside.
Melt butter over low heat, then add mushrooms, sauteing them until they are slightly brown.
Add flour; stir as you add, then slowly pour in canned milk.
Stir until you get the consistency you like.
Add garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Makes a great sauce over veggies, pasta, chicken or fish.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 tsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter over low heat in a heavy saucepan.
Stir with wooden spoon.
Saute onion and mushrooms in butter for 5 minutes. Blend in flour and seasonings.
Cook over low heat until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Remove from heat.
Stir in milk.
Bring to a boil; boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Cook until thickened. Serve over noodles, potatoes, etc.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/3 c. butter
2 Tbsp. ice water
3 eggs
1 1/4 c. whipping cream
1 tsp. mixed herbs
dash of black pepper
dash of salt
1 c. diced smoked ham
1 1/2 c. grated Cheddar or Jarlsberg cheese
dash of paprika
Directions:
Measure flour into a bowl.
Cut in butter with a pastry blender until coarse crumbs form.
Add ice water, mixing with a fork until dough forms a ball.
Wrap.
Chill for 1 hour.
Roll dough out to fit bottom and sides of a 9-inch quiche pan.
Prick dough with a fork.
Bake pie shell at 425° for about 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1 c. unsifted flour
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. butter
3 to 4 Tbsp. ice water
1/3 c. finely chopped onion
1/8 tsp. white pepper
6 slices bacon, fried crisply and crumbled
1/4 lb. Swiss cheese, diced
4 eggs, beaten
2 c. light cream
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Combine flour and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Cut in 1/3 cup butter until mixture resembles coarse meal. Gradually stir in ice water until mixture forms a ball.
Roll dough out on lightly floured board to fit 10-inch pie plate. Transfer to plate and shape edges.
Saute onion in 1 tablespoon butter until tender.
Set aside to cool.
Line crust with bacon and cheese.
Combine eggs, cream, remaining salt and spices and sauteed onion.
Pour into crust.
Bake at 375° about 35 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Serve hot!

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1 c. grated cheese (may use Swiss, Cheddar or Monterey Jack)
12 slices bacon, fried
1 c. cooked mushrooms or vegetables
4 whole eggs
2 c. cream
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of cayenne pepper
dash of black pepper
1 deep-dish pastry
Directions:
Beat eggs, cream and spices with mixer until thoroughly mixed. Crumble bacon and add to mix with cheese and vegetable or mushrooms.
Stir well.
Bake in preheated oven at 450° for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 300° and bake at least 3 more minutes until firm and set.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
pastry
1/4 c. onion
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
1 c. diced ham or bacon
5 eggs
1 egg yolk
2 1/2 c. light cream
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. salt
2 dashes cayenne pepper
dash of white pepper
1 c. grated Swiss cheese
Directions:
Line 10-inch pan with pastry.
Bake 8 to 9 minutes at 400°. Cook onion in butter until transparent.
Mix with ham.
Beat eggs and egg yolk, light cream and seasonings.
Add to ham mixture. Pour into pastry shell.
Top with cheese.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes or until set.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1/2 tsp. onion salt
1/8 tsp. basil leaves
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. lard
2 to 3 Tbsp. cold water
Directions:
In a large bowl, sift together the flour and onion salt; mix in basil.
Cut in butter and lard until it resembles coarse meal. Gradually add enough water to hold dough together, mixing lightly with a fork.
Roll out on lightly floured board.
Line 9-inch pie plate with dough.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola Bars
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. rolled oats
1 c. shredded coconut
1/2 c. raw sunflower seeds
1/4 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. slivered almonds
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. dark brown sugar
1/2 c. honey
1 c. raisins
2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Heat oven to 300°.
Spread oats, coconut, sunflower seeds, sesame seed, wheat germ and almonds on a 9 x 12-inch baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Soft Granola Bars
Ingredients:
1 c. packed brown sugar
1 c. vegetable oil
2 eggs
2 c. quick cooking or regular oats
1 1/2 c. Gold Medal whole wheat flour
1 c. raisins or cut up dates
1 c. chopped nuts or flaked coconut
1 1/2 tsp. each ground cinnamon and ground cloves, if desired
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
Honey Glaze
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Grease jelly roll pan, 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1-inch.
Mix brown sugar, oil and eggs in large bowl with spoon until smooth.
Stir in remaining ingredients except Honey Glaze. Spread in pan with spatula, patting evenly with hand.
Bake just until center is set but not firm, 17 to 22 minutes; cool 15 minutes.
Drizzle evenly with Honey Glaze; cool completely.
Cut into bars, about 3 x 1 1/2-inches.
Makes 40 bars.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Soft Granola Bars
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar, packed
1 c. vegetable oil
2 eggs
2 c. quick cooking or regular oats
1 1/2 c. flour
1 c. raisins or cut up dates
1 c. chopped nuts or flaked coconut
1 1/2 tsp. each ground cloves and cinnamon (if desired)
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
Honey Glaze (recipe follows)
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Grease a jelly roll pan, 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1-inch.
Mix brown sugar, oil and eggs in a large bowl with spoon until smooth.
Stir in remaining ingredients, except Honey Glaze. Spread mixture in pan with spatula, patting evenly with hand. Bake just until center is set, but not firm, 17 to 22 minutes; cool 15 minutes.
Drizzle evenly with Honey Glaze.
Bars can be stored, tightly covered, for up to 2 weeks, or wrap bars tightly in moisture-proof wrap and freeze up to 6 months.
Makes 40 bars.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Chewy Granola Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. rolled oats (or multi-grain)
1 c. chopped dry roasted unsalted peanuts
1 c. firmly packed brown sugar
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. dark seedless raisins
1 1/2 Egg Beaters or 2 eggs
1/2 c. salted or unsalted margarine
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Mix all.
Press mixture in a greased 9 x 9 x 2-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.
Cool 10 minutes; cut.
Healthy!!

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Granola Bars
Ingredients:
3 c. oats
1 c. peanuts
1 c. raisins
1 c. sunflower seeds
1 1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 (14 oz.) can Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk
1/2 c. butter, melted
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Line a 15 x 10-inch pan with aluminum foil; grease foil.
In large bowl, mix all ingredients well. Press evenly into pan.
Bake for 25 to 30 minutes, until golden brown.
Cool slightly; remove from pan and remove foil.
Cut into bars.
Store, loosely covered, at room temperature.
(May substitute items for chocolate chips, coconut, etc.)
Makes 48 bars.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Eggplant From The Border
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
4 slices bacon, chopped
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
1 medium eggplant, peeled and cut into chunks
1 can tomato sauce
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Brown ground beef.
Drain and set aside.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Baked Eggplant
Ingredients:
1 eggplant
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/4 stick margarine
1 onion, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
2 c. Italian rice, cooked
1/3 c. seasoned bread crumbs
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. parsley
1/3 lb. grated Romano cheese
Directions:
Peel eggplant and cut into cubes.
Cook in boiling salt water. Drain well.
Mash eggplant down with a fork.
Brown ground beef in butter with spices, onion and green pepper.
Stir in eggplant and cooked rice.
Spoon into lightly greased Pyrex casserole. Sprinkle with bread crumbs and grated Romano cheese.
Cover and bake at 375° for 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Casserole
Ingredients:
2 eggplants
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 large onion, sliced
Season-All seasoned salt to taste
1 c. Pepperidge Farm dressing mix bread crumbs
1 c. Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. Cheddar cheese
2 c. cooked tomatoes, chopped fine
1 green pepper, chopped
Directions:
Slice eggplant 1/4 inch thick, peel.
Soak in salt water for 30 minutes (about 2 tablespoons salt in large bowl).
Put a saucer on top to immerse eggplant in water.
Brown ground beef, when almost done add green pepper and onion.
Season with seasoned salt, when pepper and onion are done drain meat mixture.
Add tomatoes and heat meat mixture.
Drain eggplant, fry in hot oil until brown. Drain, put a little meat mixture in bottom of casserole.
Add layer of eggplant, a layer of meat mixture, 1/4 cup bread crumbs, 1/4 cup Mozzarella and 2 tablespoons Cheddar.
Layer eggplant, meat, bread crumbs and cheeses until all is used.
Sprinkle bread crumbs on top.
Bake at 375° for 30 to 40 minutes or until done.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Eggplant And Beef Casserole
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant
1/2 c. oil
1/4 c. minced onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 c. canned tomatoes
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. sharp grated cheese
Directions:
Saute eggplant (peeled and diced) in oil with onion, green pepper and ground beef for 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes, salt, pepper and sugar and cook 10 minutes longer.
Pour into buttered 2-quart casserole.
Cover with cheese and bread crumbs.
Bake at 400° for 20 minutes.
Serves 8 to 10 people.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Dressing
Ingredients:
1 to 2 lb. ground beef
2 c. cooked rice or cornbread
1 medium onion, chopped
salt and pepper to taste
2 lb. ground eggplant
2 medium bell peppers, ground
Directions:
Cook ground meat and onions together in skillet with a lid. When meat is cooked, add eggplant, bell pepper, and cooked rice (or cornbread). Salt and pepper to taste. Cook on low heat until eggplants and bell pepper are cooked. This will serve a family of five.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Brown Rice Plus
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked brown rice
1 c. chopped green onion
1/2 c. each broccoli and green beans or 1 c. of either
2 Tbsp. butter
2 tomatoes, chopped
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 to 3/4 c. minced parsley (optional)
1 medium garlic clove, minced
salt and pepper
Directions:
Saute onions, broccoli and green pepper in butter, about 3 minutes.
Mix in rice, tomatoes, cheese, parsley, garlic, salt and pepper to taste.
Cook 4 minutes longer, covered, until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Brown Rice Salad
Ingredients:
4 to 8 c. cooked brown rice
1 large green and 1 large red pepper, diced
1 yellow pepper, diced (can be added for more color)
2 to 4 c. grated carrot
1/2 to 1 c. fresh parsley, chopped
1/2 to 1 c. currants or raisins
1/2 to 1 c. sunflower seeds
1/2 to 1 c. sliced almonds or any other kind of nut (optional)
1/2 c. Bonita crystallized ginger, chopped (found on the Chinese shelf at Publix with luck or Nutrition Depot) *
Directions:
*This is important; it makes all the difference to the taste. If you don't like ginger, it doesn't matter, but add gradually and taste.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Crunchy Brown Rice
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. nonfat, low sodium chicken or vegetable broth
3 to 4 green onions, chopped
1 c. brown rice
1 tomato, chopped
1/4 c. fresh or frozen corn
2 to 4 Tbsp. canned diced green chiles
1 Tbsp. Dijon style mustard
1/4 c. chopped water chestnuts
Directions:
Combine stock or broth and green onions in saucepan.
Bring to boil and add rice.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer 45 minutes. Uncover.
Stir in corn, tomatoes, chestnuts, green chiles and mustard.
Serve warm.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Browned Rice
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked rice
1/2 thinly sliced bell pepper
1/2 thinly sliced onion
3 to 4 carrots, thinly sliced
Kitchen Bouquet
Directions:
In electric skillet, saute pepper, onion and carrots (2 teaspoons shortening).
Lower heat.
Add rice and mix well.
May be served with beef, pork or chicken.
Two to 3 drops Kitchen Bouquet may be added to make rice brown.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Steamed Veggies With Rice(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
water
3/4 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 1/4 c. sliced carrots
1 1/4 c. cauliflower pieces
1 1/4 c. broccoli florets
1 small zucchini, sliced
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1 c. alfalfa sprouts
1 large tomato, diced
3 green onions, thinly sliced
soy sauce
Directions:
In a 2 1/2-quart saucepan, bring 1 1/2 cups water and salt to a boil. Add rice.
Cover with tight fitting lid. Bring mixture to a boil, then remove pan from heat. Let stand 30 minutes.
Do not lift the lid during this time.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Beef
Ingredients:
2 small boxes frozen broccoli
2 lb. ground beef
2 c. (8 oz.) tomatoes
1 medium bell pepper
1/2 medium onion
1/2 c. catsup (ketchup)
1/2 c. French salad dressing
salt and pepper as desired
grated sharp or medium sharp Cheddar cheese or low-fat cheese of choice
Directions:
Grate Cheddar cheese.
Cut up and dice onion and bell pepper. In a large skillet, cook ground beef, onion, pepper and thawed broccoli together until beef is brown and broccoli is cooked, yet still crisp.
Drain off any excess fat.
Put back in skillet and add the remaining ingredients.
Bring to boil; afterwards lower heat to a good simmer.
Simmer for 10 full minutes (or until thickened somewhat).
Serve over cooked rice or pasta.
(You may substitute low-fat ground turkey for a low-fat family meal, if desired.)
Top with grated cheese on individual servings. Delicious!

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef Broccoli Supper
Ingredients:
3/4 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 lb. ground beef
1 1/2 c. fresh broccoli florets
1 can (10.75 oz) condensed broccoli cheese soup, undiluted
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. salt-free seasoning blend
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
Directions:
Cook rice according to package directions.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink; drain.
Add the rice, broccoli, soup, milk, seasoning blend, salt and pepper; stir until combined.
Transfer to a greased 2-quart baking dish.
Toss bread crumbs and butter; sprinkle over beef mixture.
Cover and bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Uncover; bake 5 to 10 minutes longer or until heated through.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef And Broccoli
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. chuck roast or round steak
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 pkg. brown gravy mix
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 bunch fresh broccoli (2 1/2 lb.)
1 (1 lb.) can bean sprouts
1 (6 oz.) can water chestnuts, sliced
Directions:
Slice meat in strips.
Quickly cook beef in hot oil until meat loses its redness.
Remove meat and place in a shallow bowl. Sprinkle with 2 tablespoons soy sauce and garlic powder.
Prepare brown gravy mix according to package directions and add to pan juices with remaining soy sauce.
Add meat and juices to gravy. Cook slowly for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Cook broccoli until just a fraction underdone.
Drain.
Add to meat and gravy with bean sprouts and water chestnuts.
Stir gently; heat through. Serve over rice.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef And Broccoli
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. m.s.g. or salt
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. ginger
2 garlic cloves, cut in pieces
1/2 c. water with 2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 lb. steak, sliced in thin pieces
1 head broccoli, cut in small pieces
1 1/2 c. water plus 1 chicken cube
Directions:
Mix the m.s.g., soy sauce and ginger; set aside.
Add chicken cube to water to make broth; set aside.
Heat oil; saute steak and garlic for 3 minutes.
Add m.s.g. mix, chicken broth and broccoli pieces.
Put cover on pan and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes.
Thicken with cornstarch, which was diluted.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef And Broccoli
Ingredients:
1 large head broccoli, cut up
1 lb. beef, cut in strips
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. ground ginger
1 Tbsp. garlic juice
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Mix together all ingredients except the broccoli.
Let stand 1 hour, then fry in a wok in small amount of oil.
In another wok, stir-fry the broccoli in a small amount of salt water.
Cook until tender.
Drain and add to the meat mixture.
Serve over steamed rice.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Butter
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. minced green onion
1 c. dry wine
1/2 c. butter, softened
2 tsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook onion and wine in a small saucepan until the liquid is reduced to 1/4 cup.
Remove from heat and cool.
With beater, cream butter and parsley.
Gradually beat in the wine mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Makes 3/4 cup butter.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Grilled Steak With Herb Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. minced fresh shallots
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh chives
1 tsp. chopped fresh tarragon
1/2 tsp. coarsely ground pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. softened butter
4 beef porterhouse or T-Bone steaks
Directions:
In 1-quart saucepan, stir all ingredients except butter and steaks.
Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until all liquid has evaporated (5 to 6 minutes).
Set aside and cool completely.
In small bowl, stir together butter and cooked, cooled herbs.
Place mixture on waxed paper; shape into 4-inch log.
Refrigerate until serving.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Herb Butter
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soft butter or margarine
1/4 c. minced parsley
1 tsp. grated onion
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
few drops of Tabasco
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
On halibut steaks, arrange on greased baking pan, which can be used for serving.
Spread on steaks.
Bake in moderate oven at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
Baste once or twice during baking.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Butter
Ingredients:
1/2 c. margarine, at room temperature
1/2 c. butter, at room temperature
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. basil
1 tsp. hickory salt
1 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chopped olives or green onion tops
Directions:
Mix altogether and serve over cooked steak.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1 pod garlic
virgin olive oil (the most expensive oil yields a wonderful tasting butter)
Directions:
In a mortar and pestle, crush 2 or 3 cloves of peeled garlic. (The broad side of a knife hit against the clove makes it easier to peel.)
Add a few drops of oil.
Add 1 or 2 more cloves of garlic while continuing to crush the mixture in the mortar.
Your finished consistency should by silky.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. broccoli (can use fresh)
1 chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
1 (3 oz.) cream cheese
1 c. milk
3/4 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Cook broccoli and onion together for 5 minutes.
In saucepan, melt butter or margarine and mix in flour, salt, pepper and milk. Cook and stir until bubbly.
Blend in cream cheese until smooth. Place broccoli and onion mix in 1 1/2-quart casserole dish.
Pour cream cheese mixture on top of broccoli.
Sprinkle grated cheese on top.
Bake in preheated 350° oven for 30 to 35 minutes. (This is my favorite of all broccoli casseroles.)

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1/4 c. chopped onion
6 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 (8 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz
1/2 c. water
2 pkg. frozen broccoli, thawed and drained
3 eggs, well beaten
1/2 c. soda cracker crumbs
1 can onion rings (optional)
Directions:
Fry onion in butter.
Stir in flour; add water and cook over low heat, stirring, until mixture thickens and comes to a boil. Blend in cheese and add broccoli.
Mix in eggs until gently blended.
Use 1 1/2-quart casserole dish.
Cover with crackers and dot with butter before baking.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1/4 c. onion, finely chopped
6 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. water
1 (8 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz
2 pkg. chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
3 eggs, well beaten
1/2 c. soda cracker crumbs
Directions:
Saute onion in 4 tablespoons butter until soft.
Stir in flour.
Add water.
Cook over low heat, stirring until mixture thickens and comes to a boil.
Blend in Cheez Whiz and combine sauce with broccoli.
Add eggs and mix gently until blended.
Turn into 1 1/2-quart greased casserole.
Cover with crumbs and dot with remaining butter.
Bake covered at 325° for 1 hour.
Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chopped frozen broccoli
1 c. Minute rice
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 c. milk
1 (8 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. (6 oz. can) water chestnuts, drained and sliced
Directions:
Cook broccoli by package directions; drain and set aside. Combine rice, soup, milk, cheese, salt and pepper.
Heat until cheese is melted and ingredients are well blended, then add onion, celery, water chestnuts and broccoli.
Stir thoroughly.
Place in a lightly greased 10 x 6 x 2-inch baking dish and heat in a 350° oven for about 30 minutes.
Fifteen minutes before removing from oven, cover top with finely crushed cracker crumbs.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Light And Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
1 c. dairy sour cream
1 c. creamed cottage cheese
1/2 c. Bisquick baking mix
1/4 c. margarine or butter, melted
2 eggs
1 tomato, peeled and thinly sliced
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Grease lightly square baking dish, 8 x 8 x 2-inch.
Spread broccoli in dish.
Beat sour cream, cottage cheese, Bisquick, margarine and eggs with hand beater 1 minute.
Pour over broccoli.
Arrange tomato slices on top; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Bake until golden brown and knife inserted halfway between center and edge comes out clean, about 30 minutes.
Cool 5 minutes. Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Grilled Vegetable Salad
Ingredients:
1/3 c. balsamic vinegar
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 shallots, finely chopped
1 tsp. dried Italian seasoning
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. molasses
1/2 lb. carrots, scraped
1 sweet red pepper
1 sweet yellow pepper
2 zucchini
2 yellow squash
1 large onion
Directions:
Combine first 7 ingredients in a large bowl.
Set aside.
Cut remaining vegetables into large pieces and add to vinegar mixture, tossing to coat.
Let stand 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain, reserving vinegar mixture.
Arrange in a grill basket. Cook, covered with grill lid, over medium-hot coals (350° to 400°) for 15 to 20 minutes, turning occasionally.
Return vegetables to reserved vinegar mixture, tossing gently.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Makes 6 cups.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Salad(Marinated)
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
3/4 c. celery, chopped
3/4 c. bell pepper, chopped
1/2 c. oil
1/2 c. wine vinegar
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 (12 oz.) can white corn, drained
1 (16 oz.) can French-cut beans, drained
1 (16 oz.) can green English peas, drained
Directions:
Mix the first 8 ingredients and heat to boil.
Combine all ingredients; chill 2 hours.
Will keep for up to 6 weeks.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Grill-Side Garden Salad
Ingredients:
2 medium tomatoes, seeded and chopped (about 2 c.)
1 medium zucchini, diced (about 1 c.)
1 c. frozen whole kernel corn, thawed *
1/3 c. thinly sliced green onions with tops
1 small ripe avocado, peeled, seeded and coarsely chopped
1/3 c. Pace picante sauce
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh cilantro or parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon or lime juice
3/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. ground cumin
Directions:
Combine tomatoes, zucchini, corn, green onions and avocado in large bowl.
Combine remaining ingredients; mix well.
Pour over vegetable mixture and mix gently.
Chill 3 to 4 hours, occasionally stirring gently.
Stir gently and serve chilled or at room temperature with additional picante sauce.
Makes 4 to 6 servings, about 4 cups salad.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Grilled Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini, cut in fingers
1 medium yellow squash, cut in fingers
1 red bell pepper, seed and cut in 8 wedges
1 large sweet onion
12 asparagus spears, trimmed
Cooking spray
Directions:
Preheat grill to medium.
Coat grill rack with cooking spray (need a small hole rack so vegetables won't fall through).
Cut onion in 8 wedges, leaving a portion of the root end attached. Place vegetables on rack.
Grill approximately 6 - 12 minutes or until desired doneness.
Remove to serving platter.
Serve with ranch or honey mustard dressing as a dip. Serves 4.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Salad(Marinated Vegetables)
Ingredients:
1/2 cauliflower, cut into flowerets
2 carrots, quartered and cut into 1-inch pieces
1 green pepper, cut into strips
1 jar (4 oz.) pimento, cut into strips
3/4 c. wine vinegar
1/2 c. salad oil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine last four ingredients with 1/4 cup water.
Bring to boil.
Add vegetables and simmer for 10 minutes, then cool. Vegetables should be crisp.
Makes 8 to 10 servings.
Serve in glass bowl.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Peppers Stuffed With Sausage
Ingredients:
6 bell peppers
1/2 lb. sausage meat
2 c. cooked rice
1 tsp. salt
1 c. tomatoes
1/2 c. boiling water
Directions:
Wash peppers and remove seeds.
Boil for 5 minutes in water to cover.
Remove from water and fill with the meat, rice, salt and strained tomatoes which have been mixed together.
Place in baking dish, add the boiling water and bake at 400° for 1 hour.
Yields 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Peppers
Ingredients:
3 medium-size bell peppers
3 medium-size onions
1 pkg. hot Italian sausage
1 pkg. sweet Italian sausage
1 can tomato sauce (29 oz.)
Directions:
Cover bottom of large frying pan with cooking oil of your choice.
Slice peppers and onions lengthwise and saute on low heat until tender.
Cut sausage links into chunks.
Can be fried in separate pan from peppers and onions or placed on a broiler pan in oven at 350° until done.
Once peppers and onions are tender, add 1 cup of water and let them remain cooking for approximately 5 minutes.
Drain.
This method reserves a lot of the excess oil. Pour tomato sauce into crock-pot or large pot and heat.
Add cooked peppers, onions and sausage.
Makes a great hoagie roll filler or serve with pasta of your choice.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Peppers
Ingredients:
1 lb. Italian sausage links
6 green or red bell peppers, cut into strips
3 large onions, sliced
salt
1/4 c. dry red or white wine
Directions:
Prick sausage links several times with fork.
In skillet, brown sausage well.
Drain and reserve 3 tablespoons drippings.
Slice sausage.
Set aside.
In the drippings, cook the peppers and onions.
Cover for 5 minutes.
Uncover and cook until the vegetables are tender but not brown.
Season to taste with salt. Add the sausage and wine; heat through.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Peppers
Ingredients:
2 pkg. sweet sausage
2 large green peppers, cut in strips
2 large onions, sliced
1 jar marinara sauce
1 can tomato paste
1 can water
1 envelope spatini
Directions:
Fry out sausage and pour off fat.
Drain. Cook onions and peppers in same pan.
Mix sauces and everything together.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Country Style Stuffed Peppers
Ingredients:
4 green, red or yellow peppers
8 oz. pork sausage
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 1/2 c. cooked rice
2 c. mild Cheddar cheese, shredded
1 medium tomato, chopped
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Remove tops, seeds and membranes from peppers.
Crumble sausage into skillet, cook with onion.
Drain excess fat.
Stir in rice, 1 1/2 cups cheese and tomato.
Fill peppers with sausage mxiture, top with remaining cheese.
Arrange in 9-inch baking pan, add 1/4 cup water.
Bake 30 minutes or until peppers are tender.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Crispy Fish Fillets(Low Cholesterol)
Ingredients:
1 lb. fish fillets
2 egg whites, beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of ground pepper
1/4 c. cornmeal or 1/3 c. cornflake crumbs
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
lemon wedges (optional)
3 Tbsp. flour
1/4 c. lemon juice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 500°.
Soak fillets in equal parts lemon juice and water.
Combine egg whites and water in shallow dish.
Combine flour, salt and pepper in another shallow dish.
Dry fish. Sprinkle each side with flour mix.
Dip in egg whites and dredge in cornmeal.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Crispy Baked Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. lemon pepper
1/2 c. saltine or club style crackers
1/2 c. potato chips
1 lb. crappie fillets
Directions:
Melt the butter and pour into a shallow bowl.
Add the paprika and lemon pepper.
Crush the crackers and the potato chips.
Mix them together in a small bowl and pour the crumbs onto a plate or waxed paper.
Dip the fish fillets in the butter mixture and coat with the crumbs.
Place the fillets in a single layer in a shallow baking pan.
Bake at 350° for 8 minutes for small fillets and 10 minutes for large.
Turn the oven to broil and cook the fish for 5 to 7 minutes or until nicely browned.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Crispy Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1/4 c. frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
1/4 c. margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. crushed onion flavored crackers
2 lb. fresh fish fillets
Directions:
Combine first four ingredients.
Mix well.
Add 1/4 cup of this mixture to crushed crackers.
Mix well.
Place fish in square baking pan.
Pour lemonade mixture over fish.
Sprinkle with cracker mixture.
Bake at 400° for 25 to 30 minutes, until fish flakes.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Crunchy Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. chili powder
4 Tbsp. margarine or butter
1 c. coarsely crushed Cheddar cheese crackers
4 small cod fillets
Directions:
Preheat oven to 500°.
Grease a 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
In pie plate, mix lemon juice, chili powder and half of melted margarine.
On waxed paper, place crushed crackers.
Dip fish fillets into chili powder mixture, then into crackers to coat. Place fillets in baking dish.
Drizzle with remaining melted margarine.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes until fish flakes easily.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Crunchy Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
2 lb. fish fillets (thaw, if frozen)
3 c. Rice Krispies, crushed (to 1 1/2 c.)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 c. oleo, melted
Directions:
Pat fillets dry.
Line bottom of baking dish with cereal, salt, pepper and parsley.
Dip fish into melted oleo and place in baking dish on top of cereal mix.
Bake at 375° for 25 minutes.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Scrambled Eggs
Ingredients:
1 tsp. butter per egg
1 Tbsp. milk or water per egg
large eggs, number desired
Directions:
In glass pie
plate
or casserole, heat butter 30 to 45 seconds.
Add
milk or water and eggs, blending lightly with a fork.
Cover
and cook as following, stirring one or two times during
the
last
half of cooking time: 1 egg - 30 to 45 seconds; 2
eggs - 1 1/2 minutes; 4 eggs - 2 1/2 to 3 minutes; 6 eggs -
3 1/2
to 4 1/2 minutes; 8 eggs - 4 1/2 to 5 1/2 minutes.
Remove from
oven,
stir and rest 2 to 3 minutes, covered.
Season with salt and pepper.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Scrambled Eggs
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 Tbsp. butter
salt and pepper
Directions:
Crack eggs in a small bowl.
Mix with a fork.
Melt butter in a frying pan over low heat.
Pour in eggs.
Stir evenly until cooked.
Shake a little salt and pepper to taste.
Careful, not too much!

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Oat Pancakes
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oats
1/4 c. oat bran
1/4 c. whole wheat flour
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 c. low-fat buttermilk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 egg whites
Directions:
Heat electric griddle to 370°.
In a bowl, combine all dry ingredients, buttermilk and vanilla.
In a mixer bowl, beat egg whites until soft peaks form. Fold egg whites into oat mixture. Spray griddle.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
4 tsp. baking powder
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 egg, slightly beaten
1 tsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. melted butter
1 3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Mix all dry ingredients.
In separate bowl, add vanilla to eggs and beat slightly.
Add to dry ingredients.
Add milk and mix.
Add melted butter and stir until smooth.
Cook on hot griddle at 400°.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Scrambled Egg Bake
Ingredients:
6 eggs
1/3 c. milk
1/4 lb. mild or sharp Cheddar cheese, cut into small cubes
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In a large mixing bowl with a wire whisk or fork, beat eggs until frothy.
Stir in milk; mix well.
Add cheese.
Season with salt and pepper.
Pour into buttered 2-quart baking dish.
Bake in a preheated 350° oven for 30 minutes.
Serves immediately.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Glaze For Pork
Ingredients:
1/2 c. dark corn syrup
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
You can add a little chickory if smoke flavor is desired.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Glaze
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. light Karo
2 Tbsp. cornstarch or flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. water
Directions:
Cook over low heat until thick and clear (10 minutes).
Color with red food coloring.
Add sliced strawberries when cool.
Pour on cake.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Carrots With Glaze
Ingredients:
1 bunch carrots
3 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
3 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Peel and quarter carrots; steam until tender. Mix the mustard, butter and brown sugar in a small bowl, then stir into cooked carrots. Cook until carrots are glazed.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Glaze
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 c. water
1/3 c. Karo light syrup
1/4 c. crushed strawberries
1 tsp. lemon juice
2 drops red food coloring (optional)
Directions:
Stir together first 3 ingredients.
Add strawberries.
Bring to boil 1 minute over medium heat, stirring constantly.
Strain. Stir in juice and coloring.
Cool slightly.
Arrange whole strawberries on cheese cake.
Cover with glaze.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Glaze
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1 c. water
3 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 pkg. Jell-O
Directions:
Bring water and sugar to a boil.
Thicken with cornstarch. Remove from heat.
Put in Jell-O.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Easy Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1 c. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. sweet milk (2% or whole)
1/2 c. butter or oleo
2 lb. peaches
1 c. water
1 c. sugar
Directions:
Mix first four ingredients.
Gradually stir in milk and butter.
Mix peaches, water and sugar in another bowl (use no more than 2 cups liquid).
In a 9 x 13-inch baking pan, melt butter. Pour batter in pan then pour fruit over batter.
During baking, batter will rise to top.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes or until top is well browned.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. sliced peaches (raw)
1/4 c. water
1 c. sugar
1 egg
1 Tbsp. shortening
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
light cream
Directions:
In saucepan, combine peaches, water and 1/2 cup of sugar. Bring to a boil.
Keep hot.
Beat egg, 1/2 cup of sugar and shortening until fluffy.
Add milk.
Stir in flour, baking powder and salt.
Spread batter in greased baking dish.
Pour hot peaches over the batter.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until fruit is tender.
Serve with cream.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1/3 c. Crisco
1 tsp. baking powder
pinch of salt
1/3 c. milk
1 stick butter
2 c. sugar
2 c. water
sliced fresh peaches
Directions:
Blend flour, Crisco, baking powder and salt with pastry blender until it resembles coarse meal.
Add milk and stir.
Roll out on floured surface in rectangle form.
Melt 1 stick butter in a 13 x 9-inch dish; set aside.
Boil sugar and water until melted.
Place sliced fresh peaches on crust and roll as if jelly roll.
Slice into 16 pieces and place in dish with melted butter. Pour water and sugar mixture over sliced pieces.
Bake at 400° for 40 minutes.
Use with any fresh fruit.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
5 c. fresh peaches, peeled and sliced
1 c. plus 1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 c. flour, divided
3 Tbsp. butter, melted
1/4 c. shortening
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. cold water
Directions:
Place peaches, 1 cup sugar and nutmeg in a saucepan.
Stir over low heat until peaches begin to exude their juices.
Sprinkle on 1/4 cup flour; cook and stir until well incorporated.
Stir in the butter.
Turn into an ovenproof 9-inch baking dish.
Place remaining flour and salt in a small bowl.
Using a pastry blender (or fingertips), work in the shortening until the mixture resembles coarse meal.
Stir in enough water to make a soft dough. Gather the dough into a ball; roll out on a floured board.
Place rolled out dough over the peaches, tucking under the edges or trimming as needed.
