Sprinkle the dough with 1 teaspoon sugar; slash in several places to allow the steam to escape.
Bake in preheated 400° oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until top is well browned.
Serve warm with vanilla ice cream.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Fresh Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. thinly sliced fresh peaches
1/4 c. water
1/2 c. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. shortening
1 Tbsp. milk
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In saucepan, combine peaches, water and 1/2 cup sugar.
Bring to boil and stir.
Keep hot.
With spoon, beat egg, 1/2 cup sugar and shortening until fluffy.
Add milk; stir in flour, baking powder and salt.
Spread batter in a greased 8-inch square pan, then pour hot peaches over the batter.
Bake at 375° for 25 to 30 minutes or until tender.
Serve warm with cream, if desired. Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Versatile Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. fresh ground pepper
1 clove garlic, pressed
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake vigorously.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Layered Vegetable Vinaigrette(Serves 8. Preparation :20.  Stand 1:00.  Total 1:20.)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. vinegar
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. Dijon mustard
fresh ground black pepper (to taste)
4 carrots
1 lb. green beans
2 tomatoes
2 cucumbers
1/4 lb. mushrooms
Directions:
Mix dressing (first 4 ingredients) in a jar. Shake well. Scrub or peel carrots and slice into rounds. Steam green beans for 5 minutes; drain. Slice tomatoes, cucumbers and mushrooms into slices. Layer vegetables in a serving dish and top with dressing. Refrigerate 1 hour or more before serving.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Italian Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
1 1/2 c. olive oil or other oil
2 large cloves garlic, crushed
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. minced parsley
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. dried basil or oregano
Directions:
Combine ingredients in a large jar with a tight fitting lid. Shake well.
Makes 2 cups.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Strong Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. anchovy paste
1 Tbsp. drained capers
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and whisk.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Our Favorite Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. prepared Dijon style mustard
4 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. granulated sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
minced parsley and/or snipped fresh chives to taste
1/2 c. olive oil
Directions:
Measure mustard into a bowl.
Whisk in vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper and herbs to taste.
Continue to whisk mixture while slowly dribbling in olive oil until mixture thickens.
Adjust seasoning to taste.
Cover until ready to use.
(Vinaigrette is best if made just before it is to be used.)
If necessary, whisk again before serving.
Makes 1 cup.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef top round steak
1 1/2 c. broccoli (1-inch size)
3 medium carrots
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion
1 c. frozen peas
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
4 to 6 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Slice beef very thin in bite size strips.
Add cooking oil to preheated hot wok (high heat).
Stir-fry broccoli, carrots and onion in hot oil for 2 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Remove from wok.
Add more oil, if necessary, before stir-frying the beef strips (fry only 1/2 of the portion of beef strips at a time) in hot oil (high heat) for 2 to 3 minutes.
Return all meat to wok. Add peas, water chestnuts and bamboo shoots.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. top round steak, thinly sliced across grain into bite sized strips
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut in 1-inch pieces
3 carrots, bias slices
1 medium onion, cut in thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
1 c. beef broth, water and bouillon
2 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Blanch in boiling water for 2 minutes the broccoli and carrots.
Drain.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef round steak, sliced thin
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut into pieces
3 medium carrots, sliced
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, thawed
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
Directions:
Cook broccoli and carrots about 2 minutes in boiling water; drain.
Mix cornstarch, salt, sugar, soy sauce and sherry; set aside.
Add oil to wok or pan over high heat and stir-fry broccoli, carrots and onions until crisp and tender.
Remove from wok.
Add beef and cook for 2 to 3 minutes.
Remove beef.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
8 oz. beef
1/4 tsp. minced garlic
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
2 tsp. oil
3/4 to 1 c. water
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
3 c. raw veggies
Directions:
Cut beef in strips.
Mix garlic, soy sauce and ginger together with beef.
Heat oil in nonstick skillet, sprayed with Pam.
Add beef mixture.
Cook until beef is no longer pink, about 5 minutes.
Add veggies and stir-fry until tender.
Mix water and cornstarch.
Add to beef mixture in skillet.
Cook until mixture thickens.
Serve over rice or noodles.
Serves 2.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless sirloin steak
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. oyster sauce
cooking spray (vegetable)
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 large onion, quartered
3 stalks celery, sliced diagonally
1/2 lb. sliced fresh mushrooms
1 green pepper, cut in strips
1/2 lb. fresh snow peas
1/2 bunch broccoli flowerets
1 can sliced water chestnuts
Directions:
Trim fat
from
steak.
Cut
across
grain into strips. Combine water,
cornstarch, soy sauce, sugar and oyster sauce. Set aside.
Coat wok or skillet with cooking spray and heat on medium-high for 2
minutes.
Add
steak
and
stir-fry about 3 minutes.
Remove meat.
Place onion, celery, mushrooms, pepper and water chestnuts to
pan drippings in wok.
Stir-fry 2 to 3 minutes. Add meat,
broccoli
and snow peas.
Cover and reduce heat to medium.
Simmer
2
to
3
minutes.
Stir in soy sauce mixture.
Cook
on
medium,
stirring constantly until bubbly. Serve over hot rice.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentils And Spinach
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lentils (1 c.)
1 lb. spinach, chopped
1 onion
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. coriander
1 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. chili powder
lemon juice to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Boil the lentils in 1 pint (2 cups) water until soft (about 25 minutes).
Fry sliced onion and chopped garlic; add spices.
Stir about 2 minutes.
Add cooked lentils and washed and coarsely chopped spinach.
Stir well.
Simmer 10 to 15 minutes.
Add salt and lemon juice.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Stew
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 c. water
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can cut tomatoes
4 tsp. vegetable bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt and thyme
1/4 tsp. fennel seed and pepper
1 bay leaf
2 medium chopped carrots (1 c.)
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
Directions:
Rinse lentils; set aside.
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven cook onion and garlic until tender, not brown.
Stir in lentils, water, tomatoes, bouillon, Worcestershire sauce, salt, thyme, fennel seed, pepper and bay leaf.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add carrots and frozen spinach. Bring to a boil, breaking up spinach with a fork; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for about 10 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add vinegar; discard bay leaf.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
8 c. chicken stock or 48 oz. can stock
2 cloves chopped garlic
1 onion, chopped
3/4 c. chopped carrots
1 c. chopped celery
1 c. lentils
1 bunch spinach
3 Tbsp. lemon juice or vinegar
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Wash and pick over lentils.
Place in boiling water and cook 2 minutes.
Cover; let sit 1 hour and drain.
(This removes gas.)

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. pkg. lentils
1 pkg. frozen spinach
1 small chopped onion
1 stalk celery, chopped
1 carrot, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
8 c. water
1 bouillon cube
2 Tbsp. vinegar
freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large soup pot or crock-pot. Cook on low for 6 hours.
If using a crock-pot, set crock-pot to high and cook 6 hours.
Add ground pepper to taste.
Can also add two chopped Italian sausages to ingredients for different flavor before cooking.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced onions
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
1/2 lb. dry lentils
1 lb. frozen, chopped spinach
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
3 c. water
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil in 3-quart saucepan over medium heat until onions are tender.
Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice.
Cover and simmer until spinach is tender, about 5 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Spiced Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 Tbsp. molasses
2/3 c. orange juice
2 c. canned or cooked mashed pumpkin
3 1/3 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. ground cloves
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 c. raisins
1 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Beat butter at medium speed of mixer.
Gradually add sugar; beat well.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Add molasses, orange juice and pumpkin.
Combine flour and next 5 ingredients.
Add to creamed mixture; mix until blended.
Stir in vanilla, raisins and nuts.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Spiced Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 c. cooked or canned pumpkin
2/3 c. orange juice
2 Tbsp. molasses
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 to 1 tsp. ground cloves
1 c. raisins
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
In
mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add the pumpkin, orange juice, molasses and vanilla. Combine dry ingredients. Add to the creamed mixture and mix until well blended. Stir in nuts and raisins. Pour into two greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3 loaf pans. Bake at 350° for 65 to 75 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes. Remove from pans onto wire racks.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Spice Bread
Ingredients:
3 c. sugar
1 c. vegetable oil
4 eggs, lightly beaten
1 can (16 oz.) solid-packed pumpkin
3 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
2 t. baking soda
1 t. baking powder
1 t. salt
1 t. ground cinnamon
1 t. ground nutmeg
1/2 t. ground cloves
1/2 t. ground allspice
1/2 c. water
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine sugar, oil and eggs.
Add pumpkin and mix well.
Combine dry ingredients; add to the pumpkin mixture alternately with water.
Pour into
two greased 9-in. 5-in.x3-in. loaf pans.
Bake at 350° for 60-70 minutes or until bread tests done.
Cool in pans 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack; cool completely.
Yields 2 loaves.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3 1/3 c. sifted flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. pumpkin spice
3 c. sugar
1 c. coarsely chopped walnuts
4 eggs, beaten
1 1/2 c. canned pumpkin (use whole can)
1 c. salad oil
2/3 c. water
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients together in a large bowl; add walnuts. Add eggs, pumpkin, oil and water.
Blend lightly.
Pour into 2 greased bread tins and bake about 1 hour at 350°.
Freezes well.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cloves
2 eggs
1 2/3 c. plain flour, unsifted (2 c. if sifted)
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. pumpkin spice
1/2 c. Crisco oil
1 c. pumpkin
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except flour.
After all other ingredients are combined, add flour last.
Bake at 350° in loaf pans for 40 to 50 minutes.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
10 oz. Mozzarella, diced
3 Tbsp. seasoned bread crumbs
1/4 tsp. salt
6 large boneless chicken breasts (approximately 2 lb.), pounded thin
2 eggs, lightly beaten
3 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. tomato sauce
Directions:
In a medium bowl, thoroughly combine cheese, eggs, crumbs, parsley, salt and pepper.
Place 1/4 cup of cheese mixture in center of each chicken breast.
Roll and secure with a toothpick.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
6 skinless and boneless chicken breasts
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 chopped medium onion
1 chopped rib celery
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1 peeled carrot, chopped
3/4 c. seasoned bread crumbs
1/2 tsp. oregano
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
parsley, cayenne and paprika
Directions:
Pound breasts between two sheets of Saran Wrap to 1/8-inch thickness.
Saute onion, green pepper, carrot and garlic in butter until soft.
Add bread crumbs and 1/2 cup broth to mixture.
Salt and pepper to taste.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breast
Ingredients:
8 oz. Swiss cheese, diced
2 eggs, slightly beaten
3 Tbsp. seasoned bread crumbs
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
6 large boneless chicken breasts, pounded thin
2 Tbsp. oil (regular or olive)
2 c. spaghetti sauce
Directions:
In a medium bowl, combine cheese, eggs, bread crumbs, parsley, salt and pepper.
Place about 1 tablespoon of cheese mixture in the center of each chicken breast.
Roll and secure with toothpicks.
In a large skillet, thoroughly brown chicken on all sides in hot oil; drain off fat.
Pour spaghetti sauce over chicken.
Bake about 45 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
10 oz. Swiss cheese, diced
2 eggs, lightly beaten
3 Tbsp. seasoned bread crumbs
3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
pinch of nutmeg
6 large boneless chicken breasts (about 2 lb.), pounded thin
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
2 c. Ragu chunky garden style spaghetti sauce with green peppers and mushrooms
Directions:
In a medium bowl, thoroughly combine cheese, eggs, bread crumbs, parsley, salt, pepper and nutmeg.
Place 1/4 cup cheese mixture in the center of each chicken breast.
Roll and secure with toothpicks.
In a large skillet, thoroughly brown chicken on all sides in hot oil; drain fat.
Pour spaghetti sauce over chicken.
Simmer, covered, 45 minutes or until chicken is done. Serves 6.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
2 c hot water
2 T butter
1 c shredded carrots
2 c Stove Top Stuffing mix
Directions:
Combine hot water, butter, carrots and seasoning mix.
Bring to a boil and add Stove Top Stuffing Mix.
Let stand 5 minutes. Put mixture on top of chicken breasts. Combine sour cream and cheese and put on top of dressing mix.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta Bake
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 garlic clove, minced
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
4 oz. spaghetti (2 c., cooked)
1 can tuna in water, drained and flaked
1/2 c. cooked peas
1 c. low-fat cottage cheese
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 Tbsp. wheat germ
Directions:
In small saucepan over medium-high heat, heat oil.
Add onion and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes.
Add tomato sauce and oregano; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer, stirring occasionally about 15 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Herbed Pasta-Tuna Bake
Ingredients:
8 oz. (2 c.) macaroni shells, cooked and drained
2 cans (6 1/2 oz.) tuna, drained and chunked
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. milk
3 c. loosely packed parsley (1 bunch), thick stems removed
2/3 c. coarsely chopped green onions
Directions:
In greased 2-quart baking dish toss shells, tuna and celery. In blender mix mayonnaise, milk, parsley and green onions until smooth.
Pour over tuna mixture; toss to coat.
Bake in preheated 400° oven 15 minutes or until bubbly.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta Bake(Microwave)
Ingredients:
6 strips cooked lasagna
1 small onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. flour
2 c. frozen vegetables
1 c. milk
1 1/2 c. shredded cheese
1 c. cottage cheese
1 egg
dash of black pepper
12 1/2 oz. can drained tuna
Directions:
Place lasagna in a 12 x 7-inch glass baking dish. Cover with water and set aside.
In 1-quart glass dish, combine onion, oil and flour. Cook on High power 1 minute. Stir to dissolve flour. Stir in vegetables and milk.
Cook on High for 4 minutes, stirring once. Combine cheese, cottage cheese, egg and pepper.
Drain lasagna.
In the same dish, layer half each lasagna, vegetables, cheese and tuna.
Repeat layers and top with remaining cheese. Cover and cook on High power 15 minutes or until hot.
Let stand 10 minutes or so.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Bake
Ingredients:
2 c. uncooked macaroni
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
2 cans mushroom soup
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. prepared mustard
1 small jar pimentos
2 small cans tuna, drained
1 c. Pepperidge Farm stuffing mix
2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Cook and drain macaroni.
Combine next 5 ingredients.
Stir in tuna.
In another bowl, combine stuffing and butter.
In a casserole, alternate layers of macaroni and sauce.
Sprinkle topping over all.
Bake at 375° for 20 to 25 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1 lb. pkg. elbow macaroni
2 cans cream of mushroom soup
4 cans tuna, drained
1/2 pkg. saltine crackers, crushed
1 (8 oz.) mild Cheddar cheese, shredded
1/4 c. chopped bell pepper
Directions:
Cook noodles. Mix all other ingredients together, except 1/4 package crackers and 1/2 of cheese. Pour noodles and mixture in 12 x 24-inch baking dish.
Cover top with remaining cheese and crackers. Bake at 400° for 10 to 15 minutes until cheese melts and crackers are browned.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
3 egg yolks
1 2/3 c. buttermilk
1 tsp. soda
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. butter
3 egg whites, stiffly beaten
Directions:
Beat egg yolks with rotary beater. Add remaining ingredients except egg whites and beat until smooth. Gently fold in egg whites.
Pour onto hot griddle.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: "Fluffy" Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. oil
1 egg
1 c. flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix first 3 ingredients together.
Mix dry ingredients together.
Mix together liquid and dry ingredients.
Let mixture stand for 5 to 10 minutes, then proceed as usual to griddle pancakes.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 eggs
2 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. cooking oil or melted butter
2 c. flour
Directions:
Take turns holding the mixer until eggs are fluffy.
Add the rest of the ingredients and mix until smooth, but do not overmix. Grease hot griddle with shortening.
Pour batter to make 4 inch pancakes.
Cook until puffed, turn and cook other side until golden brown.
We like to cut them into shapes and spread butter and jelly.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Light Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 to 2 Tbsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. soda
1 c. buttermilk
1 egg, beaten
1 to 2 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients.
Combine remaining ingredients.
Add to dry ingredients, stirring just until flour is moistened (batter will be lumpy).
Bake on hot griddle.
Yield:
4 to 5 servings.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 egg
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
maple syrup
Directions:
Beat egg.
Combine flour, baking powder, soda, salt and sugar. Add egg.
Add buttermilk and oil, beating until mixture is smooth.
For each pancake, pour about 1/4 cup batter onto a hot, lightly greased griddle.
Turn pancakes when tops are covered with bubbles and edges look cooked.
Serve with maple syrup.
Yields 8 (4-inch) pancakes.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Chicken Panang Curry
Ingredients:
1 (14 oz.) can Taste of Thai coconut milk
1 Tbsp. Taste of Thai Panang Curry Base
1 lb. boneless chicken, cut in strips
2 Tbsp. Taste of Thai seasoning sauce
2 tsp. lemon juice
1 medium tomato, diced
1 yellow bell pepper, diced
3 scallions, diced
2 c. mushrooms, sliced
2 tsp. Taste of Thai garlic chili pepper sauce (use this cautiously; you might prefer a little less)
Directions:
In a large saucepan, combine coconut milk and curry base and cook until blended over medium heat.
Add chicken, seasoning sauce and lemon juice and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add remaining ingredients, except mushrooms and garlic chili pepper sauce.
Cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add mushrooms and garlic chili pepper sauce to taste.
Cover and simmer for 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Mix Vegetable Curry
Ingredients:
3 med. onions, chopped
3 med. tomatoes, chopped
clove, cumin, cinnamon, peppercorn
finely shredded coconut
cilantro, chopped
oil
frozen mix vegetable 1/2 bag
poppy seeds
garlic paste
salt
small carton of whipping cream
red chili powder
Directions:
Heat a sauce pan on high heat.
Put some oil in it.
Add onions and cook on med heat until lightly brown and until the oil separates.
Add tomatoes and mix vegetable and cook until tender and oil comes on top.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Curry With Coconut Milk
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 large onion, finely chopped
1 cardamom pod, crushed
1-inch piece cinnamon stick
4 cloves
salt to taste
4 whole black peppercorns
1/2 tsp. turmeric
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. finely chopped ginger
1 1/2 tsp. finely chopped garlic
4 c. large peeled shrimp
2 c. coconut milk*
Directions:
Melt butter in a saucepan.
Add onion and brown.
Add all the spices and saute for 2 minutes.
Add shrimp and saute 1/2 minute. Add coconut milk (strained) and 1/4 cup shredded coconut that is leftover after straining.
Cover and cook on medium heat until the gravy thickens.
Serve over plain rice or polao.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Curry Sauce For Chicken
Ingredients:
2 medium onions
2 Tbsp. butter
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can tomato puree
1/2 pt. cream
pinch of salt
2 Tbsp. curry powder
Directions:
Cook onions gently in butter until glazed.
Add salt and curry powder.
Cook as long as you can without browning onions.
Add puree.
Bring to boil.
Cool to lukewarm.
Heat cream separately to same temperature as sauce.
Put sauce into cream by tablespoons. Don't boil!
This goes well with baked chicken, salad, rice and French bread.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Curried Hot Fruit
Ingredients:
1 stick oleo
2 1/2 Tbsp. curry powder to taste
3/4 c. brown sugar
Directions:
Place ingredients in pan and cook in a 325° oven to melt. Drain pineapple, pears, apricots, peaches and dark cherries.
Add to pan; stir well.
Bake one hour in a 325° oven.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground meat
1 large onion
1/2 tsp. cumin seed or powder
garlic powder to taste
1 hot jalapeno pepper
4 to 5 chopped fresh tomatoes or Del Monte Mexican style canned tomatoes
1 box taco shells
chopped lettuce and tomatoes (for topping)
Directions:
Heat shells in oven (325°) until crisp.
Simmer all ingredients for 45 minutes, thickening with 1 tablespoon flour if needed.
Spoon filling into taco shells.
Top with chopped lettuce, tomatoes and shredded cheese.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Meat-Filled Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 envelope taco seasoning mix
3/4 c. water
12 taco shells
2 tomatoes, chopped
1 c. Colby or Cheddar cheese, shredded
shredded lettuce
taco sauce
Directions:
Cook beef, onion and garlic until done.
Drain off fat.
Stir in taco seasoning mix and water.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, 15 to 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, arrange taco shells on a baking sheet lined with paper towels.
Warm in a 350° oven for 5 to 10 minutes.
Stuff each taco shell with meat, tomatoes, cheese, lettuce and top with taco sauce.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Soft Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra lean ground beef
1 pkg. taco mix
1 doz. (6-inch) flour tortillas
8 oz. grated reduced-fat Cheddar
shredded lettuce
chopped tomatoes
chopped onions (if desired)
non-fat sour cream (optional)
Directions:
Brown meat, then rinse in a colander under hot water.
Let drain.
Return meat to pan, add taco mix and follow instructions on mix package to prepare taco meat.
Steam tortillas, and assemble tacos.
Makes about 6 to 8 tacos.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish Tacos
Ingredients:
2 lbs. Fish; firm and fresh, such as Swordfish,Shark, or Sea Bass, cut thick
1/3 c. Lime Juice
1/4 c. Tequila or White Wine
Directions:
Broil on the barbeque, the grill or the oven, turning as often as necessary and basting as needed, until cooked but not overdone.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Crispy Taco Turnovers
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. chili powder
2 c. shredded Monterey Jack cheese
1 c. diced tomatoes
4 large wheat flour tortillas
oil (for frying)
Directions:
Brown together ground beef, onion and garlic in heavy frying pan.
Add salt and chili powder.
Blend well.
Place 1/2 cup of the beef filling, 1/2 cup cheese and 1/2 cup tomatoes onto one-half of each tortilla.
Fold other half over filling, pressing it down to remove any air pockets. Pour oil into large skillet to 1/4-inch depth.
When oil is hot, place filled tortillas into pan a few at a time.
Saute over medium to high heat until golden on each side, about 45 seconds per side.
Remove from pan onto paper towel.
Cut into wedges to serve.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Frittata
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. chopped peeled potato
1/3 c. sliced zucchini
1/3 c. onion, sliced in rings
8 oz. frozen egg substitute, thawed
4 oz. (1/2 c.) cooked chicken or turkey, cubed
1/2 tsp. dried basil, crumbled
1/2 tsp. dried dill, crumbled
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
You will also need nonstick cooking spray.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Garden Frittata
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. broccoli
1 c. sliced carrots
4 eggs
4 Egg Beaters
1 c. nonfat cottage cheese
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. sliced mushrooms
6 thin slices tomato
1 Tbsp. Parmesan
Directions:
Steam broccoli and carrots for 10 minutes.
Beat together eggs, Egg Beaters, cottage cheese, salt and pepper.
Stir in carrots and broccoli and mushrooms.
Spray 10-inch round pan with Pam.
Pour in egg mixture.
Bake at 350° until eggs are cooked and knife inserted in center comes out almost clean.
Top with tomatoes; sprinkle with Parmesan.
Broil 1 to 2 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Frittata
Ingredients:
2 large (8 oz. each) baking potatoes, scrubbed and sliced thin (4 c.)
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 medium size onions, halved lengthwise and cut in thin wedges (3 c.)
1 medium size red bell pepper, cored, seeded and cut in thin strips
1 c. frozen green peas, thawed
8 large eggs
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
Directions:
Adjust shelves to divide oven in thirds.
Heat oven to 450°. Grease 2 jelly roll pans and one 8-inch square baking dish.
Toss potato slices with 1 tablespoon of oil; spread in a single layer in 1 jelly roll pan.
Toss onions and bell pepper with remaining tablespoon of oil.
Spread in a single layer in other jelly roll pan.
Bake both pans 12 to 15 minutes, stirring once, until vegetables are just tender.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Western Style Frittata
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
4 oz. Canadian bacon, sliced and cut into strips
2 medium onions, sliced
1 bell pepper, chopped (optional)
7 eggs
1 1/2 c. grated Swiss cheese
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
season with pepper to taste
Directions:
In a 10-inch nonstick skillet, heat 2 tablespoons butter over low heat; add bacon and cook.
Add onions and green pepper, stirring frequently; cook about 5 minutes.
In medium bowl, beat eggs, cheese, pepper and bacon mixture until combined.
Melt 2 more tablespoons butter; add to egg mixture.
Cook on low heat until bottom is set.
Place in a preheated 300° oven.
Cook until desired consistency is reached, about 20 to 30 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Frittata
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 zucchini, sliced
2 carrots, sliced
1/2 onion, diced
3 red potatoes, chopped into small cubes
8 eggs
3 Tbsp. whipping cream or water
Directions:
In a 10-inch skillet, saute over medium heat all ingredients but eggs and cream until tender (about 8 minutes). Remove from heat. Beat eggs and cream in a bowl.
Put skillet back on heat. Pour egg mixture over vegetables. Do not stir. Cook until eggs are softly set.
Cover the mixture until the top sets. Salt and pepper to taste.
Can add Parmesan cheese for added touch. Can also add imitation crab meat for special touch.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Salmon Spread
Ingredients:
1 envelope unflavored gelatin
1/2 c. boiling water
4 oz. cream cheese, cut up
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1 (8 oz.) can salmon, drained and flaked
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
12 pimento-stuffed green olives, chopped
Directions:
Blend together gelatin and water.
Add cream cheese, mayo, vinegar and salmon.
Blend all together and add green pepper and olives.
Blend together and pour into a 3-cup mold.
Refrigerate until set.
Unmold and sprinkle with paprika.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Salmon Patties
Ingredients:
2 (6 oz.) cans salmon, drained and skin and bones discarded
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese or Cheddar cheese
1/3 c. finely chopped onion
1/3 c. finely chopped green peppers
1 (6 oz.) pkg. Stove Top stuffing mix
1/3 c. mayonnaise
3/4 c. water
Directions:
Saute onions and green peppers. Combine all ingredients including onions and peppers and mix well. Cover and refrigerate for 10 minutes.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Savory Salmon Patties
Ingredients:
2 (6 1/2 oz.) cans salmon, drained and flaked
1 c. mashed potatoes
2 Tbsp. plain yogurt
2 Tbsp. prepared mustard
1 large egg white
1 medium carrot, grated
1 medium onion, chopped fine
1/2 tsp. paprika
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
1 1/2 tsp. oil
Directions:
In a medium bowl, combine salmon, potatoes, yogurt, mustard, egg white, carrot, onion, paprika and lemon juice.
Shape into 8 patties.
Put bread crumbs on a plate and coat the patties with the crumbs.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Salmon In A Blanket
Ingredients:
1 lb. can flaked salmon
1/4 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. minced onion
2/3 c. milk
dash of pepper
2 Tbsp. finely chopped parsley
2 c. Bisquick
Directions:
Combine 2
cups Bisquick and 2/3 cup milk to make dough and roll
in oblong shape, 7 x 15-inches.
Transfer to lightly greased baking
sheet.
Mix rest of ingredients and place down the center of dough to within 2-inches of ends.
Fold lengthwise edge
of dough
over salmon mixture to overlap.
Fold in ends and roll over so seam is underneath.
Make slashes on top for steam
to
escape. Bake
at
425°
for
12 to 15 minutes. Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Salmon Supper
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. chopped onion
1/3 c. chopped green pepper
3 Tbsp. fat
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. milk
1 can cream of mushroom or celery soup
1 (7 oz.) can salmon, drained
1 c. cooked peas
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 can biscuits
Directions:
Heat oven to 450°.
Saute onion and green pepper in hot fat until onion is golden.
Blend in salt and flour.
Gradually stir in milk and soup.
Bring to a boil.
Boil 1 minute.
Add flaked salmon, peas and lemon juice.
Pour into baking dish, 11 1/2 x 7 1/2 x 1 1/2-inch.
Top with biscuits.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes. Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Homemade Croutons
Ingredients:
1 loaf French bread, sliced 1/4-inch thick
butter
garlic powder
Directions:
Spread butter evenly on bread slices, taking to edges of bread. Sprinkle with garlic powder and cut into cubes. Bake at 350° until crispy. Store in airtight bags. Will keep for several days.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Homemade Croutons
Ingredients:
1 loaf day-old French, sourdough, wheat, or multi-grain bread
3/4 c. olive oil
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 275°.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Easy Make Croutons
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. margarine
about 4 c. fresh bread cubes
dried herbs of your choice (basil, chives, pepper and parsley)
Directions:
Place margarine in a 7 x 11-inch pan.
Microwave on High for 1 minute.
Stir in bread cubes and dried herbs.
Microwave, uncovered, on High for 4 to 6 minutes, stirring every minute.
Let stand for 5 minutes to harden completely.
Use for garnish for soups or salads.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Croutons
Ingredients:
2 c. cubed bread
1/4 c, oleo, melted
1 tsp. parsley
1 tsp. seasoned salt, garlic salt and onion salt or a combination
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Toss bread cubes with butter and seasonings.
Spread in a single layer in shallow pan.
Bake in 300° oven, stirring occasionally until crisp and light brown, about 30 to 45 minutes. After cooling, store in airtight container for use in soups and on green salads.
Store in refrigerator or freezer for extended storage.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Party Croutons
Ingredients:
2 sticks oleo
1/4 tsp. celery salt
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1/4 tsp. chili powder
2 small loaves bread (may be day old)
Directions:
Melt oleo; mix with spices thoroughly.
Brush mixture on bread slices with pastry brush.
Cut bread into squares.
Place buttered side up on cookie sheet.
Bake at 200° for 4 hours.
Makes great croutons for soups and salads.
Keep in airtight container.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
1 pkg. (1 cup) semi-sweet chocolate chips
2 Tbsp. granulated or super-fine sugar
1/2 c. heavy cream
3 egg yolks
1/2 c. heavy cream, whipped
Directions:
Melt chocolate over simmering water in double boiler.
Stir in sugar and 1/2 cup heavy cream.
Cook, stirring constantly, until smooth and no lumps remain.
Beat yolks until smooth. Slowly pour in chocolate mixture while beating yolks constantly. Set aside and cool to room temperature.
When cool, fold in whipped cream.
Spoon into bowls and refrigerate until serving time.
Garnish with a rosette of whipped cream and chocolate curls.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
8 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
2 to 3 egg yolks
1 1/4 c. whipping cream
3 Tbsp. powdered sugar
3 Tbsp. strong brewed coffee
Directions:
Melt chocolate in a double boiler or in a pan with hot water. (Do not let water boil.)
Add sugar, coffee and egg yolks, one at a time.
Stir until mixture has thickened.
Remove from heat.
Let cool.
Whip cream.
Add slightly cooled chocolate mixture.
Spoon mousse into individual serving dishes.
Let cool in refrigerator for 1 hour.
Garnish each serving with a spoonful of whipped cream.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
8 eggs (room temperature)
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate chips
10 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. brandy
4 oz. large chocolate bar, shaved
1 c. whipped cream
Directions:
Melt butter and chocolate chips in top of double boiler (or on low power in microwave).
Beat in egg yolks, one at a time.
Cool slightly.
Stir in brandy (or Kahlua or any flavored liquer). Beat egg whites into stiff peaks.
Fold whites into the chocolate mixture, gently blending.
Spoon into 8 separate dishes or 1 large dish.
Refrigerate.
Before serving, garnish with whipped cream and shaved chocolate curls.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
4 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
4 egg yolks
1/2 stick butter, softened
dash of salt
1 tsp. vanilla
4 egg whites
6 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Put chocolate in saucepan.
Cover with 2 inches very hot tap water.
Cover.
Let stand 5 minutes or until chocolate is soft enough to stick toothpick through.
When chocolate is soft, but not dissolved, drain water.
Do not worry that some water clings.
Add yolks.
Stir with whisk and cook until thick.
Remove from heat. Add butter, salt and vanilla.
Mix well and cool.
Beat egg whites; gradually add sugar.
Beat until stiff.
Mix into chocolate. Serves 6.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse(Serves 12 Or More)
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. sweet chocolate
6 large eggs
3 Tbsp. water
2 c. heavy cream
6 Tbsp. sugar
1/4 c. Amaretto
whipped cream for garnish
grated chocolate for garnish
Directions:
Cut chocolate into 1/2 inch pieces and place in a saucepan. Place pan in almost boiling water and cover.
Let chocolate melt over lowered heat.
Put yolks in a heavy saucepan and add the 3 tablespoons water.
Place saucepan over very low heat while beating vigorously and constantly with a wire whisk, being careful not to burn.
When yolks start to thicken, add Amaretto.
Continue beating until sauce is consistency of a Hollandaise sauce.
Remove from heat.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Hard-Boiled Eggs
Ingredients:
eggs
2 Tbsp. vinegar
water (to cover)
Directions:
Place eggs in saucepan just large enough to accommodate all. Cover with water right out of top.
Add the vinegar.
Bring to boil slowly over medium heat.
Boil 1 minute.
Remove from heat. Cover and let stand 10 minutes.
Cool with running water.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Boiled Eggs
Ingredients:
eggs
water
salt (brings water to a boil quicker)
Directions:
Put eggs in single layer in saucepan.
Add enough tap water to cover eggs about 1 inch.
Quickly bring water to boiling.
Boil on medium to high heat 2 to 3 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Let eggs stand covered in the hot water 10-15 minutes for large eggs. Run cold water over eggs until cooled.
To remove shell, gently tap all over.
Roll egg between the hands to loosen shell, then peel, starting at large end.
Hold egg under running cold water or dip in bowl of water to help ease off shell.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Hard-Boiled Egg Cookies
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 tsp. vanilla
3 hard-boiled egg yolks
1 c. butter
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mash egg yolks.
Mix dry ingredients together and add mashed egg yolks and butter.
Mix well. This will be like pie dough. Roll out and cut with cookie cutter.
Brush with beaten egg whites.
Can also top with nuts if desired.
Bake at 350°.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Soft-Boiled Egg Sandwich
Ingredients:
1 fresh egg
1 English muffin, roll or bun
1 slice yellow or Mozzarella cheese
2 patties butter
1 pot of any sauce or gravy
Directions:
Toast muffin; butter and cheese like a grilled sandwich.
Poach egg in sauce.
Remove when soft-boiled and place on bun with a tablespoon of sauce.
Break yolk and serve to waiting parasites. This is an ideal brunch for late visiting guest on holiday mornings, when you have already been cooking for 2 hours.
Makes 1 serving.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Egg In A Glass
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 slice bread
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Boil egg for 9 minutes.
Break bread apart and put into glass. Add butter.
While eggs are still hot, break open and put into glass.
Salt and pepper to taste.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Roasted Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. sweet potatoes, scrubbed and cut into 1-inch cubes
1 to 2 Tbsp. butter
salt and freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Place potatoes in one layer in a lightly buttered baking dish. Dot with butter and roast in preheated 375° oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until tender, tossing every 10 minutes and adding more butter, if necessary.
Serve hot with salt and pepper to taste.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes Roasted With Garlic
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
6 cloves garlic (unpeeled)
4 medium sweet potatoes, sliced
2 tsp. dried rosemary, crumbled
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
In a small roasting pan, combine the oil and garlic and heat for 5 minutes.
Add potatoes and rosemary, turning the potatoes to coat well with oil.
Turning the potatoes frequently, roast them for 35 minutes or until tender and brown on all sides.
Sprinkle with salt.
Serves 4, 186 calories each.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Roasted Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
sweet potatoes
olive oil
salt
pepper
parsley
garlic powder
Directions:
Cut sweet potatoes into 1 1/2-inch squares.
Drizzle olive oil on top.
Sprinkle all other ingredients.
Put in roasting pan. Bake at 350° for 45 minutes; turn.
Bake 45 minutes more.
Turn oven to 425° for last 10 minutes, until potatoes are nice and crisp.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Oven Roasted Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 large sweet potatoes, peeled
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. honey
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary leaves, crushed
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Heat oven to 425 degrees. Grease baking pan. Cut sweet potatoes crosswise into 3/4 slices, halving larger sweet potatoes if necessary. Place in a single layer greased pan. In a small bowl combine oil, honey, rosemary and salt. Microwave on high for 20-30 seconds or until heated. Blend well. Brush mixture over sweet potatoes slices. Bake 425 degrees for 25-30 minutes or until sweet potatoes are tender.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Roasted Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. Honey
2 Tbsp. Grapeseed or Canola Oil
6 small Sweet Potatoes, scrubbed and halved
6 Cinnamon Sticks
Salt and freshly ground Pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
In small bowl, whisk together honey and oil.
Rub each sweet potato halve with honey and oil mixture.
Season potatoes with salt and pepper.
Press a cinnamon stick between matching halves of each sweet potato and wrap potatoes in foil.
Place on a baking sheet and roast for 30 min. Remove foil from potatoes and arrange skin side up on baking sheet.
Place cinnamon sticks next to potatoes and return to oven. Bake until potatoes and cinnamon sticks brown lightly; about 30 min.
Transfer to serving platter.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Baked Eggplant
Ingredients:
2 medium eggplants
1 (No. 2) can tomatoes
1/2 c. sharp cheese
dash of Worcestershire sauce
2 beaten eggs
1 can mushroom soup
salt and pepper
2 Tbsp. celery, chopped
1 Tbsp. onion, chopped
1/4 c. Ritz crackers, crumbled
Directions:
Peel eggplant and cut into cubes.
Add tomatoes to raw eggplant and cook slowly in saucepan until tender.
Remove from heat and add other ingredients using enough crackers to take up moisture.
Bake in large casserole in a 350° oven for about 45 minutes.
Serves 6.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Eggplant With Tomato Sauce(Great Over Rice)
Ingredients:
2 cups diced eggplant
1/4 cup water
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 cup cooked tomatoes
1/4 cup onions
1/2 tablespoon oil
1/4 cup chopped green peppers
2 teaspoons raw or brown sugar
2 teaspoons salt
1/4 teaspoon sweet basil or thyme
Directions:
Cook diced eggplant 10 minutes or until tender and water is almost absorbed.
Put sauteed onions and chopped green peppers in skillet, add juice of tomatoes and let boil gently until reduced about half in amount.
Cut tomatoes in small pieces and add seasonings.
Add cubed eggplant.
Mix well and let simmer a few minutes to absorb flavor.
Sauce should be quite thick.
If you use too many onions it will be thinner, but still very good.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Bake
Ingredients:
2 small eggplants, cut 1/2 inch slices
3 medium tomatoes, sliced and seeded
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 medium onions, cut in 1/2 inch slices
pepper
1/2 c. grated Cheddar or Romano
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 tsp. basil
Directions:
Sprinkle eggplant in colander with 1 1/4 teaspoons salt.
Let drain 30 minutes.
Place tomatoes, cut side down, on paper towels. Drain 30 minutes.
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in skillet. Saute garlic and onion.
Discard garlic; don't break onion into rings.
Drain. Rinse eggplant and drain.
Brush with oil and broil 5 minutes; turn and repeat.
Arrange in alternating layers, slightly overlapping.
Sprinkle with spices and cheese.
Bake at 350° for 10 minutes or until cheese melts.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Roasted Eggplant And Tomato Soup
Ingredients:
1 (32 oz.) can whole tomatoes
1 medium eggplant, peeled
salt
dried herbs (if desired)
olive oil
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Drain tomatoes and reserve juice.
Cut eggplant lengthwise into 1/4-inch thick slices.
Lay slices on paper towels or in a colander and sprinkle with salt.
Set aside for 1 hour.
Preheat broiler or grill.
Wipe excess liquid off eggplant slices.
Brush both sides with olive oil.
Place slices on a broiler rack or cookie sheet and broil eggplant as close to heat as possible until golden brown on both sides, or grill over medium hot coals until brown.
Place tomatoes in blender or food processor.
Add a few eggplant slices, puree, adding eggplant slices and reserved tomato juice, until soup is of desired consistency and taste.
Heat before serving.
Serve garnished with grated Parmesan cheese. Serves 6 to 8.
Before broiling, eggplant may be sprinkled with any of the following:
dried basil, pepper, coriander, crushed garlic, parsley, oregano or thyme.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Tomato And Eggplant Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (1 1/2 lb.) eggplant
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1 finely chopped onion
1/2 tsp. oregano leaves
1/2 c. crumbled saltines
6 medium tomatoes, sliced
1/2 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Boil eggplant in water and salt (sliced); drain and mash. Blend eggs, pepper, onion, oregano and saltines.
Slice tomatoes and spread over top, then sprinkle cheese.
Bake in a buttered casserole for 25 minutes at 375°.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Scotch Crispies
Ingredients:
12 oz. pkg. butterscotch chips
1 c. peanut butter
6 c. Rice Krispies
Directions:
Melt peanut butter and chips in double boiler until smooth. Add Rice Krispies.
Mix well; press into aluminum foil lined 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.
Chill about 1 hour.
Cut into 1 1/2-inch squares.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Kris Kringles
Ingredients:
1 c. light Karo syrup
1 c. sugar
1 c. peanut butter
6 c. Rice Krispies
1 c. chocolate chips
1 c. butterscotch chips
Directions:
Mix together Karo syrup and sugar in a large saucepan; bring to a boil.
Add peanut butter; stir until well blended.
In a large bowl, mix the peanut butter mixture with the Rice Krispies. Stir to coat.
Press into a 9 x 13-inch pan; cool.
Melt chocolate chips and butterscotch chips in a double boiler.
Frost the Rice Krispie mixture with the melted chips.
When cool, cut into squares.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Crispy Critters
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) bag semi-sweet chocolate chips
1 (12 oz.) bag butterscotch chips
1/2 c. peanut butter
1/2 c. butter
5 c. Rice Krispies
Directions:
Melt the chips, peanut butter and butter in the top of a double boiler.
Remove from heat and stir in the Rice Krispies. You can either drop the mixture by teaspoons on waxed paper or spread in a greased 13 x 9-inch pan.
Cut into bars when cool.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Crispix Mix
Ingredients:
1 box Crispix
1/2 bottle dark Karo
1 c. brown sugar
1 stick margarine
1 bag walnuts
Directions:
Heat dark Karo, brown sugar and margarine, but do not boil. Pour syrup mixture over cereal and walnuts.
Bake at 250° for 1 hour, stirring every 15 minutes.
Can substitute peanuts, almonds, etc. for walnuts.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Caramel Crispix
Ingredients:
2 14 oz. boxes Crispix
3 c. brown sugar
3/4 to 1 c. light Karo syrup
3 sticks margarine
1/2 tsp. soda
Directions:
Boil Karo syrup, brown sugar and butter for 5 minutes, add soda.
Pour mixture over Crispix in a large roasting pan.
Stir to coat. Bale at 200 degrees for 30 to 45 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes.

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Carrot And Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
3 c. butternut squash, cut in 1/2-inch pieces
2 c. thinly sliced carrots
3/4 c. chopped onion
2 (14 1/2 oz.) cans chicken broth
1/4 tsp. white pepper
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 c. half and half cream
Directions:
Melt butter in large saucepan on medium heat.
Add squash, carrots and onion; cover and cook 8 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add broth, bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer 25 minutes.
Puree mixture in batches in food processor. Return to saucepan and add spices.
Bring to a simmer.
Add half and half; heat thoroughly.

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. squash, peeled and seeded
1 Tbsp. margarine
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. curry
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper (optional)
3 (10 3/4 oz.) cans chicken broth
1 c. water
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 Tbsp. creamy peanut butter
1/2 c. cream or evaporated milk
Directions:
Saute onion until wilted.
Add garlic.
Cut squash into 1-inch cubes.
Put into soup pot.
Add chicken broth, water and nutmeg; boil until squash is tender.
Remove from heat.
Add curry and pepper; stir.
Stir in Worcestershire sauce and peanut butter. Whirl mix in blender or food processor, adding cream or evaporated milk.
Reheat.
Makes 2 1/2 quarts.
Freezes well.

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Elegant Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
2 butternut squash (about 2 lb. each)
2 qt. chicken broth
2 Tbsp. unsalted butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium-sized onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. ground mace
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1 Tbsp. light brown sugar
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
truffle oil (for garnish)
about 1/3 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Halve the squash lengthwise; peel, seed and cut into chunks. Place in a soup pot with the broth. Simmer, partially covered, until tender, 20 to 25 minutes. Transfer the squash to a bowl with a slotted spoon; reserve broth. Melt the butter in the oil in a nonstick skillet over very low heat. Add the onion and cook, stirring, until wilted, about 15 minutes. Sprinkle with the mace and ginger. Cook, stirring, for 1 minute more. Add the cooked onion mixture and the brown sugar to the squash and stir well. Season with salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1 butternut squash
1 small chopped onion
fresh parsley, chopped
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 pt. heavy cream
2 to 3 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Saute onion.
Cut up squash; boil with 1 tablespoon sugar until soft.
Add onion to chicken soup.
Add chopped parsley and onions.
Drain and mash squash and add to soup mixture.
Put through blender briefly.
Add cream and melted butter.
Stir briefly.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1 large butternut squash, halved
3 Tbsp butter
1/4 tsp cinnamon
1/4 tsp nutmeg
1/8 tsp cloves
1 Tbsp sugar
3 Tbsp olive oil
1 onion chopped
2 Idaho potatoes, peeled and chopped into large pieces
8 c chicken stock (or water + bouillon cubes)
1/4 c heavy cream (optional)
salt and white pepper to taste
Directions:
In a preheated, 400 degree oven, roast the butternut squash with the seasonings, butter and sugar, until soft and browned. Remove from oven and scoop squash from rind.
In a soup pot, heat olive oil and saute onions.
When translucent, add potatoes and squash flesh.
Cover with chicken stock and simmer until potatoes are soft.
Remove from heat and puree with stick blender or in an upright blender.
Return to soup pot and add heavy cream.
Season to taste.
Enjoy!

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Brisket
Ingredients:
1 trimmed beef brisket (6 or 8 lb.)
1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can applesauce or equivalent
1/2 small can tomato paste
1/4 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Place brisket in crock-pot, cutting meat if necessary to fit into pot. In a bowl, stir together all other ingredients and pour over meat. Cover; cook on low heat setting about 10 hours or until meat is tender.
Remove meat, reserving juices; cover to keep warm.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Beef Brisket Or A Roast
Ingredients:
3 to 4 lb. meat
2 Tbsp. chili powder
2 sliced onions
2 Tbsp. vinegar
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt
2/3 c. catsup
1 Tbsp. paprika
3 minced garlic cloves
1 c. water
mushrooms (canned or fresh)
potatoes, peeled and left whole
Directions:
Spread onions over top of meat.
Make a sauce with the rest of the ingredients except potatoes and mushrooms and pour over meat. Bake at 350° for 3 to 4 hours, then 1 hour before serving add potatoes and mushrooms.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Beef Brisket
Ingredients:
3 to 5 lb. boneless chuck pot roast
2 tsp. seasoned salt or plain salt
1/2 tsp. celery salt
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 c. Worcestershire sauce
3/4 c. barbecue sauce
Directions:
Place meat on heavy-duty foil.
Add all other ingredients. Marinate overnight in the refrigerator or for at least 6 hours. Cook in crock-pot on low heat for 10 hours.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Beef Brisket Pot Roast
Ingredients:
4 lb. boneless fresh brisket beef
1 large onion, coarsely chopped
salt and black pepper
all-purpose flour
water
vegetables of choice
Directions:
Heat large heavy pot.
Add meat.
Brown on all sides without oil.
Pour off any fat.
Sprinkle onion around meat.
Cover tightly.
Cook over low heat for 1 hour.
Remove from heat.
Keep covered and let meat cool to lukewarm.
When cool, slice across grain for serving.
Return meat to pot.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Cover and simmer 1 to 2 hours longer or until tender, turning slices once.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Brisket Of Beef
Ingredients:
1 large beef brisket
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can golden mushroom soup
1 envelope onion soup mix
1 soup can water
6 quartered potatoes
6 to 8 carrots
Directions:
Lay brisket in roasting pan.
Mix soup and water together. Pour half over meat. Add potatoes and carrots in pan with roast. Pour the rest of the soup over veggies.
Cover tightly with foil. Bake in slow oven at 250° to 275° for 6 to 8 hours.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Glaze For Quick Breads Or Bar Cookies Or Sweet Rolls
Ingredients:
1 c. powdered sugar
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Mix together all ingredients and put on baked goods while it is still hot and return to the oven for two or three minutes.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Baker'S Glaze
Ingredients:
1 tbsp. Wesson oil
1 tbsp. Karo Syrup
1 tbsp. water
1 tsp. Clear vanilla
1 c. sifted powdered sugar
Directions:
Mix in a saucepan first 4 ingredients and bring to a boil. Mix in 1 c. sifted powdered sugar. Pour over cake while hot before it thickens.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Rum Glaze
Ingredients:
1 1/3 c. sifted powdered sugar
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
1 Tbsp. rum (or milk)
1 Tbsp. whipping cream
Directions:
In a small bowl combine powdered sugar, butter and rum (or milk).
Stir in whipping cream or milk.
If necessary, add cream or milk, 1 teaspoon at a time, until it reaches drizzle consistency.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Glaze For Cakes
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1 stick margarine
1 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Bring to a boil. Boil until it begins to thicken. Add coconut or flavoring.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Glaze For Pork
Ingredients:
1/2 c. dark corn syrup
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
You can add a little chickory if smoke flavor is desired.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 can tomato sauce (small)
1 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 can kidney beans (small)
1 can chopped green chilies
3 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Brown meat.
Drain fat.
Add onion, pepper and celery.
Cook 5 minutes.
Add other ingredients and simmer 10 to 15 minutes.
Add seasonings to taste.
This is a leaner version of chili, low-fat and delicious.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground turkey
3 medium onions, chopped
1/2 tsp. instant minced garlic
2 (15 oz. each) cans tomatoes
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can chicken broth
1 medium green pepper, seeded and chopped
1 medium red pepper, seeded and chopped
1 medium yellow pepper, seeded and chopped
2 (4 oz. each) cans diced green chilies, drained
2 tart apples, chopped
3 Tbsp. chili powder
2 Tbsp. cocoa
1 1/2 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 Tbsp. bottled hot pepper sauce
2 (15 oz. each) cans kidney beans, drained
1 c. slivered almonds
shredded cheese (optional)
Directions:
Cook turkey, onions and garlic in Dutch oven over medium flame; drain.
Add remaining ingredients except kidney beans, almonds and cheese.
Bring to a boil over high flame.
Reduce flame to simmer, cover and cook 1 hour.
Add kidney beans and almonds.
Simmer an additional 30 minutes.
Garnish with shredded cheese, if desired.
Makes 8 to 10 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground raw turkey
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 Tbsp. paprika
1 (19 oz.) can red kidney beans, drained
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1 (5 1/2 oz.) can tomato paste
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1 Tbsp. cumin
Directions:
In large nonstick skillet, combine turkey, onion and garlic. Cook over medium heat 10 minutes, stirring and separating turkey as it cooks.
Add celery, tomatoes, tomato paste, Worcestershire sauce, chili powder, paprika and cumin.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 20 to 25 minutes, stirring occasionally to break up tomatoes.
Add kidney beans, cook 5 minutes longer to heat through.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
1 pkg. Chili-O mix
1/2 c. water
1 can chili beans with sauce (Joan of Arc brand)
1 (16 oz.) can whole peeled tomatoes, mashed
1 (8 oz.) can V-8 juice
salt and pepper to taste
chili powder to taste
1 medium onion, chopped and 1 medium green pepper, chopped (optional)
Directions:
In a nonstick pan over high heat, brown turkey meat.
Onion and green pepper may be added at this time, if desired. Add V-8 juice, Chili-O mix and water, stirring well. Reduce heat and add the tomatoes, chili powder, salt and pepper. Stir well and cook 10 minutes on low heat, covered. Add chili beans and cook another 10 minutes. Serve alone or over noodles.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
3/4 c. chopped onion
3/4 c. chopped green pepper
1 lb. ground turkey
3 Tbsp. ground cumin
3 Tbsp. chili powder
3 (14 1/2 oz.) cans chopped tomatoes
3 (14 1/2 oz.) cans drained and rinsed beans (i.e., kidney, red or pink beans, cannellini)
black pepper and salt to taste
dash of hot pepper sauce
Directions:
Saute onion and green pepper in olive oil until soft. Add ground turkey and season with salt, pepper, 1 tablespoon of cumin and chili powder. Crumble turkey as it cools. In a crock-pot, put tomatoes, beans, 2 tablespoons cumin, chili powder, salt and pepper to taste. Add a dash of hot pepper sauce or more if you want it spicier. Add turkey mixture to tomato mixture (drain fat if there is a lot of liquid). Cook on high anywhere from 6 to 8 hours, depending on how tender you want the meat.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Special Apple Pie(Makes One 10-Inch Pie)
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. (1 1/4 sticks) butter
1/4 c. water or apple cider
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, cinnamon and salt in medium bowl.
Cut in butter using pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles coarse meal.
Add water and toss mixture gently with fork until evenly moistened.
Gather gently into ball.
Transfer to lightly floured board and roll into circle slightly larger than a deep 10-inch pie plate.
Ease pastry into pan and flute high edge.
Set aside.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Apple Pie
Ingredients:
3/4 to 1 cup sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 to 1 tsp. cinnamon
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
6 to 7 cups sliced peeled apples (2 to 2 1/2 lbs.)
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
Combine sugar, flour cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
Mix lightly through apples (sliced 1/4 inch thick).
Heap in pastry-lined 9-inch pie pan.
Dot with butter.
Adjust top crust and flute edges; cut vents. bake in hot oven (425 degrees) 50 to 60 minutes, or until crust is browned and apples are tender.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Apple Pie
Ingredients:
4 c. apples, peeled and sliced
1 c. white sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
3 Tbsp. tapioca
1/2 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. butter
1 tsp. sugar
2 (9-inch) pie crusts
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Combine together the first 7 ingredients.
Fill a 9-inch pie crust with the mixture.
Cut the butter into pieces and place on top of apple mixture.
Put 2nd pie crust on top.
Rub top crust with a little milk (this will make it crusty and brown).
Sprinkle a teaspoon of sugar on top crust. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: My Favorite Apple Pie
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. tart apples, peeled and sliced (8 c.)
1 1/2 c. light brown sugar
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 stick butter or margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. apple pie spice
1 c. apple juice
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl.
Add apples, mix well. Line a 10 or 12-inch baking dish with pastry, add apple mixture. Pour apple juice around edge (not on apples).
Cover with top pastry, sealing edges.
Cut slits in top.
Brush with margarine, sprinkle with white sugar.
Bake at 425° for 40 minutes or until juice bubbles through slits.
This is a deep-dish pie.
Pan must be at least two inches deep.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Apple Pie
Ingredients:
3/4 to 1 c. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 to 1 tsp. cinnamon
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
1 to 2 tsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
6 to 7 c. apples, sliced
pastry for 2 pie crusts
Directions:
Combine brown sugar, flour, nutmeg, cinnamon, salt, vanilla and lemon juice.
Add apples and mix lightly.
Pour mixture into pie pastry.
Dot with butter.
Adjust top crust and cut vents. Bake in a hot oven at 425° for 50 minutes to 1 hour (until crust is brown and apples are tender).
This pie is delicious so live a little!
Makes 2 pies.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: Cobb Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 head iceberg lettuce
1/2 head romaine lettuce
1 head Boston or bibb lettuce
1 small bunch chicory
2 medium tomatoes, peeled and seeded
2 whole chicken breasts, cooked or baked
6 strips bacon, crisp
1 avocado
3 eggs, hard-boiled
2 Tbsp. chives, chopped
1/2 c. Bleu cheese, crumbled
1 c. French dressing
Directions:
Chop all greens; dice tomatoes, also finely dice chicken, avocado and eggs.
Add rest of ingredients and toss with the dressing.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: California Cobb Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 head Boston bibb lettuce
1/2 bunch watercress (optional)
1/2 head romaine
2 medium tomatoes, diced
2 half breasts cooked chicken, diced
6 strips crisply cooked bacon, crumbled
1 ripe avocado, diced
2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
1/3 c. Blue cheese, crumbled (optional)
oil and vinegar dressing
salt and pepper
Directions:
Shred lettuce, watercress and romaine fine; place in a large salad bowl.
Arrange diced tomatoes, chicken, crumbled bacon, diced avocado, diced eggs and crumbled Blue cheese in strips across salad greens.
Just before serving, toss with enough vinagrette dressing to moisten salad and salt and pepper.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: Cobb Salad
Ingredients:
2 chicken breast halves, cooked and cut up
6 c. finely shredded lettuce
1/4 c. crumbled Blue cheese
8 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
4 green onions (with tops), sliced
3 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 avocado, peeled and sliced
Lemon Vinaigrette (recipe follows)
Directions:
Divide lettuce among 4 plates.
Arrange chicken and remaining ingredients, except Vinaigrette, in rows over lettuce.
Serve with Lemon Vinaigrette.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: Classic Cobb Salad
Ingredients:
2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts (4 to 5 oz. each)
olive oil
Emeril's Original Essence
1/2 lb. diced bacon
1/2 c. extra-virgin olive oil
3 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1/2 lb. Maytag Blue cheese
salt and freshly round black pepper
2 heads bibb lettuce, washed, cored, patted dry and thinly sliced
1 large, ripe avocado, peeled, pitted and diced
1 beefsteak tomato, peeled, seeded and chopped
2 large hard-boiled eggs, peeled and thinly sliced
Directions:
Preheat the grill. Drizzle the chicken breasts with olive oil, then season with the Essence. Grill the chicken until the juices run clear, about 4 minutes per side.
Remove from the grill; cool and dice. Cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until just crispy, 6 to 8 minutes. Remove from the skillet and drain on paper towels. Whisk the olive oil and lemon juice in a mixing bowl. Whisk in 1/4 pound of the Blue cheese, a handful at a time. Season with salt and pepper. Toss the lettuce in a large bowl with the dressing.
Season the avocado, tomatoes and eggs with salt and pepper.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: Crispy Cobb Salad
Ingredients:
1 qt. torn assorted greens
2 c. Louis Rich breast of turkey, chopped
2 tomatoes, seeded and chopped
2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
1 avocado, peeled, seeded and chopped
6 slices Oscar Mayer bacon, cooked and crumbled
1/4 c. Kraft Blue cheese crumbles (optional)
1 (8 oz.) bottle Rancher's Choice Ranch dressing (regular or reduced calorie)
Directions:
Arrange greens, turkey, tomatoes, eggs, avocado and bacon in rows on large serving platter.
Serve with dressing; sprinkle with Blue cheese if desired.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Super Tasty Basic Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. ketchup
1/3 c. tomato juice
1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper
1/8 tsp. red pepper
2 eggs, beaten
3/4 c. soft breadcrumbs
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1/4 c. ketchup
1/2 tsp. prepared mustard
2 tsp. brown sugar
Directions:
In large bowl, combine 1/2 cup ketchup, tomato juice, salt, peppers, eggs, breadcrumbs, onion and 2 teaspoons mustard.
Mix thoroughly.
Add ground beef.
Mix. Press beef into a 5 X 5 loaf pan.
Combine 1/4 cup ketchup, 1/2 teaspoon mustard and brown sugar and spread over meatloaf.
Bake at 400° for 35 to 40 minutes or until done.
Garnish with fresh herbs, if desired.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
4 slices white bread, torn into pieces
2 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 medium yellow onion, peeled and cut into 1/8's
2 cloves garlic
2 stalks celery, cut into 2 inch pieces
2 carrots, peeled, cut into 2 inch pieces
1/2 c. flat leaf parsley leaves
1 large egg
1 c. ketchup
3 tsp. dry mustard
1 Tbsp. coarse salt
2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Place bread in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine crumbs form. Transfer to a medium bowl, and add ground beef.
Place onion, garlic, celery, carrots, and parsley in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine.
Add to meat mixture, using hands to mix well.
Add egg, 1/2 c. ketchup, 2 tsp. dry mustard, salt and pepper; use hands to combine thoroughly.
Place in an 8 1/2 x 4 1/2 x 2 1/2 inch loaf pan.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Meatloaf
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 c. crushed pineapple, well drained
1/4 c. ketchup
1/2 c. brown sugar
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1/4 tsp. salt
pepper
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1 small onion, finely chopped
2 lbs. ground beef
1/4 tsp. garlic
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°F.
Grease 9 x 5 x 3-inch pan.
Line the bottom with greased wax paper.
Whip eggs in a large bowl.
Stir in pineapple, ketchup, brown sugar, mustard, salt, garlic, and pepper.
Stir in bread crumbs, onion, and half the meat until thoroughly blended.
Work in remaining meat and press into pan. Lay a sheet of tin foil loosely over meat and bake for 1 hour. Uncover and drain off fat, continue baking uncovered for 30 - 40 min.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 beaten egg
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. onion salt
1 tsp. celery salt
2 slices bread, cut into crumbs
2 lb. ground beef
1 c. oatmeal
catsup
Directions:
Mix ingredients in order listed.
Shape into loaf.
Top with catsup.
Bake at 375° for approximately 1 hour in foil-lined pan.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
2 lbs. extra lean hamburger
1/4 lb. sausage
1 cup crumbled saltines
2 eggs
3/4 cup milk
1 Tbsp. mustard
1 tsp. accent (optional)
1/2 cup finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
If mixture seems too dry, add a little more milk.
Shape into a loaf and bake in a flat dish at 325° for 1 hour 30 minutes or until done.
Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. May pour 8 oz. can of tomato sauce over meat before baking.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 pt. low-fat Ricotta cheese
4 egg whites
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. basil
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
5 c. spaghetti sauce
8 oz. uncooked lasagna noodles
3/4 c. grated Mozzarella cheese
1 c. water
Directions:
Mix Ricotta cheese, egg whites, spices, spinach and Parmesan cheese.
Coat bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan with thin layer of spaghetti sauce.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Short-Cut Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
1 1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 egg
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. oregano
2 (15 1/2 oz.) jars spaghetti sauce
8 oz. lasagna noodles
1 c. water
Directions:
In a big bowl, mix Ricotta, 1 cup Mozzarella, egg, spinach, salt and oregano.
Place 1/2 cup sauce in bottom of a greased 13 x 9-inch baking pan.
Top with one-third of the noodles.
Cover noodles with half the cheese mixture.
Repeat.
Top with remaining noodles.
Pour remaining sauce over top.
Sprinkle with remaining Mozzarella.
Pour water around edges of pan.
Cover with foil. Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Remove foil and bake 15 minutes more. Let stand 15 minutes before cutting.
Serves 8 or more.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
1 1/2 c. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
1 egg
1 pkg. frozen spinach, thawed and drained
salt and pepper
3/4 tsp. oregano
1 jar Prego sauce (28 oz.)
1/2 pkg. lasagna noodles (8 oz.)
1 c. water
Directions:
Mix Ricotta, 1 cup Mozzarella, egg, spinach, salt, pepper and oregano.
In a greased pan, layer 1/2 cup sauce, 1/3 of noodles and 1/2 cheese mixture.
Repeat.
Top with remaining noodles, then remaining sauce.
Sprinkle with rest of Mozzarella.
Pour water around the edges.
Cover tightly with foil.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
Let stand 10 minutes before serving.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Quick And Easy Spinach Lasagne
Ingredients:
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
1 1/2 c. grated Mozzarella
1 egg
1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. oregano
32 oz. spaghetti sauce
8 to 10 oz. lasagne noodles (uncooked)
1 c. water
Directions:
In a large bowl, mix Ricotta, 1 cup Mozzarella, egg, spinach and seasonings.
In greased 9 x 13-inch pan, layer:
1/2 cup sauce, 1/3 of uncooked lasagne noodles and 1/2 of spinach. Repeat, then finish with the last 1/3 of the noodles and the remaining sauce.
Sprinkle 1/2 cup Mozzarella over the top.
Pour the water around the edges.
Cover with foil.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
Stand 15 minutes, then serve.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 box lasagna noodles
1 large container Ricotta cheese
1 box frozen spinach
1 large can or jar of spaghetti sauce
3 eggs, beaten
2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
salt and pepper
parsley flakes
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Spray a 9 x 13-inch glass dish with nonstick cooking spray. Spread a 1/4 cup of sauce on the bottom. Boil the lasagna noodles for 15 minutes. Rinse and drain. Boil and drain the spinach. Mix the Ricotta cheese, eggs, spinach, dash of pepper, salt and parsley flakes. The noodles should be flattened out after they are drained on foil. Put a layer of noodles on the bottom of the glass dish and spread with the Ricotta mixture. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and sprinkle with grated Mozzarella cheese. Next, do another layer of noodles, sauce, Ricotta, Parmesan and Mozzarella. Depending on how many noodles you have, keep layering until done with the Ricotta mixture. On the top layer, there should be noodles, sauce, Parmesan and Mozzarella cheese. Bake for 45 minutes at 375°. Take out of oven and cool on rack for 10 minutes before serving. Enjoy!

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Avocado Corn Quiche
Ingredients:
3 ears fresh or frozen corn on the cob, scraped of kernels
3/4 c. grated Havarti cheese (or any white cheese)
4 green onions, tops only, chopped
1 1/2 ripe avocados, peeled and chopped
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/2 c. milk
3 eggs, lightly beaten
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of Tabasco
10-inch partially baked pie shell *
Directions:
*Using your favorite pie crust recipe fit the dough into a 10-inch false-bottom quiche pan.
Line with foil and fill with rice.
Bake 10 minutes in a preheated 400° oven.
Remove foil and rice and bake 5 minutes longer or until lightly colored.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Avocado
Ingredients:
3 avocados, halved lengthwise
1 large carrot, diced small
8 oz. peas
8 oz. green beans, diced
1 lb. potatoes, diced small
1/4 c. oil
2 eggs
mayonnaise
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 lemon, juice only
1/2 tsp. mustard
1 tooth of garlic
salt to taste
Directions:
Boil the cut-up carrot, peas, green beans and potatoes.
Put the eggs in blender.
Add a continuous thread of oil a little at a time.
Add garlic, pepper, mustard and salt to taste and finally add lemon juice.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Mexican Avocado Dip
Ingredients:
1 can refried beans with peppers or bean dip
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 or 3 ripe avocados
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
8 oz. sour cream
1/2 c. mayonnaise
3/4 pkg. taco seasoning mix
1 large bunch new chopped onions (green and all)
3 firm red tomatoes, cubed
1 can chopped black olives
8 oz. Cheddar cheese, grated
tortilla chips
Directions:
Blend avocados, lemon juice, salt and pepper together until all lumps are removed.
Mix sour cream, mayonnaise and seasoning mix together.
Heat refried beans and layer in bottom of glass baking dish.
Put a layer of avocado mix on top, then a layer of sour cream mix.
Then layer onion, tomatoes, black olives and cheese in same fashion.
Melt cheese in a 325° oven until desired consistency is obtained.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Avocado Dip Or Guacamole
Ingredients:
4 ripe tomatoes, finely chopped
5 to 10 sprigs fresh coriander, finely chopped
