1/2 onion, finely chopped
2 to 3 green chilies, extra finely chopped
2 Tbsp. lemon or lime juice
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. fresh ground black pepper
1 large avocado, ripe
Directions:
Mix all ingredients except avocado together; not more than 1/2 an hour before serving.
Cut avocado; scrape skin well and mash. Mix into tomato mixture.
Squeeze lemon over top of mixture to prevent discoloration and wrap tightly.
To serve, pour off extra lemon and edge with tostados.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Guacamole(Avocado Dip)
Ingredients:
2 large, very ripe avocados
1 medium tomato, seeded and chopped
1/2 small white onion, minced
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
pinch of sugar
1 can green chilies, chopped
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Peel and mash the avocados.
Mix well with all the other ingredients.
Pile into a serving dish with an avocado pit in the center.
This is supposed to keep the guacamole from turning dark. Makes about 2 or 3 cups.
Serve with fried tortilla triangles.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Potato Soup
Ingredients:
5 medium potatoes
2 tsp. salt
1 small onion, chopped
2 c. milk
1 stick butter
1/2 tsp. pepper
6 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Peel and dice potatoes. Boil until tender.
Melt butter in 5-quart pan over medium heat. Add onion, salt and pepper.
Cook until onion is tender.
Adjust heat as needed. Add flour and stir until smooth and bubbly. Remove from heat.
Gradually add milk, stirring constantly. Return to heat and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and add potatoes.
Simmer 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Potato Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. water
8 medium potatoes, peeled and cut up
2 1/4 c. milk
3/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. white pepper
1 small onion, chopped
Directions:
Heat water to boiling.
Add potatoes and onions.
Boil until potatoes are tender.
Drain off water.
Put 1/2 of vegetables into blender.
Add 1/4 to 1/2 cup of milk.
Blend until smooth.
Return all vegetables to cooking pot.
Stir in remaining ingredients using measurements listed first and then adding salt and pepper to your taste.
Heat, stirring occasionally, until hot.
Add more milk while heating for a thinner soup.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Potato Soup
Ingredients:
4 large potatoes
1 tsp. salt
1 stick margarine
2/3 c. flour
1 chopped onion (optional)
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
3 c. sweet milk
bacon chips (optional)
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
Peel and cube potatoes.
Stew with 1 teaspoon salt until tender.
In a double boiler, melt butter.
Add flour, salt and pepper.
Add onion and bacon chips, if desired.
Mix well.
Add milk.
Stir until thick, adding more milk until desired consistency (you may use water from potatoes).
Add potatoes and cheese.
Mix well.
Delicious served with corn bread.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Potato Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. celery salt (optional)
1/8 tsp. pepper
3 1/2 c. milk
1 1/3 c. uncooked instant mashed potatoes
Directions:
Heat all ingredients except potatoes to scalding.
Stir in potatoes; continue cooking until smooth, stirring constantly. Soup should be consistency of heavy cream.
Yield: 4 (1 cup) servings.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Potato Soup
Ingredients:
3 1/2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion or 1 Tbsp. instant minced onion
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. celery salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. Potato Buds mashed potatoes (dry)
Directions:
Heat milk, onion, butter, salt, celery salt and pepper to scalding in 3-quart saucepan.
Stir in potatoes.
Cook, stirring constantly, until smooth.
Sprinkle each serving with paprika and snipped parsley, if desired.
Makes 4 servings (about 1 cup each).

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Steamed Veggies
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini, sliced
2 medium yellow squash, sliced
1 c. fresh broccoli flowerets
1/2 c. onion, diced
1/2 c. mushrooms, sliced
1 (12 oz.) pkg. spaghetti or fettucini
1/2 c. butter
1/2 to 1 c. whipping cream
salt and pepper
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Steam vegetables or saute in butter until still crisp.
Add mushrooms the last minute.
Cook pasta according to directions and drain.
Add butter, whipping cream, vegetables and seasonings. Toss well.
Serve warm with cheese sprinkled on top.
Serves 8.

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Fun Guy Pasta
Ingredients:
1 lb. your favorite pasta
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can green peas
1 jar sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. white wine
dash of black pepper
dash of sweet basil
1 Tbsp. olive oil
grated cheese (for serving)
Directions:
In the time it takes to boil the water for the pasta, your dinner will be ready.
In 1 pan, bring enough water to boil to cook a 1 pound box of pasta.
While the temperature is coming to a boil, prepare the sauce.

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Noodles And Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 large onion, diced
1 green pepper, diced
1/2 c. oil
1/2 c. creamed corn
1 c. tomato soup
1 (5 oz.) pkg. noodles, cooked as directed
1 (3 oz.) can olives, chopped (green or ripe)
1 (4 oz.) can mushrooms, drained
grated cheese
Directions:
Saute onion and pepper in oil until clear.
Mix all ingredients, except cheese and pour into casserole.
Chill. Sprinkle cheese on top.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta In A Pot
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
2 onions, chopped
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 (16 oz.) spaghetti sauce
1 (15 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
1 (4 oz.) can mushrooms
8 oz. shell macaroni
2 c. sour cream
8 oz. Cheddar cheese
8 oz. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
Directions:
Brown the hamburger meat with the onions and garlic salt. Boil macaroni shells until tender; then combine meat mixture with the shell macaroni.
Add spaghetti sauce, tomatoes and mushrooms together with half of each of the cheese and the rest of the cheese to go on top.
Bake until cheeses melt at 350°.

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Wild Mushroom Pasta(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, finely chopped
3 cloves garlic, finely chopped
2 Tbsp. parsley, finely chopped
2 c. coarsely chopped tomato
4 c. assorted mushrooms
salt to taste
1 lb. penne
4 c. sliced, fresh mushrooms (shiitake, morel, oyster and/or best of all, portabella)
2 red or green peppers, cut into strips
1 medium onion, cut into thin wedges
1/4 c. margarine or butter
1/4 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
hot cooked pasta
shaved or grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
In a large skillet, cook mushrooms, peppers and onion in hot margarine or butter until tender.
Stir in salt and pepper.
Toss with hot pasta.
Top with cheese.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef chuck, cubed
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 to 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. paprika
1 1/2 c. beef broth
1/2 garlic clove, minced
1 bay leaf
4 carrots, sliced
2 onions, chopped
1 rib celery
3 potatoes, diced
Directions:
Place meat in slow cooker. Combine flour, salt, pepper and paprika. Stir into meat until coated. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well. Cover. Cook on low 10 to 12 hours or high 4 to 6 hours. Stir and serve.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef-Vegetable Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 large can crushed tomatoes (undrained)
3 Tbsp. quick cooking tapioca
2 Tbsp. dried basil
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 lb. red potatoes, cut into 1-inch cubes
3 medium carrots, cut into 1-inch slices
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 1/2 lb. lean chuck roast, cut into 1-inch cubes
2 tsp. canola oil
Directions:
In a bowl, combine tomatoes, tapioca, basil, sugar, salt and pepper; let this stand for 15 to 20 minutes. Put potatoes, carrots, onion and celery in large slow cooker.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef cubes, cut into small pieces
4 small cans beef broth
2 envelopes Knorr classic brown gravy
as little or as much carrots as desired
as little or as much potatoes as desired
as little or as much celery as desired
2 medium onions, cut
flour
garlic salt to taste
Directions:
Put beef cubes in a bowl with flour, a little black pepper and garlic salt.
Coat beef cubes.
Brown beef cubes in hot oil on top of stove.
When brown, put beef cubes in slow cooker.
Mix in remaining ingredients; cook on medium-high for 7 hours or on high for 5 hours or until vegetables are tender.
Enjoy with hot French bread.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Slow Baked Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef stew meat
1 medium onion, cut up
1 stalk celery
6 carrots
6 cut up potatoes
2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. tapioca (Minute tapioca)
1 c. tomato juice
1 c. water
Directions:
More celery, onions and potatoes may be used.
Put meat and vegetables in casserole.
Do not brown meat.
Blend 2 teaspoons salt, 1 tablespoon sugar and 3 tablespoons Minute tapioca. Sprinkle over meat and add 1 cup tomato juice.
Cover and bake for 4 hours at 250°.
Add 1 cup water.
Use more tapioca to thicken, if necessary.
Do not peek!

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Easy Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef stew meat
1 can tomato soup
1 can beef broth
1 can cream of celery soup
4 to 5 potatoes, cut up
3 carrots, cut up
1 can whole kernel corn
1 small onion, chopped
salt
pepper
2 bay leaves
Directions:
Combine all the ingredients in a slow cooker.
Cook on medium heat while you're at work (6 to 8 hours).
Dinner is ready when you get home.
(Make sure you remove the bay leaf.)

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: What'S Cooking?(Beef Stew For One)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. cubed beef sirloin
1 c. carrots
1 c. potatoes
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 tsp. horseradish
Directions:
Brown beef in butter.
Add soup, vegetables and horseradish. Let simmer until vegetables are soft.
Add water for desired thickness.
For more servings, add more vegetables, horseradish and another can of soup.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Beef Dish
Ingredients:
1 c. potatoes
1 c. carrots
1 c. peas
1 medium onion, diced
1 c. rice, cooked
1 lb. ground beef
1 qt. tomatoes
salt and pepper
Directions:
Mix well all ingredients and bake in oven 1 hour or longer on moderate degrees (350°) or you may top with grated cheese if desired.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef round steak, sliced thin
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut into pieces
3 medium carrots, sliced
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, thawed
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
Directions:
Cook broccoli and carrots about 2 minutes in boiling water; drain.
Mix cornstarch, salt, sugar, soy sauce and sherry; set aside.
Add oil to wok or pan over high heat and stir-fry broccoli, carrots and onions until crisp and tender.
Remove from wok.
Add beef and cook for 2 to 3 minutes.
Remove beef.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: Beef And Potato Bake
Ingredients:
4 c. frozen hash brown potatoes, thawed
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 lb. lean ground beef
1 pkg. brown gravy mix (3/4 oz.)
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1 c. water
1 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen mixed vegetables
4 oz. shredded Cheddar cheese
1 can Durkee fried onion rings
Directions:
In a shallow 1 1/2-quart baking dish, combine potatoes, oil and pepper.
Firmly press mixture across bottom and sides of dish to form a shell.
Bake, uncovered, at 400° for 15 minutes.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: One Dish Meal
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground chuck
4 medium onions
4 medium white potatoes (Irish)
4 medium carrots
Directions:
Divide meat in half.
Pat into 2 large patties on foil.
Cut onions, carrots and potatoes in bite size pieces on top of meat. Sprinkle salt and pepper on top to season.
Add margarine on top of vegetables.
Fold the aluminum foil up around meat and vegetables.
Place in shallow pan and cook in oven 1 hour at 400°. Serves 2.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Basic Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. lightly packed basil leaves
1 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. extra virgin olive oil
1/3 c. pine nuts
1 clove garlic
2 Tbsp. lemon juice (optional)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a blender and whirl smooth.
Toss well over hot cooked pasta.
Add additional cheese, if desired. Makes 1 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
3 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 c. fresh basil leaves, firmly packed
1/2 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. pine nuts or almonds
2 cloves fresh garlic
Directions:
Put all ingredients in blender or food processor.
Puree. Serve over hot pasta or fettuccini noodles.
Do not cook pesto or it will turn very dark.
Can be frozen and sliced off as needed for smaller amounts.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
3 c. packed fresh basil
2 to 3 cloves garlic
1/2 c. pinenuts or almonds
3/4 c. parsley
3/4 c. Parmesan
1/4 c. olive oil
1/4 c. melted butter
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in blender, starting at slow speed. Can be frozen and heated as needed.
Serve over pasta or on pizza.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. fresh basil leaves
2 to 5 cloves garlic, peeled
1/4 c. pine nuts
1/4 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice (if you want to cut calories) or 1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Put basil, garlic, pine nuts and Parmesan cheese in food processor or blender.
Turn machine on and drizzle in lemon juice or olive oil.
Continue to puree until a smooth paste is formed. This sauce is delicious to spoon on top of broiled salmon steaks.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. fresh basil leaves
1/4 c. pignoli nuts
1 clove garlic
1/2 c. olive oil
4 Tbsp. butter, whipped
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
grated Parmesan or Sardo cheese
Directions:
Put basil leaves, pignoli nuts, garlic and a little less than half of the oil in blender.
Blend about 30 seconds.
Add butter and 2 tablespoons of hot water.
Salt and pepper.
Gradually add remaining oil to thin.
Best served over egg or spinach fettucini noodles.
Sprinkle with grated Parmesan or Sardo cheese, if desired.

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground round
1 (16 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 small can tomato paste
1/4 to 1/2 green pepper, chopped
1/4 to 1/2 medium onion, chopped
1/4 tsp. garlic
oregano to taste
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Brown ground round.
Add chopped green pepper; stir.
Add chopped onion; stir.
Cover until softened, 5 minutes.
Add sauce and paste.
Add water until desired thickness.
Add garlic, oregano and pepper.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Serve over pasta. Freezes well.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Spaghetti Sauce For A Crowd
Ingredients:
8 lb. ground beef
3 cloves minced garlic
1 large onion, chopped
4 tsp. garlic salt
1 1/2 tsp. pepper
5 tsp. Italian seasoning
1 (No. 10) can crushed tomatoes
5 c. tomato sauce (1/2 of No. 10 can)
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 bay leaves
salt to taste
Directions:
Brown meat and drain.
Saute garlic and onion in olive oil. Add to meat.
Add remaining ingredients and simmer 2 to 3 hours, stirring often.
Add water if necessary to keep right consistency. Add olives, oregano or basil to taste.
Serves 50.

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Pasta Sauce(Large Pot)
Ingredients:
8 cans tomato sauce
2 large cans tomato paste
1 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3/4 Tbsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. thyme
1 Tbsp. basil
1/2 c. Italian cheese
Directions:
Saute onion in small amount of oil.
Add tomato paste.
Stir for a minute.
Add all other ingredients.
Then add 4 cans of water, using tomato paste can for measure.
Bring to boil.
Simmer 3 hours, stirring often.
Add 1/2 cup grated Italian cheese after cooking 1 hour.
(Meatballs can be made and cooked in sauce.)

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, sliced
1 to 2 stalks celery, chopped
1 green pepper, sliced
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
3 large green olives, chopped
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste, with 2 c. water*
2 Tbsp. parsley, snipped
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 bay leaf
1 tsp. dried oregano
Directions:
*Or, 1 (12 ounce) tomato sauce and 1 cup water or tomato paste and whole tomatoes and little water.

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Garlic Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
4 or 5 garlic cloves, sliced
1/4 c. onion, chopped
1/4 c. bell pepper, chopped
4 or 5 tomatoes, skinned and chopped
1/2 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat oil and brown garlic until light brown.
Add onion and bell
pepper;
cook
a
little and add tomatoes, salt and pepper. Simmer
for
5
minutes.
Add
water;
bring to boil. Reduce heat;
simmer
for 20 minutes.
Cook thin spaghetti or angel
hair pasta; drain.
Pour sauce over pasta; blend well. Sprinkle with grated Italian cheese.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken Thighs And Rice
Ingredients:
2 slices bacon
1 to 1 1/2 lb. chicken thighs (boneless)
1/2 c. long grain rice
1 small onion, cut into thin wedges
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can tomatoes, drained and cut up
1/2 c. quartered fresh mushrooms
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
1/4 tsp. dried basil, crushed
3 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In a 10-inch skillet cook bacon until crisp.
Drain, reserving drippings.
Crumble bacon and set aside.
Brown chicken in reserve drippings, about 10 minutes.
Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper.
Remove chicken from skillet.
Cook rice, onion wedges and garlic in skillet drippings until rice is golden brown.
Stir frequently.
Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms, wine, bouillon granules, salt, basil and 1 cup water.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Chicken
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. red wine
6 drumsticks
1 oz. ginger
1 bud garlic
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 to 3 c. water
2 potatoes, peeled and sliced
Directions:
Skin the chicken.
Remove the meat from the bones.
Cut meat into chunks (4 to 5 chunks from each leg).
Remove skin from each ginger.
Cut ginger into 4 to 5 slices.
Press 4 to 5 cloves of garlic flat.
Mix garlic, oil and ginger.
Deep fry for about 5 seconds on medium heat.
Add chicken and bones to vegetable mix. Continue frying on medium heat for 10 seconds.
Turn to high heat. Add wine.
Saute for 5 seconds.
Add water.
Heat until water boils.
Turn heat to low for 8 minutes.
Add salt, soy sauce and potatoes.
Cook for 20 minutes.
Remove bones.
Serve.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Grilled Chicken And Potato Dinner
Ingredients:
1-1/4 lb. red potatoes, cut into 2-inch chunks
2 tsp. olive oil
4 skewers
2 plum tomatoes, seeded and diced
3-1/2 Tbsp. oil-cured black olives, pitted and coarsely chopped
1 small lemon, peel grated, 2 tsp. juice reserved
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. parsley, chopped
1 tsp. lemon pepper seasoning
4 (4 oz.) chicken breast halves
Directions:
Prepare grill.
Place potatoes in a steamer basket over boiling water.
Cover pan and steam 10 minutes or until tender.
Drain, transfer to a bowl and toss with oil.
When cool enough to handle, thread potatoes onto skewers.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Rice
Ingredients:
oil
1 large or 2 medium onions, chopped fine
salt and pepper
2 or 3 cloves garlic
2 fresh medium tomatoes, chopped fine
8 to 10 chicken thighs
1 1/2 c. long grained rice
Directions:
In a large pot put enough oil to cover the bottom.
Put in chicken pieces and lightly brown.
Add garlic, onions, tomatoes, salt and pepper.
Cook with cover on for 1/2 hour.
Remove cover and cook until sauce is reduced and thick.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: One Pan Dinner
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts
1 large can green beans
1 large can Niblets corn
4 baking potatoes
1 can French fried onions
1/2 c. flour
3/4 c. margarine
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Salt and pepper chicken breast and flour.
In large flat oven grill pan, spread aluminum foil long enough to tent over all vegetables.
Place chicken at one end of pan.
Open beans and corn, drain, then dump separately in pan.
Place potatoes in pan next.
Spread onions over green beans.
Pour melted margarine over all ingredients, but make sure the chicken is coated with it. Tent foil over vegetables and bake in oven for 1 hour at 350°.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
1 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. oil
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. additional flour
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients in large bowl allowing yeast to soften.
Stir in oil and 2 cups flour.
Add more flour until dough holds together.
Grease your hands lightly and knead dough on floured board until smooth.
Cover and let rise 45 minutes.
Shape it to pans you are using or into individual disks all on greased pans.
Brush with sauce and cover with ingredients.
Let rise about 5 to 10 more minutes then bake in 425° oven for 15 minutes. This recipe also makes a nice French bread loaf.
My family makes individualized pizzas.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1/2 c. warm water
1 tsp. sugar
5 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 3/4 c. warm water
Directions:
Put yeast, warm water and sugar in a small bowl.
In a large bowl, add the flour, salt/yeast mixture and warm water.
Mix together, then on a floured surface, knead for a few minutes.
Put dough into a well-greased bowl.
Cover with wax paper.
Let rise for 1 hour, then spread dough onto a well-greased pizza pan or cookie sheet.
Let rise another 1/2 hour.
Bake at 350° or until crust is brown on bottom.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. quick rise yeast (two 1/4 oz. packets)
1 tsp. salt
8 oz. lukewarm water (1 c.)
1/2 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Combine flour, yeast, salt and sugar in mixing bowl and stir. Add vegetable oil and water.
Mix together all ingredients.
Knead by hand for 3 minutes; shape and put in bowl. Cover and let rise until double in volume (approximately 1/2 hour).
Punch down; divide into 2 equal pieces and shape into round balls or leave in one piece for 16-inch pizza.
Let dough rest for 4 minutes.
Roll out approximately 12 or 16-inches in diameter.
Spray pizza pan lightly with no stick vegetable cooking spray and wipe off excess. Place on pizza pan; let rise for 10 to 15 minutes.
Add sauce, toppings and cheese.
Place on bottom rack in cold oven; turn oven to 500° and bake 17 to 20 minutes, depending on oven.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
2 pkg. yeast
pinch of sugar
pinch of salt
1 c. warm water
1 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Mix first four ingredients.
Add water and oil.
Mix and knead until you are able to roll into a smooth ball.
Place in warm place with towel over it.
Let rise 30 minutes.
Punch down and let set for 4 minutes.
Roll out and place on pan and let rise for 15 minutes.
Add toppings (sauce, cheese, meats, veggies, etc.). Place pizza in cold oven, set temperature to 500° and bake for 15 to 17 minutes, or longer depending on your oven!
(This recipe works best on "Air-Pans.")

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 pkg. RapidRise
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 c. oil
3 c. flour (approximately)
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in warm water.
Mix in rest of the ingredients. Mix flour in 1 cup at a time.
Knead dough until almost not sticky.
Put in buttered bowl. Cover and let rise 30 minutes. Punch down.
Divide into 2 balls (add flour to hands as it will be sticky). Shape dough onto greased pizza dishes.
Bake at 400° for 25 minutes.
Makes 2 pizzas.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Homemade Peanut Butter
Ingredients:
1 c. roasted peanuts, with shells and skins removed
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Put peanuts into blender or food processor.
Gradually add 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil, blending until texture is thick and creamy.
Keep homemade peanut butter refrigerated.
If oil separates, stir back in with spoon.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Homemade Peanut Butter Candy
Ingredients:
3 c. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. milk
1/4 c. butter
1 tsp. vanilla
1 (18 oz.) jar Jif peanut butter (creamy)
Directions:
Combine peanut butter, sugar and salt in a large saucepan (3 quart size).
Add milk gradually; mix thoroughly and bring to a bubbly boil on high heat, stirring continuously.
Reduce heat to medium and continue to boil the mixture without stirring until it reaches a temperature of 232° or until a small amount of mixture forms a soft ball when dropped into cold water.
(Be sure bulb of thermometer is not resting on bottom of saucepan.)
Remove saucepan from heat; add butter and vanilla to mixture.
Do not stir.
Allow candy to cool at room temperature until it reaches 110°.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Homemade Peanut Butter
Ingredients:
1 c. salted, roasted Spanish peanuts
1 tsp. sugar or honey (these are optional)
1 Tbsp. peanut oil
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Place ingredients in an electric blender.
Blend until mixture becomes paste-like or speadable.
It may be necessary to add more peanut oil.
The ingredients must be blended for several minutes. Store in tightly covered container.
Homemade peanut butter will separate on standing; stir before using.
You may leave out the sugar and salt, if desired.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Squares
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. margarine, softened
1 c. white sugar
1 c. brown sugar
2 eggs
2 c. flour (plain)
2/3 c. peanut butter (smooth)
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. soda
2 c. oats
Directions:
Cream the margarine and sugar.
Mix eggs, peanut butter, vanilla, salt and soda.
Add flour and oats.
Spread dough in slightly greased 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake 20 to 24 minutes at 350°. While hot, cover with milk chocolate pieces and allow to melt before icing.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Temptations
Ingredients:
1 bag miniature peanut butter cups
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. peanut butter
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. white sugar
1 egg
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 1/4 c. flour
3/4 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cream butter, peanut butter and sugars; add egg and vanilla. Mix well.
Add flour, soda and salt.
Shape into 1-inch balls. Place in ungreased small muffin tins.
Bake at 375° for 8 minutes. Immediately after removing from oven, press peanut butter cup into center.
Cool 10 minutes and carefully remove from tin.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
2 c. sliced carrots
1 c. sliced celery
1 c. sliced onions
1 small turnip, peeled and diced (optional)
4 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
1 (16 oz.) can whole tomatoes, cut up
1 (16 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place raw ingredients in a 5-quart kettle and cover with salt and peppered water.
Cook until tender.
Add tomatoes and corn (these make the soup) and heat through.
Serve with a sandwich for lunch or a first course at dinner.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Vegetable Soup(Stone Soup)
Ingredients:
3/4 c. onion, sliced
2 c. diced potatoes
1 1/2 c. celery, sliced
3 qt. boiling water
1 1/2 c. diced carrots
5 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 c. string beans and peas
4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
macaroni, broken in small pieces
rice (if desired)
1 can condensed tomato soup
Directions:
Wash and cut vegetables.
Heat butter in skillet.
Add onions and celery and simmer until soft.
Remove from heat; slowly add 3 quarts of boiling water.
Add seasonings and vegetables, macaroni and rice; boil until vegetables are tender (about 20 or 30 minutes).
Add tomato soup; heat.
Add more water, if needed.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Potato-Cheese Soup(Serves 6)
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
4 c. chopped onions
1 clove garlic, minced
4 large potatoes (unpeeled), coarsely chopped
2 large carrots, chopped
6 c. vegetable stock or water
4 Tbsp. fresh dill
8 oz. cream cheese
3 c. milk
2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In large soup pot, saute onions and garlic in butter until onions are translucent.
Add potatoes and carrots; saute for 5 to 10 minutes longer.
Add stock and dill.
Simmer until all vegetables are tender.
Puree the vegetables with the cream cheese and milk in blender or food processor.
Return the soup to soup pot.
Season with salt and pepper.
Stir in Cheddar cheese and reheat gently.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Gwen'S Vegetarian Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. pinto beans (dry)
1/4 c. black-eyed peas
1/4 c. lentils
1/4 c. lima beans
1/2 c. navy beans
1/4 c. split peas (yellow or green)
1 c. chopped celery
2 medium onions, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can green beans (with juice)
2 large potatoes or turnips or both (optional)
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. rosemary
1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley or 3 Tbsp. dried parsley
3 large carrots, cut up
1 c. frozen corn
1 large can tomatoes (32 oz.) or combination of puree and tomato
1 tsp. salt or to taste
1 tsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. garlic powder or 2 fresh garlic cloves, minced
Directions:
Soak all dried beans except lentils and split peas overnight. Cook beans in about 4 cups water for about 1 hour.
(Not the lentils and split peas.)
If beans seem hard, cook awhile longer. Add lentils and split peas.
Simmer for 20 minutes. Add canned tomatoes, celery, carrots and onions and all spices and herbs. Simmer for 30 minutes. Add more water if too thick. Add potatoes and turnips (if adding). Simmer for 15 minutes. Add frozen corn and green beans. Simmer for about 10 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Soup (With Meat)
Ingredients:
3 lb. stew meat
1 bone (if possible)
1 qt. string beans
1 qt. tomatoes
1 can corn
1 can LeSueur peas
3 onions, chopped
6 good size potatoes, chopped
1/2 lb. okra
3 or 4 leaves mustard greens (optional)
1/3 stalk celery
4 carrots
1 qt. water
salt and pepper to taste
sugar to taste
1/4 c. rice
Directions:
Salt and pepper meat and brown (not with flour).
Place meat in large soup pot with 1 quart water.
Cook until tender.
Add string beans; cook 5 minutes.
Add potatoes, okra, celery, carrots and rice.
Cook until potatoes are tender, but not mushy.
Add all other ingredients and cook a while longer.
Good for company. Serve with corn muffins.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Almond-Spinach Pilaf(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 c. thawed frozen chopped spinach, squeezed dry
1/2 c. chopped scallions
1/4 c. chopped fresh dill
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
4 ___ uncooked rice
1 ___ whole almonds, coarsely chopped
1 1/4 c. low sodium beef broth
1 small navel orange, peeled and sectioned
Directions:
In a medium saucepan over medium heat, warm oil.
Add the spinach, scallions, dill, salt and pepper.
Cook, stirring frequently until vegetables are tender, about 2 minutes.
Add the rice and almonds; cook, stirring constantly until rice is well coated with oil, about 2 minutes.
Pour in broth and bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat to low and simmer until rice is tender, 20 minutes.
Gently stir in orange sections.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Beans
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
5 cloves garlic (whole), smashed
large bunch fresh spinach
1 (16 oz.) can cannellini beans
1 large tomato, cubed
1 (16 oz.) can garbanzo beans
1/4 tsp. oregano (leaf)
1/2 tsp. basil (leaf)
1 c. elbow macaroni
1/2 c. white wine
chopped fresh parsley
crusty bread
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
In 6 to 8 quart pot brown garlic in olive oil.
Steam spinach with cover on; add rest of ingredients.
Cook elbow macaroni and add to mixture.
Break to high simmer; add wine to boil off alcohol (1 to 2 minutes).
Serve in bowl; sprinkle with parsley and Parmesan cheese.
Enjoy with crusty bread.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Feta Spinach And Fruit Salad With Honey-Lemon Dressing
Ingredients:
5 c. torn fresh spinach
1 c. cantaloupe chunks
1 c. halved strawberries
1/2 c. thin-sliced red onion rings
1 c. crumbled Feta natural cheese
1/4 c. pitted ripe olives
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. honey
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place spinach, fruit, onion, cheese and olives in large bowl. Toss lightly.
Mix remaining ingredients; add and toss.
Makes 6 cups or 6 side-salad servings.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpeas Indian Style
Ingredients:
2 cans chickpeas
2 peeled medium onions, cut in quarters
1 1/4 inch long piece fresh ginger, peeled
1 green chili or 2 dried small red chilies
3 or 4 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. nigella seed (black onion seed)
1 tsp. mustard seed
1 tsp. powdered coriander
1/2 tsp. powdered red pepper (if desired)
small can tomatoes, broken up
salt to taste
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Open cans of chickpeas and drain, reserving liquid.
In blender or food processor place onions, ginger, chilies and garlic.
Blend this all together into a puree.
In heavy saucepan, heat 2 to 3 tablespoons oil briefly.
Add cumin, nigella and mustard seed.
The seed should pop and crackle.
(Do not let burn.)
Pour in blender contents.
Fry, stirring, until color turns golden.
Add coriander, tomatoes, salt, lemon juice and red pepper (if desired).
Mix well and gently mix drained chickpeas into the spice-onion mixture. Then add liquid from cans.
Cover and let simmer about 40 minutes. Tastes better the next day.
A good dish for vegetarians, too.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Felafel
Ingredients:
2 (15 oz.) cans chickpeas
4 medium cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. finely minced onion or 6 scallions
1/2 c. minced parsley
1/4 c. water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. flour
a few dashes cayenne
oil for frying
Directions:
Rinse chickpeas and drain.
Combine all ingredients besides flour in a food processor or bowl.
Mash to a uniform batter.
Add flour, stir thoroughly.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta
Ingredients:
sun-dried tomatoes
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. tomatoes, peeled, seeded and diced
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/4 c. sun-dried tomatoes
1 Tbsp. Italian parsley, chopped
salt and pepper
pasta (except spaghetti or linguine)
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Heat oil in skillet; add garlic and saute 1 minute.
Add tomatoes; heat to boiling.
Stir until thickens, about 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and sun-dried tomatoes and simmer about 5 minutes.
Add salt and pepper.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Fresh Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
2 tsp. olive oil
3 tomatoes, peeled and seeded
1/2 tsp. salt
12 oz. pasta, cooked
1/2 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. leaf basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Saute onion in olive oil in a large nonstick skillet until golden.
Add tomatoes and simmer until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Add broth, basil and oregano, simmer to thicken sauce, 5 to 7 minutes.
Stir in salt and pepper.
Serve over hot, cooked pasta. Sprinkle with cheese.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Baked Tomato Pasta
Ingredients:
12 medium Roma tomatoes
3 to 6 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/2 c. olive oil
1 lb. dry spaghetti, cooked according to directions
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, at room temperature
1/2 c. fresh whole or 2 Tbsp. basil leaves
Directions:
Cut tomatoes in half lengthwise; set cut side up in a 9 x 13-inch baking pan.
Sprinkle lightly with salt and pepper.
Mix garlic with 1/3 cup parsley and 2 tablespoons olive oil; pat mixture over cut side of tomatoes.
Drizzle 2 tablespoons of olive oil over tomatoes.
Bake at 425° for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Tomatoes
Ingredients:
2 large tomatoes, chopped
2 Tbsp. fresh basil or 2 tsp. dried basil
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 oz. bow tie pasta or spaghetti, cooked and drained
fresh basil and grated Parmesan cheese (optional)
Directions:
Combine tomatoes, basil, garlic, salt and pepper; set aside at room temperature for several hours.
Serve over hot pasta.
If desired, garnish with basil and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Vodka And Tomato Cream Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small onion, chopped
1 (28 oz.) can Italian plum tomatoes, chopped
1 1/2 c. whipping cream
1/3 c. vodka
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1 lb. pasta, dried (preferably penne or rigatoni)
freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Melt butter and oil in pan.
Add onion and saute until translucent, about 8 minutes.
Add tomatoes and cook until reduce to almost no liquid remains in pan, about 25 minutes.
Add cream, vodka and red pepper.
Boil until thickened, about 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Butter
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. minced green onion
1 c. dry wine
1/2 c. butter, softened
2 tsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook onion and wine in a small saucepan until the liquid is reduced to 1/4 cup.
Remove from heat and cool.
With beater, cream butter and parsley.
Gradually beat in the wine mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Makes 3/4 cup butter.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Butter
Ingredients:
1/2 c. margarine, at room temperature
1/2 c. butter, at room temperature
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. basil
1 tsp. hickory salt
1 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chopped olives or green onion tops
Directions:
Mix altogether and serve over cooked steak.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Garlic Steak
Ingredients:
2 lb. boneless round steak (1-inch thick)
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 onions, sliced
1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley
8 cloves garlic, crushed
2 (10 3/4 oz.) cans chicken broth
1 1/2 c. water
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
hot cooked noodles
Directions:
Dredge steak in flour; pound to 1/2-inch thickness.
Cut steak into serving size pieces.
Brown steaks in hot oil in a Dutch oven.
Remove from skillet and set aside.
Add onion to pan drippings; saute until tender.
Return steak to Dutch oven; add remaining ingredients except noodles.
Cover.
Reduce heat and simmer 1 1/2 to 2 hours or until steak is tender.
Serve over noodles.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Grilled Steak With Herb Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. minced fresh shallots
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh chives
1 tsp. chopped fresh tarragon
1/2 tsp. coarsely ground pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. softened butter
4 beef porterhouse or T-Bone steaks
Directions:
In 1-quart saucepan, stir all ingredients except butter and steaks.
Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until all liquid has evaporated (5 to 6 minutes).
Set aside and cool completely.
In small bowl, stir together butter and cooked, cooled herbs.
Place mixture on waxed paper; shape into 4-inch log.
Refrigerate until serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Lemon-Garlic Round Steak
Ingredients:
1 (about 2 lb.) top round steak (1 1/2 inches thick)
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic, split
1 small lemon (unpeeled), cut into wedges
2 Tbsp. firmly packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Place meat in shallow dish.
Heat oil.
Add garlic and lemon. Saute until lemon peel is lightly browned.
Pierce meat deeply at intervals with fork.
Pour hot oil over meat.
Place lemon and garlic pieces around steak.
Turn meat in marinade.
Cover. Marinate at room temperature for 1 to 2 hours or in refrigerator for 6 to 12 hours.
Turn meat 2 or 3 times.
Remove steak.
Reserve marinade.
Place steak on broiler rack.
Broil 4 to 5 inches from heat for 5 minutes until browned.
Turn; brown other side about 5 minutes.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
3 garlic cloves, smashed and chopped
1 1/2 green peppers, cut into thin strips
salt and pepper
1 large lemon, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Heat butter in large frying pan.
Add shrimp and cook 2 minutes on each side over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and season well. Continue cooking for 1 minute.
Stir in green peppers and diced lemon.
Cook 1 more minute.
Add parsley, paprika, salt and pepper. Mix and serve.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. (12 oz.) frozen, peeled, deveined, quick cooking shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup. Microwave at high 30-45 second, until melted. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
12 oz. shrimp, peeled and deveined *
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. dry sherry
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
Directions:
Thaw shrimp, if frozen.
In a large skillet, heat margarine over medium high heat.
Add shrimp and garlic.
Cook, stirring frequently for 1 to 3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink.
Stir in parsley and sherry.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter(Microwave; Easy)
Ingredients:
1/2 stick butter
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 (12 oz.) pkg. frozen, peeled and deveined shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in microwave-safe dish (8 or 9-inch); a Corning Ware dish works great.
Heat butter 35 to 45 seconds to melt. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.
Place shrimp in colander; run cold water over to clean and separate.
Drain.
Stir shrimp into butter mixture to evenly coat.
Cover tightly with plastic wrap.
Microwave 6 to 8 minutes on High.
Stir every 2 minutes.
When shrimp are tender and opaque, let stand 1 1/2 minutes before serving.
Serve with toothpicks.
Fresh shrimp may be used if deveined and peeled.
Makes 1 1/2 to 2 cups.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. frozen shrimp, peeled
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup.
Microwave on High for 30 to 40 seconds until melted.
Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes. Separate shrimp and place in 9 or 10-inch diameter dish.
Pour butter mixture over shrimp evenly.
Cover tightly.
Microwave 5 to 8 minutes until shrimp are opaque, stirring every 2 minutes.
Let stand, covered, for 1 to 2 minutes.
Serve over noodles or some form of pasta.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 loaf Italian bread
garlic powder
1/2 c. fresh garlic
1/2 c. butter
Directions:
Cut loaf in half lengthwise.
Put butter on both halves.
Put a thin layer of fresh garlic evenly on both halves.
Lightly shake garlic powder on both halves.
Place both halves on a sheet pan and cook under the broiler for 3 to 4 minutes or until light golden brown.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 slice bread
garlic salt
butter
Directions:
Spread butter on bread.
Sprinkle on garlic.
Put into preheated oven at 325°.
Cook for 3 to 5 minutes.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 unsliced loaf French bread
1 lb. butter
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 Tbsp. parsley
1 small onion, diced
Directions:
Melt butter in a saucepan.
Add parsley, onion and garlic.
Cut bread in half (longways).
Brush on butter mixture over both halves of bread.
Bake at 325° on a cookie sheet for 10 to 15 minutes or until brown.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 stick soft butter
4 cloves fresh garlic, minced
1 large loaf Italian bread
1 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. olive oil
Directions:
Mix together the butter and fresh garlic.
Slice bread in half lengthwise.
Butter insides of each half with butter mixture. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Rub outside of bread with olive oil; wrap in foil.
Bake at 350° for 15 minutes.
Also good with Mozzarella cheese.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Bread Sticks
Ingredients:
1 (9-inch) loaf unsliced bread
1/2 c. butter, softened
2 cloves garlic, minced
3 to 4 Tbsp. sesame seed, toasted
Directions:
Trim crust from bread.
Cut loaf of bread in half lengthwise, then into 8 equal crosswise slices.
Combine butter and garlic; mix well.
Spread on all sides of each 8-inch slice.
Arrange on 15 x 12-inch cookie sheet.
Sprinkle with seed.
Bake at 400° for 10 minutes, or until lightly browned.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
3 lb. pork, cubed
2 c. onions, chopped
3 green bell peppers, chopped
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. vinegar
6 oz. can tomato paste
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in slow cooker; cover and cook on high 8 hours. Shred meat with fork. Mix into sauce and heat through. Serve on hamburger/sandwich buns with grated cheese and cole slaw on top.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Chops
Ingredients:
6 pork chops
1 can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 medium onion, chopped
3 Tbsp. ketchup
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Brown chops and remove from pan. Combine remaining ingredients and heat in pan in which chops were browned.
Layer chops and sauce in slow cooker or heavy Dutch oven.
Either bake, covered, in a 350° oven for 1 hour or in slow cooker on high setting until bubbly, then simmer on low until tender and sauce is consistency of gravy, 5 or 6 hours.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Pork And Beef
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef stew
1 1/2 lb. pork cubes
2 c. chopped onion
3 green peppers, chopped
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. cider vinegar
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 c. chili powder
2 tsp. Worcestershire
Directions:
In a 3 1/2 to 5-quart slow cooker, cover and cook on high (300°) for 8 hours.
Stir with wire whisk until meat is shredded. Serve on buns.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Kalua Pork
Ingredients:
3 to 5 lb. pork butt (with or without bone)
2 c. water
1 Tbsp. liquid smoke
2 to 3 Tbsp. Hawaiian salt
Directions:
Place pork fat side up in slow cooker (crock-pot).
Combine water and liquid smoke; pour over meat and sprinkle with salt. Cover and cook on medium 8 to 12 hours; remove pork butt from cooker and shred, then add the juices from the cooker (at least 1 cup; the flavor is in the juice).
Ready to eat.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Pork Chop Casserole
Ingredients:
4 to 6 pork chops
3 c. water
1 c. rice (uncooked)
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Brown pork chops in skillet, then put into slow cooker. Mix remaining ingredients and pour over pork chops. Cover and cook on low 6 to 8 hours or high 3 to 4 hours.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef chuck, cubed
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 to 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. paprika
1 1/2 c. beef broth
1/2 garlic clove, minced
1 bay leaf
4 carrots, sliced
2 onions, chopped
1 rib celery
3 potatoes, diced
Directions:
Place meat in slow cooker. Combine flour, salt, pepper and paprika. Stir into meat until coated. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well. Cover. Cook on low 10 to 12 hours or high 4 to 6 hours. Stir and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef cubes, cut into small pieces
4 small cans beef broth
2 envelopes Knorr classic brown gravy
as little or as much carrots as desired
as little or as much potatoes as desired
as little or as much celery as desired
2 medium onions, cut
flour
garlic salt to taste
Directions:
Put beef cubes in a bowl with flour, a little black pepper and garlic salt.
Coat beef cubes.
Brown beef cubes in hot oil on top of stove.
When brown, put beef cubes in slow cooker.
Mix in remaining ingredients; cook on medium-high for 7 hours or on high for 5 hours or until vegetables are tender.
Enjoy with hot French bread.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef-Vegetable Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 large can crushed tomatoes (undrained)
3 Tbsp. quick cooking tapioca
2 Tbsp. dried basil
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 lb. red potatoes, cut into 1-inch cubes
3 medium carrots, cut into 1-inch slices
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 1/2 lb. lean chuck roast, cut into 1-inch cubes
2 tsp. canola oil
Directions:
In a bowl, combine tomatoes, tapioca, basil, sugar, salt and pepper; let this stand for 15 to 20 minutes. Put potatoes, carrots, onion and celery in large slow cooker.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Slow Baked Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef stew meat
1 medium onion, cut up
1 stalk celery
6 carrots
6 cut up potatoes
2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. tapioca (Minute tapioca)
1 c. tomato juice
1 c. water
Directions:
More celery, onions and potatoes may be used.
Put meat and vegetables in casserole.
Do not brown meat.
Blend 2 teaspoons salt, 1 tablespoon sugar and 3 tablespoons Minute tapioca. Sprinkle over meat and add 1 cup tomato juice.
Cover and bake for 4 hours at 250°.
Add 1 cup water.
Use more tapioca to thicken, if necessary.
Do not peek!

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Easy Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef stew meat
1 can tomato soup
1 can beef broth
1 can cream of celery soup
4 to 5 potatoes, cut up
3 carrots, cut up
1 can whole kernel corn
1 small onion, chopped
salt
pepper
2 bay leaves
Directions:
Combine all the ingredients in a slow cooker.
Cook on medium heat while you're at work (6 to 8 hours).
Dinner is ready when you get home.
(Make sure you remove the bay leaf.)

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 egg
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
maple syrup
Directions:
Beat egg.
Combine flour, baking powder, soda, salt and sugar. Add egg.
Add buttermilk and oil, beating until mixture is smooth.
For each pancake, pour about 1/4 cup batter onto a hot, lightly greased griddle.
Turn pancakes when tops are covered with bubbles and edges look cooked.
Serve with maple syrup.
Yields 8 (4-inch) pancakes.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Favorite Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. sifted all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. soda
2 tsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 beaten egg
1 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. salad oil or melted shortening
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder, sugar, soda and salt. Combine egg, milk and salad oil; add to dry ingredients, stirring just until flour is moistened (batter will be lumpy).
Bake on hot griddle.
Makes about 12 dollar size or eight (4-inch) pancakes.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Light Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 to 2 Tbsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. soda
1 c. buttermilk
1 egg, beaten
1 to 2 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients.
Combine remaining ingredients.
Add to dry ingredients, stirring just until flour is moistened (batter will be lumpy).
Bake on hot griddle.
Yield:
4 to 5 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted all-purpose flour
1 tsp. each: soda and salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 slightly beaten eggs
2 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients.
Add remaining ingredients. Stir just until moistened.
(There will be a few lumps.)
Bake on hot, lightly-greased griddle.
For uniform cakes, use 1/4 cup measure.
Turn cakes when bubbles on surface break.
Serve with Whipped Orange Butter and syrup.
Makes about 1 1/2 dozen 4-inch cakes.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1/4 c. sugar
2 1/4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt and baking soda
2 eggs
2 c. buttermilk
1/4 c. melted butter plus some for frying
Directions:
In large bowl, sift together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Beat eggs with buttermilk and melted butter. Combine dry and wet ingredients; do not overmix. Heat butter in skillet over medium heat. Spoon 1/3 cup of batter into skillet. Cook 2 to 3 minutes on each side. Serve with whipped cream and syrup.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) broiler fryer chicken
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder with parsley
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoning salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.
Place chicken in ovenproof dish and bake, uncovered, in a 375° oven for 1 hour or until done.
Yields 4 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. broiler-fryer chicken
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoning salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.
Place chicken in ovenproof dish and bake.
Top with garlic cloves.
Bake in 375° oven for 1 hour or until done.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) fryer chicken
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder with parsley
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoned salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.
Place chicken in ovenproof dish and bake, uncovered, in a 375° oven for 1 hour or until chicken is done.
Serves 4.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon-Garlic Chicken(Low Calorie)
Ingredients:
1 garlic clove, minced
2 tsp. reduced calorie margarine
3 oz. uncooked chicken cutlets, cut into 1-inch cubes
1/2 c. frozen peas, thawed
2 tsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. white wine
parsley, minced
Directions:
In a nonstick skillet, saute first 2 ingredients.
Add remaining ingredients.
Cook, covered, for 25 minutes or until done (cooking time is 25 or 30 minutes).
Serves one.
(I use green peas.)

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Garlic Chicken
Ingredients:
4 boneless chicken breasts
1/2 c. melted butter
2 cloves garlic, chopped
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
small can mushrooms
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place butter in square baking dish.
Melt in microwave.
Add lemon juice and garlic.
Place chicken in mixture.
Cover with mushrooms, salt and pepper.
Cover pan with aluminum foil.
Cook at 350° for 45 minutes.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Mashed Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 sweet potatoes
1/4 c. sugar
1 stick margarine, softened
2/3 c. milk
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
Place the sweet potatoes in a large pot. Cover with water about 4-inches over the top of the potatoes.
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Cook 30 minutes.
When slightly cooled, peel potatoes.
Place in a large bowl.
Mash well or use a mixer until all lumps are gone.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Place potatoes in a buttered casserole dish (2 to 3 quarts). Bake in preheated 350° oven for 25 minutes.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. sweet potatoes, peeled and cooked
4 eggs, lightly beaten
1/2 c. orange juice
1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg
dash of salt
miniature marshmallows
Directions:
In a large bowl, mash sweet potatoes.
Add eggs, orange juice, butter, sugar, vanilla, nutmeg and salt; mix well.
Transfer to a greased 3-quart baking dish.
Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes or until set.
Top with marshmallows.
Return to oven until they just begin to puff and melt, about 5 to 10 minutes.
Yield:
10 to 12 servings.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Mashed Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 to 4 sweet potatoes, cooked
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
frozen orange juice concentrate (undiluted)
Directions:
Mash the cooked sweet potatoes.
Add margarine or butter and orange juice concentrate; beat until the mixture is smooth. Adjust the butter and juice concentrate until the desired taste is achieved.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 (40 oz.) can sweet potatoes, drained and mashed
1 1/3 c. sugar
2 eggs
3/4 stick butter (6 Tbsp.), melted
dash of salt
1 c. evaporated milk
Directions:
Mix and pour into large pan and bake 25 minutes at 350°. Remove from oven.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
sweet potatoes, cooked
3/4 c. sugar
3/4 c. butter or margarine
2 eggs
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. Pet milk or regular milk
Directions:
Mash
sweet
potatoes
and
mix in all the ingredients. Bake until
firm and browned on top.
Then add topping and let cook for 15 minutes on 375°.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Easy Granola Mix
Ingredients:
5 c. quick-cooking rolled oats
1 1/2 c. wheat germs
1 c. shredded coconut
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. maple syrup
1/2 butter, melted
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. raisins and/or chopped walnuts
Directions:
Mix oats, wheat germ, coconut, brown sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl. Add maple syrup and mix well. Stir together melted butter and vanilla and mix in the mixture. Turn into a large shallow pan. Bake at 325° for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring after 10 minutes. Cool. Add raisins and/or nuts. Store in airtight container.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Simple Granola
Ingredients:
3 c. 3 minute oats or old fashioned oats
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 c. sunflower nuts
1/2 c. slivered almonds
1/2 c. chopped pecans
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. coconut
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. honey
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except oil and honey in large mixing bowl.
Mix oil and honey together; pour over oat mixture.
Mix well.
Spread into 2 (15 x 10 x 1-inch) baking pans.
Bake in a 300° oven for about 20 minutes, stirring once.
Remove from pan when cool.
Store in tightly covered container.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
5 c. quick oats
3/4 c. brown sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. dry milk
1/3 c. honey
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
pinch of salt
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Place 1/4 cup of mung beans in a quart jar and cover with tepid water.
Cover with cheesecloth and tie securely.
Soak overnight.
Drain water off.
Set in a warm, dark place.
Every day, rinse with tepid water and drain.
Place in a warm dark place again.
Repeat 4 to 5 days or until sprouts are as big as you want.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Granola(Kids Recipe)
Ingredients:
4 c. old-fashioned oatmeal, uncooked
1 1/2 c. wheat germ (raw or toasted)
1 c. coconut, grated
1/4 c. nonfat dry milk
2 Tbsp. cinnamon
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. honey
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. slivered almonds
1 c. raisins
Directions:
In a large bowl, mix dry ingredients.
Combine oil, honey and vanilla in a saucepan and warm.
Add these to the dry ingredients and stir until all the particles are coated.
(Hand mixing works well here).
Spread this mixture in a long, low pan or rimmed baking sheet that has been sprayed with vegetable shortening. Bake at 250° for an hour, turning with spatula every 15 minutes. When finished toasting, add raisins and toss.
Cool and store in an airtight container.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
2 c. old fashioned oats
1 1/2 c. chopped almonds
1 c. shredded coconut
1/2 c. toasted wheat germ
1 tsp. salt
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Preheat
oven
to
300°.
In a large bowl combine oats, almonds, coconut,
wheat
germ and salt.
Stir in milk and oil and mix
thoroughly.
Spread
on
a
wax-paper
lined shallow baking pan and bake, stirring occasionally for 1 hour or until golden. Stir
in
raisins.	Let
cool
and	store in airtight containers. Makes 7 1/2 cups.
(And it's delicious too!)

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Dip
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) carton low-fat cottage cheese
1 Tbsp. low-fat buttermilk
1 Tbsp. minced onions
1/2 tsp. dried whole dill weed
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
2 drops Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in container of an electric blender; process until smooth.
Chill.
Spoon dip into a serving bowl and serve with assorted vegetables.
Serving size is 1 tablespoon (11 calories per serving).

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Quick Fruit Dip(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1 1/3 c. plain low-fat yogurt
1/4 c. orange marmalade
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
6 c. assorted fresh fruits
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients.
Cover and chill.
Serve with assorted fresh fruits.
Yields 1 1/2 cups dip.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Ranch Style Dip(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1 c. low-fat cottage cheese
2 Tbsp. skim milk
1/2 c. plain low-fat yogurt
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/8 tsp. onion powder
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Position knife blade in food processor bowl; add cottage cheese and milk.
Process about 45 seconds until smooth.
Fold in yogurt and remaining ingredients.
Cover and chill thoroughly. Serve with assorted fresh vegetables.
Yields 1 1/2 cups. Contains 1.5 g protein, 2 g fat, 7 g carbohydrates.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Diet Vegetable Dip
Ingredients:
2 c. cottage cheese (low-fat)
2 Tbsp. skim milk
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1/2 tsp. grated onions
2 tsp. lemon juice
garlic powder
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of sweetener
Directions:
Blend all in blender until smooth.
Makes 2 cups basic dip.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Dip
Ingredients:
1/2 c. creamed low-fat cottage cheese
1 Tbsp. carrot, finely grated
2 tsp. onion, finely grated
1 tsp. green pepper, finely grated
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
dash of pepper
1 c. plain low-fat yogurt
Directions:
Mix all ingredients, except yogurt, until smooth.
Fold in yogurt.
Cover and chill.
Serve as a dip with a variety of raw vegetables. Yields 1 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Crispy Crisps
Ingredients:
1 box puff pastry
1 egg
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. water
poppy seed, sesame seed or Cajun seasoning (optional)
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Thaw pastry.
Roll one sheet at a time into an 18 x 10-inch size pan.
In a cup beat 1 egg; add salt and water and beat.
Brush pastry with egg mixture.
Sprinkle your choice of remaining ingredients over pastry.
Cut crosswise into 1/4-inch strips.
Place on large cookie sheet.
Bake 8 to 10 minutes.
When cool, store in airtight container.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Bake
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. broccoli or California Blend
3/4 lb. cubed Velveeta
3/4 c. crushed buttery crackers
2 Tbsp. margarine
Directions:
Mix broccoli and Velveeta; spoon into greased 10 x 6-inch baking dish.
Sprinkle with crumbs; dot with margarine.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Crispy Cheese Squares
Ingredients:
1 c. soft butter or margarine
1 1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
dash of cayenne pepper
1 1/2 c. crisp rice cereal
Directions:
In bowl combine butter with cheese.
Blend in flour and cayenne pepper.
Mix in cereal.
Press into a buttered 8 or 9-inch cake pan.
Bake at 375° for 15 to 20 minutes until crisp.
Cool and cut into bars.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Crispy Bars
Ingredients:
1 c. white Karo syrup
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. nutty peanut butter
1 c. nuts (any kind)
5 or 6 c. Crispix cereal
Directions:
Cook first three ingredients until melted.
Can be microwaved or cooktop.
Add nuts and cereal.
Stir very well and pour into greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Cool and cut in squares.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Cheese Crispies
Ingredients:
1 cup butter or margarine (softened)
1 1/2 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese
1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
dash pepper
1 1/2 cups crisp rice cereal
Directions:
Cream butter with cheese.
Blend in flour and pepper.
Mix in cereal.
Press into buttered 8 or 9 inch cake pan.
Bake at 375 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until crisp.
Cool and cut into bars.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce (optional)
2 avocados, peeled and chopped
6 hard boiled eggs, chopped
1 c. chopped tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped red onions
1/4 cup fresh parsley or cilantro
Directions:
In a medium bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, salt and hot pepper sauce until well blended. Toss lightly with remaining ingredients until evenly coated with dressing. Cover - chill to blend flavors.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Eggs
Ingredients:
1 large ripe avocado
8 hard-cooked eggs, cut in half
1/2 c. softened cream cheese
pinch of salt and pepper
lemon juice
Directions:
Mash yolks of eggs with fork.
Add the cheese, 3/4 avocado, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Stuff the egg whites.
Slice remaining avocado thinly.
Put thin slice of avocado on top of eggs.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Egg And Avocado Dip
Ingredients:
1 ripe avocado, diced in small pieces
2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped fine
2 anchovies, cut fine
1/2 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Mix well and refrigerate.
Serve on crackers or as dip.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
4 hard-cooked shelled eggs, diced
4 strips bacon, fried, drained and crumbled
1 Tbsp. minced onion
2 large avocados, halved and pitted
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. bottled mustard or to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine eggs, bacon and onion.
Cut and scoop avocado pulp and mash with a fork or large plate.
Stir in mayonnaise, lemon juice, prepared mustard and salt.
Add egg mixture; spoon into pretty glass cups.
Garnish with leaf of lettuce.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Omelet
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. sour cream
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
2 large tomatoes, peeled and chopped
1 avocado, diced
8 eggs, slightly beaten
1/3 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Heat sour cream, salt and pepper in double boiler.
Add tomatoes and avocado.
Heat for another 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, blend the beaten eggs with milk and salt.
Pour into heated butter in skillet and cook gently, lifting edges occasionally to let uncooked part run underneath.
When set, pour half of sauce mixture over omelet and fold over.
Place on hot platter and pour on the rest of the sauce.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Party Appetizers
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground chuck
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. taco sauce
1 to 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Mix raw chuck with seasonings.
Spread on thin party rye bread.
Place in oven at 450° until brown.
Serve hot.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Party Casserole
Ingredients:
8 oz. medium egg noodles
3 qt. water
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 c. chopped onion
1 green pepper, chopped
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 c. sour cream
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. cubed, cooked chicken
2 c. cubed, cooked ham
1 c. ripe or pimento-stuffed olives, halved
4 oz. diced pimentos
1 can artichoke hearts, drained and halved
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Add egg noodles and salt to rapidly boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender; drain.
Saute onion in butter or margarine until tender, stir in green pepper and cook 1 minute longer.
In large bowl blend mushroom soup, sour cream, salt and pepper, chicken, ham, olives, pimentos and artichoke hearts.
Mix gently, spoon into buttered 3-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with buttered crumbs.
Bake at 325° for 1 hour, serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Appetizer Tidbits
Ingredients:
1 (18 oz.) Kraft barbecue sauce
1 lb. ground beef
1 c. torn fresh bread
1 egg
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 tsp. salt
oil
1 (8 1/4 oz.) can pineapple chunks, drained
1 (5 1/2 oz.) pkg. cocktail franks or 1/2 lb. hot dogs, sliced
1 c. green pepper chunks
1 (6 oz.) can water chestnuts, undrained
Directions:
Combine 2 tablespoons barbecue sauce, meat, bread, egg, onion and salt.
Mix lightly.
Shape into 30 (1-inch) balls.
Brown in oil.
Add remaining barbecue sauce, pineapple chunks, frankfurters, green pepper and water chestnuts.
Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until meatballs are thoroughly heated.
Serve hot.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Party Hot Dish
Ingredients:
2 c. ring macaroni, uncooked
1 tsp. grated onion
2 1/2 c. milk
2 cans mushroom soup
1 small bottle sliced stuffed olives or 1 green pepper
1 1/4 c. grated cheese
1 can pimento, minced
2 tsp. butter
1 c. slivered almonds
2 c. chopped ham or 2 pkg. dried beef or 2 cans tuna fish or 2 cans shrimp
Directions:
Mix ingredients in a large bowl.
Pour into casserole.
Bake 1 hour at 350°.
This can be mixed in advance and kept in refrigerator overnight.
If you do this, add the almonds just before putting in the oven.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Party Pizza Appetizers(Makes 90)
Ingredients:
1 lb. hot sausage, cooked, drained and crumbled
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. sharp cheese, grated
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese (from wedge)
1 1/2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
3 cans flaky biscuits
Directions:
Combine all ingredients, except biscuits.
Separate each biscuit into 3 pizza rounds.
Spread with mixture.
Put pizza on cookie sheet and store in plastic bags.
Bake frozen pizzas at 425° for 10 minutes.
Great for a cocktail party.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/4 c. light cream
2 egg yolks, beaten
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Place butter in a 4-cup glass bowl.
Microwave on High for 1 minute or until butter is melted.
Add remaining ingredients. Beat with electric mixer until smooth.
Cook on medium for 1 minute, beating every 15 seconds until thickened.
Remove from oven and beat with mixer until light and smooth.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. liquid Butter Buds
1 c. boiling water
1/2 tsp. lite salt (optional)
1 Tbsp. flour
2 Egg Beaters, beaten
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Combine Butter Buds and flour in saucepan; add boiling water, stirring constantly.
Cook over low heat.
Beat Egg Beaters, salt, and lemon juice together.
Add some of the first mixture to this before slowly adding to the Butter Buds, flour, and water.
Cook until the spoon is well coated.
This is delicious, easy to make, and will keep well.
It is just as good warmed over as it is fresh off the stove.
Yields 1 1/2 cups (six 1/2-cup servings).

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
4 egg yolks
1 c. butter
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of cayenne
Directions:
Put egg yolks with 1/3 of the butter in the top of a double boiler. Keep water in bottom of pot hot, but not boiling. Stir the mixture constantly. When butter melts, add another portion and as it melts and the mixture begins to thicken, add the rest of the butter, stirring all the time. As soon as the mixture is thick, remove from heat and add seasonings. This sauce is delicious served over vegetables.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Sauce Hollandaise
Ingredients:
12 Tbsp. butter
3 egg yolks
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. hard butter
1 Tbsp. heavy cream
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Melt 12 tablespoons butter and set aside, keeping it warm. In separate saucepan, whisk egg yolks until thick, then beat in the tablespoon lemon juice.
Place that pan over low heat and stir in the 1 tablespoon hard butter.
When blended, remove pan from low heat and beat in cream; add melted butter slowly. Whisk constantly.
Makes 1 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
2 beaten egg yolks
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. melted butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. hot water
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Into top of a double boiler, over boiling water, add all ingredients.
Keep stirring constantly.
Begins to thicken in about 5 minutes.
Makes 1 cup.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
3/4 c. cold water
3 eggs, separated
1 1/4 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Beat egg whites stiff.
Set aside.
Put cold water in a large bowl.
Add egg yolks.
Beat until light.
Add sugar and beat 7 minutes (do not fail here; this is the secret of a light cake). Sift flour twice. Add baking powder and salt. Add dry ingredients to egg yolk mixture. Add egg whites. Fold carefully and add vanilla.
Pour into ungreased tube pan and bake 45 minutes in a 350° oven.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
6 eggs, separated
1 1/2 c. sugar
6 Tbsp. cold water
1 1/2 c. flour (plain)
1/4 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Beat egg yolks until thick.
Add sugar and beat until smooth. Add flour and water, alternately, beating constantly.
Add vanilla.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake(Small)
Ingredients:
3 eggs, separated
1 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. baking powder
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. warm water
1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Put yolks in a bowl.
Add warm water and beat until very light, almost filling a large bowl.
Add gradually the cup of sugar and keep beating until very creamy.
Stir in the flour and beat the egg whites to a froth.
Fold them into the sponge cake mixture.
Then add the salt, vanilla and baking powder.
Pour into ungreased tube and bake 40 or 50 minutes.
Very slowly the first 15 minutes (250°) and then increase temperature to 350°.
Turn upside down on a clean towel and cover pan with the towel so the cooling will be gradual.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
6 egg yolks
1 1/2 c. sugar
2/3 c. cold water
2 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. lemon extract
1 tsp. lemon rind, grated
6 egg whites
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Heat oven to 325°; have ready an ungreased 10-inch tube pan. Sift together flour, baking powder and salt.
Beat egg yolks in small bowl until very thick and lemon colored.
Pour beaten egg yolks into large bowl and beat in sugar gradually.
Beat in dry ingredients alternately with water and flavorings.
Beat egg whites and cream of tartar in large bowl until stiff.
Fold egg yolk mixture into beaten whites.
Pour in pan.
Bake 60 to 65 minutes.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
6 eggs
1 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice, if desired
pinch of salt
1 c. flour
Directions:
Separate whites and yolks of eggs.
Beat whites until stiff, yolks until thick and lemon colored.
Add 1 cup sugar to yolks and beat until completely mixed.
Add vanilla, lemon juice and salt. Fold yolk mixture into whites very gently.
Lastly, add flour, folding in gently.
Use large buttered and floured tube pan.
Bake in 325° oven 45 to 60 minutes.
(A smaller version may be made with 4 eggs, 7/8 cup sugar and 7/8 cup flour.)
Also can be used for cupcakes.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Delicious Bread Pudding #1
Ingredients:
4 c. bread cubes
2 c. milk, scalded with 1/4 c. butter
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Put bread crumbs in 1 1/2-quart baking dish.
Blend in remaining ingredients and stir.
