Place baking dish in pan of hot water, about 1-inch deep, and bake for 45 to 50 minutes, until knife inserted comes out clean.
Great for holidays!

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Bread Pudding(Makes 6 Servings)
Ingredients:
3 c. soft bread crumbs
1/4 c. butter
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
2 c. scalded milk
1/2 c. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
1/4 c. raisins
Directions:
Scald milk with butter.
Stir in all other ingredients, except the eggs.
Mix well, then add eggs last, stirring gently.
Pour into greased pan.
Place pan in hot water and bake about 30 minutes in 350° oven.
Serve about 1 ounce butter sauce with each serving.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Bread Pudding
Ingredients:
2 c. milk
4 c. coarse bread crumbs
1/4 c. melted butter
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. seedless raisins
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Scald milk and pour over bread crumbs.
Cool and add remaining ingredients, mixing well.
Pour into a 1 1/2-quart casserole dish. Place casserole dish in pan of hot water (1 inch deep).
Bake at 350° for 1 hour, or until a silver knife inserted into pudding comes out clean.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Bread Pudding
Ingredients:
3 c. bread cubes (6 slices)
1/4 tsp. salt
4 eggs, slightly beaten
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
4 c. scalded milk
1 Tbsp. butter
3/4 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Lightly spray a 7 1/2 x 11 1/2 baking dish with Pam.
Place in a 9 x 13 filled with 1-inch of water.
Set aside.
Place bread cubes in the bottom of the smaller dish.
Put milk in a saucepan and heat to scalding.
Remove from the heat.
Add sugar, flour, salt, butter, vanilla and eggs.
Beat well.
Pour over bread cubes.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Check after 45 minutes as ovens may vary.
Pudding is done when a knife inserted near the middle comes out clean.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Bread Pudding
Ingredients:
5 slices bread, cut in small cubes
4 eggs
4 c. milk
1/2 c. raisins
1/3 c. dates, chopped
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1/3 c. wine or brandy
2/3 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
Directions:
Soak raisins and dates in wine or brandy for at least 15 minutes.
Add milk and bread.
Bring to a boil.
Add beaten eggs, mixed with sugar and vanilla.
Let mixture come to boiling point. Pour into 8 x 12-inch pan, that has been sprayed with nonstick spray.
Put this pan into a larger pan with hot water 1 1/2-inches deep.
Pour melted butter over top and sprinkle with nutmeg.
Bake in 375° oven until knife inserted in center comes out clean.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Leek And Potato Soup
Ingredients:
2 large leeks
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. butter
2 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
2 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cut off roots and tops of leeks.
Slice and wash.
In soup pot, saute leeks in oil and butter until limp.
Add potatoes and chicken broth.
Simmer 30 minutes or until potatoes are done.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Leek And Potato Soup(This Recipe Is About 125 Years Old)
Ingredients:
3 leeks (4 if small) or bunch of scallions
3 medium potatoes
2 Tbsp. very fine barley
3/4 qt. water
1 c. milk
salt and butter
Directions:
Split leeks or scallions in half and cut in small pieces.
Cut up potatoes.
In water, put potatoes, salt and barley and let come to a boil; cook about 1 hour.
Mash the potatoes.
Thin out soup with a cup of milk, more if needed.
Again let it come to a boiling point, turn off heat and add 4 tablespoons of butter (no substitute or it won't give same flavor).

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Leek And Potato Soup
Ingredients:
1 bunch leeks, sliced very fine
3 stalks celery, sliced very fine
3 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 c. diced potatoes
3 c. milk or half milk and half all-purpose cream
1 c. water
Directions:
Put leeks, celery and butter in a pan.
Cook 10 minutes, stirring constantly.
Add water.
Cover and cook 10 more minutes. Add potatoes and add more water to cover.
Cover and cook 10 additional minutes.
Add milk.
Simmer until potatoes are tender. Season to taste with salt, pepper and cayenne.
Serve hot.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 leeks, cleaned and chopped
2 Tbsp. whole-wheat flour (do not substitute white flour)
4 or 5 small potatoes, cleaned and chopped (peeled or not, your choice)
water to cover
salt and black pepper to taste
1/4 tsp. red chile (optional)
Directions:
Heat olive oil in large soup pan over moderate heat. Add leeks and cook just until tender. Add flour and stir to blend with the oil.
Add potatoes and water to cover. Cook until potatoes are tender.
Add seasoning to taste. Serve hot, preferably with a warm bread.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Leek And Potato Soup
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
3 c. leeks, minced
3 Tbsp. flour
4 c. water
1 Tbsp. salt
pepper
4 c. potatoes, diced
4 c. milk, warmed
1/2 c. heavy cream
3 Tbsp. butter
chives or chopped parsley
Directions:
Saute leeks in butter 5 minutes.
Blend in flour and cook 2 minutes.
Gradually blend in water.
Add salt, pepper and potatoes; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 40 minutes, partially covered.
Add milk; bring to a simmer.
Blend in cream. Turn off heat and add butter.
Garnish with chives or parsley.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Six Layer Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
3 sticks butter
2 c. granulated sugar
7 eggs
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. vanilla extract
1 Tbsp. almond extract
1/3 c. evaporated milk
Directions:
Cream butter, adding sugar until creamy.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Fold in sifted dry ingredients, alternating with milk, beating until smooth.
Add vanilla and almond extract.
Bake in 9-inch pans at 325° for approximately 12 minutes.
Use approximately 6 heaping tablespoonfuls of batter to each pan; makes 6 thin layers.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
2 c. plain flour, sifted
1 stick margarine
1 stick butter
4 Tbsp. cocoa
1 c. water
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. soda
1/2 c. buttermilk
2 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Place sugar and flour in a bowl and mix well.
Bring margarine, butter, cocoa and water to a rapid boil.
Remove from heat and pour over sugar and flour.
Mix well.
Add vanilla, soda, buttermilk and eggs.
Beat well with an electric mixer.
Pour in a greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake Squares
Ingredients:
2 c. all-purpose flour
2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 stick butter
1 c. water
1/2 c. shortening
4 to 6 Tbsp. cocoa (depending on how chocolate flavor you prefer)
2 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Place flour, sugar and salt in a large mixing bowl.
Put butter, water, shortening and cocoa in a saucepan and bring to a boil.
Mix this with the dry ingredients. Mix together eggs, soda, vanilla and buttermilk.
Add to cocoa mixture.
Mix well.
Pour into a greased and floured 15 1/2 x 11 1/2 x 1-inch pan.
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.
Begin making the icing about 5 minutes before cake is done.
Ice while cake is hot.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Homemade Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 eggs
2 c. sugar
1 3/4 c. plain flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. cooking oil
1 c. milk
3/4 c. cocoa (Hershey's baking powder cocoa)
1 c. boiling water
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Mix all ingredients except for boiling water until well blended.
Mix with electric mixer for 3 minutes more.
Add boiling water.
Mix another minute.
Pour batter into 2 (9-inch) layer pans.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes.
Do not overcook.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 tsp. sugar
2 eggs
1/2 c. cinnamon
1/2 c. flour
whole bag chocolate drops
1/2 dose butter
1/2 dose vanilla
can of chocolate
Directions:
Bowl, break the eggs up (take shells off).
Flour next, vanilla, sugar.
Mix up with a spoon and stir up real fast, mix up good, butter cinnamon, chocolate drops.
Then sugar - stir a little bit more.
Put in two circle pans.
Heat oven to 400°; don't want to burn it, cook 3 minutes until done.
Then ice, and eat, and then go brush teeth, watch TV and go to bed.
Don't forget to read a book!

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice With Vegetables
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 egg, beaten
1 medium green bell pepper, chopped
3 scallions, sliced
1 celery rib, sliced
2 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, thawed (1 c.)
1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/8 tsp. hot pepper sauce
2 c. cooked rice, cooled
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
In a wok, heat 1 tablespoon oil over medium-high heat until hot.
Add egg and cook, stirring, until firm, about 2 minutes. Remove to a plate.
Cut into small pieces.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice
Ingredients:
3 to 4 carrots, chopped fine
1 c. celery, chopped
1 large bell pepper
1/2 head cabbage, chopped
1 large onion, chopped
soy sauce
4 Tbsp. sesame oil
rice
Directions:
Add sesame oil to frying pan or wok.
Add vegetables and cook. Add soy sauce (several tablespoons).
Cook rice as directed on box, then add 2 tablespoons sesame oil to pan and brown rice, then add rice to cooked vegetables.
Add as much soy sauce as you like.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Easy Fried Rice
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked brown rice
1/4 c. frozen peas
1 small carrot, cut real fine (small cubes)
1 small potato, cut real fine (small cubes)
1/4 c. green onion, chopped fine
salt
1 tsp. sesame seed
1/2 Tbsp. sesame seed oil
1 tsp. olive oil
Directions:
In a nonstick skillet, put olive oil.
Turn temperature to 450°.
Put carrot and potato.
Stir until cooked.
Add salt to taste, then add frozen peas.
Stir and salt.
Then add rest of ingredients.
Stir until mixed real well.
Salt to taste.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice
Ingredients:
4 c. cooked rice
1 carrot
1 stick celery
1/2 c. soy sauce
1 small onion
1 small green pepper
1 c. cooked meat
Directions:
Chop all vegetables.
Saute in 1/4 cup oil.
Add rice and meat.
Scramble 2 eggs, then add with soy sauce, salt and pepper. Mix all together, stirring frequently over medium heat.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1/4 c. egg substitute
2 Tbsp. rice wine or dry white wine
2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
1 Tbsp. water
1/8 tsp. pepper
nonstick cooking spray
1 c. loose-pack frozen green beans, thawed and well drained
1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/2 c. bias-sliced celery (1 stalk)
1 small onion, halved and sliced (1/3 c.)
1/2 (8 oz.) can bamboo shoots, drained (1/2 c.)
2 c. chilled cooked rice (cooked without margarine or salt)
2 Tbsp. unsalted dry roasted peanuts, coarsely chopped (optional)
Directions:
In a small mixing bowl, stir together the egg substitute, rice wine or white wine, soy sauce, water and pepper.
Set aside.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
1 pork shoulder roast
1 tsp. celery seed
1/3 c. cider vinegar
1/2 c. ketchup
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 tsp. brown sugar
1/8 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 bay leaf
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
1 dash hot pepper sauce
1 c. water
Directions:
In heavy skillet brown the roast on all sides in a small amount of oil.
Place roast in a heavy ovenproof pan with tight fitting lid or a pan you can seal with aluminum foil.
Place the remaining ingredients in a saucepan and bring to a boil.
Boil for 1 minute; pour mixture over the roast.
Cover tightly.
Place the roast in preheated 325° oven and bake for about 35 to 45 minutes per pound. Baste several times with the juices in the pan.
Remove the roast and allow to cool slightly.
Slice the roast into bite sized thin pieces.
Add additional hot pepper sauce and few drops of vinegar if desired.
Yield:
10 servings.
Carbohydrate 5 g, protein 3 g, fat 3 g, calories 58.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Festive Pork Roast
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chicken broth
1/2 c. soy sauce
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. ground ginger
1 boneless pork roast, 4 to 5 lbs.
Directions:
In large plastic bag, combine first five ingredients; mix well. Add roast, turning to coat on all sides. Cover and refrigerate 3 to 4 days (turning several times a day). Remove meat, discard marinade. Place with fat side down on a rack in shallow roasting pan. Bake uncovered at 325° 2 to 2 1/2 hours. Cover and let stand 15 minutes before carving. Yield: 8 to 10 servings.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Roast Pork, Stuffed With Prunes And Apples
Ingredients:
1 tsp. butter
3 tsp. oil
1 small onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 tsp. dried rosemary crumbs
1 1/2 tsp. dried leaf thyme crumbs
2 large, tart apples, cored and chopped
2 tsp. brown sugar
2 tsp. salt
24 sliced prunes
1 (5 lb.) boneless pkg. loin roast, trimmed
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. sage
2 1/2 to 3 c. apple cider
1/2 tsp. rosemary
3 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Heat butter and oil in skillet.
Add onion, garlic, 1/2 teaspoon rosemary and 1/2 teaspoon thyme.
Saute about 2 minutes. Add next 3 ingredients.
When apples are softened, add prunes. Remove from heat.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Roast Pork With Thyme & Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. dry white wine
1 1/2 tsp. fresh thyme or 1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1 Tbsp. peppercorn mustard
1/4 tsp. each salt and pepper
3 lb. boneless pork roast
1 1/2 lb. new or red potatoes, quartered and cooked until almost tender
8 oz. baby carrots cooked until almost tender
1 red onion, cut into wedges
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1/2 tsp salt
Directions:
Mix together first 5 ingredients and brush on roast.
Place in roasting pan fat side up.
Bake in 350° oven for 1 to 2 hours, basting occasionally.
Near end of roasting, mix together potatoes, carrots, and onion.
Toss vegetables with olive oil, vinegar, and salt.	Roast in pan with pork roast last 10 to 20 minutes of cooking time.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Oriental Roast Pork
Ingredients:
1 tsp. salt
3/4 c. soy sauce
1/2 c. lemon juice
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. red food coloring
1 small onion, chopped
1 tsp. ground ginger
2 garlic cloves, minced
3 or 4 lb. pork shoulder (boneless allows better penetration, but bone-in will work as well)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients, except pork.
Place meat in plastic bag big enough to hold it and place in bowl.
Pour marinade in bag. Refrigerate at least 4 hours, overnight is fine.
Occasionally move the bag around so marinade reaches all portions of the meat.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Molten Chocolate Lava Cake(Petite Gateau)
Ingredients:
1/2 cup Butter, unsalted
4 ounce(s) Bittersweet chocolate
2 Egg(s)
2 Egg yolk(s)
1/4 cup Sugar
2 tablespoon(s) Flour, all-purpose
Directions:
Butter and flour 4 custard cups.
Preheat oven to 450F.
Melt butter and chocolate.
Do NOT let it boil.
Remove from heat and set aside.
Beat together the 2 eggs plus 2 yolks and the sugar, until it's light and thick.
Pour the now tepid chocolate mixture into the egg mixture, and beat to mix.
Quickly beat in the flour until just mixed in.
Pour into the custard cups.
(At this point you can refrigerate for up to 24 hours.
If you refrigerate, let return to room temp before you bake.)
Put custard cups on a baking sheet and bake at 450 degrees for 6-7 minutes.
The outside will be set up, but the top may still be slightly wiggly (technical French cooking term).
Invert on plate, let sit for 10 seconds or so, remove custard cup.
Sprinkle with powdered sugar, and surround with a fruit sauce of you're choice.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Deep Dish Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. unsifted flour
2 c. sugar
3/4 c. cocoa
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs
1 c. milk
1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 tsp. vanilla
1 c. boiling water
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients in large mixing bowl. Add remaining ingredients except for boiling water.
Beat at medium speed 2 minutes.
Stir in boiling water.
(Batter will be thin.)
Pour into a greased 9
13 pan and bake at 350° for 35 - 40 minute or until cake tester inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool and top with our favorite frosting.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 stick butter
2 c. regular flour
1 Tbsp. vanilla flavor
2 sq. unsweetened chocolate
1 tsp. soda
2 c. sugar
2 eggs
1/2 c. buttermilk
1 c. hot water
Directions:
Melt chocolate in double boiler.
Cream butter and sugar; add eggs, flour and buttermilk.
Add 1/2 cup hot water to the melted chocolate; place the other half in a separate pan and bring to a boil.
Add soda to the boiling water and immediately to the chocolate.
Add mixture to batter; add vanilla.
Bake at 325° until cake pulls from pans.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 eggs
2 c. flour
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. butter
1 c. water
1/2 c. milk, add 1 1/2 tsp. vinegar to milk and let set
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
4 sq. chocolate, melted
Directions:
Mix chocolate and water.
Add butter, eggs, alternate flour and milk.
Add sugar, vanilla, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
Beat until smooth.
Bake in 2 (8 or 9-inch) pans at 350° for 25 minutes.
Top with any icing.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
3 sq. unsweetened chocolate
2 1/4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
2 1/4 c. (1 lb.) brown sugar
3 eggs
2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. buttermilk
1 c. boiling water
Directions:
Melt chocolate over hot water.
Sift flour, soda and salt on wax paper.
Cream margarine and butter.
Add sugar.
Beat in eggs one at a time.
Stir in vanilla and chocolate.
Add flour mixture a third at a time alternately with buttermilk.
Stir in hot water and pour into 3 (9-inch) greased cake pans.
Bake in 375° oven for 25 to 30 minutes.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/8 tsp. salt
1 egg
1 c. buttermilk
1 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 very ripe banana, mashed
Directions:
Sift flour and combine with next 4 ingredients. Combine egg, buttermilk and margarine; add to dry mixture. Stir until smooth. Stir in banana. Use 1/4 cup batter for each pancake. Pour onto hot griddle coated with cooking spray. Turn only once when edges look done. Serve with maple syrup and strawberry preserves.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
1 c. nonfat buttermilk
1 tsp. soda
1/2 c. mashed banana
1/2 c. egg substitute
1 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar and salt in a bowl, mixing well.
Combine 1 cup nonfat buttermilk with soda.
Add to banana, eggs and oil. Pour all liquid ingredients into dry ingredients and stir until moistened.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto griddle sprayed with Pam. Makes 12 pancakes (4-inch size).

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Yummy Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
3 c. whole wheat flour
3 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 1/4 tsp. double acting baking powder
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
3 eggs
3 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. butter, softened
1 ripe banana, mashed
Directions:
Beat 3 eggs until light.
Add 3 cups buttermilk, 3 tablespoons butter and ripe banana.
Combine the dry ingredients with the liquid ingredients.
Cook on medium hot griddle.
Makes 24 medium pancakes.
Freeze extras for easy, healthy breakfast, lunch or snacks.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour (all-purpose)
4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. milk
1/3 c. melted butter
1 1/2 c. mashed bananas
Directions:
Sift flour with baking powder, salt, sugar and cinnamon.
Beat eggs and beat in milk, butter, bananas and vanilla.
Add dry ingredients and stir until blended.
Bake each pancake on a hot, lightly oiled griddle, pouring out 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake.
Flip once when brown.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 egg
1 1/4 c. buttermilk or soured milk
1 1/4 c. flour
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 tsp. baking powder
1 c. mashed banana
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Beat egg.
Beat in remaining ingredients until smooth.
Serve with honey or currant jelly or dust with confectioners sugar.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
4 slices white bread, torn into pieces
2 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 medium yellow onion, peeled and cut into 1/8's
2 cloves garlic
2 stalks celery, cut into 2 inch pieces
2 carrots, peeled, cut into 2 inch pieces
1/2 c. flat leaf parsley leaves
1 large egg
1 c. ketchup
3 tsp. dry mustard
1 Tbsp. coarse salt
2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Place bread in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine crumbs form. Transfer to a medium bowl, and add ground beef.
Place onion, garlic, celery, carrots, and parsley in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine.
Add to meat mixture, using hands to mix well.
Add egg, 1/2 c. ketchup, 2 tsp. dry mustard, salt and pepper; use hands to combine thoroughly.
Place in an 8 1/2 x 4 1/2 x 2 1/2 inch loaf pan.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Super Tasty Basic Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. ketchup
1/3 c. tomato juice
1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper
1/8 tsp. red pepper
2 eggs, beaten
3/4 c. soft breadcrumbs
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1/4 c. ketchup
1/2 tsp. prepared mustard
2 tsp. brown sugar
Directions:
In large bowl, combine 1/2 cup ketchup, tomato juice, salt, peppers, eggs, breadcrumbs, onion and 2 teaspoons mustard.
Mix thoroughly.
Add ground beef.
Mix. Press beef into a 5 X 5 loaf pan.
Combine 1/4 cup ketchup, 1/2 teaspoon mustard and brown sugar and spread over meatloaf.
Bake at 400° for 35 to 40 minutes or until done.
Garnish with fresh herbs, if desired.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Meatloaf
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 c. crushed pineapple, well drained
1/4 c. ketchup
1/2 c. brown sugar
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1/4 tsp. salt
pepper
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1 small onion, finely chopped
2 lbs. ground beef
1/4 tsp. garlic
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°F.
Grease 9 x 5 x 3-inch pan.
Line the bottom with greased wax paper.
Whip eggs in a large bowl.
Stir in pineapple, ketchup, brown sugar, mustard, salt, garlic, and pepper.
Stir in bread crumbs, onion, and half the meat until thoroughly blended.
Work in remaining meat and press into pan. Lay a sheet of tin foil loosely over meat and bake for 1 hour. Uncover and drain off fat, continue baking uncovered for 30 - 40 min.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
2 lbs. extra lean hamburger
1/4 lb. sausage
1 cup crumbled saltines
2 eggs
3/4 cup milk
1 Tbsp. mustard
1 tsp. accent (optional)
1/2 cup finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
If mixture seems too dry, add a little more milk.
Shape into a loaf and bake in a flat dish at 325° for 1 hour 30 minutes or until done.
Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. May pour 8 oz. can of tomato sauce over meat before baking.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Mystery Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 pound of alligator meat
1/2 cup of turtle eyes
1/2 cup of green slime
1 tablespoon of toxic waste
1 pinch of sand to spice
Directions:
Take 2 cups of flour mix with 1 gallon of sugar.
Put in the oven for 12 hours at 250°.
Shape it as a banana then let it cool for about 1 hour.
Sprinkle yellow sprinkles until no fudge is showing.
On top of the cake put 5 chocolate brownies.
In the center put a single strawberry then crack 2 raw eggs on top. Put in the refrigerator for 2 days, then serve.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
3/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. lite or fat-free sour cream
1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 eggs
2 Tbsp. poppy seeds
2 Tbsp. milk
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 tsp. lemon extract
Directions:
In large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt; set aside. Combine remaining ingredients; mix well. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Fill greased or paper-lined muffin cups 2/3 full. Bake at 400° for 20 to 25 minutes or until muffins test done. Cool in pan for 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy-Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
2 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. poppy seed
3/4 c. skim or 1% milk
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
2 Tbsp. oil
2 egg whites
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, salt, baking powder and poppy seed.
Add milk, lemonade, oil and egg whites.
Stir until moistened; do not overmix.
Coat a 12-muffin tin with nonstick cooking spray or line with muffin cups.
Fill each 2/3 full with muffin mixture.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes at 400° or until golden brown.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
2 c. plain flour
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. poppy seed
3/4 c. low-fat milk
1 (16 oz.) can frozen lemonade, thawed
2 Tbsp. oil
2 egg whites
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, salt, baking powder and poppy seed.
Add milk, lemonade, oil and egg whites.
Stir until moistened; don't overmix.
Spray pan with Pam and fill 2/3 full.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes at 400°.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon-Poppy Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 c. milk
2 eggs
1 pkg. lemon instant pudding mix (4-serving size)
2 c. Bisquick (original mix)
1/4 c. poppy seed (I use 1/8 c. or 2 Tbsp.)
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. grated lemon rind
Directions:
Grease bottoms of or use paper baking
cups in regular muffin pan.
Mix oil, milk, eggs and pudding mix with fork until blended. Stir in the poppy seeds.
Divide evenly into 12 prepared muffin pan.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes in preheated oven at 375°.
Cool 10 minutes and drizzle with glaze.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Lemon-Poppy Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. poppy seed
3/4 c. skim milk or 1% milk
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade, thawed
2 Tbsp. oil
2 egg whites
Directions:
Mix together dry ingredients.
Add milk, lemonade, oil and egg whites; stir together until just moist.
Fill paper filled muffin pans.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes at 400°.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. (8 oz.) pineapple chunks
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. shortening or Pam
1 1/4 c. water
2 c. carrot sticks
3 bouillon cubes or instant broth packets
1/4 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 c. catsup and 1 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. vinegar
2 c. diced cooked chicken and/or can stir-fry
1 c. green pepper strips (you can substitute green beans)
3/4 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 1/4 c. Minute rice
Directions:
Drain pineapple, reserving juice.
Add water to juice to make 2 1/4 cups.
Saute onion in shortening in large skillet until tender.
Add 1 1/4 cups water, carrots and bouillon.
Cover and simmer 5 minutes.
Combine sugar, cornstarch and ginger.
Add catsup, vinegar and soy sauce and stir into vegetable mixture. Cook until clear and thickened.
Add chicken, green peppers and pineapple.
Cover and simmer 5 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet-Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1/4 c. maple syrup
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. liquid, drained from canned pineapple
1/4 c. vinegar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 c. cooked, sliced chicken
1/4 c. onion, thin half slices
1 c. drained, canned pineapple
1/2 c. celery strips, thin
1/2 c. green pepper rings
1 (3 oz.) can chow mein noodles
2 c. cooked rice
1/4 c. slivered almonds
Directions:
Combine maple syrup, cornstarch and salt.
Stir into pineapple liquid.
Add vinegar and soy sauce.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet 'N Sour Baked Chicken
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. coarsely chopped green pepper
1/2 c. coarsely chopped carrots
3/4 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/4 c. firmly packed brown sugar
dash of red pepper
ground ginger
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. pineapple chunks, drained
1 c. pineapple juice
1 (3 lb.) chicken, cut up
Directions:
Preheat oven to
400°.	In
medium
skillet heat butter until melted.
Add onion,
green	pepper	and carrots.
Cook 5 minutes, stirring.
Stir in ketchup, pineapple juice, vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, garlic salt, salt, pepper and ginger.
Cook, stirring constantly	until
mixture	boils.	Add
pineapple. Arrange chicken in	13 x 9-inch baking dish.
Pour sauce over. Bake 45 minutes.
Uncover;	bake
30
minutes longer or until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet 'N Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless chicken, cut in cubes
2 Tbsp. oil
1 clove garlic, minced
1 c. carrot strips
1/2 c. chopped green peppers
1 1/4 c. chicken bouillon or 1/3 c. teriyaki
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. ginger
1 (8 oz.) can chunk pineapple in juice
1 1/2 c. (8 oz.) Minute rice
2 Tbsp. vinegar
Directions:
Brown chicken in oil.
Add garlic, green peppers and carrots. Saute briefly.
Add bouillon, soy sauce, sherry, vinegar, sugar, ginger and pineapple with juice.
Bring to a full boil.
Stir in rice (optional).
Cover; remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Stir before serving.
Cooked rice can be served on the side.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet-Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) fryer chicken, cut up
6 Tbsp. (3/4 stick) butter
2 (8 1/4 oz.) cans pineapple chunks in syrup
1/4 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. vinegar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 c. green pepper, cut in strips
1/4 c. thinly sliced onion
hot buttered cooked rice
Directions:
Brown chicken in butter in large skillet.
Cover; simmer 35 to 40 minutes.
Remove chicken; set aside.
Drain pineapple, reserving syrup.
Combine sugar, cornstarch and salt in skillet. Gradually stir in vinegar, soy sauce and reserved syrup.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened.
Add pineapple, green pepper, onion and reserved chicken.
Cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Serve over rice.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Sauteed Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/2 lb. butternut squash, seeded and cut into 1-inch chunks (about 3 1/2 c.)
1 large clove garlic, minced
salt and pepper to taste
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh sage
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh Italian parsley
Directions:
In a heavy (preferably nonstick) skillet, heat oil until sizzling.
Add squash and garlic to coat well with oil.
Saute slowly over low heat, stirring frequently, for about 30 minutes until squash is golden and tender.
(Add a tablespoon or two of water to pan if squash begins to stick.)
Add salt and pepper to taste, then sprinkle sage and parsley over squash and mix to combine well.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oil
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
3 eggs
2 c. plain flour
2 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
8 oz. crushed pineapple (undrained)
2 c. grated butternut squash
1 c. walnuts
Directions:
In large bowl, combine first 6 ingredients. Beat eggs. Add to spice mixture. Mix dry ingredients together. Slowly add to spice mixture. Beat 5 minutes. Add pineapple, squash and nuts. Fold in. Pour in large, greased tube pan. Bake at 300° for 55 minutes. Cool. Frost with Buttercream Frosting or your favorite frosting.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
1 medium butternut squash
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. red hots candy (2 oz. pkg.)
1/2 orange juice
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut squash in half lengthwise and discard seeds.
Slice into 1/2-inch slices crosswise and remove peel. Place in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Sprinkle with sugar.
Heat orange juice in microwave dish. Dissolve candy in the orange juice.
Pour over squash. Sprinkle with salt.
Cover with foil and bake at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes. Place liquid from baking pan into small saucepan and boil until thick.
Pour over squash. Yields 4 servings.
Has 150 calories, fat free.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Spicy Butternut Squash Pie
Ingredients:
2 butternut squash
3 eggs, slightly beaten
3/4 c. firmly packed artificial light brown sugar
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 1/2 pkg. Hi-Energy Vanilla Supplement
12 oz. cold water
Directions:
Peel squash.
Slice in half lengthwise and remove seeds.
Cut into slices.
Place in saucepan and cover with water.
Cover and cook 15 minutes or until tender and drain.
Puree pulp in food processor or mash thoroughly.
Set aside 2 cups squash puree. Store remainder in refrigerator for later use (for up to 5 days). Combine remaining ingredients, mixing well.
Sieve mixture.
Pour 1/2 into each pie plate.
Bake at 375° for 40 to 45 minutes or until set.
Let cool.
Serve with thickened vanilla spiced icing mixture, if desired.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Pie
Ingredients:
4 well beaten egg yolks
1/2 tsp. salt
2 1/4 c. granulated sugar
5 Tbsp. flour
2 c. mashed butternut squash, cooled
3 c. sweet milk
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. allspice
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
Combine ingredients in order listed.
Mix thoroughly, then add stiffly beaten egg whites.
Pour into unbaked pie shells and bake 10 minutes at 400° then for 40 minutes at 350°.
Makes 3 medium size pies.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. buttermilk baking mix
1 c. milk
1 large egg
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
chocolate syrup (optional)
Directions:
In a medium bowl, whisk together baking mix, milk, egg and sugar until smooth.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Heat a heavy skillet or griddle over medium-high heat.
Grease lightly.
Using about 1/4 cup batter for each pancake, pour batter into skillet in shape of a heart and cook until bubbles appear on surface and edges are dry.
Turn and cook until bottom is golden brown.
Place cooked pancakes in a warm oven until ready to serve.
Serve with chocolate syrup or syrup of your choice.
Makes about thirteen 4-inch pancakes.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
3/4 tsp. salt
3 tsp. baking powder
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 egg
1 c. milk
3 Tbsp. salad oil
8 oz. chocolate chips
Directions:
Mix first 7 ingredients together by hand until smooth.
Add 8 ounces chocolate chips and stir.
Cook over low heat until done.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
4 tsp. baking powder
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 egg, slightly beaten
1 tsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. melted butter
1 3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Mix all dry ingredients.
In separate bowl, add vanilla to eggs and beat slightly.
Add to dry ingredients.
Add milk and mix.
Add melted butter and stir until smooth.
Cook on hot griddle at 400°.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. buttermilk baking mix
1 c. milk
1 large egg
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
chocolate syrup, (optional)
Directions:
Mix in medium bowl milk, egg and sugar until smooth.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Heat in a heavy skillet or griddle over medium-high heat.
Grease lightly.
Using about 1/4 cup batter for each pancake, pour batter into skillet in shape of heart and cook until bubbles appear on surface and edges are dry.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 egg
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
1 1/2 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. cocoa
Directions:
Mix all ingredients.
Pour 1/4 cup batter on hot griddle. Cook pancakes until puffed.
Turn and cook other sides until golden brown.
Dust with powdered sugar. "Tastes just like a chocolate donut." Christine Walsh.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar, packed
1 c. granulated sugar
1 c. melted shortening (Crisco or butter)
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. coconut
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. soda
1 c. sifted flour
4 c. rolled oats
1/2 c. nuts
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Sift salt, soda and flour; mix ingredients in order given. Drop by teaspoon on greased cookie sheet.
Press flat.
Bake at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes.
Makes about 4 dozen 2-inch cookies.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. flour
1/3 tsp. soda
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/4 c. shortening
1 c. white sugar
1 c. brown sugar
3 eggs, well beaten
2 c. coconut
1 c. oats
1 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Mix flour, baking powder, soda and salt together.
Work shortening until soft.
Add sugar; work until mixture is smooth and creamy.
Beat eggs; add to shortening mixture.
Mix in flour mixture oats, nuts and coconut thoroughly. (May need to work with hands.)
Roll into size of a walnut, place onto ungreased cookie sheet.
Grease hands with butter or shortening.
Makes 7 dozen.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
3 egg whites
1 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. grated coconut
Directions:
Beat egg whites until stiff.
Add sugar gradually; beat until glossy.
Fold in flour, salt, vanilla and coconut.
Line baking sheet with greased heavy brown paper.
Drop mixture by teaspoons on paper.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.
Makes 2 dozen.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
2 1/4 c. flour
1/3 tsp. baking soda
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. shortening
1 c. white sugar
1 c. brown sugar
2 eggs
1 c. rolled oats
2 c. coconut
walnut halves
Directions:
Cream shortening, butter, sugar and eggs.
Mix flour, soda, baking powder and salt.
Then add first mixture.
Add oats and coconut.
Roll dough in walnut-size balls.
Place on ungreased cookie sheet 3 inches apart.
Top with walnut or pecan halves. Bake at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
2 large egg whites
1/8 tsp. salt
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 (7 oz.) bag flaked coconut
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
Directions:
Preheat oven to 300°.
Grease and flour large cookie sheet. In small bowl with mixer at high speed, beat egg whites and salt until soft peaks form.
Beating at high speed, sprinkle in sugar 2 tablespoons at a time, beating well after each addition, until sugar is completely dissolved.
Beat in vanilla (whites should stand in stiff glossy peaks).
With rubber spatula fold in coconut and flour.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Sandwich
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. cooked, chopped chicken
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of chicken soup, undiluted
2 Tbsp. chopped pimiento
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts, drained and thinly sliced
20 slices bread, crusts removed
4 eggs, slightly beaten
2 Tbsp. milk
1 (6 oz.) bag potato chips, crushed
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients, mixing well. Spread evenly on 10 slices of bread.
Top with the remaining 10 slices. Wrap individually in freezer wrap and freeze.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Baked Chicken Sandwich
Ingredients:
2 c. chopped cooked chicken
1 medium onion, chopped fine
2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
1/4 oz. can sliced mushrooms (do not drain)
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/4 c. sliced ripe olives
12 slices very thinly sliced bread
1/2 pt. sour cream
1 can chicken soup
paprika
Directions:
Cut crust from 12 slices of bread.
Butter 6 and line a 9 x 13 casserole.
Mix all other ingredients and spread on top of the bread in casserole.
Cover with 6 slices bread and top with mixture of sour cream and chicken soup.
Sprinkle top with paprika.
Bake at 325° for 30 to 45 minutes.
This may be made a day ahead of time.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Baked Chicken Sandwich
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. chicken, first cooked and picked from bones
1 can Franco-American chicken gravy
1 can cream of mushroom soup
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 c. sliced water chestnuts
Directions:
Mix all together.
Spread mix on 8 slices of bread and cover with 8 slices.
Wrap individual sandwiches in foil.
Freeze.
When ready to serve, dip sandwich while still frozen in well-beaten egg, then crushed potato chips.
Place on well-greased cookie sheet. Bake 1 hour or a little more at 300°.
Serve with salad and a light dessert.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Hot Chicken Sandwich Supreme
Ingredients:
1/2 stick butter or margarine
1/2 c. diced green pepper
1 c. sliced mushrooms
4 Tbsp. flour
1 c. chicken stock
1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. diced pimiento
2 1/2 c. diced cooked chicken
salt and pepper
2 egg yolks
2 Tbsp. sherry
8 slices bread (crust trimmed off)
2 eggs (additional)
1/2 c. milk (additional)
3 c. coarsely crushed potato chips
3 Tbsp. blanched almonds
Directions:
Heat butter, add green pepper and mushrooms, cook on low heat 5 minutes.
Add flour and stir until blended.
Slowly add stock and milk.
Stir over low heat until thick and smooth.
Add pimiento and chicken.
Add salt and pepper if desired.
Heat thoroughly.
Into slightly beaten egg yolks stir a little of the hot sauce.
Slowly add the egg mixture to the remaining sauce, stirring constantly.
Add sherry.
Pour mixture into an 8-inch square pan.
Cool, then put in refrigerator several hours or overnight.
Cut chicken mixture into 4 squares.
Place each square on a slice of bread.
Cover with slice of bread.
Smooth sides with spatula.
Cut each sandwich in half.
Beat eggs with 1/4 cup milk.
Dip each sandwich half on all sides in egg mixture, then in potato chips.
Place on greased baking sheet.
Sprinkle almonds on top.
Bake 30 minutes at 350°.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Hot Chicken Sandwiches
Ingredients:
16 slices bread
butter
1 1/2 c. chicken, cooked and seasoned
3 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
1/4 c. ripe olives, chopped
1 can mushrooms (optional)
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 can cream of chicken soup (concentrate)
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Butter a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Butter both sides of bread and cut off crusts.
Place 8 slices of bread in the pan, forming a crust. Combine chicken, eggs, olives, mushrooms and mayonnaise together. Spoon over bread.
Top with remaining bread.
Mix soup and sour cream together.
Pour over bread.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Brown Rice(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. oil
3/4 c. chopped green onions (including tops)
1 c. green pepper, diced
1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 c. water chestnuts, sliced
3 c. cooked brown rice
3 c. cooked chicken, cut into bite-size pieces*
1/3 c. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
*Turkey or tuna may be substituted.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Rice Dinner(Serves 5)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
10 chicken thighs (about 3 lb.)
3 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces (undrained)
2 c. boiling water
minced fresh parsley (optional)
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. chopped onions
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 chicken bouillon cubes
4 chicken breasts, split and boned
1 (5 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts
1 can undiluted cream of mushroom soup
1 1/2 c. finely chopped celery
1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
1 pkg. corn bread stuffing (about 3 c.)
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix soup, mayonnaise, chestnuts and celery.
Lightly grease 3-quart casserole.
Lay breasts in pan.
Pour over mixed ingredients.
Mix stuffing with melted butter and sprinkle on top of chicken.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes to 1 hour.
Delicious!

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice With Leftovers(Very Good!!!)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. long grain rice, washed in 3 changes of water and drained
3 Tbsp. oil
2 stalks celery, diced
1 medium onion, diced
1/4 green pepper, diced
2 cloves garlic, diced
1 to 2 c. or more of any leftover meat (ham, beef, pork, chicken or combination), diced
1/4 c. soy sauce (optional)
1 can water chestnuts, sliced
1 can pieces and stems mushrooms, drained (save juice)
2 1/2 c. water
4 Tbsp. chicken bouillon
Directions:
Fry rice in skillet over high heat, stirring all the time, until brown.
Scrape into 4-quart pan with lid.
Add all ingredients, bringing to a boil.
Boil for 1 minute. Turn to low heat and cover tightly.
Don't lift lid for 25 minutes.
Stir and serve.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Easy Chicken-Rice Supper
Ingredients:
1/4 c. margarine or butter
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
1 c. chicken broth
2 c. cut up cooked chicken or turkey
1 1/2 c. cooked white rice or wild rice
1/3 c. chopped green pepper
1/4 c. slivered almonds
2 Tbsp. chopped pimento
1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces, drained
Directions:
Heat margarine in a 2-quart saucepan until melted.
Stir in flour, salt and pepper.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until bubbly.
Remove from heat.
Stir in milk and broth.
Heat to boiling, stirring constantly.
Boil and stir 1 minute.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Pour into ungreased 2-quart casserole or rectangular 10 x 6 x 1 1/2-inch baking dish.
Bake, uncovered, in a 350° oven until bubbly, 40 to 45 minutes.
Makes 6 servings, each containing 315 calories and 16 grams fat.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Red Rice
Ingredients:
2/3 c. uncooked regular rice
1 c. chopped green pepper
1 (2.8 oz.) can Durkee French fried onions
4 chicken breast halves, fat trimmed and skinned if desired
1 (15 1/2 oz.) jar spaghetti sauce with mushrooms
1 1/4 c. water
2 1/2 c. cubed 1-inch cooked chicken
2 c. cooked long grain rice
1 c. milk
1 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen mixed vegetables
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed cream of celery soup
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. soy sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. chow mein noodles
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
In large bowl, stir together all ingredients, except chow mein noodles.
Spoon into 13 x 9-inch baking pan.
Bake for 30 minutes.
Sprinkle with chow mein noodles.
Continue baking for 15 to 20 minutes or until heated through.
Yields 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 c. sweet potatoes, cooked
1/2 stick margarine
1 Tbsp. cinnamon-sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 c. Karo syrup
Directions:
Put all the ingredients in a casserole dish with lid and bake at 400°, for about 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 medium sweet potatoes
1 c. sugar
1 bottle white Karo
1 stick butter
2 Tbsp. vanilla
Directions:
Boil sweet potatoes until done.
Peel and cool.
Cut lengthwise.
Put in 9 x 12-inch baking dish.
Mix all other ingredients until melted.
Pour over potatoes.
Cook at 375° for 40 minutes.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Glazed Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. butter or margarine
1/2 box light brown sugar
1/4 to 1/2 bottle Karo syrup
5 lb. boiled, peeled and sliced sweet potatoes
Directions:
Melt butter; add sugar and melt.
Add syrup and mix well.
Add over sliced sweet potatoes in layers.
Preheat oven to 375°.
Bake 30 to 45 minutes until syrup thickens and forms glaze.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 c. Karo dark corn syrup
1/2 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2 Tbsp. margarine
12 medium sweet potatoes, cooked, peeled and halved lengthwise
Directions:
In a small saucepan, bring first 3 ingredients to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes.
Pour 1/2 cup of syrup mixture into a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish.
Arrange potatoes in syrup.
Top with remaining syrup.
Bake in 350° oven, basting often, 20 minutes or until glazed.
Makes 12 servings.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 sweet potatoes
1/4 c. margarine
1/2 c. dark Karo syrup
1/4 c. firmly packed dark brown sugar
Directions:
Boil potatoes about 20 minutes; drain, cool and peel.
Cut in half lengthwise.
In large skillet, stir sugar, margarine and syrup.
Arrange potatoes on top (cut side down).
Cook over low heat basting occasionally or until potatoes are well glazed.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Spicy Beef Dip
Ingredients:
1 pound ground beef
1 tablespoon onion chopped
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
1 8-ounce can tomato sauce
1/4 cup ketchup
1 teaspoon oregano
1 teaspoon sugar
1 teaspoon salt
1 8-ounce package cream cheese
Directions:
Brown beef and drain.
Add all ingredients and simmer 15-20 minutes.
Then add cream cheese with the meat mixture to a crock pot.
Stir well on low heat.
Serve with corn or tortilla chips.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Spicy Beef Dip
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic
8 oz. tomato sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 c. ketchup
3/4 tsp. oregano
8 oz. cream cheese
1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Cook ground beef, onion and garlic until brown and tender. Drain grease.
Stir in the tomato sauce, sugar, ketchup and oregano.
Simmer for 10 minutes.
Add cream cheese and Parmesan cheese.
Cook until cream cheese dissolves.
Serve warm with dipping size Fritos.
It tastes a lot better than it looks!

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Spicy Beef Dip
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/4 c. catsup
3/4 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. sugar
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Brown beef, onion and garlic; drain.
Add remaining ingredients and simmer until well blended.
Serve warm with your favorite chips or crackers.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Spicy Beef Dip
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove minced garlic
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/4 c. ketchup
3/4 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. sugar
1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Brown hamburger, onion and garlic.
Drain well.
Add remaining ingredients and heat thoroughly.
Serve hot.
Good with tortilla chips or crackers.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Hot Savory Dip
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) can evaporated milk
1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 c. shredded Swiss cheese
1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
dash of hot pepper sauce
Directions:
Put all ingredients in a 1 1/2-quart microproof casserole. Cover and cook on Medium for 6 minutes.
Stir thoroughly halfway through cooking time.
Serve as a warm dip for meatballs/vegetables.
Keep warm on fondue burner.
Makes 2 cups.
